












































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Jesus Kristus wõ yen, anĩ nẽ ibor gĩ isin, Ĩ Dawid tubu, Abraham nẽ ibor.
Isak, ne tama Abraham, Jakop, ne tama Isak, Juda, ne tura tar geid, idi temeid Jakop,
Feres Sera ado, nedi temeid Juda, nedi sineid Tamar, Hesron, ne tama Feres, Ram, ne tama Hesron,
Aminadab, ne tama Ram, Nason, ne tama Aminadab, Salmon, ne tama Nason,
Boas, ĩ yogon tama Salmon, Boas sina Rahab, ĩ haiden kayau, Israel kayau sã, Obed, ĩ yogon tama Boas, yogon sina Rut, ĩ haiden kayau, Israel kayau sã, Jesi, ne tama Obed,
King Dawid, ne tama Jesi. Solomon, ne tama Dawid, Solomon ne sina ĩ, kulu kusĩ mudur Uria nẽ kayaun,
Rehoboam, ne tama Solomon, Abiya, ne tama Rehoboam, Asa, ne tama Abiya,
Jehosafat, ne tama Asa, Jehoram, ne tama Jehosafat, Usia, ne tama Jehoram,
Jotam, ne tama Usia, Ahas, ne tama Jotam, Hesekia, ne tama Ahas,
Manase, ne tama Hesekia, Amon, ne tama Manase, Josia ne tama, Amon,
Jekonia in tura tar geid, nedi temeid Josia, sain anĩ bun, Babilonem Israel tamo kayau guri difeid dirou, Babilon kalabus bun dilen.
Babilon kalabus bun dilen sain anĩ bunem, Sieltiel, ne tama Jekonia, Serubabel, ne tama Sieltiel,
Abiud, ne tama Serubabel, Eliakim, ne tama Abiud, Asor, ne tama Eliakim,
Sadok, ne tama Asor, Akim, ne tama Sadok, Eliud, ne tama Akim,
Eleasar, ne tama Eliud, Matan, ne tama Eleasar, Jakop, ne tama Matan,
Josef ĩ, ne tama Jakop, Josef ĩ Maria aiwa, Maria ĩ Jesus gõ fen, Jesus ĩ anĩ Kristus dedig.
Anĩ nigin, ibor Abraham bun tamal ile Dawid, are ibor 14, Dawid bun tamal ile Babilon kalabus dilen, are ibor 14, kalabus bun tamal ile Kristus wõ yen, are ibor 14.
Jesus wõ yen anĩ eig fiya: In sina Maria Josefem yalouf nigin digirkenen, anĩ ere, idi uruwom fau mois diyo ken, Awa Uur Fateul bunem Maria bou adon anĩ dilen.
Josef, Maria ne aiwa, ĩ nun karĩya tamo, anĩ ĩ Maria atun meleid bun yana sane ifenẽya itor ken, yaor to wogõ yen, ĩ namen kayau anĩ itornẽf nigin kisi fen.
Agef kisif mog, Negur nẽ engel, imĩya bun ĩ wagen wõ ye fen, iron, “Josef, Dawid naal, Maria wale fõ bun on kayau ibodõf nigin to kumĩ wo, ere nigin, Maria namen kare fef are, Awa Uur Fateul bunem.
Kayau anĩ kesu monog gõ fouf, õ yana ũ Jesus wouf, ere nigin, yogon tamo kayau mosor bun temeleid kel gei fouf.”
Negur nẽ od, profet sigor bun eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin, enĩ ganan wõ yen:
“Kayau taulei kesu adouf, kesu monog gõ fouf, idi yana dũ Imanuel douf,” anĩ nẽ gariya, “Negur ĩ ada ado.”
Sain Josef irik yen, Negur nẽ engel wogõ fiyen kilei agef fen, Maria yale fõ bun irou ile, in kayau ibodon.
Anĩ ere, ĩ kayau ado bouweid bagu fiya san, ile kesu monog matu gõ fen, anĩ Josef kesu yana yũ Jesus yen.
King Herod nẽ sain bun, Jesus Betlehem fonõ Judia distrik bun wõ yen, anĩ bure fele di, keleĩ tamo gaa iseyan temeleid Jerusalem disin,
idi to difen, “Kesu momou Juda neid king wõ youf den anĩ, nain wõ yen? Amã in barisa gaa iseyan melem mailen, ĩ yana malesauf nigin masin.”
King Herod od anĩ karĩ yen, ĩ wau morõ fen, idi Jerusalem dibodon anĩ ganan geid waud morõ fedin.
Agef fen, tamo kayau neid pris odudug ganan ado, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo ganan iweigneĩd, guru dife di, ĩ to fedin, “Kristus nain bagai wõ youf?”
Idi aiten dalen, “Oun Betlehem fonõ Judia distrik an, age fouf nigin kulu profet eig ye itoton:
“‘Õ Betlehem, Juda teneub bun, õ Juda neid uyu irouya atun naal bagai sã, fau õ bunem tamo yana odug ado wõ youf, ĩ anim neu tamo kayau Israel marau ibodõf.’ ”
Age de di, Herod gaa iseyan keleĩ tamo iminẽyan iweigneĩd fen, ere sain bagai barisa anĩ wõ yen anĩ kelein.
Ĩ idi Betlehem sur feid fen, iron, “Ulagauf, kesu anĩ foinenem ed ge umirẽgouf. Kesu anĩ fata gouf, kaisã bagai aya urokanag, ago ge di, ayag ele fen, yana alesauf.”
King nẽ od karĩ del fen, idi naab dale dilen, age de mog, barisa oun gaa iseyan idi dilen anĩ, ĩ ket uyu ile, kesu yenen nẽ modoũ an bagai dẽ yel ifaren.
Barisa anĩ dẽ yele di, dile fen, idi waud kulĩya odug bagai adon.
Fõ namen disorũ dilen, kesu sina Maria ado diledin, idi bobou dife fen, in yana dalesen, age de fen, nedi faa diwareĩd fen, safina ege luwa eneidi difenen, are gol, aa gaula sumeĩ nigin tõ fiyadig, moul aa bun tamal sumeĩ biya biya ado anĩ.
Herod wagenem to ke de dilauf nigin, imĩya bunem wedereid iroun, anĩ nigin, idi neid teneub bun ke douf nigin naab taka dalen.
Idi dilel mog, Odug nẽ engel, imĩya bun Josef wagen wõ yen, ĩ iron, “Fã wo, kesu sina ado gei wo, uyag Isip uleg, an ubodõg uleg mog, aya fau arokonõf, gama bagai Herod kesu imirek yukesiyouf nigin age fef.”
Anĩ nigin, Josef fã yen, kesu sina ado gei feid, bõ turan Isip diya dilen.
Josef fau an ibod mog, Herod laa fen. Anĩ bun, Odug nẽ od, profet sigor bun eig ye wogõ yen anĩ, wõ ye kisi felen, “Isip bun tamal aya neu kesu aweignen.”
Herod mogo kisi yalen, “Gaa iseyan keleĩ tamo aya didegnan,” ye fen, ĩ mogo fatuk bagai seye yen, keleĩ tamo naa nigin solo de dirokenen anĩ bun kisi es fe fen, Betlehem fonõ kalilĩ fiya anĩ kesu monog yar uru, yar tekelei anĩ ganan didenkesiyouf nigin bagai ari fedi di, didenkesin.
Anĩ bun, Negur, profet Jeremaia bunem eig ye wogõ yen anĩ, agef kisi felen:
“Rama fonõ ait taka, inã wau gudũ fiya odug karĩ den, Rahel inã odug gere tar nigin yalen, ĩ taka nem bobo fiyẽf anĩ itoron, ere nigin, yogon kesu taka to mata ibodon.”
Herod laa fe di, Odug nẽ engel, Josef Isip ibod mog, imĩya bun ĩ wagen wõ ye fen,
iron, “Fã wo, kesu sina ado gei wo, Israel teneub bun ule, ere nigin, idi kesu yukesiya nigin age difen are mogo gare den.”
Age fe di, Josef fã yen, kesu sina ado gei feid, Israel teneub bun diyok dilen.
Anĩ ere, ĩ, Akelaus ĩ mogo tama Herod fotokar Judia teneub lo fef ya anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ an ileya nigin kumĩ yen. Imĩya bun weder iroun nigin, ĩ tokõ fel, Galili distrik ilen.
Josef ilen, taun taka Nasaret dedig an ibodon. Anĩ bun, profet od eig de wogõ den anĩ kisi felen, “Ĩ Nasaret tamo douf.”
Sain anĩ bun, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo isin, gerere tuan Judia teneub bun biya od wogõ ye fen,
iweig iron, “Wauĩ falei gei, ere nigin, saa tano mogo melsak.”
Tamo enĩ nigin profet Asaia eig ye wogõ yen, “Ait taka gerere tuan iweig iron, ‘Odug nẽ naab dodok gei, in naab madur gei.’”
Jon ne gabar are kamel siwi, ĩ gaar gabar nem lũ diwan anim luwa gu fedig. Yogon saaf totobi nin te ado.
Tamo kayau Jon wagen guru difen, idi Jerusalem, Judia teneub ganan, Jordan naan kalilĩ fiya anĩ adok bun temeleid.
Idi neid mosor yaor difele di, Jon Jordan naan igunẽdin.
Anĩ ere, ĩ naan iguneĩd mog, Farisia tamo, Sadusia tamo geid musei disi di, ileid fen, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Ã, gogour sane gere tar! Didi isiyouf anĩ wal ge fen, uyagauf nigin aim irokenein?
Wauĩ falei gef are, age fiya gen faat biya ũ gouf.
Ã aug nigin kisi to eig ye irõf, ‘Abraham nemã tamamã.’ Aya arokeneik, meein eneidi bun Negur sã irõ di, Abraham gere tar wowã douf.
Safor aayũ gariyan mogo ibodok, aayũ ganan faat biya to yuk, are itu ira ken, yã malan irãf.
“Wauĩ falei gef nigin, aya naan nem naan aguneik, anĩ ere, taka ĩ aya dumeun isiyouf, ĩ megeir barikã aya wal fiya, ayam yogon ye su inukeis kenẽya kisi feleya sã. Ĩ Awa Uur Fateul yã ado nem naan iguneĩf.
Ĩ susu fiya nẽ fok iman ado, ĩ yogon susu fiya nẽ mayã waĩ fouf, yogon wit biya are wit fõ bun kuruf fen, wit ido yã mala faimud bun an irãf.”
Anĩ bure fele di, Jesus Jonem naan igunẽf nigin Galili tamal Jordan naanũ isin.
Anĩ ere, Jon Jesus gudũ fiye ken, iron, “Onom aya naan igunaya, ere nigin aya garan usif?”
Jesus aiten yalen, “Arokonok nem ago. Negur nẽ madur bagai anĩ ganan kisi falauf nigin ada age tafouf, are biya.” Age ye di, Jon dõf age fen.
Jesus naan yale bure fel fen, kaisã bagai ĩ naanũ tamal fã yen. Agef mog bagai, saa ilun bobog kã fele di, ĩ lof mog, Negur nẽ Awa Uur, ninã kuburir gen Jesus muduren isi, lalan ifenen.
Ait taka saa ilun iweig iron, “Eĩ neu Kesu, ĩ nigin aya wau laa fedig, ĩ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig.”
Anĩ bure fele di, Awa Uur Jesus itonẽ di, gerere tuan ile, Satanem kisi fiyen.
Ĩ kuri ibodon, naa foti bõ foti bure fele di, ĩ naũ fen.
Kisi fiyẽya tamo Satan, ĩ bun wõ ye fen, irokenen, “Õ Negur Naal ouf are, meein enidi urõ di, bret falei fediyouf.”
Jesus Satan aiten yalen, “Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, ‘Tamo bretem dogol to mata ifenẽf, sã, od ganan Negur sigor bun isif anim mata ifenẽf.’ ”
Age fe di, Satan Jesus yale irou, fateul taun Jerusalem irou iselen, an tempel fõ soko ilun bagai inenẽ ifaren.
Satan iron, “Õ Negur Naal ouf are, ogo ufũ urã. Ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, “‘Negur õ nigin yogon engel ari fedi di, idi õ imedim ololon daleyõf, age dife di, õ yẽ meein takam to itutu ouf.’ ”
Jesus Satan aiten yale iron, “Negur nẽ Itotoya taka buneg eig ye irok, ‘Odug ogon Negur kisi fiya bun to unenẽf.’ ”
Baban, Satan Jesus yale irou, arei odug ilun biya isel fen, teneub enei nẽ tano ganan, nedi biya fiya adok ifelnen.
Satan iron, “Enidi ganan aya afonõf, õ wageun bobou wo, selu wabiyouf are.”
Jesus Satan irokenen, “Satan, utorna ule! Ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, ‘Odug ogon Negur seli wabi fen, ĩ dogol aruna walouf.’ ”
Age ye di, Satan Jesus itornẽ ile di, engel disi Jesus aruna dalen.
Jesus mogo, Jon kalabus ibodon anĩ karĩ ye fen, kel Galili distrik ilen.
Jesus Nasaret taun itor ile, Kapenaum taun ibodon, Kapenaum are Galili daliyou sirin, Sebulun Naptali ado idi neid teneub akor bun ibodon.
Od profet Asaia eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin, agef wõ yen,
“Sebulun nẽ teneub, Naptali nẽ teneub, are naab maaĩwõ ileyan, Jordan naan sitakã, Galili distrik haiden Israel sã anidi dibodok nẽ,
tamo kayau gugum bun difaren, idi lalan odug dilen, tamo kayau laa teneub ado laa nẽ buri bun dibodon idi bun lalan iran.”
Sain anĩ bunem ilen anĩ, Jesus biya od wogõya gariya inon, “Wauĩ falei gei, ere nigin, saa tano mogo melsak.”
Jesus Galili daliyou yeri iyok isil fen, mala iran uru tura ado iledin, Simon yana taka Pita, yogon tura Endru ado. Idi maaĩ daliyoun kakãg diran, ere nigin, idi gau yaleya tamo.
Jesus iron, “Usig, aya dõ wiyag len, aya ã tamo gei fiya tamo aneneĩf.”
Kaisã bagai, idi neid kakãg folõ difel fen, Jesus dõ difen.
Anenem iyok ile fen, Jesus baban mala iran uru tura ado iledin, Jems Sebedi ne naal, yogon tura Jon ado. Idi waag bun nedi temeid Sebedi geid kakãg madur difedif dibodon. Jesus disiyouf nigin iweignẽdin.
Kaisã bagai, temeid waag ado ditor ken, Jesus dõ difen.
Jesus Galili distrik akor anĩ adok iyo ken, Juda neid uub fõ bun od ifelneĩd, saa tano ne biya od anĩ wogõ fedin, agef fen, tamo kayau atun dagi fire fire ado ilõyabidiya adok el fedin.
Ĩ nigin od anĩ, Siria teneub ganan bun iyokelen, age fe di, tamo kayau idi, dagi taka taka adodo anidi ganan Jesus wagen guri difeid, disin, idi darau odug biya adodo, idi kaa sesen adodo, idi mir adodo, idi bouweid ilolaisidiya anĩ, Jesus el fedin.
Guru fiya odug, Galili temeleid, Dekapolis temeleid, Jerusalem temeleid, Judia teneub ado Jordan naan sitakã teneub akor anĩ ganan tamo kayau Jesus dõ difen.
Gama tamo kayau musei guru dife di, Jesus ileid fen, arei wala bun isel ibodon. Yogon dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disin.
Jesus gariya ino ifelneĩd fen, iron,
“Aib idi uur nigin maleg dibodok, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, saa tano are idi neid.
Aib idi waud gudũ fedif, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi waud yo fediyouf.
Aib idi molol dibodok, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi teneub akor adouf.
Aib idi Negur nẽ madur bagai nigin naũ fedif, naan ail fedif, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi weit fediyouf.
Aib idi waud ifenẽdif, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi wau ifenẽya dalouf.
Aib idi waud bun karẽtut, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi Negur dilouf.
Aib idi maur gudũ difedig, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi Negur gere tar difediyouf.
Aib idi Negur nẽ madur bagai nigin darau dalef, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, saa tano are idi neid.
“Aib ã aya nigin tamo kayau idi kono diyeik, darau difeneik, idegẽya bun od sane ganan ã bun dirarak, gama ã nigin el yeik.
Wauĩ kulĩg fen, sereg, ere nigin, ãgenei mala solo saa tano bun odug, profet idi ket dibodoneg kulu darau age fiya bagai dalen.
“Ã teneub enĩ nẽ sol, anĩ ere, sol in kai sa kalauf are, ere naig fe di, baban kai adouf? Ĩ baban ereb kabĩ taka ifenẽya kisi feleya sã, diraile di, tamo anĩ teten dilef, disi difouf dogol.
“Ã teneub enĩ nẽ lalan. Taun taka uya bun ibodok anĩ inokeleya kisi feleya sã.
Age fiya gen, tamo kayau lam tõ de fen, beĩ kur to dinouf. Age fiya ban, idi yoki bun diseginnẽ di, anĩ lalan tamo ganan fõ anĩ bun ifenẽdif.
Age fiya bagai, ãgenei fula fiya tamo kayau lalan ifenẽdiyouf, ago ge di, tamo kayau idi ãgenei tobonuneĩ biya anĩ dile fen, ãgenei Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok anĩ seli dabiyouf.
“Aya asin anĩ, Moses nẽ Lo, profet neid od ado alelauf nigin asin to gouf, aya anĩ yaleleya nigin to asin, anĩ kisi afalauf nigin asin.
Aya momoi bagai arokeneik, sain saa teneub ado iminkeleya sã mog, sifa naal bagai, pen togo fiya anĩ Lo bun taka to fitol yale iminkalauf, idi anĩ ganan dibod mog, ereb ereb ganan kisi falauf.
Aibem taka, ĩtãfiya enĩ nẽ tekelei naal bagai anĩ to dõf fen, tamo tunĩ ĩ dõ difiyẽ age difouf nigin ifelnẽdiyouf are, ĩ saa tanon yana naal bagai youf, anĩ ere, aib taka ĩtãfiya eneidi dõf agef kisi fel ifelnẽdiyouf, saa tanon yana odug yalouf.
Anĩ aya arokeneik, ãgenei madur bagai anim, Farisia tamo ado lo ifelnẽdiya tamo neid madur bagai to wal gouf are, ã saa tanon ileya nigin kisi feleya sã bagai.
“Tamo ĩtãfiya kulu eig den anĩ karĩ gen, ‘Õ tamo to ukeis, taka ne tã yukesif are, es fiya bun ifarauf.’
Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, aibem taka tura seye ifenek are, ĩ es fiya bun ifarauf. Baban, aib taka tura irokenek, ‘Daku,’ ĩ kot bun ifarauf. Takag, aibem irok, ‘Õ neneya!’ age youf, hel nẽ yã uruwa dõya kelẽ fiyek.
“Anĩ nigin, õ Negur bun sesewi wou fenẽ kisi wale, alta garan safina urou ule fen, õ turã õ bun nauseir ado anĩ õ weder fokõ fouf are,
safina an alta garan utor yen, kel ule turã ado komo weleg fen, gama usi, Negur safina wenẽ, sesewi wouf.
“Aib õ kot bun irouleyõya nigin, ã uruwom naab luwe uleg fen, on kiwai tamo ado kaisã komo gouf. Sãf, ĩ õ es fiya tamo bun inenõf. Age fe di, es fiya tamo õ irouyõ polis imeid bun ino di, idim õ kalabus bun dirãyõf.
Aya momoi arokonok, õ kalabus bun kutũ yesiya sã mog, wareg ganan unolauf.
“Tamo ĩtãfiya eig den anĩ karĩ gen, ‘Õ seseirã to uno.’
Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, taka ĩ malam kayau lof fen, mala yũ yalef, ĩ mogo wau bun kayau anĩ bun seseirã inol.
Õ malã biyalem mosor bun inenõf are, ubodol uraile. Õ boũ adok hel bun irãya anĩ fotokar, õ boũ tunĩ taka iminkalauf, are deuf.
Õ imã biyalem mosor bun inenõf are, gudũ uraile. Õ boũ adok hel bun irãya anĩ fotokar, õ boũ tunĩ taka iminkalauf, are deuf.
“Ĩtãfiya eig fe yenen, ‘Aibem taka yogon aiwa iruwau fenẽ, kayau ado bagu fiya anĩ fara fiya nẽ pepa ifen ken, bagu fiya fara fouf.’
Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, aibem taka, yogon kayau ĩ tamo taka ado to seseirã dino mog, iruf are, ĩ kayau anĩ seseirã naab bun inenek. Anĩ aibem taka kayau anĩ yalef, tamo anĩ mogo seseirã inof.
“Takag, tamo ĩtãfiya kulu eig den anĩ karĩ gen, ‘Ã wau kuturoleya od anĩ to waleleg. Ã wau kuturoleya od, Odug mala bun unogen anĩ kulatun gouf.’
Anĩ ere, aya arokeneik, od megeir ifenẽya bun, saa mala bun to bagai wouf, ere nigin, saa are Negur nẽ ibodõya modoũ.
Oo teneub mala buneg to wouf, ere nigin, teneub are Negur ye inoya nẽ sawa. Oo Jerusalemeg mala bun to wouf, ere nigin, are King Odug in taun yana.
Õ muduremeg anĩ nigin megeir to unouf, ere nigin, õ ogon fatiya age fe di, lalau be karos be taka wõya kisi feleya sã.
Ã nigin yo yeya are yo gouf, sã de sã gouf dogol, od enĩ wal fe fen, tobol fiya are Satan bunem isif.
“Tamo ĩtãfiya eig den anĩ karĩ gen, ‘Mala fagã difouf, mala solo abag mala fagã wo. Waila are waila tura.’
Anĩ ere, aya arokeneik, tamo sane mala solo to wenẽ. Tamo taka ogon walã biyalẽ fakã fouf are, falei wel len, walã sitakãg fakã fouf.
Tamo taka ogon kolos yalouf nigin kot yõ fenẽ, malakaĩ ogon saket anĩg utorken.
Tamo taka mail tekelei ileya nigin nugo yõf, malakaĩ uruwom mail uru ulagauf.
Aibem ereb taka nigin to yok, are wenẽf. Aibem ereb taka wareg õ bun yalou fenẽf, õ to dudum wiyẽ.
“Tamo ĩtãfiya eig den anĩ karĩ gen, ‘Õ nẽ tã nigin waũ laaf fen, on kiwai anĩ kiwai wenẽ.’
Anĩ ere, aya arokeneik, ãgenei kiwai nigin wauĩ laaf fen, tunĩ darau difeneik idi nigineg kosẽ gouf.
Ago gouf are, ã Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok gere tar wowã gouf. Ĩ yogon gaa sur fef, tamo sane, tamo biya adok daledig, taka uyẽg sur fef, tamo madur, tamo madur sã adok ifenẽdidig.
Idi ã nigin orodidig anidi nigin dogol wauĩ laa fouf are, ere mala solo anĩ ã walogouf? Are takis yaleya tamog to age difedig de?
Ã tureĩ tar dogol aan wiyẽdigouf are, ere anĩ tunĩ wal fediya ago gef? Haiden are idig, anĩ to age difedig de?
Anĩ nigin, Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok ĩ madur bagai gen, ãg de madur bagai agog.
“Ã lo welegei, ãgenei tobonuneĩ madur anĩ seluma kulõ difouf ge mã, anĩ tamo kayau meleid bun yaau to du wog. Ã ago gouf, Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok mala solo to ifeneĩf.
“Sain õ maleg tamo usennẽdiyou fenẽ, õ anĩ taur to fũ fen, ait bagauf, mala yaleya tamo Juda neid uub fõ bun ado naabur, tamo idi seluma kulõ difouf de fen, age difedig gen. Aya momoi arokeneik, idi anĩ nẽ mala solo adok mogo dalen.
Anĩ õ maleg tamo usennẽdif, on imã kilẽ to keleĩ mog, imã biya melẽ age fouf,
anĩ õ iminẽyan dor walef. Ago di, on Tamã, õ iminẽyan agol, ile fen, mala solo ifonõf.
“Sain ã kosẽ gouf bun, ã mala yaleya tamo age difedig gen to agog. Idi tamo dilemãf de fen, Juda neid uub fõ namen ado naab kaleyan difar fen, kosẽya orodidig. Aya momoi arokeneik, idi anĩ nẽ mala solo adok mogo dalen.
Sain õ kosẽ wou fenẽ, õ ogon aabẽ ule, sukar unol fen, Tamã Negur, ĩ iminẽyan ibodok, kosẽ wiyẽ. Anĩ on Tamã õ iminẽyan agol, ile fen, mala solo ifonõf.
Sain ã kosẽ gouf, haiden age difedig gen, od musei to dĩg, ere nigin, idi neid kisi, nemã od musei nigin karĩ famãf de fen, idi od musei biya wogõ dedig.
Ã, idi age difedig gen, to agog, Negur ãgenei Temeĩ ĩ ereb ã lau gef anĩ mogo keleĩ mog, dum ĩ to wiyẽgedig.
“Kosẽ gou fenẽ, ã eig wog urõgouf: “‘Õ nemã Dei õ saa ilun ubodok, õ yanã fateul ibodõf,
ogon tano isiyouf, ogon oroyok saa ilun age fef gen, tenebur eineg age fouf.
Saaf naa enĩ nẽ wanamãf.
Õ amã nemã mosor nigin wederẽ tu kalauf, are idi amã bun mosor dinof, amãg idi neid mosor nigin wederamã tu kelef gen.
Kisi famãya bun to uroulemãf, sesen anĩ bun tamal amã walelnamãf.’
Tamo idi ã bun mosor dinoyeĩf, ã idi neid mosor nigin wedereĩ tu kalauf are, ãgenei Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok, ĩg ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kalauf.
Anĩ ere, ã tamo idi neid mosor nigin wedereĩ to tu kalauf are, ãgenei Temeĩ, ĩg ãgenei mosor nigin weder to tu kalauf.
“Sain ã kuri gouf, mala yaleya tamo sẽya nẽ neweid age difedig gen to ago gei, ago gouf, tamo anĩ dile fen kuri def douf. Aya momoi arokeneik, anĩ nẽ mala solo adok mogo dalen.
Anĩ ere, sain õ kuri wouf, fatiyã moul u ken, nawã usurũf.
Anĩ bunem, õ kuri bek oo sã be, tamo idi õ nigin to keleĩ youf. Ogon Tamã, Negur iminẽyan ibodok, ĩ yogo dogol keleĩ youf, anĩ ogon Tamã õ iminẽyan ereb ago wouf ile fen, mala solo ifonõf.
“Aug nigin safina biya biya tenebur ein to kuru wog. An dedek yãf, maat te yũf, bẽ tamog narĩ de, bẽ dalouf.
Ã aug nigin safina biya biya saa ilun kuru wog. An dedek to yãf, maat te to yũf, bẽ tamog to narĩ de, bẽ dalouf.
Ogon safina biya biya ibodok nẽ an, ogon waũg an yenẽf.
“Mala are bouwa nẽ yal. Õ malã biyauf are, ogon bouwã ganan lalan lauf.
Anĩ ere, õ malã sane lauf are, ogon bouwã ganan gugum kalauf. Lalan õ ado anĩ gugum kalauf, gugum are odug bagai!
“Aib taka ĩ yogon marau uru bun kabĩ to yalouf. Anĩ taka kiwai ifen ken, taka anĩ nigin wau laa fouf. Ĩ taka anĩ dõf fen, taka anĩ mala irim fouf. Anĩ nigin, ã uru to aruneid walogouf, Negur ado moni.
“Age fiya nigin, aya ã arokeneik, ã ãgenei bouweĩ mata ibodõf nigin to osig fen, ere saaf tãf, ere naan tãf gouf. Ã ãgenei bouweĩ nigin to osig fen, ere gabar tafilaĩf gouf. Mata anĩ saaf wal fiya, bouwa anĩ gabar wal fiya sã de?
Saa ilun ã ninã uledigouf, idi saaf to ditenẽdig, idi saaf u de fen, kin to dinodig, anĩ ere, ãgenei Temeĩ saa ilun yogo ifoutnẽdidig. Ã idi anĩ wal fediya sã de?
Ã takam yogon mata nigin osi ye fen, aua tekelei tobol fiya kisi feleya de?
“Ere nigin ã gabar nigin osi gef? Dubur aa munĩ, naig fe odugedig anĩ ulogouf. Idi kabĩ to daledig, to diwadig.
Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, kulu King Solomoneg, yogon saki gegẽ biya biya ifonun anim, aa munĩ eig fediya taka to wal fen.
Anĩ ere, Negur, dubur aa munĩ gama dogol ifarauf, nile di, yã irãf anĩ, agef naki fediyouf are, ã bun idi wal fediya bagai Negur ifounneĩf, age fiya sã de, ã momoiya naal bagai ado?
Anĩ nigin, to osi wog urõgouf, ‘Ere saaf ada tãf?’ oo ‘Ere naan ada tãf?’ oo ‘Ere gabar ada tafilaĩf?’
Haiden idi enĩ ganan nigin meleid dimirẽdig. Ãgenei Temeĩ saa ilun lau gef anĩ ganan keleĩ.
Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ tano ado yogon madur bagai ketem umirẽg, ago ge di, safina eneidig ganan ifeneĩf.
Age fiya nigin, naa nil nẽ anĩ nigin to osi wog, nil nẽ are yogo nigin osi youf. Naa mugu mugu nẽ morõ are idi dogo dalouf.
“Taka to es wiyẽg, ago gouf, ãg es yeĩf.
Anĩ nigin, tunĩ es wedigef gen, ãg agef es yeĩf. Ãgenei es fiya nẽ naab de tekelei bun ãg agef es yeĩf.
“Õ ere nigin turã mala teteur lo fen, õ ogon aa masak malã bun ibodok anĩ to ulef?
Aa masak ogon malã bun ibod mog, naig fe di, turã nigin dogol urokenek, ‘Utor len, aya ogon malã teteur alelkonõf’?
Õ mala yaleya tamo, õ ogon malã bun ketem aa masak walel kelẽ wol fen, dum turã bun mala teteur walelauf.
“Ereb fateul anĩ gaũ to urakenẽdig. Ãgenei maaĩ tuwa meli bagai pel anĩ bor to urakenẽdig. Ã ago gouf, yedim lalai difouf. Age de fen, falei del, ã serek de fisik diyeĩf.
“To gouf, agef ã ifeneĩf; umirẽgouf, ã gurug gouf; godugodu gouf, ã sukar kã feneĩf.
Aibem taka to fef, yalouf; aibem taka imirek, gurug fouf; aibem taka godugodu fef, sukar kã fel kenẽf.
“Ã anĩ takam, ĩ naal bret nigin to fef, ĩ meein ifenẽf de?
Takag, ĩ gau nigin to fef, ĩ gogour ifenẽf de?
Seseneĩ bagai ã, ãgenei kesu safina biya biya anĩ ifenẽdiya ã keleĩ bagai, age fiyauf are, Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok, safina biya biya aib idi to difiyek, ãgenei wenẽdigedig anĩ wal fiya, idi ifenẽdiyouf!
Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb ganan bun, ereb taka idim age diyeĩf anĩ oroyeik anĩ, ãg idi nigin ago gouf. Od enĩ Lo od ado Profet od neid kaũ.
“Bobog kidõ bun usorug ulagauf. Ere nigin, daũ fiya bun ileya nigin bobog bilalã fiya, naab odug. Tamo kayau musei naab odug anĩ diledig.
Anĩ ere, mata tano bun ileya nigin bobog kidõ, naab naal. Anĩ nigin, tamo kayau teke tekeleim dogol, anĩ fata difedig.
“Idegẽya profet anidi lo weledigei. Idi ege sipsip siwi difoun ken, ã garan disif, anĩ ere, idi namedin gaũ kuĩ sane ado.
Idi neid faat yũf bun, ã idi dogo anibo be biya be ulogouf. Tamo kayau idi wei biya barik bun, gira udum bun daledig de?
Age fiya gen, aayũ biya are faat biya yũdig, aayũ anibo are faat anibo yũdig.
Aayũ biya ĩ, faat sane yũya kisi feleya sã, aayũ anibo are faat biya imaya kisi feleya sã.
Aayũ ganan faat biya to imaf are, ditu dale yã malan dirãf.
Age fiya nigin, idi neid faat yũdig bunem, ã idi nigin yaor keleĩ youf.
“Idi aya ‘Odug, Odug’ de fen dirokanadig, idi ganan saa tanon to dilauf. Aibem ĩ, neu Dei saa ilun ibodok in oroya dõf age fef anim dogol ilauf.
Naa anĩ bun, musei aya dirokanauf, ‘Odug, Odug, amã õ yanã nem profet od wogõ maun, amã õ yanã nem kaa sesen maruid fen, õ yanã nem memelik musei manodin!’
Age de di, aya yaor arokenẽdiyouf, ‘Aya ã keleĩ sã. Ã sane gide gedig, uyaleleg!’
“Age fiya nigin, taka ĩ neu od eneidi karĩ ye fen, dõf age fef, ĩ keleĩ tamo yogon fõ meein teten inon gen.
Sain uyẽ burabura isin, kuwei odug ile, solalã fel fen, yau odug fã ye fen, fõ yoũ fe di, to kubũ yen, ere nigin, tor gariya meein teten inon.
Anĩ ere, aib taka ĩ neu od eneidi karĩ ye fen, to dõf age fef, ĩ neneya tamo yogon fõ subusir teten inon gen.
Sain uyẽ burabura isin, kuwei odug ile, solalã fel fen, yau odug fã ye fen, fõ yoũ fe di, kubũ ye narĩf irailen.”
Od ganan Jesus wogõ ye idikele di, tamo kayau in od ifelnẽdin anĩ nigin terẽ den,
ere nigin, Jesus ifelnẽdin are, taka ĩ yana adom gen age fiya od wogõ fedin, idi neid lo ifelnẽdiya tamo age difedig gen sã.
Jesus arein tamal kutũ yesi di, tamo kayau musei dõ difiyen.
Tamo lepra dagi ado isi, Jesus wagen ibor bobou fe fen, irokenen, “Odug, õ waũ irom are, aya el fiyaya nigin kisi feleyam.”
Jesus ima iran, tamo anĩ kobũf fen, iron, “Aya wau irok, bouwã biyaf.” Age ye di, kaisã bagai yogon lepra dagi sa kelen.
Jesus irokenen, “Õ aib taka to urokenẽf. Õ ogo pris wagen ule, bouwã ufelne ken, Moses nẽ od dõ fen, safina sesewi wo, anĩ bunem õ biya lel anĩ, tamo kayau dilouf.”
Jesus Kapenaum taun wõ ye di, Rom kusĩ tamo neid orowa Jesus wagen isi fen, isennẽf nigin to fiyen.
Ĩ iron, “Odug, neu kabĩ tamo fõ bun darau odug ado ilolaisin yenek.”
Jesus irokenen, “Aya ele, el afiyẽf.”
Age ye di, kusĩ orowa aiten yale iron, “Odug, aya to biya nigin aya kisi afef, õ neu fõ bun to usiyouf. Malakaĩ, õ od dogol urõ di, anĩ neu kabĩ tamo dagi sa kalauf.
Aya yug nigin age fiya, ayag neu odug anĩ farumen abodok, kusĩ tamo idig aya farumeun dibodok. Aya taka enĩ arokenek, ‘Ule’ afiyek, ĩ ilauf. Aya taka arokenek, ‘Õ usi’ au di, ĩ isidig. Neu kabĩ tamo enĩ ago afiyek, ĩ agef age fedig.”
Od anĩ kusĩ orowa age irõ di, Jesus od anĩ karĩ ye, terẽ ye fen, tamo kayau dõ difiyen anidi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aya Israel bun ãgenei momoiya odug eig fiya taka to ailen.
Aya arokeneik, musei fau gaa iseyan gaa ileyan temeledim disiyouf, idim modoũ dalel fen, saa tano nẽ tar odug bun, Abraham, Isak, Jakop geid saa tanon dibodõf.
Anĩ ere, Israel tamo kayau musei Negurem idi nigin saa tano dodok fe kenẽdin anidi, fau dumeitur gugum bẽ mayarẽ irarãf, an inã odug ado firi de fen, goboreid kikokõ youf.”
Jesus age wogõ yel fen, kusĩ orowa irokenen, “Kel ule! Õ ogon momoiya kilei bagai, õ nigin dõf agef ifonõf.” Sain anĩ wogõ ye mog bagai, yogon kabĩ tamo dagi sa kelen.
Jesus Pita nẽ fõ bun ilen, Pita nẽ mam bouwa uruwa odug ado fatarẽ yen mog, ilen.
Jesus kayau ima anĩ kobũ fe di, bouwa uruwa fara fiye kele di, kaisã bagai kayau fã yale, Jesus aruna yalen.
Gugum mog, tamo kayau kaa sesen adodo musei guri difeid, Jesus wagen disin. Age dife di, Jesus od nem kaa sesen iruid fen, dagi adodo ganan el fedin.
Jesus enĩ ganan age fen, are Negur ĩ, profet Asaia bunem od eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin: “Ĩ yogo neda ilõyabiya yales, neda dagi faali fen.”
Sain anĩ Jesus mala iran, tamo kayau musei kalilĩ difiyẽ di, daliyou sitakã dibal dilauf nigin in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin.
Age fiyeĩd mog, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo taka wagen isi fen, irokenen, “Tise, õ narib ulauf are, aya õ dõ ayõf.”
Jesus aiten yale iron, “Gaũ kuĩ idi yenẽya nẽ modoũ ku ado, ninã lalo bun diyok idi uru ado, anĩ ere, Tamo Naal ĩ mudur inoya nẽ modoũ sã.”
In dõ fiya taka irokenen, “Odug, fau de, folõ wiya len, aya ele fen, neu dei mũ afel fen.”
Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Õ aya dõ wiya, laa tamo idi, laa tutur abob mumã difouf.”
Jesus waag owor isile di, in dõ fiya tar ĩ geid dilen.
Idi keleĩ sã mog, maaĩ daliyoun yau totol fã yen. Agef mog, maaĩ odug fã ye, waag yũ di, waag anĩ naanũ imutkesilau fenẽ age fen. Anĩ ere, Jesus mulã yenen.
In dõ fiya tar dilen, turĩ difiyẽ, diron, “Odug, usennamã! Amã mogo naanũ mamutatã gare mausiyou fenẽ!”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Ãgenei momoiya naal bagai, ere nigin ã fatuk kumĩ gef?” Age ye fen, ĩ fã ye, maaĩ yau ado ou fiyẽdi di, oditekei kee delen.
Tamo idi terẽ de fen, to difen, “Tamo eĩ naig fiya bagai? Maaĩ yau ado karĩ difiye ken, dõ difef!”
Jesus Gadara neid teneub bun daliyou sitakã ilen, kaa sesen adodo tamo uru matmat bunem dile fen, Jesus tarabã difen. Tamo uru kuĩ bagai diledin nigin, tamo ganan naab anĩ to diyõdig.
Anĩ idi diweig fen, diron, “Negur Naal, õ amã nigin ere naig wamãf? Õ naa wenen anĩ fau mog, gama bagai daig wamã fenẽ ein usif de?”
Idi difaren sitakã gerõ nuwa an, bor musei saaf doko diyon.
Kaa sesen idi Jesus digonen, “Õ tamo eneidi bun tamal urumã fenẽf are, amã bor musei namedin sur wamãf.”
Jesus kaa sesen irokenẽdin, “Uleleg!” Idi ulolõ deis fen, diselen bor namedin dilelen. Bor ganan gududu de bebeigir disil, daliyoun naanũ gare desin.
Bor lo fiya tamo diya, taun disil fen, Jesus kaa sesen irudi di, bor gare den anĩ ganan wogõ den. Age de fen, idi ereb tamo uru kaa sesen adodo bun wõ yen anĩ nigineg wogõ den.
Age de di, tamo kayau taun temeleid adok, Jesus ileya nigin dilen. Idi Jesus dile fen, idi neid fonõ anĩ itor ilauf nigin digonen.
Jesus waag taka sõ ye, daliyou ibal fen, yogon taun ilen.
Tamo tunĩ tamo bouwa ilolaisin gabgab bun yen mog, Jesus wagen diroulen. Idi neid momoiya Jesus ile fen, Jesus tamo bouwa ilolaisin irokenen, “Kesu, waũ unois, ogon mosor alelkonok.”
Anĩ karĩ de fen, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ, idi neid kisi bun diron, “Tamo eĩ Negur kono fiyek!”
Idi neid kisi kelei ken, Jesus iron, “Ã ere nigin wauĩ bun kisi sane agef wõ yef?
Nanĩ anĩ irõya nigin karika: ‘Ogon mosor alelkonok,’ de? Oo ‘Fã, ufar uyok ule’?
Anĩ ere, Tamo Naal ĩ tenebur ein mosor yaleleya nigin yana ado anĩ ã keleĩ youf nigin…” Age ye fen, tamo bouwa ilolaisin irokenen, “Fã ufar, ogon gabgab wale urou, fonõ ule.”
Age ye di, tamo fã yale, fonõ ilen.
Tamo kayau guru difen ganan anĩ meledim dile fen, terẽ de kumĩ den. Negur yogo tamo yana enĩ ifenẽdin anĩ nigin, idi Negur yana dalesen.
Jesus an tamal iyok ile fen, mala irakelen, tamo yana Matyu takis yaleya fõ bun ibod mog, ilen. Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Aya dõ wiya.” Age ye di, Matyu fã yale, Jesus dõ fen.
Jesus Matyu nẽ fõ bun bõ saaf yõ mog, takis yaleya tamo, mosor ado tamo kayau musei disi fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid weim saaf don.
Farisia tamo idi anĩ dile fen, idi Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar to difedin, “Ere nigin ãgenei tise, takis yaleya tamo, mosor ado tamo kayau geid saaf doko?”
Od anĩ Jesus karĩ ye fen, iron, “Idi bouweid biya bagai, dokta gein ileya nigin to waud yenẽdig, tamo dagi ado idim dogol, dokta gein ileya nigin waud yenẽdig.
Uleg fen, od enĩ dir ge fen, kaũ ere yeĩf anĩ keleĩ youf, ‘Aya wau ifenẽya anĩ orouf, sesewi fiya sã.’ Anĩ nigin, aya tamo madur anidi iweignẽdiya nigin to asin, aya mosor adodo anidi iweignẽdiya nigin asin.”
Age ye mog, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo nẽ dõ fiya tar disin, Jesus to difiyen, “Naig fe di, amã Farisia tamo geid kuri mau di, ogon dõ fiya tar idi kuriya sak?”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Tamo, kayau yalou fenẽ tar bun, ne tã tar disennek idi fau weim dibod ken, naig ĩ nigin waud gudũ fouf? Dum sain wõ ye di, an ne tã tar bun tamal yalelnẽf bun anĩ, idi gama kuri douf.
“Tamo taka, gabar masak mata, gabar tubu ado baguf fen, to iwauf. Anĩ age fouf, gabar masak matam gabar tubu dĩ fe di, tubu kudef, awa kanouf.
Takag, tamo idi wain mata anĩ meme gabar tubu anĩ bun to ditinẽf. Age difouf, meme gabar kude fele di, wain oho yalauf. Meme gabar sane lauf. Age fiya sã, idi wain mata are meme gabar mata bun ditinẽf. Age fe di, uru idi kabĩ ifenẽdiya nigin biya difarauf.”
Od enĩ Jesus fau wogõ ye mog, Juda neid uub fõ nẽ uyu irouya taka isin, Jesus wagen ibor bobou fe fen, iron, “Gama bagai neu barai laa fel. Õ uma fen, imã teten uno di, kayau naal baban kel mata ibodõf.”
Jesus fã yale, uruwom dile di, yogon dõ fiya tar idig dilen.
Dile mog, kayau taka ogõ dagi faimud ado yar tuwelf iyon anĩ, Jesus dume dume isi fen, Jesus nẽ kolos iri kobũ fen.
Kayau anĩ yogon kisi iron, “Aya de yogon kolos dogol kobũ afouf, anĩ aya neu dagi sa kalauf.”
Jesus falei yelen, kayau anĩ ile fen, iron, “Nau barai, waũ unois, ogon momoiya anim dagi sa kel konok.” Age ye mog bagai, kayau in dagi sa kelen.
Jesus uyu irouya nẽ fõ bun isour ilen, mala iran, tamo kayau musei kokũ de, i de mog, iledin.
Jesus iron, “Uyaleleg, kayau naal enĩ laa fiya sã, mulã yenek.” Age ye di, idi kasã difiyen.
Tamo kayau mayarẽ irud laisi fen, Jesus aab namen ilen, kayau naal ima yale iroun. Age fe di, kayau naal fã yen.
Nenerĩ anĩ wogõ de di, teneub anĩ ganan bun iyokelen.
Jesus modoũ anĩ itor ken, iyok ile mog, tamo uru meleid ifofakeleya Jesus dõ difiyen, diweig diron, “Dawid Naal, amã nigin waũ inõ!”
Jesus fõ aaben ile di, tamo uru meleid ifofakeleya wagen dilen, Jesus idi to fedin, “Ã momoi gef, aya ã meleĩ el afe di, lo gouf nigin kisi feleya?” Idi aiten dalen, “Ao, Odug.”
Age de di, Jesus imam meleid kobũ feid fen, iron, “Momoi gef kilei, ã nigin age feneĩf.”
Idi neid meleid gama kelẽ delen. Jesus totol bagai katũ feid fen, iron, “Enĩ nigin taka to urokenẽgouf.”
Anĩ ere, idi kututũ deis dile fen, Jesus age fen anĩ, teneub anĩ nẽ akor ganan bun od dinof diyon.
Idi Jesus ditornẽ dile mog, tamo taka kaa sanem ait ifokelen anĩ Jesus wagen dirousin.
Kaa sane iru di, iyan, tamo ait ifokeleya wogõ yen. Tamo kayau guru difen ganan terẽ de fen, diron, “Kulu nem isi gama, Israel bun eig fiya taka to tailen.”
Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo idi diron, “Are kaa sane neid mudur yana bunem, ĩ kaa sesen irudif.”
Jesus taun ganan fonõ fonõ ganan bun iyo ken, nedi uub fõ bun ifelneĩd, saa tano nẽ biya od wogõ feid fen, dagi gariya fire fire ganan el fedin.
Sain Jesus mala iran, tamo kayau musei guru difen anĩ ileid fen, idi nigin wau yun, ere nigin, idi morõ adodo isennẽdiya sã, idi sipsip marau sã age fiya gen.
Anĩ yogon dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Kabier saaf musei biya ima bure felen, anĩ ere, kabĩ tamo musei sã.
Age fiya nigin, kusu fiya marau, Odug to wiyẽg, kabĩ tamo susur fedi di, yogon kabier kususu fiya nigin dilauf.”
Jesus in dõ fiya tar tuwelf iweignẽdi di, wagen guru difen, kaa sesen irudiya, dagi gariya fire fire ganan el difediyouf nigin megeir ifenẽdin.
Eĩ aposel tuwelf yeneid, Simon (in yana Pita dedig), yogon tura Endru, Jems Sebedi naal, ne tura Jon,
Filip, Batolomyu, Tomas, taka Matyu takis yaleya tamo, Jems Alfeus naal, taka Tadeus,
Simon Selot, taka Judas Iskariot, ĩ anĩ Jesus kiwai ifenen.
Idi tuwelf enidi, Jesus fadim enĩ ado dõ difouf nigin sur fedin: “Idi ibor fire Juda ibor sã wagedin to ulagauf, Samaria neid taun taka taka buneg to uleg.
Israel atun idi sipsip fõ delen anidi bun dogol ulagauf.
Sain ã ulagauf, od enĩ anĩ wogõ gef uyõg, ‘Saa tano mogo melsak.’
Dagi el wedig, gare den turĩ wedig, lepra dagi ado el wedig, kaa sesen urudig. Megeir anĩ ã na yaleya sã ege walegen, anĩ nigin, ege luwa wenẽdigouf.
Ã gol moni, silwa moni, kapa moni be, ãgenei kodolẽ taka to bagai ufeg.
Delẽ uyõgou fenẽ, delẽ iyõya nẽ faa sã, gabar uru, sendel uru, manig uru agog to guri gouf, tamo kabĩ dalef, idi de mala ereb lau difef anĩ difenẽdiyadidig.
“Narib gouf, taun be, fonõ taka be bun ulegef, ã meleĩ unog, tamo ã nigin sere yeĩf, yogon fõ bun ubodõg, dum utorõg uleg.
Ã fõ anĩ bun ulegef, ãgenei wau inosiya nẽ aanya wenẽdigouf.
Fõ anĩ bun tamo kayau biya diyeik, ãgenei wau inosiya nẽ aanya an urofosig, idi age fiya sãf, ãgenei wau inosiya nẽ aanya anĩ baban keg waleg.
Aib taka ĩ ã nigin to sere yeĩf, ãgenei od to karĩ youf, ãgenei yeĩ aasu tu weleg fen, fõ be taun anĩ utorõg ulagauf.
Aya momoi arokeneik, Sodom Gomora ado darau dalen anĩ wal fiya, es fouf naa anĩ bun, taun anĩ in darau odug bagai yalouf.
“Aya ã sur ayeik are, sipsip gaũ kuĩ atun sur fiya gen. Anĩ nigin, ã gogour age fedig gen, kisi ed ge waleg fen, ago gouf, ninã kuburir gen, imatkesiya ubodõgouf.
Ã tamo nigin lo walagauf, idi fau kaunsel imeid bun dineneĩ di, idi Juda neid uub fõ bun wagagã diyeĩf.
Idi aya nigin de fen, ã guri diyeĩ diroule, gawaman mudur, king ado wagedin difarnei ken, ã idi geid fen, haiden Israel sã anidi meleid bun, aya nigin wogõ gouf.
Anĩ ere, idi ã kot bun ifareya nigin gei diyeĩf, ã wauĩ to morõ ken, ere od tarõf, naig ta tarõf anĩ nigin to kisi fatuk walogouf. Sain anĩ bun, ã ereb od urõgouf nigin fau ifeneĩf.
Are ãgem to urõgouf, ãgenei Temeĩ nẽ Awa Uur ĩ yogo ã bunem wogõ youf.
“Tura fã youf, tura nigin kiwai fen, idegẽ di, laa bun inenẽf, tamag naal ado age difouf, kesu fã douf, idi neid sina tama nigin kiwai dino fen, idi dogo laa bun dinenẽdiyouf.
Tamo ganan idi, aya nigin fau kiwai difeneĩf, anĩ ere, aib taka megeir ino ifar ile idikeleya bun ouf, Negur isennẽf.
Teneub taka bun, ã darau odug difeneĩf are, uyu takã uyag uleg. Aya momoi arokeneik, ã fau Israel neid taun ganan bun to uyõg udikeleg mog, Tamo Naal kel isiyouf.
“Skul kesu ĩ yogon tise to wal fouf, age fiya gen, ferfer ĩ yogon marau to wal fouf.
Skul kesu ĩ yogon tise genẽf, are de. Takag, kabĩ tamo ĩ yogon orowa genẽf, are de. Fõ anĩ tama yana dun Belsebub, anĩ nigin, fõ anĩ tamo ganĩ be dibodok idi yeneid sane bagai dalef!
“Age fiya nigin, ã idi to kumĩ wedig. Gama ereb ein dede fiya yenek, are fau lelek falauf, gama ereb iminẽyan yenek, are dum fau keleĩ youf.
Gama ereb aya gugum bun wogõ ayeik, are fau gaa lalan bun wogõ gouf bagai; gama ereb kosesẽyam karĩ gef, dum fau fõ agaran ufareg fen, uweigig urõgouf bagai.
Idi bouwa dukesif, anĩ ere, malakanon yukesiya kisin sã anĩ to kumĩg. Anĩ ere, taka ĩ malakanon bouwa ado yũ orok fe, hel bun irãya kisi feleya anĩ dogol kumĩ gouf.
Fisisir uru ten toea nem na nigin sur gedig. Anĩ ere, ãgenei Temeĩ yogon wau to irõ mog, taka tenebur to kubũ youf.
Ãgenei mudureĩ bun fatiyeĩg ganan iwes yalen.
Age fiya nigin, to kumĩg, ã Negur mala bun safina odug bagai, fisisir musei wal fediya.
“Aibem taka aya nigin tamo meleid bun kurõ falaisiyouf, ayag ĩ nigin neu Dei saa ilun ibodok wagen kurõ afalaisiyouf.
Anĩ ere, aibem taka aya nigin tamo meleid bun wa fouf, ayag ĩ nigin neu Dei saa ilun ibodok wagen wa afouf.
“Ã to kisi eig wog, aya tenebur ein wau inosiya irou isiya nigin asin gouf. Aya wau inosiya irou isiya nigin to asin, anĩ ere, aya soworu irou isiya nigin asin.
Anĩ nigin, aya tubi kobõ fiya nigin asin, “‘Tamo ĩ tama nigin kiwai inouf, ne barai yogon sina nigin kiwai inouf, yanawau ĩ sina yana nigin kiwai inouf.
Tamo nẽ kiwai are, de tamo anĩ nẽ ibor bun tamalem fã de fen, kiwai difenẽf.’
“Aibem taka ĩ, yogon tama sina nigin wau fatuk ifen ken, aya nigin to age fef, ĩ aya dõ fiya nigin to kisi falauf. Aibem taka ĩ, yogon naal be, ne barai be wau fatuk ifen ken, aya nigin to age fef, ĩ aya dõ fiya nigin to kisi falauf.
Aibem taka ĩ, yogon aa tetek orowa to sef fen, aya dõ fiyaf, areg aya dõ fiya nigin to kisi falauf.
Aib taka tenebur ein nẽ mata alouf ye fen imirek, yogon mata fõ yalauf. Aib taka yogon mata aya nigin irailef, yogon mata kel yalouf.
“Tamo aibem ã yaleyeik, are aya yaleyaf, tamo aibem aya yaleyaf, are aib ĩ aya sur fiyan ĩ yalef.
Aibem taka ĩ, ĩ profet nigin ye fen, profet taka yalef, ĩ profet mala yalouf, aibem taka ĩ, ĩ madur tamo nigin ye fen, madur tamo taka yalef, ĩ madur tamo nẽ mala yalouf.
Aibem taka, naan medir kap tekelei, tamo yeneid sã anĩ taka ifen yãf, ere nigin, ĩ neu dõ fiya tamo, aya ã momoi arokeneik, ĩ yogon mala solo to bagai wal fiyẽf.”
Jesus yogon dõ fiya tamo tuwelf tai feid bure fel fen, anenem tokõ fel, Galili taun taka taka bun ifelneĩd fen, biya od wogõ fediyouf nigin ilen.
Age fe di, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo kalabus bun ibod ken, Kristus kabĩ agef yalef de di, od anĩ karĩ yen, Jon yogon dõ fiya tar Jesus to difiyẽf nigin
sur fedi di, dilen, to difiyen, “Tamo isiyouf den, õ ogo yeir de? Oo amã fau taka nigin tari mafouf?”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Kekug uleg fen, ã wedereim karĩ gel, meleim ulegel anĩ Jon wogõ wiyẽg,
meleid ifofakelen kelẽ def, to diyon mogo diyok, lepra dagi adon mogo el fedin, wedereid daabun od karĩ def, gare den turĩ fedif, maleg bun biya od wogõ fedif.
Tamo aya nigin wau to firagagaũ fef, Negur ĩ el fiyek.”
Jon nẽ dõ fiya tamo ditornẽ dilele di, Jesus, tamo kayau guru difen anidi, Jon nigin irokenẽdiya anĩ gariya inon, “Ã ere bagai anĩ ulogouf nigin, gerere tuan ulegen? Ã unin yaum walala fe di, ulogouf nigin ulegen de?
Anĩ sãf are, ere bagai ã ulogou fenẽ, ulegen? Tamo taka kolos biya bagai ifonun de? Sã, idi kolos biya bagai difonuk age fiya are, king nẽ fõ bun dibodok.
Ba, ere bagai anĩ ã ulogou fenẽ, ulegen? Profet taka de? Are de yeir, aya ã arokeneik, ĩ profet wal fediya.
Tamo anĩ, ĩ nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye itoton: “‘Aya neu arũ tamo sur afe di, ĩ ket uyu ilauf, im uyulil ogon naab dodok fouf.’
Aya ã momoi arokeneik, kayau onoudi kesu dalen idi atun an, taka nem Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo to wal difiyen, anĩ ere, aib taka saa tanon yana naal bagai ado ĩ Jon wal fiya.
Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo in sain bunem isi gama, saa tano, megeir ado bilalaũ fedig, megeir ado tamom saa tano anĩ irou irouledig.
Profet ganan Moses nẽ Lo ado, saa tano nigin profet od wogõ def disin, isi Jon bun daun.
Ã walogou fenẽ wauĩ oroĩf are, ĩ Eliya, ĩ fau isif ya anĩ.
Aib ĩ weder adouf, karĩ youf.
“Tamo kayau sain enei bun, idi nigin ere bunem aya kisi afouf? Idi simom maket modoũ bun dibod ken, abob diweignẽdidig gen:
“‘Amã ã nigin kelel maun, anĩ ere, ã to kui gen; amã kanon seg malen, anĩ ere, ã to wauĩ gudũ fen.’
Anĩ Jon isin, saaf to yon, wain to yon, idi dirõdig, ‘Ĩ kaa sane ado.’
Tamo Naal isin, saaf yon, wain yon, idi dirõdig, ‘Eĩ saaf wan, wainei yedig, dobu irãya tamal, ĩ, takis yaleya tamo, mosor tamo ado geid nigal difedig.’ Anĩ ere, kisi biya ĩ in tobonunã anĩ bunem, biya yaoref.”
Jesus ĩ, taun tunĩ bun memelik musei inodin, anĩ ere, idi waud to falei den, anĩ nigin, Jesus ou fiyẽdin.
“Korasin taun, õ malalon ado! Betsaida, õ malalon ado! Ã bun memelik musei anodin, age fiya gen anĩ Taia taun Saidon taun ado bun wõ yem are, mogo kulu waud falei de fen, wau gudũ fiya nẽ gabar difoun ken, aasur dibodom.
Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, es fiya sain bun, morõ Taia taun Saidon taun ado dalouf anĩ wal fiya, ã walogouf.
Õ Kapenaum, õ yanã anĩ saa ilun iselauf de? Sã bagai, õ laa neid modoũ bun usilauf. Memelik õ bun wõ yen anĩ age fiya, Sodom taun an wõ yem are, ĩ gamag eig fe di, ibodom.
Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, es fiya sain bun, morõ Sodom yalouf anĩ wal fiya, õ walouf.”
Sain anĩ bun, Jesus iron, “Dei, saa ado teneub nẽ Odug, aya õ yanã alesef, ere nigin, safina eneidi, kisi biya ado keleĩ adodo to dilouf nigin õ unokon, ago fen, simõ dibodon anidi bun yaor won.
Ariya, Dei, enĩ are ogon waũ filolõ fiya biya bunem agon.
“Ereb ereb ganan, neu Dei ĩ aya bun inon. Taka nem Naal keleĩ sã, Dei yogo dogol. Taka nem Dei keleĩ sã, Naal yogo, tunĩ idi Naalum Dei ifelnẽdiyouf nigin igirnẽdif anidim dogol keleĩ.
“Ã ganan morõ yei ken, sii yeik, wageun usig, ago ge di, aya wau inosiya afeneĩf.
Neu sũ waleg, oroweĩ seg fen, aya bun keleĩ walogouf, ere nigin, aya molol fen, aya imatkesiya. Ago gouf, meleĩkanon siwo inoya gurug fouf.
Ere nigin, neu sũ karika fen, neu morõ yal bagai.”
Sain anĩ Juda neid Sabat naa bun, Jesus wit kabĩ atu atu iyok ilen. Jesus in dõ fiya tar naũ feid fen, wit tunĩ gei fiya gariya dino fen, don.
Farisia tamo idi anĩ dileid fen, idi Jesus dirokenen, “Ulef! On dõ fiya tamo tar idi, ĩtãfiya difodul ken, Sabat naa bun oug difef.”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Dawid in kusĩ tamo anidi geid naũ fedi di, Dawid age fen anĩ, ã Negur nẽ Itotoya bun to uwesegen de?
Ĩ Negur nẽ fõ namen ilen, agef fen, ĩ in kusĩ tamo anidi geid, bret fateul anĩ don, anĩ idi age fiya kisi feleya sã, anĩ idi ĩtãfiya difodul ken, age difen anĩ, prisem sã age difoũ nẽ anĩ.
Oo ã Lo od anĩ to be uwesegen de? Are Sabat naa bun, pris tempel namen kabĩ dalef bunem naa anĩ didodok, anĩ ere, anĩ mosor sã.
Aya ã arokeneik, tekelei ĩ tempel wal fiya anĩ, are yeir.
Ã od enĩ, ‘Aya wau ifenẽya anĩ orouf, sesewi fiya sã,’ anĩ nẽ gariya keleim are, ã tamo morõ sã ege mosor ado to wiyẽdigem.
Ere nigin, Tamo Naal yogo dogol Sabat naa nẽ Odug.”
Jesus modoũ anĩ itor ken, iyok ile, Juda neid uub fõ namen ilen,
tamo taka ima sitakã gege fefu fen, ĩ an ibodon. Idi Jesus bouwa bun od dinou fenẽ nigin naab dimir ken, abugã to difiyen, “Sabat naa bun tamo madur fiya anĩ idodõya sã de?”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã anĩ taka, ã atun ĩ sipsip taka ado anĩ Sabat naa bun mekur isilauf, ã to uleg waleseg unenẽgouf de?
Tamo ĩ sipsip wal fiya bagai! Anĩ nigin, biya anĩ Sabat naa bun age tafef, are idodõya sã.”
Age ye fen, ĩ tamo anĩ irokenen, “Imã fara wol.” Age ye di, ĩ ima fara fele di, oditekei ima madur len, age fe di, ima sitakã gen wõ yen.
Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo idi dilelel fen, Jesus yukesiya nigin katõ difen.
Idi neid kisi kelei ken, Jesus modoũ anĩ itoron. Tamo kayau musei ĩ dõ difiyẽ di, ĩ idi neid dagi ganan el fedin,
tamo kayau ganan wedereid iroun, ĩ aib yeya anĩ to yaor difouf nigin.
Enĩ Negur, profet Asaia bunem eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin, agef wõ yen:
“Eĩ neu kabĩ tamo ayam agirnen, ĩ nigin aya wau laa fedig, ĩ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig; aya neu Awa Uur ĩ bun anouf, ĩ anĩ teneub ganan haiden bun Negur nẽ madur bagai anĩ kurõ fesiyouf.
Ĩ to seye ye fen, ait bagam to iweig irõf; takam in ait naabur to karĩ youf.
Werĩ felu reya ĩ to were fouf, takag, lalan komomor fe mog, ĩ to gare falauf, agef mog, Negur nẽ madur bagai anim ganan wal fouf.
In yana bun, teneub ganan haiden, idi neid waud an yenẽf.”
Tamo taka kaa sanem irou di, mala sigor ado ifofakelen, idi anĩ dirousi di, Jesus ĩ el fiyen. Age fe di, ĩ mala kelẽ ye fen, od wogõ yen.
Tamo kayau adok waud bun terẽ de fen, diron. “Enĩ anĩ Dawid Naal de?”
Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo idi karĩ de fen, diron, “Are kaa sane neid mudur Belsebub yana bunem dogol, tamo enĩ kaa sesen irudif.”
Jesus idi neid kisi kelei ken, idi irokenẽdin, “Tano ganan yogo kiwai ifen ken, fara fouf, are sane lauf, taun ganan bun be, fõ ganan bun be, idi dogo fara difouf, idi to difarauf.
Satan ĩ yogo Satan iruf, ĩ yogo nigin faraf, yogo kiwai ifenek, naig fe fen, anĩ yogon tano ifarauf?
Are aya Belsebub yana bunem kaa sesen arudif, ere bunem ãgenei tamo kayau kaa sesen dirudidig? Anĩ nigin, idim ã es diyeĩf.
Anĩ ere, aya Negur nẽ Awa Uur bunem kaa sesen arudif are, Negur nẽ tano mogo ã bun isil.
“Takag, taka megeir ado nẽ fõ bun ile, in safina bẽ yalou fenẽ, are ĩ tamo megeir ado anĩ ket ifokel fen, gama ĩ in safina fõ bun bẽ yalouf.
“Taka ĩ aya to fedẽ fiyaf, ĩ neu kiwai, takag, taka ĩ aya ado to guru mafef are, ĩ firagagaũ fef.
Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, mosor kono fiya ado ganan tamo bun wõ yef, are yalelauf, anĩ ere, Awa Uur kono fiyek, are mosor to yalelauf.
Taka ĩ Tamo Naal nigin kiwai ifen ken, kobu yef are, in mosor yalelauf. Ani ere, taka ĩ Awa Uur Fateul nigin kiwai ifen ken, kobu yef are, in mosor to yalelauf, gama sain enĩ bun ado dumen isiyouf buneg to yalelauf.
“Aa biya are faat biya yũdig, aa sane are faat sane yũdig, anĩ nigin, aa ganan faat bunem keleĩyadig.
Ã, gogour sane gere tar, naig fe di, ã sane anim ã biya nigin wogõ gouf? Ereb ã namein isokosef, are sigoreim kaaresi gef.
Tamo biya, safina biya ĩ bun kuru fef anĩ irou isidig, age fe di, tamo sane, safina sane ĩ bun kuru fef anĩ irou isidig.
Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, tamo idi od kisi sã wogõ den anĩ ganan, fau es fiya sain bun, idi fau dogo Negur mala bun, mugu mugu kurõ difesiyouf.
Anĩ nigin, ogon od bunem õ mosor sã yõf, ogon od bunem õ mosor ado yõf.”
Age fe di, Farisia tamo tunĩ, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ geid, idi Jesus dirokenen, “Tise, amã õ bun memelik nẽ uris taka mailau fenẽ.”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Sane seseirã ibor, sain enei nẽ tamo kayau anĩ, memelik nigin to difef! Anĩ ere, taka to ifelneĩf, de profet Jona nẽ uris anim dogol ifelneĩf.
Ere nigin, Jona naa towo bõ towo, gau odug namen ibodon, age fiya gen, Tamo Naal naa towo bõ towo, teneub akor ilon yenẽf.
Niniwe tamo kayau fã de fen, es fiya naa bun, ibor enĩ, sain enei nẽ tamo kayau sane difiyẽdiyouf, ere nigin, idi mogo Jona wogõ ye di, waud falei den, gama taka Jona wal fiya are yeir.
Kuin Saut tamal fã ye fen, es fiya naa bun, ibor enĩ, sain enei nẽ tamo kayau sane fiyẽdiyouf, ere nigin, kayau anĩ, King Solomon nẽ keleĩ biya karĩ youf nigin teneub idiyan tamal isin, gama taka King Solomon wal fiya are yeir.
“Sain kaa sane tamo bun tamal ulõ yeis fen, gerere tuan ile, si inoya modoũ imirek ile to fotou fef.
Agef fen, ĩ irok, ‘Aya fõ atoron anĩ bun baban kelauf.’ Sain ĩ kel isif, fõ ani daku, waĩ difel fen, madur difen anĩ ilef.
Anĩ nigin, ĩ ile fen, baban kaa sesen ĩ wal fiya sewen anĩ geif irou isif, age de fen, idi namen dile, an difaref. Age dife di, tamo anĩ gai sane bagai lef, uruwa bun ne tobonunã anĩ wal fiya. Age fiya bagai, sain enei nẽ tamo kayau, ibor sane enĩ gama difaref, idi tobonunã anĩ adouf.”
Sain Jesus tamo kayau wogõ feid mog, in sina tura tar geid serẽ difar fen, ĩ geid od wogõ douf nigin orodin.
Takam ĩ irokenen, “Ogon sinã turã tar geid serẽ difaref, idi õ geid od wogõ dou fenẽ orodif.”
Jesus aiten yalen, “Ai anĩ neu naai, ai anĩ neu turau tar?”
In dõ fiya tar bun imam ifelneĩd fen, ĩ iron, “Enidi anĩ neu naai, neu turau tar.
Taka ĩ, neu Dei saa ilun ibodok anĩ nẽ oroya dõf age fef anĩ ĩ, neu turau, neu mainou, neu naai.”
Naa de anĩ bun, Jesus aaben tamal kutũ yeis ile, daliyou sirin ibodon.
Guru fiya odug kalilĩ difiyẽ di, tamo kayau adok ubun difar mog, ĩ waag namen isil ibodon.
Agef fen, ereb ereb musei yaab od nem irokeneĩd fen, iron, “Kabĩ marau taka, faat irarãf nigin ilen.
Sain ĩ irarak ile mog, tunĩ naab luwen kuku ren, are ninã disi dakasin.
Tunĩ meein tuar kuku ren, an teneub badagar. Are kaisã bagai fokũ den, ere nigin, teneub are badagar bagai.
Anĩ ere, sain gaa ise di, bali are ilala di, laasi yedin, ere nigin, idi warumutei sã.
Faat tunĩ malũ duri atun kuku ren, are malũ duri anĩ fã ye fen, bali sile feledin.
Faat tunĩ teneub biya bun kuku ren, are idi biya imadin, taka biya handred, taka biya siksti, taka biya teti age fef ilauf.
Aib ĩ weder adouf, karĩ youf.”
In dõ fiya tar ĩ wagen disi to difiyen, “Ere nigin õ yaab od nem tamo kayau urokenẽdif?”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Saa tano nẽ waa keleĩ youf nigin are mogo ã ifenein, anĩ ere, tamo kayau to ifenẽdin.
Ereb taka aib ĩ ado are, anĩ wal fiya ifenẽf, anĩ ĩ musei adouf. Ereb taka aib ĩ sã, ereb ereb ĩ ado areg ĩ bun yalelauf.
Anĩ nigin, aya yaab od nem arokenẽdif, ere nigin, “Idi meledim diledig, anĩ ere, idi meleid fokõya sã, idi wederedim karĩ dedig, anĩ ere, idi wedereid fokõya sã, to keleik.
Idi bun, Asaia nẽ profet od kisi felef: “‘Ã wedereim karĩ gouf, anĩ ere, wedereĩ to fokõ youf, ã meleim ulogouf, anĩ ere, meleĩ to fokõ youf.
Ere nigin, tamo kayau enei, idi waud katĩ felen, idi wederedim karĩya malai bagai, age de fen, idi meleid difofakelen, age fiya sam are, idi meledim dilem, wederedim karĩ dem ado, idi waud fokõ ye fen, falei de di, aya idi el afedim.’
Anĩ ere, ãgenei meleĩ nigin el fedif, ere nigin, ã ulegef, ãgenei wedereĩ nigin el fedif, ere nigin, ã karĩ gef.
Anĩ aya ã momoi arokeneik, profet musei, madur tamo geid, ã ulegef anĩ dilou fenẽ nigin waud yenen, anĩ ere, idi meledim to dilen, takag, karĩya ã karĩ gef anĩ karĩ dou fenẽ nigin waud yenen, anĩ ere, idi wederedim to karĩ den.
“Yaab od bun, faat irarãya tamo nẽ gariya anĩ karĩg:
Taka ĩ, saa tanon nẽ od karĩ ye fen, ĩ weder to fokõ yef, sane taka isi, faat yogon wau bun iraran anĩ son fiyek. Are faat naab luwen iraran anĩ age fiya.
Takag, faat meein tuar kubũ yen are, tamo ĩ od karĩ ye fen, kaisã bagai ĩ od anĩ yale fen, wau bun kulĩ yef.
Anĩ ere, ĩ warumutei sã, anĩ nigin, ĩ sain meluk to ibodõf. Sain, biya od nigin morõ be, kafĩ fiya be isif, ĩ kaisã bagai irofosif.
Takag, faat taka malũ duri atun kubũ yen are, tamo ĩ od karĩ yef, anĩ ere, tenebur mata ibodõya nẽ sii fiya, safina ado ibodõya nẽ kisi fiya anidim, biya od sile fe di, anim biya to yũf.
Takag, faat teneub biya bun kubũ yen are, tamo ĩ od karĩ ye fen, fokõ yef, are ĩ biya yũf, taka biya handred, taka biya siksti, taka biya teti agef imauf.”
Jesus yaab od taka irokenẽdin, “Saa tano ĩ, tamo taka yogon kabĩ bun, wit faat biya iraran gen.
Anĩ ere, tamo adok mulaĩ den mog, yogon kiwai isin, lili wit kabier irara ken, agef yen ilen.
Sain wit bali fokũ ye fen, biya olili den, agef mog, lilig wowã den.
“Marau nẽ kabĩ tamo, ĩ wagen disin diron, ‘Tamo biya, õ faat biya on kabier to uraran de? Lili anĩ nainenem disin?’
“Ĩ aitedin yalen, ‘Kiwai takam age fen.’ “Ne kabĩ tamom to difiyen, ‘Amã mele anĩ kususu mafelauf anĩ õ oroyok de?’
“Ĩ aitedin yalen, ‘Sã, ere nigin, lili kususu ge mã, ã wit ado kususu gouf.
Malakaĩ, weim difar mog, fau kusu fiya sain bun. Sain anĩ bun, aya kususu fiya tamo arokenẽdiyouf: Lili ketem kurug fen, ufafãg, dum yakur feid isaikalauf nigin; agog fen, wit kurug, neu kin gurig uleg.’”
Jesus yaab od taka irokenẽdin: “Saa tano ĩ, masted faat tamo takam yale fen, yogon kabier itenen gen.
Anĩ ĩ faat ganan nigin naal bagai, anĩ ere, ĩ odugouf, ĩ kabier saaf ganan wal fediya aa wõ youf. Age fe di, ninã ilun temeleid disi, were bun dibodõf.”
Jesus baban yaab od taka irokenẽdin: “Saa tano ĩ, yis kayau takam yale fen, flawa odug ado falei fe di, ganan gẽ yedig gen.”
Jesus od enĩ ganan, yaab od nem tamo kayau wogõ fiyẽdin. Ĩ od ganan to kurõ falaisi irokenẽdin, yaab od nem dogol.
Anĩ bunem, Negur profet bunem eig ye wogõ yen anĩ, agef kisi felen: “Aya yaab od bunem sigoroum kurõ afesiyouf, gariya bun teneub ino fen, ereb ereb inokakan anĩ aya yaor afouf.”
Jesus tamo kayau itorneĩd fen, fõ namen ilen. In dõ fiya tar ĩ wagen disi fen, diron, “Kabier lili nẽ yaab od anĩ, amã faded wamã.”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Tamo tekelei faat biya iraran, are Tamo Naal.
Kabĩ are tenebur tamo kayau, faat biya anĩ, are Negur nẽ tano nẽ gere tar, lili are Satan nẽ gere tar,
kiwaim lili iraran, are Satan. Kusu fiya are saa teneub ado idiyẽf bun, kususu fiya tamo are idi engel.
“Anĩ nigin, lili kususu feid, yã yakur feid isaikalauf, age fiya gen, saa teneub ado idiyẽf bun, age fouf.
Tamo Naal ĩ, yogon engel sur fediyouf, idi yogon tano bun ereb ereb ganan mosor dinodig ado, tamo kayau ganan sane age difedig gei difeid fen, dalelnẽdiyouf.
Idi yã mala bobo rouf bun dirarãf, an inã odug ado firi de fen, goboreid kikokõ youf.
Age fe di, madur tamo idi, gaa gen nedi Temeid nẽ tanon fula difouf. Aib ĩ weder adouf, karĩ youf.
“Saa tano ĩ, safina biya bagai kabier inokon gen. Tamo taka fotou fe fen, baban kabier inokon. Agef fen, wau al fef ile, safina adok ĩ ado anĩ, na nigin sur fe fen, akor anĩ na yalen.
“Takag, saa tano ĩ, na yaleya tamo, maaĩ tuwa meli bagai pel biya, na nigin imirek gen.
Ĩ meein medeĩya taka moni odug nẽ anĩ fotou fe fen, ile, safina adok ĩ ado anĩ na nigin sur fe fen, meein medeĩya anĩ na yalen.
“Takag, saa tano ĩ, kakãg daliyou bun gau bou fire fire gei fiya nigin dirãdig gen.
Sain kakãg isokose di, gau yaleya tamo dĩ dife, ubun ise di, anĩ idi dibod ken, gau biya gei de, karam namen difeid fen, sesen anĩ are dirarailen.
Age fiya bagai, saa teneub ado idikalauf bun eig fouf. Engel idi disi fen, idi madur tamo atun sesen anidi gei de dale,
yã mala bobo ref bun dirarãf, an inã odug ado firi de fen, goboreid kikokõ youf.”
Jesus to fedin, “Ã od enĩ ganan wedereĩ fokõ yef de?” Idi diron, “Yo, amã karĩ mauf.”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Anĩ nigin, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo ganan saa tano nigin ifelnẽdin are, idi fõ tama gen, ĩ safina biya nẽ aaben tamal safina mata tubu ado irou isidig.”
Jesus yaab od eneidi bure fel fen, anenem iyok ilen.
In fõ gariyan isi fen, ĩ an tamo kayau dogo neid uub fõ bun ifelnẽdin, age fe di, idi terẽ den. Idi to difen, “Tamo eĩ, kisi biya ado memelik nẽ totol enei, nain yalen?
Ĩ kapenta naal sã de? In sina Maria sã de? In tura tar Jems, Josef, Simon, Judas ado sã de?
In main tar ganan, ada weim to tabodok de? Tamo enĩ enei ganan nain yalen?”
Age de fen, idi ĩ kiwai difenen. Anĩ ere, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Profet taka ĩ, in fõ gariyan ado in fõ bun dogol, ĩ yana sã.”
Ĩ an memelik musei to inon, ere nigin, idi to momoi den.
Sain anĩ bun, Galili nẽ uyu irouya Herod Jesus nigin od karĩ ye fen,
in kabĩ tamo irokenẽdin, “Enĩ Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo, ĩ laa fen anĩ kel fã yen! Anĩ nigin, memelik nẽ totol ĩ bun kabĩ yalef.”
Kulu Herod, in tura Filip nẽ aiwa, Herodias nigin, Jon yale ifõ, kalabus bun inenen.
Ere nigin, Jon ĩ irokenẽdig, “Õ ĩtãfiya ufodul ken, turã nẽ kayau walen.”
Herod Jon yukesiya nigin wau yenen, anĩ ere, tamo kayau kumĩ fedin, ere nigin, idi ĩ profet taka dedig.
Herod sina gõ fen anĩ nẽ naa bun, Herodias nẽ barai seg kui ye fen, dole kenẽdi di, Herod wau al bagai fen.
Age fe di, ĩ wau adok kuturol fen, ne barai ereb taka nigin to fouf, de anĩ bagai ifenẽf yen.
In sinam weder te yabi di, ĩ iron, “Beĩ taka bun Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo mudur uno fen, ein wanauf.”
King ĩ wau togun, anĩ ere, wau kuturol fen, tamo kayau meleid bun kurõ fesin anĩ nigin, in oroya dõf anĩ bagai ifenẽf nigin wogõ ye fen, tamo sur fe di,
Jon kalabus bun ula gudũ fen.
In mudur beĩ bun dino diroule, ne barai difenẽ di, ĩ sina gein irou ilen.
Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar disi, in bouwa buru dale mũ difen. Age de fen, idi dilen, Jesus dirokenen.
Jesus, Herod Jon ula gudũ fen anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ mugu bagai waag bun moilin ilen. Tamo kayau idi anĩ karĩ de fen, taun temeleid yedim dõ difen.
Sain Jesus kutũ yeis fen, mala iran, tamo kayau musei iledin, ĩ idi nigin wau yu ken, idi neid dagi el fiyẽdin.
Mogo bok isi di, in dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disi diron, “Eĩ gerere tuan, sain mogo sa kelef. Tamo kayau susur wo di, dilalauf, ago di, idi fonõ fonõ dile fen, dogo neid saaf na dalouf.”
Jesus irokenẽdin, “Idi ileya nigin kisi to yenẽf. Saaf yõya nigin ãgem wenẽdigouf.”
Idi dirokenen, “Amã ein bret faif, gau uru ado dogol.”
Ĩ iron, “Wageun gurig urousig.”
