Tamo kayau fisir bun dibodadãf nigin Jesus irokenẽdin. Bret faif gau uru ado, imam yale, saa ilun itad fen, ĩ Negur de fiye ken, bret mumã fen. Agef fen, in dõ fiya tar ifenẽdi di, idim tamo kayau difenẽdin.
Idi ganan don anĩ kisi felen. Age fe di, in dõ fiya tar, tamo kayau bret dokon, tunĩ ditoraran anĩ fito difen, karam tuwelf eweid gere fen.
Tamo bret don anĩ, idi faif tausen age fiya, kayau kesu geid iwesediya sã.
Kaisã bagai, Jesus, in dõ fiya tar waag bun idi ketem sitakã dilauf nigin sur fedin. Age de mog, ĩ tamo kayau irudin.
Jesus idi irud le fen, ĩ yogo arein kosẽ youf nigin iselen. Ĩ an mugu ibod mog, bõ irou isin.
Anĩ ere, waag mogo teneub itoron gerõ ifaren, yau odug fã ye di, moloun wĩ ye fen, waag yũ di, ilef isif fen.
Wef mog, Jesus daliyou teteatu idi gedin iyok ilen.
Sain in dõ fiya tar meleid diran, daliyou teteatu iyõ mog, dile fen, idi tererẽ den. Idi diron, “Eĩ baraũ,” kumĩ de fen, ui guru den.
Anĩ ere, kaisã bagai Jesus irokenẽdin, “Totol ufareg! Are ayam. To kumĩ wog.”
Pita solof iron, “Odug, onom ouf are, urokana len, naan teteatu õ garan asiyouf.”
Jesus iron, “Usi.” Age fiyẽ di, Pita waag bun kutũ yeis, naan teteatu Jesus wagen iyok ilen.
Anĩ ere, ĩ yau ile fen, kumĩ ye di, gamai imutuk isil fen, iweig iron, “Odug, usenna!”
Kaisã bagai, Jesus ima iran, yalesne ken, irokenen, “Õ momoiya naal, ere nigin õ waũ uru ado?”
Age ye fen, idi uru waag namen sosõ de di, yau kee relen.
Anĩ dile fen, idi waag namen difaren, Jesus nigin seli dabi diron, “Momoi bagai, õ anĩ Negur Naal.”
Sain idi daliyou sitakã dibal dilen, Genesaret teneub bun wõ den.
Tamo kayau fonõ anĩ bun temeleid, Jesus kelei ken, idi fonõ anĩ kalilĩ fiya fõ fõ ganan od dinon. Fonõ fonõ idi neid dagi tamo guri difeid, Jesus wagen disi fen,
idi dagi tamo yogon gabar irig kobũ difouf nigin, Jesus digonen. Ganan idi ĩ kobũ difen, dagi fara feledin.
Sain anĩ bun, Farisia tamo tunĩ, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ geid, Jesus garan Jerusalem temeleid disi to difiyen,
“Ere nigin on dõ fiya tar, mudur ado neid tobonunã wal difedig? Idi neid imeid kulo fiya sã, saaf dõdig!”
Jesus solof irokenẽdin, “Ere nigin ã ãgenei tobonuneĩ dõg fen, Negur nẽ ĩtãfiya wal gedig?
Ere nigin, Negur iron, ‘Õ sinã tamã yeneid wales,’ ‘Aibem taka sina be tama be gelu fiyẽf, ĩ laa bun dinenẽf bagai.’
Anĩ ere, ã urõgedig, ‘Tamo taka, sina be, tama be idi bun irõf, “Ereb taka õ isennõya nigin ayam ifonõya anĩ, ayam Negur afenem,”
ĩ age fef anĩ bunem in tama yana seli kulõ fiya nigin to age fouf,’ gedig. Ãgenei tobonunã age fiya bunem Negur nẽ od to dõ gedig.
Ã mala yaleya tamo! Asaia ĩ, ã nigin profet od eig ye wogõ yen in od tutuk:
“‘Tamo kayau enidi, nedi sigoredim aya selu kulõ difedig, anĩ ere, idi neid waud aya nigin gerõ ifaref.
Idi aya yanau dalesedig, are ege. Idi neid ifelnẽdiya are tamo nẽ keleĩ dogol dõ difedig.’ ”
Jesus tamo kayau iweig laisi, irokeneĩd fen, iron, “Karĩg fen, wedereĩ fokõf.
Ereb taka mayarem tamo awa kurẽ isilef anim, ĩ amuyẽ to ifenẽdig, anĩ ere, ereb taka namenem awa kurem ulõ yesif anim, ĩ amuyẽ ifenẽdig.”
Age ye di, in dõ fiya tar ĩ garan disi to difiyen, “Farisia tamo idi od enĩ karĩ de fen, waud õ nigin to biyaf anĩ, õ karĩ wof de?”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Aayũ ganan, neu Dei saa ilun tamal im to itenanan, are warumutei ado kususu fouf.
Utornẽdig; idi uyu irouya nigin meleid ifofakelen. Mala ifofakeleya tamo taka, mala ifofakeleya taka gim fiyẽf are, idi uruwom mekur kuku douf.”
Pita iron, “Yaab od enĩ nẽ gariya faded wo urokanamã.”
Jesus to fedin, “Ã fau nene gef de?
Ã to ulegedig de? Ereb taka awa gerinem te namen isilef are te ado iledig.
Anĩ ere, ereb taka awa bun wõ yef are wauda bunem isedig anim, tamo amuyẽ ifenẽdig.
Ere nigin, wauda bun tamal wõ yef, are kisi sesen, tamo yukesiya, seseirã inoya, noli tobonunã, bẽ, kot bun idegẽya od bou bun yũya, dumen od wogõya.
Enĩ ganan anĩ tamo amuyẽ ifenẽdig, anĩ ere, ima kulo fiya sã saaf doko anim, tamo amuyẽ to ifenẽdig.”
Jesus modoũ anĩ itor ken, Taia Saidon ado neid teneub akoron ilen.
Haiden kayau Kanan tamal taka, melsã an tamal Jesus wagen isin iweig iron, “Odug, Dawid Naal, aya nigin malalon yõ! Neu barai kaa sanem irou di, to biya bagai yenek.”
Anĩ ere, Jesus od taka to solo fenen. Anĩ nigin, in dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disi, totol bagai dirokenen, “Kayau sur wo di, ile, ere nigin, ĩ iweig fen, iweig fen, dõ fadaf.”
Jesus kayau aiten yalen, “Negur aya sur fiyan are, sipsip Israel atun fõ delen anidi bun dogol.”
Kayau anĩ isin, wagen ibor bobou fe fen, ĩ iron, “Odug, aya usenna!”
Jesus aiten yalen, “Kesu nanaal neid saaf yale fen, gaũ irarak kenẽdiya are to biya.”
Kayau anĩ iron, “Odug, are momoi, anĩ ere, gaũ idig moroid tar tebol bun saaf dõ di, momout kuku re di, dõdig.”
Age ye di, Jesus aiten yalen, “Kayau, õ momoiya odug ado! Ogon waũ irok agef ifonok.” Sain anĩ bun bagai, ĩ ne barai el felen.
Jesus an itor ken, Galili maaĩ yeri dõ fen. Agef fen, ĩ arein isel ibodon.
Tamo kayau musei wagen disin, yeid kirorõya, meleid ifofakelen, iborodim gogo dedig, aiteid ifofakelen, dagi fire fire museig, Jesus ye gariyan guri dife dirou disi di, ĩ el fedin.
Aiteid ifofakelen od wogõ den, iborodim gogo dedig madur feid difaren, yeid kirorõya diyon, meleid ifofakelen lo difen, anĩ ganan tamo kayau dile fen, terẽ den. Age fe di, idi Israel nẽ Negur yana dalesen.
Jesus, in dõ fiya tar iweignẽdi di, wagen disi di, irokenẽdin, “Aya tamo kayau enidi nigin waud inaf, idi mogo aya geid naa towo dibodon, anĩ ere, gama ereb taka yõya sã. Aya, idi naũ susur afedi di, dilauf anĩ to orouf, age afouf are, idi luwen kuku douf.”
In dõ fiya tar dirokenen, “Amã gerere tuan ein bret kisi feleya nain male fen, musei enĩ weit mafediyouf?”
Jesus to fedin, “Bret ganĩ ã ado?” Idi diron, “Bret sewen, gau nanaal teke tekelei ado.”
Jesus tamo kayau tenebur dibodadãf nigin irokenẽdin.
Agef fen, Jesus, bret sewen gau ado, imam yale iroun, ĩ Negur de fiye ken, bret anĩ mumã feid fen, in dõ fiya tar ifenẽdi di, idi bagam tamo kayau difenẽdin.
Idi ganan don anĩ kisi felen. Dumen in dõ fiya tar, tamo kayau bret dokon, tunĩ ditoraran anĩ fito difen, karam sewen eweid gere fen.
Tamo bret don anĩ idi fo tausen, kayau kesu geid iwesediya sã.
Jesus tamo kayau susur feid, dilele di, ĩ waag bun sõ ye, Magadan akoron ilen.
Farisia tamo Sadusia tamo geid, Jesus wagen disi, kisi difiye ken, saa ilun nẽ memelik taka meledin inouf nigin to difiyen.
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Sain aragau isi di, ã urõgedig, ‘Sain biyau fenẽ, ere nigin, saa giri yef,’
bonimei di, ã urõgedig, ‘Gama uyẽ yau ado fouf, ere nigin, saa giri ye fen, budũ iyokelef.’ Ã saa bun es fiya nigin keleĩ bagai, anĩ ere, ã ereb sain nẽ uris es fiya nigin kisi feleya sã.
Sain enei nẽ tamo kayau, ibor sane seseirã inoya nẽ anĩ, memelik nẽ uris dimirẽdig, anĩ ere, taka to ifenẽdiyouf, de Jona nẽ uris dogol ifenẽdiyouf.” Age ye fen, Jesus idi itorneĩd ilen.
Sain idi daliyou sitakã dibal dilen, in dõ fiya tar bret yaleya nigin wedereid tu kelen.
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Lo welegei! Farisia tamo ado Sadusia tamo neid yis nigin, ã lo welegei.”
In dõ fiya tar idi dogo dogol katõ de fen, diron, “Ĩ agef irok, ere nigin, ada bret to tarousil nigin.”
Idi neid wogõya Jesus kelei ken, to fedin, “Ã momoiya naal bagai, ere nigin ã bret sã ge fen, aug tutur wogõ gef?
Ã wedereĩ fau to fokõ yef de? Ã to karĩ welegef, bret faif anĩ faif tausen don, age fe di, karam ganĩ ã kuru ge di, eweid gere fen?
Takag, bret sewen anĩ fo tausenem don, age fe di, karam ganĩ ã kuru ge di, eweid gere fen?
Ã naig fe di, wedereĩ to fokõ yef, aya bret nigin ã to arokeneim de? Anĩ ere, ã lo welegei, Farisia tamo ado Sadusia tamo neid yis nigin.”
Age ye di, idi mogo wedereid fokõ yen, ĩ yis bret bun dinodig anĩ nigin to wogõ fedin, ĩ Farisia tamo ado Sadusia tamo neid ifelnẽdiya anĩ nigin wogõ fedin.
Sain Jesus Sisaria Filipai nediwon isi fen, in dõ fiya tar to fiyẽdin, “Tamo kayau Tamo Naal nigin ai dedig?”
Idi dirokenen, “Tunĩ dirok, õ Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo, tunĩ dirok, õ Eliya, tunĩ dirok, õ Jeremaia oo profet taka be.”
Jesus to fedin, “Ba ã uleg? Aya nigin ã ai gef?”
Simon Pita aiten yalen, “Õ anĩ Kristus, Õ mata ibodõya Negur Naal.”
Jesus solof iron, “El fiya õ ado, Simon Jona nẽ naal, ere nigin, on keleĩ are tamo nẽ keleĩ bunem sã, are neu Dei saa ilun tamal in keleĩ bunem.
Anĩ nigin, aya õ arokonok, õ Pita, meein enĩ teten neu sios anouf, laa nẽ megeir anim sios to wal fiyẽf.
Aya saa tano nẽ ki õ afonõf, ereb õ tenebur ein ufok, are saa ilun ouneg ifõf, ereb õ tenebur ein biru wof, are saa ilun ouneg biru fouf.”
Age ye fen, Jesus ĩ Kristus yeya anĩ, aib taka to dirokenẽf nigin, in dõ fiya tar wedereid iroun.
Sain anĩ bunem ilauf bun, Jesus yogo nigin in dõ fiya tar yaor fe irokenẽdin, ĩ Jerusalem ilauf bagai, an darau musei, mudur adodo, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo imeid bun yalouf, an ĩ dukesiyouf, naa towo bure fele di, mata kel fã youf.
Pita Jesus yale, yerin irou ile ou fiyen, ĩ iron, “Odug, sã bagai! Enĩ ganan õ nigin to bagai wõ youf!”
Jesus falei yel, Pita irokenen, “Satan, dumeun ule! Õ aya naaburau gudũ wof; on kisi are Negur nẽ sã, on kisi tamo nẽ dogol.”
Age ye fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Aib taka aya dõ fiyau fenẽ, ĩ yogon oroya lai fesil fen, ĩ yogon aa tetek faali fe fen, anĩ aya dõ fiyauf.
Ere nigin, aib taka yogon mata isennẽf nigin oro fef are, fõ yalauf, aib taka yogon mata, aya nigin irailauf are, mata anĩ gurug fouf.
Tamo taka ĩ, teneub enĩ ganan kakarai fe fen, akorou yef, anĩ are, ĩ yogon malakanon irailauf, ere biya ĩ yalouf? Takag, tamo taka yogon malakanon nigin ere mala solof fen, ĩ kel yalouf?
Tamo Naal, in Tama nẽ fula fiya medeĩya ado in engel geid disiyouf, agef fen, tamo mugu mugu ereb age fef anĩ kilei, ĩ mala solo age fiya bagai ifenẽdiyouf.
Aya momoi arokeneik, tunĩ ein difaref fau to gare de mog, idi Tamo Naal in tano bun isi di, dilouf.”
Naa sigis bure fele di, Jesus, Pita, Jems, taka Jon Jems nẽ tura geif fen, idi mugu arei odug ilun diselen.
An Jesus idi meleid bun bouwa falei felen. In nawa gaa gen fula felen, in kolos lalau fen, yal gen lalanen.
Agef mog, an idi meleid bun Moses, Eliya ado wõ de fen, Jesus weim wogõ den.
Pita Jesus irokenen, “Odug, ada ein ibodõya nigin biya bagai. Õ oroyõf are, aya salafat towo anouf, taka ogon, taka Moses nẽ, taka Eliya nẽ.”
Pita fau wogõ ye mog, lalo lalau bagai idi kerub fedin, ait taka lalo namen iron, “Eĩ neu Kesu, ĩ nigin aya wau laa fedig, ĩ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig. Ĩ karĩ wiyẽg!”
Anĩ in dõ fiya tar karĩ den, idi neweid kususur de fen, tenebur gurorõ de tererẽ den.
Anĩ ere, Jesus isin, kobũ feid fen, ĩ iron, “Fafãg, to kumĩg.”
Idi ditadsen, taka to dilen, Jesus dogol.
Idi arei bun diyok disi fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã ereb ulegel enĩ, aib taka to urokenẽg, fau Tamo Naal laa bun tamal kel fã ye di.”
In dõ fiya tar Jesus to difiyen, “Ere nigin lo ifelnẽdiya tamo dirõdig, ‘Eliya ĩ ketem isiyouf bagai’ dedig?”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Momoi bagai, Eliya isi fen, ereb ereb ganan madur fediyouf.
Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, Eliya mogo isi bure felen, idi anĩ ĩ nigin to kelei ken, ereb ereb ganan idi waud iron kilei, ĩ nigin mogo age difen. Age fiya gen, Tamo Naal idi imeid bun darau yalouf.”
Jesus age wogõ ye di, in dõ fiya tar idi wedereid fokõ yen, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo nigin irok den.
Sain idi tamo kayau gedin disin, tamo taka Jesus wagen isi fen, ibor bobou fen.
Ĩ iron, “Odug, neu kesu nigin malalon yõ. Ĩ mir yuk sain, sane bagai firi ye fen, sain musei yãg iledig, naanũg iledig.
Aya, ĩ, on dõ fiya tar wagedin arou elen, anĩ ere, idi el fiyẽya kisi feleya sã.”
Jesus solof iron, “Sain enei nẽ tamo kayau, ibor enĩ, sane, momoiya sã, sain ganĩ aya ã geid tabodõf? Sain ganĩ aya ã nigin wau aukesilauf? Kesu wageun ein urousig.”
Jesus kaa sane ou fiyẽ di, kesu bun tamal ulõ yeis ile mog, kesu ĩ bou karika len.
Age fe di, in dõ fiya tar mugun Jesus wagen disi to difiyen. “Ere nigin amã kaa sane iruya kisi feleya san?”
Jesus irokenẽdin, “Ere nigin, ãgenei momoiya naal bagai nigin. Aya momoi arokeneik, ã momoiya naal masted faat age fiya adouf are, ã arei enĩ urokenẽgouf, ‘Ein tamal godo urou ule, oun ufar,’ ago ge di, ĩ dõf age fouf. Ereb ereb ganan ã age fiya kisi feleya.”

Sain idi disi, Galili guru difen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo Naal ĩ fau tamo imeid bun dinouf.
Idi fau ĩ dukesiyouf, anĩ ere, naa towo bure fele di, ĩ fau baban mata kel fã youf.” Age ye di, in dõ fiya tar waud morõ gudũ fesin.
Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, Kapenaum taun disi di, tempel takis yaleya tamo, Pita wagen disi to difiyen, “Ãgenei tise tempel nẽ takis to inodig de?”
Pita iron, “Ariya, ĩ takis inodig.” Sain Pita fõ namen isi di, Jesus ket wogõ yen, “Simon, õ ere kisi wof? Ai bunem tenebur nẽ king anidi takis daledig, idi neid kesu bunem de, oo tamo tunĩ bunem?”
Pita solof iron, “Tamo tunĩ bunem.” Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Anĩ nigin, kesu idi bunem sã.
Anĩ ere, adam idi waud saneya to tafenẽdiyouf nigin, õ daliyoun ule, on mũ urãf. Gau uruwa walouf anĩ awa gede fen, an silwa koin moni ulouf, wale fen, takis ogon ado neu nigin wenẽdiyouf.”
Sain anĩ bun, in dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disi, to difiyen, “Aim saa tanon odug bagai ibodok?”
Ĩ kesu naal taka iweignẽ isi di, idi atun ifarnen.
Agef fen, ĩ iron, “Aya momoi arokeneik, ã kesu nanaal gen falei gouf anĩ dogol, age fiya sãf are, ã saa tanon to bagai ulagauf.
Anĩ nigin, aib taka yogo nigin kuru kel fen, kesu enĩ genẽf are, ĩ saa tanon odug bagai ibodok.
“Takag, aib taka kesu naal eig fiya, aya yanau nem yalef are, ĩ aya yaleyaf.
Anĩ ere, aibem taka age fe di, kesu aya nigin momoi def enidi taka, mosor bun kubũ youf are, tamo anĩ meein odug guyutu bun ifo ken, maaĩwõ irãya nigin biya.
“Teneubur tamo kayau idi meleidlon ado, ere nigin, ereb to biya anĩ age fe di, tamo mosor bun dilalauf. Tobonunã age fiya bagai wõ youf, anĩ ere, tamo nanĩ be bunem isif, ĩ malalon ado!
Ogon imam be, yem be mosor bun ineyõf are, gudũ fen uraile. Õ imã tobega be, yẽ tobega ado mata bun ileya nigin biya bagai, ere nigin, imã totoũ be, yẽ totoũ adouf are, yã faimud ibodkeleya anĩ bun an dirãyõf.
Age fiya bagai, ogon malam mosor bun ineyõf are, ubodol uraile. Õ malã tekelei ado mata bun ileya nigin biya bagai, ere nigin, malã totoũ adouf are, hel nẽ yã mala bun dirãyõf.
“Ã lo welegei, kesu nanaal enidi taka to meleĩ irim gouf. Ere nigin, aya ã arokeneik, idi neid engel saa ilun dibodok, sain ganan neu Dei saa ilun ibodok no diledig.

“Ã ere kisi ado? Tamo taka ĩ wan handred sipsip ado, tekelei idi atun fõ yalauf are, marau ĩ nainti-nain sipsip uya bun itorneĩd fen, ile, tekelei fõ yelen anĩ to imirẽf de?
Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ĩ fata fouf are, ĩ sipsip tekelei anĩ nigin wau kulĩya odug, sipsip nainti-nain to fõ delen nigin anĩ nẽ kulĩya wal fiya.
Age fiya bagai, ãgenei Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok, kesu nanaal enidi taka fõ yeleya nigin to orodig.
“Ogon turã taka mosor inoyõf, ule ã uruwom atun dogol in kũ fenẽya ufelnẽf. Ĩ õ karĩ yõf, õ ogon turã mogo kel walel.
Anĩ ere, ĩ to karĩ yõf, baban tekelei be uru age fiya õ geid fen, ulagauf, ago di, ‘od ganan isennẽya uruwom be, towom sigoredim kurõ difesiyouf anĩ megeir gouf.’
Ĩ idi karĩ fediya nigin itorõf, sios urokenẽf. Ĩ sioseg karĩ fiyẽya nigin itorõf are, ĩ haiden be takis yaleya tamo sane gen unenẽf.
“Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ereb taka ã tenebur ein ufokalagauf, are saa iluneg ifokalauf, ereb taka ã tenebur ein biru walagauf, are saa iluneg biru falauf.
“Baban, aya ã arokeneik, tenebur ein ã uruwom ereb taka nigin wauĩ tekelei fen, to gouf, neu Dei saa ilun ibodok, ĩ dõf ã nigin age fouf.
Ere nigin, uruwom be, towom be, aya yanau nem guru difef, aya an idi geid mabodok.”
Age ye di, Pita Jesus wagen isi, to fen, “Odug, neu turau aya nigin mosor inouf, sain ganĩ neu turau nẽ mosor nigin wederou tu kalauf? Wederou tu kelef ile, sewen daũ de?”
Jesus aiten yalen, “Aya õ arokonok, õ sewen dogol to agouf, sewenti anĩ are sewenem tobol wouf.
“Anĩ nigin, saa tano ĩ, king taka, ne ferfer geid in wareg madur fiya nigin oron gen.
King ĩ wareg madur fiya nigin gariya inon, tamo taka ĩ bun ten milion kina yalen anĩ, ĩ wagen dirou disin.
Ĩ wareg anĩ yukesiya kisi feleya sã nigin marau iron, ĩ yogo ado in aiwa, in gere tar ado in safina ganan na nigin sur fedi di, in wareg anĩ yukesiya kisi falauf yen.
“Kabĩ tamo, marau wagen ibor bobou fe fen, igonen, ‘Õ aya nigin waũ unois fen, sain wana len, aya wareg anĩ ganan kisi afelkonõf.’
Kabĩ tamo anĩ nẽ marau, ĩ nigin wau yu ken, wareg anĩ ganan lai fesil fen, itornẽ di, ilen.
“Anĩ ere, kabĩ tamo anĩ oreis ile fen, ĩ yogon kabĩ tura taka fotou fen, ĩ bun wareg wan handred kina ado. Ĩ ka fe, ula irou fen, iron, ‘Õ aya bun wareg walen anĩ kel wana!’
“In kabĩ tura kubũ ye, ibor bobou fe fen, igonen, ‘Õ aya nigin waũ unois fen, sain wana len, aya wareg anĩ mala kela afonõf.’
“Anĩ ere, ĩ to karĩ fiyen. Ĩ tamo yale irou, kalabus bun iran, are de wareg inouf anĩ dogol.
Anĩ kabĩ tura tar tunĩ, ĩ age fen anĩ dile fen, idi waud odug sanen, anĩ nigin, dile, idi neid marau ereb age fen anĩ ganan wogõ difiyen.
“Age de di, marau tamo, kabĩ tamo anĩ iweignẽ isi di, ĩ irokenen, ‘Õ kabĩ tamo sane. Aya ogon wareg ganan lai afonon, ere nigin, õ aya ugonan.
Aya õ nigin wau inan gen, õ ogon kabĩ tura nigin waũ inõya san de?’
In marau tamo name ise fen, darau ifenẽya nigin kalabus lo fiya tamo imeid bun inenen, are de wareg ganan inouf anĩ dogol.
“Age fiya bagai, neu Dei saa ilun ibodok, ã atun tureĩ tar neid mosor nigin wauĩ bun wedereĩ to tu kalauf are, ãg age yeĩf.”
Jesus od enidi wogõ ye bure fel fen, Galili distrik itor ken, Judia distrik ilen, Jordan naan sitakã.
Tamo kayau musei dõ difiyẽ di, ĩ an idi dagi el fedin.
Farisia tamo tunĩ ĩ wagen disi, kisi difiye ken, idi to difiyen, “Tamo taka, yogon kayau gariya fire fire bun iruf anĩ, lo dõ fiya de?”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Ã Negur nẽ Itotoya to uweseg ulegen de? Gariya bun, Negur ereb ereb kare fedin ĩ, ‘tamo ino kayau ino fen,’
Negur iron, ‘Anĩ nigin, tamo ĩ in sina tama itorneĩd fen, in kayau ado bagu difouf, idi uruwom bouweid tekelei.’
Age difef, idi uru sã, idi tekelei. Anĩ nigin, Negur tamo kayau ado bagu fedin anĩ, tamom to fara fouf.”
Idi to difiyen, “Age fiyauf are, ere nigin Moses iron, tamo taka in kayau fara fiya nẽ pepa ifen ken, iru di, ilauf yen?”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Moses ĩ ãgenei wauĩ totol anĩ ile fen, ãgenei kayau iruya nigin to katũ yein. Anĩ ere, gariya bun age fiya sã.
Aya ã arokeneik, aib taka in kayau seseirã inoya sã mog, kayau iru fen, kayau taka yalef are, ĩ seseirã inof.”
In dõ fiya tar Jesus dirokenen, “Tamo kayau atun morõ agef yenek nigin, ĩ kayau to yalouf are biya bagai.”
Jesus irokenẽdin, “Tamo ganan od enĩ dõ fiya kisi feleya sã, teke tekeleim Negurem age fedif anidi dogol.
Tunĩ idi, sineid namenem, bouweid kesu irouya nigin tutuk sã gõ fedidig, tunĩ are tamom korõ difedidig, tunĩ saa tano nigin kisi de fen, kayau to daledig. Tamo taka kisi enĩ dõ fiya nigin kisi falauf, dõf age fouf.”
Jesus ima tetedin ino fen, kosẽ fiyẽdiyouf nigin, kesu nanaal ĩ wagen guri de dirousin. Anĩ ere, in dõ fiya tar, idi guri de dirousin anidi ou difiyẽdin.
Jesus iron, “Utornẽdig len, kesu nanaal aya wageun disiyouf, idi to katũ wedig, ere nigin, saa tano are eig fediya neid.”
Age ye fen, ĩ ima tetedin inol fen, an tamal tokõ fel ilen.
Tamo taka Jesus wagen isi to fiyen, “Tise, ere biya anĩ aya age afe fen, mata ibodkeleya alouf?”
Jesus aiten yalen, “Õ ere nigin ereb biya nigin aya to wiyaf? Tekelei ĩ dogol biya. Mata ibodkeleya bun ulau fenẽ, õ ĩtãfiya dõ woid.”
Tamo Jesus irokenen, “Ĩtãfiya nanĩ bagai?” Jesus iron, “‘Õ tamo taka to ukesiyouf, seseirã to unouf, to bẽ walouf, õ taka nigin idegẽya od to urõf,
ogon sinã tamã yeneid walesauf, õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigineg ago.’ ”
Tamo gaũ iron, “Anĩ ganan aya dõ afen, ere taka anĩ aya fau dõ fiya sã?”
Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Õ madur bagai you fenẽf, ule, ogon safina ganan na nigin sur wo fen, maleg tamo wenẽdiyouf, agouf, õ saa ilun safina biya adouf. Agol fen, usi, aya dõ wiya.”
Od enĩ tamo gaũ karĩ ye fen, ĩ wau morõ fe di, itor ilen, ere nigin, ĩ safina musei ado.
Age fe di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, safina musei ado tamo, saa tanon ileya nigin malai bagai.
Baban aya ã arokeneik, kamel ĩ gabar iwaya nẽ nil ku bun ileya nigin karika bagai, safina musei ado tamo, Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin malai bagai.”
Od enĩ in dõ fiya tar karĩ den, idi fatuk terẽ de fen, to difen, “Age fiyauf are, aim anĩ mata ibodkeleya yaleya kisi feleya?”
Jesus idi lo feid fen, iron, “Tamo yogo bun age fiya kisi feleya sã, anĩ ere, Negur yogo bun ereb ereb ganan age fiya kisi feleya.”
Pita Jesus aiten yalen, “Amã ereb ereb ganan mator ken, õ dõ mayok! Ere anĩ amã nemã mala solo malouf?”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ereb ereb ganan mata falei fouf sain anĩ bun, Tamo Naal ĩ yogon king nẽ sia bun fula fiya medeĩya ado ibodõf, ã aya dõ wiyagef, ãg king nẽ sia tuwelf bun ubodõg fen, Israel ibor tuwelf es wedigouf.
Taka fõ be, tura tar be, main tar be, tama, sina, gere tar, kabĩ, aya yanau nigin itoron, idi ganan mala solo wan handred wal fiya dalouf, mata faimud ibodkeleya anĩ dalouf.
Anĩ ere, musei malabag dibodok, idi dumen dibodõf, musei dumen dibodok, idi malabag dibodõf.
“Saa tano nẽ tobonunã are, teneub marau taka ĩ, bonimei bagai ile fen, yogon wain kabier kabĩ dalouf nigin tamo oroi yaledin age fiya gen.
Kabĩ marau naa tekelei nigin ten kina afeneĩf ye di, idi ganan anĩ yo de di, in wain kabier sur fedin.
“Nain kilok bonimei age fiya, ĩ ilen, tamo tunĩ maket modoũ bun ege difar mog, iledin.
Ĩ idi irokenẽdin, ‘Ãg uleg, neu wain kabier kabĩ waleg, ago gouf, mala de afeneĩf.’
Age ye di, idi dilen. “Ĩ baban gaa atun ado aragau tri kilok age fiya ile feneg, de age fen.
Aragau faif kilok age fiya, ĩ ilen, tunĩg fau difar mog, iledin. Ĩ idi to fiyẽdin, ‘Ere nigin ã ege bagai gaa ganan ein ufaregel?’
“Idi aiten dalen, ‘Ere nigin, taka nem amã to oroi yalemam.’ “Ĩ idi irokenẽdin, ‘Ãg uleg, neu wain kabier kabĩ waleg.’
“Sain aragau di, wain kabĩ marau in kabĩ tamo neid orowa irokenen, ‘Kabĩ tamo uweigneĩd fen, dogo neid mala wenẽdiyouf, dumen disil idi bun gariya uno fen, ule, uyu disil bun ouf.’
“Kabĩ tamo aragau faif kilok age fiya kabĩ dalen disi fen, mugu mugu ten kina dalen.
Sain idi bonimei nem ket iweignẽdin anidi disin, idi kisi difen, amã idi wal fiya malouf den, anĩ ere, idig mugu mugu ten kina dalen.
Sain idi moni dalel fen, idi teneub marau nigin nauseir den.
Idi diron, ‘Tamo enidi dum bagai uweignẽdi di, aua tekelei dogol kabĩ dalel, anĩ ere, amã, naa enĩ ganan bonimei nem isi, gama yeiref, kabĩ totol malel, gaa uruwa dõ famam, anĩ ere, õ amã idi geid ten kina dede wanamam.’
“Anĩ ere, kabĩ marau ĩ, idi neid taka solof irokenen, ‘Mou, aya õ sane to ayok. Õ ten kina nigin ada uruwom sigoroda to tekeleil de?
Ogon kabĩ mala wale fen, ule. Aya õ afonom age fiya, tamo dum bagai oroi aleyen anĩ, de age fiya afenẽf nigin wau irok.
Aya neu safina ereb taka age fiya nigin wau irok anĩ, aya to age afouf de? Aya neu biya age afef nigin, õ aya kiyeĩ wanaf de?’
“Anĩ nigin, idi dumen dibodok anidi malabag dibodõf, idi malabag dibodok anidi dumen dibodõf.”
Jesus Jerusalem iselau fenẽ, ĩ in dõ fiya tar tuwelf mugu bagai gei feid fen, irokenẽdin,
“Ada Jerusalem teselef, an Tamo Naal ĩ pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo imeid bun dinenẽf. Idi ĩ laa fouf nigin bou bun od dũf.
Age de fen, idi ĩ haiden Juda sã anidi imeid bun dino di, kono difiyẽ, wagĩ difiye ken, aa tetek bun dukesiyouf. Naa towo bun, ĩ mata kel fã youf!”
Age fe di, Sebedi nẽ kesu uru, sineid geid Jesus wagen disin. Idi neid sineid ibor bobou fe fen, wau irok anĩ Jesus to fiyen.
Jesus to fiyen, “Ere anĩ õ orok?” Kayau iron, “Õ urõf, neu kesu uru enĩ, ogon tano bun taka ima biyalẽ ibodõf, taka ima kilẽ ibodõf.”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã ereb to gef anĩ nẽ gariya, ã keleĩ sã, naan aya ãf anĩ ã yõya kisi feleya de?” Idi aiten dalen, “Amã kisi feleya.”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã momoi neu kap bun naan are wãgauf, anĩ ere, imau biyalẽ ibodõya be, kilẽ ibodõya are, ayam ifenẽya kisi feleya sã. Modoũ anidi are, neu Dei idi nigin dodok fen anidi neid.”
In dõ fiya tar ten, od anĩ karĩ de fen, uru tura ado nigin seye den.
Jesus idi iweig laisi fen, iron, “Ã keleĩ, haiden idi dogo neid uyu irouya, tamo kayau lo fiya nigin totol dinodig, idi dogo neid odudug, tamo kayau nigin megeir yaor difedig.
Anĩ ere, ã bun kisi to agef yenẽf, ã atun aib taka odug ibodõf nigin orof, ĩ ãgenei kabĩ tamo ibodõf.
Ã atun aib taka uyun ibodõf nigin orof, ĩ ãgenei ferfer ibodõf.
Age fiya gen, Tamo Naal ĩ disennẽf nigin to isin, anĩ ere, ĩ tamo kayau isenneĩd fen, tamo kayau musei idi neid mosor anĩ fotokar yogon mata ifenẽdiyouf nigin isin.”
Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid Jeriko ditor dile mog, tamo kayau musei dõ difiyen.
Tamo uru meleid ifofakelen naab yerin dibodon. Sain idi Jesus isi ilef yeya karĩ de fen, diweig diron, “Odug, Dawid Naal, amã nigin malalon yõ!”
Tamo kayau idi ou difiyeĩd fen, foro dalauf nigin dirokenẽdin, anĩ ere, idi wade bagai diweig diron, “Odug, Dawid Naal, amã nigin malalon yõ!”
Jesus dẽ yel fen, idi iweigneĩd fen, ĩ to fedin, “Ere naig ayẽif nigin ã oroyeik?”
Idi aiten dalen, “Odug, amã malamã fara wol kanamãf nigin oromak.”
Jesus idi nigin meleidlon fe fen, idi meleid kobũ fedin. Kaisã bagai, idi meleid fara fele di, sã lo dife fen, idi Jesus dõ difen.
Idi Jerusalem kelẽ difiye ken, Moul Arei bun Betfage fonõ wõ den, Jesus in dõ fiya tar uru sur feid fen,
ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Fonõ wagein ifaref tokõ weleg, ulõ wesig fen, kaisã bagai donki ifõya naal ado uledigouf. Idi biru weledig fen, wageun gurig usig.
Taka nem ã ereb yeĩf, ĩ urokenẽgouf, Odug ĩ kabĩ ifenẽdiyou fenẽ orof, ago ge di, kaisã bagai sur fediyouf.”
Profet eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin agef wõ yen:
“Saion nẽ tamo kayau urokenẽgouf, ‘Ulef, ogon king õ garan isif, imatkeis fen, donki bun ibodok, donki naal teten.’”
In dõ fiya tar dilen, Jesus iron kilei age difen.
Idi donki naal ado dirousi di, tetedin idi neid gabar du difedi di, Jesus anĩ tetedin ibodon.
Tamo kayau musei, idi neid gabar naabur du difedin, tunĩ idi aa were kokour dife, naabur du difedin.
Tamo kayau uyu dilen ado, dume dõ difen diweig diron, “Hosiana, Dawid Naal bun!” “Odug yana bunem isif, ĩ el fiya ado!” “Hosiana, saa ilun bagai!”
Sain Jesus Jerusalem ulõ yesi di, taun anĩ bun tamo kayau ganan terẽ de fen, toti difen, “Tamo eĩ aim?”
Tamo kayau diron, “Eĩ Jesus, profet Nasaret taun Galili teneub bun tamal.”
Jesus tempel modoũ bun ile, wõ ye fen, na dale dile disi dife mog, an tamo kayau adok irudidin. Ĩ moni solo fediya neid tebol ado kuburir na sur fediya neid fatar eleg feledin.
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Negur nẽ Itotoya irok, ‘Neu fõ ĩ kosẽ nẽ fõ douf,’ anĩ ere, ã ‘bẽ tamo neid iminẽya fõ’ unogen.”
Meleid ifofakeleya, yeid kirorõya, Jesus wagen tempel bun disi di, ĩ el fedin.
Anĩ ere, Jesus ereb biya bagai age fe di, kesu nanaal tempel modoũ bun diweig diron, “Hosiana, Dawid Naal bun,” age de di, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, idi anĩ dileid fen, seye den.
Idi Jesus to difiyen, “Kesu nanaal enidi ereb def, õ karĩ wof de?” Jesus aitedin yalen, “Ariya, ã Negur nẽ Itotoya to uwesegen de? “‘Kesu momou kesu nanaal geid sigoreid bun selu kulõ fiya nigin Negur idi mogo saika fedin.’ ”
Agef fen, Jesus an tamal idi itorneĩd, taun anĩ itor ken, Betani fonõ ilen, an bõ tekelei ibodon.
Bonimei bagai, Jesus Jerusalem kel ile fen, naab luwen naũ fen.
Mala irakelen, aa fig naab yerin ilen, Jesus iyok iselen fele fen, aa fig biya sã ege aarau dogol. Jesus aa fig irokenen, “Õ baban to bagai umauf!” Kaisã bagai, aa fig gariri kelen.
In dõ fiya tar anĩ dile mã, idi terẽ de kulõ de fen, diron, “Naig fe di, aa fig kaisã bagai gariri kelen?”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ã wauĩ momoi ge mã, wauĩ to ilef isi fouf, ã aa fig enĩ bun age afel dogol to ago gouf, sã arei enĩg urokenẽgouf, ‘Kusu fen, maaĩwõ irãyõf,’ are ĩ dõf age fouf.
Ã momoi gouf are, ereb taka nigin tog fen, kosẽ gouf, ã walogouf.”
Jesus tempel modoũ namen ulõ yeis fen, an tamo kayau od ifelneĩd mog, pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo, ĩ wagen disi to difen, “Ere igirĩya bunem õ ereb ereb enĩ ago wof? Aim õ igirĩya enĩ ifonon?”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Ayag to fiya tekelei afeneĩf. Ã solog urokanagauf are, ereb igirĩya bunem ereb ereb enĩ age afef, aya ã arokeneĩf.
Jon nẽ naan igunẽdin, are nainenem isin? Are saa ilun tamal de, tamo bunem?” Idi dogo dogol katõ de fen, diron, “Ada ‘Ĩ saa ilun tamal,’ tauf, ĩ irõf, ‘Ba anĩ, ere nigin ã ĩ nigin to momoi wiyẽgen?’
Anĩ ere, ada ‘Tamo bunem’ tauf, ada tamo kayau nigin kumĩ tafedif, ere nigin, tamo kayau idi ganan Jon nigin profet taka dedig.”
Anĩ nigin, idi Jesus ait solo de diron, “Amã keleĩ sã.” Age de di, Jesus iron, “Ago gouf are, ayag, ere igirĩya bunem ereb ereb enĩ age afef anĩ to arokeneĩf.
“Ã ere kisi gef? Tamo taka ĩ naal uru adon. Tama ĩ kesu matu garan ile iron, ‘Neu kesu, gama wain kabier ule, kabĩ walouf.’
“Ĩ aiten yalen, ‘Aya tuwauf,’ dum ĩ in kisi falei ye fen, ilen.
“Agef fen, tama kesu taka garan ile, od tekelei anĩ irokenen. Kesu aiten yalen, ‘Dei, aya age afouf,’ anĩ ere, ĩ ileya sã.
“Idi uru atun, aim anĩ tama oron anĩ age fen?” Idi aiten dalen, “Matum.” Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, takis yaleya tamo, kayau bouweid na nẽ sur difedig geid, ã atun, idi ketem Negur nẽ tano bun uyu dilauf.
Ere nigin, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo ĩ, madur ibodõya nẽ naab ifelneĩf nigin ã garan isin, ã ĩ nigin to momoi gen, anĩ ere, takis yaleya tamo, kayau bouweid na nẽ sur difedig geid, idi momoi den. Ã ĩ ulegeneg, ã wauĩ to falei ge fen, ĩ to momoi wiyẽgen.
“Yaab od taka nigin wedereĩ unog. Teneub marau taka ĩ yogon kabier aa wain itenen, ĩ kau ifõ kalĩ felen, wain sumin asi fiya nigin ku yalen, kabĩ lo fiya nẽ fõ inon. Agef fen, ĩ mala solo yalouf nigin wain kabĩ, kabĩ lo difedig tamo tunĩ imeid bun ino fen, uyu takã ilen.
Sain biya bure fele di, teneub marau wain biya fito fiya nigin in ferfer susur fe di, kabĩ lo difedig tamo garan dilen.
“Kabĩ lo difedig tamo, teneub marau nẽ ferfer dirouneĩd fen, taka dun, taka dukesin, taka meein tulu difen.
Age dife di, teneub marau ferfer tunĩ sur fedin, are idi musei uyulil sur fedin wal fiya. Age fe di, kabĩ lo difedig tamo uruwa age difen gen, baban yogon ferfer bun age difedin.
Dum bagai, teneub marau yogon naal idi garan sur fiyen. Ĩ iron, ‘Idi neu kesu nigin fau karĩ difiyẽf.’
“Anĩ ere, kabĩ lo difedig tamo, naal anĩ dile fen, idi abob dirokenen, ‘Eĩ inim wain kabĩ akorouf. Usig, ada ĩ taukeis fen, yogon akor talouf.’
Age de fen, idi ĩ dale, wain kabĩ mayarẽ dira ken, dukesin.
“Age fiya nigin, sain wain kabĩ nẽ marau isiyouf, ĩ kabĩ lo difedig tamo ere naig fediyouf?”
Idi Jesus aiten dalen, “Teneub marau, idi sane bagai sane ye fen, idenkesiyouf, ĩ wain kabĩ anĩ, kabĩ lo difedig tamo tunĩ imeid bun ino fen, na yaledi di, idi wain mayof sain bun fito de fen, yogon biya difenẽf.”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã od Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek anĩ to uwesegen de? “‘Meein are fõ inoya tamom sane de fen, ditoron anĩ, gama monog tor wõ yen, anĩ Odug yogo age fe di, malamã yun.’
“Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, Negur nẽ tano ã bun tamal son yeĩ yale, tamo kayau idi aayũ faat biya yũf anidi ifenẽdiyouf.
Aib taka meein anĩ teten kubũ youf, mered fe fisik fouf, takag, aib taka meein anĩ ĩ teten kubũ youf, ĩ danĩf aas lauf.”
Sain pris odudug, Farisia tamo geid, Jesus nẽ yaab od karĩ den, idi kelein, Jesus idi nigin wogõ yen.
Idi Jesus irounẽya nigin naab dimiren, anĩ ere, idi tamo kayau nigin kumĩ den, ere nigin, tamo kayau idi Jesus nigin profet taka dedig.
Jesus yaab od nem baban irokeneĩd fen, iron:
“Saa tano ĩ, king taka, ĩ naal kayau yalouf nigin tar dodok fen age fiya gen.
Ĩ yogon ferfer sur fedi di, tamo iweignẽdin yogon tar bun disiyouf nigin dirokenẽdin, anĩ ere, idi isiya ditoron.
“Ĩ baban ferfer tunĩ sur feid fen, iron, ‘Idi aya aweignẽdin anĩ urokenẽdig: Aya tar mogo saika afel. Aya bulmakau yaro biya biya ado adenen, ereb ereb ganan mogo dodok afelel. Bagu fiya tar bun usig.’
“Anĩ ere, idi to karĩ difiyẽdin, idi diyalelen, taka yogon kabier ilen, taka ĩ yogon bisnis kabĩ yalen.
Tunĩ idi ferfer dirouneĩd fen, tadũ difiyeĩd didenkesin.
Anĩ nigin, king name odug sane fen, yogon kusĩ tamo sur fedi di, dilen, ferfer didenen anidi didenkeis fen, nedi taun yã dinon.
“Agef fen, king, ne ferfer irokenẽdin, ‘Bagu fiya nẽ tar mogo dodok afelel, aya tamo aweigneĩd fen, naa afenẽdin anidi, dogo sane age difen nigin, isiya kisi feleya sã.
Anĩ nigin, ã ulagauf, naab kaleyan aib aib uledigouf are, urokenẽdig len, idi tar bun disiyouf.’
Age ye di, ferfer dilelen, naab naab diyo ken, tamo kayau dileid fen, biya ado sane ganan gou difedin, age dife di, tamo kayau ado bagu difedidig nẽ guru fiya modoũ bun tamo kayau isokosen.
“Age dife di, king namen isin, tamo kayau fele fedin, an ĩ tamo taka kolos biya ifonũya sã fotou fen.
King ĩ to fiyen, ‘Mou, naig fe di, õ bagu fiya nẽ naki sã anĩ guru fiya enĩ namen usil?’ Tamo ĩ od sã ibodon.
“Age fe di, king yogon kabĩ tamo irokenẽdin, ‘Ima ye ado ufõg, mayarẽ gugum bun urãg, an are wifirig ye fen, gobora kikokõ yediyouf.’
“Anĩ nigin, tamo kayau musei iweignẽdif, anĩ ere, teke tekelei igirnẽdif.”
Age fe di, Farisia tamo dilen, Jesus in od bun naig fe mog, talouf de fen, od katõ difen.
Age de fen, Farisia tamo, idi neid dõ fiya tar, Herod nẽ tamo tar geid, Jesus wagen sur difedi di, dilen, idi Jesus dirokenen, “Tise, amã keleĩ, õ momoi wogõya nẽ tamo, anĩ õ Negur nẽ naab momoi bagai ufelnẽdidig, õ tamom to wewu diyõdig, ere nigin, õ idi yana ado be sã anĩ to es wedig.
Anĩ amã urokanamã, ogon kisi ere wof? Sisa takis ifenẽya nigin biya de, sã?”
Anĩ ere, Jesus idi neid namedin kisi sane kelei ken, iron, “Ã meleid yaleya tamo, ere nigin ã aya kisi wiyagef?
Takis ifenẽya nigin koin moni ufelnag.” Idi koin moni taka wagen diroule di,
Jesus idi to fedin, “Eĩ ai nawa nẽ malakanon? Eĩ ai yana nẽ itotoya?”
Idi aiten dalen, “Sisa nẽ.” Age de di, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Ereb Sisa nẽ are Sisa wenẽg, ereb Negur nẽ are Negur wenẽg.”
Od enĩ idi karĩ de fen, terẽ den. Age de fen, idi Jesus ditornẽ diya dilelen.
Naa de tekelei anĩ bun, Sadusia tamo idi dirõdig anĩ, laa bun tamal to ke de fã dedig, dedig anidim, Jesus wagen disi to difiyen.
Idi diron, “Tise, Moses iron, tamo taka kesu sã mog laa fef, in tura waab yale fen, tura fotokar kesu iroukenẽf.
Amã atun, tura tura sewen dibodon. Matu ĩ kayau yalen laa fen, ĩ kesu sã, anĩ nigin, ĩ, in kayau, ne tura itorkenen.
Age fiya bagai, tura dõ fiya ĩg age fen, anĩ dõ fiya tri ĩg agef ile sewen adoken.
Idikeleya bun, kayau ĩg laa fen.
Anĩ nigin, kel fãya bun, idi sewen anĩ atun, ĩ ai nẽ kayau bagai ibodõf? Ere nigin, idi ganan kayau anĩ dalen.”
Jesus aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Ã od kũ wenẽgef, ere nigin, ã Negur nẽ Itotoya ado Negur nẽ megeir keleĩ sã.
Laa bun tamal kel fãya bun, an tamo kayau ado abob yalef ya sã, idi engel saa ilun difaref gen dibodõf.
Anĩ ere, laa bun tamal kel fãya nigin, Negur ã irokenein anĩ, ã to uwesegen de?
Negur iron, ‘Aya Abraham nẽ Negur, Isak nẽ Negur, Jakop nẽ Negur.’ Ĩ laa neid Negur sã, ĩ mata ibodõya neid Negur.”
Anĩ tamo kayau od enĩ karĩ de fen, ĩ agef ifelnẽdin anĩ nigin terẽ den.
Jesus ĩ Sadusia tamo od bun sigoreid ifokelen anĩ karĩ de fen, Farisia tamo idi guru difen.
Idi atun, lo keleĩ tamo takam Jesus kisi fiye ken, eig fiyẽ to fiyen,
“Tise, ĩtãfiya nanĩ anĩ, ganan wal fiya odug bagai Lo bun irok?”
Jesus irokenen, “‘Õ, Odug ogon Negur waũ adok, malãkanon adok, kisi adok bunem, ĩ nigin waũ laaf.’
Ĩtãfiya enĩ ĩ matu, Lo bun ganan wal fiya odug bagai irok.
Anĩ dõ fiya are eig fiya, ‘Õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigineg ago waũ laaf.’
Lo ado Profet neid od ganan, ĩtãfiya uru enĩ teten difaref.”
Sain Farisia tamo idi guru difesi di, Jesus idi to fedin,
“Kristus nigin ã kisi ai gef? Ai nẽ naal anĩ Kristus?” Idi aiten dalen, “Dawid naal.”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Dawid naig fe di, anĩ Awa Uurem irokenen, ĩ nigin ‘Odug’ yen?” Ĩ nigin Dawid iron,
“‘Negur neu Odug irokenen: “Imau biya melem ubod mog, ogon kiwai tar on yẽ farume gõ afalauf.” ’
Dawid ĩ nigin ‘Odug’ yen ouf are, naig fe di, Kristus ĩ Dawid naal ouf?”
Taka nem, ĩ aiten yale solof irõya kisi feleya san, naa anĩ bunem ilen ganan, takam baban ĩ to fiyẽya nigin kumĩ den.
Dum Jesus, tamo kayau in dõ fiya tar geid irokenẽdin,
“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, Moses nẽ sia bun dibodõdig.
Anĩ nigin, ã idi karĩ wiyẽdig fen, ereb idi ã ago gei de di, ã ago gouf. Anĩ ere, ereb idi age difef anĩ, ã to agog, ere nigin, idi dirõdig anĩ to dõ de age difedig.
Idi morõ odudug difofa ken, tamo kayau oroweid se difedig, anĩ ere, idi dogo bagai, morõ enei dalesauf nigin imeid gege tekelei bagai gebeya nigin to orodidig.
“Idi ereb ereb ganan age difedig, are ege tamo meleid yaleya: Age de fen, idi tamo meleid yaleya nigin, lo ĩtãfiya bokis naal odudug nuwa bun difeid fen, demeid bun ado imeid dã bun difofãdig, idi neid kolos nẽ malũ meluluk adodo dinodidig.
Idi, saaf odudug bun ado Juda neid uub fõ bun, modoũ malabag ibodõya anĩ orodidig.
Idi maket modoũ bun, tamo kayau idim sere difiyeĩd fen, ‘O tise’ difediyouf anĩ orodidig.
“Anĩ ere, ã tise to diyeĩf, ere nigin, ã Tise tekelei dogol ado, ã adok tura tura.
Ã tenebur ein aib taka to dei gouf, ere nigin, ã Temeĩ tekelei dogol ado, ĩ saa ilun ibodok.
Ã mudur ado to diyeĩf, ere nigin, ã Mudur Ado tekelei dogol, are Kristus.
Ã atun, aib taka ganan wal fiya wõ you fenẽ, ĩ ãgenei kabĩ tamo ibodõf.
Ere nigin, aib taka ĩ yogo yana yalesef, ĩ lai fesilauf, aib taka ĩ yogo nigin lai fesilauf, ĩ yana adouf.
“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã tamo kayau meleid bun saa tano nigin sukar unogedig. Ã aug namen to ulegedig, idi dilau fenẽ age difef, ã katĩ welegedig.

“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã, tamo tekelei waleg fen, ĩ ãgenei dõ fiya unenẽgouf nigin, teneub bun uyokeleg fen, maaĩ naab bun uyõgefeg ago gedig, agog fen, tamo ĩ anĩ ufelnẽge di, ĩ ãgenei dõ fiya wõ yef are, ĩ ã hel nẽ gere tar ubodõgef wal yeĩya sane bagai wõ yef.
“Mala ifofakeleya uyu irouya, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã urõgedig, ‘Aib taka tempel yana bunem in od isen ken, totol od irok, are ege, anĩ ere, aib taka tempel nẽ gol bunem in od isen ken, totol od irok, ĩ dõf age fouf.’
Ã neneya, meleĩ ifofakeleya! Ere anĩ odug, gol de, oo tempel gol fateul ifenẽdig anĩ?
Takag ã urõgedig, ‘Aib taka alta yana nem in od isen ken, totol od irok, are ege, anĩ ere, aib taka sesewi fiya nẽ safina alta bun ifaref anĩ yana nem in od isen ken, totol od irok, ĩ dõf age fouf.’
Ã, mala ifofakeleya tamo! Ere anĩ odug, safina de, oo alta sesewi fiya fateul ifenẽdig anĩ?
Anĩ nigin, aib taka alta yana nem in od isen ken, totol od irok, ĩ alta ado safina ganan alta teten ifaref anim in od isen ken, totol od irok.
Taka ĩ tempel yana nem in od isen ken, totol od irok, ĩ tempel ado, Negur tempel namen ibodok anim in od isen ken, totol od irok.
Taka ĩ saa yana nem in od isen ken, totol od irok, ĩ Negur nẽ king sia ado, Negur ĩ an ibodok anim in od isen ken, totol od irok.
“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã kabier tamal sako nanaaleg farag fen, ten tekelei unogedig, anĩ ere, ã, lo nẽ odug, are safina wal fiya anidi nigin to kisi gedig, are lo nẽ madur fiya, wau ifenẽya, wau momoiya. Ã anĩ adok to tai gedig. Ã teten nẽ anĩ dõg fen, dum nẽ anĩg tai gem, are dem.
Ã, mala ifofakeleya uyu irouya! Ã soloulã tar bun ibodok anĩ ulul nem yaleleya nigin kous gedig, anĩ ere, ã kamel tar bun ibodok anĩ utobogedig.
“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã kap beĩ ado agara anĩ kulo gedig, anĩ ere, name bun amuyẽ isokos fen, taka nẽ safina yaleya nigin imeĩ su lai ge fen fe tetenem yaleya ado, akorou yeya aug naumeĩ nigin dogol yenek.
Farisia tamo, mala ifofakeleya! Kap beĩ ado name ket kulo wedig, ago ge di, teteneg fili youf.
“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã aau lalau nem matmat sigor naki fiya gen, teten lo fiya nigin biya bagai, namen anĩ are tamo gare den tuweid ado ereb ereb ganan amuyẽ isokosen.
Age fiya bagai, ãg teten tamo kayau meleid bun madur tamo gen ubodõgedig, anĩ ere, nameneĩ mala yaleya ado sane bagai isokosen.
“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã profet neid matmat unog fen, madur tamo neid matmat garab wiyẽgedig.
Ã urõgedig, ‘Ada tubuda tar dibodon sain bun, ada tabodom are, ada idi geid to bagu tafem, profet naudeid to filu fadam.’
Anĩ nigin, ã aug nigin yaor gef, ere nigin, ã idi profet didenkesin anidi neid ibor tar.
Ãgenei tubuĩ tar neid mosor tobol ge di, isokosef!
“Ã gogour bagai! Ã gogour sane gere tar! Ã naig ge fen, hel nẽ es fiyauf bun tamal uyagauf?
Age fiya nigin, aya, profet, keleĩ biya tamo, tise ado ã bun sur afediyouf. Idi tunĩ udenkesigouf, tunĩ aa tetek bun udenẽdigouf, tunĩ ãgenei uub fõ bun wagagã gouf, fonõ fonõ idi darau wenẽdig fen, urudigouf.
Anĩ nigin, madur tamo Abel nẽ naud bun ile, Sekaraia Berekia naal, ĩ tempel alta ado atun ã ukesigen, in naud bun, madur tamo neid naudeid ganan teneub enĩ iroun nigin, anĩ nẽ mala solo sane ã bun isiyouf.
Aya ã momoi arokeneik, mala solo kafĩ fiya enĩ ganan, tamo kayau sain enei bun dibodok anidi bun isiyouf.
“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, õ profet udenkeis fen, õ bun sur fedig anidi meein meein wedidig, sain musei aya õ wau afon ken, ogon gerẽ tar kuru afedig, tataro sina momou waye farumen kuru fedig gen, anĩ ere, ã utorõgedig.
Ulogouf, ãgenei fõ fonou lef.
Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, ã aya baban to uleyagauf ile, ã fau urõgouf, ‘Odug yana bunem isif, ĩ el fiya ado,’ sain anĩ bun, ã aya uleyagauf.”
Jesus tempel bun tamal kutũ yeis, iyok ile mog, in dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disin, tempel fõ tunĩ anĩ difelnen.
Jesus to fedin, “Ã enĩ ganan ulegef de? Aya ã momoi arokeneik, meein enĩ taka, meein tura teten to yenẽf, anĩ adok fau isog irailauf.”
Jesus Moul Arein ibod mog, in dõ fiya tar mugun wagen disin dirokenen, “Urokanamã, ere sain enĩ wõ youf? Ere uris bagai anĩ, on isiya nẽ ado idikeleya nẽ?”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Takam to idegneĩf nigin lo weleg.
Ere nigin, musei aya yanau nem disi dirõf, ‘Aya Kristus,’ age de fen, idi tamo kayau musei didegnẽdiyouf.
Ã kusĩ wõya karĩg fen, tamo sigoredim kusĩ nigin wogõ douf anĩ karĩ gouf, ã anĩ nigin to terẽ gei. Ereb ereb anĩ agef wõ youf, anĩ ere, idikeleya sain fau dum isiyouf.
Teneub taka fã ye fen, ĩ teneub taka nigin kiwai ifenẽf, tano taka ĩ tano taka nigin kiwai ifenẽf. Naũ odug mimĩ ado, uyu taka taka bun wõ youf.
Enei ganan, kayau kesu ibodõf nigin darau gariya inof gen.
“Sain age fouf bun, ã idi imeid bun ulagauf, darau odug laa bun dineneĩf, teneub ganan bun tamo kayau ã nigin to orodiyouf, ere nigin, aya yanau ã ado nigin.
Sain anĩ bun, musei momoiya dudum difouf, idi dogo tutur abob kiwai difenẽf, idi abob to orodiyouf.
Agef mog, idegẽya profet musei wowã douf, idi tamo kayau musei didegnẽdiyouf.
Tobonunã sane anĩ fou yalauf nigin, tamo kayau musei wau laa fiya nigin folo rouf.
Anĩ ere, aib taka ĩ megeir ifar ile, idikeleya bun, Negur ĩ isennẽf.
Saa tano nẽ biya od enĩ wogõ difediyouf anim, teneub ganan bun tamo kayau wedereid irou fen, uris gen ifenẽdiyouf, anĩ gama idikeleya isiyouf.
“Sain ã log mog, ninir fonou inenẽf, are profet Daniel sigor bun wogõ yen anĩ, Jerusalem fateul modoũ bun ifarauf are (ani uweseg keleĩ youf),
idi Judia teneub bun dibodok, arein diya diselauf.
Taka ĩ yogon fõ sokor ibodok, ĩ to kel isil, aaben ereb ereb gei fouf.
Taka ĩ kabier ibodok, yogon gabar yalouf nigin to kel ilauf.
Naa anĩ bun, kayau bouweid ado, kayau kesu su ifenek ado, idi meleidlon adouf.
Feluk sain Sabat naa bun ado, ã to uyagauf nigin Negur kosẽ gouf.
Sain anĩ bun, morõ odug biya isiyouf, morõ age fiya gariya bun teneub inon isi gama, taka to wõ yen, dum buneg taka to wõ youf.
Negurem naa anĩ to godo falaisim are, taka to mata ibodom, tamo kayau igirnẽdin idi nigin ye fen, naa anĩ godo falaisiyouf.
Sain anĩ bun, taka ã irokeneĩf, ‘Ulegef, Kristus yeir!’ oo ‘Ĩ your!’ ã anĩ to momoi ge.
Fau idegẽya Kristus, idegẽya profet ado wõ de fen, idi kisi falauf are, Negur igirnẽdin anidig didegnẽdiyouf nigin uris odug memelik ado difelnẽdiyouf.
Karĩg, aya tetunem ã arokenein.
“Anĩ nigin, takam ã irokeneĩf, ‘Kristus ĩ your, gerere tuan,’ ã to ulagauf, ‘Kristus ĩ yeir, aab namen,’ ã anĩ to momoi ge.
Gaa iseyanem kolimei fili ye di, ile, gaa ileyaneg iledig, age fiya bagai, Tamo Naal in isiyouf bun age fouf.
Nain be ereb bouwa buru waaif nẽ an, tum guru difouf.
“Morõ sain anĩ bure fele di, kaisã bagai “‘gaa gugum kalauf, ogõ to lalan youf, saa ilun tamal barisa kuku rediyouf, saa nẽ megeir guyoyõ douf.’
“Sain anĩ bun, Tamo Naal nẽ uris saa bun wõ youf, teneub ganan bun tamo kayau waud gudũ fouf. Idi Tamo Naal saa lalo bun, yogon fula fiya medeĩya barikã megeir ado isi mog, dilouf.
Agef fen, ĩ yogon engel, taur ait odug ado susur fedi di, idi, yogon tamo kayau igirnẽdin anidi, teneub akor ganan bun, saa akor ganan bun ado kuru difediyouf.
“Gama ã, aa fig bun keleĩ walogouf: Susu bonuf fen, aarau inodif, ã keleĩ, saneya melsak.
Age fiya nigin, ã anĩ ganan ulogouf are, ã keleĩ, in isiya mogo melsã, bobogẽ bagai ifaref.
Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tamo kayau sain enei nẽ idi to sa kel mog, enĩ ganan wowã youf.
Saa teneub ado sa kalauf, anĩ ere, neu od to bagai sa kalauf.
“Taka nem, anĩ nẽ naa sain ado to keleĩ, saa ilun engel idig sã, Naal ĩg sã, Dei yogo dogol keleĩ.
Noa nẽ sain bun age fen age fiya bagai, Tamo Naal isiyouf bun age fouf.
Kuwei odug nẽ naa fau mog, tamo kayau saafei de fen, naanuei den, tamo kayau yalef, kayau tamo difenek difen, age de dile mog, Noa waag namen ilen.
Idi ereb wõ youf anĩ to keleĩ mog, kuwei isi, adok kuweir dilelen. Age fiya bagai, Tamo Naal ĩ isiyouf bun age fouf.
Tamo uru idi kabier kabĩ dalef difarauf, tekelei yalouf, taka itornẽf.
Kayau uru idi falawa falei dife mog, tekelei yalouf, taka itornẽf.
“Age fiya nigin, meleĩ unog fen, log, ere nigin, ã keleĩ sã, naa nanĩ be bun ãgenei Odug isiyouf.
Ã keleĩ youf: Fõ marau, bõ ereb sain, bẽ tamo isiyouf keleĩ youf are, ĩ mata ibod ken, bẽ tamo in fõ to narĩ fouf nigin ololo fouf.
Age fiya nigin, ãg saika gouf, ere nigin, Tamo Naal ĩ fau sain to isiyouf gouf bun isiyouf.
“Ferfer taka aim anĩ dõ fiya kisi biya ado de? Ĩ yogon odugem, ĩ yogon odug nẽ fõ bun anidi neid saaf, dogo neid sain kilei dõf ifenẽdiyouf nigin ima bun inon anĩ.
Sain tamo odug kelouf bun, ferfer biya bagai age fe di, ilouf, tamo odug ĩ nigin biya fiyẽf.
Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tamo odug ĩ, yogon safina ganan ferfer anĩ ima bun inouf.
Anĩ ere, ferfer taka sane ĩ wau bun irõf, ‘Neu tamo odug ilen, sain meluk biya gerõ ibodok, ĩ kukula to isiyouf.’
Age ye fen, ĩ, in kabĩ tura tar idenẽdiya gariya ino fen, gama ĩ yogo, saaf biya naan biya, aai sẽ fiya tamo geid dõdig.
Ferfer anĩ nẽ tamo odug, in isiya nẽ naa, ferfer to isiyouf ye fen, kisif mog, in isiya sain, ĩ keleĩ sã mog, isiyouf.
Tamo odug, ferfer anĩ gudũf fisik fe fen, mala yaleya tamo geid nedi modoũ bun inenẽf, an are wifirig ye fen, gobora kikokõ yediyouf.”
Jesus tobol fe iron, “Sain anĩ bun, saa tano ĩ, kayau taulei ten, idi neid lam gei de diyok dilen, tamo mois tarabã difiyẽf age fiya gen.
Faif idi kisi neneya ado di, faif idi kisi biya ado.
Kisi neneya ado, idi neid lam gei difen, anĩ ere, keresin to dalen.
Anĩ ere, kisi biya ado, keresin kulumã ado lam dalen.
Tamo mois kaisã to isin, idi adok mulã fedi di, denenan.
“Bõ atun ait taka iweig iron, ‘Ulegef, tamo mois mogo yeir, ulolõ wesig fen, fotou wiyẽg!’
“Kayau taulei ganan fafã de fen, lam wik koriri difeselen.
Kisi neneyam, kisi biya ado dirokenẽdin, ‘Ãgenei keresin tunĩ wanamãg, amã nemã lam gare felediyou fenẽ.’
“Kisi biya adodom, kisi neneya dirokenẽdin, ‘Eo, keresin eĩ, ã ado amã ado to kisi falauf. Amam ifeneĩya ban, uleg, oun keresin na nẽ dinodig bun, aug nigin na waleg.’
“Kisi neneya idi, keresin na nigin dile mog, tamo mois mogo isin. Kayau taulei idi ololo difiyen, weim bagu fiya nẽ tar bun, aaben dilelen. Age dife di, sukar kotũ felen.
“Dum, kisi neneya idig disin, idi diron, ‘Tamo odug, tamo odug, amã nigin sukar kã wo!’
“Anĩ ere, tamo mois aitedin yalen, ‘Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aya ã keleĩ sã.’
“Age fiya nigin, ã lo weleg, ere nigin, naa kilok ado ã keleĩ sã.
“Takag, saa tano ĩ, tamo taka ĩ, uyu takã gerõ naab ilau fenẽ nigin, ĩ yogon ferfer iweigneĩd fen, yogon safina kulatun de kenẽf nigin, imeid bun inon age fiya gen.
Taka ĩ faif tausen kina ifenen, taka tu tausen kina ifenen, taka wan tausen kina ifenen, idi dogo mugu mugu neid safina kulatun fiya nẽ keleĩ kilei kilei ifeneĩd fen, ĩ uyu takã gerõ naab ilen.
Tamo faif tausen kina yalen, kaisã bagai ilen, moni kabĩ bun ino fen, baban faif tausen kina yalen.
Tamo tu tausen kina yalen, ĩg agef fen, baban tu tausen kina yalen.
Tamo wan tausen kina yalen, anĩ ere, ĩ ile, meku yale fen, tamo odug nẽ moni teneub kur inokelen.
“Sain meluk bure fele di, ferfer neid odug kel isi fen, moni ferfer mugu mugu ifenẽdin anĩ, idi naig dife kabĩ difenen anĩ, faded de dirokenẽf nigin ferfer ganan iweig laisin.
Tamo faif tausen kina yalen, ĩ baban faif tausen kina taka ado irou isi fen, ĩ iron, ‘Tamo odug, õ aya faif tausen kina wanan, ulef, aya baban faif tausen kina taka ado.’
“In tamo odug ĩ irokenen, ‘Õ de agon, õ ferfer biya dõ fiya biya bagai! Õ safina naal bun kulatun biya ubodon nigin, aya õ imã bun safina musei anouf. Usi fen, ogon tamo odug nẽ kulĩya namen ubod!’
“Tamo tu tausen kina yalen, ĩg isi fen, ĩ iron, ‘Tamo odug, õ aya tu tausen kina wanan, ulef, aya baban tu tausen kina taka ado.’
“In tamo odug ĩ irokenen, ‘Õ de agon, õ ferfer biya dõ fiya biya bagai! Õ safina naal bun kulatun biya ubodon nigin, aya õ imã bun safina musei anouf. Usi fen, ogon tamo odug nẽ kulĩya namen ubod!’
“Age fe di, tamo wan tausen kina yalen, ĩ isi fen, iron, ‘Tamo odug, aya kelein, õ tamo totol ado, onom to utenen anĩ kusu wodig, onom faat to uraran anĩ fito wodig.
Anĩ nigin, aya õ nigin kumĩ au fen, ele, ogon moni teneub kur anokelen. Ulef, ogon safina yeir.’
“In tamo odug ĩ irokenen, ‘Õ, ferfer sane fõ tamal! Õ kelein, ayam to atenen anĩ kusu afedig, ayam faat to araran anĩ fito afedig de?
Õ kisi agom, neu moni benk bun uno di, benk im kabĩ yalekanam, ago wom, sain aya kelauf bun, moni kabĩ yalen anĩ nẽ mala ado, moni õ benk wenen anĩ bagu fiya kel isin ado alem. Anĩ õ to agon.’
“Age ye fen, ĩ ari fedin, ‘Wan tausen kina ĩ bun son ge fen, tamo ten tausen kina ado anĩ wenẽg.
Taka ĩ ereb ado, aya toru afouf, age fe di, ĩ musei adouf. Taka ĩ sã bagai, ereb taka ĩ adog, ĩ bun tamal son fouf.
Ferfer sane anĩ mayarẽ gugum namen urãg, an are wifirig ye fen, gobora kikokõ yediyouf.’
“Sain Tamo Naal, yogon fula fiya medeĩya ado engel ganan geid disiyouf, ĩ in ibodõya modoũ fula fiya medeĩya bun ibodõf.
Teneub ganan bun, tamo kayau ĩ wagen kuru difediyouf, age dife di, ĩ tamo kayau foi fediyouf, sipsip lo fiya tamo, sipsip meme ado foi fedig gen age fouf.
Ĩ sipsip ima biyalẽ inoid fen, meme ima kilẽ inodiyouf.
“Agef fen, King ĩ, idi ima biyalẽ anidi irokenẽdiyouf, ‘Neu Deim el yeik ã, usig, ãgenei akoreĩ waleg, gariya bun teneub inon bunem isi gama, tano ãgenei nigin saika fen anĩ.
Ere nigin, aya naũ fiya mog, ã yõya nẽ safina wanagen, aya naan ail fiya mog, ã naan yõya nigin wanagen, aya yaũ tamo abod mog, ã aabẽ urou uleyagen.
Aya gemũ abod mog, ã gabar ufilaĩnagen, aya dagi abod mog, ã kulatun wiyagen, aya kalabus bun abod mog, ã usig ki wiyagen.’
“Age ye di, madur tamo kayau aiten dalen, ‘Odug, ere sain õ naũ ubod mog, amã saaf mafonon, õ naan ail yõ mog, naan mafonon?
Ere sain õ yaũ tamo mailiyo ken, amã nemã fõ bun maleyon, õ gemũ ubod mog, gabar mafilaĩnon?
Ere sain õ dagi ubod mog, amã õ mailiyon, õ kalabus bun ubod mog, amã ki mayon?’
“King aitedin yale irõf, ‘Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ã neu turau tar yeneid sã enidi taka el wiyẽgen, are aya el wiyagen.’
“Age ye fen, ĩ ima kilẽ anidig irokenẽdiyouf, ‘Gelu yein ã, wageun uyag uleg, yã mala fitotoleya faimud, Satan in engel geid idi nigin dodok fen anĩ, an uleg.
Ere nigin, aya naũ abod mog, ã ereb taka to wanagen, aya naan ail fiya mog, ã naan to wanagen.
Aya yaũ tamo abod mog, ã aabẽ to urou uleyagen, aya gemũ abod mog, ã gabar to ufilaĩnagen, aya dagi abodon, kalabus bun abod mog, ã to kulatun wiyagen.’
“Idig aiten dale dirõf, ‘Odug, ere sain õ naũ ubodon, naan sã ubodon, yaũ tamo ubodon, gabar sã ubodon, dagi ubodon, kalabus bun ubodon, amã õ to masennon?’
“King aitedin yale irõf, ‘Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ã neu idi yeneid sã enidi taka to el wiyẽgen, are aya to el wiyagen.’
“Age ye di, idi darau faimud ibodkeleya nẽ bun dilauf, madur tamo kayau idi mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ bun dilauf.”
Jesus od enĩ ganan wogõ ye bure fel fen, ĩ in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin,
“Ã keleĩ, naa uru bure fele di, Pasa naa isiyouf, age fe di, Tamo Naal idi imeid bun dino di, aa tetek bun dukesiyouf.”
Dum pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo, pris mudur ado in yana Kaiafas in fõ bun guru difen.
An idi Jesus idegẽya naab bun dale fen, dukesiyouf nigin katõ difen.
Idi diron, “Sifa inoya bun to age tafouf, age tafouf, tamo kayau idi seye de fen, kusĩ dalesauf.”
Jesus, Betani fonõ an, Simon lepra dagi kulu adon in fõ bun ibod mog,
kayau taka, Jesus wagen moul sumeĩ biya bagai moni odug nem anĩ, moul ifeya nẽ gulub ado irou isin anĩ, Jesus tebol bun saaf yoko ibod mog, ĩ mudur bun moul fi felen.
Anĩ in dõ fiya tar dile mã, idi nameid sane fen, diron, “Ere nigin enĩ sekil fef?
Moul enei na odug nem sur fiyam are, moni anĩ yale maleg tamo ifenẽdiyam.”
Anĩ Jesus kelei ken, idi irokenẽdin, “Ã, ere nigin kayau enĩ wau morõ wenẽgef? Kayau enĩ aya bun biya bagai age fel.
Maleg idi ã geid faimud ubodõgouf, anĩ ere, aya ã geid faimud to tabodõf.
Sain kayau moul enĩ, neu bouwau bun fi felel are, mekur ainẽf nigin dodok fiyal.
Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tenebur ein nain be biya od enĩ wogõ douf, ereb kayau anĩ age fen anĩg wogõ douf. Age dife di, idi ĩ nigin dum dum wogõ de fen, karĩ dalauf.”
Agef fen, dõ fiya tar tuwelf idi atun taka, yana Judas Iskariot tamal, pris odudug wagedin ile fen,
to fedin, “Sain aya ĩ imeĩ bun ano di, ere anĩ ã aya wanagauf nigin kisi gef?” Age ye di, idi teti silwa koin moni anĩ diweskene ken, difenen.
De anenem, Judas ĩ Jesus kiwai tamo imeid bun inoya nigin naab imirek ilen.
Bret yis sã sifa inoya naa matu anĩ bun, in dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disi to difiyen, “Õ amã nain anĩ Pasa saaf wãf nigin, amã dodok mafe konõf anĩ oroyok?”
Jesus iron, “Taun uleg, tamo taka wagen wõg fen, urokenẽg, ‘Tise irok: Aya neu naa mogo melsã. Aya, neu dõ fiya tar geid, ogon fõ bun Pasa saaf male fen, sigigi mafouf.’”
Anĩ nigin, in dõ fiya tar, Jesus iron anĩ dõ de fen, Pasa saaf nigin dodok difen.
Aragau di, Jesus, in tuwelf geid, tebol bun saaf doko dibodon.
Idi saaf dokon, Jesus iron, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ã atun takam, aya kiwai tamo imeid bun ineyauf.”
Idi waud gudũf fen, mugu mugu wogõ fiyẽya nigin gariya dinon, “Odug, momoi bagai, aya sã?”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Taka ĩ, amã uruwom imamã takai beĩ bun nu mafesil, im aya kiwai tamo imeid bun ineyauf.
Tamo Naal, ĩ nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya irok kilei, agef bagai ilauf. Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ Tamo Naal kiwai tamo imeid bun inof, ĩ malalon ado! Ĩ sina to gõ fem, are dem.”
Age ye di, Judas, tamo ĩ Jesus kiwai tamo imeid bun inouf, iron, “Momoi bagai, aya sã, Rabi?” Jesus aiten yale iron, “Are õ ogo urok.”
Idi saaf dokon, Jesus bret yale, Negur de fiye ken, bret anĩ mumãf, in dõ fiya tar ifeneĩd fen, iron, “Bret enei waleg fen, wõg, eĩ neu bouwau.”
Agef fen, ĩ kap yale, Negur de fiye ken, kap anĩ ifeneĩd fen, iron, “Ã ganan, enĩ bun wõg.
Eĩ neu naudou bar itenẽya nigin, are tamo kayau musei mosor yalel kenẽdiyouf nigin fi felef.
Aya ã arokeneik, aya baban wain enĩ to ãf, gaman ile, aya ã geid, neu Dei nẽ tano bun, wain mata tãf anĩ bun.”
Anĩ bure fele di, idi seg taka dalel fen, idi Moul Arei bun diselen.
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Bõ enĩ bun, ã ganan aya utornagauf, ere nigin, are Negur nẽ Itotoya irok kilei: “‘Aya sipsip marau aukesi di, sipsip ganan firagagaũ difouf.’
Anĩ ere, aya, laa bun tamal kel fã au fen, aya ket Galili uyu alauf.”
Pita, Jesus aiten yale iron, “Idi ganan õ ditornõfeg, aya are to bagai atornõf.”
Jesus Pita irokenen, “Aya õ momoi arokonok, bõ enĩ bun tataro kokorok yeya sã mog, õ aya nigin wa towo wouf.”
Anĩ ere, Pita Jesus irokenen, “Momoi ada uruwom gare tau mogoufeg, aya õ nigin to bagai wa afouf.” Age ye di, dõ fiya tar ganan, od tekelei anĩ diron.
Age de fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, modoũ taka yana Getsemane dilen. An, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Aya oun ele, kosẽ au mog, ein ubodõgouf.”
Jesus, Pita Sebedi gere tar uru gei feid fen, dile mã, ĩ wau gudũf fen, moro kalaisin.
Age fe di, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Neu malaukanon tobega le fen, wau morõ gudũ falaisi, laa nẽ daũ bun ifaref. Ein ufareg fen, ã aya geid lo tafalauf.”
Naal godof iroule fen, kubũ ye, nawa tenebur kumokur fe fen, kosẽ yen, “Neu Dei, kisi falauf are, darau nẽ kap enĩ walel kanauf. Anĩ ere, neu oroya to dõ wouf, on oroya anĩ dogol dõ wo.”
Age fel fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar gedin kel isin, mulã den mog, iledin, ĩ Pita to fiyen, “Tamo ã, aya geid aua tekelei lo fiya nigin to kisi feleya de?
Ã, lo weleg fen, kosẽ gouf, are ã kisi yeĩya bun to kubũ gouf nigin. Uur are orof, anĩ ere, bouwa anĩ malegef.”
Ĩ, anĩ dõ fiya, baban kel ile, kosẽ yen, “Neu Dei, kap enĩ bun aya to ãf are, õ kap enĩ yaleleya nigin kisi feleya sã, age fouf, õ ogon oroya dõ wouf.”
Ĩ kel isin, baban denena mog iledin, ere nigin, idi meleid morõ gudũ fesin.
Agef fen, ĩ idi itorneĩd fen, baban kel ilen, kosẽ yen anim towo, od tekelei iron anĩ baban kosẽ yen.
Agef fen, ĩ in dõ fiya tar gedin kel ile, idi irokenẽdin, “Ã fau si unog fen, yenẽyai gef? Ulegef, sain mogo melsã, Tamo Naal mogo mosor tamo imeid bun ilef.
Fafãg fen, teleg! Kiwai imeid bun inoya tamo yeir isif!”
Jesus fau wogõ ye mog, in dõ fiya tar tuwelf idi anĩ atun taka, Judas isin. Tamo musei dimig adodo seburer adodo ĩ geid disin. Pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo idim sur difedi di, disin.
Gama Judas, Jesus kiwai tamon inoya tamo ĩ, Jesus yaor fiyẽf nigin idi uris ifenẽdin: “Tamo aya umã fiya bunem aan afiyẽf anĩ, ĩ waleg.”
Judas, kaisã bagai, Jesus wagen ile iron, “O Rabi, fel!” Age ye fen, ĩ umã fiyen.
Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Mou, ereb wofon usif, are ago.” Age ye mog, tamo Jesus wagen dile dirounen.
Age dife di, tamo Jesus weim difaren anidi takam, ima iran, dimig ul feis yalen, pris mudur ado nẽ ferfer weder salõf iran.
Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Ogon dimig in modoũ bun uno, ere nigin, idi ganan dimig ul difeis dalef, dimig bun gare douf.
Ã kisi gef are, aya, neu Dei isennauf nigin aweignẽ di, ĩ kaisã bagai, engel musei biya, sewenti-tu tausen wal fiya imau bun inoya kisi feleya sã de?
Age afouf are, Negur nẽ Itotoya anĩ nigin iron enĩ ganan, naig fe kisi fel, agef wõ youf?”
Sain anĩ bun, Jesus tamo musei irokenẽdin, “Ã bẽ tamo walegedig gen, aya ã dimig adodo seburer adodo waleyagau fenẽ usigef de? Naa ganan, aya tempel fofomala bun abod ken, od afelnẽdidig, anĩ ere, ã aya to urouyagen.
Anĩ ere, profet neid itotoya kisi falauf nigin, enĩ ganan wõ yen.” Age ye di, in dõ fiya tar ganan ditornẽ diyalelen.
Idi Jesus dalen, pris mudur ado Kaiafas garan dirou dilen, an lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo geid guru difen.
Anĩ ere, Pita, Jesus dume naal soso fiye ken, dõf tokõ fel ile, pris mudur ado nẽ fofomalan wõ yen. Ĩ namen ile fen, kabĩ tamo geid dibod ken, naig be difiyẽf nigin lo fen.
Pris odudug, Juda neid kaunsel ganan geid, Jesus laa bun dinenẽf nigin, bou bun idegẽya od dinou fenẽ dimiren.
Musei wagen disi fen, disenneĩd fen, idegẽya od diraran, anĩ ere, Jesus laa bun dinenẽf nigin od gariya taka to dilen. Dum tamo uru wõ den,
anidim diron, “Tamo enim iron, ‘Aya Negur nẽ tempel narĩ afel fen, naa towo bun baban anouf, are kisi feleya.’”
Age de di, pris mudur ado fã ye, ifar fen, Jesus irokenen, “Õ to solo urõf de? Eĩ ere od anĩ, tamo enidi õ nigin dirousif?”
Anĩ ere, Jesus mutũ ifaren. Pris mudur ado Jesus irokenen, “Õ mata ibodõya Negur mala bun urõf nigin, od arokonok. Õ momoi Kristus, Negur Naal be anĩ, amã urokanamãf.”
Jesus aiten yalen, “Ao, õ ogo yer urok. Anĩ ere, aya ã ganan arokeneik: Dum bun, Tamo Naal Negur megeir ado ima biyalem ibod ken, saa lalo bun isi mog, ã ulogouf.”
Jesus age ye di, pris mudur ado karĩ ye fen, in kolos serek fe fen, iron, “Ĩ Negur kono fel! Ere nigin ada od megeir fiya nigin tamo baban tamirẽf? Ulegef, ã gama Negur kono fel anĩ karĩ gel.
Anĩ ã ere kisi gef?” Idi aiten dalen, “Ĩ laa bun ilauf.”
Age de fen, idi, Jesus nawa bun disisne ken, imedim dun. Tunim wala fã de fen,
diron, “Kristus, kurõ weis urokanamã, aim õ inok?”
Pita, pris mudur ado nẽ fõ fofomalan ibod mog, kabĩ kayau momoul taka wagen isi iron, “Õg Jesus Galili tamal weim uyõgen.”
Anĩ ere, ganan meleid bun ĩ waf fen, iron, “Õ od urok enĩ, aya keleĩ sã.”
Age ye fen, ĩ iyok ilen, bobog bun, an kayau momoul takam ile fen, tamo kayau an difaren idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo enĩ, Jesus Nasaret tamal ĩ geiden.”
Ĩ baban waf fen, totol od iron, “Tamo are aya keleĩ sã!”
Sain naal ile di, idi an difaren Pita garan dile fen, diron, “Momoi bagai, õ idi neid taka, on od wogõya bun ogo yaor yok.”
Age de di, ĩ mogo yogo bouwa geluf fen, totol od irokenẽdin, “Tamo are aya keleĩ sã!” Age ye mog, kaisã bagai tataro kokorok yen.
Age fe di, Pita Jesus wogõ yen anĩ nigin weder fokõ yen, “Sain tataro kokorok yeya sã mog, õ aya nigin wa wo towo wouf.” Anĩ nigin, ĩ weder fokõ ye di, ĩ mayarẽ ile fen, inã odug yalen.
Bonimei bagai, pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo geid, Jesus yukesiya nigin od difon.
Idi ĩ difõ dale diroule, gawaman nẽ mudur Pailat ima bun dinon.
Anĩ Judas, Jesus kiwai ifenen, ĩ lof mog, Jesus dukesiyouf nigin ĩ bou bun od dun anĩ ile fen, ĩ kisif wau yu ken, teti silwa koin moni kel iroule, pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo geid ifenẽdin.
Judas iron, “Aya mosor anon, ere nigin, ĩ mosor sã mog, ayam kiwai anon.” Age ye di, idi aiten dalen, “Amã ere mayõf? Are ogon sakir.”
Judas moni irou ile, tempel namen irara ken, ilen. Anĩ ĩ iya ile, yogo kosim bun ula iseginen.
Pris odudug moni gei de fen, diron, “Lo to wal tafouf nigin, moni enĩ tempel nẽ kolekta bokis bun to ufeg, ere nigin, moni enĩ naud mala.”
Katõ fiya bure difel fen, moni anim, mis inoya tamo nẽ teneub anĩ na dale fen, yaũ tamo mumã difediyouf nigin, idi kisi difon.
Anĩ bunem, gamag teneub anĩ yana, Naud nẽ Mayã dedig.
Are profet Jeremaia nẽ od, eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi felen: “Idi teti silwa koin moni dalen, moni anĩ Israel tamo kayau ĩ nigin digiren.
Idi moni anim, mis inoya tamo nẽ teneub na dalen, Odug aya agef irokanan kilei.”
Jesus, Rom gawaman nẽ mudur Pailat, mala bun ifare di, gawaman nẽ mudur Pailat ĩ to fiyen, “Õ Juda neid king de?” Jesus iron, “Are de yer, õ urok anĩ.”
Sain pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo geid, Jesus bou bun od dun, ĩ aitedin to yalen.
Pailat Jesus to fiyen, “Õ boũ bun od dirarak to karĩ wof de?”
Anĩ ere, Jesus aiten to yalen, ĩ bou yũya od tekelei bagai nigin taka to solof iron. Age fe di, gawaman nẽ mudur, odug biya terẽ yen.
Gama gawaman mudur nẽ tobonunã, Pasa sifa naa bun, tamo kayau, tamo taka kalabus bun digirĩ di, yalisnẽdig.
Sain anĩ bun, idi kalabus tamo taka, yana sane bagai adon, ĩ yana Barabas.
Bonimei, tamo kayau, Pailat nẽ fõ bun guru difesi di, Pailat to fedin, “Nanĩ ã aliskeneĩf anĩ oroyeik, Barabas de oo Jesus ĩ Kristus dedig anĩ?”
Ere nigin, ĩ yogo kelein, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo idi, kiyeĩ bunem, Jesus ĩ ima bun dinon.
Pailat od es fiya modoũ bun ibod mog, in aiwa od sur fen, “Tamo anĩ ĩ mosor sã, ĩ nigin ereb taka to ago wouf, ere nigin, aya, nor bõ, ĩ nigin ami ken, morõ odug ĩ nigin ailel.”
Anĩ ere, pris odudug, mudur adodo geid, tamo kayau od irõya nigin wedereid diroun, are idi Barabas yalisnẽya nigin ado, Jesus dukesiyouf nigin nonĩ douf nigin age difen.
Gawaman nẽ mudurem to fedin, “Aya ã aliskeneĩf nigin, uru enidi ã nanĩ oroyeik?” Idi aiten dalen, “Barabas anĩ.”
Pailat to fedin, “Age fiyauf are, aya, Jesus, Kristus dedig nigin, ere naig afouf?” Idi ganan diron, “Aa tetek bun ũf!”
Pailat to fedin, “Ere nigin? Ere mosor ĩ age fen?” Anĩ ere, idi totol bagai diweig diron, “Aa tetek bun ũf!”
Pailat ĩ anĩ ile fen, ĩ od irõya nigin naab taka sã, anĩ tamo kayau idi totol bagai dino fen, kusĩ dou fenẽ age dife di, ĩ naan yale fen, tamo kayau meleid bun ima kulof fen, ĩ iron, “Tamo enĩ naud aya bun sã, are ãgenei sakir!”
Tamo kayau ganan aiten dale diron, “Yogon naud utor len, amã bun ado nemã kesu tar bun yenẽf!”
Age de di, ĩ Barabas yalis ifenẽdin. Agef fen, ĩ irõ di, Jesus wagĩ de fen, ĩ aa tetek bun dũf nigin, kusĩ tamo imeid bun inon.
Gawaman mudur nẽ kusĩ tamo, Jesus dale gawaman mudur nẽ fõ namen dile fen, an mayã taka, kusĩ tamo ganan gou difalaisi salili difiyen.
Idi Jesus nẽ kolos dinukeis fen, kolos meluk giriya anĩ difounnen.
Age dife fen, idi malũ duri ado dale, teter tanak kori de fen, ĩ mudur bun kurũ difen. Idi werĩ tibog dale, ima biyalẽ dino fen, wagen bobou de fen, diselinen. Idi diron, “O Juda neid king gai gai ibodõf!”
Idi ĩ disisne ken, idi baban werĩ tibog ima bun tamal dale, mudur bun baba baban dun.
Idi diseline kel fen, kolos meluk giriya anĩ dinukeis, yogon kolos bagai anĩ baban difounnen. Age de fen, kusĩ tamom idi, ĩ aa tetek bun dũf nigin dirou diselen.
Sain idi mayã anĩ ditor diyok dile fen, idi Sairini tamal tamo taka fotou difen, yana Simon. Idi ĩ, Jesus nẽ aa tetek faali fouf nigin nugo difiyen.
Idi disel, modoũ yana Golgota (anĩ nẽ gariya, Mudur Tuwa nẽ Modoũ) wõ den.
Kusĩ tamo idi, an wain makik ado falei difen anĩ, Jesus yãf nigin difenen. Anĩ ere, ĩ yõ ile fen, yõya nigin itoron.
Sain idi ĩ aa tetek bun du kel fen, idi aisaĩ dira kodẽ de fen, yogon kolos morou morou gadõ difen.
Age de fen, idi an dibod ken, lo difiye kelen.
Ĩ bou bun od dinon anĩ, idi yogon mudur ilun ditoton: EĨ JESUS, JUDA NEID KING.
Age de fen, kusĩ tamo idi, bẽ tamo urug, ĩ geid aa tetek bun didenen, taka yogon ima biyalẽ, taka yogon ima kilẽ.
Tamo kayau dile disi dife, Jesus kono difiye ken, kasã difiyẽ, mudureid dira ken,
idi diron, “Õ onom tempel narĩ wol fen, baban naa towo bun anouf won, õ ogo nigin usennẽf! Õ Negur Naal wouf are, aa tetek bun tamal kutũ weis!”
Age difiyen gen, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo, idi Jesus diselinen.
Idi diron, “Tunĩ anĩ isennẽdin, anĩ ere, ĩ yogo nigin isennẽya kisi feleya sã! Ĩ Israel nẽ king! Utornẽg len, gama aa tetek bun tamal kutũ yesiyouf. Age fe di, ada ĩ nigin momoi tauf.
Ĩ Negur nigin momoi yedig. Ĩ irõdig, ‘Aya Negur Naal,’ anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ nigin orouf are, utornẽg len, gama Negurem ĩ isennẽf.”
Age difiyen gen, bẽ tamo Jesus geid, aa tetek bun didenen idig, ĩ nigin kono fiya od in bou bun diran.
Tuwelf kilok gaa ado nẽ ile, tri kilok aragaun, gugum isin, teneub ganan kerub fen.
Tri kilok age fiya mog, Jesus wade bagai iweig iron, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” –anĩ nẽ gariya, “Neu Negur, neu Negur, ere nigin õ aya utornal?”
Tunĩ an difaren, anĩ karĩ de fen, diron, “Ĩ Eliya iweignek.”
Kaisã bagai, idi atun takam gudu re ile, spons yalen, wain kai ado bun nu feis fen, tibog bun ino fen, Jesus yãf nigin ifenen.
Tunĩ ganan diron, “Gama utornẽg, Eliya isi isennẽ mog, tailauf.”
Jesus baban ait odug nem iweig di, in uur ul fe yale di, laa fen.
Sain anĩ bun, gabar meluk odug tempel namen modoũ fateul bun ibodon anĩ, serek fe uru fen, ilunenem irousil teneburen. Teneub yoũf fen, meein fara fedin.
Matmat bobog kã fedi di, tamo kayau fateul musei gare den idi, baban mata fafã den.
Idi matmat bunem fafã den anidi, Jesus kel fã ye di, Jerusalem fateul taun dile fen, tamo kayau musei meleid bun wowã den.
Kusĩ tamo tunĩ, idi neid orowa geid, Jesus tari difiyen, teneub yoũ fe di, ereb ereb ganan wowã ye di, dile fen, fatuk bagai terẽ de fen, diron, “Momoi bagai, ĩ Negur Naal!”
Kayau musei an difaren, idi so del fen, lo difen. Idi Galili anenem Jesus aruna yaleya nigin dõ difen anidi.
Idi atun Maria Magdala tamal, Maria Jems Joses ado neid sineid, taka Sebedi gere tar neid sineid.
Aragau mog, safina ado tamo, Arimatea tamal, yana Josef isin, ĩ Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar anĩ nẽ taka.
Ĩ Pailat wagen ile, Jesus nẽ bouwa buru nigin to fiyẽ di, Pailat yo ye fen, Jesus nẽ bouwa buru ĩ ifenẽya nigin, kusĩ tamo irokenẽdin.
Josef bouwa buru yale gabar lalau amuyẽ sã anim sile fen.
Agef fen, ĩ yogon matmat mata sa bun ku yalen ani bun, Jesus nẽ bouwa buru inenen. Ĩ meein odug wele fe di, isi, matmat awa ku katĩ fel fen, ilen.
Maria Magdala tamal, Maria taka ado, matmat wagen dibodon.
Naa taka, Sabat naa nẽ dodok fiya naa anĩ bure fele di, pris odudug, Farisia tamo geid, Pailat wagen dilen.
Idi diron, “Tamo Odug, amã karĩ maulef, idegẽya tamo ĩ matan iyo ken, iron, ‘Naa towo bure fele di, aya laa bun tamal, baban mata kel fã auf.’
Age fiya nigin, õ urõ len, naa towo bun matmat totol bagai tari difouf. Age fiya sãf, in dõ fiya tar disi, bouwa buru bẽ dale mã, tamo kayau didegneĩd fen, ĩ laa bun tamal kel fã yel douf. Idegẽya dum isiyouf anĩ gai sane bagai, uruwa nẽ wal fiyauf.”
Pailat iron, “Lo fiya tamo tekelei waleg. Uleg fen, ã, taka nem matmat bun ileya nigin, totol bagai katĩ feleya nigin, ã keleĩ anĩ kilei bagai, matmat agog totol bagai lo gouf.”
Anĩ nigin, idi dile, matmat bun meein teten wõ dũ dino fen, lo fiya tamo anĩ dinenen.
Sabat naa bure fele di, uub nẽ naa matu bun bonimei mumurei ado, Maria Magdala tamal, Maria taka ado matmat dilou fenẽ dilen.
Sain anĩ bun kaisã bagai, mimĩ totol ado wõ yen, ere nigin, Odug nẽ engel saa ilun tamal isin, matmat bun ilen, meein welef yerin ile di, teten ibodon.
Agef fen, in lo fiya kolimei filiya gen, in kolos lalau medeĩya saa lalo lalau gen.
Matmat lo difen tamo, idi ĩ nigin kumĩ de, tererẽ de fen, laa tamo gen denenan.
Engel kayau irokenẽdin, “To kumĩ wog, ere nigin, aya keleĩ, ã Jesus aa tetek bun dun anĩ umirnẽgef.
Ĩ ein sã, ĩ iron kilei, mogo laa bun tamal mata kel fã yel. Usig fen, ĩ yenen modoũ uleg.
Agog fen, kaisã bagai uleg, in dõ fiya tar urokenẽdig: ‘Ĩ laa bun tamal kel fã ye fen, ĩ ketem Galili ilef. An ã ĩ ulogouf.’ Aya mogo ã arokeneim.”
Age ye di, kayau idi, kaisã bagai matmat ditor dilen, kumĩ den, anĩ ere, waud kulĩya ado, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar dirokenẽdiyou fenẽ nigin gududu den.
Age de mog, Jesus tarabã feid fen, iron, “Fel.” Idi ĩ wagen disin, in ye dirou fen, seli dabin.
Age dife di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã, to kumĩ wog, uleg fen, neu turau tar idi, Galili dilauf nigin urokenẽdig; idi an aya dileyauf.”
Kayau naab luwe dile mog, matmat lo difen tamo tunĩ, taun namen dile, pris odudug bun, ereb ereb ganan wõ yen anĩ nigin od dinon.
Pris odudug, mudur adodo geid, guru de, kisi katõ de fen, idi kusĩ tamo moni odug difenẽdin.
Idi, matmat lo difen tamo dirokenẽdin, “Ã urõgouf, ‘Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar bõ disi fen, mainana kel mog, in bouwa buru bẽ dalen’ gouf.
Od enĩ gawaman nẽ mudur bun ilauf are, amã faded mafiyẽ di, ã morõ to walogouf.”
Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo moni dalen, idi diron kilei age difen. Od enĩ, Juda tamo kayau bun iyokelen, gamag agef yenek.
Age fe di, in dõ fiya tar ilewen Galili dilen, arei Jesus irokenẽdin nẽ an dilen.
Sain idi Jesus dilen, idi seli dabinen, anĩ ere, tunĩ waud urun.
Age dife di, Jesus wagedin isin irokenẽdin, “Megeir adok, saa ilun nẽ ado tenebur nẽ anĩ ganan, Negurem aya ifanan.
Anĩ nigin, ã, teneub ganan bun, tamo kayau ganan bun uleg fen, neu dõ fiya tar unenãdigouf, Dei yana nem, Naal yana bunem, Awa Uur Fateul yana bunem, idi naan ugunẽdigouf.
Agog fen, od aya ã arokenein anĩ ganan dõ difouf nigin ufelnẽdigouf. Momoi bagai, aya ã geid sain faimud tabodok, ile, sain idikalauf bun.”
Jesus Kristus, Negur Naal nigin, biya od gariya inoya.
Profet Asaia nẽ itotoya bun ibodok: “Aya neu arũ tamo ĩ ket sur afe di, ĩ uyu ilauf, ogon naab dodok fouf.”
“Ait taka gerere tuan iweig irok, ‘Odug nẽ naab dodok ge fen, madur wenẽg.’”
Age fiya nigin, Jon isin, tamo kayau gerere tuan od irokenẽdi di, waud falei del, nedi mosor yaleleya nigin naan igunẽdin.
Judia kalilĩ fiya, Jerusalem tamo kayau ganan, ĩ garan dilen. Idi neid mosor kurõ difesi di, idi im Jordan naanũ naan igunẽdin.
Jon kamel siwi nem gabar diwan anĩ ifonũdig. Agef fen, gaar gabar nem lũ diwan anim luwa gu fedig. Ĩ totobi nin te ado yõdig.
Eĩ enĩ yogon od iron, “Taka ĩ aya dumeun dõ fiyauf, anĩ ere, in megeir neu wal fiya. Aya to biya nigin, iborou bobou fe fen, in ye su nẽ malũ biru fiya kisi feleya sã.
Aya naan nem aguneik, anĩ ere, ĩ Awa Uur Fateulem iguneĩf.”
Sain anĩ bun, Jesus Nasaret taun oun Galili nediwom isi, Jonem Jordan naan igunen.
Jesus naanum fã yale fen, ĩ lof mog, saa tano kãf fen, Awa Uur kuburir gen, ĩ bun isi mog, ilen.
Age fe di, ait taka saa ilunem isin, “Õ neu Kesu, õ nigin aya wau laa fedig, õ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig.”
Kaisã bagai, Awa Uurem sur fiyẽ di, gerere tuan ilen.
Ĩ gerere tuan an, naa foti ibod mog, Satanem kisi fiyen. Ĩ gaar kuĩ geid difar mog, engel idim anĩ ĩ disennen.
Jon kalabus bun dinenen ibod mog, Jesus Galili ile, Negur nẽ biya od anĩ kurõ feis iron.
Ĩ iron, “Sain mogo isil. Negur nẽ tano mogo melsak. Wauĩ falei wog fen, biya od enĩ nigin wauĩ momoi gei!”
Jesus Galili maaĩ yeri iyo ken, ĩ Simon, ne tura Endru ado, daliyou bun kakãg dirã mog, iledin, ere nigin, idi gau yaleya tamo.
Jesus iron, “Usig, dõ wiyag, aya ã tamo gei fiya nigin aneyeĩf.”
Sain anĩ bun bai, nedi kakãg ditor ken, ĩ dõ difiyen.
Sain ĩ naal iyok ile fen, ĩ Sebedi naal Jems, tura Jon ado, waag namen, idi neid kakãg dodok dife mog, iledin.
Kaisã bagai, ĩ iweignẽdin. Age fe di, idi temeid Sebedi, in kabĩ tamo oroi yaledin anidi geid waag bun ditorneĩd fen, Jesus dõ difiyen.
Idi Kapenaum taun dilen. Sain Juda neid uub naa Sabat wõ ye di, Jesus Juda neid uub fõ namen ile fen, od ifelnẽdiya gariya inon.
Tamo kayau in od nigin terẽ den, ere nigin, ĩ tamo yana adom gen ifelnẽdin, ĩ lo ifelnẽdiya tamo gen sã.
Agef mog bai, tamo taka kaa sanem irounen anĩ, nedi uub fõ namen an kaĩ ye iron,
“Õ amã ere naig wamã fenẽ, Jesus Nasaret tamal? Õ amã daig wamã fenẽ nigin usil de? Aya õ nigin keleĩ, Negur nẽ Fateul bagai!”
Jesus totol ado iron, “Foro wol! Ĩ namen tamal ulõ weis!”
Kaa sane, tamo anĩ totol bagai yokũ fiyẽ, sur fiyẽ, ira ken, kaĩ ye, ulõ yesin.
Tamo kayau ganan terẽ de fen, abob toti difen, “Eĩ ere? Keleĩ mata, agef fen, totol ado! Ĩ irõ di, kaa seseneg dõ difedig.”
Ĩ age fen anĩ nẽ od kaisã bagai, Galili kalilĩ fiya fonõ anĩ adok iyokelen.
Sain Juda neid uub fõ ditor ken, kututũ desin, idi Jems Jon ado weim, Simon Endru ado neid fõ bun dilen.
Simon nẽ mam, ĩ bouwa uruwa odug ado nigin fatarẽ yenen, anĩ idi ĩ nigin Jesus dirokenen.
Anĩ nigin, Jesus kayau wagen ile, kayau ima yales irou isennẽ di, fã yen. Age fe di, bouwa uruwa anĩ kayau folo fiye kele di, kayau ĩ aruneid yalen.
Aragau anĩ bun gaa kuru kel mog, tamo kayau dagi adodo, kaa sesen adodo ganan, Jesus wagen guri difeid, disin.
Taun anĩ nẽ tamo kayau ganan, fofomala anĩ bun guru difen.
Anĩ bun, Jesus, tamo kayau dagi fire fire adodo musei el fiyẽdin, kaa sesen musei irudi di, diyawon. Anĩ ere, kaa sesen idi ĩ nigin kelein. Anĩ nigin, idi to wogõ douf nigin sigoreid ifofan.
Bonimei bagai mumurei ado, Jesus fã yale, fõ itor, moilin ile, an Negur kosẽ fiyen.
Simon ĩ, ne tã tar geid dimirne ken, dilen.
An fotou difiye ken, idi dirokenen, “Tamo kayau ganan õ dimirnok!”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Ada uyu takã talauf, fonõ melsã anĩ bun. Aya aneg od arõf, anĩ nigin aya asin.”
Age ye fen, Jesus Galili kalilĩ fiya ganan bun iyo ken, nedi uub fõ fõ bun od iro ken, kaa sesen irudi di, diyawon.
Tamo taka lepra dagi ado, ĩ wagen isi, ibor bobou fe fen, igon, “Õ oroyõf are, el wiyauf.”
Jesus wau gudũf fen, ima irã, kobũ fiye ken, ĩ iron, “Aya wau irok, õ bouwã biyaf!”
Age ye di, kaisã bagai lepra guruma ĩ itornẽ di, bouwa biya len.
Jesus kaisã bagai totol bagai weder irou fen, sur fiyẽ di, ilen:
“Karĩ welei, enĩ aib taka to urokenẽf, anĩ ere, õ pris wagen ule, õ bouwã ufelnẽf, õ bouwã biyal anĩ nigin Moses nẽ od irok anĩ dõ fen, sesewi fiya wenẽf, anĩ bunem yaore di, tamo kayau dilouf.”
Anĩ ere, ĩ iyok ile fen, kurõ feis irõ di, od anĩ iyokelen. Anĩ nigin, Jesus mal atun taun taka bun to iledig, ĩ moilin ibodon. Anĩ ere, tamo kayau firen firen temeleid fau fau ĩ wagen disidig.
Naa tunĩ bure fele di, Jesus baban Kapenaum taun ile di, tamo kayau idi, ĩ fõ taka bun ibodok yeya anĩ karĩ den.
Anĩ nigin, tamo kayau musei guru difen, fõ aaben ado fofomala dino dale di, modoũ san. Age dife di, Jesus od irokenẽdin.
Jesus od irokeneĩd mog, tamo tunĩ tamo ilolaisin anĩ tamo aiwa ifenẽyam faali de, dirou disin.
Idi ĩ Jesus garan irou ileya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, tamo kayau musei, anĩ nigin, idi Jesus ibodok nẽ fõ soko anĩ korõ difel fen, tamo gabgab bun yen mog, folo folõ dife di, isilen.
Jesus idi neid momoiya ile fen, ĩ tamo ilolaisin irokenen, “Kesu, ogon mosor alelkonok.”
Age fe di, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ an dibodon, idi dogo namedin kisi difen,
“Ere nigin ĩ age irok? Ĩ kono fef! Taka nem mosor yaleleya to yenek, Negur yogo dogol.”
Kaisã bagai, Jesus yogon kisi bun, idi waudim kisi difen anĩ kelein. Agef fen, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Ã ere nigin agog kisi gef?
Tamo ilolaisin anĩ irokenẽya nigin nanĩ anĩ karika, ‘Ogon mosor alelkonok’ de, ‘Fã wo, ogon gabgab wale fen, uyok ule’?
Anĩ ere, Tamo Naal ĩ tenebur ein mosor yaleleya nigin yana ado anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin…” Age ye fen, ĩ tamo ilolaisin anĩ irokenen,
“Aya õ arokonok, fã wo, ogon gabgab wale fen, fõ bun ule.”
Ĩ fã yale, ganan meleid bun in gabgab yale iyok ilen. Age fe di, tamo kayau ganan terẽ de fen, Negur yana dales diron, “Ada kulu ereb eig fiya taka to tailen!”
Jesus ĩ baban daliyou sirin ilen. Tamo kayau musei ĩ wagen disile di, ĩ od gariya ino ifelnẽdin.
Ĩ iyok ile, Lewi, Alfeus naal, takis yaleya fõ bun ibod mog, ile fen, irokenen, “Aya dõ wiya.” Age ye di, ĩ fã yale, dõ fiyen.
Jesus Lewi nẽ fõ bun saaf yõ mog, takis yaleya tamo musei, mosor adodo tamo kayau musei, ĩ, in dõ fiya tar geid, weim saaf don, ere nigin, idi musei Jesus dõ difiyen.
Sain lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo idi, Jesus ĩ takis yaleya tamo, mosor adodo tamo kayau geid, weim saaf doko dibod mog, dileid fen, idi in dõ fiya tar anĩ to difiyẽdin, “Ere nigin ĩ takis yaleya tamo, mosor adodo tamo kayau geid weim doko?”
Anĩ karĩ ye fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Dagi sã anidim dokta bun ileya nigin waud to yenek, dagi adodom dogol. Aya madur tamo anidi iweignẽdiya nigin to asin, mosor adodo tamo anidi iweignẽdiya nigin asin.”
Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar, Farisia tamo geid, idi kuri den. Tamo tunĩ disi, Jesus to difiyen, “Naig fe di, Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar, Farisia tamo nẽ dõ fiya tar geid, idi kuri dedig, anĩ ere, ogon idi sã?”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Naig fe di, mois tamo ibod mog, in tamo tar idi kuri douf? Idi to age difouf, ere nigin, ĩ idi geid fau dibodok.
Anĩ ere, naa fau isi di, anĩ bun mois tamo idi bun tamal yalelnẽ di, naa anĩ bun gama idi kuri douf.
“Tamo taka, gabar tubu, gabar masak mata ado baguf fen, to iwauf. Taka ĩ age fouf are, masak mata anim tubu arirĩ fe di, tubu kudef irailauf.
Takag age fiya, taka nem wain mata meme gabar tubu bun to itinẽf. Ĩ age fouf are, wain anim age fe di, meme gabar gẽ ye fen, serek fouf. Age fe di, wain meme gabar ado sane lauf. Age fiya nigin, ĩ wain mata meme gabar mata bun itinẽf.”
Sabat naa taka bun, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, wit kabĩ atu diyok dile fen, idi wit biya tunĩ fito difen.
Age dife di, Farisia tamo idi Jesus dirokenen, “Ulef, ere nigin idi Sabat naa nẽ lo difodul ken, Sabat naa bun oug difef?”
Jesus irokenẽdin, “Sain Dawid, ne tã tar geid naũ fedi di, saaf lau de fen, Dawid age fen anĩ, ã to uwesegen de?
Abiata, pris mudur ado ibodon sain anĩ bun, Dawid ĩ Negur nẽ fõ namen ile fen, bret fateul prisem dogol dõdig an ibodon anĩ yokon, ĩ bret tunĩ, ne tã tareg ifenẽdin.”
Age ye fen, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo isennẽya nigin Sabat naa inon, tamom Sabat naa anĩ isennẽf nigin to inon.
Anĩ nigin, Tamo Naal ĩ Odug, Sabat nẽg ĩ Odug.”
Sain taka, Jesus baban Juda neid uub fõ bun ilen. Tamo taka ima sitakã gege fefu fen anĩ, an ibodon.
Tamo tunĩ an difaren idi, Jesus bouwa bun od dinouf nigin naab dimiren, anĩ nigin, idi ĩ Sabat naa bun tamo anĩ el fiyẽ mog, dilouf nigin ololo difen.
Jesus tamo ima fefu fiya anĩ irokenen, “Ganan meleid bun fã, ufar.”
