Anĩ nigin, ã ereb ereb irokeneik anĩ ganan dõg, ago weleg fen, ãg eig ge urõgouf, ‘Amã ferfer to biya, amã nemã kabĩ anĩ dogol malel.’”
Jesus Jerusalem ileya nigin, Samaria ado Galili distrik daũ atu iyok ilen.
Ĩ fonõ taka bun ile mog, tamo ten lepra dagi adodo, ĩ fotou difiyen. Idi gerom difar fen,
aiteid odug nem diweig diron, “Jesus, Odug, amã nigin malalon yõ!”
Sain ĩ idi ileid fen, iron, “Uleg, aug bouweĩ pris ufelnẽdigouf.” Age ye di, idi dile mog, bouweid biya len.
Idi neid taka bouwa biya len anĩ ile fen, kel isi, ait odugem Negur yana yalesen.
Jesus ye gariyan kubũ ye yen ken, de wiyal fiyen, ĩ Samaria tamal.
Age fe di, Jesus to fen, “Ten ganan to biya ledin de? Tamo nain idi nain difaref?
Takam to kel isi, Negur yana yalesel, yaũ enei dogol de?”
Jesus age ye fen, ĩ irokenen, “Fã wale fen, ule, ogon momoiyam õ el yom.”
Sain taka, Farisia tamom, Negur nẽ tano ere sain isiyouf nigin Jesus to difiyẽ di, Jesus solof iron, “Negur nẽ tano, malam ileya kisi feleya sã bunem isidig,
tamo to ‘Eĩ yeir,’ be, ‘Your oun,’ be douf, ere nigin, Negur nẽ tano are ã atun ibodok.”
Age ye fen, Jesus yogon dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Sain isi di, Tamo Naal nẽ naa taka ileya nigin oroyeĩf, anĩ ere, ã anĩ to ulogouf.
Tamom dirokeneĩf, ‘Ĩ your!’ be, ‘Ĩ yeir!’ douf. Ã, to uleg, idi to dõ wedig.
Ere nigin, Tamo Naal, yogon naa bun, kolimei filiya lalan saa gariyanem irou, idikeleyan isiledig gen.
Anĩ ere, uruwa ĩ darau musei yale di, tamo kayau sain enei bun dibodok anidi ĩ dudum difiyẽf.
“Noa nẽ sain bun age fen gen, age fiya bagai Tamo Naal nẽ sain buneg age fouf.
Tamo kayau saafei de fen, naanuei den, tamo kayau yalef, kayau tamo difenek difen, age de dile mog, Noa waag namen ilen. Agef mog, kuwei isi fen, idi ganan daũ fedin.
“Lot nẽ sain buneg de age difen, tamo kayau saafem, naanem difen, na dalef, na sur difef, saaf diten, fõ dino mog, difen.
Anĩ ere, naa Lot Sodom taun itor ilen bun, yã ado meein salfa, saa bunem uyẽ gen kukur fen, idi ganan daũ fedin.
“Age fiya gen bagai, Tamo Naal yaorouf nẽ naa bun, agef wõ youf.
Naa anĩ bun, taka ĩ yogon fõ agaran ibod mog, in safina namen ibodok anĩ yalouf nigin to kel isilauf. Age fiya bagai, taka ĩ kabier ibodok, yogon safina yalouf nigin to kel ilauf.
Lot nẽ kayau bun kisi gouf!
Taka ĩ yogon mata yalouf nigin kisi fouf, ĩ mata anĩ fõ yalauf. Taka ĩ yogon mata anĩ itorõf are, ĩ yogon mata irou kafĩ falauf.
Aya ã arokeneik, bõ anĩ bun, tamo uru idi fatar tekelei bun denẽf, tekelei yalouf, taka itornẽf.
Kayau uru idi wit ditutu mog, tekelei yalouf, taka itornẽf.”

Idi to difen, “Odug, õ urok anĩ nain wõ youf?” Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Nain be laa yenek nẽ an, tum guru difouf.”
Age ye fen, Jesus, in dõ fiya tar idi faimud kosẽya nigin tuweid to yũf anĩ ifelnẽdiyouf nigin, yaab od taka irokenẽdin.
Ĩ iron, “Taun taka bun, es fiya tamo taka ibodon, ĩ Negur to kumĩ fiyẽdig, tamog to iwesnẽdig.
Taun anĩ bun an, kayau waab taka ibodon, ĩ es fiya tamo bun toku kel fen, yogon kiwai mala solo ifenẽf nigin irokenẽyai yedig.
“Es fiya tamo ĩ kaisã to karĩ fiyen, anĩ ere, dum ĩ yogo nigin iron, ‘Aya Negur to kumĩ afiyek, tamog to awesnẽdif,
anĩ ere, kayau waab enei toku morõ ifanaf nigin, in morõ anĩ ail fen, kayau ĩ irok anĩ age afouf, anĩ bunem ĩ to kel fen, morõ ifanauf!’”
Jesus age ye fen, iron, “Es fiya tamo sane, ereb ĩ iron anĩ karĩg.
Negur yogon igirnẽdin anidi, bõ ado gaa ado diweig dirokenẽdig nigin, ĩ lo nẽ madur fiya to ifenẽdiyouf de? Ĩ sain meluk to karĩ fiyẽdiyouf de?
Aya ã arokeneik, ĩ kaisã bagai lo nẽ madur fiya ifenẽdiyouf. Anĩ ere, Tamo Naal isiyouf sain bun, tenebur ein ĩ momoiya fotou fouf de?”
Tunĩ idi dogo nigin amã madur bagai de fen, tunĩ meleid irim lai difedidig anidi bun, Jesus yaab od eneig irokenẽdin,
“Tamo uru tempel bun kosẽ douf nigin diselen, taka Farisia tamo, taka takis yaleya tamo.
Farisia tamo ifar fen, yogo nigin kosẽ yen, ‘Negur õ de ayok, aya tamo tunĩ gen sã, bẽ diledig, sane age difedig, seseirã dinodig, takis yaleya tamo enei geneg sã.
Aya uub tekelei bun naa uru kuri au fen, ereb ereb ganan aya alef anĩ, ten teke tekelei õ afonõdig.’
“Anĩ ere, takis yaleya tamo ĩ so rel ifaren. Ĩ saa iluneg to itad fen, anĩ ere, ĩ akor yu ken, iron, ‘Negur, aya nigin waũ inõf, aya mosor temelou.’
“Aya ã arokeneik, Farisia tamo anĩ sã, takis yaleya tamo enei, Negur mala bun ĩ madur fen, fõ bun ilen. Ere nigin, taka ĩ yogo yana yalesef, Negur ĩ yana lai fouf, taka ĩ yogo yana lai fef, Negur ĩ yana yalesauf.”
Takag, tamo kayau, Jesus kesu momoug kobũ fediyouf nigin ĩ wagen guri difeid disin. Age dife di, in dõ fiya tar anĩ dile fen, idi ou difiyẽdin.
Anĩ ere, Jesus kesu ĩ wagen iweigneĩd fen, iron, “Utornẽdig len, kesu nanaal aya wageun disiyouf, idi to katũ wedig, ere nigin, Negur nẽ tano are eig fediya neid.
Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aib taka ĩ, Negur nẽ tano, kesu naal age fiya gen to yalouf are, ĩ Negur nẽ tanon to bagai ilauf.”
Uyu irouya tamo taka Jesus to fiyen, “Tise biya, aya ere naig afe fen, mata faimud ibodkeleya alouf?”
Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Ere nigin õ aya anĩ biya wiyaf? Aibem taka biya sã, Negur yogo dogol.
Õ ĩtãfiya keleĩ: ‘Õ seseirã to unouf, õ tamo taka to ukesiyouf, õ to bẽ walouf, õ taka nigin idegẽya od to urõf, sinã tamã yeneid walesauf.’”
Age ye di, ĩ iron, “Enei ganan aya kesu naalun dõ afef asin.”
Jesus enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ irokenen, “Õ fau tekelei anĩ inĩ sã. Ogon safina ganan na nigin sur wo fen, maleg tamo weneĩd, agouf anĩ õ saa ilun safina biya adouf. Ago wol fen, usi, aya dõ wiya.”
Anĩ ere, ĩ od enei karĩ ye fen, wau fatuk gudũ fen, ere nigin, ĩ safina musei biya ado.
Jesus ĩ lege fiye ken, iron, “Safina musei adodo tamo, Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin, gai malai bagai!
Momoi, kamel ĩ, gabar iwaya nẽ nil ku bun ileya nigin, karika bagai, safina musei ado tamo, Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin, malai bagai.”
Idi od anĩ karĩ de fen, to difen, “Age fiyauf are, aim anĩ mata ibodkeleya anĩ yaleya nigin kisi feleya?”
Anĩ ere, Jesus solof iron, “Ereb tamom age fiya nigin kisi feleya sã anĩ, Negur age fiya nigin kisi feleya.”
Pita Jesus irokenen, “Ulef, amã õ dõ mayõf nigin, ereb ereb ganan amã ado anĩ matoron!”
Age ye di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aib taka fõ, kayau, tura tar, sina tama tar be, gere tar, Negur nẽ tano nigin itoron,
ĩ mala solo musei bagai sain enĩ bun yalouf, ĩ dumen isiyouf buneg mata faimud ibodkeleya yalouf.”
Age ye fen, Jesus, in dõ fiya tar tuwelf firen geif iroule irokenẽdin, “Ulegef, ada Jerusalem teselef, ereb ereb ganan Tamo Naal nigin profet ditoton anĩ, fau kisi falauf.
Ĩ fau haiden Israel sã anidi imeid bun ilauf. Idi ĩ fau diselinẽf, kono difiyẽf, disisnẽf, wagĩ difiye ken, dukesiyouf.
Naa towo bun, ĩ fau baban mata kel fã youf.”
Anĩ ere, dõ fiya tar, enei ganan taka to kelein. Od anĩ nẽ gariya idi bun iminen, agef fen, idi ĩ ereb nigin irok anĩ to kelein.
Sain Jesus Jeriko kelẽ fiyẽ mog, tamo taka mala ifofakeleya, naab yerin nonĩ yef ibodon.
Ĩ tamo kayau musei disi dilef ya karĩ ye fen, ereb wõ yef anĩ nigin to fedin.
Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Jesus Nasaret tamal isi ilef.”
Age de di, ĩ iweig iron, “Jesus, Dawid Naal, aya nigin malalon yõ!”
Tamo uyu dilen anidim sakã difiye ken, foro yalauf nigin dirokenen, anĩ ere, ĩ wade bagai iweig iron, “Dawid Naal, aya nigin malalon yõ!”
Jesus dẽ yel fen, tamo ĩ wagen dirou disiyouf nigin irokenẽdin. Ĩ isi melsã di, Jesus ĩ to fiyen,
“Aya õ ere age afonõf ani, õ oroyok?” Tamo anĩ solof iron, “Odug, aya malau kelẽ yalau fenẽ.”
Age ye di, Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Malã fara wol, ogon momoiya anim el yom.”
Kaisã bagai, ĩ mala fara fel fen, Jesus dõf, Negur yana yalesen. Tamo kayau ganan anĩ dile fen, idig Negur yana dalesen.
Jesus Jeriko taun wõ ye fen, atu iyok ilen.
Tamo taka yana Sakeus an ibodon. Ĩ takis yaleya tamo neid mudur, safina musei ado.
Ĩ Jesus ĩ ai bagai anĩ ilouf nigin oron, anĩ ere, ĩ tobega tamo nigin ĩ kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, tamo kayau musei dinonolnen.
Anĩ nigin, ĩ ket gudu ref ile, Jesus ilouf nigin aa fig ilun sõ yen, ere nigin, Jesus naab anĩ dõf, are isi ilauf.
Sain Jesus modoũ anĩ bun ulõ yeis fen, mala ilun ira ken, ĩ irokenen, “Sakeus, kaisã bagai kutũ weis. Gama aya ogon fõ bun abodõf bagai.”
Age ye di, ĩ kaisã kutũ yeis fen, wau sere fiya ado Jesus aan fiyen.
Tamo kayau ganan enei dile fen, kosesẽ kurã den, “Ĩ mosor ado tamo nẽ fõ bun mogo ilef.”
Anĩ ere, Sakeus ifar fen, Jesus irokenen, “Odug, ulef! Gama yeir aya neu safina atun fara afe fen, sitakã maleg tamo afenẽdiyouf, aya idegẽya bunem tunĩ neid safina alen are, aya idi mugu mugu mala solo aiwa ifenẽya teten ano fen, afenẽdiyouf.”
Age ye di, Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Gama kel yaleya anĩ fõ enei bun isil, ere nigin, tamo enĩ, ĩg Abraham naal taka.
Ere nigin, Tamo Naal fõ delen anidi imirneĩd fen, kel gei fouf nigin isin.”
Idi od enei karĩ de mog, Jesus tobol fe, yaab od taka irokenẽdin, ere nigin, ĩ mogo Jerusalem melsã ifaref, anĩ nigin, tamo kayau Negur nẽ tano kaisã bagai wõ youf de fen, kisi difen.
Anĩ nigin, ĩ iron, “Tamo taka yana odug ado, ĩ king dinenẽ di, kel isiyouf nigin fõ takã gerõ bagai ilen.
Anĩ nigin, ĩ yogon ferfer ten iweig laisi fen, moni wan tausen kina mugu mugu ifeneĩd fen, irokenẽdin, ‘Moni enei kabĩ wenẽg mog, aya kelauf.’
“Anĩ ere, yogon tamo tar kiwai difen ken, eig de dirõf nigin ĩ dumen arũ tamo sur difen, ‘Amã tamo enei nemã king wõ youf nigin to oromak.’
“Anĩ ere, ĩ king yana yale fen, fonõ kel isin. Agef fen, ĩ, ferfer moni ifenẽdin idi moni ado naig de kabĩ dalen anĩ ilouf nigin, iweignẽdi di, disin.
“Tamo uyu ĩ isi iron, ‘Odug, aya ogon wan tausen kina bun, ten tausen kina taka alen.’
“Age ye di, yogon odug solof irokenen, ‘Õ ferfer biya, õ de agon! Õ safina naal bagai bun kabĩ biya walen nigin, taun ten lo weid.’
“Ĩ dõ fiya taka isi iron, ‘Odug, aya ogon wan tausen kina bun, faif tausen kina taka alen.’
“Age ye di, yogon odug ĩg irokenen, ‘Õ taun faif lo weid.’
“Age fe di, ferfer taka isi iron, ‘Odug, ogon moni yeir. Aya moni anĩ gabar masak nem sile afe fen, anokon.
Aya õ nigin kumĩ aun, ere nigin, õ tamo totol ado. Õ ereb to unokon anĩ waledig, onom to utenen anĩ kusu wodig.’
“Yogon odug ĩ irokenen, ‘Aya ogon od bunem es ayõf, õ ferfer sane! Õ kelein, aya tamo totol ado, ayam to anokon anĩ aledig, ayam to atenen anĩ kusu afedig de?
Ere wo fen, neu moni benk bun to unon? Ago wom are, sain aya kelauf bun, moni kabĩ yalen anĩ nẽ mala ado, moni õ benk wenen anĩ bagu fiya kel isin ado alem.’
“Age ye fen, odug idi difaren anidi irokenẽdin, ‘Yogon moni son ge fen, tamo ten tausen kina ado anĩ wenẽg.’
“Age ye di, idi ĩ dirokenen, ‘Odug, ĩ mogo ten tausen kina ado!’
“Odug solof iron, ‘Aya ã arokeneik, taka ĩ ado, aya teten anouf, anĩ ere, taka ĩ sã bagai, ereb taka ĩ ado areg, ĩ bun tamal son fouf.
Anĩ ere, neu kiwai tar, aya nedi king ibodõya nigin to orodin anidi, ein wageun gurig urousig fen, malau bun udenkesig.’”
Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, Jerusalem iseleya nigin, ĩ ketem uyu iselen.
Jesus Moul Arei bun Betfage ado Betani fonõ kelẽ fiye ken, in dõ fiya tar uru sur feid irokenẽdin,
“Fonõ wageik anĩ bun uleg, an wõg fen, donki naal difon anĩ ulogouf, are aibem taka anĩ bun to iyon. Anĩ biru weleg fen, ein urou usig.
Taka nem to yeĩf, ‘Ere nigin ã anĩ biru gef?’ urokenẽgouf, ‘Odug anĩ kabĩ ifenẽf nigin.’”
Anĩ nigin, uyu sur fedin idi dile, Jesus irokenẽdin kilei bagai anĩ fotou difen.
Idi donki naal biru de mog, anĩ nẽ marau tamo idi to difiyẽdin, “Ã ere nigin donki naal anĩ biru gef?”
Idi ĩ solo de dirokenen, “Odug anĩ kabĩ ifenẽf nigin.”
Idi donki naal anĩ Jesus wagen dirousi fen, idi neid gabar teten dirara ken, ĩ anĩ teten dinenẽ ibodon.
Jesus iyok ile mog, tamo kayau idi neid gabar naabur du difedin.
Sain ĩ iyok isi, naab Moul Arei bunem isileya non, in dõ fiya tar ganan, memelik ganan inodin dilen nigin, waud al fiya ado aiteid odug nem Negur yana dalesen:
“King, Odug yana bunem isif, are ĩ el fiya ado!” Saa ilun wau inosiya ado, ilun bagai fula fiya medeĩya ado!”
Tamo kayau atun, Farisia tamo tunĩ Jesus dirokenen, “Tise, ogon dõ fiya tar sakã wiyeĩd!”
Anĩ ere, Jesus solof iron, “Aya ã arokeneik, idi foro dalauf are, meein eneidi diweig dirõf.”
Ĩ Jerusalem kelẽ fiye ken, taun anĩ ile, wau gudũ fe di, inã yale,
iron, “Õ Jerusalem naa enei bun, õ nigin erebem waũ inosiya irou isif anĩ õ keleim, are dem, anĩ ere, gama õ malã bun iminek.
Sain taka õ bun isiyouf, ogon kiwai tar, õ bun teneub mudu dino, salili diyokel, afi diyokalauf.
Idi õ tenebur dale dirãyõf, õ ado gerẽ tar ogon kau namen difaref geid. Idi meein taka taka teten ditorõ di, to ibodõf, ere nigin, Negur õ bun isin nẽ naa anĩ to ulegen nigin.”
Jesus tempel modoũ bun ile, idi ereb ereb na nigin sur de mog, an irudidin.
Agef fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok, ‘Neu fõ are, kosẽya nẽ fõ ibodõf,’ anĩ ere, ãgem ‘bẽ tamo neid iminẽya fõ’ unogen.”
Naa ganan Jesus tempel bun ifelnẽdidin. Anĩ ere, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo geid, Jesus dukesiyouf nigin naab dimiren.
Anĩ ere, idi age difouf nigin naab taka to dilen, ere nigin, tamo kayau ganan in od anĩ diroun.
Naa taka bun, Jesus tempel bun tamo kayau ifelneĩd fen, biya od wogõ yen. Agef mog, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, mudur adodo geid, ĩ gein disin.
Idi diron, “Aim õ igirnõ di, õ ereb ereb enĩ ago wof anĩ urokanamã. Aim õ igirnon?”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Ayag to fiya taka afeneĩf. Solog urokanag,
Jon naan igunẽdin are saa ilun tamal de, tamo bunem?”
Idi dogo dogol katõ de fen, diron, “Ada, ‘Saa ilun tamal,’ tauf are, ĩ to fouf, ‘Ere nigin ã ĩ nigin to momoi wiyẽgen?’
Anĩ ere, ada, ‘Tamo bunem,’ tauf are, tamo kayau ganan meeinem dinadauf, ere nigin, idi Jon ĩ profet den.”
Anĩ nigin, idi solo de diron, “Ĩ nain be tamal are amã keleĩ sã.”
Age de di, Jesus iron, “Ayag ã to arokeneĩf, aim aya igirna di, aya ereb ereb enĩ age afedif.”
Jesus tobol fe, yaab od enei tamo kayau irokenẽdin, “Tamo taka wain kabĩ yale, ĩ mala solo yalouf nigin wain kabĩ, kabĩ tamo tunĩ imeid bun ino fen, sain meluk uyu takã ilen.
Fito fiya sain, ĩ ferfer taka wain kabĩ lo fiya tamo gedin, wain biya tunĩ difenẽf nigin sur fen. Anĩ ere, idi ĩ du ken, sur difiyẽ di, ima sãsã ilen.
Ĩ ferfer taka sur fen, anĩ ere, idi tamo anĩg du ken, mama difenẽ di, ima sãsã ilen.
Ĩ baban takag sur fe di, idi ĩg darau difen ken, dumeitur diran.
“Age dife di, wain kabĩ marau iron, ‘Aya ere naig afouf? Aya neu kesu, oboiyou, sur afouf. Idi ĩ anĩ karĩ difiyẽf be.’
“Anĩ ere, kabĩ lo fiya tamo idi ĩ dile fen, abob dirokenen. Idi diron, ‘Eĩ ĩ akorouf. Ada ĩ taukeis fen, akor eĩ nedauf.’
Anĩ nigin, idi ĩ wain kabĩ dumeitur dira ken, dukesin.” Age dife di, wain kabĩ marau naig fediyouf?
Ĩ isi, kabĩ lo fiya tamo idenkeis fen, wain kabĩ anĩ tamo tunĩ ifenẽdiyouf.” Sain tamo kayau od enei karĩ de fen, idi diron, “Enei to bagai agef wõ youf!”
Anĩ ere, Jesus idi lo feid le fen, to fedin, “Age fiyauf are, ere gariya nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok: “‘Meein are fõ inoya tamom sane de fen, ditoron, meein anĩ gama monog tor wõ yen’?
Aib taka meein anĩ teten kubũ youf, mereb fe fisik fouf, takag, aib taka meein anĩ ĩ teten kubũ youf, ĩ danĩf aas lauf.”
Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, pris odudug geid, Jesus kaisã bagai irounẽya nigin naab dimiren, ere nigin, idi kelein, ĩ idi nigin yaab od enei wogõ yen. Anĩ ere, idi tamo kayau nigin kumĩ den.
Anĩ nigin, idi Jesus ololo difiye ken, kofo tamo sur difedin, kofo tamo idi idegẽya bun madur tamo gen dilen. Idi Jesus ereb od wogõya bun kũ fenẽ di, diroune ken, Rom gawaman mudur nẽ lo fiya ado megeir bun dinenẽf nigin kisi difen.
Anĩ nigin, kofo tamo Jesus to difiyen, “Tise, amã keleĩ, ogon wogõya ifelnẽya ado madur. Õ takam in oroya dõ wouf nigin wewu yõ di, in oroya dõ fen, taka wau morõ to wenẽdig, anĩ ere, õ momoi bun Negur nẽ naab ufelnamãdig.
Amã Sisa takis mafenẽf anĩ lo dõ fiya de, sã?”
Anĩ ere, Jesus idi namedin idegẽya anĩ ile fen, irokenẽdin,
“Koin moni taka ufelnag. Ai nẽ malakanon ado itotoya anĩ bun ibodok?”
Idi aiten dale diron, “Sisa nẽ.” Age de di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Age fiyauf are, Sisa nẽ are Sisa wenẽg, Negur nẽ are Negur wenẽg.”
An Jesus mal atun wogõ yen bun, idi ĩ irounẽya kisi feleya sã. Idi ĩ solof iron anĩ bunem terefeit de fen, foro delen.
Sadusia tamo idi dirõdig, laa bun tamal mata to ke de fã dedig, dedig anĩ tunim, to fiya eig fiya ado Jesus wagen disin.
Idi diron, “Tise, Moses itotkanaman, are tamo taka, ne tura laaf fen, aiwa itornen, anĩ ere, kesu sãf are, tamo ĩ kayau waab anĩ yale fen, tura nẽ kesu diroukenẽf.
Gama tura tura sewen dibodon. Matu ketem kayau taka yalen, anĩ ere, kesu yaleya sã mog, tamo laa fen.
Matu dõ fiya bagam kayau anĩ yalen, ĩ laa fe di,
ĩ dõ fiya bagam kayau anĩ yalen, age de dile dile, tura tura sewen ganan kesu sã gare desin.
Dum kayau areg laa fen.
Anĩ nigin, dum laa bun tamal mata kel fãya sain bun, ĩ ai nẽ kayau ibodõf, ere nigin, tura tura sewen anidi adok ĩ dale dogolen?”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Gama sain enei bun, tamo kayau yalef, kayau tamo yalef ya ibodok.
Anĩ ere, sain anĩ bun, idi laa bun tamal mata kel fãya sain bun dibodõf nigin kisi feleya anidi, an tamo kayau yalef, kayau tamo yalef ya sãf,
idi baban gare deyag kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, idi engel gen. Idi laa bun tamal mata ke de fã def nigin, idi Negur nẽ gere tar.
Anĩ ere, arein aa yã wõ yen nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya bun, Moseseg tamo gare den anĩ mata ke de fã douf nigin ifelnen, ere nigin, ĩ Odug nigin iron, ‘Abraham nẽ Negur, Isak nẽ Negur, Jakop nẽ Negur.’
Ĩ laa neid Negur sã, ĩ mata ibodõya neid Negur, ere nigin, ĩ bun ganan mata dibodok.”
Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ aiten dale diron, “Tise, õ de urok!”
Anĩ bunem idi kumĩ de fen, taka nem ereb taka nigin baban Jesus to, to fiyen.
Age dife di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Naig fe di, idi Kristus ĩ Dawid nẽ Naal dedig?
Dawid ĩ yogo Buk Sam bun kurõ falaisin: “‘Negur neu Odug irokenen, “Imau biya melem ubod mog,
ogon kiwai tar on yẽ inoya nẽ sawa anouf.”’
Dawid ĩ nigin ‘Odug’ yef, age fiyauf are, naig fe di, ĩ Dawid naaluouf?”
Tamo kayau ganan karĩ difiyẽ mog, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin,
“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo nigin lo welegei. Idi gabar meluluk difonunakel diyo ken, maket modoũ bun aan difiyẽdiyouf anĩ orodidig. Age de fen, idi Juda neid uub fõ bun sia biyai biyai bun dibod ken, tar inoya bun modoũ malabag malabag bun dibodõdig.
Idi kayau waab idegnẽdiya bunem nedi fõ sosoin difeid fen, meleid yaleya nigin meluk bagai kosẽ dedig. Tamo age fediya, mala solo darau sane bagai dalouf.”
Jesus mala irã, tamo kayau safineid adodo, nedi kolekta moni tempel bogis bun dino mog, iledin.
Takag, ĩ lof mog, kayau waab maleg taka isi, peni giriya moni nanaal uru inon.
Agef fen, Jesus iron, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, kayau waab maleg enĩ ĩ, ganan wal fediya, odug bagai bogis bun inol.
Tamo kayau enei ganan, dogo neid safineid bun tamal, nedi kolekta moni dinon, anĩ ere, kayau anĩ, maleg bun ĩ mata ibodõf nẽ anĩ ganan inon.”
In dõ fiya tar tunĩ, tempel meein biya biya nem ado, safineid biyai Negur difenen anim, tempel naki difiyen anĩ nigin wogõ den. Anĩ ere, Jesus iron,
“Ã ulegef enei nigin, sain fau isiyouf, meein enĩ taka to abob tete tete yenẽf, anĩ adok fau isog irailauf.”
Idi to difen, “Tise, ere sain eneidi wõ youf? Ere uris anĩ, eneidi kisi falauf nigin wõ youf?”
Age de di, Jesus iron, “Takam to idegneĩf nigin lo weleg. Ere nigin, musei aya yanau nem disi dirõf, ‘Aya Kristus,’ takag, ‘Sain mogo melsak.’ Age de di, to dõ wiyẽdig.
Ã kusĩ nigin ado, kantri bun kiwai fen, gawaman narĩ difef ya karĩ gouf, ã to tererẽ gei. Ereb ereb enidi ketem wõ youf bagai, anĩ ere, idikeleya anĩ, sain anĩ bun bagai to wõ youf.”
Age ye fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Teneub taka fã ye fen, ĩ teneub taka nigin kiwai ifenẽf, tano taka ĩ tano taka nigin kiwai ifenẽf.
Mimĩ odug wowã youf, naũ odug ado dagi totol, modoũ taka taka bun wowã youf, ereb ereb kumĩya nẽ ado uris odudug, saa bun wowã youf.
“Anĩ ere, eneidi ganan fau to wõ ye mog, idi kaka diyei ken, kafĩ fiya difeneĩf. Idi Juda neid uub fõ bun ado kalabus bun dineneĩf. Age de fen, ã king ado gawaman mudur adodo meleid bun dirouleyeĩf, anĩ ganan aya yanau nigin de fen, age diyeĩf.
Naab enei bunem, ã idi meleid bun, aya nigin kurõ wesigouf.
Anĩ ere, ã idi meleid bun aug isenneĩya nigin dodok ge fen, to wogõ gouf nigin ã kisi ketem ufokeleg.
Ere nigin, aya, od ado kisi biya, ãgenei kiwai tar takam solof irõya be, kiwai ifenẽya kisi feleya sã anĩ afeneĩf.
Anĩ ere, ã fau sineĩ temeĩ tarem, tureĩ tarem, sirag ado neĩ mou taremeg kiwai difenei ken, ã tunĩ laa bun dineneĩf.
Tamo ganan, aya yanau nigin de fen, ã kiwai difeneĩf.
Anĩ ere, mudureĩ bun, fatiyeĩ tekelei bagai to iminkalauf.
Megeir ifareya bunem, mata walogouf.
“Sain ã Jerusalem kusĩ tamom salili dife mog, ulogouf, ã keleĩ youf, Jerusalem fonou inenẽya anĩ melsak.
Age fiya ulogouf, idi Judia distrik bun dibodok, arein diya diselauf, idi taun anĩ bun dibodok, anenem diyalalauf, idi taun yerin difaref, namen to dilauf bagai.
Ere nigin, sain enei are, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok ganan kisi falauf nigin darau ifenẽya nẽ sain.
Naa anĩ bun, kayau bouweid ado, kayau kesu su difenek ado, idi meleidlon ado. Teneub anĩ bun, morõ odug wõ ye fen, Negur nẽ didi, tamo kayau enei bun isiyouf.
Idi dimig nem didenkeis, kalabus tamo gei difeid fen, teneub ganan bun diroulediyouf. Jerusalem fau haiden Israel sã anidim lalai difeid dile, haiden Israel sã anidi neid sain anĩ kisi falauf.
“Uris gaa bun, ogõ bun ado, barisa bun wõ youf. Tenebur ein, teneub ganan bun moloun fire bagai fã ye fen, maaĩ gugu re di, idi kisi gurũ ye fen, nene douf.
Tamo kayau, teneub bun ere wowã youf de fen, kumĩ de, meleid waĩ youf, ere nigin, saa nẽ megeir guyoyõ douf.
Sain anĩ bun, tamo idi, Tamo Naal lalo bun megeir ado fula fiya medeĩya barikã isi mog, dilouf.
Ereb ereb enei gariya ino, wõ ye di, ufareg fen, mudureĩ utadseg, ere nigin, kel yaleyeĩya are melsak.”
Age ye fen, Jesus yaab od enei irokenẽdin, “Ã aa fig ado aa ganan ulogouf.
Sain idi aarau ifiraũd mog, anĩ ã aug uleg fen, ã keleĩdig, saneya melsak.
Age fiya bagai, ereb ereb eneidi wõ ye mog, ulogouf are, ãg keleĩ youf, Negur nẽ tano are mogo melsak.
“Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tamo kayau sain enei bun dibodok anidi to gare de mog, ereb ereb eneidi ganan wõ youf.
Saa teneub ado sa kalauf, anĩ ere, neu od to bagai sa kalauf.
“Lo walagauf, sãf are, saafei ge, aai naanuei ge fen, tenebur mata ibodõya nigin sii fiya anim, ãgenei wauĩ bun kafĩ yeĩ di, ã keleĩ sã mog, Negur nẽ naa kor gen ã bun isiyouf.
Naa are, tenebur tamo kayau ganan bun wõ youf.
Eneidi ganan wowã you fenẽ anĩ wal fiya kisi falauf nigin ado, Tamo Naal mala bun ufaragauf nigin, ã faimud ololo wog fen, kosẽ gouf.”
Naa ganan, Jesus tempel bun ifelneĩd fen, aragau ganan, Moul Arein isel fen, bõ an ibodõdig.
Age fe di, tamo kayau ganan, tempel bun karĩ difiyẽf nigin, bonimei bagai disidig.
Gama Bret Yis Sã Sifa naa, Pasa naa dedig melsã di,
pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, Jesus yukesiya nigin naab dimiren, ere nigin, idi tamo kayau nigin kumĩ den.
Age fe di, Satan, Judas, Iskariot tamal dedig, tuwelf dõ fiya tar atun taka, ĩ namen ilen.
Age fe di, Judas ile, pris odudug ado tempel lo fiya tamo neid uyu irouya bun wõ ye fen, idi geid ĩ naig fe Jesus kiwai imeid bun inouf nigin katõ difen.
Idi od enĩ karĩ de, waud al fe fen, ĩ moni difenẽf nigin dirokenen.
Judas ĩ yo ye fen, tamo kayau to guru de mog, Jesus idi imeid bun inouf nigin naab imirek ilen.
Anĩ dumen, Bret Yis Sã anĩ nẽ naa wõ yen, anĩ bun idi Pasa naa nigin sipsip naal diden ken, sesewi difedig.
Jesus, Pita Jon ado sur feid fen, iron, “Uleg, ada Pasa naa nẽ saaf tãf nigin dodok wanadag.”
Idi Jesus to difiyen, “Õ, amã nain anĩ, Pasa naa nẽ saaf tãf nigin, dodok mafouf anĩ oroyok?”
Age de di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Taun wõg fen, tamo taka darum naan ado isi fotou yeĩf, ĩ fõ bun ilauf anĩ dõg uleg.
Agog fen, ã fõ marau eig wiyẽg urokenẽgouf, ‘Tise õ irokonok: Aab nanĩ bun an, aya neu dõ fiya tar geid, Pasa naa nẽ saaf mãf?’
Ago ge di, ĩ aab odug ilun anĩ ifelneĩf, an ereb ereb dodok de bure difelen. An neda nigin dodok gouf.”
Age ye di, idi dile, Jesus irokenẽdin kilei ereb ereb age fiya dilen. Anĩ nigin, idi Pasa naa dodok difen.
Sain wõ ye di, Jesus in aposel geid tebol bun dibodon.
Age de fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya darau yaleya sã mog, ã geid Pasa naa nẽ saaf tãf anĩ orouf bagai.
Ere nigin, aya ã arokeneik, aya baban Pasa naa nẽ saaf to ãf ile, anĩ fau Negur nẽ tano bun kisi falauf.”
Age ye fen, ĩ kap yale, Negur de fiye ken, iron, “Enei waleg fen, ã atun foig.
Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aya baban wain to ãf ile, Negur nẽ tano isiyouf.”
Age ye fen, Jesus bret yale, Negur de fiye ken, mumã fen. Agef fen, ĩ in dõ fiya tar ifeneĩd fen, iron, “Eĩ neu bouwau, ã nigin afeneik. Enei agog fen, aya nigin kisi gouf.”
Age fiya bagai, saaf bure difel fen, Jesus kap yale, iron, “Kap enei, neu naudou bun, ã Negur geid bar itenẽya mata, naudou are ã nigin fi felef.
Anĩ ere, taka aya kiwai imeid bun inoyauf, are ein tebol bun urom imamã manof.
Momoi, Tamo Naal ĩ nigin iron kilei agef ilauf, anĩ ere, tamo ĩ kiwai ifenek, ĩ malalon ado.”
Age ye di, idi dogo dogol toti difen, idi atun aim bagai tobonunã enei age fouf.
Takag, idi atun aim anĩ odug bagai ibodõf nigin luwa diroun.
Age dife di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Haiden neid king, dogo neid tamo kayau lo difedig, idi dogo neid megeir tamo kayau bun yaor difedig, are ada biya difadauf dedig.
Anĩ ere, ã age fiya anĩ to ago gouf. Age fiya ban, ã atun odug ibodok are, kesu naal gen ibodõf, takag, uyu irouya tamo ĩ, aruna yaleya tamo gen ibodõf.
Ai anĩ odug, taka tebol bun ibodok anĩ de, taka ĩ aruna yalef anĩ? Taka ĩ tebol bun ibodok anĩ sã de? Anĩ ere, aya ã atun aruna yaleya tamo gen abodok.
Ã anĩ, neu kisi fiya isi di, aya bun toku ufaregen.
Neu Dei tano aya ifanan gen, ayag tano ã afeneik.
Age afe di, ã neu tanon, tebol bun saaf ado naan wãgauf, king nẽ sia bun ubodõg fen, Israel ibor tuwelf es gouf.
“Simon, Simon, tamo wit biya ado wit ido foi fiya nigin age fedig gen, Satan ĩ ãgenei momoiya kisi yeĩ fenẽ nigin to fen.
Anĩ ere, aya, Simon õ nigin ogon momoiya to urofosiyouf nigin kosẽ aun. Anĩ nigin, sain õ kelouf, turã tar megeir wediyouf.”
Anĩ ere, Pita aiten yale iron, “Odug, aya õ ado kalabus bun ado, laa bun ileya nigin dodok afel.”
Age ye di, Jesus iron, “Pita, aya õ arokonok, gama fau tataro kokorok yeya sã mog, õ wa fen, aya nigin keleĩ sã wo, towo wouf.”
Age ye fen, Jesus idi to fedin, “Sain aya ã moni nẽ kodol, faa be, su sã sur ayein, ã ere taka lau gen de?” Idi solo de diron, “Sã.”
Age de di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Anĩ ere, gama taka ĩ moni nẽ kodol adouf, yalouf, faag age fiya, taka ĩ dimig sã, yogon gabar na nigin sur fe fen, taka na yalouf.
Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye ibodok, ‘Ĩ tamo sesen geid bagu difedin.’ Aya ã arokeneik, enei aya bun kisi fel, agef wõ youf. Ariya, aya nigin itoton are mogo kisi felef.”
In dõ fiya tar diron, “Ulef, Odug, dimig uru yeir.” Age de di, ĩ iron, “Are de.”
Agef fen, Jesus aabẽ tamal ulõ yeis fen, gai age fedig gen, Moul Arein iselen, age fe di, in dõ fiya tareg ĩ dõ difiyen.
Modoũ anĩ bun wõ de fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Kisi fiya bun to kubũ gouf nigin kosẽ wog.”
Jesus yogon dõ fiya tar itorneĩd, meein irã di, ile kubũ youn age fiyan ile, ibor bobou fe fen, kosẽ yen,
“Dei, õ oroyõf are, kap enĩ aya bun walelauf. Anĩ ere, neu oroya to dõ wouf, on oroya dõ wo.”
Engel taka saa ilun tamal, ĩ bun wõ ye fen, megeir ifenen.
Age fe di, Jesus wau morõ fatuk fe di, ĩ totol bagai kosẽ yen, age fe di, maab, naud isidig gen, tenebur kuku ren.
Ĩ kosẽ yel fen, fã ye, in dõ fiya tar gedin kel ile, waud gudũ falaisil, den mog, iledin.
Agef fen, Jesus idi to fedin, “Ere nigin mulaĩ wenẽgef? Ã kisi fiya bun to kuku gouf nigin fafãg fen, kosẽg.”
Jesus fau wogõ ye mog, tamo musei disin, tuwelf in dõ fiya tar idi anĩ atun taka, Judas dedig inim uyu iroukenẽdin. Ĩ Jesus umã fiyẽf nigin non ilen.
Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ to fiyen, “Judas, õ umãya bunem Tamo Naal kiwai wenẽf de?”
Sain Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar, ereb wõ you fenẽ age fe di, dile fen, idi diron, “Odug, amã nemã dimig nem madenauf de?”
Age de fen, idi takam, pris mudur ado nẽ ferfer weder biyalẽ anĩ salõf iran.
Anĩ ere, Jesus iron, “Baban enei to ago gouf!” Age ye fen, ĩ tamo anĩ nẽ weder kobũf fen, el fiyen.
Agef fen, Jesus, pris odudug, tempel lo fiya tamo neid uyu irouya geid, mudur adodo, ĩ nigin disin anĩ irokenẽdin, “Ã bẽ tamo urounẽgouf gen, ã dimig adodo seburer adodo usigef de?
Naa ganan, aya ã geid tempel bun tabodon, anĩ ere, ã aya bun imeĩ taka to unogen. Anĩ ere, eĩ ãgenei sain, are gugum irouneik nigin.”
Idi Jesus dale, diroune ken, pris mudur ado nẽ fõ bun dirou dilen. Pita ĩ so rel fen, dumeid dõ fen.
Anĩ ere, sain idi fofomala atun yã kũ de dibodon, Pita ĩg an weim dibodon,
Kabĩ kayau momoul taka, Pita yã sirin ibod mog, ilen. Kayau momoul anĩ Pita lo fel fen, iron, “Tamo eneig ĩ geid.”
Anĩ ere, Pita waf fen, iron, “Kayau, aya ĩ keleĩ sã.”
Sain naal ile di, taka nem ĩ ile fen, iron, “Õg idi neid taka.” Anĩ ere, Pita iron, “Mou, aya sã!”
Aua tekelei age fiya ile di, taka bagam ĩ nigin totol iron, “Momoi bagai, tamo eneig ĩ geid diyon, ere nigin, ĩg Galili tamal.”
Anĩ ere, Pita aiten yale iron, “Tamo, õ urok anĩ aya keleĩ sã!” Ĩ irõ mog bagai, tataro kokorok yen.
Odug falei yel, Pita lo felen. Age fe di, Pita Jesus wogõ fiyen anĩ nigin weder fokõ yen, “Gama fau tataro kokorok yeya sã mog, õ aya nigin wa wo, towo wouf.”
Age fe di, ĩ mayarẽ ile fen, inã fatuk yalen.
Tamo Jesus dirounen idi, ĩ diseline ken, wagĩ difiyen.
Age dife fen, idi Jesus mala difofakel fen, to difiyen, “Kurõ weis urokanamã! Aim õ inok?”
Age de fen, idi kono fiya od musei dirokenen.
We fele di, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo neid kaunsel, are pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, weim guru de mog, Jesus idi gedin dirou dilen.
Idi diron, “Õ Kristus ouf are, amã urokanamã.” Anĩ ere, Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Aya ã arokeneĩf are, ã to momoi gouf,
agef fen, aya ã to ayeĩfeg, ã to solog urõgouf.
Anĩ ere, gama sain enei bunem ilauf ganan, Tamo Naal ĩ, Negur megeir ado ima biyalem ibodõf.”
Age ye di, idi ganan to difiyen, “Age fouf are, õ anĩ Negur Naal de?” Ĩ aitedin yale iron, “Ã de urõgef, aya anĩ.”
Age ye di, idi diron, “Ere nigin ada, ĩ nigin od megeir fiya nigin tamo baban tamirẽf? Ada ĩ sigoron bagai karĩ taul.”
Age de fen, guru fiya ganan fã de, Jesus Pailat bun dirou dilen.
Age de fen, idi mogo gariya dino, ĩ bouwa bun od du ken, diron, “Amã, tamo enei nemã tamo kayau ganan idegẽya bunem sanen guri feid irou ile mog, mailen. Ĩ Sisa takis ifenẽya nigin katũ fiyeĩd fen, ĩ yogo nigin aya Kristus, aya king yen.”
Anĩ nigin, Pailat Jesus to fiyen, “Õ Juda neid king de?” Jesus solof iron, “Are de yer, õ urok anĩ.”
Age ye di, Pailat ĩ, pris odudug, tamo kayau geid irokenẽdin, “Aya tamo enei bou bun mosor taka to ailel.”
Anĩ ere, idi totol dinon, “Ĩ Judia distrik ganan bun, in ifelnẽya bunem tamo kayau waud yalen. Ĩ Galili an gariya ino fen, tokõ fel eineg isin.”
Pailat anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ Galili tamal be anĩ to fen.
Pailat ĩ, Jesus Herod nẽ tano bun tamal yeya kelei ken, Herod gein sur fen, Herod ĩg sain anĩ bun Jerusalem ibodon.
Herod Jesus ile fen, wau fatuk kulĩ yen, ere nigin, sain meluk bagai ĩ ileya nigin oron. Ĩ nigin karĩ yen nigin, Herod ĩ Jesus bun memelik tunĩ ilouf nigin age fen.
Herod Jesus musei bagai to fiyen, anĩ ere, Jesus taka to solof iron.
Pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid an difaren, ĩ bou bun od totol bagai dinon.
Age dife di, Herod yogon kusĩ tamo geid, Jesus kasã difiye ken, kono difiyen. Age dife fen, kolos biya difounne ken, Pailat wagen sur difiyẽ di, kel ilen.
Naa anĩ bun, Herod Pailat ado nigal dun, uruwa bun idi uruwom kiwain.
Pailat ĩ, pris odudug, mudur adodo, tamo kayau geid iweigneĩd fen,
irokenẽdin, “Ã tamo enei, tamo kayau waud yale fen, sane nigin weleid inon ge fen, waleg, urou usigel. Aya ã meleĩ bun to afiyem, anĩ ere, ã ĩ bou bun od unogen anĩ, tamo enei bun gariya taka to ailel.
Herod ĩg age fiya, anĩ nigin, ĩ kel sur fe di, ada gein isil. Anĩ ulogouf, ĩ yukesiya nigin ereb sane taka to age fen.
Anĩ nigin, aya darau dogol afen ken, atornẽf.”

Anĩ ere, idi sigoreid takai fen, diweig diron, “Tamo enei ukesiyouf! Barabas walis kanamã!”
(Barabas ĩ anĩ taun oun kusĩ yales fen, tamo yukesin nigin, kalabus bun dinenen.)
Pailat, Jesus yalisnẽya nigin baban totol bagai irokenẽdin.
Anĩ ere, idi baba baban diweig diron, “Aa tetek bun ũf! Aa tetek bun ũf!”
Age de di, Pailat ĩ irõ, towo fen sain bun anĩ irokenẽdin, “Ere nigin? Tamo enei, ere mosor inon? Aya ĩ yukesiya nẽ gariya anĩ, ĩ bun taka to ailel. Anĩ nigin, aya ĩ darau afen ken, atornẽf.”
Anĩ ere, idi aiteid odudug fen, ĩ aa tetek bun yũf nigin, baba baban dirokenen. Age dife di, dogo neid aitedim, Pailat nẽ od lai difiyen.
Anĩ nigin, Pailat, nedi oroya dõ fiya nigin kisi yale fen, irokenẽdin.
Pailat ĩ, tamo kusĩ yales fen, tamo yukesi di, kalabus bun dinenen ĩ nigin tamo kayau to difiyen anĩ, yalisne ken, dogo neid oroya dõ difouf nigin Jesus ifenẽdin.
Idi Jesus dirou dile fen, Simon Sairini tamal, ĩ yogon fonom isi mog, luwen ĩ dale, aa tetek orowa se dife di, faali fe, Jesus dõ fen.
Tamo kayau musei, kayau idi ĩ nigin waud gudũf fen, inã dalen geid, dõ difiyen.
Anĩ ere, Jesus idi bun falei yel, idi irokenẽdin, “Jerusalem nẽ barai tar, aya nigin inã to waleg, ã aug nigin ado gereĩ tar nigin inã waleg.
Ere nigin, sain fau isiyouf bun, idi dirõf, ‘Kayau dali, kayau fau kesu gõ fiya sã, kayau kesu su ifenẽya sã anidi el fedif!’
Age de fen, “‘idi arei dirokenẽdiyouf, “Teteman kukug!” arei mudu dirokenẽdiyouf, “Kerub wamãg!”’
Tamo, aa mata mog, enei age difedif are, meti youf sain bun, ere wõ youf?”
Lo wal fiya tamo uru idig, ĩ geid laa bun dinenẽdiyouf nigin dirou dilen.
Sain idi modoũ yana Mudur Tuwan dedig wõ de fen, an Jesus aa tetek bun dun, lo wal fiya tamo uru geid, taka biya melem, taka ki melem.
Age dife di, Jesus iron, “Dei, idi neid mosor nigin weder tu kel, ere nigin, idi keleĩ sa ken, enei age difef.” Age fe di, idi aisaĩ kodẽ de fen, yogon kolos idi atun foifu difen.
Tamo kayau difar fen, lo difeid mog, mudur adodomeg ĩ kasã difiyẽ diron, “Ĩ tunĩ isennẽdin, ĩ Kristus Negur igirnen ouf are, utornẽg len, yogo bouwa isennẽf.”
Kusĩ tamog dise fen, diselinen. Idi wain makik ado difen ken,
diron, “Õ Juda neid king ouf are, ogo boũ usennẽf.”
Ĩ muduren itotoya eig ya yenen: EĨ JUDA NEID KING.
Lo wal fiya tamo aa tetek bun difaren anĩ takam, Jesus kono fiyẽ iron, “Õ Kristus ouf are, õ ogo usenne ken, amã usennamãf!”
Anĩ ere, lo wal fiya tamo taka im, ne tã ou fiye ken, iron, “Õ kafĩ fiya tekelei walef, anĩ ere, õ Negur to kumĩ wiyek de?
Ada urom darau talef, are de, ere nigin, ada urom sane age tafen anĩ mala solo. Anĩ ere, tamo enei ereb sane to age fen.”
Age ye fen, ĩ Jesus irokenen, “Jesus, sain õ ogon tano bun usel fen, aya karĩ wiyalauf.”
Age ye di, Jesus tamo anĩ irokenen, “Aya õ momoi arokonok, gama õ aya ado paradis bun tabodõf.”
Gaa atun tuwelf kilok age fiya bun, teneub ganan bun gugum kelef ile, tri kilok aragaun,
ere nigin, gaa mala ifokelen. Age fe di, tempel nẽ gabar anĩ atusil serek fe, uru wõ yen.
Jesus ait odug nem iweig iron, “Dei, neu uur õ imã bun anof.” Agef iro ken, ĩ oboi irour yalen.
Kusĩ tamo neid orowa, Jesus age fiya ile fen, Negur yana yales iron, “Momoi, tamo eĩ madur tamo.”
Tamo kayau ganan idi lo fiya nigin guru difen, ereb anĩ wõ ye di, meledim dilen, are idi waud gudũf fen, akoreid du ken, firagagaũ difen.
Anĩ ere, idi Jesus keleĩ anidi ganan, idi atun kayau Galilim ĩ dõ de disin anidig, so del difar fen, eneidi wõ ye di, lo difen.
Tamo taka yana Josef, ĩ kaunsel taka, madur tamo biya bagai,
anĩ nigin, ĩ idi neid tobonuneid ado od difon anĩ nigin to yo yen. Ĩ Judia distrik bun Arimatea taun tamal, ĩ Negur nẽ tano isiyouf anĩ tari fen.
Josef ĩ, Pailat gein ile, Jesus bou buru yalouf nigin to fiyen.
Agef fen, ĩ Jesus bou buru yale, irou isil, gabar lalau nem silef fen, matmat sa bun ku dalen an inenen, ku anĩ bun an taka to dinenen.
Naa anĩ dodok fiya naa, Sabat naa mogo gariya inou fenẽ melsã.
Kayau Jesus geid Galilim disin, Josef dõ de, matmat ado, Jesus bouwa buru naig de dinof anĩ, lo difen.
Age difel fen, idi fonõ dile, bou wã fiya nẽ marasin ado moul sumeĩ biya bagai dodok difen. Anĩ ere, idi Sabat naa nigin ĩtãfiya dõ de fen, si dinon.
Uub nẽ naa matu bun bonimei bagai mumurei ado, kayau idi, bou wã fiya nẽ marasin dodok difen anĩ dale fen, matmat bun dilen.
Age dife fen, idi matmat bun meein wele feleya dilen.
Anĩ ere, sain idi meku namen dilen, idi Odug Jesus nẽ bouwa buru an to dilen.
Idi enei nigin kisi musei dale mog bagai, tamo uru kolos medeĩya barikã siridin difaren.
Age dife di, kayau kumĩ de fen, kususu de, teneub lo difen, anĩ ere, tamo idi kayau dirokenẽdin, “Ã ere nigin laa atun mata tamo umirnẽgef?
Ĩ ein sã, ĩ mogo fã yel! Ĩ Galili oun ã geid ubodõg fen, irokenein anĩ, wedereĩ fokõ youf,
ĩ iron, ‘Tamo Naal mosor adodo imeid bun dino di, ĩ aa tetek bun dukesiyouf, age dife di, naa towo bun, ĩ baban mata kel fã youf.’”
Age de di, kayau idi, in od anĩ wedereid fokõ yen.
Sain idi matmat bunem ke de, disi fen, aposel ilewen tunĩ ganan geid, enei ganan wogõ difiyẽdin.
Kayau idi are Maria Magdala tamal, Joana, Maria Jems nẽ sina. Kayau anidi, kayau tunĩg geid, enei aposel wogõ difiyẽdin.
Anĩ ere, idi kayau nigin to momoi den, ere nigin, kayau neid od, idi bun auya gen.
Anĩ ere, Pita fã yale, matmat bun gudu re ilen. Ĩ ku bun itin, gabar lalau dogol yen mog, ilen, agef fen, ereb anĩ wõ yen anĩ nigin, ĩ kisi musei yalef ile, yogon fõ bun ilen.
Naa de anĩ bun, idi neid tamo uru, fonõ taka yana Emaus dilen, Jerusalem anenem Emaus are ilewen kilomita age fiya.
Idi urom, ereb ereb ganan wõ yen anĩ abob dirokenek dilen.
Idi eneidi nigin diro ken, katõ de dile mog, Jesus yogo isi, weim diyok dilen.
Anĩ ere, idi Jesus keleĩya nigin meleid ifofakelen.
Age dife di, Jesus idi to fedin, “Ã ere nigin naab luwen katõ ge usigef?” Idi dẽ del fen, idi neweid wau gudũ fiya ado agogon delen.
Idi taka yana Kleopas Jesus solof irokenen, “Õ ege Jerusalem nẽ ki tamo nigin, naa eneidi bun an ereb ereb wõ yen anĩ, õ keleĩ sã de?”
Age ye di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ere bagai?” Idi Jesus dirokenen, “Jesus Nasaret tamal nigin. Ĩ profet taka, Negur ado tamo kayau ganan meleid bun, od ado tobonunã bun megeir barikã.
Pris odudug, neda mudur ado idim, ĩ laa bun dinenẽf nigin imeid bun dino di, aa tetek bun dukesin.
Anĩ ere, amã waumã iron, im anĩ Israel tamo kayau kel gei fouf maun. Anĩ dogol sã, enei ganan wõ yen are, gama naa eneim mogo naa towo ilef.
Takag, amã nemã kayau tunĩg, amã terẽ difamam. Gama bonimei bagai, idi matmat bun dilel,
anĩ ere, idi yogon bouwa buru to dilel. Idi dile, meleid seleulã kurãf fen, engel diledin, engel idi dirokenẽdil, Jesus ĩ mata ibodok, difiyẽdi di, disi, amã dirokanamam.
Age de di, amã tunĩ matmat bun dile, kayau wogõ del gen bagai dilel, anĩ ere, idi Jesus to dilel.”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã neneya bagai, ã profet wogõ den anĩ ganan, wauĩ bun momoiya nigin folo reya bagai!
Kristus ĩ darau enei yale fen, yogon fula fiya medeĩya namen to ilauf de?”
Age ye fen, ĩ Moses ado profet ganan neid itotoya bunem gariya ino fen, yogo nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya ganan bun ibodok anĩ, idi faded fedin.
Idi fonõ dilef nẽ anĩ kelẽ difiye ken, Jesus tokõ feleya nigin suma ino genen.
Anĩ ere, idi totol bagai dirokenen, “Amã geid tabodõf, ere nigin, gaa mogo kuru kelef, gugum irousif.” Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi geid dibodõf nigin namen ilen.
Sain ĩ idi geid tebol bun dibod ken, ĩ bret yale, Negur de fiyẽ, mumãf fen, gariya ino ifenẽdin.
Age fe di, idi meleid fara fele di, idi Jesus nigin kelein. Age dife di, ĩ idi meleid bun iminkelen.
Idi abob dirokenen, “Sain ĩ naab luwen wogõ fada fen, Negur nẽ Itotoya faraf ifelnadal mog, ada namedan wauda to tõf yalel de?”
Age de fen, idi fã de dale, kaisã bagai Jerusalem keku de dilen, an idi aposel ilewen, tamo tunĩ idi geid, guru de difar mog, fotou difedi di,
diron, “Are momoi! Odug fã ye fen, Simon bun wõ yen.”
Age de di, tamo uru ereb naab luwen wõ yen ado, Jesus ĩ bret mumã fe di, idi Jesus nigin naig de kelein anĩ wogõ den.
Idi fau enei nigin wogõ de mog, Jesus yogo idi atun ifar fen, irokenẽdin, “Wau inosiya ã ado ibodõf.”
Idi baraũ mailef de fen, terẽ de fen, kumĩ den.
Age dife di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ere nigin ã wauĩ morõ fef, ere nigin ã wauĩ bun kisi uru wõ yef?
Aya imau yeu ado feleg. Eĩ aya yug bagai! Kobũ wiyag fen, uleg. Baraũ ĩ aya bouwau ado, tuwau ado uleyagef gen sã, ĩ bou sã, tuwa sã.”
Jesus enei iro ken, ĩ ima ye ado ifelnẽdin.
Age fe di, idi waud kulĩya ado terẽya bunem, fau waud to momoi de di, Jesus idi to fiyẽdin, “Ã ereb yõya nẽ taka ein tau ado?”
Idi gau yã tamal masak taka difenen,
age dife di, Jesus gau yale, meledin yon.
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Enei are, aya fau ã geid tabodon sain bun arokenein. Ereb ereb ganan, aya nigin Moses nẽ Lo bun, profet neid itotoya bun ado, Buk Sam bun ditoton anĩ ganan kisi falauf bagai.”
Agef fen, Jesus idi Negur nẽ Itotoya keleĩ youf nigin, waud kã fenẽdin. 4624
Ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok: Kristus ĩ fau darau yale fen, laa bun tamal naa towo bun mata kel fã youf,
age fe di, wau faleiya ado, mosor nigin weder tu keleya nẽ od anĩ, fau ĩ yana bunem teneub ganan bun, Jerusalem anenem gariya dino fen, wogõ de dilauf.
Ã enei ulegen nigin kurõ walaisi gouf.
Aya esel fen, neu Dei sur afouf yen anĩ, ã bun sur afouf, anĩ ere, taun anĩ bun ubodõgef uleg, ã megeir saa ilun tamal anim ifounneĩf.”
Sain Jesus idi gurif irou, Betani non dilen, an ĩ ima yales fen, el fiya ifenẽdin.
Ĩ idi el feid le fen, ĩ itornẽdi di, saa ilun irou iselen.
Age fe di, idi ĩ yana dales fen, waud kulĩya odug ado, Jerusalem ke de dilen.
Age de fen, idi tempel bun toku dibod ken, Negur yana dalesedig.
Gariya bun Od anĩ ibodon, Od anĩ Negur ado dibodon, Od anĩ Negur.
Gariya bun ĩ Negur ado dibodon.
Ĩ bunem ereb ereb ganan inon, Od anĩ sã bun ereb inodin taka to ibodok.
Mata ĩ bun ibodon, mata anĩ tamo neid fula fiya.
Fula fiya anĩ gugum bun lalan ifenek, anĩ ere, gugum ĩ fula fiya anĩ to kelein.
Tamo taka Negurem sur fe di, isin, ĩ yana Jon.
Ĩ fula fiya anĩ yaor fe, kurõ fesiyouf nigin isin, are tamo kayau ganan ĩ bunem momoi douf nigin age fen.
Ĩ anĩ fula fiya sã, ĩ fula fiya anĩ kurõ fesiyouf nigin isin.
Fula fiya bagai yogo tamo kayau ganan lalan ifenẽdif, ĩ tenebur isin.
Ĩ teneub bun ibodon, are ĩ bunem teneub inon, anĩ ere, tamo kayau tenebur ein, ĩ to kelein.
Ĩ yogon bagai anidi bun isin, anĩ ere, yogon bagai anidi ĩ to daleyen.
Anĩ ere, idi ĩ daleyen, ĩ yana nigin momoi den anidi bun, Negur idi Negur nẽ gere tar wowã douf nigin igirnẽdin.
Sina tama nẽ naud bunem to Negur gere tar wowã den, bouwa nẽ oroya bunem sã, tamo nẽ wau irõya buneg sã, anĩ ere, Negur yogo age fe di, wowã den.
Od anĩ tamo wõ ye fen, ada atun ibodon. Ada yogon fula fiya medeĩya tailen, fula fiya medeĩya are Naal Tekelei Yogo Dogol nẽ, ĩ Tama bun tamal wau ifenẽya ado momoi barikã isin.
Jon ĩ nigin kurõ falaisi wogõ yen. Ĩ iweig fen, iron, “Ĩ enei nigin aya arokenein, ‘Taka ĩ aya dumeun isif, ĩ aya wal fiyaya, ere nigin, ĩ ket ibodon.’”
In wau ifenẽya barikã bunem, ada adok el fiya tale fen, anĩ teten el fiya musei talen.
Are Moses bunem lo anĩ talen, anĩ ere, wau ifenẽya ado momoi anĩ, Jesus Kristus bunem isin.
Taka nem Negur to bagai ilen, anĩ ere, Negur Naal Tekelei Yogo Dogol, ĩ Tama wagen ibod ken, ĩ nigin yaor fen.
Juda tamo Jerusalem temeleid idim, pris tunĩ, Lewi nẽ ibor geid sur difedi di, Jon ĩ aim yeya anĩ to difiyẽ di, Jon ĩ eig ye kurõ fesin.
Ĩ wa fiya sã, kurõ falaisi, “Aya Kristus sã,” yen.
Idi ĩ to difiyen, “Age fiyauf are, õ ai? Õ Eliya de?” Ĩ iron, “Aya ĩ sã.” Idi diron, “Õ Profet amã tari mafef anim de?” Ĩ iron, “Sã.”
Age ye di, idi diron, “Õ ai bagai? Õ amã urokanamã len, idi amã sur difaman anidi gein ke ma malauf. Õ ogo nigin ere wof?”
Jon profet Asaia nẽ od bun solof iron, “Aya anĩ, ait taka gerere tuan iweig irok, ‘Odug nẽ naab madur gouf.’”
Farisia tamo tunĩ sur difedin anidim
to difiyen, “Õ Kristus sãf, Eliya sãf, Profet anĩ sãf are, ere nigin naan ugunẽdif?”
Jon aitedin yale iron, “Aya naan nem naan agunẽdif, anĩ ere, ã atun, taka ã keleĩ sã anĩ ifaref.
Ĩ anĩ aya dumeun dõ fiyaf, aya to biya nigin, in ye su nẽ malũ biru fediya kisi feleya sã.”
Enei ganan Betani oun Jordan naan sitakã, Jon naan igunẽdin nẽ an wõ yen.
Naa taka di, Jon, Jesus wagen iyok isi mog, ile fen, iron, “Ulegef, Negur nẽ Sipsip Naal, ĩ tamo ganan neid mosor yaleledif!
Enei nigin au fen, oron, ‘Taka ĩ aya dumeun isif, ĩ aya wal fiyaya, ere nigin, ĩ ket ibodon.’
Aya yug ĩ keleĩ san, anĩ ere, aya asi, naan nem naan agunẽdif nẽ gariya are, Israel tamo kayau bun ĩ yaor fouf nigin.”
Age ye fen, Jon enei kurõ feis iron, “Aya, Awa Uur saa ilun tamal kuburir gen isi, ĩ bun ibod mog, ailen.
Aya ĩ to kelein, anĩ ere, taka ĩ, aya naan nem naan agunẽdiyouf nigin sur fiyan im irokanan, ‘Tamo anĩ, Awa Uur isi, ĩ bun ibod mog, ulouf, im Awa Uur Fateul nem naan igunẽdiyouf.’
Aya ailen nigin kurõ afeis, ‘Eĩ Negur Naal,’ auf.”
Naa taka di, Jon, in dõ fiya tar uru geid, baban an difaren.
Ĩ, Jesus isi ile di, ile fen, ĩ iron, “Ulegef, Negur nẽ Sipsip Naal!”
Sain Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar uru enei karĩ de fen, idi Jesus dõ difiyen.
Jesus falei yel, idi ĩ dõ difiyẽ mog, ile fen, to fedin, “Ã ere oroyeik?” Idi diron, “Rabi (anĩ nẽ gariya, Tise), õ nain ubodõdig?”
Ĩ iron, “Umag fen, ulogouf.” Age ye di, idi dile, ĩ ibodõdig anĩ dile fen, naa anĩ bun, ĩ geid dibodon. Are aragau fo kilok age fiya.
Endru, Simon Pita ne tura ĩ, idi uruwom ereb Jon wogõ yen anĩ karĩ de fen, Jesus dõ difiyen anĩ taka.
Ereb uruwa Endru age fen are, ĩ tura Simon imir ile fen, irokenen, “Amã Mesia (anĩ Kristus) fotou mafen.”
Age ye fen, Endru, Pita Jesus wagen irou ile di, Jesus Pita lo fiye ken, iron, “Õ Simon, Jon naal. Õ yanã Sifas douf” (Sifas falei fiyauf are, Pita).
Naa taka di, Jesus Galili ileya nigin kisif fen, Jesus Filip fotou fiye ken, irokenen, “Aya dõ wiya.”
Filip ĩ, Endru Pita ado geid, Betsaida taun temeleid.
Filip Nataniel fotou fiye ken, ĩ irokenen, “Amã ĩ nigin Moses nẽ Lo bun itoton ado profet idig ditoton, Jesus Nasaret tamal, Josef naal anĩ, fotou mafen.”
Nataniel to fen, “Nasaret! Ereb biya taka, anenem wõya nigin kisi feleya de?” Filip iron, “Usi ule.”
Sain Jesus Nataniel non iyok isi mog, ile fen, ĩ nigin iron, “Eĩ Israel tamo bagai, ĩ bun ereb idegẽya taka sã.”
Nataniel Jesus to fiyen, “Naig wo fen, õ aya keleĩ?” Jesus aiten yale iron, “Aya õ Filip iweignõya sã mog, aa fig farumen ubod mog, ailiyon.”
Age ye di, Nataniel Jesus irokenen, “Rabi, õ Negur Naal, õ Israel neid King.”
Jesus iron, “Aya õ aa fig farumen ailiyon aul nigin, õ momoi wof. Õ anĩ wal fiya ereb ereb odug ulouf.”
Ĩ tobol fe iron, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ã, saa bobog kã fele di, Negur nẽ engel Tamo Naal bun diselef disif dife mog, ulogouf.”
Naa uru bure fele di, naa towo bun, tamo kayau ado bagu fiya, Galili distrik oun Kana fonõ wõ yen. Jesus sinag an ibodon.
Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid idig, tamo kayau ado bagu fiya bun diweignẽdin.
Sain wain sa kele di, sinam Jesus irokenen, “Idi wain taka sã.”
Jesus iron, “Kayau, õ ere nigin aya kababal wiyaf? Neu sain fau isiya sã.”
Jesus sina, kabĩ tamo irokenẽdin, “Ereb ĩ irokeneĩf anĩ dõg, ago gouf.”
Nodin meein gulub sigis naan ifotũya nẽ difaren, are Juda neid tobonuneid bun imeid kulo fiya nigin, idi teke tekelei 100 lita age fiya naan iroudig.
Jesus kabĩ tamo irokenẽdin, “Gulub bun naan utinẽdig.” Age ye di, idi ditineĩd eweid gere fesedin.
Age difele di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Gama tunĩ lolob ge fen, sifa marau uroule kenẽg.” Age ye di, idi age difen.
Sifa marau naan wain falei fen anĩ yõ ilen. Ĩ wain anĩ nainenem be isin anĩ to kelein, anĩ ere, kabĩ tamo naan lolob difen idi kelein. Agef fen, sifa marau ĩ, kayau marau yerin iweignẽ, ile di,
irokenen, “Ganan idi wain biya anĩ ket dirousi di, tamo disif idi anĩ fatuk dõ mog, to biya gen anĩ dum dirousidig, anĩ ere, õ biya bagai urou ubodom anĩ, gama bagai urousif.”
Jesus memelik gariya inon are enei bun, oun Galili distrik Kana fonõ. Anĩ bun, ĩ yogon fula fiya medeĩya yaor fe di, yogon dõ fiya tar dogo neid momoiya ĩ bun dinon.
Enei bure fele di, Jesus ĩ, sina, tura tar ado, yogon dõ diya tar geid, Kapenaum disilen. An naa musei to dibodon.
Juda neid Pasa naa sain melsã mog, Jesus Jerusalem iselen.
Tempel modoũ bun, tamo, bulmakau, sipsip ado, kuburir na sur difeid fen, tunĩg tebol bun dibod ken, moni solo de mog, iledin.
Anĩ ile fen, ĩ malũ nem wip inon, agef fen, tempel modoũ bun tamal, sipsip ado bulmakau ganan irudi di, serẽ dilelen, ĩ moni solo fiya tamo neid koin moni daũf firagagaũ fe fen, ĩ dogo neid tebol yale, falei feledin.
Idi kuburir na sur difen anĩ irokenẽdin, “Eneidi ein waleledig, neu Dei nẽ fõ anĩ maket modoũ to unog!”
Dum in dõ fiya tar, eig ye itotoya anĩ nigin wedereid fokõ yen, “Ogon fõ nigin wau itenẽya anim nameun isainaf.”
Age ye di, Juda tamo Jesus dirokenen, “Ere memelik anĩ ufelnamã di, enei ganan agof anĩ nigin õ igirĩya ado mauf?”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Tempel enei narĩ weleg len, naa towo bun baban alesauf.”
Juda tamo diron, “Tempel enei dinon are, foti-sigis yar yalen, anĩ õ naa towo bun walesauf de?”
Anĩ ere, tempel ĩ wogõ yen are, yogo bouwa nigin.
Ĩ laa bunem kel fã yen anĩ bure fele di, in dõ fiya tar, ĩ iron anĩ, wedereid fokõ yen. Anĩ bunem, idi Negur nẽ Itotoya ado Jesus wogõ yen anĩ nigin momoi den.
Gama ĩ Jerusalem oun sain Pasa Sifa bun ibod ken, tamo kayau musei memelik inodin anĩ dilen, anĩ bun ĩ yana nigin momoi den.
Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ yogo bagai, idi nigin to momoi yen, ere nigin, ĩ tamo ganan nigin keleĩ.
Jesus ĩ, tamo takam taka nigin ĩ irokenẽya anĩ kisi feleya san, ere nigin, ereb tamo name bun ibodok, ĩ yogo keleĩ.
Farisia tamo taka, yana Nikodemus ibodon, ĩ Juda uyu irouya neid kaunsel taka.
Ĩ bõ Jesus wagen isi fen, iron, “Rabi, amã keleĩ, õ tise Negur bunem usin. Ere nigin, taka nem Negur ĩ ado to ibodõf are, memelik õ unodif anĩ inodiya kisi feleya sã.”
Jesus aiten yale iron, “Aya õ momoi bagai arokonok, taka nem Negur nẽ tano to ilouf, ĩ baban mata gõ fiyẽf dogol.”
Nikodemus Jesus to fiyen, “Tamo ĩ biyan anĩ, sina naig fe baban gõ fouf? Momoi bagai, ĩ sina namen baban ile di, gõ fiyẽya kisi feleya sã!”
Jesus solof iron, “Aya õ momoi bagai arokonok, taka ĩ, naan ado Awa Uurem mata to wõ youf are, ĩ Negur nẽ tano bun ileya kisi feleya sã.
Bouwam gõ fef are, bouwa nẽ, anĩ ere, Awa Uurem gõ fef are, uur nẽ.
Õ neu od eig au wogõ auf bun, kisi to gurũ wouf, ‘Ã de baban mata wõ gouf.’
Yau in oroya bun isi iledig. Õ ait dogol karĩ wodig, anĩ ere, õ nainenem isif be, nain be ilef, to keleĩ youf. Ganan idi Awa Uurem gogũ fedif are, age fiya bagai.”
Nikodemus Jesus to fiyen, “Are naig fe, agef wõ youf?”
Jesus iron, “Õ Israel neid tise, anĩ ere, õ enei to keleik de?
Aya õ momoi bagai arokonok, ereb amã keleĩ anĩ wogõ mauf, age ma fen, ereb amã mailen anĩ kurõ mafesif, anĩ ere, tamo kayau ã fau amã nemã od to walegef.
Aya ã ereb tenebur tamal nẽ anĩ wogõ ayeik, anĩ ere, ã to momoi gef, saa ilun tamal nẽ anĩ wogõ ayeĩfeg, naig ge momoi gouf?
Aibem taka saa ilun to iselen, Tamo Naal saa ilunem isin yogo dogol.
Moses gerere tuan gogour yalesen, age fiya bagai, Tamo Naaleg age de dalesnẽf.
Are ganan idi ĩ nigin momoi def, mata faimud ibodkeleya adouf nigin.
“Negur, tamo kayau teneub enei bun ganan nigin fatuk wau laa fen nigin, yogon Naal tekelei bagai anĩ ifenẽdin, are taka ĩ, ĩ nigin momoi youf are, to fõ yalauf, mata faimud ibodkeleya adouf nigin age fen.
Negur ĩ, yogon Naal teneub enei bun, tamo kayau es fediya nigin to sur fen, ĩ bunem tamo kayau teneub enei bun, kel gei fouf nigin sur fen.
Taka, ĩ nigin momoi yef are, to es fiyek, anĩ ere, taka, ĩ nigin momoiya sã are, ĩ mogo es fiya bun ifaref, ere nigin, ĩ Negur Naal tekelei bagai yana nigin to momoi yen.
Foi fiya eig fiya, fula fiya teneub enei bun mogo isin, anĩ ere, tamo idi dogo neid tobonuneid sane nigin, fula fiya ditor ken, gugum nigin waud laa fen.
Tamo idi sane age difef are, lalan to orodidig, ere nigin, dogo neid tobonuneid sane anĩ yaoreya kumĩ de fen, lalan namen to disiyouf.
Anĩ ere, aib taka ĩ momoi bun age fef, lalan namen isidig, age fe di, ereb ĩ age fen are, Negur bunem age fen anĩ, yaor dilouf.”
Anĩ bure fele di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, Judia teneub bun dilen, an ĩ idi geid sain naal dibod ken, naan igunẽdin.
Joneg Ainon Salim non naan igunẽdin, ere nigin, an naan musei bagai, anĩ nigin, tamo kayau naan igunẽdiyouf nigin toku disidig.
(Are Jon fau kalabus bun to dinenẽ mog.)
Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar tunĩ, Juda tamo taka geid, dogo neid tobonuneid dõ de fen, imeid kulo difedig anĩ nigin luwa diroun.
Idi Jon wagen disi dirokenen, “Rabi, tamo õ uruwom Jordan naan sitakã ufareg fen, ĩ nigin kurõ weis uron, ĩ naan igunẽdif, age fe di, ganan ĩ bun dilef.”
Jon solof iron, “Tamo ĩ, ereb saa ilun tamal ifenek anĩ dogol yalouf.
Ã aug aya oron anĩ sã kurõ walaisi gef, ‘Aya Kristus sã, anĩ ere, aya ĩ ket sur fiyan.’
Mois kayau are, mois tamo nẽ. Mois nẽ mou ĩ, bagu fiya bun ifar fen, karĩ fiyek, ĩ mois tamo nẽ ait anĩ karĩ ye fen, kulĩya odug ado. Kulĩya are neu, anĩ gama kisi felef.
Ĩ yana odug isele di, aya yanau tenebur isilauf.
“Taka ĩ ilunem isif, ĩ ganan wal fiya, taka ĩ tenebur tamal are, tenebur nẽ, anĩ nigin, tenebur nẽ anĩ wogõ yedig. Taka ĩ saa ilunem isif, ĩ ganan wal fiya.
Ereb ĩ ilen ado karĩ yen anĩ, kurõ falaisif, anĩ ere, yogon od taka nem to yalef.
Taka ĩ yogon od yalen anim, Negur ĩ momoi bagai ye fen, anĩ megeir ifenen.
Taka ĩ Negurem sur fiyen are, ĩ Negur nẽ od wogõ yef, ere nigin, Negur ĩ Awa Uur idikeleya sã ifenek.
Tama ĩ Naal nigin wau laaf fen, ereb ereb ganan ĩ ima bun inon.
Aib ĩ Naal nigin momoi yef are, mata gai ibodkeleya ado, taka ĩ Naal nigin itorok are, ĩ mata to ilouf, Negur nẽ didi ĩ bun ibodok.”
Jesus Jon wal fiye ken, in dõ fiya tar musei geif naan igunẽdif ya anĩ, Farisia tamo karĩ den.
Anĩ ere, momoi bagai Jesusem naan igunẽdiya sã, are in dõ fiya tar anidim.
Sain Odug enei kelei ken, ĩ Judia distrik itor ken, baban Galili kel ilen.
Gama ĩ Samaria atu ilauf.
Anĩ nigin, ĩ Sikar taun oun Samaria, Jakop, ne naal Josef teneub kulu ifenen non, iyok isin.
An Jakop nẽ naan ifotokon tutuwõ ibodon, Jesus naab meluk iyok isi, tuwa yu kele di, naan ifotokon tutuwõ sirin ibodon. Are mogo gaa atun age fiya.
Agef mog, Samaria kayau taka naan ifotũya nigin isi di, Jesus kayau irokenen, “Aya naan tau wana di, ãf.”
(In dõ fiya tar, taun saaf na yaleya nigin dilelen.)
Samaria kayau Jesus irokenen, “Õ Juda tamo di, aya Samaria kayau. Naig fe di, ayam õ naan afon, wãf nigin to wiyaf?” (Juda tamo kayau idi, Samaria tamo kayau geid to uyu katõ difedig.)
Jesus kayau irokenen, “Õ safina ege luwa Negur ifonok ado, aibem naan nigin to yok anĩ keleim are, õ ĩ to wiyẽ di, mata ifenẽya nẽ naan anĩ ifonom.”
Kayau iron, “Odug, õ ifotũya nẽ safina sã, naan ĩ ilon bagai. Õ mata ifenẽya nẽ naan are nain walouf?
Tamamã Jakop naan ifotok kanama ken, ĩ yogog gere tar ado gaareg anĩ bun don, õ ĩ wal fiya de?”
Jesus kayau aiten yale iron, “Ganan naan enei doko, idi baban naan ail fediyouf.
Anĩ ere, taka ĩ aya naan anĩ afenẽ di, yoko, ĩ baban to bagai naan ail fouf. Naan aya ĩ afenek, warur naan ĩ namen faimud ulo ulõ yef yenẽ di, anim mata gai ibodkalauf.”
Kayau Jesus irokenen, “Odug, naan enei wanauf, ago di, aya baban naan ail to fiya fen, naan enei bun ifotũya nigin toku ein to kelauf.”
Ĩ kayau irokenen, “Ule, ogon tamo uroken ken, kel usig.”
Kayau iron, “Aya tamo sã.” Jesus kayau irokenen, “Õ tamo sã wof are, õ tutuk urok.
Ere nigin, õ mogo tamo faif adon, tamo gama õ ado are, ogon aiwã sã. Õ ogo urom, are momoi bagai.”
Kayau iron, “Odug, aya õ ailiyok, õ profet taka.
Amã tamamã tar, arei enei bun Negur yana dalesedig, anĩ ere, Juda ã urõgedig, Negur yana yaleseya modoũ are oun Jerusalem dogol.”
Jesus kayau irokenen, “Kayau, aya momoi wiya, sain fau isi di, baban arei enei bun ado, Jerusalemeg an, Dei yana to walesagauf.
Samaria ã, ereb ã keleĩ sã anĩ yana walesegedig, amã ereb amã keleĩ anĩ yana malesedig, ere nigin, tamo kayau kel yaleya nẽ are, Juda ibor bun tamal.
Sain isiyouf are, gama mogo yeir isil, Negur momoi bagai yana dalesedig are, uur ado momoi bunem Dei yana dalesauf, ere nigin, idi age fediya anĩ Dei ĩ imirnẽdif.
Negur ĩ uur, anĩ nigin, ĩ yana dalesedig idi, uur ado momoi bunem, yana dalesauf.”
Kayau iron, “Aya keleĩ, Mesia (Kristus dedig) fau isif. Ĩ isiyouf sain bun, ereb ereb ganan faded famãf.”
Age ye di, Jesus kayau irokenen, “Aya inim yeir od ayok.”
Agef mog bagai, in dõ fiya tar keku de disi, Jesus kayau anĩ ado od de mog, dileid fen, terẽ den. Anĩ ere, taka nem to, to fiyen, “Õ ere oroyok?” be “Õ ere nigin ĩ ado od gef?”
Kayau, ne naan gulub itor yen, taun kel ile, tamo kayau irokenẽdin,
“Umag, tamo taka, aya ereb ereb ganan age afef asin irokanal anĩ uleg. Ĩ anĩ Kristus be.”
Idi taun ditor disi, Jesus garan dilen.
Age de mog, in dõ fiya tar Jesus totol bagai dirokenen, “Rabi, ereb taka wõ.”
Anĩ ere, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Aya saaf ã keleĩ sã anĩ ãf nigin ado.”
Age ye di, in dõ fiya tar abob dirokenen, “Taka nem mogo saaf irousi ifenem de?”
Jesus iron, “Neu saaf are, aya sur fiyan in oroya dõ afe fen, in kabĩ bure afalauf anĩ.
Ã eig ge to urõgedig de, ‘Ogõ fo bure fele di, kusu fiya sain wõ youf’? Aya ã arokeneik, meleĩ fara weleg fen, kabĩ onoudi ulogouf! Idi mogo kusu fiya nẽ mayo bure felen.
Kusu fiya tamo ĩ gama mala solo yalef, ĩ gama mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ biya kususu fef, anĩ bun, itenẽya tamo ado kusu fiya tamo waud al fouf.
Anĩ nigin, od enei momoi bagai, ‘Tamo takam itenẽdig, tamo takam kusu fedig.’
Aya, ã kabĩ to walegen nẽ an, kusu fiya nigin sur ayein. Tunim kabĩ totol dalen, anĩ ã idi neid maab mala anĩ kusu gen.”
Samaria tamo kayau, taun anĩ bun temeleid musei, ĩ nigin momoi den, ere nigin, kayau anĩ eig ye kurõ fesin, “Ĩ ereb ereb ganan age afef asin anĩ irokanal.”
Anĩ nigin, Samaria tamo kayau ĩ gein disi, ĩ idi geid dibodõf nigin totol bagai dirokenẽ di, ĩ naa uru, idi geid dibodon.
In od bunem, musei fau fau momoi den.
Idi kayau anĩ dirokenen, “Amã ogon od bun dogol to momoi mauf, ere nigin, amã mug karĩ mau fen, amã keleĩ, tamo enei momoi bagai teneub ganan enei nẽ Isennẽya.”
Naa uru bure fele di, Jesus Galili ilen.
Jesus ĩ yogo iron, ‘Profet taka, yogon fõ gariyan, ĩ yana sã.’
Sain ĩ Galili wõ yen, Galili tamo kayau ĩ daleyen. Idi Jerusalem Pasa Sifa bun, ĩ ereb ereb age fen ganan dilen, ere nigin, idig an weim difaren.
Ĩ baban Galili distrik oun Kana fonõ ki fen, kulu an ĩ naan wain falei felen. Sain anĩ bun, king nẽ kabĩ mudur taka nẽ naal Kapenaum taun an dagi yenen.
Tamo enei, Jesus Judia distrik tamal Galili isin anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ Jesus gein ile, ne naal laa melsã yenen anĩ, isi el fiyẽf nigin igonen.
Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Ã memelik uris ado anĩ to ulogouf are, ã to bagai momoi gouf.”
King nẽ kabĩ mudur iron, “Odug, neu kesu fau laa fiya sã mog, õ usiyouf.”
Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Õ wadã ule. Õ naal fau mata ibodõf.” Tamo anĩ, Jesus nẽ od momoi ye fen, ilen.
Ĩ fau naab iyok ile mog, yogon ferfer ĩ fotou difiye ken, yogon kesu mata ibodok anĩ wogõ difiyen.
Age de di, ĩ gaa mala ganĩ bun, ne naal dagi karikan anĩ to fiyẽdin. Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Bouwa uruwa, nor wan kilok aragau folõ fiye kelen.”
Age de di, tama ĩ kelein, sain anĩ bun bagai, Jesus irokenen, “Õ naal fau mata ibodõf.” Anĩ nigin, ĩ yogo, ne fõ tura tar ganan geid, momoi den.
Jesus Judia distrik bun tamalem Galili isi fen, memelik inon, are eneim anĩ uru.
Dum, Jesus Juda neid sifa bun Jerusalem iselen.
Jerusalem an Sipsip Bobog non, naan kolili fiya taka Hibru od nem Betesta dedig ibodok, naan kolili fiya anĩ sirin meein torem fõ faif dinodin dibodok.
An dagi tamo kayau musei denenãdig, meleid ifofakeleya, yeid kirorõya, bouweid ilolaisidin.

Difaren nẽ an, tamo taka dagi ado ibodok ile, teti-eit yar yalen.
Sain Jesus ĩ an yen mog, ile fen, ĩ sain meluk dagi ado an yenen anĩ kelei ken, ĩ to fiyen, “Õ biya leya oroyok de?”
Dagi tamo iron, “Odug, sain naan moyõ fe di, taka nem isenna di, naanũ isileya to ibodok. Aya asilauf au mog, taka ketem uyu wal fiya fen, isiledig.”
Age ye di, Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Fã wo! Ogon gogoũ wenẽdig anĩ wale fen, uyok ule.”
Age ye di, tamo kaisã bagai dagi sa kele di, ĩ yogon gogoũ yale fen, iyok ilen. Anĩ wõ yen naa are, Sabat naa.
Anĩ nigin, Juda tamo idi, tamo dagi sa kelen anĩ dirokenen, “Naa eĩ Sabat naa. Õ ogon gogoũ irouya nigin lo katũ yef.”
Anĩ ere, ĩ aitedin yale iron, “Tamo ĩ el fiyal anim, ‘Ogon gogoũ wenẽdig anĩ wale fen, uyok ule,’ fiyal.”
Anĩ nigin, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Tamo enei nanim, ‘Ogon gogoũ wale fen, uyok ule,’ yom?”
Tamo el fiyen, ĩ aib ya anĩ nene yelen, ere nigin, Jesus ĩ an guru difen anĩ namen iwaikelen.
Dum Jesus tamo anĩ tempel bun fotou fiye ken, irokenen, “Ulef, õ baban biya lel. Baban mosor to uno, are ereb sane bagai uruwa nẽ wal fiya anĩ, õ bun to wõ youf nigin.”
Tamo are ile, Juda tamo irokenẽdin, ‘Aya el fiyal tamo are Jesus,’ yen.
Jesus Sabat naa bun enei age fedig nigin, Juda tamo idi ĩ morõ difenen.
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Neu Dei ĩ faimud kabĩ yalef isi, gama naa enei buneg kabĩ yalef, anĩ nigin, ayag kabĩ alef.”
Jesus age yen nigin, Juda tamo idi ĩ dukesiyouf nigin kabĩ totol dalen, Sabat naa nẽ lo wal fiya bun nigin dogol sã, ĩ Negur nigineg neu Dei ye fen, aya Negur ado tekelei yen nigin.
Anĩ nigin, Jesus od enei idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, Naal ĩ yogon oroyam ereb taka to age fouf, ĩ Tama age fef anĩ dogol ile fen, ĩg age fedig, ere nigin, ereb Tama age fef are Naaleg age fouf.
Tama ĩ Naal nigin wau laaf fen, ĩ ereb ereb age fedig anĩ ganan ifelnek. Ĩ ereb ereb enei wal fiya Naal ifelnẽf, anĩ bun ã terẽ gouf.
Tama ĩ laa turĩ feid fen, mata ifenẽdidig, age fiya bagai, Naal ĩg aib ĩ orof anĩ mata ifenẽdig.
Tama ĩ aib taka to es fiyẽf, anĩ ere, ĩ es fiya kabĩ ganan Naal bun inon,
are tamo kayau ganan idi Temeid yana dalesedig gen, Naal nigineg yana dalesauf nigin ĩ age fen. Taka ĩ Naal yana to yalesef, ĩ Tamam Naal sur fiyen anĩ yana to yalesef.
“Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ neu od karĩ ye fen, aya sur fiyan ĩ nigin momoi yef, ĩ mata faimud ibodkeleya ado fen, es fiya bun to ilauf. Ĩ laa bun tamal ibal fen, mata bun ilen.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, sain fau isif, are mogo yeir isil, laa tamo Negur Naal nẽ ait karĩ douf, idi karĩ def anidi mata dibodõf.
Tama ĩ yogo bun mata ado, age fiya bagai, ĩ mata de anĩ Naaleg adouf nigin ifenen.
Agef fen, Tama ĩ Naal es fediyouf nigin megeir ifenen, ere nigin, ĩ Tamo Naal.
“Eig fiya bun to terẽ gouf, sain fau isif, ganan nedi matmat bun dibodok idi, yogon ait karĩ de fen,
ulolõ desiyouf, idi biya age difen anidi mata dibodõf nigin fafã douf, idi sane age difen anidi es fedi di, hel bun dilauf nigin fafã douf.
Aya neu oroyam, ereb taka to naig be afouf. Aya karĩ auf kilei bagai, aya es afef, neu es fiya are madur bagai, ere nigin, aya yug nigin au fen, to age afedig, anĩ ere, aya sur fiyan ĩ wau al fouf nigin au fen, age afedig.
“Aya yug nigin aya mugu wogõ auf are, neu wogõya are, momoi be sã be anĩ yaor sã.
Taka ĩ aya nigin kurõ fesidig, agef fen, aya keleĩ, ĩ aya nigin kurõ fesif are momoi.
“Ã Jon garan tamo tunĩ sur wedige di, ĩ aya nigin momoi od anĩ kurõ falaisi irokenẽdin.
Aya tamom aya nigin kurõ fesif anĩ to aroudig, anĩ ere, aya ã isenneĩf au fen, od anĩ wogõ aun.
Jon ĩ lam futur fen, lalan ifenen, age fe di, ã sain tobega bagai waleg fen, in lalan nigin wauĩ al fen.
“Neu kurõ fesiya anĩ Jon nẽ wal fiya, ere nigin, kabĩ aya bure afalauf nigin Dei ifanan alef anim, Dei ĩ aya sur fiyan anĩ kurõ fesif.
Dei ĩ sur fiyan ĩ yogo, aya nigin kurõ fesin. Ã ĩ ait to karĩ gen, nog to ulegen,
in odeg ã bun to ibodok, ere nigin, ã sur fiyen anĩ ĩ nigin to momoi gedig.
Ã Negur nẽ Itotoya keleĩ youf nigin kabĩ totol walegedig, ere nigin, ã kisi gef, anĩ bunem amã mata faimud ibodkeleya malef ge fen, ago gedig. Negur nẽ Itotoya enei, aya nigin kurõ fesif.
Anĩ ere, ã mata yaleya nigin, aya wageun isiya utorõgedig.
“Aya tamom yanau dalesauf nigin to orok,
anĩ ere, aya ã nigin keleĩ. Aya keleĩ, ã wauĩ bun Negur nigin wauĩ laa fiya to ibodok.
Aya neu Dei yana bunem asin, anĩ ã aya to waleyagen, anĩ ere, aibem taka yogo yana bunem isif are, ã walogouf.
Ã abob yana yaleseya anĩ oroyei ken, yana yaleseya Negur Tekelei bunem isif anĩ to totol unog walogouf are, ã naig ge momoi gouf?
“Anĩ ere, ã ayam Dei mala bun ãgenei sane anĩ kurõ afesiyouf ge fen to kisig. Ãgenei sane kurõ fesiya are Moses, ĩ bun ãgenei wauĩ iseya unogedig anĩ.
Ã Moses nigin momoi gem are, aya nigineg momoi gem, ere nigin, im aya nigin itoton.
Anĩ ere, ereb ĩ itoton anĩ to momoi gef nigin, naig ge fen, aya wogõ auf enei nigineg momoi gouf?”
Enei dumen, Jesus Galili Maaĩ ub sitakã ibal ilen (Galili Maaĩ anĩ, yana taka Taiberias Maaĩ).
Age fe di, tamo kayau musei ĩ dõ difiyen, ere nigin, ĩ dagi tamo kayau bun memelik ino di, meledim dilen.
Agef fen, Jesus arein isel, yogon dõ fiya tar geid dibodon.
Juda neid sifa inoya Pasa naa melsã mog.
Sain Jesus mala irakel, tamo kayau musei ĩ garan disi mog, ileid fen, ĩ Filip irokenen, “Ada tamo kayau eneidi dãf nigin, bret nain na talouf?”
Ĩ Filip kisi fiye ken, enei to fen, ere nigin, Jesus ĩ ereb age fouf nigin are ĩ keleĩ.
Filip Jesus aiten yalen, “Ogõ eit nẽ mala anim, idi mugu mugu nigin bret na talouf are, tunĩ to dõ dilouf.”
In dõ fiya tamo taka Endru, Simon Pita nẽ tura anĩ Jesus irokenen,
“Kesu taka yeir baali bret faif gau uru ado, anim musei ganan enei tau kisi falauf?”
Jesus iron, “Tamo kayau urokenẽdig len, dibod.” Modoũ anĩ bun fisir musei ado, an tamo dibodadan faif tausen age fiya.
Gama Jesus bret anĩ geif, Negur de fiye ken, idi dibodadan neid oroya kilei, anĩ gadõ fedin. Ĩ gau buneg de age fen.
Idi ganan dõ kisi fele di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Tunĩ ditoraram anĩ kurug. To sekil fiyauf.”
Anĩ nigin, baali bret faif anĩ idi dokon, masak tunĩ ifaredin anĩ kuru dife di, karam tuwelf isokosedin.
Tamo kayau memelik inon anĩ dile fen, idi diron, “Momoi bagai, enei are Profet teneub enei bun isiyouf ya anĩ.”
Idi disi, Jesus king ibodõf nigin nugo difiyẽf ya anĩ, ĩ kelei ken, baban mugu arein kel iselen.
Gugumek isi di, yogon dõ fiya tar daliyoun disilen.
An idi waag taka bun sosõ de daliyou dibal fen, Kapenaum luwe dile mog, mogo gugumen, anĩ Jesus fau idi garan to isin.
Yau totol isi di, maaĩ moloun wĩ yen.
Idi waag sur de dira ken, ful de dile, faif kilomita be, sigis kilomita age fiya mog, Jesus naan tetenem waag garan iyok isi mog, dile fen, kumĩ tererẽ den.
Anĩ ere, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Are ayam, to kumĩ wog.”
Age ye di, ĩ waag bun dalesnẽf nigin waud yenen, kaisã bagai, idi dilauf nẽ waud iron ub anĩ bun, waag goro fen.
Naa taka di, tamo kayau daliyou ub sitakã difaren idi kelein, waag tekelei dogol an ibodon, anĩ Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid to sõ den, idi dogo dogol dilen.
Waag tunĩ Taiberias temeleid, Odug, bret Negur de fiye ken, tamo kayau ifeneĩd don modoũ anĩ non, goro difen.
Tamo kayau, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid an to dibodon anĩ kelei ken, idi waag sosõ de fen, Jesus dimirnẽf nigin Kapenaum dilen.
Sain tamo kayau idi, daliyou sitakã Jesus fotou dife fen, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Rabi, ere sain õ ein usin?”
Jesus aitedin yalen, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ã aya umirnagef, ã memelik ulegen nigin sã, anĩ ere, ã bret ifoutneĩ di, wõg eweĩ gere fen nigin.
Saaf sane ledig anĩ nigin to kabĩ waleg, anĩ ere, saaf to sane le fen, mata faimud ibodkeleya bun ibodõdig anĩ nigin kabĩ waleg, are Tamo Naalem ifeneĩf. Ĩ dogol Tama Negurem igirne ken, yoya nẽ megeir ganan ifenen.”
Age ye di, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Amã Negur nẽ kabĩ malouf nigin, naig bagai mafouf?”
Jesus solof iron, “Negur nẽ kabĩ are yeir, Negurem sur fiyen ĩ nigin momoi gouf.”
Anĩ nigin, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Ere memelik bun uris wanamã di, mail fen, õ momoi mayõf? Ere anĩ õ unouf?
Amã nemã tubumã tar gerere tuan mana don, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye yenek kilei, ‘Ĩ idi saa ilun tamal bret dãf nigin ifenẽdin.’ ”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, Moses im bret saa ilun tamal to ifenein, anĩ ere, neu Dei ĩ yogo bret kaũ bagai saa ilun tamal ifeneik.
Ere nigin, Negur nẽ bret saa ilun tamal isi fen, teneub enei mata ifenek.”
Idi diron, “Odug, gama ilauf enei bun bret anĩ wanamã.”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya anĩ mata nẽ bret. Taka ĩ aya bun isif, to bagai naũ ilauf, taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, to bagai naan ail fouf.
Anĩ ere, aya ã arokenein kilei, ã mogo uleyagen, anĩ fau to momoi gef.
Idi ganan Deim ifanaf, aya bun disiyouf, taka ĩ aya bun isif, aya to bagai aruwauf.
Aya saa ilun tamal asin, aya neu oroya dõ afouf nigin sã, anĩ ere, aya sur fiyan nẽ oroya dõ afouf nigin.
Aya sur fiyan nẽ oroya are yeir, idi ganan ĩ ifanan taka to folõ afalauf, anĩ ere, aya idikeleya naa bun alesnẽdiyouf.
Neu Dei nẽ oroya anĩ, taka ĩ Naal ile fen, ĩ nigin momoi yef, mata faimud ibodkeleya yalouf, idikeleya naa bun aya alesnẽf.”
Od enei Juda tamo karĩ de fen, ĩ nigin nauseir den, ere nigin, Jesus iron, “Aya bret saa ilun tamal asin.”
Idi diron, “Eĩ Jesus sã de? Josef naal, in sina tama ado ada keleĩ. Naig fe di, ĩ irok, ‘Aya saa ilun tamal asin’?”
Jesus solof iron, “Ã aug to nauseir gouf.
Taka yogon oroyam, aya wageun isiya kisi feleya sã, anĩ ere, Dei aya sur fiyan inim, ĩ namen kabĩ yale fen, aya garan irou isiyouf. Age fe di, idikeleya naa bun, aya ĩ alesnẽf.
Profet neid itotoya bun eig ye yenek, ‘Idi ganan Negurem ifelnẽdiyouf.’ Taka ĩ Dei karĩ fiye ken, ĩ bun keleĩ yalef, aya bun isidig.
Taka nem Dei to ilen, Negur bunem isin im dogol. Ĩ yogo dogol Dei ilen.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ momoi yef, mata faimud ibodkeleya ado.
Aya mata nẽ bret.
Ãgenei tubuĩ tar gerere tuan mana don, anĩ ere, idi gare den.
Anĩ ere, bret enei saa ilun tamal isif, are tamo yãf, to laa fouf.
Aya mata ibodõya bret, are saa ilun tamalem isin. Taka ĩ bret enei yoko, ĩ mata faimud ibodõf. Bret enei aya bouwau, are teneub ganan bun, tamo kayau mata dalouf nigin afenẽdiyouf.”
Age ye di, Juda tamo dogo dogol fatuk bagai luwa diroun, “Naig fe fen, tamo enei yogon bouwa ifanada tãf?”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ã Tamo Naal nẽ bouwa to wãgauf, in naud to wãgauf are, ã namein mata to ibodok.
Taka ĩ neu bouwau yokon, neu naudou yoko, ĩ mata faimud ibodkeleya ado, anĩ aya fau idikeleya naa bun alesnẽf.
Ere nigin, neu bouwau are saaf bagai, neu naudou are naan bagai.
Taka ĩ neu bouwau yokon, neu naudou yoko, ĩ aya nameun ibodok, aya ĩ namen abodok.
Mata ibodõya Dei aya sur fiya di, aya Dei bunem mata abodok gen, taka ĩ aya yõyaf, aya bunem mata ibodõf.
Bret enei saa ilun tamal isin. Ãgenei tubuĩ tar mana don are gare desin, anĩ ere, taka ĩ bret enei yoko, faimud mata ibodkalauf.”
Ĩ od enei Kapenaum taun an, Juda neid uub fõ bun ifelneĩd fen, wogõ yen.
Od enei karĩ de fen, in dõ fiya tar musei diron, “Ifelnadaf eĩ totol bagai. Aim anĩ keleĩ youf?”
In dõ fiya tar od enei nigin nauseir de di, Jesus anĩ kelei ken, idi irokenẽdin, “Od enei ã morõ ifeneik de?
Ba, Tamo Naal ĩ ibodon nẽ kel isel mog ulogouf are, ã ere kisi gouf?
Awa Uurem mata ifenẽdig, bouwa are gorõ. Od aya wogõ ayein are Uur, od anĩ mata ifenẽdig.
Anĩ ere, ã tunĩ momoiya sã.” Ere nigin, Jesus idi nigin gariya bun kelein, aiyaim ĩ nigin to momoi den, aim ĩ nigin kiwai inouf.
Ĩ od tobol fe iron, “Anĩ nigin, aya od enei arokenein, Dei ĩ nigin wau to yalouf, ĩ aya bun isiya kisi feleya sã.”
Od enei bunem, in dõ fiya tar musei keku den, baban Jesus to dõ difiyen.
Jesus in dõ fiya tar tuwelf to fedin, “Ãg aya utornag ulagauf de?”
Simon Pita solof iron, “Odug, amã ai bun malauf? Õ mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ od ado.
Amã momoi mau fen, keleĩ, õ anĩ Negur nẽ Fateul.”
Age ye di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Tuwelf ã ayam to agirnein de? Anĩ ere, ã atun taka are Satan.”
(Ĩ Judas, Simon Iskariot naal nigin kisif fen, iron. Idi tuwelf anĩ taka Judas, fau dum Jesus kiwai ifenen.)
Enei dumen, Jesus Galili an iyon, Judia distrik so fiyen, ere nigin, an Juda tamo ĩ dukesiyouf nigin ololo difen.
Anĩ ere, Juda neid Salafat nẽ Sifa naa melsã di,
Jesus tura tarem ĩ dirokenen, “Õ ein utor ken, Judia ulauf, ago di, ogon dõ fiya tar, memelik uno di, dilouf.
Tamo taka ĩ, tamo kayau meleid bun mala yaor wõ you fenẽ, ĩ iminẽyan kabĩ to yaledig. Õ eneidi agof, õ ogo tamo kayau ganan ufelnẽdiyouf.”
Ĩ yogon tura tar bagaig, ĩ nigin to momoi den.
Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya neu sain bagai fau isiya sã, ã nigin sain ganan kisi feleya bagai.
Tenebur tamo kayau idi, ã to kiwai difeneik, aya nigin kiwai, ere nigin, ereb sane age difef anĩ kurõ afesidig.
Ã Sifa bun ulagauf, aya nigin fau Sifa enei bun to eselauf, ere nigin, neu sain bagai fau isiya sã.”
Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, Galili distrik an ibodon.
Anĩ ere, tura tar Sifa bun diselel mog, ĩg iselen, anĩ ere, mala yaor sã, iminẽyan.
Sifa bun, Juda tamo idi, ĩ nigin meleid dino fen, to difen, “Tamo are nain?”
Tamo kayau atun, ĩ nigin fatuk bagai kosesẽ kurã den. Tunĩ diron, “Ĩ tamo biya.” Tunĩ solo de diron, “Eo, ĩ tamo kayau idegnẽdidig.”
Anĩ ere, taka nem ĩ nigin yaor to kurõ fesin, ere nigin, idi Juda tamo nigin kumĩ den.
Sifa mogo atusil ifar mog, Jesus tempel modoũ bun isel fen, od ifelnẽdin.
Juda tamo idi terẽ de fen, diron, “Tamo enei tai fiya yaleya sã mog, naig fe fen, keleĩ eig fiya ado?”
Jesus solof iron, “Neu ifelnẽya are neu sã, aya sur fiyan ĩ bunem isif.
Taka ĩ Negur nẽ oroya dõ fiya nigin orof are, neu ifelnẽya Negur bunem isif be, aya neu oroya nem wogõ auf be anĩ, ĩ keleĩ youf.
Taka ĩ yogon kisim wogõ yef are, ĩ yogo yana yaleseya nigin age fef, anĩ ere, taka ĩ sur fiyen nẽ yana yaleseya nigin kabĩ yalef, tamo are momoi nẽ. Ĩ bun idegẽya taka sã.
Moses lo anĩ to ifenein de? Anĩ ere, ã atun, taka nem lo to dõ fedig. Ere nigin ã aya unakesigouf nigin ago gef?”
Tamo kayau solo de diron, “Õ kaa sane ado. Aim õ inokesiyouf nigin age fef?”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya memelik taka ano di, ã ganan terẽ gen.
Anĩ ere, Mosesem mulũ ileya ifenein nigin, ã kesu Sabat naa bun mulũ ileya wenẽgedig (mulũ ileya are, Moses bunem to isin, teneub te bunem isin).
Moses nẽ lo to wal gouf nigin, Sabat naa bun kesu nẽ mulũ ileya wenẽgedig, ere nigin aya Sabat naa bun, tamo bou adok el afe di, ã aya nigin nameĩ sanedig?
Mala yaor anĩ dogol uleg fen, to es gei, tutuk bagai el ge, es gei.”
Sain anĩ bun, Jerusalem tamo kayau tunĩ diron, “Tamo enei are idi ĩ dukesiyouf nigin age difef anĩ sã de?
Ĩ de yeir, mal atun wogõ ye di, ereb od taka to dirokenek. Mudur adodo idi, ĩ anĩ Kristus ya anĩ mogo tutuk keleĩ de?
Anĩ ere, tamo enei nain be tamal, are amã keleĩ. Sain Kristus isiyouf, taka nem ĩ nainenem be isif to keleĩ youf.”
Age de di, Jesus fau tempel modoũ bun ifelneĩd fen, iweig iron, “Are de, ã aya nigin keleĩ, aya nainenem asin are ã keleĩ. Aya ein neu oroyam to asin, anĩ ere, ĩ aya sur fiyan are momoi. Ã ĩ keleĩ sã,
anĩ ere, aya ĩ keleĩ, ere nigin, aya ĩ bun tamal, im aya sur fiyan.”
Od enei bun, idi ĩ dirounẽf nigin age difen, anĩ ere, taka nem ĩ bun ima to inon, ere nigin, yogon sain fau isiya sã.
Anĩ ere, tamo kayau musei fau ĩ nigin momoi de fen, diron, “Sain Kristus isiyouf, ĩ memelik tamo enei inodif anĩ wal fiya inodiyouf de?”
Tamo kayau ĩ nigin age de, kosesẽ kurã de mog, Farisia tamo idi karĩ den. Age de fen, pris odudug Farisia geid, tempel lo fiya tamo Jesus dalouf nigin sur difedin.
Jesus iron, “Aya ã geid sain modeg tabodok, age afe fen, aya ĩ aya sur fiyan bun alauf.
Ã aya umirnagauf, anĩ ere, ã to fotou wiyagauf. Aya abodõf nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã.”
Juda tamo abob dirokenen, “Tamo enei nari bagai ile di, anĩ ada ĩ to fotou tafouf? Ada neda tamo kayau firagagaũ difen, Grik tamo kayau atun dibodok nẽ an, ĩ ile fen, Grik tamo kayau ifelnẽdiyouf de?
Ere gariya nigin ĩ iron, ‘Ã aya umirnagauf, anĩ ere, ã to fotou wiyagauf. Aya abodõf nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã’?”
Sifa naa odug idikeleya bun, Jesus ifar fen, iweig iron, “Taka ĩ naan ail fouf, aya bun isi fen, naan yãf.
Taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, Negur nẽ Itotoya iron kilei, warur naan ĩ namenem ulo ulõ yef yenẽf.”
Ĩ od enei Awa Uur nigin wogõ yen, are idi Jesus nigin momoi den anidi fau dalouf. Sain anĩ bun, Awa Uur isiya san, ere nigin, Jesus fau fula fiya medeĩya yaleya sã.
Od enei karĩ de fen, tamo kayau tunĩ diron, “Momoi bagai, tamo enei Profet ada tari tafef anĩ.”
Tunĩ diron, “Ĩ Kristus.” Tunĩg diron, “Kristus ouf are, naig fe fen, Galilim isiyouf?
Kristus Dawid nẽ ibor bunem, Betlehem taun Dawid ibodon nẽ anenem isiyouf, anĩ Negur nẽ Itotoya to irok de?”
Anĩ nigin, tamo kayau Jesus nigin fara furu difen.
Tunĩ Jesus ka difiyẽf nigin age difen, anĩ ere, taka nem ĩ bun ima to inon.
Tempel lo fiya tamo idi, pris odudug Farisia tamo gedin keku de dile di, to difedin, “Ere nigin ã ĩ to urou usigel?”
Tempel lo fiya tamo solo de diron, “Taka nem, tamo enei wogõ yedig gen to wogõ yedig.”
Farisia tamo solo de diron, “Ĩ ãg idegnein de?
Mudur adodo Farisia tamo geid atun, taka ĩ nigin momoi yen de?
Sã, anĩ ere, tamo kayau eneidi idi lo keleĩ sã, idi Negurem gelu fedif.”
Nikodemus, idi neid taka, tetunem Jesus garan ilen, ĩ irokenẽdin,
“Ada neda lo bun, taka ĩ ereb age fef anĩ ileya nigin ketem karĩ tafiye ken, es tafedig. Age fiya sã de?”
Idi solo de diron, “Õg Galili tamal de? Umir ken, fau keleĩ youf, profet taka Galilim to isif.”
Age de fen, idi mugu mugu dogo neid fonõ fonõ dilen.
Anĩ ere, Jesus Moul Arei bun iselen.
Bonimei mumurei ado, ĩ baban tempel modoũ bun wõ yen, an tamo kayau ganan guru de salili difiyẽ di, ĩ ifelnẽdiyouf nigin ibodon.
Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo Farisia tamo geid idi, kayau taka noli ye mog, dale dirou disi, guru fiya mala bun dinenẽ di, ifaren.
Age dife fen, Jesus dirokenen, “Tise, kayau enei noli tobonunã ino di, malel.
Lo bun, kayau age fediya meein tulu fiya nigin Moses irokanaman. Gama õ ere wof?”
Idi ĩ bou bun od yũya nigin kor dino fen, age de, to difiyen. Anĩ ere, Jesus obũ yeis fen, ima gegem teneub bun itoton.
Idi ĩ to difiyẽtu di, ĩ fã ye, saules fen, irokenẽdin, “Ã atun, aib taka ĩ mosor sãf, ĩ ketem kayau bun meein irãf.”
Baban ĩ obũ yeis fen, teneub bun itoton.
Idi od anĩ karĩ de fen, idi mugu mugu ul de, diyalelen, biyedim uyu dirou di, age de dile, Jesus kayau ifaren anĩ ado dogol ditornẽdin.
Jesus saules fen, kayau to fiyen, “Kayau, idi nai difef? Idi takam baban õ bun od to yuk de?”
Kayau iron, “Odug, takam to age fef.” Jesus iron, “Ayag õ boũ bun od to auk. Ule fen, sain enei ilauf ganan, mosor baban to uno.”
Jesus baban tamo kayau irokeneĩd fen, ĩ iron, “Aya tenebur enei nẽ fula fiya. Taka ĩ aya dõ fiyauf, ĩ gugum namen to bagai iyõf, anĩ ere, ĩ mata nẽ fula fiya adouf.”
Age ye di, Farisia tamo idi Jesus dirokenen, “Õ ogo nigin wogõ wof, anĩ nigin, ogon wogõya are, momoi be sã be anĩ yaor sã.”
Jesus solof irokenẽdin, “Aya yug nigin wogõ auf, anĩ ere, neu wogõya are momoi, ere nigin, aya nainenem asin, nain be alauf anĩ, aya keleĩ. Anĩ ere, ã, aya nainenem asin, nain be alauf anĩ, keleĩ sã.
Ã tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem es gedig, aya aib taka to es afedig.
Anĩ ere, aya es afouf are, neu es fiya are tutuk, ere nigin, aya mugu sã. Aya Dei inim sur fiyan ado mafaref.
Ãgenei Lo bun itotoya irok, tamo urom wogõ tekelei dinof, are momoi.
Aya yug nigin kurõ afalaisidig, age afe di, Dei aya sur fiyan ĩ, aya nigin kurõ fesidig.”
Age ye di, idi Jesus dirokenen, “Õ tamã nain?” Jesus solof iron, “Ã aya nigin ado neu Dei nigineg keleĩ sã. Ã aya nigin keleim are, neu Dei nigineg keleim.”
Ĩ tempel bun kolekta inoya nẽ modoũ non ifelneĩd fen, od enei wogõ fiyẽdin. Anĩ ere, takam ĩ to ima ka fen, ere nigin, in sain fau isiya sã.
Jesus baban idi irokenẽdin, “Aya atorneĩ di, ã umirnagauf, agog fen, ã ãgenei mosor bun gare gouf. Aya elef nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã.”
Anĩ bunem, Juda tamo idi diron, “Ĩ yogo bouwa yukesiyouf de? Anĩ nigin, ĩ, ‘Aya elef nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã,’ yef de?”
Anĩ ere, Jesus tobol fe fen, irokenẽdin, “Ã tenebur temeleĩ, aya ilun temelou. Ã teneub enei nẽ, aya teneub enei nẽ sã.
Anĩ nigin, aya, ã ãgenei mosor bun gare gouf ayein. Aya yug nigin, aya im audig anĩ, to momoi gouf are, ã momoi bagai ãgenei mosor bun gare gouf.”
Age ye di, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Õ ai?” Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya aib anĩ, mogo gariya bunem arokeneik asin.
Aya ã nigin wogõya musei ado, es fiya nigineg musei. Anĩ ere, sur fiyan ĩ, momoi bagai, anĩ nigin, ereb aya ĩ bun karĩ aun anĩ, tamo kayau tenebur ein arokenẽdif.”
Idi, ĩ Tama nigin irokenẽdif ya anĩ, to kisi fokõ yen.
