Anĩ nigin, Jesus iron, “Sain ã Tamo Naal walesagauf bun, aya yug nigin aya im audig anĩ, ã keleĩ youf, aya neu oroyam ereb taka to age afedig, anĩ ere, aya Dei ifelnan anĩ dogol wogõ audig anĩ, ã keleĩ youf.
Aya sur fiyan ĩ, amã urom mabodok, ĩ mugu to itornal, ere nigin, aya faimud, ereb ĩ wau al fouf anĩ, age afedig.”
Age wogõ ye di, musei ĩ nigin momoi den.
Jesus, Juda tamo ĩ momoi difiyen anidi irokenẽdin, “Aya afelnein anĩ uroug tokõ walagauf are, ã momoi bagai neu dõ fiya tar.
Agog fen, ã momoi anĩ keleĩ youf, momoi anim kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelneĩf.”
Idi aiten dale dirokenen, “Amã Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar, amã aib taka nẽ ferfer to mabodon. Ere wo fen, amã kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnamãya nigin urok?”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ mosor inof are, ĩ mosor nẽ ferfer.
Ferfer ĩ, ibor anĩ bun gai ibodkeleya modoũ sã, anĩ ere, modoũ are naal nẽ faimud ibodkalauf.
Anĩ nigin, Naal ĩ kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelneĩf are, ã momoi bagai karika lauf.
Ã Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar are, aya keleĩ. Anĩ ere, ã aya unakesigouf nigin dodok gef, ere nigin, ã neu od nẽ modoũ namein to ibodok.
Ereb aya Dei mala bun ailen anĩ, aya ã arokeneik, ãg ereb ãgenei temeĩ bun karĩ gen anĩ ago gedig.”
Idi aiten dale dirokenen, “Abraham ĩ tamamã.” Age de di, Jesus iron, “Ã Abraham gere tarem are, Abraham age fedin anĩ ago gem.
Gama ã, aya Negur bun momoi anĩ karĩ au fen, arokenein anĩ, unakesigouf nigin naab umirẽgef. Abraham ĩ to age fen.
Ã temeĩ age fedig anĩ ago gef.” Age ye di, idi Jesus dirokenen, “Amã seseirã inoya naab bun temelamã sã. Nemã Tamamã are Negur yogo dogol.”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Negur ĩ Temeim are, ã aya nigin wauĩ laa fem, ere nigin, aya Negur bunem asi fen, yeir afaref. Aya neu oroyam to asin, im sur fiyan.
Ere nigin neu od nigin wauĩ to fokõ yef? Are aya wogõ auf anĩ, ã karĩya kisi feleya sã nigin.
Ã, temeĩ Satan nẽ, anĩ nigin, ã temeĩ nẽ oroya dõ fiya nigin oroyeik. Ĩ gariya bunem isin, ĩ yukesiya kaa, momoi to iroudig, ere nigin, ĩ namen momoi sã. Ereb sain ĩ idegẽya od wogõ yedig, ĩ yogon od bagai wogõ yedig, ere nigin, ĩ kori tamal, idegẽya tama.
Anĩ ere, aya momoi anĩ wogõ audig nigin, ã to momoi wiyagedig!
Ã takam, aya neu mosor anĩ tau kurõ fesiya kisi feleya? Aya momoi wogõ auf are, ere nigin ã to momoi wiyagef?
Aib ĩ Negur nẽ, ĩ Negur ereb yef anĩ karĩ yedig. Ã to karĩ gef anĩ nẽ gariya are, ã Negur nẽ sã nigin.”
Juda tamo aiten dale dirokenen, “Amã õ Samaria tamal, kaa sanem irounon mauf are, momoi to morok de?”
Jesus solof iron, “Aya kaam to irounan, anĩ ere, aya neu Dei yana seli abidig, ã aya selu to wabigedig.
Aya yug nigin fula fiya medeĩya to amirek, anĩ ere, taka ĩ anĩ imirek are ibodok, ĩ anĩ es fiya tamo.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ neu od irou kafĩ falauf are, ĩ laa to bagai gurug fouf.”
Juda tamo, anĩ bun Jesus dirokenen, “Gama amã keleĩ, õ kaa sanem irounon! Abraham laa fen, profeteg gare den, anĩ ere, õ, taka ĩ ogon od irou kafĩ falauf are, ĩ laa to bagai kobũf ilouf, wof.
Õ tamamã Abraham wal fiya de? Ĩ laa fen, profeteg age difen. Õ kisi wof, õ ai?”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Aya yug selu alesauf are, neu seli alef are ege. Neu Dei, ĩ anĩ ãgenei Negur gef, ĩ aya yanau yalesedig.
Ã ĩ keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, aya ĩ keleĩ. Aya ĩ keleĩ sã auf are, aya ã gen idegẽya tamouf, anĩ ere, aya ĩ keleĩ bagai, in od dõ afedig.
Temeĩ Abraham ĩ, neu naa anĩ ilouf nigin kisif fen, wau al fen. Ĩ anĩ mogo ile fen, kulĩ yen.”
Anĩ nigin, Juda tamo Jesus dirokenen, “Õ fau yar fifti yaleya sã, anĩ õ mogo Abraham ulen de?”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, Abraham gõ fiya sã mog, aya abodon.”
Anĩ nigin, idi ĩ meein tulu difouf nigin meein gei difen, anĩ ere, Jesus bouwa inokel fen, tempel modoũ bun tamal iya ilen.
Jesus iyok ile fen, tamo taka mala ifofakeleya gõ difen anĩ ilen.
In dõ fiya tar Jesus to difiyen, “Rabi, aim mosor ino di, ĩ mala ifofakeleya gõ difen, tamo enei yogo de, sina tamam de?”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Tamo eneimeg sã, sina tama adomeg sã, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ kabĩ ĩ bunem yaorouf nigin eig fiya wõ yen.
Eĩ fau gaa ado, aya sur fiyan in kabĩ talouf bagai. Bõ fau isif, sain anĩ, taka nem kabĩ yaleya kisi feleya sã.
Sain aya tenebur abodok, aya teneub enei nẽ fula fiya.”
Age wogõ yel fen, ĩ tenebur isis fen, salina buru ado falei fe fen, tamo mala bun inon.
Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Ule, Siloam naan kukor ugũ” (Siloam nẽ gariya, are ‘Sur fiyen’). Anĩ nigin, tamo ile, naan igun, agef fen, mala kelẽ yel, fõ bun isin.
In fõ tura tar ado, idi ĩ nonĩ ye mog diledig anidi diron, “Tamo de eneim ibod ken, nonĩ yedig anĩ sã de?”
Idi tunĩ diron, “Im.” Tunĩ diron, “Im sã, taka ĩ genem.” Anĩ ere, ĩ yogo iron, “Aya de tamo anim.”
Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Naig fe di, õ malã kelẽ yeledin?”
Ĩ aitedin yale iron, “Tamo yana Jesus dedig im, buru falei fe fen, malau uru bun inodin. Ĩ, aya ele, Siloam naan agũf nigin irokanan. Anĩ aya ele, naan agun, age afe fen, aya malau kelẽ aun.”
Idi ĩ to difiyen, “Tamo are nain?” Ĩ iron, “Aya keleĩ sã.”
Idi tamo mala ifofakelen anĩ, Farisia tamo gedin dale dirou disin.
Jesus buru falei fe fen, tamo mala el fedin nẽ naa are Sabat naa.
Anĩ nigin, Farisia tamo idig, ĩ naig fe fen, mala kelẽ yedin anĩ to difiyen. Tamo are irokenẽdin, “Ĩ malau buru inodin, age fe di, agun, anĩ aya gama kelẽ auf.”
Farisia tamo tunĩ diron, “Tamo enei Negur bun tamal sã, ere nigin, ĩ Sabat naa to dõ fef.” Anĩ ere, tunĩ diron, “Naig fe di, mosor tamo memelik age fediya inoya kisi feleya?” Anĩ nigin, idi fara difen.
Idi baban tamo mala ifofakelen anĩ dirokenen, “Ĩ õ malã el fen anĩ, õ ĩ nigin ere wof?” Age de di, ĩ iron, “Ĩ profet.”
Juda tamo idi, tamo mala ifofakeleya mala kelẽ yelen anĩ, fau to momoi den. Anĩ nigin, idi tamo anĩ sina tama diweignẽdin.
Idi to difen, “Eĩ ã naaluĩ de? De ĩ anĩ mala ifofakeleya gõ mafen gef? Naig fe di, ĩ gama sã mala kelẽ yelef?”
Sina tama diron, “Amã keleĩ, ĩ nemã kesu, anĩ ĩ mala ifofakeleya gõ mafen.
Anĩ ere, ĩ naig fe fen, gama sã lo fef, aim ĩ mala el fedin anĩ, amã keleĩ sã. Yogo to wiyẽg, ĩ biya, yogo nigin wogõ youf.”
Sina tama idi, Juda tamo kumĩ difiyeĩd fen, age de diron, ere nigin, Juda tamo idi mogo od difon, aib taka Jesus anĩ Kristus youf are, Juda neid uub fõ bun dalelnẽf.
Age fiya nigin, sina tama eig de diron, “Ĩ biya, yogo to wiyẽg.”
Baban Juda tamo idi, mala ifofakelen anĩ diweigne ken, diron, “Negur yana wales fen, momoi nẽ od dogol urõf, amã keleĩ, tamo are mosor tamal.”
Ĩ solof iron, “Ĩ mosor ado be sã be, aya keleĩ sã. Tekelei aya keleĩ are, aya malau ifofakelen, anĩ ere, gama lo afedig.”
Age ye di, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Ĩ õ ere naig yon? Naig fe di, õ malã birikã fedin?”
Ĩ aitedin yale iron, “Aya ã mogo arokenein, anĩ ere, ã to karĩ gen. Ere nigin ã baban karĩ gou fenẽ? Ãg in dõ fiya tar wowã gou fenẽ de?”
Age ye di, idi kono difiye ken, diron, “Õ tamo enei nẽ dõ fiya taka! Amã are Moses nẽ dõ fiya tar!
Negur Moses wogõ fiyen are amã keleĩ, anĩ ere, tamo enei nigin, ĩ nainenem isin areg, amã keleĩ sã.”
Tamo anĩ aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Ago ge di, terẽ auf. Ĩ nainenem isin, ã keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, aya malau birikaũ fedin.
Amã keleĩ, Negur ĩ mosor dinodidig anĩ to karĩ fiyẽdidig, anĩ ere, taka ĩ Negur anini fiye ken, Negur nẽ oroya dõ fef are, Negurem ĩ karĩ fiyẽdig.
Gariya bunem isi gama, taka nem, tamo mala ifofakeleya gõ difen anĩ birikã fedin yeya to karĩ yedig.
Tamo enei Negur bun tamal sam are, ĩ ereb taka to naig fem.”
Age ye di, idi diron, “Õ mosor barikã gõ diyon, naig fe di, õ amã ufelnamak?” Age de fen, idi ĩ mayarẽ diru dirã di, isin.
Jesus, idi tamo anĩ serẽ diran yeya anĩ karĩ yen. Jesus ĩ fotou fiye ken, iron, “Õ Tamo Naal nigin momoi wof de?”
Tamo to fen, “Odug, ai anĩ ĩ? Urokana di, aya ĩ nigin momoi auf.”
Jesus iron, “Õ gama ĩ ulel, de ĩ anĩ urom wogõ gef.”
Age ye di, tamo iron, “Odug, aya momoi auf.” Agef fen, ĩ Jesus seli yabin.
Jesus iron, “Es fiya nigin aya tenebur ein asin, are mala ifofakeleya meleid kelẽ youf, age fe di, idi meleid kelẽ yef, are meleid ifofakalauf nigin.”
Farisia tamo tunĩ Jesus geid difaren anĩ, agef wogõ ye di, karĩ de fen, to difen, “Ere? Amãg malamã ifofakeleya de?”
Jesus iron, “Ã momoi bagai meleĩ ifofakeleyam are, ã mosor sam, anĩ ere, gama ã malamã kelẽ yef gef, anĩ nigin, ãgenei mosor fau ibodok.
“Aya momoi bagai arokeneik, tamo taka ĩ, sipsip nẽ kauwor bobog bunem to ilauf, anĩ ere, naab taka bunem gar ye isilauf are, ĩ bẽ tamo, bẽ yaledig.
Tamo ĩ bobog bunem ilef are, ĩ yogo sipsip marau.
Lo fedig tamo ĩ bobog kãf kenẽdidig, age fe di, sipsip ĩ ait karĩ dedig. Ĩ yogon sipsip yana yaleid fen, mayarẽ guri feid, irouledig.
Sain ĩ yogon ganan mayarẽ guri feid iroule fen, ĩ ketem uyu iledig, age fe di, yogon sipsip dõ difedig, ere nigin, idi yogon ait keleĩ.
Anĩ ere, idi tamo urug to dõ difedig, idi ĩ mã diyawauf, ere nigin, ĩ ait urug nigin idi keleĩ sã.”
Jesus yaab od enei nem wogõ fiyẽdin, anĩ ere, ĩ idi ereb gariya nigin irokenẽdin anĩ, idi to kelein.
Anĩ nigin, Jesus baban iron, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, aya sipsip neid bobog.
Ganan uyulil disin are, idi bẽ tamo, bẽ daledig, anĩ ere, sipsip idi to karĩ difiyẽdin.
Bobog are aya, taka ĩ aya bunem isiyouf are, mata kel yalouf. Ĩ namen isi fen, ulõ yeis ilauf, agef fen, fisir yõya nẽ fotou fouf.
Bẽ tamo are bẽ nigin, yukesiyouf nigin ado, narĩ fouf nigin dogol isif, aya idi mata dale fen, barikãuf nigin asin.
“Aya sipsip lo fiya tamo biya, sipsip lo fiya tamo biya, yogon mata sipsip nigin itorõdig.
Oroi tamo are ĩ sipsip marau sã. Anĩ nigin, ĩ gaũ kuĩ isi di, ile fen, sipsip itorarã iyadig. Age fe di, gaũ kuĩ sipsip kaka feid fen, firagagaũ fedidig.
Tamo are iyadig, ere nigin, ĩ oroi tamo, sipsip nigin to karĩ yedig.
“Aya sipsip lo fiya tamo biya, aya neu sipsip keleĩ, neu sipsip idi aya keleĩ,
are Dei ĩ aya keleĩ, aya Dei keleĩ gen. Anĩ nigin, aya neu mata sipsip nigin atorok.
Aya sipsip tunĩ ado, are sipsip kau enei bun temeleid sã, aya idig de guri afeid, arou asiyouf. Idig aitou karĩ douf, age fe di, idi uũ tekelei, sipsip lo fiya tamo tekelei youf.
Neu Dei, aya nigin wau laa fef nẽ gariya are, aya neu mata baban kel yalouf nigin anĩ atorok.
Taka nem neu mata to son fiyauf, anĩ ere, aya neu oroyam neu mata atorok. Aya neu mata itorõya nigin megeir ado, kel yaleya nigineg megeir ado. Od enei neu Dei bun tamal alen.”
Juda tamo od enei nigin baban fara difen.
Musei idi diron, “Ĩ kaa sane ado, agef fen, wadak. Ere nigin ĩ karĩ wiyẽgef?”
Anĩ ere, tunĩ diron, “Wogõya enei are, tamo kaa sane ado nẽ sã. Kaa sane ĩ mala ifofakeleya birikã feleya kisi feleya de?”
Sain anĩ bun, Negur bun Kel Inoya nẽ Sifa naa Jerusalem wõ yen. Are saneya sain.
Anĩ Jesus tempel modoũ bun, Solomon nẽ Waranda dõ fef iyon.
Juda tamo guru de, Jesus salili difiye ken, dirokenen, “Sain ganĩ amã lo wamã di, nene mauf? Õ Kristus ouf are, amã el wo, faded wamãf.”
Jesus aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Aya mogo arokenein, anĩ ere, ã to momoi gef. Memelik neu Dei yana nem anodif, are aya nigin irok.
Anĩ ere, ã to momoi gef, ere nigin, ã neu sipsip sã.
Neu sipsip aya aitou karĩ dedig, aya idi keleĩ, anĩ nigin, idi aya dõ difiyadig.
Aya idi mata faimud ibodkeleya afenẽdidig, age afe di, idi to bagai inanakalauf. Takam idi imaun tamal to sosoin fiyauf.
Neu Dei idi aya ifanan ĩ, ereb ereb ganan wal fiya. Takam idi neu Dei ima bun tamal son fiya kisi feleya sã.
Aya Dei ado tekelei.”
Juda tamo baban ĩ meein tulu difiyẽf nigin, meein gei difen.
Anĩ ere, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya Dei bun tamal, ã memelik odudug musei afelnein. Anidi atun nanĩ anĩ nigin, ã aya meein tulu wiyagau fenẽ?”
Juda tamo aiten dale diron, “Amã anidi taka nigin meein to tulu mayõf, anĩ ere, Negur kono fiya nigin, ere nigin, õ tamo maug anĩ, ‘aya Negur’ wof.”
Jesus idi aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Ãgenei Lo bun itotoya anĩ to ibodok de, ‘Aya aron, ã waitou’?
Negur nẽ od idi bun isin are, Negur idi anĩ waitou yen. Negur nẽ Itotoya are narĩ fiya kisi feleya sã.
Age yen ouf are, Dei yogon bagai igirna fen, ein tenebur sur fiyan anĩ, aya Negur Naal aul anĩ, ere nigin aya kono afel wiyagef?
Aya ereb neu Dei age fedig anĩ, to age afef are, aya to momoi wiyagauf.
Anĩ ere, aya age afe di, ã neu od to momoi goufeg, memelik anodif anĩ momoi gouf, anĩ bunem Dei aya bun ibodok, aya Dei bun abodok ya anĩ, ã karĩg fen, keleĩ youf.”
Idi baban Jesus ka difiyẽf nigin age difen, anĩ ere, ĩ oreis iyawon.
Agef fen, Jesus ĩ, Jordan naan sitakã, uruwa bun Jon naan igunẽdin modoũ bun, kel ile, an ibodõ di,
tamo kayau musei ĩ garan disi diron, “Jon memelik taka to inon, anĩ ere, Jon tamo enei nigin wogõ yen ganan, are momoi.”
Age de fen, an musei idi Jesus nigin momoi den.
Gama tamo Lasarus dedig dagin. Ĩ Betani tamal, Maria ĩ tura Marta ado neid fonõ.
Maria de anim, kulu moul sumeĩ biya ado, Jesus bun fi fel fen, fatiyam Jesus ye waĩ fen. Ĩ main Lasarus gama dagi yenek.
Anĩ nigin, main tar Jesus garan od sur difen, “Odug, ĩ nigin waũ laa fedig are dagi.”
Jesus ĩ enei karĩ ye fen, iron, “Dagi eneim to laa ilauf, are Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin, anĩ bunem, Negur Naal yana dalesauf.”
Marta, tura ado, maineid Lasarus nigin, Jesus wau laa fen.
Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ Lasarus dagi yenek ya karĩ ye fen, ĩ ibodon nẽ an baban naa uru ibodon.
Anĩ bure fele di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Ada Judia distrik baban keku tagauf.”
Anĩ ere, idi diron, “Rabi, õ gama bagai Juda tamo meein tulu diyõf nigin age difen, anĩ õ an kel ulau fenẽ de?”
Jesus irokenẽdin, “Gaa tekelei bun aua tuwelf to ado de? Anĩ ege aa luwan to ilalauf. Tamo ĩ gaa ado iyok, ĩ ye to tũ fedig, ere nigin, ĩ teneub enei nẽ lalan anim lo fedig.
Sain ĩ bõ iyõf are, ye tũ fouf, ere nigin, ĩ lalan sã.”
Enei irokel fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Neda mou Lasarus ĩ mulã yenek, anĩ ere, aya turĩ afiyẽf nigin an elef.”
In dõ fiya tar Jesus solo de dirokenen, “Odug, ĩ yenek are, ĩ fau karikauf.”
Lasarus laa fen nigin Jesus iron, anĩ ere, in dõ fiya tar kisi difen, ĩ mulã yenẽya maug bagai nigin irok den.
Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi faded feid, irokenẽdin, “Lasarus laa fen.
Ã nigin au fen, aya an to abodon anĩ nigin, aya wau al fef, ere nigin, anĩ bunem ã momoi gouf. Anĩ ere, ada ĩ gein talauf.”
Anĩ nigin, Tomas Didimus dedig, dõ fiya tar tunĩ ganan irokenẽdin, “Weim gare tauf nigin, adag talauf.”
Sain Jesus ile wõ yen are, Lasarus mogo matmat bun naa fo ilelen anĩ karĩ yen.
Betani are Jerusalem melsã, tri kilomita age fiya.
Juda tamo kayau musei, Marta Maria ado maineid laa fen anĩ, waud yo difouf nigin idi gedin disin.
Marta Jesus isif ya karĩ ye fen, Jesus fotou fouf nigin ilen, anĩ ere, Maria ĩ fõ bun ibodon.
Marta Jesus irokenen, “Odug, õ ein udobom are, mainou to laa fem.
Anĩ ere, aya keleĩ, gamag õ ereb taka nigin Negur urokenẽf are, ifonõf.”
Jesus Marta irokenen, “Nẽ main baban kel fã youf.”
Marta Jesus aiten yale iron, “Aya keleĩ, idikeleya naa kel fãya sain bun, ĩ baban kel fã youf.”
Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Aya dogol kel fãya nẽ ado mata nẽ. Taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef are, ĩ mata ibodõf, laa foufeg, ĩ mata ibodõf.
Taka ĩ mata ibod ken, aya nigin momoi yef are, ĩ to bagai laa fouf. Õ enei momoi wof de?”
Marta Jesus irokenen, “Momoi, Odug, aya momoi auf, õ Kristus, Negur Naal, teneub enei bun usin.”
Ĩ agef irokel fen, ĩ kel ile, tura Maria iweigne ken, mugun irokenen. Ĩ iron, “Tise yeir, ĩ iweignok.”
Maria od enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ kaisã bagai fã yale, Jesus garan ilen.
Jesus fonõ wõya sã, ĩ fau Marta fotou fiyen modoũ anĩ bun ibodon.
Juda tamo kayau, Maria geid, fõ bun dibod ken, ĩ wau wã difenen, ĩ kaisã bagai fã yale, ulõ yeis ile di, dile fen, ĩ matmat bun inã yalouf nigin ilef de fen, dõ difiyen.
Sain Maria Jesus ibodon nẽ modoũ anĩ bun wõ ye, Jesus ile fen, ĩ ye gariyan kubũ ye fen, iron, “Odug, õ ein ubodom are, mainou to laa fem.”
Sain Maria inã yalen ado, Juda tamo kayau Maria geid disin idig inã dalen, Jesus anĩ ile fen, wau fatuk bagai gudũf morõ fen.
Jesus to fen, “Ĩ nain mũ gen?” Idi diron, “Odug, usi fen, ule.”
Jesus ĩ inã yalen.
Age fe di, Juda tamo kayau diron, “Ulegef, ĩ nigin fatuk bagai wau laa fen anĩ!”
Anĩ ere, idi tunĩ diron, “Ĩ tamo mala ifofakeleya birikã fedin, tamo eneig laa bun ileya nigin katĩ feleya to kisi feleyan de?”
Jesus baban wau fatuk bagai gudũf fen, matmat bun isin. Matmat are ku, meein nem bobog katĩ difelen.
Jesus iron, “Meein waleleg.” Marta, laa tamo nẽ main iron, “Anĩ ere, Odug, are gama waai sane, ere nigin, ĩ an naa fo ibodon.”
Age ye di, Jesus iron, “Õ momoi wof are, Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya ulouf, to age ayon de?”
Anĩ nigin, idi meein are dalelen. Age dife di, Jesus itad fen, iron, “Dei, õ aya karĩ wiyal nigin, õ de ayok.
Aya kelein, õ faimud aya karĩ wiyadig, anĩ ere, aya tamo kayau yeir difaref nigin od enei orom, are idi onom aya sur wiyan anĩ momoi douf nigin.”
Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, ait odug nem iwegin, “Lasarus, ulõ weis!”
Laa tamo, ye, ima gabar masak nem filu difen ado, nawa gabarem sile difen ulõ yesi di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Gabar waleleg fen, utornẽge di, ile.”
Anĩ nigin, Juda tamo kayau musei Maria gein disin, Jesus ereb age fen anĩ dile fen, ĩ nigin momoi den.
Anĩ ere, idi tunĩ Farisia tamo gedin dile fen, Jesus ereb age fen anĩ dirokenẽdin.
Anĩ nigin, pris odudug Farisia tamo geid, katõ difouf nigin Juda uyu irouya neid kaunsel guru fiya diwegin. Idi diron, “Ada naig tafouf? Ere nigin, tamo enei memelik musei inodif.
Ada lo tafe di, ĩ enei eig fef ilauf are, tamo ganan ĩ nigin momoi douf, age dife di, neda ibodõya ado teneub, Rom tamom disi dalouf.”
Age de di, idi atun taka, yana Kaiafas, ĩ yar anĩ bun pris neid mudur ibod ken, wogõ yen, “Ã ereb taka keleĩ sã!
Tamo kayau ganan inanakalauf ban, tamo tekeleim tamo kayau nigin laa fouf, are ã nigin deuf anĩ, ã to kisi gef.”
Ĩ yogon kisi bunem od enei to iron, anĩ ere, ĩ yar anĩ bun pris neid mudur ibodon nigin, profet od wogõ yen, Jesus Juda tamo kayau ganan nigin laa fouf yen.
Are Juda tamo kayau nigin dogol sã, Negur gere tar firagagaũ difen anidig, guri feid irousi kuru fedi di, idi tekelei youf nigin, Jesus laa fouf yen.
Anĩ nigin, naa anĩ bunem ilen, idi Jesus dukesiyouf nigin naab dimiren.
Age dife di, Jesus ĩ, Juda tamo kayau meleid bun mala yaor to iyon, ĩ an iminkele fen, teneub akor taka, gerere tuan melsã, fonõ yana Efraim ilen, an yogon dõ fiya tar geid dibodon.
Sain anĩ Juda neid Pasa naa melsã, musei fonõ fonõ temeleid, dogo neid nonorou lilik fiya nigin, Pasa naa wõya sã mog, Jerusalem diselen.
Idi Jesus nigin meleid dinof diyon. Idi tempel modoũ bun difar fen, abob to difen, “Ã ere kisi gef? Ĩ Sifa bun to isiyouf de?”
Anĩ ere, pris odudug Farisia tamo geid, taka nem Jesus nain be ibodok ya anĩ ile fen, irokenẽdi di, dirounẽf nigin wedereid diroun.
Pasa nẽ naa wõya nigin, naa sigis fau ibod mog, Jesus Betani wõ yen, an Lasarus ibodon, ĩ Jesusem laa bun tamal turĩ fiyen.
An Jesus nigin waud el fe fen, bõ saaf dabin, anĩ Marta aruna yalen. Idi Jesus geid tebol bun dibodon atun, Lasarus ibodon.
Age de mog, Maria moul sumeĩ biya, hap lita nad nem dinon, are moni odug nẽ anĩ yale fen, Jesus ye bun fi fel fen, fatiyam ye waĩ fen. Age fe di, moul sumeĩ biyam, fõ anĩ ino yalen.
Anĩ ere, Judas Iskariot, in dõ fiya taka, fau dum im Jesus kiwai imeid bun inouf, im iron,
“Ere nigin moul sumeĩ biya enei, na nigin sur fe fen, moni anĩ maleg tamo to ifenẽdiyam? Are yar tekelei bun, kabĩ tamo nẽ mala yaledig kilei.”
Ĩ maleg tamo nigin kisif fen, enei to iron, ĩ yogo bẽ tamo nigin age yen. Ĩ moni nẽ kodol lo fiya tamo, moni nẽ kodol bun dinodig are bẽ yaledig.
Anĩ nigin, Jesus iron, “Kayau are utornẽg, ĩ aya mũ difiyauf naa nẽ nigin, moul sumeĩ biya enei irouwauf.
Maleg idi, ã geid sain faimud ubodõgouf, anĩ ere, aya, ã geid sain faimud to tabodõf.”
Age de mog, Juda tamo kayau musei, Jesus an ibodok ya kelei ken, disin, are ĩ nigin dogol sã, Lasarus Jesusem laa bun tamal turĩ fiyen ĩg dilouf nigin.
Anĩ nigin, pris odudug Lasarus ĩg dukesiyouf nigin naab dimiren,
ere nigin, Lasarus bunem, Juda tamo kayau musei Jesus garan dile fen, ĩ nigin momoi den.
Naa anĩ ile di, tamo kayau musei Sifa bun disin, Jesus Jerusalem isif ya anĩ karĩ den.
Idi pam aarau anã aarau gen anĩ guri de, Jesus tarabã difiyẽf nigin dile fen, diweig diron, “Hosiana!” “Odug yana bunem isif, ĩ el fiya ado!” “Israel neid King, ĩ el fiya ado!”
Jesus donki naal fotou fe fen, teten ibodon, are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei,
“To kumĩg, Saion nẽ tamo kayau, uleg, ãgenei king, donki naal teten ibod ken, isif.”
Uruwa bagai, in dõ fiya tar, enei ganan nigin wedereid fokõya san. Dum Negur Jesus fula fiya medeĩya ifenẽ di, enei ĩ nigin ditoton ado, enei tamo kayau ĩ bun age difen anĩ, wedereid fokõ yen.
Tamo kayau Jesus geid difar fen, ĩ Lasarus matmat bun tamal iweigne ken, laa bun tamal turĩ fe di, lo difen idim wogagã def, dile di, od iyokelen.
Tamo kayau musei, Jesus memelik anĩ inon karĩ den nigin, ĩ fotou difiyẽf nigin dilen.
Age dife di, Farisia tamo idi abob dirokenen, “Ulegef, ada kabĩ ege talegef. Lo gouf are, tamo kayau ganan ĩ dõ difiyek!”
Sifa bun Negur yana dalesauf nigin diselen idi atun, Grik tunĩ difaren.
Idi Filip Betsaida tamal Galili teneub bun, ĩ garan disi fen, to difiyẽ diron, “Tamo biya, amã Jesus mailau fenẽ.”
Age de di, Filip ile, Endru iroken ken, uruwom Jesus dirokenen.
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Negur Tamo Naal fula fiya medeĩya ifenẽf nigin, sain anĩ mogo yeir isil.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, wit faat taka teneub bun kubũ ye fen, to burauf are, faat tekelei dogol agef ibodõf, anĩ ere, ĩ burauf are, faat musei wowã douf.
Tamo ĩ yogon mata nigin wau laa fef are, ĩ mata anĩ itornẽf, anĩ ere, tamo ĩ teneub enei bun, yogon mata atorok bagai ye fen, itorok are, ĩ irounek ile, mata ibodkeleya bun ilauf.
Taka ĩ aya arunau yalef, ĩ aya dõ fiyauf bagai. Aya abodok nẽ an, neu kabĩ tamo ĩg an ibodõf. Taka ĩ arunau yalef, neu Dei ĩ yana yalesauf.
“Gama neu wau morok, anĩ aya ere auf? ‘Dei sain enei bun usenna,’ auf de? Sã, gariya enei nigin bagai, sain enei bun asin.
Dei ogo yanã selĩ kulõ!” Age ye di, ait taka saa ilunem isin, “Aya mogo anĩ selu abin, aya baban anĩ selu abiyouf.”
Tamo kayau an difaren anĩ karĩ de fen, diron, kolimei den, tunĩ diron, engel takam wogõ fiyem.
Jesus iron, “Ait enei, ã isenneĩ di, momoi gouf nigin, aya nigin sã.
Gama Negur ĩ, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau es fedif, gama teneub enei nẽ mudur iruwauf.
Anĩ ere, aya tenebur tamal dalesnauf sain, aya tamo ganan aya bun, didĩ afediyouf.”
Jesus yogo naig fe, laa fouf anĩ ifelnẽdiyouf nigin, od enei wogõ yen.
Tamo kayau aiten dale diron, “Lo bun amã Kristus gai gai ibodõf ya anĩ karĩ maun, naig fe di, õ urok, ‘Tamo Naal ĩ dalesnẽf bagai’? Ai anĩ Tamo Naal?”
Age de di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Sain naal bagai ã lalan adouf. Ã lalan ado mog, uyõg, anĩ bunem gugum to irousi kerũ yeĩf. Tamo ĩ gugum bun iyok, ĩ naib ilef are keleĩ sã.
Ã lalan ado mog, ãgenei momoiya lalan bun unog, ago gouf, ã lalan gere tar wowã gouf.” Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, ĩ itorneĩd ile, iminkelen.
Jesus idi meleid bun memelik musei inodin, anĩ ere, idi fau ĩ nigin to momoi den.
Enei are profet Asaia nẽ od kisi falauf nigin wõ yen: “Odug, aim nemã od nigin momoi yen? Aiyai bun Odug nẽ megeir yaor fen?”
Gariya enei nigin, idi momoiya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, Asaia baban od enei iron:
“Negur idi meleid ifofa ken, waud ifofakelen, anĩ bunem, idi meledim ileya kisi feleya sã, waud fokõya kisi feleya sã, waud faleiya kisi feleya sã, age fiya sam, aya el afedim.”
Asaia od enei iron, ere nigin, ĩ Jesus nẽ fula fiya medeĩya ile fen, ĩ nigin iron.
Mudur adodo idi atun, museig ĩ nigin momoi den. Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo idim Juda neid uub fõ bun dirudidiya nigin kumĩ de fen, dogo neid momoiya to yaor difen.
Ere nigin, idi Negurem yeneid yaleseya ban, tamom yeneid dalesauf anĩ orodidig.
Jesus iweig iron, “Tamo ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, ĩ aya nigin dogol to momoi yef, ĩ aya sur fiyan nigineg momoi yef.
Ĩ aya lo fiyaf, im aya sur fiyan anĩ ilef.
Aya lalan anĩ, tenebur ein asin, are taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, ĩ gugum bun to ibodõf nigin age afen.
“Taka ĩ neu od karĩ ye fen, to dõ fef, aya ĩ to es afiyek, ere nigin, aya tamo kayau es fiya nigin to asin, aya kel gei fiya nigin asin.
Taka ĩ aya itorna fen, neu od to irouf, ĩ nigin es fiya tamo ibodok. Od de wogõ aun anim, idikeleya naa bun ĩ es fiyẽf.
Ere nigin, aya neu kisi nem to wogõ aun, anĩ ere, Dei aya sur fiyan im, ere anĩ wogõ auf, naig afe wogõ auf anĩ, toli fiya di, wogõ aun.
Aya keleĩ, yogon si fiya are mata faimud ibodkeleya bun ileya nẽ, anĩ nigin, ereb aya wogõ auf, Dei aya wogõ auf nigin irokanan kilei bagai, aya wogõ auf.”
Pasa nẽ Sifa fau wõya sã mog, Jesus kelein, ĩ teneub enei itor ken, Tama garan ileya nẽ sain mogo wõ yel. Ĩ yogon tamo tar tenebur ein dibodok anidi nigin wau laa fedig, ĩ idi nigin wau laa fen are iroule idikeleya bun.
Bõ saaf dõ mog, Satanem Judas Iskariot, Simon naal namen Jesus kiwai imeid bun ifenẽf nigin, kisi mogo ifenen.
Tama ĩ ereb ereb ganan, Jesus ima bun inon, ĩ Negur bunem isin anĩ, Negur bun kel ilef, are Jesus ĩ keleĩ.
Jesus saaf bun ibodon anĩ fã ye, yogon kolos teten inukeis fen, taul yale, luwa gu fen.
Age fel fen, ĩ naan yale, beĩ bun yu ken, yogon dõ fiya tar yeid kulo fiya gariya inon, agef fen, taul luwa gu fen anim yeid waĩ fedin.
Jesus Simon Pita garan isi di, ĩ Jesus irokenen, “Odug, õ aya yeu kulo wou fenẽ de?”
Jesus Pita aiten yale irokenen, “Ereb aya age afef, õ gama keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, fau dum õ keleĩ youf.”
Pita iron, “Aya yeu to bagai kulo wouf.” Jesus Pita irokenen, “Aya õ to kulo ayõf are, õ aya ado nigal fiya sã.”
Simon Pita Jesus irokenen, “Odug, agouf are, yeu dogol sã, imau mudurou adog kulo wouf.”
Jesus aiten yale iron, “Taka ĩ naan igukelel, ye dogol kulo fouf, bouwa ganan filiya. Ã filiya ba, anĩ ere, ã ganan sã.”
Jesus ĩ aibem kiwai ifenẽf anĩ keleĩ, anĩ nigin, ganan filiya sã yen.
Jesus yeid kulof bure fel fen, yogon kolos ifounkel, yogon modoũ bun kelen. Agef fen, ĩ idi to fedin, “Aya ereb ã bun age afel anĩ, ã wedereĩ fokõ yef de?
Ã aya ‘Tise’ ado ‘Odug’ gedig, are tutuk, ere nigin, aya de anĩ.
Aya ãgenei Tise ado Odug, ã yeĩ kulo afel, anĩ nigin, ãg abob ye kulo gouf.
Aya malakanon anokeneim, are ã nigin age afel gen, ãg ago gouf.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ferfer takam yogon odug to wal fiyẽdig, arũ tamom ĩ sur fiyen to wal fiyẽdig.
Gama ã enei keleĩ, anĩ nigin, enei dõg ago gouf are, ã el yeĩf.
“Aya ã ganan nigin to wogõ auf. Aya agirnẽdin idi, aya keleĩ, anĩ ere, enei are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek anĩ kisi falauf nigin, ‘Taka ĩ aya urom neu bret moko, ĩ aya kiwai ifana fen, dã fiyal.’
“Anĩ fau to wõ ye mog, gama aya ã arokeneik, anĩ bunem, anĩ wõ youf sain bun, aya de Im ya anĩ momoi gouf.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ayam sur afe di, ĩ yalef are, ĩ aya yaleyaf, taka ĩ aya yaleyaf are, ĩ aya sur fiyan anĩ yalef.”
Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, ĩ wau moro ken, kurõ feis iron, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ãgenei takam aya kiwai ifanauf.”
Yogon dõ fiya tar idi abob loli difen, ai nigin bagai wogõ yef de fen, nene den.
Idi neid taka, dõ fiya taka Jesus ĩ nigin wau laa fedig ĩ, Jesus sirin ibodon.
Simon Pita, dõ fiya tamo enei mudurem fiye ken, ĩ iron, “Ĩ ai nigin irok anĩ to wiyẽ.”
Dõ fiya tamo anĩ, Jesus akoron mudur isen ken, to fen, “Odug, õ ai wof?”
Jesus aiten yale iron, “Tamo bret enei beĩ bun nu afe fen, afenẽf anĩ.” Age ye fen, ĩ bret nuf fen, Judas Iskariot, Simon naal ifenen
Judas bret anĩ yale di, Satan ĩ namen ilen. Jesus Judas irokenen, “Ereb agou fenẽ, kaisã bagai ago.”
Anĩ ere, saaf bun dibodon anĩ takam, ere nigin Jesus od enei Judas irokenen anĩ, kisi to fokõ yen.
Judas ĩ moni lo fiya tamo nigin, tunĩ kisi difen, Sifa nẽ ereb ereb na yalouf nigin be, maleg ereb ereb ifenẽdiya nigin be, Jesusem Judas irokenẽ di, ilef den.
Judas ĩ bret yale fen, kaisã bagai oreis ilen. Sain anĩ bõ.
Judas iya ile di, Jesus iron, “Gama Tamo Naal fula fiya medeĩya yale di, Negur fula fiya medeĩya Tamo Naal bun yalef.
Negur fula fiya medeĩya Naal bun yalef are, Negur ĩ fula fiya medeĩya Yogo bun Naal ifenẽf, fula fiya medeĩya anĩ kaisã bagai Naal ifenẽf.
“Neu kesu tar, aya ã geid sain naal bagai tabodõf. Ã aya umirnagauf. Aya Juda tamo arokenẽdin kilei, gama ã arokeneik, aya elef nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã.
“Aya ĩtãfiya mata afeneik, abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf. Aya ã nigin wau laa fedig kilei, ãg abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf bagai.
Ã abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf, anĩ bunem tamo ganan idi keleĩ youf, ã neu dõ fiya tamo tar.”
Simon Pita Jesus to fiyen, “Odug, õ nai ulef?” Jesus iron, “Aya elef nẽ an, õ gama aya dõ fiyaya kisi feleya sã, anĩ ere, õ fau dum dõ wouf.”
Pita to fen, “Odug, ere nigin gama aya õ dõ yõya kisi feleya sã? Aya õ nigin neu mata atorõf.”
Age ye di, Jesus iron, “Õ aya nigin ogon mata utorõf de? Aya õ momoi bagai arokonok, tataro fau kokorok yeya sã mog, õ aya nigin wa wo, towo wouf!
“Ã wauĩ to morõ yeĩ. Negur nigin momoi gouf, aya nigineg momoi gouf.
Neu Dei nẽ fõ bun aab musei ado, age fiya sam are, arokeneim. Aya eselef nẽ an, ãgenei modoũ dodok afouf.
Aya esel, ãgenei modoũ dodok afel fen, aya ã geid tabodõf nigin, aya kelau gei ayeĩf, are ãg aya abodok nẽ an ubodõgouf nigin.
Aya eselef nẽ naab anĩ, ã keleĩ.”
Tomas Jesus irokenen, “Odug, õ narib ulef are, amã keleĩ sã, anĩ nigin, naig mafe fen, amã naab anĩ keleĩ youf?”
Jesus Tomas irokenen, “Aya dogol naab anĩ, aya dogol momoi anĩ, aya dogol mata anĩ. Taka ĩ naab taka bunem, Dei wagen to isiyouf, aya bunem dogol.
Ã aya keleim are, ã neu Deig keleim. Gama sain enei bun ilauf, ã ĩ keleĩ, ĩ ulegel.”
Filip iron, “Odug, Tamada ufelnamã, anĩ amã nigin deuf.”
Jesus iron, “Filip, aya ã geid sain meluk tabodon, anĩ ere, õ aya keleĩ sã de? Taka ĩ aya ileyan are Dei ilen. Naig fe di, õ urok, ‘Tamada ufelnamã’?
Aya Dei bun abodok, Dei aya bun ibodok anĩ to momoi wof de? Od aya wogõ ayeik are, aya yug bun tamal sã, are Dei aya bun ibodok ĩ kabĩ yalef.
Aya Dei bun abodok, Dei ĩ aya bun ibodok anĩ, momoi wiyagauf, sãf are, aya kabĩ aledig bun, momoi wiyagauf.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, ereb aya age afedig, ĩg age fouf, enei age afedig anĩ wal fiyag age fouf, ere nigin, aya Dei gein eselef.
Ã ereb taka nigin, aya yanau nem to gouf, aya age afouf, anĩ bunem, Dei ĩ Naal bun, fula fiya medeĩya yalouf.
Ereb taka nigin, aya yanau nem to wiyagauf are, aya age afouf.
“Ã aya nigin wauĩ laa fouf are, neu ĩtãfiya anĩ dõ gouf.
Aya Dei arokenẽ di, ĩ Isenneĩya taka, ã geid gai gai ibodõf nigin ifeneĩf,
are momoi nẽ Awa Uur. Tenebur ein tamo kayau ĩ to dalouf, ere nigin, idi ĩ to dilef, to keleĩ. Anĩ ere, ã ĩ keleĩ, ere nigin, ĩ ã geid ibodok, ã bun ibodõf.
Aya ã madmad gen to atorneĩf. Aya ã gein asiyouf.
Sain naal bagai ile di, tenebur ein tamo kayau, aya to dileyauf, anĩ ere, ã uleyagauf. Aya mata abodok nigin, ãg mata ubodõgouf.
Naa anĩ bun, aya neu Dei bun abodok, ã aya bun ubodõgef, aya ã bun abodok anĩ, ã keleĩ youf.
Taka ĩ neu ĩtãfiya irou dõ fef, ĩ aya nigin wau laa fedig. Ĩ aya nigin wau laa fedig anĩ, neu Dei ĩ nigin wau laa fouf, ayag ĩ nigin wau laaf fen, aya yug ĩ bun yaor afouf.”
Age ye di, Judas taka (Judas Iskariot anĩ sã) iron, “Odug, ere nigin õ ogo, amã bun dogol õ yaorõf, tenebur ein tamo kayau bun sã?”
Jesus iron, “Taka ĩ aya nigin wau laa fef, ĩ neu od dõ fouf. Neu Dei ĩ nigin wau laa fouf, anĩ amã ĩ gein masi, weim mabodõf.
Taka ĩ aya nigin to wau laa fef, ĩ neu od to dõ fouf. Od enei ã karĩ gef, are aya bun tamal sã, are Dei aya sur fiyan nẽ od.
“Aya fau ã geid tabod ken, od enei ganan wogõ ayein.
Anĩ ere, Isenneĩya, Awa Uur Fateul anĩ, Deim aya yanau nem sur fouf, Awa Uur Fateul ĩ, ereb ereb ganan ifelnei ken, aya arokenein anĩ ganan wedereĩ fokõf fen, kisi turĩ fouf.
Wau inosiya atorkeneik, neu wau inosiya afeneik, aya afeneik are, tenebur ein tamo kayau wau inosiya difeneik gen sã. Ã wauĩ to morõ yei ken, kumĩg.
“Aya eig au di, karĩ gel, ‘Aya ele fen, ã gein kelau asiyouf.’ Ã aya nigin wauĩ laa fem are, aya Dei bun elef anĩ nigin, ã kulĩya adom, ere nigin, Dei ĩ aya wal fiyaya.
Anĩ wõya sã mog, aya mogo arokeneim, anĩ bunem, agef wõ ye di, ã momoi gouf.
Aya ã geid, sain meluk to wogõ tauf, ere nigin, teneub enei nẽ mudur mogo isif. Anĩ ere, ĩ aya lai fiyaya nigin megeir sã,
anĩ ere, tenebur ein tamo kayau keleĩ bagai youf, are aya Dei nigin wau laa fef, anĩ nigin, neu Dei irokanan kilei bagai age afedig. “Fafãg fen, modoũ enei tatorõg.
“Aya aa wain bagai, neu Dei ĩ kabĩ marau.
Were aya bun biya to yuk anĩ ganan, Deim kokour falauf, were biya yuk anĩ ganan, Deim dẽ fe di, biya musei imauf.
Aya od wogõ ayein anim, ã amuyẽ sã, ã mogo filiya.
Ã aya bun ubodõgouf, ayag ã bun abodõf. Were taka aa wain luwa ado to susu falauf are, yogo biya yũya kisi feleya sã. Age fiya bagai, ãg aya bun to ubodõgouf are, biya yũya kisi feleya sã.
“Aya aa wain gariya, ã were. Taka ĩ aya bun ibodõ di, ayag ĩ bun abodõf are, ĩ biya musei imauf. Aya utornagauf are, ã ereb taka to ago gouf.
Taka ĩ aya bun to ibodõf are, ĩ were diraile di, meti ledig gen. Were age fediya are gei de fen, yã dirarã di, isasaikelediyouf.
Ã aya bun ubodõge di, neu od ã bun ibodõf are, ereb taka oroyei ken, urokanage di, ifeneĩf.
Biya musei ũg fen, neu dõ fiya tar wowã gouf are, neu Dei ĩ fula fiya medeĩya yalouf.
“Neu Dei aya nigin wau laa fedig kilei, ayag ã nigin wau laa fedig. Gama ã neu wau laa fiya anĩ bun ubodõg.
Aya neu Dei nẽ ĩtãfiya dõ afe fen, yogon wau laa fiya bun abodok kilei, ã neu ĩtãfiya dõ gouf are, neu wau laa fiya bun ubodõgouf.
Aya enei arokeneim, are neu kulĩya ã namein ibod ken, ãgenei kulĩya barikãf nigin.
Neu ĩtãfiya are yeir, aya ã nigin wau laa fedig gen, ãg abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf.
Wau laa fiya enei wau laa fiya ganan wal fiya, are yogon mou tar nigin yogon mata itorok anĩ.
Ã aya ereb ĩtãfiya arokenein anĩ dõg, ago gouf are, ã neu mou tar.
Aya baban ã to ferfer ayeĩf, ere nigin, ferfer ĩ yogon tamo odug nẽ kabĩ keleĩ sã. Anĩ ere, aya ã neu mou tar ayeim, ere nigin, ereb ereb ganan aya Dei bun karĩ aun anĩ, aya ã afelneim.
Ãgem aya to ugirnagen, aya ã agirnei ken, uleg, biya ũg fen, biya anĩ ibodkalauf nigin ã ayein. Agog fen, aya yanau nem, ereb taka nigin Dei urokenẽge di, ifeneĩf.
Enei anĩ neu ĩtãfiya, abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf.
“Tenebur tamo kiwai difeneĩf are, aya ketem kiwai difanan anĩ, ã keleĩ youf.
Ã teneub enei nẽf are, ã yogon nigin, ã nigin wau laa fouf. Anĩ ere, ã teneub enei nẽ sã, aya ã tenebur tamal gei ayei ken, agirnein. Anĩ nigin, tenebur ein ã kiwai difeneik.
Aya od arokenein anĩ, ã karĩ walagauf, ‘Ferfer taka yogon odug to wal fedig.’ Idi aya darau difanan are, ãg age de darau difeneĩf. Idi neu od dõ difen are, idi ãgeneig age de dõ difouf.
Idi enei ganan ã bun age difouf, ere nigin, aya yanau ã ado, are aya sur fiyan idi ĩ keleĩ sã nigin.
Aya to asi fen, arokenẽdim are, idi mosor sam. Anĩ ere, idi neid mosor nigin to galã dũf.
Taka ĩ aya kiwai ifanaf, ĩ neu Deig kiwai ifenek.
Taka nem to age fen anĩ, aya idi atun to age afem are, idi mosor sam. Anĩ ere, gama idi memelik dile fen, aya neu Dei ado kiwai difanaman.
Anĩ ere, enei, idi neid Lo bun ditoton yenek anĩ, kisi falauf nigin, ‘Idi aya mura sã kiwai difanan.’
“Awa Uur Isenneĩya are, ayam Dei bun tamal ã bun sur afe di, isiyouf, are momoi nẽ Awa Uur, Dei bun tamal ulõ yeis isi fen, ĩ aya nigin kurõ fesiyouf.
Ãg agog kurõ wesigouf bagai, ere nigin, ã aya geid fen, gariya bunem tasin.
“Ã to felu rogouf nigin, od enei ganan mogo ã wogõ ayeim.
Idi ã Juda neid uub fõ bun diruyeĩf. Takag, sain fau isiyouf bun, taka ĩ ã ideneĩkeis fen, kisi fouf, Negur sesewi afiyek youf.
Idi enei age difouf, ere nigin, idi Dei keleĩ sã, aya nigineg keleĩ sã.
Aya enei mogo arokeneim, are sain isiyouf bun, ã wedereĩ aroul anĩ, karĩ walagauf nigin. Aya enei tetun to arokenein, ere nigin, aya ã geiden.
“Gama aya ĩ sur fiyan gein eselef, anĩ ere, ã takam to aya to fiyaf, ‘Õ nai ulef?’
Aya enei arokeneim nigin, ã fatuk bagai wauĩ gudũ fef.
Anĩ ere, aya momoi arokeneik, aya ãgenei biya fiya nigin eselef. Aya to eselauf are, Isenneĩya anĩ ã bun to isiyouf, aya eselauf are, aya ĩ, ã bun sur afouf.
Sain ĩ isiyouf, tenebur ein tamo kayau bun, mosor nigin, Negur nẽ madur fiya nigin ado, Negur nẽ es fiya nigin, idi neid kũ fenẽya anĩ yaor fe, faded fediyouf.
Mosor are, idi aya nigin to momoi def nigin.
Negur nẽ madur fiya are, aya Dei gein esele di, ã aya to uleyagauf nigin.
Negur nẽ es fiya are, teneub enei nẽ mudur mogo es fiyen nigin.
“Aya ã irokeneĩya nigin musei biya, anĩ ere, ã gama keleĩya kisi feleya sã.
Anĩ ere, sain momoi nẽ Awa Uur isiyouf bun, momoi nẽ anĩ ganan bun, im itoneĩf. Ĩ yogon kisim to wogõ youf, ereb ĩ karĩ yef anĩ wogõ youf, agef fen, ereb fau wõ youf anĩ irokeneĩf.
Ĩ neu bun tamal yale fen, ã ifelneĩf, anĩ bunem, aya fula fiya medeĩya ifanauf.
Dei nẽ ganan are neu, anĩ nigin, aya arom, Awa Uur neu bun tamal yale fen, ã ifelneĩf aul.
“Sain naal bagai ile di, ã to uleyagauf, agef fen, baban sain naal bagai ile di, aya uleyagauf.”
In dõ fiya tar tunĩ abob dirokenen, “Ere gariya nigin eig ye irok, ‘Sain naal bagai ile di, ã to uleyagauf, agef fen, baban sain naal bagai ile di, aya uleyagauf,’ takag, ‘Ere nigin, aya Dei gein eselef nigin,’ yef?”
Idi anĩ fau fau wogõ den, “Ĩ ere ye fen, ‘sain naal bagai’ yen? Ĩ irok anĩ, amã gariya keleĩ sã.”
Idi enei nigin Jesus to difou fenẽ mog, Jesus anĩ ile fen, idi irokenẽdin, “Aya eig aul anĩ nẽ gariya nigin abob to wiyẽgef de, ‘Sain naal bagai ile di, ã to uleyagauf, agef fen, baban sain naal bagai ile di, aya uleyagauf’?
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ã fau maruĩ isi fen, wauĩ gudũ fouf, tenebur tamo kayau kulĩ de mog. Ã wauĩ gudũ fouf, anĩ ere, ãgenei wauĩ gudũ fiya falei yel kulĩ youf.
Kayau kesu ibodõ fenẽ darau fef, ere nigin, yogon naa wõ yel, anĩ ere, yogon kesu wõ ye di, darau weder tu kelef, ere nigin, kesu tenebur wõ yel nigin kulĩ yef.
Ãg age fiya, gama ãgenei wauĩ gudũ fiya nẽ naa, anĩ ere, aya baban ailiyeĩ di, ã kulĩ gouf, taka nem ãgenei kulĩya to yalelkeneĩf.
Naa anĩ bun, ereb taka nigin ã to, to wiyagauf. Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, aya yanau bunem, ereb taka nigin neu Dei to wiyẽgouf are, ifeneĩf.
Uruwa bunem isi gama, aya yanau nem, ereb taka nigin to, to gen. To gouf, walogouf, ago gouf, ã kulĩya barikãf.
“Aya yaab od wogõ audig, anĩ naa taka isiyouf bun, aya yaab od to wogõ auf, anĩ ere, neu Dei nigin yaor arokeneĩf.
Naa anĩ bun, aya yanau bunem to gouf. Aya ã nigin Dei to afiyẽf ya anĩ to arokeneik,
ere nigin, ã aya nigin wauĩ laaf fen, aya Negur bun tamal asin anĩ, momoi gedig nigin, Dei ã nigin wau laa fedig.
Aya Dei bun tamal ulõ aus fen, tenebur asin, gama aya teneub enei ator ken, Dei bun kelauf.”
Age ye di, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar diron, “Gama õ yaor wogõ wof, yaab od nem sã.
Gama amã mailef, õ ereb ereb ganan keleĩ, are taka nem to yõf anĩg to tari wodig. Anĩ bunem, õ Negur bun tamal usin anĩ, momoi mauf.”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Ã gama momoi gef de?
Anĩ ere, naa fau isif, are mogo isil, anĩ bun, ã firagagaũ yeĩ, ãgenei fonõ fonõ yeĩf. Ã aya mugu utornagauf. Anĩ ere, aya mugu sã, ere nigin, neu Dei ĩ aya ado.
“Ã aya bun wauĩ inosiya adouf nigin, od enei arokeneim. Tenebur ein ã morõ adouf, anĩ ere, totol ado ufaragauf! Aya teneub enei nẽ megeir mogo wal afen.”
Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, saa ilun itad fen, kosẽ yen: “Dei, naa mogo isil, fula fiya medeĩya õ Naal wenẽ, ago di, õ Naal õ selĩ kulõ fouf.
Are õ Naal, idi ganan õ wenen bun, mata faimud ibodkeleya ifenẽdiyouf nigin, tamo kayau ganan lo fediya nẽ megeir õ wenen.
Mata faimud ibodkeleya are yeir, õ momoi Negur tekelei ado Jesus Kristus õ sur won anĩ, idi keleĩ youf anĩ.
Kabĩ õ wanan anĩ adikelen bunem, tenebur ein aya õ bun fula fiya medeĩya arou asin.
Dei, teneub kare fiya sã mog, ada urom fula fiya medeĩya adon anĩ, õ malã bun fula fiya medeĩya anĩ gama wana.
“Aya teneub enei bun tamal õ wanan idi bun, õ yaor ayon. Idi ogon, anĩ ere, õ idi wanan, ago di, idi ogon od dõ difedig.
Gama idi keleĩ, ereb ereb ganan aya wanan are õ bun tamal.
Aya od wanan anĩ afenẽdi di, idi dalen. Aya õ bun tamal asin anĩ, idi momoi bagai kelein, idi onom aya sur wiyan anĩ momoi den.
Aya idi nigin kosẽ auf. Aya teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau nigin to kosẽ auf, anĩ ere, idi õ wanan anidi nigin kosẽ auf, ere nigin, idi ogon.
Neu ganan are ogon, ogon are neu. Idi bunem, aya fula fiya medeĩya alel.
Aya tenebur ein to abodõf, anĩ ere, idi fau tenebur dibodok, aya õ gein esef. Dei Fateul, õ yanã wanan nẽ megeir bunem, kulatun wediyouf, anĩ bunem, ada tekelei gen idig tekelei youf.
Sain aya idi geid mabodon, õ aya yanã wanan anĩ bunem, kulatun afeid el afen. Taka to fõ yelen, tamo ĩ fõ yalauf nẽ dogol fõ yelen, are Negur nẽ Itotoya kisi falauf nigin.
“Gama aya õ gein esef, neu kulĩya idi namedin barikãf nigin, tenebur ein fau abod ken, od enei arok.
Aya ogon od afenẽdi di, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau idi kiwai difenẽdin, ere nigin, gama aya teneub enei nẽ sã, age fiya gen, idig teneub enei nẽ sã.
Aya teneub enei bun tamal walelnẽdiyouf nigin to kosẽ auf, anĩ ere, wadãgen tamo sane isi fen, daũ fediya nigin, kulatun wediyouf anĩ kosẽ auf.
Aya teneub enei nẽ sã, age fiya gen, idig teneub enei nẽ sã.
Momoi bunem fateul unenẽdiyouf, ogon od are momoi.
Õ teneubur ein sur wiyan gen, ayag teneub enei bun sur afiyẽdin.
Idi nigin, aya yug adok bagai afonok, are idig momoi bagai dogo adok Negur difenẽf nigin.
“Aya neu kosẽya are idi nigin dogol sã, idi neid od bunem, aya nigin momoi douf anidi nigineg, aya kosẽ auf,
idi ganan tekelei youf nigin kosẽ auf, Dei õ aya bun ubodok, aya õ bun abodok gen, idig ada bun dibodõ di, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau, onom aya sur wiyan anĩ, momoi douf nigin.
Fula fiya medeĩya õ wanan anĩ, idi afenẽdin, are ada tekelei gen, idig tekelei youf nigin.
Aya idi bun, õ aya bun, are idi tekelei youf nigin, anĩ bunem, onom aya sur wiya fen, aya nigin waũ laa fedig gen, idi nigineg waũ laa fedig anĩ, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau keleĩ youf.
“Dei, idi õ aya wanan anidi, aya abodok nẽ an, aya geid mabodõf anĩ orouf, are idi neu fula fiya medeĩya dilouf nigin, fula fiya medeĩya anĩ teneub kare fiya sã mog, õ aya nigin waũ laaf fen, wanan anĩ.
“Dei madur bagai, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau idi õ keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, aya õ keleĩ, neu dõ fiya tar idi, onom aya sur wiyan anĩ keleĩ.
Aya õ anĩ afelnẽdi di, idi õ keleĩ, õ nigin fau fau afelnẽdif alauf, are õ aya nigin waũ laa fiya anĩ, idi bun ibodõf ado, ayag idi bun abodõf nigin.”
Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, ĩ yogon dõ fiya tar geid, Kidron naan uus atu dilen. Kidron sitakã kabĩ taka ibodon, ĩ yogon dõ fiya tar geid, kabĩ atu dilen.
Kiwai tamo Judas ĩ modoũ anĩ keleĩ, ere nigin, sain musei Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid an guru difedig.
Anĩ nigin, Judas, kusĩ tamo tunĩ ado, tempel lo fiya tamo tunĩ pris mudur adodo Farisia tamo geid idim sur difedin anidi geif fen, kabier uyu ile di, dilen. Idi yal, lam, kusĩ nẽ waila guri de fen, dilen.
Jesus, ĩ bun wõ youf anĩ ganan kelein, ĩ iyok ile to fedin, “Ã ai umirnẽgef?”
Idi diron, “Jesus Nasaret tamal.” Jesus iron, “Aya im.” Kiwai tamo Judas, idi geid an difaren.
Sain Jesus iron, “Aya im,” ye di, idi soso de dile, tenebur kuku den.
Jesus baban idi to fedin, “Ã ai umirnẽgef?” Idi diron, “Jesus Nasaret tamal.”
Jesus iron, “Aya ã arokeneim, aya im. Aya anĩ umirnagauf are, tamo eneidi utornẽdig len, dile.”
Agef iron are, od Jesus wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin, “Aya õ wanan anidi taka to folõ afelen.”
Age dife di, Simon Pita ĩ, dimig adon anĩ ul feis yale, pris neid mudur nẽ ferfer weder biya melem salõf iran. Ferfer anĩ yana Malkus.
Age fe di, Jesus Pita irokenen, “Ogon dimig yogon modoũ bun kel uno! Dei aya naan kap ifanan anĩ, aya to ãf de?”
Age ye di, kusĩ tamo, nedi mudur, Juda neid tempel lo fiya tamo geid, Jesus dalen. Idi ĩ difo ken,
Anas garan ket dirou dilen, Anas ĩ, Kaiafas ne ten, yar anĩ bun Kaiafas ĩ pris neid mudur ibodon.
Kaiafas im, Juda tamo kayau wedereid irou fen, tamo tekeleim tamo kayau ganan nigin laa fouf, are deuf, yen.
Simon Pita, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar taka ado, Jesus dõ difen. Pris neid mudur, dõ fiya tar taka anĩ keleĩ, anĩ nigin, ĩ Jesus ado, pris neid mudur nẽ fofomalan kau namen dilen.
Anĩ ere, Pita ĩ serẽ bobogen ifaren. In dõ fiya taka ĩ pris neid mudur ĩ nigin keleĩ, ĩ baban serẽ ke len, bobog lo fiya kayau iroken ken, Pita yale irou, namen dilen.
Kabĩ kayau bobog lo fedig ĩ, Pita to fiyen, “Õg be, in dõ fiya tamo taka anĩ sã de?” Pita iron, “Aya sã.”
Menig nigin, ferfer, tempel lo fiya tamo geid, yã kũ de fen, salili de, bouweid diroron. Pita ĩg weim difar fen, bouwa iroron.
Fõ namen, pris neid mudur, Jesus ĩ, in dõ fiya tar nigin ado, yogon od tai fedin nigin to fiyen.
Jesus solof iron, “Aya tamo kayau atun, mala yaor wogõ aun. Aya sain faimud Juda neid uub fõ bun be, tempel bun, Juda tamo kayau ganan guru de mog, wogõ audig. Aya iminẽyan taka to wogõ aun.
Ere nigin anĩ aya to wiyaf? Idi aya wogõ au di, karĩ difiyan onou idi to wiyeĩd. Ereb aya wogõ aun, idi keleĩ.”
Jesus age ye irõ di, tempel lo fiya tamo taka non ifaren anim, Jesus wala fãf fen, iron, “Pris neid mudur anĩ, õ ago urokenẽdig de?”
Jesus solof irokenen, “Aya ereb kũ fenẽya arom are, õ ereb kũ fenẽya anĩ urõf. Anĩ ere, aya momoi arom are, ere nigin õ walau fã wol?”
Age ye di, Anas Jesus difon ado, pris neid mudur Kaiafas gein sur fen.
Simon Pita bouwa irorouk ifar mog, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Õg be, in dõ fiya tamo taka anĩ sã de?” Ĩ waf fen, iron, “Aya sã.”
Pris mudur nẽ ferfer taka, ĩ Pitam weder salõf iran nẽ sirag anim iron, “Aya õ ĩ urom kabier to ailiyeim de?”
Pita baban waf mog, kaisã bagai tataro kokorok yen.
Age fe di, Juda tamo, Jesus Kaiafas bun tamal dale dirou, Rom gawaman mudur nẽ fõ bun dilen. Are bonimei bagai, Juda tamo idi Pasa nẽ saaf dãf nigin, kal sese de fen, gawaman mudur nẽ fõ namen to dilen.
Anĩ nigin, Pailat idi gedin ulõ yeis isi fen, to fedin, “Ere od ã tamo enei bou bun unogouf?”
Idi solo de diron, “Ĩ lo wal fiya tamo sam are, amã õ gein to marou masim.”
Pailat idi irokenẽdin, “Ã aug ĩ waleg fen, ãgenei lo bun es wiyẽg.” Juda tamo idi Pailat dirokenen, “Amam tamo yukesiya nigin Rom gawaman to yo faman.”
Are Jesus ĩ naig be fe, laa fouf nigin wogõ yen anĩ, kisi falauf nigin agef wõ yen.
Age de di, Pailat aaben kel ile, Jesus iweigne ken, to fiyen, “Õ Juda neid king de?”
Jesus solof iron, “Õ ogon kisim od enei urok de, tunim be aya nigin õ dirokonon?”
Pailat solof iron, “Aya Juda tamo de? Õ ogon tamo kayaum pris odudug geid, aya bun dirousiyom. Õ ere taka tau agon?”
Jesus iron, “Aya neu tano teneub enei nẽ sã. Aya neu tano teneub enei nem are, neu kabĩ tamo, Juda tamom aya to daleyauf nigin kusĩ dem. Anĩ ere, neu tano teneub enei nẽ sã.”
Age ye di, Pailat Jesus irokenen, “Age fouf, õ king de?” Jesus solof iron, “Õ ogo yer urok, aya king. Enei nigin aya wõ aun, are momoi anĩ wogõ auf nigin, anĩ nigin, aya tenebur asin. Momoi nẽ ganan, aya karĩ difiyadig.”
Pailat to fen, “Ere anĩ momoi?” Age yel fen, ĩ baban Juda tamo gedin serẽ ile, idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ĩ bun mosor taka to ailef.
Anĩ ere, ãgenei tobonuneĩ eig fiya, Pasa naa bun, kalabus tamo taka aliskeneĩdig. Ã Juda neid king aliskeneĩf anĩ oroyeik de?”
Idi baban diweig, solo de diron, “Sã, ĩ sã! Barabas anĩ wanamãf!” Barabas ĩ anĩ bẽ tamal.
Age de di, Pailat Jesus yale fen, irõ di, wagĩ difiyen.
Kusĩ tamo malũ duri ado dale, teter tanak kori de fen, ĩ mudur bun kurũ difiyen. Idi gabar kadaũ dale difounne ken,
idi baba baban ĩ wagen dile fen, diron, “O Juda neid king gai gai ibodõf!” Age de fen, wala fã difen.
Pailat baban serẽ kel isi fen, Juda tamo irokenẽdin, “Ulegef, aya ĩ bun mosor taka to ailef anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin, ĩ ã gein arou asif.”
Sain Jesus malũ duri kurũ difiyen, gabar kadaũ difounnen ado, serẽ isi di, Pailat idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo are yeir!”
Pris odudug, tempel lo fiya tamo geid, ĩ dile fen, diweig diron, “Aa tetek bun ũf! Aa tetek bun ũf!” Anĩ ere, Pailat idi irokenẽdin, “Ã aug waleg, aa tetek bun ũg. Aya ĩ bun mosor taka to ailef.”
Juda tamo idi solo de diron, “Amã nemã lo ado, lo anĩ kilei ĩ laa fouf, ere nigin, ĩ yogo aya Negur Naal yedig.”
Od enei Pailat karĩ ye fen, fatuk bagai kumĩ yen.
Ĩ baban fõ aaben kel ile fen, Jesus to fiyen, “Õ nain tamal?” Anĩ ere, Jesus aiten to yalen.
Pailat Jesus irokenen, “Õ aya od to urokanauf de? Aya õ kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnõya nigin megeir ado, õ aa tetek bun inõya nigineg megeir ado anĩ, õ keleĩ sã de?”
Jesus solof iron, “Ilun tamal megeir õ to ifonom are, aya ogon megeir farumen to abodom. Anĩ nigin, tamo taka ĩ aya õ imã bun inenan, ĩ yogon mosor odug bagai, ogon wal fiya.”
Jesus Pailat age fiyẽ di, Pailat Jesus kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalisnẽf nigin, naab imiren, anĩ ere, Juda tamo idi diweig diron, “Õ tamo enei utornẽ di, ilauf are, õ Sisa nẽ mou sã. Taka ĩ yogo anĩ king yef, ĩ Sisa kiwai ifenek.”
Pailat od enei karĩ ye fen, Jesus serẽ yale irou isi fen, es fiya tamo nẽ sia, Meein Bedu dedig modoũ bun ibodon (Meein Bedu are, Hibru od nem yana Gabata).
Naa are Pasa Sifa nigin dodok fiya naa, gaa atun age fiya, naa anĩ ilele di, Pasa naa wõ youf. Pailat Juda tamo idi irokenẽdin, “Ãgenei king yeir.”
Anĩ ere, idi diweig diron, “Uru uraile! Uru uraile! Aa tetek bun ũ!” Pailat to fen, “Aya ãgenei king aa tetek bun aũf de?” Pris odudug solo de diron, “Amã king taka sã, Sisa dogol.”
Anĩ nigin, Pailat Jesus aa tetek bun dũf nigin, idi imeid bun inon. Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo Jesus dalen.
Ĩ yogon aa tetek faali fe, modoũ Mudur Tuwan (Hibru od nem Golgota dedig) iselen.
An idi Jesus aa tetek bun dun, tamo uru idig, ĩ geid aa tetek bun didenen, idi urom si sitakã, Jesus atun.
Pailat irõ di, eig de ditot fen, aa tetek bun degẽ difen: JESUS NASARET TAMAL, JUDA NEID KING.
Juda tamo kayau musei itotoya enei diwesen, ere nigin, Jesus aa tetek bun dun modoũ are taun non. Itotoya are Hibru od nem, Rom od nem, Grik od nem.
Juda neid pris odudug Pailat dirokenen, “To ‘Juda neid King’ wo utot, anĩ ere, tamo enei yogo aya Juda neid king yen, ago utot.”
Pailat aitedin yale iron, “Ereb aya atoton, are de agef ibodõf.”
Sain kusĩ tamo Jesus aa tetek bun du ken, Jesus nẽ kolos gei difeid, aiwa adodo foi difen, are teke tekelei kusĩ tamo mugu mugum gei difen, kolos meluk ilon tamal dogol foi fiya sã. Kolos are meluk tekelei tokõ feleya diwan.
Idi abob dirokenen, “Ada anĩ to serek tafouf, ada aisaĩ tara ken, aibem yalouf anĩ tailauf.” Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok anĩ kisi falauf nigin, agef wõ yen, “Neu kolos idi atun foi difeid fen, neu kolos meluk nigin aisaĩ diran.” Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo idi enei age difen.
Jesus nẽ aa tetek sirin, Jesus sina, sina nẽ tura, Maria Kolopas aiwa, Maria Magdala tamal an difaren.
Sain Jesus mala irã, sina ado in dõ fiya tamo taka ĩ nigin wau laa fedig non difar mog, ileid fen, Jesus ĩ sina irokenen, “Kayau, õ naal yeir.”
Age ye fen, Jesus yogon dõ fiya tamo irokenen, “Enei ogon sinã.” Naa anĩ bunem ilen, dõ fiya tamo enei sinawau yale, yogon fõ bun iroule, kulatun fiyen.
Anĩ dumen, Jesus keleĩ, ereb ereb ganan mogo gama bure felel, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok anĩ kisi falauf nigin, Jesus iron, “Aya naan ail fiyaf.”
Wain makik yag ado an ibodon, idi spons dale, wain bun nu dife, aa hisop were bun dino fen, dales, Jesus sigoron dinon.
Jesus wain makik anĩ yale fen, iron, “Gama bure.” Age yel fen, guyu kureis, yogon uur itoron.
Gama naa are dodok fiya nẽ, we fele di, are Sabat naa, Sabat anĩ are, uub odug. Juda tamo idi, Sabat naa bun, bouweid aa tetek bun ifareya ditorõdig, anĩ nigin, idi yeid weweur difeid, bouweid gei difalaisiyouf nigin, Pailat dirokenen.
Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo disin, tamo taka ket ye weweur difen, takag age difen, idi Jesus geid, aa tetek bun didenen anidi.
Anĩ ere, idi Jesus wagen disi fen, ĩ mogo laa fen anĩ dilen, anĩ nigin, idi ĩ ye to weweur difen.
Anĩ fotokar, kusĩ tamo takam, ot nem Jesus siri gilĩ fe di, naud naan ado fi felen.
Tamo enei ilen im wogõ yen, yogon wogõya are momoi, ĩ keleĩ, ĩ momoi wogõ yef, are ãg momoi gouf nigin wogõ yef.
Negur nẽ Itotoya enei kisi falauf nigin agef wõ yen, “Yogon tuwa taka to were fouf,”
agef fen, Negur nẽ Itotoya takag irok, “Idi siri gilĩ difen tamo ĩ, idim dilouf.”
Anĩ dum, Josef Arimatea tamal, Jesus bouwa buru yalouf nigin Pailat irokenen. Josef ĩ, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tamo taka, anĩ ere, ĩ Juda tamo nigin kumĩ ye fen, iminẽyan Jesus dõ fen. Pailat yo ye di, ĩ isi, Jesus bouwa yalen.
Josef ĩ Nikodemus ado fen, disin, kulu tamo anim, bõ Jesus gein ilen. Nikodemus ĩ, marasin yana mer (myrrh) aloi (aloe) ado falei difen anĩ iroulen, anĩ nẽ morõ teti kilogram age fiya.
Idi urom Jesus bouwa dale, marasin ado gabar lalau nem filu difen. Juda neid tamo mũ fiya tobonunã bunem age difen.
Jesus aa tetek bun dun nẽ modoũ an, kabĩ taka ado, kabier an, ku mata taka ado, taka an to goro difen.
Naa are Juda neid dodok fiya nẽ naa nigin ado, tokõ kug melsã nigin, idi Jesus an goro difen.
Uub nẽ naa matu Sande bun, bonimei bagai gugum ado, Maria Magdala tamal matmat bun ile fen, mala irã, bobog bun meein yaleleya ilen.
Anĩ kayau, Simon Pita, dõ fiya taka Jesus ĩ nigin wau laa fedig anidi gedin gudu ref ile, irokenẽdin, “Idi Odug matmat bun tamal dale diroulen, ĩ nain be dinon, ada keleĩ sã!”
Anĩ nigin, Pita, dõ fiya tamo taka ado, matmat bun dilen.
Urom gududu den, anĩ ere, dõ fiya tamo takam Pita wal fe, ĩ ket matmat bun wõ yen.
Ĩ iti ken, fai yen, gabar lalau filu difen anĩ an yen mog, ilen, anĩ ere, ĩ kuren to ilen.
Age fe di, Simon Pita dum dõ fiyen, wõ ye fen, tokõ fel, matmat kuren ile, gabar lalau filu difen an yen mog, ilen,
mũ difen gabar Jesus mudur sile difen anĩg ilen. Mudur sile difen gabar are, yogo fire kori fel, gabar lalau filu difen anĩ firen ibodon.
Age fe di, dõ fiya tamo taka, ĩ ket matmat bun wõ yen ĩg, kuren ilen. Ĩ ile fen, momoi yen.
(Jesus laa bun tamal kel fã youf ya, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek anĩ, idi fau wedereid fokõya sã.)
Age de fen, dõ fiya tar, nedi fõ bun ke de dilen.
Anĩ ere, Maria matmat serẽ inã yalef ifaren. Ĩ inã ado inã ado iti ken, matmat namen fai yen.
Agef fen, ĩ, engel uru kolos lalau adodo, Jesus yenen modoũ bun dibod mog, iledin, taka muduren, taka yen.
Idi ĩ to difiyen, “Kayau, õ ere nigin inã walef?” Maria iron, “Idi neu Odug dale diroulen, ĩ nain be dinon anĩ, aya keleĩ sã.”
Age ye fen, ĩ falei yel, Jesus an ifar mog ilen, anĩ ere, are Jesusem ya anĩ to kelein.
Jesus iron, “Kayau, õ ere nigin inã walef? Õ ai anĩ umirnek?” Maria kisi fen, ĩ kabĩ lo fedig anim ye fen, irokenen, “Tamo biya, onom ĩ wale uroulen ouf are, nain be unon anĩ, aya urokana di, aya ĩ alouf.”
Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Maria.” Maria ĩ falei yel, Jesus wage ifen ken, Hibru od nem irokenen, “Raboni!” (anĩ nẽ gariya, Tise).
Jesus iron, “Aya to urouna, ere nigin, aya Dei gein fau kel iseleya sã. Anĩ ere, neu turau tar gedin ule urokeneĩd, ‘Aya neu Dei, ãgenei Temeĩ, neu Negur, ãgenei Negur bun kelau eselauf.’”
Anĩ nigin, Maria Magdala tamal, in dõ fiya tar gedin ile irokenẽdin, “Aya Odug ailel!” Age ye fen, Maria Jesus od enei irokenen anĩ, idi wogõ fiyẽdin.
Uub nẽ naa matu Sande aragau anĩ bun, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar, Juda tamo nigin kumĩ de fen, sukar kotũ difel, aaben guru de dibod mog, Jesus isi, idi atun ifar fen, iron, “Wau inosiya ã ado ibodõf!”
Od enĩ irokel fen, ĩ ima siri ado idi ifelnẽdin. In dõ fiya tar idi, Odug dile fen, fatuk bagai kulĩ den.
Jesus baban iron, “Wau inosiya ã ado ibodõf! Dei aya sur fiyan gen, ayag ã sur ayeik.”
Age ye fen, idi bun fuu fiyeĩd fen, iron, “Awa Uur Fateul waleg.
Ã, tamo neid mosor nigin, wedereĩ tu kalauf are, idi neid mosor nigin weder tu kelef, ã idi neid mosor nigin, wedereĩ to tu kalauf are, idi neid mosor nigin weder to tu kelef.”
Anĩ ere, Jesus in dõ fiya tar meleid bun wõ yen sain, tuwelf idi neid taka Tomas (yana taka Didimus), idi geid to ibodon.
Anĩ nigin, dõ fiya tar tunim ĩ dirokenen, “Amã Odug mailen!” Anĩ ere, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Aya yogon ima bun tuti ba to ailauf, aya imau gege tuti ba bun to ano fen, aya imau siri bun to anouf, aya to momoi auf.”
Uub tekelei ilele di, in dõ fiya tar baban fõ bun dibodon, are Tomas geid. Sukar kotũ difedin, anĩ ere, Jesus isi, idi atun ifar fen, iron, “Wau inosiya ã ado ibodõf!”
Agef fen, Jesus Tomas irokenen, “Ogon imã gege ein uno, neu imau uleid. Imã urã siru bun uno. Waũ to ilef isif fouf, momoi dogol wo.”
Tomas Jesus irokenen, “Neu Odug, neu Negur!”
Age ye di, Jesus Tomas irokenen, “Õ malam aya uleyaf nigin, momoi wof. Idi meledim to dile fen, momoi def, are el fedif.”
Jesus, in dõ fiya tar meleid bun, memelik musei inodin, are buk enei bun itotoya san.
Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ Kristus, Negur Naal anĩ ã momoi ge fen, ĩ yana nigin momoiya bunem, ã mata walogouf nigin enei itoton.
Anĩ dum, Jesus baban in dõ fiya tar gedin, Taiberias daliyoun wõ yen. Anĩ eig fe wõ yen.
Simon Pita, Tomas (yana taka Didimus), Nataniel Kana tamal Galili teneub bun, Sebedi gere tar ado, dõ fiya tar uru anidim guru de dibodon.
Simon Pita idi irokenẽdin, “Aya gau nigin ayõ fenẽ.” Idi diron, “Amãg õ geid talauf.” Anĩ idi dile, waag bun sosõ den, anĩ ere, bõ anĩ bun, gau taka to dalen.
Bonimei bagai, Jesus maaĩ yerin ifaren, anĩ ere, dõ fiya tar idi, Jesusem ya anĩ to kelein.
Ĩ idi iweig irokenẽdin, “Mou tar, ã gau taka tau walegel?” Idi aiten dalen, “Sã.”
Ĩ irokenẽdin, “Waag siri biya melem kakãg urãg fen, tunĩ gei gouf.” Idi age difen sain, idi kakãg dĩ fiya kisi feleya san, ere nigin, gau musei biya.
Anĩ in dõ fiya tamo Jesus ĩ nigin wau laa fedig ĩ, Pita irokenen, “Are Odugem!” Ĩ, “Are Odugem,” ye di, Simon Pita karĩ ye fen, ĩ kolos teten tamal inũ inon anĩ yale, luwa guf fen, naanũ ifũ iran.
In dõ fiya tar tunĩ ganan, waag bun disi, kakãg gau isokosen ado dĩ de dilen, ere nigin, are idi daliyou yeri gerõ sã, handred mita age fiya.
Sain idi kutũ desin, yã kaureya anĩ bun, gau yã bẽ bret tunĩ ado dilen.
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã gau gama bagai walegel tunĩ urousig.”
Simon Pita waag sõ ye fen, kakãg dĩ falaisi, maaĩ yerin irousin. Kakãg are gau odudug isokosen, gau are 153, gai musei biya, anĩ ere, kakãg to kokour fen.
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Usig, saaf wõg.” In dõ fiya tar kukĩ de fen, takam ĩ to, to fiyen, “Õ aim?” Idi keleĩ, are Odug yogo.
Jesus isi, bret yale fen, idi ifenẽdin, gaug de age fen.
Jesus laa bun tamal kel fã ye fen, in dõ fiya tar meleid bun wõ yen are, gama eneim towo fen.
Sain idi saaf dakas fen, Jesus Simon Pita irokenen, “Simon Jon naal, õ aya nigin fatuk waũ laa fef, tunĩ eneidi neid wal fiya de?” Pita iron, “Odug, momoi, õ keleĩ, aya õ nigin wau laa fef.” Jesus iron, “Neu sipsip momou ufoutneĩd.”
Baban Jesus iron, “Simon Jon naal, õ aya nigin waũ laa fef de?” Pita solof iron, “Odug, momoi, õ keleĩ, aya õ nigin wau laa fef.” Jesus iron, “Neu sipsip kulatun wiyẽdiyouf.”
Jesus Pita iroken towo fe fen, iron, “Simon Jon naal, õ aya nigin waũ laa fef de?” Pita wau moron, ere nigin, Jesus ĩ to fiyẽ towo fen, “Õ aya nigin waũ laa fef de?” Pita iron, “Odug, ereb ereb ganan õ keleĩ, õ keleĩ, aya õ nigin wau laa fef.” Jesus iron, “Neu sipsip ufoutneĩd.
Aya õ momoi bagai arokonok, sain õ gaun, õ naki rel, ogon oroya dõ fen uledig, anĩ ere, sain õ tubau bun, imã walese di, taka nem ifõyo ken, õ to oroyok nẽ an irouleyõf.”
Pita naig be fe, laaf fen, Negur fula fiya medeĩya ifenẽf anĩ nigin, Jesus od enei iron. Age ye fen, Jesus Pita irokenen, “Aya dõ wiya!”
Pita falei yel fen, dõ fiya taka Jesus ĩ nigin wau laa fedig anĩ, dõ feid mog, ilen. (Tamo enei bõ saaf yõya bun, Jesus akoron mudur isen ken, iron, “Odug, aim anĩ õ kiwai ifonõf?”)
Sain Pita tamo anĩ ile fen, Jesus to fiyen, “Odug, tamo enei ĩ naig fouf?”
Jesus solof irokenen, “Tamo enei mata ibod mog, aya kelauf anĩ aya orouf aufeg, õ nigin ere yok? Õ de aya dõ wiyauf.”
Enei nigin, dõ fiya tar idi atun, od enei iyokelen, are dõ fiya tamo enei to laa fouf den. Anĩ ere, Jesus, tamo anĩ to laa fouf ya nigin to iron, Jesus ĩ eig ye iron, “Tamo enei mata ibod mog, aya kelauf anĩ aya orouf aufeg, õ nigin ere yok?”
In dõ fiya tamo enei, anĩ ganan wogõ ye fen, itoton. Amã keleĩ, in od are momoi.
Jesus ĩ ereb ereb museig age fen. Aya kisi afef, anĩ ganan buk bun ditotlem are, teneub ganan bun modoũ sam.
Teofilus, uruwa buk aya atoton anĩ bun, Jesus gariya ino, ereb ereb age fen ado ifelnẽdif ile,
aposel ĩ igirnẽdin anidi Awa Uur Fateul bunem faded fiye keleid fen, Jesus saa ilun iselen nẽ naa bun, aya anĩ ganan nigin atoton.
Ĩ darau yale fen, laa fen, mata kel fã ye fen, tamo eneidi meleid bun wõ yen, agef fen, idi ĩ mata ibodok ya anĩ momoi douf nigin, ereb ereb musei age fen. Naa foti anĩ namen, ĩ idi meleid bun wõ ye fen, Negur tano nigin wogõ fiyẽdin.
Jesus idi geid saaf doko dibod ken, ĩ idi eig ye fadim yukenẽdin, “Ã Jerusalem to utorõgouf, anĩ ere, ereb aya wogõ au di, karĩ gen, are neu Dei ereb sur afouf yen anĩ tari gouf.
Are Jon ĩ naan nem dogol igunein, anĩ ere, naa tunĩ ilele di, ã Awa Uur Fateulem naan iguneĩf.”
Anĩ nigin, sain idi takai guru de dibod ken, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Odug, õ sain enei bun, Israel neid tano baban unouf de?”
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Are Dei ĩ yogon megeir bunem, sain nanĩ be naa inon ibodok anĩ, ã to keleĩ youf.
Anĩ ere, ã fau sain Awa Uur Fateul ã bun isiyouf are, megeir walogouf, agog fen, ã aya age afen anĩ nigin wogõg fen, Jerusalem bun, Judia distrik ado Samaria distrik ganan bun ile, teneub idikeleya buneg, aya nigin wogõ gouf.”
Ĩ enei irokel fen, idi meleid bun bagai, ĩ yale irou iselen, ĩ lalo bun iminkele di, to dilen.
Jesus isele di, idi saa ilun ditad se, lo difef den mog, kaisã bagai tamo uru kolos lalau adodo, idi siridin difaren.
Idi diron, “Galili tamo ã, ere nigin ein ufareg utadseg fen, saa ilun lo gef? Jesus enei ã bun tamal yale irou, saa ilun iselel, ã ĩ saa ilun isel mog, ulegel kilei bagai, agef ĩ kel isiyouf.”
Age de fen, idi Moul Arei dedig bun tamal, Jerusalem keku de dilen, Moul Areinem Jerusalem ileya are wan kilomita age fiya, anĩ nigin, Sabat naa bun iyõya kisi feleya.
Sain idi Jerusalem wõ de fen, idi aab ilun dibodõdig nẽ an diselen, idi eneidim, Pita, Jon, Jems, Endru, Filip, Tomas, Batolomyu, Matyu, Jems Alfeus naal, Simon Selot taka, Judas Jems naal.
Idi ganan guru de, waud tekelei dino fen, toku kosẽ dedig, kayau tunĩ geid, Maria Jesus sina, Jesus tura tar geid.
Sain anĩ bun, Pita, momoiya tamo kayau handred tuwenti age fiya idi atun, ifar fen, iron,
“Turau tar, kulu Awa Uur Fateulem Dawid sigoron, Judas ĩ tamo uyu iroukenẽdi di, Jesus dalen ĩ nigin wogõ yen anĩ, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok, are de agef kisi felen.
Ĩ amã nemã taka, ĩ amã weim kabĩ enei malen.”
(Judas yogon sane bunem moni yale fen, teneub taka na yalen, an ĩ kubũ ye mudur iten ken, yogon bouwa faraf fen, te galelei adok ulõ yesin.
Age fe di, tamo kayau Jerusalem dibodon anĩ ganan, od anĩ karĩ den, anĩ nigin, teneub anĩ, dogo neid od nem yana dũ Akeldama den, anĩ nẽ gariya, Naud Teneub.)
Pita wogõ tobol fe, irokeneg iron, “Buk Sam bun eig ye itoton, “‘Yogon modoũ are fonou inouf, an taka nem to ibodõf,’ takag, “‘Taka nem ĩ fotokar yogon kabĩ yalouf.’
Anĩ nigin, Odug Jesus ada atun kabĩ yale ilef isif mog,
Jon naan igunẽdin sain bunem ile, Jesus ada bun tamal, yale irou iselen sain bun, sain ganan ada weim tabodon anidi taka tagirnẽf. Are idi eneidi atun, takam Jesus mata kel fãya nigin, ada geid od wogõ tauf.”
Anĩ nigin, idi tamo uru dinenẽdin, Josef Basabas dedig (yana taka Jastus), taka Matias.
Age de fen, idi kosẽ de fen, diron, “Odug, tamo ganan neid waud õ keleĩ, uru eneidi bun, õ aib ugirin anĩ ufelnamã,
are Judas ĩ itor ken, yogon modoũ bun ilen anĩ, ĩ fotokar aposel kabĩ yalouf nigin.”
Age de fen, idi aisaĩ dira ken, aisaĩ Matias wagen kubũ yen, anĩ bunem, Matias ĩ aposel ilewen baguf weimen.
Sain Pentikos naa isi di, idi ganan modoũ tekelei bun, guru de dibodon.
Idi an dibod mog, kaisã bagai, ait yau totol ado gugu redig gen, saa ilun tamal isi fen, fõ aab ino yalen.
Idi ereb yã bale gen isi di, dile mog, fara furu feid, idi mugu mugu tetedin ibodon.
Age fe di, idi ganan Awa Uur Fateulem aura fiyẽdi di, gariya dino, od fire fire bunem wogõ den, Awa Uurem fiyẽdi di, age difen.
Sain anĩ bun, Juda tamo Negur nigin momoi den idi, teneub ganan bun temeleid disi, Jerusalem dibodon.
Sain idi ait anĩ karĩ de fen, tamo kayau musei idi nene de fen, guru difen, ere nigin, idi mugu mugu dogo neid od bun wogõ den anĩ karĩ den.
Idi fatuk bagai terẽ de fen, diron, “Tamo od wogõ def eneidi ganan, Galili temeleid sã de?
Naig fe di, ada mugu mugu, idi neda od bunem wogõ de di, karĩ tauf?
Ada fire firen temelada, Patia, Media, Elam kantri, Mesopotamia, Judia distrik, Kapadosia, Pontus, Asia provins,
Frigia, Pamfilia distrik, Isip kantri ado Libia distrik tunĩ Sairini taun non. Amã tunĩ Rom kantri temelamã, Juda temeleid ado haiden Juda neid momoiya bun falei maun,
Krit nuyo ado Arabia distrik. Ada mugu mugu neda od bun, Negur kabĩ odug age fen anĩ wogõ de di, karĩ tauf.”
Idi terẽ de nene de fen, abob toti difen, “Eĩ ere gariya nigin?”
Anĩ ere, tunĩ idi weli difiyeĩd diron, “Idi wain fatuk domõ.”
Pita aposel ilewen geid difar fen, ait odugem tamo kayau wogõ fiyẽdin, “Juda tamo kayau ado ã ganan Jerusalem ubodõgef, utorõg len, aya ã enei faded ayeĩf, kee releg fen, aya wogõ auf anĩ karĩg.
Ã kisi gef, tamo eneidi wain domõ gef, age fiya sã, gama eĩ nain kilok bonimei!
Anĩ ere, eĩ are Profet Joel eig ye wogõ yen:
“‘Negur irok, idikeleya naa bun, aya neu Awa Uur, tamo kayau ganan bun gõ afalauf. Age afe di, ãgenei kesu, kayau momoul ado, profet od wogõ douf, ãgenei tamo gaũ meleid bun seleulã kurã fouf, ãgenei tamo tubau dimĩdiyouf.
Neu ferfer tamo ado kayau geid buneg, aya neu Awa Uur naa anĩ bun gõ afalaisi di, idi profet od wogõ douf.
Aya saa ilun, memelik fire fire afelnẽdiyouf, tenebur ein uris anodiyouf. Naud, yã ado, kaau tubutubuya wõ youf.
Odug nẽ Naa odug fula fiya medeĩya ado, fau to isi mog, gaa gugum kele fen, ogõ naud gen wõ youf.
Age fe di, aib taka ĩ, Odug yana yale iweignẽf are, Odug ĩ kel yalouf.’
“Israel tamo kayau, od enei karĩg, ã aug keleĩ, Negur ã atun, Jesus Nasaret tamal bunem memelik, ereb urug bagai ado, uris inodin, anĩ bunem Jesus ĩ Negurem sur fiyen anĩ, Negur ã ifelnein.
Tamo enei nigin, Negurem ereb ereb wõya sã mog, yogon keleĩ ado kisi bunem, ĩ ã imeĩ bun inon, age fe di, ã tamo sesenem disenneĩ di, ĩ laa fouf nigin, aa tetek bun tuti nem ũgen.
Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ laa bun tamal turĩ fe di, mata kel fã yen, laa nẽ darau bun tamal yalelnen, ere nigin, laa anim ĩ irounẽya kisi feleya sã.
Are Dawid ĩ nigin iron: “‘Odug sain faimud malau bun ifar mog, ailedig. Ĩ aya imau biyalem ibodok nigin, aya to kumĩ au fen, terẽ auf.
Anĩ nigin, neu wau seref fen, sigorou seli abidig, aya, ereb Negur aya bun biya age fouf anĩ tari afedig,
ere nigin, õ neu malaukanon to utornẽ di, bouwau laa neid modoũ bun ibodõf, õ ogon Fateuleg to utorõ di, bura lauf.
Õ mata bun ileya nẽ naab ufelna fen, õ malã bun kulĩya barikã wiyauf.’
“Turau tar, aya ã yaor arokeneik, tubuda Dawid ĩ laa fe di, mũ difen. Yogon matmat, ada atun naa enei bun fau ibodok.
Anĩ ere, ĩ profet taka, anĩ nigin, ĩ keleĩ, Negur wau kuturol fen, Dawid yogon ibor nẽ tubu tar bun tamal taka, yogon king nẽ sia bun inenẽf nigin irokenen.
Dawid ĩ ereb fau wõya sã mog, anĩ tetunem ile fen, Kristus mata kel fã youf nigin eig ye wogõ yen, ‘Ĩ laa neid modoũ bun to ibodõf, ĩ bouwag to bura lauf,’ yen.
Negur Jesus enei turĩ fe di, ĩ mata kel fã yen anĩ, amã ganan mailen.
Negur ĩ ima biyalem yalesnẽ di, Jesus ĩ, Tama bun Awa Uur Fateul Negur afeneĩf yen anĩ yale fen, fi felen, are ã gama ulegef ado karĩ gef anĩ.
Dawid saa ilun to iselen, anĩ ere, ĩ iron, “‘Negur neu Odug irokenen: “Imau biya melem ubod mog,
ogon kiwai tar ogon ye inoya nẽ sawa anodiyouf.” ’
“Anĩ nigin, Israel tamo kayau ganan enei keleĩ bagai youf, Jesus enei ã aa tetek bun ukesigen anĩ, Negur yogo, Odug ado Kristus inenen.”
Tamo kayau od enei karĩ de fen, idi waud gudũ fe di, Pita aposel tunĩ ganan geid dirokenẽdin, “Turamã tar, amã naig mafouf?”
Pita solof irokenẽdin, “Ã mugu mugu wauĩ falei wog fen, Jesus yana bunem naan iguneĩ di, ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kalauf, ago ge di, ege luwa are Awa Uur Fateul walogouf.
Promis od are ãgenei, ãgenei kesu tar ado, idi gerõ difaref ani ganan neid, are Odug neda Negur iweignẽdiyouf anĩ ganan neid.”
Age ye fen, Pita od musei bun, idi wedereid irou fen, totol irokenẽdin, “Ã aug isenneĩf nigin, tamo kayau sane sain enei bun tamal urab uraileg.”
Yogon od dalen idi naan igunẽdin, age dife di, naa anĩ bun, tri tausen tamo kayau age fiya, idi neid bun tobol difen.
Idi aposel neid ifelnẽdiya, uyu kũ fiya, saaf weim yõya, kosẽya bun, idi neid kisi adok dino fen, age difen.
Tamo kayau ganan terẽ de inid ifitin. Age dife di, aposel idi, uris ado memelik musei dinon.
Momoiya tamo kayau ganan weim dibod ken, safineid ganan gadõ difedig.
Safineid na nigin sur difeid fen, taka ĩ lau fef anĩ difenẽdig.
Naa ganan idi toku waud tekelei fen, tempel modoũ bun guru difedig. Idi dogo neid fõ fõ bun, kulĩya ado waud adok an yen ken, weim saaf dõdig.
Idi Negur yana dalesedig, tamo kayau ganan, idi nigin biya difiyẽdidig, age dife di, Odug naa ganan bun, tamo kayau kel gei feid fen, idi neid bun tobol fedig.
Naa taka bun, Pita Jon ado, tri kilok aragau kosẽya sain nigin, tempel bun diselen.
Tamo taka sina namen ye ilolaisin gõ fen, tempel bobog yana ‘Meli Bagai’ dedig an faali de diroulen, an naa ganan bun dinenẽ di, ibod ken, tempel bun dilef anidi moni nigin nonĩ fiyẽdidig.
Sain Pita Jon ado, tempel namen dilau fenẽ age dife di, ileid fen, moni nigin irokenẽdin.
Anĩ ere, Pita Jon ado, ĩ lo difel fen, Pita iron, “Amã lo wamã!”
Age ye di, ĩ ereb difanauf ye fen, lo feidlen.
Age fe di, Pita iron, “Silwa be gol are aya sã, anĩ ere, ereb aya ado anĩ, õ afonok, are Jesus Kristus Nasaret tamal yana bunem uyõ.”
Age ye fen, Pita tamo ima biyalẽ yale iroune ken, isennẽ yalesnen, kaisã bagai tamo nẽ ye guyu totoledin.
Ĩ gurusã ye ifar fen, iyõya gariya inon. Agef fen, ĩ weim tempel namen dilen, iyõ, gurusã ye fen, Negur yana yalesen.
Tamo kayau ganan ĩ iyo ken, Negur yana yalese di, dile fen,
idi, im bagai tempel bobog yana ‘Meli Bagai’ dedig bun ibod ken, nonĩ yedig den. Idi ĩ bun ereb wõ yen anĩ nigin, fatuk bagai terẽ de fen, inid ifitin.
Solomon nẽ Waranda dedig an, nonĩya tamo anĩ, Pita Jon ado irounẽdi di, tamo kayau ganan terẽ de fen, gududu de, idi gedin disin.
Pita anĩ ile fen, idi irokenẽdin, “Israel tamo, ere nigin eneim ã terẽ yeik de? Ere nigin nemã megeir bunem be, nemã Negur aniniya bunem, tamo enei el mafiyen gen amã lo wamãglef?
Abraham, Isak, Jakop idi neid Negur, tubuda tar neid Negur im, yogon kabĩ tamo Jesus fula fiya medeĩya ifenen. Ã ĩ dukesiyouf nigin wenẽdig fen, Pailat ĩ itornẽ di, ilauf nigin kisi ino mog, ã Pailat mala bun ĩ nigin wa gen.
Ã, ĩ Fateul Madur tamo anĩ wag fen, tamo yukesiya tamo anĩ yaliskeneĩf nigin urokenẽgen.
Ã mata nẽ gariya anĩ ukesigen, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ laa bun tamal yalesnen. Amã enei mailen nigin wogõ mauf.
Jesus yana nigin momoiya bunem, Jesus yana anim, tamo enei ã kelei ken, ulegedig anĩ totol ifenem. Momoiya ĩ bunem isif anim, tamo enei ã ganan log mog, el fiye kelel.
“Turau tar, aya keleĩ, ã ãgenei uyu irouya geid, keleĩ sã nigin ago gen.
Anĩ ere, enei wõya sã mog, Negur profet ganan bun wogõ yen, are yogon Kristus darau yalouf bagai, anĩ Negurem agef kisi felen.
Anĩ nigin, wauĩ falei ge fen, Negur bun uleg, anĩ bunem ãgenei mosor isasalauf. Ago gouf, wauĩ mata wõya nẽ sain Odug bunem isi fen,
Negur, Kristus ã nigin igirin, are Jesus sur fouf.
Jesus fau de saa ilun ibod mog, Negur ereb ereb ganan mata inouf nẽ sain wõ youf, kulu yogon profet fateul sigoreid bun Negur wogõ yen kilei.
Moses iron, ‘Odug ãgenei Negur, profet taka aya gen, tamo kayau ã atun wõ ye keneĩf. Ã ereb irokeneĩf ganan, karĩ gouf bagai.
Taka nem profet anĩ to karĩ fiyẽf, ĩ tamo kayau atun gai gai gudũf irailauf.’
“Age fiya gen, profet ganan Samuel bun gariya ino fen, isin idig, gama naa eneidi bun ereb wowã yef isin anĩ nigin wogõ den.
Ã profet neid gere tar, Negur ãgenei tubuĩ tar geid bar itenẽya inon, ã bar itenẽya anĩ nẽ gere tar. Negur Abraham irokenen, ‘Ogon ibor bunem, tamo kayau teneub ganan bun el fediyouf.’
Negur yogon kabĩ tamo yalesne ken, ãgenei sane bun tamal, ã mugu mugu ganan falei ge di, el yeĩf nigin, ã bun ket Jesus sur fen.”
Pita Jon ado, tamo kayau od dirokeneĩd mog, pris tunĩ, tempel lo fiya tamo neid mudur, Sadusia tamo tunĩ geid, idi gedin disin.
Idi fatuk bagai waud moron, ere nigin, aposel idi tamo kayau difelneĩd fen, Jesus laa bun tamal mata kel fã yen anĩ wogõ den.
Idi Pita Jon ado dirouneĩd fen, aragau nigin idi kalabus bun dinenẽdi di, ile we felen.
Anĩ ere, od karĩ den idi musei momoi den, momoiya tamo faif tausen age fiya wõ den.
Naa taka di, nedi uyu irouya, mudur adodo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, Jerusalem guru difen.
Pris neid mudur Anas an ibodon, Kaiafas, Jon, Aleksanda, pris mudur neid ibor tunĩ ganan idig an dibodon.
Idi Pita Jon ado guri de dirousi, atũ difeid fen, to difedin, “Ere megeir bunem be, ere yana bunem enei ago gen?”
Age de di, Pita Awa Uur Fateulem aura fiyen ĩ, idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo kayau neid uyu irouya, mudur adodo!
Amã gama, tamo ye ilolaisin bun ereb biya age mafe di, naig fe el fiyen nigin to wamãgouf are,
ã, Israel tamo kayau ganan geid enei keleĩ youf, ã Jesus Kristus Nasaret tamal aa tetek bun ukesigen, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ laa bun tamal yalesnen, ĩ yana bunem, tamo ã meleĩ bun ifaref enei el fiyen.
Tamo are “‘meein fõ inoya tamo ãgem sane ge fen, utorõgen, anĩ gama monog tor wõ yen.’
Taka bun tamo kel gei fiya to ibodok, ere nigin, ada kel gei fadauf nigin, saa farumen yana taka to tamo ifenẽdin.”
Pita Jon ado skul ileya sã, fonõ tamo, are idi kelein, anĩ ere, idi kumĩ sã wogõ de di, dile fen, terẽ den. Age de fen, idi kelein, tamo eneidim Jesus geid diyon.
Anĩ ere, tamo el difiyen anĩ, Pita Jon ado geid difar mog, dilen nigin, idi ereb od irõya nigin od sã.
Anĩ nigin, Juda uyu irouya neid kaunsel guru fiya anĩ ditor dilauf nigin, idi dirokeneĩd, ditor dile di, idi dogo dogol katõ difen.
Idi diron, “Tamo eneidi ere naig tafiyẽdiyouf? Idi memelik enei fire bagai dinon anĩ, Jerusalem dibodok idi ganan keleĩ, are ada wa fiya kisi feleya sã.
Anĩ ere, enei, tamo kayau bun to iyokalauf nigin, tamo eneidi Jesus yana bunem taka to wogõ difiyẽf nigin, ada wedereid tarouwauf bagai.”
Age de fen, idi baban namen diweigneĩd, disi di, Jesus yana bunem to bagai wogõ douf be difelnẽdiyouf nigin, totol bagai dirokenẽdin.
Anĩ ere, Pita Jon ado solo de dirokenẽdin, “Negur mala bun, Negur dõ fiya ban, ã dõ mayeĩf, are tutuk de, sã de anĩ, ã aug es wog.
Ereb amã mailen, karĩ maun nigin, sigoramã ifõya kisi feleya sã.”
Uyu irouya idi baban kumĩ od difeneĩd le fen, folõ difeid le di, dilen. Uyu irouya idi darau ifenẽdiya nigin kisi taka to dalen, ere nigin, tamo kayau ganan ereb wõ yen anĩ nigin, Negur yana dalesen.
Tamo memelik dino fen, el difiyen are, yar foti wal feseya.
Sain Pita Jon ado dalisnẽdi di, idi dogo neid tamo kayau bun keku de dile fen, pris odudug mudur adodo geid, od dirokenẽdin anĩ ganan wogõ difiyẽdin.
Idi od anĩ karĩ de fen, idi aiteid tekelei dales fen, Negur kosẽ difiyẽ diron, “Odug ereb ereb ganan nẽ Marau, õ saa, teneub, maaĩ, anidi namen ereb ereb ganan unodin.
Tamamã Dawid, ogon kabĩ tamo sigor bun Awa Uur Fateulem wogõ won: “‘Ere nigin haiden idi Odug bun seye de fen, tamo kayau idi kiwai nẽ kisi are ege bagai dinof?
Tenebur nẽ king idi kusĩya nigin dodok difef, uyu irouya tamo guru de fen, Odug bun ado yogon Kristus bun kiwai dinof.’
Momoi, Herod, Pontius Pailat idim, haiden, Israel tamo kayau geid, taun enei bun guru de fen, ogon kabĩ tamo fateul Jesus õ ogo ugirin ĩ kiwai difenen.
Õ ogon megeir ado oroya bunem agef wõ youf wo fen, tetun ufon anĩ kilei, idi age difen.
Odug, gama idi dogo neid kumĩ od dinon anĩ kisi fen, amã ogon ferfer, ogon od kumĩ sã megeir ado wogõ mauf nigin megeir wanamã.
Imã ura ken, dagi el wo, ago fen, ogon kabĩ tamo fateul Jesus yana bunem memelik uris ado unodiyouf.”
Kosẽ de bure difel mog, idi guru difen nẽ modoũ anĩ guyoyõ fen. Age fe di, idi ganan Awa Uur Fateulem aura fiyeĩd fen, toli fedi di, kumĩ sã Negur nẽ od wogõ den.
Momoiya tamo kayau ganan waud ado kisi tekelein. Taka nem, yogon safina taka to neu mugu yen, anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan idi ado are weim dile dogolen.
Aposel idi megeir odug nem, Odug Jesus mata kel fã yen nigin wogõ den, age dife di, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya odug, idi ganan bun ibodon.
Age fe di, idi atun taka nem ereb taka to lau fen, ere nigin, teneub be fõ adodo anĩ na nigin sur difeid fen, moni dale dirou disi,
aposel imeid bun dinodig, anĩ gadõ de fen, taka ĩ lau fef anĩ difenẽdig.
Josef, Lewi ibor taka, Saipras nuyo tamal, aposel idi ĩ anĩ Banabas dedig (anĩ nẽ gariya, Wau Yaleya Tamo),
ĩ yogon teneub na nigin sur fe fen, moni yale, aposel imeid bun inon.
Tamo taka yana Ananias, aiwa Safira ado, nedi safina taka na nigin sur difen.
Ĩ, yogon aiwa anĩ ganan keleĩ mog, moni tunĩ yogon nigin irou fen, tunĩ anĩ yale iroule, aposel imeid bun inon.
Age fe di, Pita iron, “Ananias, naig fe di, Satan waũ bun isokose di, Awa Uur Fateul udegne ken, moni teneub nẽ walen anĩ tunĩ ogon nigin urouf?
Fau na sur fiya sã mog are ogonen, na nigin sur wol fen, moni areg ogonek. Ere nigin õ waũ bun enei ago wouf nigin kisi unol? Õ tamo to udegnẽdil, are õ Negur udegnem.”
Ananias od enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ kubũ ye laaf yenen. Ganan od enei karĩ den, idi kumĩ tererẽ den.
Age fe di, tamo gaũ gaũ disi, yogon bouwa sile de, faali de diroule, mũ difen.
Tri aua age fiya ilele di, aiwa gober ereb wõ yen anĩ keleĩ sa ken, isin.
Age fe di, Pita kayau to fiyen, “Urokana, õ aiwã ado teneub nẽ moni de enei kilei walegen de?” Kayau iron, “Ao, de enei kilei dogol.”
Age ye di, Pita kayau irokenen, “Naig fe di, õ aiwã ado wauĩ tekelei fen, Odug nẽ Awa Uur kisi wiyẽgel? Ulef, tamo idi ogon aiwã mũ difel, idi neid yebureid yer bobogẽ, õg idi age de faali de dirouleyõf.”
Agef irokenẽ di, kaisã bagai, Pita ye gariyan, kayau are kubũ ye laa fen. Age fe di, tamo gaũ namen disi, kayau laa fel dile fen, faali de diroule, aiwa mũ difen sirin mũ difen.
Sios adok, tamo kayau ganan od enei karĩ den idi geid, fatuk bagai kumĩ den.
Aposel idi tamo kayau atun memelik uris ado musei dinodin. Age dife di, momoiya tamo kayau ganan Solomon nẽ Waranda bun guru difedig.
Tamo kayau idi nigin yeneid dalesedig, anĩ ere, idi kumĩ de fen, taka nem idi geid to bagu difen.
Anĩ ere, tamo kayau musei Odug nigin momoi de di, momoiya tamo kayau baba baban tobol fef iselen.
Aposel age difef ya anĩ kelei ken, tamo kayau dagi adodo naabur guri difedi di, fatar bun ado gogoũ bun dinenãdin, are Pita ile di, yogon burig idi tunĩ bun irã di, el be fediyouf de fen, age difen.
Tamo kayau musei Jerusalem kalilĩ fiya taun temeleideg, dogo neid dagi adodo, kaa sesenem darau difenẽdin anidi guri de dirou disi di, idi ganan el difiyẽdin.
Age dife di, pris neid mudur ĩ, yogon katõ tura tar are Sadusia tamo geid, kiyeĩ beberĩdin.
Idi aposel dirouneĩd fen, kalabus bun dinenẽdin.
Anĩ ere, bõ anĩ bun, Odug nẽ engel kalabus fõ sukar kã feleid, gurif, mayarẽ disi fen, irokenẽdin,
“Ulagauf, tempel bun ufareg fen, tamo kayau mata enei nẽ od ganan urokenẽdig.”
Idi irokenẽdin kilei, bonimei bagai idi tempel bun dile fen, tamo kayau ifelnẽdiya gariya dinon. Sain pris neid mudur, yogon katõ tura tar geid disi di, idi Israel neid uyu irouya ganan neid guru fiya yana Sanhedrin dedig anĩ diroun, age de fen, idi aposel kalabus bun temeleid guri difeid dirou disiyouf nigin tamo sur difedin.
Anĩ ere, sain kabĩ tamo kalabus fõ bun dilen, aposel an to diledin. Anĩ nigin, idi keku de dile dirokenẽdin,
“Amã kalabus fõ kotũ feleya ado lo fiya tamo bobog bun difar mog, mailedil, anĩ ere, sukar kã mafel fen, an taka nem to ibod mog mailel.”
Od anĩ karĩ de fen, tempel lo fiya tamo neid mudur, pris odudug geid, nene de fen, enei bunem naig be fe wõ youf de fen, sii fedin.
Age de mog, taka nem isi iron, “Ulegef! Tamo kalabus bun unenẽdigen idi tempel bun difar fen, tamo kayau difelnẽdif.”
Age ye di, tempel lo fiya tamo neid mudur, yogon kabĩ tamo geid, dile, aposel gei difeid fen, dirou disin. Idi to sibu difiyeĩd fen, daũ difiyẽdin, ere nigin, idi tamo kayau meein tulu difiyẽdiya nigin kumĩ difiyẽdin.
Idi aposel gei de dirousi, Israel uyu irouya neid guru fiya meleid bun difarnẽdi di, pris neid mudur idi to fiyeĩd
iron, “Amã yana enei bunem to ufelnẽdigouf nigin, totol bagai katũ mayein, anĩ ere, ã wogõ ge di, ã ufelnẽdigen anĩ Jerusalem ganan bun iyokelen, ago ge di, tamo enei nẽ naud amã bouwamã bun unogef.”
Pita aposel ganan geid aiten dale diron, “Amã tamo aiteid dõ fiya ban, Negur ait anĩ dõ mafouf bagai.
Jesus laa fouf nigin aa bun useginnẽgen, anĩ ere, tamada tar neid Negurem Jesus laa bun tamal yalesnen.
