Haiden tamo kayau idi momoi den anidi bun, amã kisi mafon anĩ matotkenẽdin, are idi saaf idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difen anĩ to dãf, yaro naud adodo to dãf, yaro uleid kakã difeid fen, didenkesif anĩ to dãf ado, noli tobonunã bun to dilauf.”
Naa anĩ ile di, Pol tamo anidi geif fen, ĩ yogo weim nonorou lilik difen. Age difel fen, ĩ tempel bun ile, ere sain nonorou lilik fiya naa bure fele di, idi mugu mugu sesewi difouf anĩ, pris keleĩ youf nigin irokenẽdin.
Naa sewen anĩ bure falau fenẽ mog, Juda tamo tunĩ Asia provins temeleid idi, tempel bun Pol dilen. Idi tamo ganan waud dalese di, seye de fen, Pol dale,
diweig diron, “Israel tamo, usennamãg! Tamo enei anĩ, neda tamo kayau, neda lo ado, modoũ enei nigin, od sane teneub ganan bun, tamo ganan ifelnẽdidig. Takag, ĩ Grik tamo tempel modoũ bun gurif isi di, fateul modoũ enei amuyẽ ifenen.”
(Idi uruwa bun, Trofimus Efesus taun tamal, Pol ado an taun diledin, anĩ nigin, idi kisi difen, Trofimus Pol im tempel modoũ namen iroulen den.)
Taun tamo kayau ganan fafã de fen, naab uyu fire fire bunem gududu de disin. Idi Pol dale, tempel bun tamal dĩ de diror diroule di, kaisã bagai sukar kotũ difeledin.
Idi Pol dukesiyou fenẽ age de mog, od isel, Rom kusĩ tamo neid odug, Jerusalem taun tamo kayau ganan kuru dalesef ya anĩ karĩ yen.
Kaisã bagai, kusĩ tamo neid odug ĩ, kusĩ tamo neid orowa tunĩ ado kusĩ tamo geif fen, tamo kayau musei gedin gududu de disilen. Tamo kusĩ dalesen idi, kusĩ tamo neid odug ado yogon kusĩ tamo geid dileid fen, Pol dun anĩ folõ difelen.
Kusĩ tamo neid odug isi, Pol dale, sen uru nem difõf nigin iron. Age ye fen, Pol ĩ ai anĩ, ereb ĩ age fen anĩ ado nigineg, Juda tamo to fiyẽdin.
Tamo kayau musei atun, tunĩ od gariya fire diweig diron, tunim od gariya fire taka diweig diron. Kusĩ tamo neid odug ĩ, idi kuru dalesen nigin momoi od yaleya kisi feleya san anĩ nigin, ĩ Pol kusĩ tamo neid fõ bun dirou dilauf nigin irokenẽdin.
Pol lata garan wõ ye mog, tamo musei idi didid aus fele di, kusĩ tamom Pol faali difiyen.
Tamo musei idi dõ difeid fen, diweig diron, “Ukesig!”
Kusĩ tamo idi, Pol kusĩ tamo neid fõ aaben diroulau fenẽ mog, ĩ kusĩ tamo neid odug to fiyen, “Aya od taka tau arokonõf?” Ĩ aba solof iron, “Õ Grik od wogõ wodig de?
Õ Isip tamal sã de? Kulu gawaman kiwai wene ken, gerere tuan fo tausen kiwai tamo uyu urou ulen anĩ.”
Pol iron, “Aya Juda tamo, Silisia provins oun Tasus taun tamal, taun yana ado nẽ fõ morou. Utorna len, tamo kayau od arokenẽdiyouf.”
Kusĩ tamo neid odug yo fiyẽ di, Pol lata bun ifar fen, tamo kayau imam fiyẽdin. Idi ganan foro dele di, Pol Hibru od nem irokenẽdin,
“Turau tar ado dei geg, gama aya yug nigin isennẽya od enei karĩ wog.”
Pol Hibru od nem irokenẽdi di, karĩ de fen, idi fatuk foro delen. Age dife di, Pol iron,
“Aya Juda tamo, Silisia provins oun Tasus taun an wõ au fen, taun enei bun biyaun. Aya Gamaliel bun tubuda tar neid lo nigin tai fiya fatuk alen. Age afe fen, ã ganan gama ago gef gen, ayag Negur nigin kisi totol alen.
Aya Naab enei dõ difedig tamo kayau, darau afeneĩd fen, adenkesin, tamo ado kayau gei afeid fen, kalabus araran.
Pris neid mudur ado, kaunsel neid uyu irouya ganan geideg, aya age afen anĩ nigin wogõ douf. Aya tureid tar Juda idi oun Damaskus taun difaref anidi bun paseg idi bun ale fen, tamo kayau eneidi darau difenẽdiyouf nigin afofa ken, Jerusalem guri afeid alauf nigin an elen.
“Gaa atun age fiya, aya ele, Damaskus wõ au fenẽ mog, kaisã bagai, lalan fula fiya taka saa ilun tamal aya bun fula felen.
Aya tenebur kubũ au asil fen, ait taka wogõ fiya mog, karĩ aun, ‘Sol, Sol, ere nigin õ aya daig wiyaf?’
“Aya to afen, ‘Odug, õ aim?’ “Ĩ solof irokanan, ‘Aya Jesus Nasaret tamal, õ daig wiyaf anim.’
Neu kabĩ turau tar fula fiya anĩ dilen, anĩ ere, idi ait wogõ fiyan anĩ to karĩ den.
“Aya to afen, ‘Ere naig afouf?’ “Odug iron, ‘Fã wale fen, Damaskus taun ule, an õ ereb agouf nigin Negur igirkonon anĩ ganan irokonõf.’
Neu kabĩ turau tar, imau gim de, Damaskus dirouleyan, ere nigin, lalan fula fiya anim malau gugum kelen.
“Tamo taka yana Ananias ileyauf nigin isin. Ĩ lo el fe dõ fedig tamo, Juda idi an difaref ganan, ĩ nigin biya difiyẽdig.
Ĩ aya sirun ifar fen, iron, ‘Turau, Sol, õ malã kelẽ yalauf!’ Sain anĩ bun bagai, aya ĩ ileya kisi feleyan.
“Age afe di, ĩ iron, ‘Tubuda tar neid Negur, õ yogon oroya keleĩ youf nigin, Madur Bagai Tamo anĩ ulouf nigin ado, ĩ awa bun od karĩ wouf nigin igirnon.
Õ ereb ulen ado karĩ won anĩ, tamo ganan bun ĩ nigin wogõ wouf.
Anĩ gama õ ere tari wof? Fã wale, naan wale, ĩ yana uweigne ken, ogon mosor kulo wol.’
“Aya Jerusalem kelau ele fen, tempel bun kosẽ au mog, malau seleulã kurãf fen,
Odug wogõ ye mog, ailen. Ĩ aya irokanan, ‘Gama nem, kaisã bagai Jerusalem utor ule, ere nigin, idi aya nigin ogon od to karĩ douf.’
“Age ye di, aya oron, ‘Odug, idi dogo keleĩ, are aya Juda neid uub fõ fõ bun ele fen, õ nigin momoi den anidi kalabus bun aneneĩd fen, adenẽdidig.
Takag, ogon od wogõ yedig tamo Stiwen naud fi felen sain bun, ayag an afaren, ĩ dukesiyouf nigin wau iro ken, tamo idi ĩ dukesin neid kolos tari afen.’
“Age au di, Odug irokanan, ‘Ule, aya haiden gedin gerõ sur ayõf.’”
Tamo kayau musei Pol karĩ difiyek dile, ĩ od enei irõ di, idi kakaĩ de fen, diweig diron, “Ukesig, tenebur tamal uraileg! Ĩ mata ibodõya to biya!”
Idi diweig diro ken, dogo neid kolos dinukakã dirara ken, aas ilun diraran.
Age dife di, kusĩ tamo neid odug, Pol kusĩ tamo neid fõ bun dirou dilauf nigin irokenẽdin. Tamo idi Pol eig de diweig dirokenen anĩ nẽ gariya keleĩ youf nigin, Pol wagĩ difiye ken, to difiyẽf nigin, ĩ irokenẽdin.
Idi ĩ wagĩ difiyẽf nigin yaĩ difiyẽ mog, Pol kusĩ tamo neid orowa an ifaren anĩ irokenen, “Ã, Rom tamo, mosor ado be ya kelei sa ken, wagĩ fiya are lo dõ fiya de?”
Kusĩ tamo neid orowa od enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ kusĩ tamo neid odug garan ile fen, ĩ irokenen, “Õ ere naig wou fenẽ? Tamo enei ĩ Rom tamo.”
Kusĩ tamo neid odug Pol garan ile fen, to fiyen, “Õ urokana, õ Rom tamo de?” Pol ĩ iron, “Are momoi.”
Age ye di, kusĩ tamo neid odug iron, “Aya Rom tamo wõ auf nigin, moni odugem na alen.” Pol iron, “Anĩ ere, aya Rom tamo gõ difiyan.”
Age ye di, tamo Pol to difiyẽf nigin age difen idi, kaisã bagai folõ difelen. Kusĩ tamo neid odug ĩg, Pol ĩ Rom tamo, sen nem ifon anĩ weder fokõ yel fen, kumĩ yen.
Naa anĩ ile di, kusĩ tamo neid odug ĩ, Juda idi Pol bou bun od dun anĩ nẽ gariya tutuk bagai keleĩ youf nigin oron, anĩ nigin, ĩ Pol yalisne ken, pris odudug ado Juda neid uyu irouya ganan guru difouf nigin irokenẽdin. Agef fen, ĩ Pol yale irousi, idi wagedin ifarnen.
Pol guru fiya anĩ lo feid le fen, iron, “Turau tar, aya Negur kabĩ ifanan anĩ, wau karẽtut bagai ado age alef asi, gama naa enei bun.”
Od enĩ irõ di, pris neid mudur Ananias, tamo Pol non difaren anidi ĩ sigor daũ difouf nigin irokenẽdin.
Age ye di, Pol Ananias irokenen, “Negur õ inõ irãf, õ pen lalaum garaĩ naki fiya! Õ lo kilei es wiyauf nigin an ubodok, anĩ ere, õ lo wal wo fen, aya dinauf nigin urokenẽdif!”
Tamo Pol non difaren anidim ĩ dirokenen, “Õ Negur nẽ pris neid mudur kumĩ sã kono wiyek de?”
Age de di, Pol iron, “Turau tar, ĩ pris neid mudur anĩ aya to kelein. Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok, ‘Ogon tamo kayau neid uyu irouya nigin od sane to urõf.’ ”
Age ye fen, Pol idi tunĩ Sadusia tamo, tunĩ Farisia tamo anĩ kelei ken, uyu irouya neid guru fiya mala bun iweig iron, “Turau tar, aya Farisia tamo taka, Farisia tamo naaluid. Aya laa bun tamal mata kel fãya nigin wau iseya ado nigin, kot bun afaref.”
Pol od enei irõ di, Farisia tamo ado Sadusia tamo geid fefe de fen, guru fiya anĩ faraf uru fen.
(Sadusia tamo idi dirõdig, laa bun tamal mata kel fãya sã, engel sã, uureg sã, anĩ ere, Farisia tamo idi dirõdig, anĩ ganan are dibodok.)
Aiteid oduduge di, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ, idig Farisia bun temeleid fafã de fen, totol bagai fe de diron, “Amã tamo enei bun kũ fenẽya taka to mailef. Ĩ uurem be engel takam be irokenen are, naig fiyauf?”
Fefeya anĩ ile, sane le di, kusĩ tamo neid odug Pol fisik difouf ye fen, kumĩ yen. Anĩ nigin, ĩ kusĩ tamo disil, imedin tamal totol ado son difeid, kusĩ tamo neid fõ bun diroulauf nigin, irokenẽdin.
Bõ anĩ bun, Odug Pol non ifar fen, iron, “Totol uno! Õ Jerusalem ein, aya nigin wogõ wol gen, õ Rom ouneg ago wogõ wouf.”
Bonimei di, Juda idi guru de fen, Pol yukesiya nigin kisi katõ difen. Pol yukesiya sã mog, idi saaf ado naan to dãf nigin waud kuturol fen, od difon.
Tamo foti wal fiya anidim, enei nigin kisi katõ difen.
Idi pris odudug ado uyu iroudiya bun dile fen, diron, “Pol yukesiya sã mog, amã ereb taka to mãf nigin waumã kuturol fen, od mafon.
Anĩ nigin, gama ã uyu irouya neid guru fiya geid, tamomoi ge fen, Pol nigin tutuk bagai keleĩ youf ge fen, ĩ ã gein dirou disiyouf nigin, kusĩ tamo neid odug urokenẽgouf. Amã, ĩ ein wõya sã mog, ĩ maukesiyouf nigin dodok mafef.”
Anĩ ere, Pol main nẽ naal kisi enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ kusĩ tamo neid fõ bun ile fen, Pol irokenen.
Age ye di, Pol kusĩ tamo neid orowa taka iweignẽ isi di, iron, “Tamo gaũ enei wale, kusĩ tamo neid odug gein uroule. Ĩ od taka irokenẽf nigin ado.”
Anĩ nigin, ĩ kusĩ tamo neid odug garan yale iroule fen, iron, “Kalabus tamo Pol iweigna fen, tamo gaũ enei õ gein arou asiyouf nigin irokanal, ere nigin, ĩ od taka irokonõf nigin ado.”
Kusĩ tamo neid odug, tamo gaũ ima yale irou, yerin dile fen, to fiyen, “Aya ere od anĩ urokanau fenẽ?”
Tamo gaũ iron, “Juda idi waud tekeleil, tamomoi de fen, Pol nigin tutuk bagai keleĩ youf de fen, nil uyu irouya neid guru fiya mala bun, ĩ diroulauf nigin dirokonõf.
Are idi to karĩ wiyẽdiyouf, ere nigin, tamo foti wal fiya anidim ĩ nigin dimin ken, tari difef. Pol yukesiya sã mog, idi saaf ado naan to dãf nigin waud kuturol fen, od difon. Idi dodok difel fen, Pol idi garan sur fiya nigin ogon yoya anĩ tari difef.”
Kusĩ tamo neid odug tamo gaũ anĩ weder irou fen, sur fen, “Õ enei urokanal anĩ, aib taka to urokenẽf.”
Age fel fen, ĩ kusĩ tamo neid orowa uru iweigneĩd, disi di, irokenẽdin, “Kusĩ tamo tu handred ado, kusĩ tamo sewenti hos adodo, kusĩ tamo tu handred ot adodo anidim, bõ nain kilok Sisaria taun ulagauf nigin, dodok gouf.
Pol teten ibod ken, Gawaman nẽ Mudur Feliks bun biya ile wõ youf nigin, hos tunĩ dodok gouf.”
Ĩ pas eig ye itoton:
Aya Klodius Lisias, Odug Gawaman nẽ Mudur Feliks aan ayok.
Tamo enei Juda tamom dale fen, dukesiyou fenẽ age difen, anĩ ere, aya neu kusĩ tamo geid masi masennen, ere nigin, aya ĩ nigin kelein, ĩ Rom tamo.
Idi ĩ bun od dun anĩ, aya gariya keleĩ youf nigin, ĩ dogo neid uyu irouya guru fiya bun aroulen.
Ĩ bun od dun are dogo neid lo nigin age difen, anĩ ere, ĩ laa fiya nẽ be, kalabus ilauf nẽ ereb taka to age fen anĩ aya kelein.
Aya ĩ dukesiyouf nigin naab dimirek ya anĩ karĩ au fen, aya kaisã bagai ĩ, õ gein sur afiyen. Ĩ bou bun od dun idig, õ malã bun nedi morõ yaor difouf nigin arokenẽdin.
Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo idi irokenẽdin kilei, dõ def age difen, idi bõ Pol dale dirou, Antipatris taun dilen.
We fele di, idi, kusĩ tamo hos adodo, Pol geid dilauf nigin dirokeneĩd fen, idi kusĩ tamo neid fõ bun keku de dilen.
Kusĩ tamo hos adodo Sisaria taun wõ de fen, pas anĩ gawaman nẽ mudur difen ken, Pol ĩ ima bun dinon.
Gawaman nẽ mudur ĩ pas anĩ iwes fen, Pol ĩ teneub nanĩ bun tamal anĩ to fiyen. Gawaman nẽ mudur ĩ, Pol Silisia provins bun tamal anĩ kelei ken,
ĩ iron, “Aya ogon od, tamo õ bun od dun anidi ein disiyouf bun, karĩ auf.” Age ye fen, ĩ Pol Herod nẽ fõ bun dinene ken, lo difouf nigin irokenẽdin.
Naa faif ilele di, pris neid mudur Ananias, uyu irouya tunĩ ado, lo keleĩ tamo yana Tertulus dedig geid, Sisaria taun disilen. Idi Pol bouwa bun od dũf nigin, gawaman nẽ mudur mala bun wõ den.
Anĩ Pol diweignẽ, isi di, Tertulus Feliks mala bun, Pol bun bou yũya od anĩ gariya ino irokenen, “Amã õ farumen wau inosiya sain meluk mabodok masin. Ogon lo fiya biya bun, neda teneub bun ereb ereb biya musei wowã den.
Odug Feliks, modoũ ganan ado naab ganan bun, amã enei kelei ken, anĩ nigin fatuk bagai de mayok.
Anĩ ere, aya ogon sain to akasiyouf nigin, õ waũ ino ken, sain naal bagai karĩ wamãf nigin arokonok.
“Tamo enei morõ inoya tamo, teneub ganan bun, Juda tamo atun kuru yalesedig anĩ amã mailen. Ĩ Nasaret idegẽya momoiya mala neid uyu irouya.
Ĩ tempeleg amuyẽ ifenẽf nigin age fen, anĩ nigin, amã ĩ malen.

Õ ogo tamo enei to wiyẽf are, od ĩ bou bun manof anĩ ganan momoi bagai ya anĩ, õ keleĩ youf.”
Juda tamo idi, ĩ bou bun od yũya bun megeir dife fen, are momoi, den.
Gawaman nẽ mudur, Pol wogõ youf nigin mudurem dogol fiyẽ di, Pol iron, “Aya keleĩ, yar musei õ teneub enei bun es fiya tamo ubodon, anĩ nigin, aya wau el fe fen, aya yug nigin megeir afouf.
Malai sã, õ yaor bagai keleĩ youf, are naa tuwelf dogol mogo ilef, aya Negur yana alesauf nigin Jerusalem eselen.
Aya bouwau bun od dun tamo idi keleĩ, aya aib taka ado tempel bun to fe maun be, Juda neid uub fõ bun be taun nameneg, tamo kayau waud to alesen.
Idi gama aya bouwa bun od duk are momoi yeya anĩ, õ ifelnõya kisi feleya sã.
Anĩ ere, aya Naab idi idegẽya dedig anĩ dõ afe fen, tubuda tar neid Negur yana alesedig, are momoi auf. Aya Moses nẽ Lo ado, profet neid buk bun ditoton anĩ ganan nigin, momoi auf.
Ayag tamo eneidi gen Negur bun wau iseya ado, are madur tamo ado tamo sesen laa bun tamal mata ke de fã douf anĩ.
Anĩ nigin, Negur mala bun ado tamo meleid bun, aya wau karẽtut abodõf nigin sain ganan kabĩ totol aledig.
“Aya yar tunĩ firen abodkele fen, aya neu tamo kayau maleg nigin safina wau sã ado, Negur bun sesewi fiya nẽ safina, Jerusalem arou asin.
Aya nonorou lilik afel fen, enei age afe mog, idi aya tempel modoũ bun fotou difiyan. Aya an tamo guru fiya mala taka geid san, katã san.
Anĩ ere, Juda tamo tunĩ Asia provins temeleid an difaren anidi, dogo bagai õ gein disi fen, bouwau bun od yũya idi adouf are, wogõ dem bagai.
Sãf are, tamo eneidim, aya uyu irouya neid guru fiya meleid bun afaren sain, idi aya bun ereb mosor fotou difen anĩ wogõ douf.
Tekelei dogol, aya idi meleid bun afar fen, aweig aron, are eig fiya, ‘Laa bun tamal mata kel fãya anĩ nigin, aya gama ã melein kot bun afaref.’”
Age ye di, Feliks ĩ yogo, Naab anĩ nigin keleĩ bagai, ĩ kot gudũ fel fen, iron, “Kusĩ tamo neid odug Lisias isiyouf sain, aya ogon kot nigin od afõf.”
Ĩ, Pol lo difouf, anĩ ere, ĩ karika difen ken, yogon mou tar ĩ ereb lau fef anĩ kulatun difouf nigin yo fiyẽdiyouf nigin, kusĩ tamo neid orowa irokenen.
Naa tunĩ ilele di, Feliks ĩ aiwa Drusila Juda kayau ado disin. Ĩ Pol nigin od sur fe, isi fen, ĩ Kristus Jesus bun momoiya nigin wogõ ye di, karĩ yen.
Pol ĩ Negur nẽ madur fiya nigin, tamo yogon oroya kulatun fiya nigin ado, es fiya fau isiyouf anĩ nigin dir fe di, Feliks ĩ kumĩ ye fen, iron, “Are de bure welef! Wadã ule. Sain biya adouf are, õ nigin od sur afouf.”
De sain anĩ bun, Feliks ĩ, Polem moni ifenẽf nigin oron, anĩ nigin, sain musei Feliks Pol nigin od sur fe fen, urom wogõ dedig.
Yar uru ilele di, Porsius Festus, Feliks nẽ modoũ yalen. Anĩ ere, Feliks Juda tamo meleid yalouf nigin, Pol kalabus bun itornẽ ibodon.
Festus provins anĩ bun wõ ye, naa towo ilele di, ĩ Sisariam Jerusalem iselen,
an pris odudug ado Juda neid uyu iroudiya geid, ĩ mala bun wõ de fen, Pol bou yũya od anĩ dirokenen.
Festus ĩ wau ifeneĩd fen, Pol Jerusalem sur fe di, ilauf nigin totol bagai dirokenen, ere nigin, idi naab luwen dimin ken, Pol dukesiyouf nigin dodok difen.
Age de di, Festus ĩ irokenẽdin, “Pol oun Sisaria kalabus bun ibodok. Aya yug mogo an alau fenẽ.
Anĩ nigin, tamo anĩ ereb kũ fenen ouf are, ãgenei uyu irouya tunĩ aya weim Sisaria mele fen, an ĩ bou yũya od wogõ douf.”
Festus ĩ idi geid, naa eit be ten dibodkele fen, Sisaria isilen. Naa anĩ ile di, ĩ es fiya modoũ bun ibod ken, Pol ĩ wagen dirousiyouf nigin irokenẽdin.
Pol wõ ye di, Juda idi Jerusalem temeleid disin ĩ salili difiye ken, ĩ mosor sane bagai inon de fen, ĩ bou yũya od musei diron, anĩ ere, idi anĩ nẽ gariya to yaor difedin.
Age dife di, Pol yogo nigin isennẽya od iron, “Aya Juda neid lo nigin, tempel nigin, Sisa nigin be, ereb kũ fenẽya taka to age afen.”
Anĩ ere, Festus ĩ, Juda tamo ĩ nigin waud yenẽf nigin wau iro ken, Pol irokenen, “Õ Jerusalem usel fen, boũ yũya od eneidi nigin an aya malaun kot bun ufarauf de?”
Pol iron, “Aya gama Sisa nẽ kot bun yeir afaref, ein aya kot difiyauf. Õ ogo keleĩ bagai, aya Juda tamo bun kũ fenẽya taka to anon.
Anĩ ere, aya laa nẽ mosor taka anon ouf are, aya laa nigin to atorok. Anĩ ere, Juda tamo eneidi bouwau bun od dun anĩ momoi sãf are, aya taka nem idi imeid bun inenaya kisi feleya sã. Aya Sisa bun kot afouf.”
Festus ĩ, yogon lo keleĩ tamo geid, katõ difel fen, iron, “Õ Sisa bun kot afouf wol. Õ Sisa gein ulauf.”
Naa tunĩ ilele di, King Agripa Bernis ado, Festus aan difiyẽf nigin Sisaria taun disin.
Idi naa musei an dibodõ di, Festus Pol nigin king ado katõ de fen, ĩ iron, “Feliks ĩ, kalabus tamo taka ein itornen ibodok.
Aya Jerusalem ele di, pris odudug Juda neid uyu irouya geid, ĩ bun bou yũya od dirou disi fen, ĩ mosor ado afiyẽf nigin dirokanan.
“Anĩ ere, aya arokenẽdin, Rom neid tobonunã bun, tamo taka bou bun od duk ĩ, yogon kiwai tar meleid bun ifar fen, bou bun od dun anĩ nigin, yogo bou isennẽya od wogõya sã mog, are kaisã tamo anidi imeid bun to dinenẽf.
Idi aya weim ein masi fen, aya to foi aun, we fele di, aya es fiya modoũ bun abod ken, tamo are dale dirou disiyouf nigin arokenẽdin.
Yogon kiwai tar fã de wogõ den, anĩ ere, aya mosor kisi afen anĩ nigin taka to bou bun dun.
Anĩ ere, idi dogo neid momoiya nigin ado, laa tamo yana Jesus, Pol ĩ nigin mata ibodok yedig anĩ nigin, ĩ geid fefe den.
Aya enei nigin naig afe tutuk keleĩ youf au fen, nene aun, anĩ nigin, aya ĩ Jerusalem ile fen, bou bun od dun enei nigin an kot bun ifarauf nigin to afiyen.
Anĩ ere, Pol ĩ kusĩ tamom lo difiyẽ dile, fau dum Sisam es fiyẽf nigin irokanan. Anĩ nigin, aya ĩ lo difiyek dile, ĩ Sisa gein sur fiya nigin naab amir ken, sur afiyẽf sain bun anĩ nigin arokenẽdin.”
Age ye di, Agripa Festus irokenen, “Aya yug tamo enei karĩ afiyẽ fenẽ.” Festus iron, “Õ nil karĩ wiyẽf.”
Naa anĩ ile di, Agripa Bernis ado, biya biyamã de disi, guru fiya fõ aaben, kusĩ tamo neid odudug, taun nẽ uyu iroudiya geid dilen. Festus irõ di, Pol aaben dirou disin.
Festus iron, “King Agripa ado tamo ganan weim tafaref ã, tamo enei ulegef. Juda tamo kayau ganan Jerusalem ado ein Sisaria, ĩ nigin totol bagai dirokanan. Idi ĩ mata to ibodõf nigin diweig diron.
Aya, ĩ laa fouf nẽ ereb taka to age fen anĩ ailen. Anĩ ere, ĩ Sisa bun kot fouf nigin iron, anĩ nigin, aya ĩ Rom sur fiya nigin kisi afon.
Anĩ ere, aya ĩ nigin ereb od Sisa bun atotkenẽf anĩ yaor sã. Anĩ nigin, aya ã ganan meleĩ bun ĩ arou asil, King Agripa õ bun bagai, anĩ bunem aya ĩ to afiyẽ kelei ken, ĩ nigin ereb od itotoya nigin adouf be.
Ere nigin, aya kisi afef, kalabus tamo ĩ ereb mosor inon anĩ to yaor mog, sur afouf, are to biya.”
Age ye di, Agripa Pol irokenen, “Aya õ ogo nigin wogõ wouf nigin arokonok.” Anĩ nigin, Pol imam fe fen, yogo isennẽf nigin wogõ yen,
“King Agripa, bolẽ bagai, aya gama õ malã bun afar fen, Juda tamo aya bouwau bun od dun anĩ ganan nigin, aya yug isennauf nẽ od wogõ auf.
Bolẽ bagai auf, ere nigin, õ Juda neid tobonunã ado luwa irouya anĩ ganan keleĩ. Anĩ nigin, õ folo reis fen, karĩ wiyauf nigin agonok.
“Aya kesu naalun naig be afe abodon are, Juda tamo ganan keleĩ. Uruwa bun, aya neu teneub bun abodon, age afe fen, Jerusalemeg abodon are idi keleĩ.
Idi aya nigin sain meluk kelein, anĩ idi orodiyouf are, idi sã wogõ douf, are ada neda momoiya mala bun, Farisia tamo idi lo totol bagai dõ difedig anidi neid taka abodon.
Negur ada tubuda tar bun age afouf bagai fiyẽdin anĩ bun, aya wau iseya ado, anĩ nigin, aya gama kot bun afaref.
Negur age afouf bagai fiyẽdin anĩ nigin, ada neda ibor tuwelf, gaa ado bõ ado totol bagai Negur aruna dales fen, anĩ kisi fele di, dilouf nigin waud iseya adon. O king, wau iseya enei nigin, Juda idi aya bouwau bun od duk.
Ere nigin ã, Negur laa tamo kel turĩ fiyek anĩ kisi feleya sã gef?
“Aya yugeg, Jesus Nasaret tamal yana kiwai afenẽf nigin ereb ereb ganan age afouf aun.
Are aya Jerusalem an age afen. Pris odudug bun yoya ale fen, Negur nẽ tamo kayau musei kalabus bun anenẽdin. Idi laa bun dinenẽdin sain, ayag idi laa bun dinenẽdiyouf nigin yo aun.
Sain musei, aya idi darau afenẽdiyouf nigin, Juda neid uub fõ fõ bun elen, age afe fen, idi Negur kono difiyẽf nigin nugo afiyẽdin. Aya idi nigin nameu sane bagai yen ken, aya idi kafĩ fiya afenẽdiyouf nigin yaũ tauneg elen.
“De anĩ nigin sain taka bun, aya pris odudug neid od ado, yoya bun Damaskus taun elen.
O king, gaa atun age fiya naab luwe ele mog, aya saa ilun tamal fula fiya taka, gaa nẽ medeĩya wal fiya, aya neu kabĩ turau tar geid bun, fula felen anĩ ailen.
Amã ganan tenebur kuku mau fen, ait taka Hibru od nem eig ye irokana mog, karĩ aun, ‘Sol, Sol, ere nigin õ aya daig wiyaf? Õ aa waila ado bun yẽ urak are, õ nigin malai bagai.’
“Age ye di, aya to afen, ‘Odug, õ aim?’ “Odug iron, ‘Aya Jesus, õ daig wiyaf anim.
Gama õ fã wale yem ufar. Aya õ bun wõ aul, ere nigin, õ neu kabĩ tamo wõ wo fen, õ aya nigin ereb ulen ado ereb afelnõf anĩ wogõ wouf nigin agirnon.
Aya Israel tamo kayau bun ado haiden buneg asennõf. Aya idi bun õ sur ayok,
idi meleid fokõ yel fen, gugum bun tamal lalan bun disiyouf ado, Satan nẽ megeir bun tamal Negur bun disiyouf, anĩ bunem idi neid mosor nigin weder tu keleya dale fen, aya nigin momoi de fen, fateuledin anidi atun dogo neid modoũ gei difouf.’
“King Agripa, anĩ nigin, aya saa ilun tamal malau seleulã kurãf fen, ailen anĩ to adodon.
Uruwa, oun Damaskus taun difaref anidi bun, Jerusalem ado Judia distrik ganan bun difaref anidi bun ado, haiden buneg, idi waud falei ye, Negur bun falei dife fen, ereb age difef bunem, idi waud falei yen anĩ yaor difouf nigin wogõ aun.
Anĩ nigin, Juda idi tempel modoũ bun daleya fen, dinakesiyou fenẽ nigin age difen.
Anĩ ere, Negur aya isennaf isi, gama naa enei bun, anĩ nigin, aya ein afar fen, nanaal ado odudug bun wogõ auf. Aya Moses profet geid agef wõ youf den anĩ to adod ken, wogõ auf,
are Kristus darau yale fen, ĩ ket laa bun tamal mata kel fã ye fen, Israel tamo kayau ado haiden geid bun, fula fiya anĩ nigin kurõ fesiyouf anĩ.”
Pol yogo bouwa isennẽf nigin od enei wogõ ye di, Festus iweig iron, “Pol, õ wadã inok. Ogon keleĩ odug anim wadã bun irouleyok.”
Pol iron, “Odug Festus, aya wadã sã. Ereb aya orok enei are momoi, gariya ado.
King ĩ enei nigin keleĩ, anĩ nigin, aya kumĩ sã wogõ ayok. Aya momoi auf, are enei taka ĩ mala bun to iminen, ere nigin, enei iminẽyan to wõ yen.
King Agripa, õ profet ganan nigin momoi wof de? Aya keleĩ, õ momoi wof.”
Age ye di, Agripa Pol irokenen, “Õ kisi wof, are sain tobega eig fiya bun aya Kristen wõ auf nigin neu kisi falei wouf de?”
Pol iron, “Sain tobega be, sain meluk, aya Negur kosẽ afiyẽdig are õ nigin dogol sã, ganan gama aya karĩ wiyagef ãg, aya gen wowã gouf nigin, anĩ ere, sen enei dogol anĩ to difõyeĩf.”
Age ye di, king, gawaman nẽ mudur, Bernis ado, idi weim dibodon ganan fafã den.
Age de fen, idi aab ditor dile, abob diroken ken, diron, “Tamo enei ereb taka laa fouf nẽ be, kalabus ileya nẽ to age fef.”
Agripa Festus irokenen, “Tamo enei Sisa bun to kot fem are, ĩ yalisnẽya kisi feleyam.”
Amã waag bun Itali kantri malauf nigin od difõ di, Pol kalabus tamo tunĩ geid, kusĩ tamo neid orowa taka yana Julius ima bun dinenẽdin, ĩ Sisa nẽ Kusĩ Mala bun tamal taka.
Amã waag taka, Adramitium taun tamal Asia provins bun maaĩ ub ub ilau fenẽ agef mog, sõ mau fen, melen. Aristakus, Tesalonika taun tamo oun Masedonia provins bun tamal, ĩ amã weim.
Naa ile di, Saidon taun wõ maun. Julius ĩ Pol wau ifen ken, ĩ mou tar gedin ile fen, ereb ĩ lau fef anĩ difenẽf nigin yo fiyen.
Anenem amã baban waag bun sõ mau fen, Saipras nuyo wagenem melen, ere nigin, yau naaburamã gudũ fen.
Amã Silisia ado Pamfilia maaĩ atu mele fen, Lisia provins bun Maira taun wõ maun.
An kusĩ tamo neid orowa, Aleksandria taun tamal waag taka Itali kantri ilau fenẽ mog, ile fen, ĩ amã waag bun inenaman.
Amã naa musei, foinenem waag bun, Nidus taun non wõya nigin darau nem melen. Yau naaburamã gudũ fe di, amã Krit nuyo uyu Salmone wal mafe fen, Krit nuyo wagenem melen.
Amã darau kininem maaĩ ub dõ maf masil, modoũ yana Basis Biya dedig, Lasea taun non an wõ maun.
Naa musei ilelen, agef fen, waag bun ileya are mogo sane bagai len, ere nigin, naa are Kuriya Naa dumen. Anĩ nigin, Pol wedereid iroun,
“Tamo, aya ailef are, neda waag bun delẽ sanel fen, waag adoi, udũ adoi, tamo adag daũf sa kalauf.”
Anĩ ere, kusĩ tamo neid orowa, Pol wogõ yen anĩ to karĩ ye fen, waag irouya tamo ado waag marau idi neid od dõ fen.
Basis are yau sain bun ifareya to biya nigin, musei ganan, waag bun tokõ mafel, Finiks wõ mau fen, an mabodõf nigin kisi difon. Finiks are Krit nuyo nẽ basis taka, gaa ileyan saut ado not melem wage ifenek.
Yau saut melem foinenem fũ fe di, idi neid oroya kilei agef wõ yen anĩ kisi difen. Anĩ nigin, idi anka dĩ difesel fen, waag bun Krit nuyo maaĩ ub dõ de dilen.
Sain meluk ileya sã mog, yau odug totol ado, yana ‘Gaa iseyan not tamal’ dedig anĩ, fã ye fen, nuyo bunem fũf irou isilen.
Yau odug totol ado waag yũ di, waag yau bun ileya kisi feleya san. Anĩ nigin, amã waag ulum irouya matorõ di, yaum irouleman.
Amã nuyo naal taka Kauda dedig dumenem wal mafe fen, isennẽya nẽ waag naal darau nem dĩ mafen.
Tamo, isennẽya nẽ waag naal, waag odug teten dalesel dino fen, gama idi malũ nem waag odug anĩ to fara fouf nigin luwa filu difen. Idi waag, maaĩ kulum yana Sirtis bun sõya nigin kumĩ de fen, anka folõ difesi di, yaum waag iroulen.
Yau fatuk bagai waag yuk ile, we fele di, idi udũ tunĩ naanũ diraran.
Naa anĩ ile di, idi imedim waag nẽ safina naanũ diraran.
Naa musei, gaa ado barisa to mailen, agef fen, yau odug totol ado de agef yenen. Anĩ bunem, amã isennẽya malouf nigin waumã iseya ganan sa kelen.
Tamo idi sain meluk saaf sã denek dilen nigin, Pol meledin ifar fen, iron, “Tamo ã, neu od Kritem waag bun to talauf nigin arokenein anĩ karĩ gem, are dem, ago gem are, daũ fiya ado iraraileya enei to fotou gem.
Anĩ ere, aya totol unogouf nigin totol bagai arokeneik, ere nigin, ãgenei taka to fõ yalauf, waag dogol narĩ fouf.
Nor bõ, Negur, aya yogon, aya ĩ aruna aledig, yogon engel sirun ifar fen,
iron, ‘Pol, to kumĩ wo. Õ de Sisa malan kot bun ufarauf. Negur õ wau ifon ken, ganan õ geid waag bun ulegef idi neid mata õ ifonon.’
Anĩ nigin, tamo, totol unogouf, ere nigin, aya Negur bun momoiya anof, are ĩ irokanan kilei fau agef wõ youf.
Anĩ ere, ada nuyo taka bun sõ tauf.”
Naa fotin nẽ bõ anĩ bun, amã fau Mediterenian Maaĩ bun yaum iroulemã mog, bõ atun age fiya waag tamo idi teneub melsã melef ya anĩ kerẽ fedin.
Idi naan nẽ mala es difouf nigin malũ folõ difele di, isil fen, naan nẽ mala foti mita dilen. Sain naal bagai dile fen, idi baban malũ folõ difele di, isil fen, naan nẽ mala teti mita dilen.
Idi waag meein tuwa bun ileya nigin kumĩ de fen, idi waag dumen anka aiwa adodo folo folõ difeledi di, disil fen, gaa nigin kosẽ den.
Waag tamo idi, waag bun tamal diyalalau fenẽ nigin, idi isennẽya nẽ waag naal folõ difele di, maaĩwõ isilen, tamomoi de fen, waag uyu bun anka dirarãf nigin de fen, age difen.
Age dife di, Pol kusĩ tamo neid orowa, kusĩ tamo geid irokenẽdin, “Tamo eneidi waag bun to dibodõf are, ã isenneĩya to walogouf.”
Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo idi, malũ isennẽya nẽ waag naal iroun anĩ gudũ difele di, ilen.
We kurã fiya sã mog, idi ganan saaf dãf nigin, Pol ĩ totol bagai irokeneĩd fen, iron, “Naa fotin bun ã sii yei ken, saaf sã usigen, ã saaf taka to wõgen.
Anĩ nigin, gama aya ã saaf wãgauf nigin totol bagai arokeneik. Ã mata ubodõgouf nigin wãgauf. Ãgenei taka, mudur bun fatiya tekelei bagai taka to kusuf irãf.”
Pol od enei wogõ yel fen, idi ganan meleid bun, ĩ bret tunĩ yale, Negur de fiyekel fen, mũf gariya ino yon.
Idi ganan waud yalese di, saaf don.
Amã waag bun mafaren ganan gu feleya are 276.
Idi dakas kisi fele di, idi waag karikauf nigin, wit ganan maaĩwõ diraran.
Lalan ise di, teneub uyu nain be ya anĩ idi keleĩ san, anĩ ere, alelei ub mumul ado anĩ dilen, kisi falauf are, idi an waag dirou dilauf nigin kisi difon.
De sain tekelei bun maaĩwõ anka kokour de ditorarã yen ken, malũ waag uyu gadi fiya nẽ pul difon anĩ biru difeledin. Age difel fen, idi yau bun sel dalesel fen, yau difenẽ di, waag ubun irou ilauf nigin age difen.
Anĩ ere, maaĩ irak isi abob bun dũdig nẽ an, waag maaĩ kulum yu ken, anĩ teten sõ yesen. Waag uyu degẽ fel fen, tonoya kisi feleya san, age fe di, waag ibu maaim yũ di, faraf fisik fe irailen.
Kalabus tamo idi maaĩwõ to gaõgĩ de diyawauf nigin, kusĩ tamo idi didenkesiyouf nigin katõ difen.
Anĩ ere, kusĩ tamo neid orowa Pol isennẽf nigin wau iro ken, kusĩ tamo idi dogo neid kisi to dõ de age difouf nigin gudũ felen. Idi yoyõya kisi feleya anidi, ketem waag bun tamal gurusã de fen, teneub bun dilauf nigin, ĩ ari fedin.
Tunĩ ganan aa bun be, waag masasak bun an dilen. Anĩ bunem, idi ganan biya bagai totoũ teneub bun wowã den.
Amã biya bagai ubun wõ mau fen, nuyo are yana Malta ya anĩ kelein.
Tamo kayau an temeleid waud fatuk bagai difanaman. Uyẽ isi fen, feluken nigin, idi yã kũ dife fen, amã ganan aan difaman.
Pol ĩ aa were gurif fen, yã teten ino mog, gogour sane yã uruwam iru di, Pol ima bun degẽ felen.
Tamo kayau an temeleid, gogour anĩ Pol ima bun kuuri ye mog, dile fen, idi abob dirokenen, “Tamo enei tamo yukesiya tamo bagai, ere nigin, ĩ maaĩwõ tamal iyawol, anĩ ere, neda waitou Madur Fiya anim ĩ mata ibodõf nigin to oron.”
Age de di, Pol ĩ gogour wiri fe di, yã malan isilen, anĩ ere, ĩ bun ereb taka to wõ yen.
Tamo kayau ĩ ima dĩ youf be, kaisã bagai kubũ ye laa fouf de fen, kisi difen. Anĩ ere, idi sain meluk lo difef dile, ereb taka ĩ bun to wõ yen anĩ dile fen, idi kisi falei del diron, ĩ waitou den.
Teneub akor melsã are, nuyo anĩ nẽ mudur, Publius nẽ teneub ibodon. Ĩ aan fama ken, yogon fõ bun gei famã iroule, naa towo el fe kulatun faman.
Ĩ tama dagi di, fataren yenen, bouwa uruwa ado te fururũ yalen. Pol ĩ ilouf nigin ile kosẽ yel fen, ima teten ino di, dagi fara felen.
Enei wõ ye di, nuyo bun dagi tamo tunĩ ganan ĩ garan disi di, el feid ledin.
Idi naab fire fire bunem el difama ken, amã waag sõ mauf nigin dodok mafe di, idi amã ereb ereb lau mafen anĩ difanaman.
Ogõ towo ilele di, amã, waag taka yau sain bun nuyo an si inon anĩ, sõ mau fen, melen. Waag are Aleksandria taun tamal, anĩ uyu bun, waitou aina ado Kastor Polluks ado meleidkanon dinon.
Amã Sirakus taun wõ mau fen, naa towo an mabodon.
Anenem amã waag bun mele, Regium taun wõ maun. Naa anĩ ile di, yau saut melem fã yen, baban naa anĩ ile di, amã Puteoli taun wõ maun.
An amã momoiya tamo tunĩ fotou mafiyẽdi di, idi geid naa sewen mabodõf nigin dirokanaman. Age mafel fen, Rom taun masin.
Momoiya tamo an, amã masif ya anĩ karĩ de fen, idi diyok disi, Apius Maket ado Tamo Yenẽya Fõ Towo bun an fotou difamãf nigin disin. Pol tamo anidi ileid fen, Negur de fiye ken, wau megeir yalen.
Amã Rom wõ mau fen, Pol ĩ mugu kusĩ tamo takam tari fiyek dibodõf nigin yo difiyen.
Naa towo ilele di, Pol Juda neid uyu irouya iweig laisi, guru dife di, idi irokenẽdin, “Turau tar, aya, neda tamo kayau ado, neda tubuda tar neid tobonunã to adodon, anĩ ere, aya Jerusalem oun daliya fen, Rom imeid bun dinenan.
Idi aya fele difiyale fen, dalisnau fenẽ age difen, ere nigin, aya laa nẽ mosor taka to anon.
Anĩ ere, Juda idi anĩ nigin kiwai dinon, aya neu tamo kayau nigin bouwa yũya od taka san, anĩ ere, naab taka san nigin Sisa bun kot afen.
Gariya anĩ nigin, aya fotou ayei ken, ã geid wogõ tauf nigin to ayein. Israel neid waud iseya anĩ nigin, aya sen enei nem difõyan.”
Idi diron, “Amã õ nigin Judia distrik bun tamal pas taka to malen, agef fen, turada tar idi anenem disin õ nigin od taka be, od sane taka to dirokanaman.
Anĩ ere, amã ogon kisi anĩ karĩ mauf nigin waumã irok, ere nigin, amã keleĩ, tamo kayau teneub ganan bun, ogon momoiya mala enei nigin kiwai od wogõ dedig.”
Idi Pol dilouf nigin naa taka dinon, naa anĩ bun, idi musei bagaim Pol ibodon nẽ an disin. Pol ĩ bonimei nem ile bõ, Negur nẽ tano nigin faded fiyeĩd fen, kurõ feis irokenẽdin, ĩ Moses nẽ Lo ado profet neid itotoya bun, Jesus nigin idi neid kisi falei ye fen, momoi douf nigin age fen.
Tunĩ Pol wogõ yen anĩ bun waud falei yen, anĩ ere, tunĩ to momoi den.
Pol idikeleya od enei wogõ ye di, idi dogo dogol fefe de fen, dilelen, “Awa Uur Fateul profet Asaia sigor bunem eig ye wogõ yen, are ĩ tubuĩ tar momoi bagai od anĩ wogõ fiyẽdin:
“‘Tamo kayau enei bun ule fen, urõ, “ã wedereim karĩ gouf, anĩ ere, wedereĩ to fokõ youf, ã meleim ulogouf, anĩ ere, meleĩ to fokõ youf.”
Ere nigin, tamo kayau enei, idi waud katĩ felen, idi wederedim karĩya kisi feleya sã, age de fen, idi meleid difofakelen, age fiya sam are, idi meledim dilem, wederedim karĩ dem ado, idi waud fokõ ye fen, falei de di, aya idi el afedim.’
“Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ isennẽya haiden bun sur fen anĩ, ã keleĩ youf. Age fe di, idi anĩg karĩ douf!”

Yar uru adok, Pol ĩ yogon fõ na yaledig bun ibod ken, ĩ dilouf nigin disin ganan aan fiyẽdin.
Kumĩ sã ado kafĩ fiya sã, ĩ Negur nẽ tano nigin wogõ ye fen, Odug Jesus Kristus nigin ifelnẽdin.
Aya Pol, Kristus Jesus nẽ ferfer, aposel wõ auf nigin iweigna fen, Negur nẽ biya od wogõ auf nigin igirnan.
Biya od anĩ, Negur kulu bagai yogon profet promis od irokenẽdi di, Negur nẽ Itotoya Fateul bun ditoton,
are yogon Naal, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nigin, ĩ tamo nẽ ibor bun are, Dawid nẽ ibor bun wõ yen,
agef fen, fateul nẽ Awa Uur bunem, ĩ laa bun tamal kel turĩ fiyen anim, Negurem Jesus ĩ Yogo Naal megeir barikã ado anĩ yaor kurõ fesin.
Ĩ bunem, amã yogon yana seli kulõ fiya nigin, haiden ganan atun temeleid, tamo kayau maweignẽdi di, idi momoi de fen, dõ difouf nigin, amã wau ifenẽya ado aposel nẽ kabĩ malen.
Ãg, Jesus nẽ tamo kayau wowã douf nigin iweignẽdif anidi atun, ubodõgef.
Tamo kayau ganan Rom taun ubodõgef, Negur ã nigin wau laaf fen, tamo kayau fateul wõ gouf nigin iweignein, ã bun pas enei atotof. Wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya, neda Tamada Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus bunem, ã bun isiyouf.
Uruwa bagai, aya ã ganan nigin, Jesus Kristus bunem, neu Negur de afiyek, ere nigin, ãgenei momoiya nigin teneub ganan bun od iyokelen.
Negur ĩ nigin aya wau adok iro ken, ĩ Naal nẽ biya od wogõya bun aruna aledig, ĩ ileya mog, aya ã nigin toku neu kosẽya bun faimud karĩ auledig.
Age afe fen, gama Negur orouf are, naab kã fele di, aya ã gein asiyouf nigin aya kosẽ auf.
Aya ã ileyeĩya nigin bagai wau irok, are aya uur nẽ ege luwa tunĩ megeir ifareya nẽ anĩ afeneĩf nigin age afef,
anĩ bunem, aya ã geid, mugu mugu ãgenei momoiya ado neu momoiya bunem abob tasennẽf.
Turau tar, aya ã enei to keleĩ youf anĩ to orouf, aya, sain musei, ã gein isiya nigin kisi afen, anĩ ere, aya age fiya nigin, naab katĩ felef isi, gama enei bun, are aya, Juda sã anidi tunĩ ganan atun, age afen gen, ã atuneg gei ayeĩf nigin age afen.
Negur aya isennan nigin, aya ĩ bun wareg ado. Anĩ nigin, Aya, tamo Grik od ado dogo neid tobonuneid keleĩ anidi ado, tamo Grik od ado dogo neid tobonuneid keleĩ sã anidi bun, kisi biya adodo, nene yedidiya buneg, wareg enei aũf.
Age fiya nigin, aya Rom taun ubodõgef ã buneg, biya od anĩ wogõya nigin kisi totol alef.
Aya biya od nigin to mama fiyaf, ere nigin, are Negur nẽ megeir, tamo ganan momoi def, kel gei fouf nigin, Juda idi bun keteme di, Juda sã anidi idi buneg age fouf.
Ere nigin, biya od bun, Negur ĩ tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab anĩ kurõ fesif, Negur ĩ tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab anĩ momoiya bunem dogol isif, are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Madur tamo momoiya bunem mata ibodõf.”
Negur nẽ didi, saa ilun tamal, tamo idi dogo neid sanem momoi anĩ lai difedig anidi neid mosor ado sane ganan bun yaoref,
ere nigin, ereb Negur nigin idi keleĩ youf are, idi bun yaor, ere nigin, Negur ĩ idi bun anĩ yaor fen.
Negur teneub saa ado kare fen sain bunem isi gamag, Negur nẽ tobonunã ileya kisi feleya sã anĩ, are in ibodkeleya megeir ado ĩ Negur ya anĩ, idi yaor diledig. Ereb Negur inodin anĩ bunem idi keleĩ, anĩ nigin, tamo idi galã taka sã.
Idi Negur kelein, anĩ ere, idi ĩ Negur gen to yana dales fen, de difiyẽdig, anĩ ere, idi neid kisi nene yel fen, idi neid waud neneya anĩ bunem dogo neid waud gugum kerũ felen.
Idi amã kisi biya ado dedig, anĩ ere, idi neneya wowã de fen,
idi to bura leya Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya anĩ falei difel, bura leya nẽ tamo, ninã, gaar ado, gaar luwedim diyõdig imedim meleidkanon dinon anĩ bun dinon.
Anĩ nigin, Negur idi itornẽdi di, idi neid waud irõya sane dõ de, noli mosor dino amuyẽ bun dile fen, idi neid bouwedim abob mama difenẽdig.
Idi Negur nẽ momoi anĩ falei difel, idegẽya bun dinon, age de fen, idi Negur ereb ereb kare fen anĩ ban, ereb ereb Negurem kare fen idi yeneid anĩ dales fen, aruneid daledig. Negur ĩ faimud yana yaleseyauf. Momoi.
Enei nigin, Negur idi mama nẽ oroya bun itornẽdi di, dilen. Idi neid kayaug, Negur bagu fedin geid bouweid bagu fiya ditor ken, falei del, kayau tutur Negur bagu fediya sã anidi geid bouweid bagu difedig.
Age fiya bagai, tamog Negur kayau ado bagu fedin anĩ ditor ken, idi abob bun noli nigin yã gaĩ de genen. Tamo, tamo tunĩ geid mama tobonunã age dife fen, idi neid idodõya mala darau dogo ke de dalen.
Idi Negur nigin keleĩ yaleya ditoron, anĩ nigin, Negur idi itornẽdi di, idi neid kisi sanel fen, idi ereb ereb to age fiya nẽ anĩ age difedig.
Idi tobonunã madur fiya sã fire fire ganan, sane, safina nigin neu dogol yeya ado, to ile oroya anim isokosen. Idi kiyeĩ, tamo yukesiya, kusĩ, idegẽya ado, sanem barikã. Idi dumen od wogõ dedig,
idi bou yũya od wogõ dedig, Negur dudum difiyẽdig, idi kono difedig, idi akoreid dũdig, idi dogo yeneid dalesedig. Idi sane age fiya nigin naab dimirẽdig. Idi sineid temeid tar sigoreid to dõ difedig.
Idi kisi biya sã, momoiya sã, waud laa fiya sã, waud yũya sã.
Idi Negur nẽ lo keleĩ, are idi anĩ age difef laa gurug difouf, anĩ ere, idi anĩ dogol to age difef diledig, anĩ ere, idi tunĩ anĩ age difedig anidig waud difenẽdidig.
Anĩ nigin, õ galã taka sã, õ aib taka es wiyẽdig, ereb taka bun es wiyek, õ ogo boũ uk, ere nigin, õ taka es wiyek, õ ogog de ago wodig.
Ada keleĩ, Negur nẽ es fiya idi age difef anidi bun isif, are momoi nẽ bun Negur es fedig.
Anĩ nigin, tamo õ aib, tunĩ age difef anidi es wiyeĩd fen, õg anĩ ago wodig, õ Negur nẽ es fiya anĩ wal afouf wof de?
Õ, Negur nẽ biya fiya õ waũ faleiya bun irouyõ isif anĩ to kelei ken, yogon biya fiya, molol ado, feseya sã, idi kisi feleya bagai anĩ, õ kono wof de?
Anĩ ere, ogon waũ totol ado ogon waũ faleiya sã bunem, õ ogo nigin Negur nẽ didi wõ youf naa bun walouf nigin didi kuru wof, sain anĩ bun Negur nẽ es fiya madur bagai anĩ yaorouf.
Negur ĩ “mugu mugu ereb age difen kilei ifenẽdiyouf.”
Idi feseya sã ereb biya age difen bunem, fula fiya medeĩya, yana ado, to bura leya dimirẽdig anidi, mata ibodkeleya ifenẽdiyouf.
Anĩ ere, idi dogo nigin dogol kisi de fen dimirẽ di, idi momoi anĩ ditor ken, sane dõ difedig anidi bun, didi ado seyeya wõ youf.
Morõ ado darau, tamo sane age difedig ganan bun wõ youf, Juda idi bun keteme di, haiden idi buneg age fouf.
Anĩ ere, fula fiya medeĩya, yana ado, wau inosiya, idi biya age difedig ganan bun wõ youf, Juda idi bun keteme di, haiden idi buneg age fouf.
Ere nigin, Negur ĩ Juda ado haiden, es fiya tekelei bunem es fediyouf.
Idi Moses nẽ lo sa ken, mosor dinof gananeg, Moses nẽ lo sã daũ falauf, idi Moses nẽ lo farumen dibod ken, mosor dinof ganan, Moses nẽ lo nem es fediyouf.
Negur mala bun, idi lo karĩ dedig anidi madur bagai sã, anĩ ere, idi lo dõ difedig anidi, Negur mala bun madur bagai youf.
Haiden idi lo sã dogo neid kisim ereb ereb lo irok kilei age difedig, idi lo sã, anĩ ere, idi dogo, dogo nigin lo.
Idi ereb ereb lo irok anĩ dogo neid waud bun itoton anĩ yaor difef, anĩ nigin, dogo neid kisi es fiya waud bun ibodok animeg, are momoi anĩ, yaor fe di, dogo neid kisim dogo bouweid yu ken, isenneĩd mog fef.
Neu biya od, Jesus nigin tamo kayau arokenẽdif anĩ irok kilei, Negur Jesus Kristus bunem, tamo nẽ wau bun iminek anĩ es fouf naa bun, enei agef bagai wõ youf.
Õ ogo nigin aya Juda tamo wof; õ lo bun ufar fen, aya Negur ado nigal mauf wo fen, yanã walesef;
õ lom faded yõ di, õ Negur nẽ oroya kelei ken, ereb madur bagai anĩ õ biya wof;
õ ogo nigin momoi wof, are õ mala ifofakeleya neid ulum irouya tamo, õ idi gugum bun difaref anidi neid lalan,
õ neneya tamo neid tai fiya tamo, õ momou neid tise, ere nigin, õ lo bun keleĩ ado momoi anĩ barikã,
age fiyauf are, õ tunĩ ufelnẽdidig, õ ogo to ufelnẽdig de? Õ to bẽ walegei wodig, õ ogo bẽ waledig de?
Õ to seseirã unoi wodig, õ seseirã unodig de? Õ idegẽya waitou anĩ to bagai oroyõdig, õ dogo neid tempel bun bẽ waledig de?
Õ aya lo ado wo fen, yanã walesedig, õ lo ifodulũya bunem Negur mama wenẽdig de?
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Ã bunem, haiden atun Negur yana kono difiyek.”
Õ lo dõ wof are, mulũ are isennok, anĩ ere, õ lo ufodulõf are, õ mulũ ileya sã gen wõ wof.
Anĩ nigin, idi mulũ ileya sã anidim lo irok kilei dõ difouf are, idi mulũ ileyan gen to ilediyauf de?
Taka ĩ mulũ to ile fen, lo dõf el fouf are, ĩ, õ lo itotoya ado fen, mulũ ulen, anĩ ere, õ lo ifodulũya tamo ye fen, to es yõf de?
Tamo ĩ bouwam dogol Juda tamouf, ĩ Juda tamo bagai sã. Bouwam dogol mulũ ilef, areg mulũ bagai sã.
Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ name bun Juda tamouf, ĩ Juda tamo bagai. Mulũ bagai are, Awa Uurem, waud bun age fedig, lo itotoya bunem sã. Tamo age fiya, tamo bunem yana yaleseya to yaledig, anĩ ere, Negur bunem yaledig.
Age fiyauf are, tamo ĩ aya Juda tamo yef bun, ere biya yalouf? Mulũ bun ere biya adouf?
Naab ganan bun musei! Uruwa bagai, Negur nẽ od idi kulatun difouf nigin imeid bun inon.
Juda tunĩ momoiya sãf are, naig fouf? Idi neid momoiya sã anim, Negur age fouf yen anĩ to age fouf de?
To bagai agef ilauf! Negur ĩ momoi bagai, age fe di, tamo ganan idegẽya temeleid tauf. Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Are sain õ wogõ wouf bun, õ madur bagai anĩ yaorouf, sain õ es diyõf bun, õ wal wediyouf nigin.”
Anĩ ere, ada neda madur bagai sã anim, Negur nẽ madur bagai fatuk bagai yaor fouf are, ada ere tauf? Negur ĩ ada bun yogon didi ifanadauf nigin, ĩ madur sã tauf de? Aya tamo nẽ luwa irouya anĩ wogõ auf.
To bagai agef ilauf! Age fiyauf are, Negur tamo kayau naig fe es fediyouf?
Taka nem monẽ ye fen, irõf, “Neu idegẽya anim Negur nẽ momoi bagai anĩ yaau du fe di, anĩ bunem, yogon fula fiya medeĩya odugouf are, ere nigin aya fau mosor tamal ya ani, bouwau bun inouf?”
Ere nigin to eig youf, “Biya anĩ wõ youf nigin, ada sane age tafouf” youf? Tunĩ amam od enei wogõ maudig de fen, amã bouwamã yũya od dirõdig. Negur idi es feid fen, mala solo ifenẽdiyouf.
Amã ere mauf? Juda amã haiden wal fediya de? Gai sã bagai! Amã mogo, Juda ado haiden geid ganan mosor farumen kilei kilei dibodok ya anĩ, moron.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Madur bagai taka to ibodok, tekelei bagaig sã;
taka nem kisi fokõya sã, taka nem Negur imirẽya sã.
Ganan Negur nẽ naab fasis dife fen, ganan sesen len; aibem taka to biya age fedig, tekelei bagaig sã.”
“Idi neid uleidbanĩ, laa nẽ meku awa dede fiya sã gen; idi neid baleid idegẽya wogõ dedig.” “Gogour sane nẽ mũ sigoredin ibodok.”
“Idi neid eweid, isisĩya ado dirikeĩ bagai.”
“Idi neid yeid, tamo didenkesiyouf nigin tuninirya sã kaisã bagai dirãdig;
idi neid iyõya bun, daũ fiya ado morõ dinodig,
age de fen, wau inosiya nẽ naab idi keleĩ sã.”
“Idi neid meleid bun, idi Negur nigin kumĩ sã.”
Gama ada keleĩ, ereb lo irok are, idi lo farumen dibodok anidi irokenẽdif, anĩ bunem, eweid ganan omutukul del fen, tenebur tamo kayau ganan Negur nẽ es fiya farumen dibodõf.
Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ, lo dõ fiya bunem, ĩ mala bun taka ĩ madur bagai to youf. Age fiya nigin, lom ada mosor tanon anĩ yaor fadadig.
Anĩ ere, gama Negur ĩ tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab, are lo bunem sã anĩ yaor fen, are Lo ado profet neid wogõya bun kurõ difesin.
Negur ĩ tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab enei, Jesus Kristus nigin momoiya bunem, idi momoi def ganan bun isif. Juda ado haiden bun de tekelei,
ere nigin, ganan mosor dinon, anĩ nigin, taka nem Negur fula fiya medeĩya bun ibodok ĩ wagen ileya kisi feleya sã.
Age dife di, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya anim, kel gei fiya Kristus Jesus na yaledin bunem isin anĩ bunem, idi ege bagai madur bagai inodif.
Negur ĩ, Jesus nẽ naud bun momoiya bunem, Negur nẽ didi yof fen, tamo kayau neid mosor yalelkenẽdiya kabĩ yalouf nigin, Negurem Jesus sesewi fouf nigin inenen. Ĩ yogo madur bagai ya anĩ yaor fiya nigin, enei age fen, ere nigin, in molol bunem, uruwa mosor dinon anĩ mala solo ifenẽdiya sã itornẽdin.
Sain enei bun, ĩ yogo madur bagai ya anĩ, yaor fiya nigin age fen, are ĩ yogo madur bagai ye fen, taka ĩ Jesus bun momoiya ado ĩ madur bagai youf nigin age fen.
Age fiyauf are, yana yaleseya anĩ nain? Yana yaleseya are sã. Ere gariya bunem? Lo dõ fiya bunem de? Sã, momoiya bunem.
Ere nigin, ada keleĩ, Negur ĩ tamo nẽ momoiya bunem madur bagai youf, lo dõ fiya bunem sã.
Negur ĩ Juda neid dogol de? Ĩ haiden neid sã de? Eo, ĩ haiden nedig Negur.
Negur ĩ tekelei, ĩ mulũ dilen anidi, momoiya bunem madur bagai youf, agef fen, mulũ ileya sãg, momoiya de tekelei anim madur bagai youf.
Age fiyauf are, ada momoiya eneim lo anĩ tadodõf de? Sã bagai. Age fiya ban, ada lo tarou kafĩ tafalauf.
Age fiyauf are, ada Juda tubuda Abraham, ere anĩ ĩ gurug fen nigin, ere tauf?
Abraham yogon kabĩ bunem, madur bagai inenem are, Abraham ĩ yogo yana yaleseya nigin ereb taka adom, anĩ ere, Negur mala bun sã.
Negur nẽ Itotoya ere ye irok? “Abraham Negur nigin momoi ye di, Negur ĩ Abraham madur bagai yen.”
Tamo taka ĩ kabĩ yalef, yogon mala solo are ege luwa ifenẽya gen sã, are kabĩ mala.
Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ madur bagai wõ youf nigin kabĩ to yale fen, Negur, ĩ dõ fiya sã anidi madur fedidig, ĩ nigin momoi yef, Negur yogon momoiya are madur bagai yef.
Dawid ĩg, tamo kabĩ bunem sã, Negur madur bagai yen, tamo anĩ nẽ el fiya nigin wogõ yen:
“Idi neid kũ fenẽya nigin weder tu keledig, idi neid mosor yaleledig, are el fedif.
Tamo ĩ yogon mosor nigin Odug to bagai iwesnẽf, ĩ el fiyek.”
El fiya enei mulũ ileya neid dogol de? Sã, are mulũ ileya san neideg. Age fiya nigin, amã morõdig, Negur Abraham nẽ momoiya bunem ĩ madur bagai yen.
Ere sain bun Negur ĩ age yen? Ĩ mulũ ilel mog de, mulũ ileya sã mog? Ĩ mulũ ilel mog sã, ĩ mulũ ileya sã mog.
Ĩ mulũ ileya nẽ uris, are ĩ fau mulũ ileya sã mog, momoiya bunem Negur madur bagai yen anĩ nẽ uris yalen. Anĩ nigin, ĩ mulũ ileya san momoi def ganan neid temeid, anĩ bunem, Negur idi madur bagai youf.
Ĩ mulũ ileya nedig temeid, idi mulũ dilen dogol sã, anĩ ere, idi tubuda Abraham ĩ mulũ ileya sã mog, momoiya ado iyon anĩ yebura dõ de diyõdig anidi nedig.
Negur, Abraham ado in tubu tar irokenẽdin, are Negurem ereb ereb ganan idi afenẽdi di, akorediyouf yen anĩ, lo bunem sã, anĩ ere, madur bagai momoiya bunem isif anĩ bunem.
Idi lo dõ difedig anidim, Negurem ereb ereb ganan idi afenẽdi di, akorediyouf yen anĩ akorediyouf are, momoiya are ege ile di, ereb Negur iron are ege kilẽf,
are lo didi irou isidig nigin. Lo sãf are, lo ifodulũyag sã.
Anĩ nigin, ereb Negur age afouf yen are, wau ifenẽya bunem, kabĩ yalef ya anĩ yaorouf nigin, momoiya bunem isidig, are Negur ĩ, ege luwa Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar ganan afenẽdiyouf yen anĩ, megeir fiya nigin age fedig, idi lo dõ difedig anidi bun dogol sã, anĩ ere, idi Abraham nẽ momoiya dõ difedig anidi buneg. Age fiya nigin, Abraham ĩ, ada ganan neda tamada.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Aya õ teneub akor musei neid temeid anenon.” Negur mala bun, ĩ neda tamada, Abraham Negur nigin momoi yen, Negur ĩ tamo gare den mata ifeneĩd fen, ereb to ibodok anĩ iweig di, agef wõ yedig, Negur ĩ anĩ.
Wau iseya nigin gariya taka sã bun, Abraham in wau iseya bun momoi yen, are ĩ teneub akor musei neid temeid wõ youf nigin age fen, are Negur ĩ eig ye irokenen kilei, “Ogon ibor agef yenẽf.”
In momoiya bun felu reya sã, ĩ handred yar age fiya ibodon nigin, yogon bouwa anĩ laa gen ile fen, Sara kesu yaleya nigineg laa gen ilen.
Anĩ ere, ereb ĩ Negur iron anĩ nigin to wau uru fen, in momoiya to ilef isi fen, anĩ ere, ĩ yogon momoiya megeir fe fen, Negur fula fiya medeĩya ifenen.
Abraham ĩ, ereb Negur age afouf yen anĩ age fiya nigin, ĩ megeir ado, ye fen, momoi bagai yen.
Anĩ nigin, Negur, Abraham nigin ĩ madur bagai yen.
Od “Negur ĩ nigin madur bagai yen” are, ĩ nigin dogol to itoton,
anĩ ere, Negur ada nigin madur bagai youf anĩ nigineg itoton, are ada, Negur, neda Odug Jesus tamo gare den bun tamal kel turĩ fiyen nigin, momoi tauf anĩ.
Negur ĩ Jesus neda mosor nigin laa bun inene ken, ada madur bagai youf nigin, Jesus mata kel turĩ fiyen.
Anĩ nigin, momoiya bunem, Negur ada madur bagai yen nigin, ada neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem, Negur ado maror bun tabodok.
Neda momoiya bunem, Jesus Kristus ĩ, ada Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya enei ada gama an tafaref anĩ namen irou ileda di, telen. Anĩ nigin, ada Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin, wauda ise fen, kulĩ taudig.
Anĩ nigin dogol sã, ada neda morõ nigineg kulĩ taudig, ere nigin, ada keleĩ, morõ bunem feseya sã anĩ wõ yedig,
feseya sã anĩ bunem atĩya biya wõ yedig, atĩya biya bunem wau iseya wõ yedig.
Wau iseya anim ada to fõ fadadig, ere nigin, Awa Uur Fateul Negurem ifanadan anĩ bunem, in wau laa fiya ada wauda bun fi felen.
Ada fau maleg tabod mog, in sain bun bagai, Kristus ĩ, ada Negur dõ fiya sã anidi nigin laa fen.
Tamo takam, taka madur bagai nigin, laa fiya malai bagai, agef fen, tamo takam aib taka tobonunã biya ado nigin totol ino fen, laa fouf be.
Anĩ ere, Negur ada nigin yogon wau laa fiya anĩ, enei bun ada ifelnadaf, are ada fau mosor bun tabod mog, Kristus ada nigin laa fen.
Gama yogon naud bunem, Negur ada madur bagai yen nigin, ada ĩ bunem Negur nẽ didi bun tamal baban momoi bagai yalelkanadauf!
Sain ada Negur nẽ kiwai tamo tar tabod mog, yogon Naal nẽ laa bunem, ada ĩ geid komo fadan. Gama ada ĩ geid komo fadan nigin, baban momoi bagai, Kristus nẽ mata bunem ada kel gei fadauf!
Enei dogol sã, anĩ ere, ada, ereb Negur neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem age fen nigineg kulĩ taudig, are Jesus Kristus bunem, ada gama komo fiya talen.
Anĩ nigin, tamo tekelei bunem, mosor ket tenebur wõ ye di, laa mosor bunem wõ yen, age fiya bagai, ganan mosor dinon nigin, laa, tamo ganan bun wõ yen.
Lo wõya sã mog, mosor tenebur ibodon. Anĩ ere, lo sãf are, mosor to iwesauf.
Anĩ ere, Adam nẽ sain bunem ile Moses nẽ sain bun, idi Adam age fen gen, to Negur nẽ ĩtãfiya wal difen anidig laa farumen dibodon, Adam ĩ taka fau isiyouf nẽ malakanon.
Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ ege luwa are mosor Adam inon gen sã. Tamo tekelei nẽ mosor bunem musei gare den ouf are, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ado ege luwa, tamo tekelei Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem isin, naig fiya bagai tamo musei bun gogũ fouf!
Takag age fiya, Negur nẽ ege luwa are, tamo tekelei nẽ mosor mala age fiya sã. Es fiya mosor tekelei dõf fen, mosor inon nigin bouwa bun od yũya irou isin, anĩ ere, ege luwa mosor musei dõf fen, madur bagai anĩ irou isin.
Tamo tekelei nẽ mosor bunem, laa anĩ, tamo tekelei anĩ bunem mudur ibodon ouf are, idi Negur bunem, wau ifenẽya barikã ado, madur bagai anĩ nẽ ege luwa barikã dalef anidi, momoi bagai, tamo tekelei Jesus Kristus bunem, mata bun mudur dibodõf!
Anĩ nigin, mosor tekelei bunem, Negur tamo ganan mosor temeleid yen, age fiya gen, madur bagai tekelei age fen bunem, Negur tamo nigin madur bagai ye fen, tamo ganan nigin mata irou isin.
Tamo tekelei nẽ od wal fiya bunem, musei mosor adodo wowã den, age fiya gen, tamo tekelei nẽ dõ fiya bunem, musei madur bagai wowã douf.
Mosor ifageya nigin, lo isin. Anĩ ere, mosor ifaga di, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya fatuk bagai ifagan,
are mosor laa bun mudur ibodon gen, wau ifenẽya madur bagai bunem mudur ibod ken, neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem mata ibodkeleya irou isiyouf nigin age fen.
Age fiyauf are, ada ere tauf? Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ifagauf nigin, ada mosorei tauf de?
Sã bagai! Ada mosor bun gare taun; naig fe di, ada anĩ bun tau tabodõf?
Ada ganan Kristus Jesus bun naan talen, are yogon laa bun naan talen anĩ, ã to keleĩ de?
Anĩ nigin, ada, laa bun naan talen bunem, ĩ geid mũ fadan, are Kristus, Tama nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nẽ megeir bunem, tamo gare den bun tamal kel turĩ fen gen, adag ibodõya mata bun mata tabodõf nigin age fen.
Ada yogon laa bun, enei gen ĩ geid bagu fadan ouf are, ada momoi bagai yogon kel fãya buneg, ĩ geid bagu fadauf.
Ada keleĩ, mosor nẽ bouwada yukesiyouf nigin, neda oroya tubu ĩ geid aa tetek bun yun, are ada mosor nẽ ferfer to tabodõf nigin age fen,
ere nigin, taka ĩ laa fen are, ĩ mosor nẽ megeir bun tamal yalelnen.
Ada Kristus geid gare taun ouf are, adag ĩ geid mata tabodõf nigin momoi tauf.
Ere nigin, ada keleĩ, Kristus tamo gare den bun tamal, kel turĩ fiyen nigin, ĩ baban to bagai laa fouf, ĩ laa nẽ megeirem baban to irounẽf.
Ĩ laa fen are, ĩ mosor nẽ megeir yukesiyouf nigin, sain tekelei bun dogol laa fen, anĩ ere, mata ĩ ibodok are, ĩ Negur bun mata ibodok.
Age fiya bagai, ã aug nigin, mosor bun gareg fen, Kristus Jesus bunem, Negur bun mata ubodõgef anĩ kisi gouf.
Anĩ nigin, ãgenei bouweĩ bura leya nẽ anĩ bun, mosor mudur ibodõ di, ã in oroya sane anĩ dõ gouf nigin to ago gouf.
Ãgenei bouweĩ tunĩ, sane nẽ aruna yaleya nigin mosor bun to wenẽgouf, anĩ ere, idi laa bun tamal kel turĩ fedin gen, ã aug Negur wenẽg fen, ãgenei bouweĩ tunĩ, madur bagai nẽ aruna yaleya nigin Negur bun wenẽgouf.
Mosor ãgenei odug to ibodõf, ere nigin, ã lo farumen sã, wau ifenẽya farumen ubodõgef.
Age fiyauf are, naig fiya? Ada lo farumen sã, wau ifenẽya farumen tabodok nigin, mosor tanouf de? Gai sã bagai!
Sain ã aug, taka sigor dõg fen, ferfer gen ĩ aruna walegef, ã taka sigor dõ gef anĩ nẽ ferfer ubodõgef anĩ, ã to keleĩ de? Ã mosor nẽ ferfer ubodõgef, are laa bun irouleyeik, ã Negur dõ fiya nẽ ferfer ubodõgef, are madur bagai bun irouleyeik.
Anĩ ere, ada Negur de tafiyẽf, ere nigin, ã uruwa bun mosor nẽ ferfer ubodõgen, anĩ ere, ã tai fiya difenein anĩ, ãgenei wauĩ adok dõ gen.
Ã mosor bun tamal yalelneĩ di, madur bagai nẽ ferfer wõ gen.
Aya, ã bouweĩ bun felu reya nigin, tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem wogõ auf. Ã uruwa bun ferfer gen, ãgenei bouweĩ, sane amuyẽ ado bun unogen, ago ge di, fatuk bagai sane len, age fiya gen, gama ã ferfer gen, ãgenei bouweĩ, madur bagai bun unoge di, fateul bagai wõ gouf.
Sain ã mosor nẽ ferfer ubodõgen, ã madur bagai nẽ farumen to ubodõgen.
Sain anĩ bun, ereb ã gama mama yeik bun tamal, ã ere mala biya walegen? Anĩ ganan are, laa bun irou isif.
Anĩ ere, ã gama mosor bun tamal yalelneĩ di, Negur nẽ ferfer wõ gen, anĩ nẽ mala biya are, fateul bun irouleyeik, anĩ nẽ kaũ are, mata faimud ibodkeleya.
Ere nigin, mosor mala, are laa, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ ege luwa, are neda Odug Kristus Jesus bun mata faimud ibodkeleya.
Turau tar, aya, Moses nẽ lo keleĩ tamo ã arokeneik, lo are tamo mata ibodok sain bun dogol, ĩ bun megeir ado anĩ, ã to keleĩ de?
Eig fiya gen, lo irok, kayau tamo aiwaf, ĩ tamo mata ibodok sain bun dogol ĩ aiwaf, anĩ ere, ĩ aiwa laa fouf are, kayau ĩ bagu fiya nẽ lo farumen to ibodõf.
Age fiya nigin, kayau ĩ aiwa monog fau mata ibod mog, ĩ baban tamo taka yalouf are, ĩ seseirã kayau douf. Anĩ ere, yogon tamo laa fouf are, lo anim kayau to irounẽ di, ĩ tamo taka yaloufeg, ĩ to seseirã kayau douf.
Anĩ nigin, neu turau tar, ãg Kristus bouwa bunem lo bun gare gen, are ã, taka ĩ tamo gare den bun tamal kel turĩ fiyen anĩ nẽ wowãg fen, ada Negur bun faat biya taũf nigin ago gen.
Sain ada bouwa nẽ oroyam irounadan bun, lo anim mosor nẽ oroya turĩ fe di, mosor nẽ oroya anim bouwada bun kabĩ yalen, anĩ bun, ada laa nẽ faat taun.
Anĩ ere, gama ada ereb mogo irounadan bun gare taun nigin, ada lo bun tamal yalelnadan, anĩ nigin, ada Awa Uur nẽ naab mata bun aruna talef, naab tubu lo itotoya bun sã.
Age fiyauf are, ada ere tauf? Lo anĩ mosor de? Sã bagai! Momoi, lo sam are, aya mosor are ereb yef anĩ to keleim. Ere nigin, taka nẽ safina ile to oroya nigin lo to age ye irom are, aya taka nẽ safina ile to oroya nigin to keleim.
Anĩ ere, ĩtãfiya anim mosor modoũ ifenẽ di, aya nameun mosorem taka nẽ safina ile oroya fire fire ganan inodin. Ere nigin, lo sãf are, mosor are laa fen.
Uruwa aya lo sã bun mata abodon, anĩ ere, ĩtãfiya isi di, mosor mata fã ye di,
aya laa fiyan. Lo anĩ mata irousiyouf aun, anĩ ere, ĩ momoi bagai laa irousin anĩ ailen.
Ere nigin, ĩtãfiya anim mosor modoũ ifenẽ di, mosorem aya idegna fen, ĩtãfiya bunem laa bun inenan.
Age fiyauf are, lo are fateul, ĩtãfiya are fateul, madur fen, biya.
Age fouf are, ereb biya anim aya bun laa irousin de? Sã bagai! Anĩ ere, mosor are mosor ya anĩ yaorouf nigin, mosorem ereb biya bunem aya bun laa irousin, are mosor ĩtãfiya bunem mosor bagai wõ youf nigin age fen.
Ada keleĩ, lo are Negur bun tamal, anĩ ere, aya bouwa buru nẽ, mosor nẽ ferfer gen na nẽ sur fiyan.
Ereb aya age afef, are aya keleĩ sã. Ere nigin, ereb aya age fiya nigin orouf, are aya to age afedig, anĩ ere, ereb aya to orouf anĩ, aya age afedig.
Ereb aya age fiya nigin to orouf anĩ, aya age afouf are, aya lo are biya auf anĩ ifelnadaf.
Anĩ nigin, aya yug anĩ to age afef, anĩ ere, mosor aya nameun ibodok anim age fef.
Aya keleĩ, ereb biya taka, aya nameun, are mosor nẽ bouwau enei bun to ibodok. Ere nigin, aya ereb biya age fiya nigin orouf, anĩ ere, aya age fiya kisi feleya sã.
Ere nigin, ereb aya age afef, are ereb biya age fiya nigin orouf anĩ sã, anĩ ere, ereb sane aya age fiya nigin to orouf anĩ, aya faimud age afedig.
Aya ereb to orouf anĩ age afouf are, ayam anĩ to age afef, anĩ ere, mosor aya nameun ibodok anim age fef.
Anĩ nigin, aya tobonunã eig fiya kabĩ yale mog, ailef: Sain aya biya age afou fenẽ di, sane anĩ aya ado ibodõdig.
Ere nigin, aya nameun Negur nẽ lo nigin wau kulĩ yedig,
anĩ ere, aya lo taka anĩ bouwau tunĩ bun kabĩ yale mog, ailef, are neu kisi biya nẽ lo ado kusĩ de fen, aya, mosor, bouwau tunĩ bun kabĩ yalef anĩ nẽ lo nẽ kalabus tamo inenadig.
O aya malaulon bagai! Aim anĩ aya laa nẽ bouwau enei bun tamal yalelnauf?
Neda Odug Jesus Kristus age fen bunem Negur ada yalelnadan nigin ĩ de tafiyẽf! Age fiyauf are, aya yug neu kisi bun are, Negur nẽ lo nẽ ferfer, anĩ ere, aya mosor nẽ bouwau enei bun, mosor nẽ lo nẽ ferfer.
Anĩ nigin, idi Kristus Jesus bun dibodok anidi bun, mosor dinon nigin bou yũya taka gama to ibodok,
ere nigin, Kristus Jesus bunem, mata nẽ Awa Uur nẽ lo anim, mosor ado laa nẽ lo bun tamal yalelnan.
Mosor nẽ bouwa felu reya nigin, lo anim age fiya nigin kisi feleya sã anĩ Negur age fen, are ĩ yogon Naal, mosor tamo nẽ bouwa gen bun, mosor yaleleya nẽ sesewi fiya ibodõf nigin sur fiyen anĩ bunem, Negur ĩ, mosor, mosor tamo nẽ bouwa bun ibodok anĩ nẽ megeir yukesin,
are madur bagai wõ youf nigin lo irok anĩ, bouwa nẽ oroya tator ken, Awa Uur nẽ oroya bun tabodõdig ada bun, kisi falauf nigin, Negur ĩ age fen.
Idi bouwa nẽ oroya bun dibodõdig anidi, dogo neid kisi are, ereb mosor nẽ bouwa orof anĩ bun yenẽdig, anĩ ere, idi Awa Uur nẽ oroya bun dibodõdig anidi, dogo neid kisi are, ereb Awa Uur orof anĩ bun yenẽdig.
Kisi mosor nẽ bouwa bun yenẽdig, are laa nẽ, anĩ ere, kisi Awa Uur bun yenẽdig, are mata nẽ ado wau inosiya nẽ,
ere nigin, kisi mosor nẽ bouwa bun inodig, are Negur kiwai ifenẽdig, are Negur nẽ lo farumen to ibodõdig, ĩ age fiya nigineg kisi feleya sã.
Idi mosor nẽ bouwa bun dibodõdig anidi, Negur wau al fiya ifenẽya kisi feleya sã.
Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Awa Uur ã namein ibodõf are, ã mosor nẽ bouwam to ulum iroukeneĩf, anĩ ere, ã Awa Uurem ulum iroukeneĩf. Anĩ ere, taka ĩ Kristus nẽ Awa Uur sãf are, ĩ Kristus nẽ sã.
Anĩ ere, Kristus ã namein ibodõf are, ãgenei bouweĩ mosor nigin laa foufeg, ãgenei uur madur bagai nigin mata ibodok.
Ĩ Jesus tamo gare den bun tamal, kel turĩ fiyen anĩ nẽ Awa Uur, ã namein ibodõf are, ĩ Kristus tamo gare den bun tamal, kel turĩ fiyen, yogon Awa Uur ã namein ibodok anĩ bunem, ãgenei bura leya nẽ bouweĩ matag ifeneĩf.
Anĩ nigin, turau tar, ada wareg ado, are ada mosor nẽ bouwa to dõ tafouf, bouwa nẽ oroya bun to tabodõf.
Ã bouwa nẽ oroya bun ubodõgouf are, ã gare gouf, anĩ ere, Awa Uur bunem ã bouwa nẽ tobonunã anĩ ukesigouf are, ã mata ubodõgouf,
ere nigin, idi Negur nẽ Awa Uurem uyu iroukenẽdif are, idi Negur nẽ gere tar.
Ã kumĩya nẽ ferfer ineneĩya nẽ uur to walegen, anĩ ere, ã Negur nẽ gere tar ineneĩya nẽ Awa Uur walegen. Anĩ nigin, ĩ bunem ada taweig fen, “Aba, Dei” taudig.
Awa Uur yogo, ada neda uur bun kurõ falaisi, ada Negur nẽ gere tar yedig.
Ada in gere tar ouf are, ada ereb el fiya biya Negur ifanadauf nigin promis od iron anĩ talouf. Ada Kristus geid weim yogon fula fiya medeĩyag talouf nigin ada momoi bagai ĩ geid weim yogon darau talouf are, ada Kristus geid weim ereb el fiya biya Negur ifanadauf nigin promis od iron anĩ talouf.
Aya kisi afef, fula fiya medeĩya ada bun yaorouf, are ada neda darau gama talef anĩ wal fiya bagai.
Ereb ereb ganan Negur inodin are, Negur yogo gere tar yaor fediyouf nigin, fatuk bagai tari difedig.
Ere nigin, ereb ereb ganan Negur inodin are, Negur uruwa idi yogon oroya dõ difouf nigin kisi fen anĩ idi to dõ difedig, are dogo neid oroya bunem sã, anĩ ere, ĩ agef inodin anĩ nẽ oroya bunem. Anĩ ere, waud iseya ado,
are ereb ereb ganan Negur inodin, idig dogo bura leya nẽ kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelneĩd fen, Negur nẽ gere tar neid fula fiya medeĩya nẽ karika ibodõya bun gurif iroulediyouf.
Ada keleĩ, ereb ereb ganan Negur inodin, idi kesu gõ fiya nẽ darau bun gen, gariya bunem osi def disi, gama sain enei bun bagaig, age difef.
Anĩ dogol sã, anĩ ere, ada, Awa Uur, are dumen fula fiya medeĩya ada talouf nẽ faat uyulil yũya anĩ talen, ada dugeg, Negur ada bouwada kel geif fen, ada yogon gere tar bagai ya anĩ yaor fe kurõ falaisiyouf nigin, fatuk bagai tari tafe fen, namedan osi taudig.
Ada kel gei fadan sain bun, ada wauda iseya enei talen. Anĩ ere, wau iseya malam ileya are, wau iseya bagai sã. Aim anĩ, ereb ĩ mogo ilef nigin wau isauf?
Anĩ ere, ada ereb ada fau ileya sã nigin wauda isauf are, ada totol tano fen, tari tafouf.
Age fiya gen, Awa Uur ĩ neda felu reya bun isennadadig. Ada ereb nigin kosẽ tauf anĩ ada keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, Awa Uur yogo od faded fiya kisi feleya sã anĩ, osi ye fen, ada nigin kosẽ yedig.
Age fe di, Negur ada wauda fele fedig, ĩ Awa Uur nẽ kisi keleĩ, ere nigin, Awa Uur ĩ tamo kayau fateul nigin Negur nẽ oroya kilei kosẽ yedig.
Ada keleĩ, ereb ereb ganan bun, Negur yogo nigin waud laa fedig anidi neid biya fiya nigin Negur kabĩ yaledig, idi yogon oroya kilei iweignẽdin anidi.
Idi Negurem mogo kelein anidi, Negur idi yogo Naal gen wowã douf nigineg mogo igirnẽdin, are yogon Naal, tura tar musei atun, kesu matu wõ youf nigin age fen.
Agef fen, idi Negur igirnẽdin anidig, ĩ iweignẽdin, idi Negur iweignẽdin anidig, ĩ madur bagai fiyẽdin, idi Negur madur bagai fiyẽdin anidig, ĩ fula fiya medeĩya ifenẽdin.
Age fiyauf are, ada enei nigin ere tauf? Negur ĩ nedauf are, aim anĩ ada daũ fadaya kisi feleya?
Ĩ yogo Naal bagai nigin to katũ ye fen, ada ganan nigin yogo Naal itornen anĩ, naig fe di, ĩ yogo Naal ado ereb ereb gananeg, ege kilẽ to ifanadauf?
Aim anĩ, Negur igirnẽdin anidi kot bun inenẽdiyouf? Negur yogo idi madur bagai fiyẽdidig.
Aim anĩ, idi mosor dinon ye fen, idi bouweid bun od yũf? Kristus Jesus ĩ mogo laa fen, agef feneg, ĩ kel turĩ fe di, matan, ĩ Negur ima biyalẽ ibod ken, ada nigineg kosẽ yedig.
Aim anĩ, ada Kristus nẽ wau laa fiya bun tamal fara fadauf? Kafĩ fiya, morõ, darau, naũ, gemũ, waila be, dimigem age fouf de?
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Õ nigin amã naa tekelei adok laa gurug mafef; amã sipsip didenkesiya nigin age fiya gen dileman.”
Anĩ ere, enei ganan bun, ada, ĩ ada nigin wau laa fen bunem, ada kusĩ wal difen anidi wal fediya tabodok.
Aya momoi auf, laa, mata, engel, kaa sesen, ereb gama nẽ, ereb dumen nẽ, ereb megeir taka,
ilun, kuren bagai be, ereb ereb ganan inodin bun ereb takam, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya, neda Odug Kristus Jesus bun ibodok anĩ bun tamal, ada fara fadaya nigin kisi feleya sã.
Aya Kristus bun momoi orok, aya idegẽya sã, neu kisi es fiya wau bun ibodok, Awa Uur Fateul bunem, aya bun anĩ megeir fef,
are aya fatuk bagai wau gudũf fen, aya faimud wau bun morõ ado.
Ere nigin, aya, neu turau tar, neu ibor anidi nigin, aya yug isisna fen, Kristus bun tamal yalelnauf anĩg, aya orouf.
Idi Israel tamo kayau. Negur nẽ gere tar ya anĩ dogo neid, Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya anĩ, idi bun yaor fen, Negur ado bar itenẽya, lo yaleya, tempel bun Negur yana yaleseya ado, ereb Negur age afouf ye fen igirin, are dogo neid.
Tubuid tar Abraham, Isak, Jakop are dogo neid, idi neid ibor anĩ isi isi Kristus wõ yen, Kristus ĩ Negur, ganan ĩ farumen dibodok, faimud ĩ yana talesauf! Momoi.
Are Negur nẽ od irofosiya gen sã. Ere nigin, Israel ibor bun wõ den anĩ, ganan Israel sã.
Idi Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar ba, anĩ ere, ganan Abraham nẽ gere tar bagai sã. Age fiya ban, “Isak bunem, ogon ibor tar douf.”
Are, tamo nẽ tobonunã nẽ naud bunem Abraham nẽ gere tar wowã den anidi ganan, Negur nẽ gere tar sã, anĩ ere, promis nẽ gere tar idi, Abraham nẽ ibor tar youf.
Negur nẽ promis od anĩ eig fiya, “Yogon sain bun bagai, aya kelauf, Sara kesu adouf.”
Anĩ dogol sã, anĩ ere, Rebeka nẽ gere tar tama tekelei ado, are tubuda Isak.
Anĩ ere, kesu uru fau gõ fiya sã bun, ereb biya be sane be age fiya sã mog, Negur nẽ oroya anĩ, kabĩ bunem sã, iweignẽdif ĩ bunem, yogon igirĩya bun ifarauf nigin,
ĩ Rebeka irokenen, “Matu anĩ, ibuye nẽ aruna yaleyẽf.”
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Aya Jakop nigin wau laa fen, anĩ ere, Esau to oroun.”
Age fiyauf are, ada ere tauf? Negur madur sã de? Sã bagai!
Ere nigin, Negur Moses irokenen, “Aya aib nigin wau yuk anĩ bun, wau yũya afenẽf, aya aib nigin wau irok, ĩ nigin wau yenẽf.”
Anĩ nigin, are, tamo nẽ oroya be kabĩ totol yaleya bunem sã, Negur nẽ wau yũya bunem.
Negur nẽ Itotoya bun, Isip nẽ king Farao nigin eig ye irok, “Aya õ enei nigin bagai king anenon, are aya õ bun neu megeir yaor afe di, teneub ganan bun, neu yanau kurõ difalaisiyouf nigin age afen.”
Anĩ nigin, Negur aib ĩ wau yũya ifenẽya nigin orof bun, ĩ wau yũya ifenẽdig, agef fen, ĩ aib nẽ wau katĩ feleya nigin orof bun, ĩ katĩ feledig.
Ã takam aya irokanauf, “Age fiyauf are, ere nigin Negur fau ada bouwada bun od yuk? Aim anĩ yogon oroya katĩ felef?”
Anĩ ere, tamo õ ai anĩ Negur od solo urokenẽf? “Ereb kare fen anim ĩ kare fen anĩ, ‘Ere nigin eig wo unoyan?’ fiyẽf de?”
Mis inoya tamo ĩ mafer de tekelei anim, mis uru, taka kabĩ biya ifenẽya nẽ, taka kabĩ sane ifenẽya nẽ, yogon oroyam inoya kisi feleya sã de?
Negur ĩ yogon didi anĩ yaor fe di, yogon megeir anĩ tamo kayau keleĩ youf nigin wau iro ken, yogon didi idi bun ile, daũ feidlauf anidi nigin molol bunem loloum fedi di, sain meluk ibodon ouf are, ada ere tauf?
Negur ĩ idi fula fiya medeĩya dalouf nigin dodok fe fen, yogon wau yũya ifenẽdiyouf anidi bun, yogon fula fiya medeĩya barikã anĩ yaor fiya nigineg wau iron ouf are, ada ere tauf?
Ada buneg Negur iweignadan, Juda temeleid dogol sã, haiden buneg.
Are Hosia nẽ itotoya buneg Negur wogõ yef kilei, “Aya idi neu tamo kayau sã anidi, neu tamo kayau auf, age afe fen, aya neu oboiyou sã anĩ, neu oboiyou auf,”
takag, “Negur ‘Ã neu tamo kayau sã’ yen nẽ modoũ anĩ bun, idi anĩ ‘Negur mata ibodõya nẽ gere tar’ youf.”
Asaia Israel nigin iweig iron, “Israel tamo kayau maaĩ ubun mumul gen musei bagai, anĩ ere, musei sã dogol kel gei fediyouf.
Ere nigin, Odug ĩ teneub bun, yogon tamo kayau es fediyouf nẽ od ganan kaisã bagai dõf agef kisi falauf.”
Are Asaia mogo iron kilei, “Odug saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri feid uyu iroudig anĩ, neda ibor nẽ tubu tar tunĩ to itornẽdim are, ada Sodom gen wõ taum, ada Gomora gen tabodom.”
Anĩ nigin, ada ere tauf? Haiden idi madur bagai anĩ to dimiren anidi, momoiya bunem madur bagai anĩ dalen.
Anĩ ere, Israel idi madur bagai nẽ lo dõ difen, idi madur bagai anĩ yaleya sã.
Ere nigin yaleya sã? Idi Negur nigin momoiya bunem dõ fiya sã, anĩ ere, lo dõ fiya bunem, Negur mala bun madur bagai dalouf nigin age difen nigin. Idi ye tũ fiya nẽ meein anim yeid tũ fen.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Lo weleg, aya Saion oun tamo yeid tũ fiya nigin meein taka, idi kubũ douf nigin sa tuwa taka anof, age afe di, taka ĩ, ĩ nigin momoi youf, ĩ mama to bagai yalouf.”
Turau tar, aya Negur ĩ Israel kel gei fediyouf nigin wau iro ken, Negur bun kosẽ audig.
Aya idi nigin kurõ afeis eig auf, idi Negur nigin kisi totol dinodig, anĩ ere, idi neid kisi totol are keleĩ bunem sã.
Ere nigin, idi madur bagai Negur bunem isif anĩ to kelei ken, dogo neid madur bagai anĩ dalouf nigin dimiren, age dife fen, idi, Negur tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab anĩ ditoron.
Kristus ĩ, idi momoi def ganan madur bagai wowã douf nigin, lo nẽ idikeleya wõ yen.
Moses ĩ madur bagai lo ganan dõ fiya bunem isif nigin eig ye itoton, “Tamo ĩ lo enei dõ fef, ĩ anĩ bunem mata ibodõf.”
Anĩ ere, madur bagai momoiya bunem isif anĩ eig ye irok, “Õ waũ bun to eig wo urõf, ‘Aim anĩ saa ilun iselauf?’ ” (are, Kristus irou isiyouf nigin)
“oo ‘Aim anĩ teneub kur bagai isilauf?’ ” (are, tamo gare den bun tamal Kristus irou isauf nigin).
Anĩ ere, ĩ ere ye irok? “Od anĩ õ wagen ibodok, are ogon sigor bun, ogon waũ bun ibodok,” are momoiya nẽ od amã wogõ maudig anĩ.
Are õ ogon sigorom, “Jesus ĩ Odug,” wo fen, õ waũ bun, Negur ĩ Jesus tamo gare den bun tamal kel turĩ fiyen anĩ, momoi wouf are, õ kel yaleyõf.
Are, taka ĩ wau bun momoi ye di, Negur ĩ madur bagai yef, age fe di, taka ĩ sigorom momoi auf ye di, Negurem ĩ kel yalouf.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Taka ĩ, ĩ nigin momoi youf, ĩ mama to bagai yalouf.”
Juda ado haiden bun fire fire sã, Odug de tekelei anĩ ganan nẽ Odug, ĩ idi diweignek ganan bun el fiya fatuk bagai ifenẽdidig,
are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Idi Odug nẽ yana dale diweignek ganan, Negurem kel gei fediyouf.”
Age fiyauf are, naig fe di, idi ĩ nigin to momoi den ani diweignẽf? Naig de fen, idi to karĩ den anĩ nigin momoi douf? Taka nem to irokenẽdiyouf are, naig de fen, idi karĩ douf?
Idi to sur fediyouf are, idi naig de fen, od wogõ douf? Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Idi biya od diroulef anidi, yeid gai meli bagai!”
Anĩ ere, Israel tunĩ biya od anĩ to dalen. Idi age difen nigin, Asaia eig ye iron, “Odug, aim anĩ nemã od nigin momoi yen?”
Anĩ nigin, momoiya anĩ biya od karĩya bunem isidig, biya od karĩya are Kristus nẽ od bunem isidig.
Anĩ ere, aya to afef; Idi to karĩ dedig de? Momoi, idi karĩ den, are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Neu arũ tamo neid aiteid, teneub ganan bun iyokelen, dogo neid od teneub idikeleya bun ilen.”
Baban aya to afef: Israel idi to kelein de? Uruwa bun, Negur Moses bunem iron, “Aya tamo kayau yeneid sã idi bun age afe di, idi nigin ã kiyeĩ unogouf. Aya tamo kayau keleĩ sã idi bun age afe di, idi nigin ã nameĩ saneuf.”
Takag, Asaia kukĩya sã eig ye iron, “Idi aya to dimirnan, aya dileyauf. Idi aya nigin to fiya san anidi bun, aya yug yaor afouf.”
Anĩ ere, Israel nigin ĩ eig ye iron, “Naa tekelei adok, aya tamo kayau dõ fiya sã, fe temeleid bun imau dõ au fen, tari afedif abodon.”
Age fiyauf are, aya to afef: Negur ĩ yogon tamo kayau aulel fedin de? Sã bagai! Aya yug Israel temelou, Abraham nẽ ibor, Benjamin nẽ gĩ bun temelou.
Negur ĩ, yogon tamo kayau, ĩ mogo gariya bunem kelei ken igirnẽdin anidi to aulel fedin. Ereb Negur nẽ Itotoya bun Eliya nigin irok, are ĩ Negur ado, Israel idi nigin bou yũya od wogõ den anĩ, ã to keleĩ de?
“Odug, idi mogo ogon profet didenkeis fen, ogon alta narĩ difedin. Aya mugu dogol ditorna fen, idi aya dinakesiyouf nigin age difef.”
Age ye di, Negur ere od solof irokenen? “Aya, aya yug nigin sewen tausen tamo idi idegẽya waitou Bal bun to iboreid bobou difen anidi, foi afen.”
Age fiya gen, sain enei buneg, Negur wau ifenẽya bunem musei sã igirnẽdin anidi fau dibodok.
Igirĩya anĩ, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem isin, are tamo nẽ kabĩ bunem sã. Igirĩya anĩ tamo nẽ kabĩ bunem isin ouf are, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya anĩ, wau ifenẽya sa ken, mala ifenẽya yenem.
Anĩ nigin, ada ere tauf? Ereb Israel idi kabĩ totol dale fen, dimiren anĩ, idi to dalen, anĩ ere, Israel tunĩ musei sã Negur igirnẽdin anidim dogol dalen. Israel tunĩ ganan Negur waud ifofakelen.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Negur, idi kisi kurã fiya sã nẽ uur, meleid to dilouf nẽ ado, wedereid to karĩ douf nẽ anĩ ifenẽdin, anĩ bunem isi gama naa enei bun.”
Takag, Dawid eig ye iron, “Neu kiwai tar, idi neid sifa nẽ tebol bun, saaf dokon waud kulĩ yen sain bun, idi suk bun gei difediyouf, idi kor bun gei difediyouf, idi neid el fiyam, dogo yeid tũ difouf nigin ado, mala solo fiya nẽ darau, idi bun wõ youf nigin aya orouf.
Dogo neid meleid gugum kele fen, to dilouf, dogo neid bagiyeid gai gai nigin fe fesilauf anĩ orouf.”
Age fiyauf are, aya to afef: Idi yeid tũ fe di, kubũ de fen, baban fãya kisi feleya sã de? Sã bagai! Anĩ fotokar, idi neid mosor nigin, kel gei fiya are haiden bun isin, are Israel idi kiyeĩ dinouf nigin age fen.
Anĩ ere, idi neid mosor nigin tenebur tamo kayau bun el fiya kisi feleya bagai wõ ye fen, idi neid kũ fenẽya nigin haiden bun el fiya kisi feleya bagai wõ youf are, idi neid gire fiya anim naig fiya el fiya kisi feleya bagai irousiyouf!
Aya ã haiden bun wogõ auf. Aya haiden bun aposel nigin, aya neu kabĩ nigin fatuk bagai yanau alesef,
are aya neu Israel tamo kayau turĩ afeid, idi kiyeĩ dinouf bun, idi tunĩ kel gei afouf nigin age afef.
Negur idi aulel fedin bunem, tenebur tamo kayau idi Negur geid komo fiya dalen ouf are, sain Negur idi yalediyouf bun, ere anĩ wõ youf? Are idi tamo kayau ganan gare den bun tamal mata kel fã den gen ouf.
Wit uyulil faat yun anĩ bunem sesewi fiya nẽ bret dinof, anĩ nẽ masak fateul ouf are, bret gananeg fateul. Warumutei anĩ fateul ouf are, were gananeg fateul.
Were tunĩ kokour fele fen, õ oliv aa kuĩ nẽ were, oliv aa bun bagu yõ di, oliv aa nẽ warumutei bun saaf tekelei waledig,
anĩ nigin, Israel idi bun, õ haiden yanã to wales. Õ yanã walesauf are, enei kisi wo: Õ warumutei to usennek, anĩ ere, warumutei anĩ õ isennok.
Anĩ ere, õ eig wo urõf, “Aya aa anĩ bun bagu fiyauf nigin were kokour feledin.”
Are momoi. Ani ere, idi momoiya sã nigin kokour feledin, age fe di, õ momoiya bunem ufaref. Õ yanã to wales, anĩ ere, õ kumĩ wouf.
Ere nigin, Negur ĩ Israel idi oliv aa nẽ were bagai yalelnẽdiyouf nigin to katũ yen ouf are, ĩ õ nigineg to katũ youf.
Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ molol ado wau itenẽya nigin kisi gouf, ĩ idi kubũ den anidi bun wau itenen, anĩ ere, ã in molol bun toku ubodõgouf are, ĩ ã bun molol ibodõf. Anĩ ere, ã in molol bun to ubodõgouf are, ãg kokour yeikalauf.
Israel idi momoiya sã bun toku to dibodõf are, idi baban aa oliv bun bagu fediyouf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ baban idi bagu fediya nigin kisi feleya.
Õ ogon gariya oliv aa kuĩ bagai bun tamal kokour fele fen, ogon gariya sã oliv aa bagai kulatun fedig anĩ bun bagu yon ouf are, oliv aa bagai nẽ were eneidi, naig fiya karika bagai dogo neid oliv aa bagai bun bagu fediyouf!
Turau tar, aya waa enei ã to keleĩ youf nigin to orouf, are ã aug nigin keleĩ biya ado to gouf nigin age afef. Waa are, Negurem Israel tunĩ waud ifofakelen, anĩ bunem idi dibodok disi mog, haiden idi Negurem igirnẽdin anidi ganan Negur wagen disiyouf sain anĩ bun.
Age dife di, Israel ganan kel gei fediyouf, are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Kel yaleya tamo Saion bun tamal isiyouf, ĩ Jakop bun tamal Negur nẽ od dõ fiya sã nẽ tobonunã anĩ yalelauf.
Aya, idi geid bar itenẽya nẽ enei atenẽf, anĩ bunem aya dogo neid mosor alelauf.”
Biya od nigin, idi ã nigin kiwai, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ igirĩya nigin, idi tubuid tar nigin, Negur idi nigin wau laa fedig,
ere nigin, Negur nẽ ege luwa ado yogon igirĩya anĩ falei fiya kisi feleya sã.
Ã uruwa bun Negur dõ fiya sã, anĩ ere, ã gama, Israel Negur dõ fiya sã nigin, Negur nẽ wau yũya walegen.
Age fiya gen, idig gama Negur dõ fiya sã, are Negur nẽ wau yũya ã ifenein anĩ bunem, idig gama Negur nẽ wau yũya dalouf nigin age fen.
Age fiya nigin, Negur ĩ tamo ganan, dõ fiya sã nẽ kafĩ fiya bun inenẽdin, are ĩ idi ganan wau yũya ifenẽdiyouf nigin age fen.
O Negur nẽ kisi biya ado keleĩ biya, are kisi feleya bagai ilon bagai isilef. Yogon es fiya anĩ imir ken, keleĩya kisi feleya sã, yogon delẽ iyõdig anĩ dir feleya kisi feleya sã.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Aim anĩ Odug nẽ kisi kelein? Aim anĩ ĩ ulum iroukenen?”
“Aim anĩ Negur ifenen nigin Negur ĩ aba kel ifenẽf?”
Ada keleĩ, od enei are momoi, ere nigin, ereb ereb ganan ĩ bun tamal isif, ereb ereb ganan ĩ bunem ibodok, ereb ereb ganan ĩ bun ilef. Ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya faimud ibodõf! Momoi.
Anĩ nigin, turau tar, aya, ã, Negur nẽ wau yũya ada ifanadan bunem totol bagai arokeneik, ãgenei bouweĩ, mata ibodõya nẽ sesewi fiya, fateul ado Negur wau kulĩya nẽ anĩ gen Negur wenẽgouf. Enei anĩ, ãgenei uurem Negur yana yaleseya.
Tenebur enei nẽ oroya baban to dõg, anĩ ere, Negur ãgenei kisi falei fe mata inoyeĩ di, ãgenei kisi mata anĩ dõ gouf, anĩ bunem, ã Negur nẽ oroya, are yogon biya nẽ, kulĩya nẽ ado, kisi feleya nẽ oroya anĩ keleĩ youf.
Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem, aposel kabĩ yaleya nẽ yana aya ifanan nigin, aya ã ganan arokeneik: Taka ĩ yogo nigin kisi fouf anĩ to wal fe fen, kisi fouf, anĩ ere, momoiya Negur ifenen anĩ kilei, es fiya biya bun yogo nigin kisi fouf.
Ada bouwada tekelei bun fara fiya musei ado, anĩ ere, fara fiya ganan bun kabĩ tekelei sã,
age fiya gen, ada fara fiya musei, anĩ ere, Kristus bun, bouwada tekelei, fara fiya mugu mugu tunĩ ganan geid bagu fedif.
Negur wau ifenẽya ada ifanadan kilei, ada Negur nẽ igirĩya ege luwa fire fire ado. Tamo ĩ profet od wogõya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ yogon momoiya kilei wogõ youf.
Ĩ aruna yaleya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ aruna yalouf. Ĩ ifelnẽya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ ifelnẽya kabĩ yalouf.
Ĩ wau yaleseya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ taka nẽ wau yalesauf. Ĩ tunĩ lau fiya isennẽya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ wau sã ifenẽdiyouf. Ĩ uyu irouya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ fõ fiya sã uyu irouya kabĩ yalouf. Ĩ wau yũya ifelnẽya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ wau kulĩya ado age fouf.
Wau laa fiya are mala yaleya sã. Ereb sane anĩ seseg fen, ereb biya anĩ kafĩ weleg.
Ã abob bun tureĩ tar bagai nigin gen, wauĩ laa fiya bun wauĩ wenẽgouf. Ã atun abob yana ketem ilun walesagauf.
Ã to fõ yei ken, kabĩ totol waleg. Ãgenei uur nẽ totol bunem, Odug aruna walogouf.
Wau iseya bun wauĩ kulĩ youf, morõ bun megeir ufaragauf, toku kosẽ gouf.
Negur nẽ tamo kayau lau difef anidi wenẽdigouf. Tamo urug waledigouf.
Idi ã darau difeneik anidi el fiya wenẽdigouf, el fiya wenẽdig fen, to usisnẽdigouf.
Idi waud kulĩ yef geid kulĩ gouf, idi inã dalef geid inã walogouf.
Ã abob nigin wauĩ tekelei yenẽf. Ã yeneĩ to walesagauf, anĩ ere, ã tenebur difaref geid nigal yũya nigin ago gouf. Ã aug nigin keleĩ biya ado to gouf.
Ã aib taka sane age yeik anĩ, aba sane to wiyẽgouf. Tamo ganan meleid bun ereb madur age fiya nigin karĩ walagauf.
Ã kisi feleyauf are, ganan geid wau inosiya bun ubodõgouf.
Neu oboiyou tar, ã aug mala solo to wenẽdigouf, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ didi nigin modoũ unogouf, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ya ibodok, “Odug irok, mala solo ifenẽya are neu. Ayam mala solo afenẽf.”
Age fiya ban, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ya ibodok, “Ogon kiwai naũ fouf are, saaf wenẽ yãf, ĩ naan ail fouf are, naan wenẽ yãf. Anĩ agouf bun, ĩ yogon ereb sane age fen nigin mama sane falauf.”
Ã sane anim to wal yeĩf, anĩ ere, ãgem biya bunem sane anĩ wal gouf.
Tamo kayau ganan gawaman farumedin dibodõf, ere nigin, gawaman Negurem to inodin anĩ taka to ibodok. Gawaman gama dibodok are Negur yogo inodin.
Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ gawaman kiwai ifenek, ĩ ereb Negurem inon anĩ kiwai ifenek. Idi anĩ age difef, idi es fiya dogo bouweid bun dinouf.
Ere nigin, uyu irouya tamo, idi biya age difef anidi kumĩ to difiyẽdidig, anĩ ere, idi sane age difef anidi kumĩ difiyẽdidig. Uyu irouya ĩ õ to kumĩ ifonõf anĩ, õ oroyok de? Agouf are, ereb tobonunã biya anĩ ago wo di, ĩ õ yanã yalesauf.
Ere nigin, ĩ ogon biya fiya nigin Negur nẽ kabĩ tamo inenen. Anĩ ere, sane ago wouf, õ kumĩ wouf, ere nigin, ĩ dimig ege to irouf. Ĩ Negur nẽ kabĩ tamo, ĩ mala ifenẽya tamo, idi sane age difef anidi bun Negur nẽ didi irou isif.
