Nemã karika ado sain modeg nẽ morõ anim, faimud ibodkeleya nẽ fula fiya medeĩya, are morõ anĩ ganan fatuk bagai wal fiya anĩ, amã malouf nigin kabĩ yaledig.
Anĩ nigin, ada ereb maladam tailef ani to lo tafalauf, anĩ ere, ereb maladam to tailef anĩ lo tafalauf. Ere nigin, ereb tailef, are sain tobega nẽ, anĩ ere, ereb to tailef, are faimud ibodkeleya nẽ.
Ada keleĩ, tenebur nẽ salafat ada anĩ namen tabodõdig anĩ narĩ fouf are, ada fõ taka Negur bun tamal ado, are saa ilun oun faimud ibodkeleya nẽ fõ, are tamo imam inoya sã.
Gama ada fõ enei bun tabod ken, osi taudig, age tafe fen, saa ilun neda ibodõya modoũ bunem ifounnadauf nigin wauda fatuk irõdig,
ere nigin, ada saa tanon ibodõya nẽ bouwa ifounnadauf sain bun, ada gemũ to diledauf.
Ada salafat enei bun tabod mog, morõ faali tafe fen, osi taudig, ere nigin, ada salafat enei lelek fel kanadauf nigin to orodadig, anĩ ere, saa ilun neda ibodõya modoũ bun ifounnadauf nigin orodadig, anĩ bunem, ereb laa nẽ anĩ, mata anim itob lauf.
Negur ĩ enei nigin bagai ada inoda fen, ada wauda bun, ereb isiyouf anĩ momoi bagai isiyouf ye fen, Awa Uur iben.
Anĩ nigin, ada faimud kisi totol ado fen keleĩ, are ada bouwada buru ado tabodok sain anĩ bun, ada Odug weim to tabodõdig.
Ada momoiya bunem tabodõdig, ereb maladam tailef bunem sã.
Aya arok, ada kisi totol ado fen, ada bouwada enei tator ken, Odug geid takai tabodõf nigin orodaf bagai.
Anĩ nigin, ada bouwada buru ado tabodok be tatorok be, ĩ wau al fouf nigin ada kisi tatenẽf.
Ere nigin, ada ganan Kristus nẽ es fiya sia wagen wõ tauf bagai, are mugu mugu, ereb biya be sane be, ada bouwada buru ado tabod ken, age tafen anĩ kilei, yogon mala solo yalouf.
Amã Odug anini fiyẽya anĩ keleĩ nigin, amã tamo waud yaleya nigin age mafedig. Amã naig fiya anĩ Negur keleĩ bagai, age fiya gen, amã nigineg ãgenei kisi es fiya bun yaorouf nigin, aya wau irok.
Amã ã bun baban yanamã yaleseya nigin to age mafef, anĩ ere, ã amã yanamã walesagauf nigin sain mafeneik, anĩ bunem, idi ereb waud bun ibodok anĩ fotokar, ereb meledim dilef anĩ nigin yeneid dalesedig anidi bun, ã solof irõya kisi feleya.
Amã wadã idenamãf, are Negur nigin. Amã kisi biya adouf, are ã nigin.
Kristus nẽ wau laa fiya anim amã toli famãdig, amã kisi mafef, tekeleim ganan nigin laa fen, anĩ nigin, yogon laa bun, ganan gare den.
Ĩ ganan nigin laa fen, anĩ nigin, idi mata dibodok anidi dogo nigin to dibodõf, anĩ ere, ĩ idi nigin laa fe di, kel turĩ fiyen anĩ nigin dibodõf.
Anĩ nigin, gama einenem ilef ganan, ada tamo nẽ karĩya bunem taka to keleĩ youf. Ada kulu naab enei bunem Kristus kelein, anĩ ere, ada baban to age tafedig.
Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ Kristus bun ibodok, Negur ĩ yale, mata bagai inon. Tubu are ilele di, mata anĩ isin.
Enei ganan Negur bun tamal, ĩ Kristus bunem ada ĩ geid komo fada fen, komo fiya nẽ kabĩ anĩ ada ifanadan.
Are Negur ĩ tamo nẽ mosor idi bun to iwes fen, Kristus bun tenebur tamo kayau ĩ geid komo fedin. Agef fen, Negur ĩ komo fiya nẽ od ada bun inon.
Anĩ nigin, amã Kristus nẽ soosi tamo, are Negur ĩ yogon wau irõya, amã bunem wogõ yedig gen. Amã Kristus fotokar ã magoneik, Negur geid komo gouf.
Negur ĩ, ada nigin ye fen, Kristus mosor sã anĩ, mosor ĩ bun inon, are ĩ bunem, ada Negur nẽ madur bagai wowã tauf nigin age fen.
Negur nẽ kabĩ tura tar amã, ã totol bagai marokeneik, are Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya walegen anĩ, ege to aaluwan ilauf.
Ere nigin, Negur ĩ irok, “Neu wau ifenẽya sain bun, aya õ karĩ ayon, kel yaleya nẽ naa bun, aya õ asennon.” Aya ã arokeneik, gama eĩ Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya nẽ sain, gama eĩ kel yaleya nẽ naa.
Amã taka delẽ ilauf bun ye to tũ fouf nigin meein to manodig, are nemã kabĩ yana sane to ilauf nigin age mafedig.
Age fiya ban, amã, naab ganan bun, amã Negur nẽ kabĩ tamo bagai ya anĩ mafelnẽdidig, are feseya sã ifareya bun, darau, morõ, wau morõ bun,
didenamak bun, kalabus bun, kusĩ bun, kabĩ totol bun, bõ mulaĩ itorõya bun ado, naũ bun,
karẽtut bun, keleĩ bun, molol bun, dor yaleya bun, Awa Uur Fateul bun ado, wau laa fiya bagai bun,
momoi nẽ wogõ bun, Negur nẽ megeir bun, madur bagai nẽ waila ima biyalẽ ado ima kilẽ bun,
tunĩ yanamã dalesedig ado tunĩ to yanamã dalesedig bunem, yana sane inoya ado yana biya inoya bunem; amã momoi marok, anĩ ere, amã idegẽya tamo gen kisi difedig;
idi amã nigin keleĩ, anĩ ere, keleĩ sã gen kisi difedig; gare mauf, anĩ ere, amã mata mabodok; didenaman, anĩ ere, to didenamakesin;
waumã gudũ fef, anĩ ere, faimud waumã kulĩ yedig; maleg, anĩ ere, musei safina kisi feleya manenẽdidig; ereb taka sã, anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan ado.
Korin tamo kayau, amã karika wogõ mayein. Age ma fen, amã ã bun waumã sukar fatuk bagai kã mafen.
Amã nemã waumã laa fiya ã bun to mafokeledig, anĩ ere, ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya amã bun ufokelegedig.
Aya neu kesu tar bun gen ã wogõ ayeik, ã solog fen, wauĩg sukar fatuk bagai kãg.
Momoiya sã geid to bagu gouf. Madur bagai sane ado naig de nigal dũf? Lalan gugum ado ere bunem nigal dũf?
Kristus Satan ado naig fe di, waud tekelei youf? Ere anĩ momoiya ado, momoiya sã atun tekelei?
Negur nẽ tempel, idegẽya waitou atun, ere mamad katõ fiya ado? Are ada mata ibodõya Negur nẽ tempel. Negur iron kilei, “Aya idi geid mabod ken, idi atun ayõf, age afe fen, aya idi neid Negur ouf, age afe di, idi neu tamo kayau ouf.”
“Anĩ nigin, utornẽdig fen, fire ufareg, Odug irok. Ereb amuyẽ ado to kobũg, ago ge di, aya ã aleyeĩf.”
“Aya ãgenei temeĩ di, ã nau kesu tar, nau barai tar ouf, Odug saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri feid uyu iroudig anĩ irok.”
Ã neu oboiyou, ada Negur age afouf yen od enei ado nigin, ada dug ereb ereb ganan bouwa ado uur amuyẽ ifenẽdig anĩ lilik tafe fen, Negur anini fiyẽya bunem fateul bagai wõ tauf.
Ãgenei wauĩ bun, amã nigin modoũ unog. Amã aib taka bun to kũ mafenen, amã aib taka sane bun to manenen, amã aib taka idegnẽya bunem ereb ereb to son mafen.
Aya ã bouweĩ yũya nigin od enei to wogõ auf. Ere nigin, aya mogo oron, are ãgenei ibodõya modoũ, amã waumã bun ado nigin, amã ã geid mata tabodõf be, gare tauf.
Aya ã nigin fatuk bagai momoi au fen, fatuk bagai ã yeneĩ alesef. Aya wau fatuk bagai yalesef, nemã morõ ganan bun, neu wau kulĩya gogũ felef.
Sain amã Masedonia masin, nemã bouwamã enei si inoya san, anĩ ere, amã siri ganan bun darau difanaman, serẽ kiwai difanamã mog, nameman kumĩ ado.
Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ waud morõ adodo waud yo fedidig, Taitus isin bunem ĩ waumã yo fen.
Are, in isin bunem dogol sã, anĩ ere, wau yo fiya ĩ wenẽgen anĩ bunem ado. Ã aya uleyagauf nigin bagai oroyein, ereb wõ yen anĩ nigin ãgenei awaun yeya odug fen, ã aya nigin kisi fatuk bagai walegedig anĩ ĩ irokanaman, anĩ bunem, neu kulĩya odug bagai iselen.
Aya neu pas bunem wauĩ gudũ fiya afenein, anĩ nigin, aya uruwa bun awaun aun. Anĩ ere, gama aya anĩ nigin to awaun auf, ere nigin, aya ailef, are neu pas anim, sain naal bagai dogol wauĩ gudũ fen.
Anĩ ere, gama aya wau al fef, are wauĩ gudũ fiya afenein anĩ nigin sã, anĩ ere, ãgenei wauĩ gudũ fiya anim, wauĩ faleiya bun irouleyein nigin. Ere nigin, ã Negur nẽ oroya kilei wauĩ gudũ fen, anĩ nigin, amã ã daũ fiya to mafenein.
Wau gudũ fiya Negur nẽ orof kilei anĩ, wau faleiya irousi, kel yaleya bun irouledig, anĩ nigin, ada to awaun taudig, anĩ ere, tenebur nẽ wau gudũ fiya laa irousidig.
Negur nẽ wau gudũ fiya eneim, ã bun faat yun anĩ ulogouf, are ereb totol bagai wauĩ irõdig, morõ wõ yen anim to lai yeĩf nigin ereb ã aug madur gedig, ereb sane nigin seye gedig, ereb Negur nigin anini gedig, ereb taka nigin bagai oroyeĩdig, ereb kabĩ totol walegedig, ereb sane age fen bun mala solo wenẽgedig. Ereb ereb ganan bun, ã aug enei nigin kũ fenẽya taka sã anĩ yaor gen.
Anĩ nigin, aya ã bun atoton are, taka ĩ sane age fen be, takam ĩ bun sane age fen anĩ nigin sã, anĩ ere, ã amã nigin naig ge wauĩ wanamãgef anĩ, Negur mala bun aug ulogouf nigin age afen.
Enei ganan nigin amã waumã yo fef. Amã waumã yo fiya anĩ teten, amã Taitus ĩ fatuk bagai wau al fen anĩ mail fen, fatuk bagai waumã al fen, ere nigin, yogon uur ã ganan bunem filolõ fen.
Aya ĩ bun yeneĩ alesen, age afe di, ã aya mama to wanagen. Anĩ ere, ereb amã wogõ mayein anĩ ganan momoi, age fiya gen, amã Taitus bun yeneĩ malesen areg, momoi anĩ yaoren.
Ã ganan ĩ dõg fen, aniniya ado tererẽya bunem ĩ walegen anĩ, ĩ kisif fen, ã nigin yogon wau laa fiya mugi bagai ilen.
Aya, ereb ereb ganan bun, ã nigin, sã momoi auf nigin, wau al fef.
Turamã tar, amã, ã wau ifenẽya Negur Masedonia sios ifenẽdin anĩ keleĩ youf nigin oromak.
Idi morõ odug bagai dale fen, maleg bagai dibodon, anĩ ere, idi neid waud kulĩya mugi ado bun, idi isennẽdiya nigin kolekta moni musei difenẽdin.
Aya kurõ afeis eig au arokeneik, idi ifenẽdiya kisi feleya ado, anĩ wal fesiyag difenẽdin. Dogo neid oroyam,
idi Negur nẽ tamo kayau isennẽdiya kabĩ amã geid malouf, are dem de fen, anĩ nigin totol bagai dirokanaman.
Age dife fen, idi, amã idi nigin kisi mafen kilei, to age difen, anĩ ere, idi anĩ wal fiya age difen. Idi dogo anĩ ketem Odug difen ken, anĩ dumen Negur nẽ oroya dõ de, idi dogo amã difanaman.
Anĩ nigin, amã Taitus totol bagai marokenen, ĩ uruwa bun gariya inon nigin, wau ifenẽya nẽ kabĩ enei ã buneg bure falauf nigin marokenen.
Anĩ ere, ã ereb ereb ganan bun, momoiya bun, wogõ bun, keleĩ bun, wauĩ adok irõya ganan bun, ãgenei wauĩ amã nigin laa fiya bun, kisi feleya ago gef gen, wau ifenẽya nẽ kabĩ enei buneg ã kisi feleya ago gouf.
Aya ã ago gouf bagai nigin sii fiya to afeneik, anĩ ere, aya sios tunĩ kabĩ totol dalef anĩ bunem, ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya anĩ, momoi be sã be anĩ es ayeĩf.
Ere nigin, ã neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya keleĩ, are ĩ safina kisi feleya, anĩ ere, ã nigin ĩ maleg wõ yen, are yogon maleg bunem ã safina kisi feleya wõ gouf nigin, ĩ age fen.
Aya enei nigin neu kisi, ãgenei biya fiya nigin afeneik. Yar tubu bun, ã ket wenẽdigen anĩ dogol sã, ã ago gouf nigin wauĩ iseya anĩg adon.
Gama kabĩ anĩ udikalagauf, anĩ bunem, ã ago gouf nigin, ãgenei oroya totol bagai ibodon gen, ã safina kisi feleya kilei kabĩ anĩ bure walagauf.
Oroya anĩ an ibodõf are, Negur ereb tamo taka safina ado kilei anĩ yalouf, ereb tamo taka safina sã bunem sã.
Amã nemã oroya, tunĩ waud karika ifenẽdi di, ã wauĩ morõ ifeneik anĩ sã, anĩ ere, ganan kisi kisi feleya ibodõya nigin oromak.
Sain enei bun, ãgenei ereb ereb musei anim, ereb idi lau difef anĩ gadõ gouf, anĩ bunem, dogo neid ereb ereb musei animeg, abag ereb ã lau gef anĩ gadõ difouf, age dife di, kisi kisi feleya ubodõgouf,
are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Taka ĩ safina musei kuru fen, ĩ musei bagai to yalen, taka ĩ naal kuru fen, ĩ to lau fen.”
Aya, Negur ĩ, kisi aya ã nigin ado kisi de tekelei, Taitus nẽ wau bun inon nigin, Negur de afiyek.
Ere nigin, Taitus ĩ, nemã od ã ki yeĩya nigin anĩ, de ye fen, ĩ yogon wau irõya odug bagai ado, yogon oroyam ã gein isif.
Amã, turamã taka biya od bun yogon kabĩ nigin, sios ganan yana dalesedig anĩ, Taitus ado sur mafedif.
Enei dogol sã, turamã ĩ anĩ, wau ifenẽya nẽ kabĩ enei bun, amã geid mayok malauf nigin, siosem digirnen, kabĩ are, amã Odug bun fula fiya medeĩya marousiyouf nigin ado, amã nemã isennẽdiya nigin waumã irõya mafelnẽdiyouf nigin kabĩ malef anĩ.
Amã, wau ifenẽya bunem ege luwa musei dinon enei, lo ma mog, tunĩ anĩ nigin od sane to dirõf nigin oromak.
Ere nigin, amã Odug mala bun ado, tamo meleid buneg, ereb madur bagai anĩ age mafouf nigin lo mafedig.
Amã, turamã taka, idi geid sur mafedif, ĩ amã sain musei es mafiye ken, ĩ ereb ereb musei bun kabĩ totol yaledig anĩ mailedig, ĩ ã nigin fatuk bagai momoi yef nigin, ĩ gama isennẽdiya nigin kabĩ totol yaleya orib yef.
Taitus nigin, ĩ neu tã tar taka, ĩ ã nigin neu kabĩ turau; nemã turamã tar nigin, idi sios neid arũ tamo, Kristus bun fula fiya medeĩya dirousidig.
Anĩ nigin, ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya nẽ kaũ ado, amã ã yeneĩ malesedig anĩ nẽ gariya nẽ kaũ, tamo eneidi ufelnẽdigouf, anĩ bunem, sios idi anĩ dilouf.
Ã mogo keleĩ nigin, aya Negur nẽ tamo kayau bun kabĩ enei nigin baban to atotkeneĩf.
Ere nigin, aya isennẽdiya nigin ãgenei wauĩ irõya totol anĩ kelei ken, Masedonia tamo kayau bun yeneĩ alesedig, are yar tubu bun tamal isi, gama ã Akaia an isennẽdiya nigin dodok gen anĩ arokenẽdi di, isennẽdiya nigin ãgenei wauĩ irõya totol anim, idi musei waud fã yen.
Anĩ ere, aya turau tar sur afedin, are amã ã yeneĩ malesedig anĩ enei bun ege to ilauf, anĩ ere, ã aya aron gen dodok gouf nigin, age afen.
Ere nigin, Masedonia tamo tunĩ aya geid masi fen, ã dodok fiya sã anĩ dilouf are, amã ã nigin momoiya age fiya ado nigin mama malouf, ãg mama yeĩf nigin ereb od taka sã.
Anĩ nigin, aya kisi afen, aya turau tar totol bagai arokenẽdi di, idi ketem ã gein dile fen, ã wau ifenẽya nẽ ege luwa musei wenẽdigouf urõgen anĩ nigin dodok fiya bure difalauf, are deuf, aun. Age dife di, wau ifenẽya nẽ ege luwa dodok fiyauf, are nugo yeĩya bunem ege luwa inoya sã.
Enei karĩ walagauf, aib taka faat musei sã irarak, ĩ musei sãg kusu fouf, aib taka faat musei irarak, ĩ museig kusu fouf.
Tamo mugu mugu, ereb yogon wau bun ifenẽya nigin kisi ifon anĩ ifenẽf, are wau morõ bunem sã, takam nugo fiya bunem sã, ere nigin, Negur ĩ tamo wau kulĩya bunem ifenek nigin wau laa fef.
Negur ĩ wau ifenẽya ganan ã kisi feleya bagai ifeneĩya kisi feleya, are ereb ereb ganan bun, ã faimud ereb ã kisig fen, lau gef anĩ ganan waleg fen, kabĩ biya ganan kisi feleya bagai ago gouf nigin age fef.
Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei: “Ĩ yogon safina firagagaũ feid fen, maleg ifenẽdin; yogon madur bagai faimud ibodkalauf.”
Negur ĩ, faat irarãya tamo, faat ado yõya nẽ bret ifenẽdig, ĩ ãgenei faat irarãya nigineg ifen ken, musei inouf, agef fen, ĩ ãgenei madur bagai nẽ kusu fiya odug inouf.
Negur ĩ ereb ereb ganan bun, ã safina ado inoyeĩf, anĩ bunem, ã sain ganan wau ifenẽya bunem musei wenẽdigouf, ago ge di, idi amã bunem ãgenei ege luwa dale fen, Negur de difiyẽf.
Kabĩ enei ã walegedig anim, ereb Negur nẽ tamo kayau lau difef anĩ nigin dogol to isennẽdif, anĩ ere, ago ge di, musei idi Negur de difiyek buneg gogũ felef.
Kabĩ ã walegedig anĩ bunem, ã aug nigin yaor gen, anĩ nigin, tamo idi Negur yana dalesauf, ere nigin, ã Kristus nẽ biya od kurõ wesig fen, anĩ dõg fen, ã wau ifenẽya bunem idi adok ganan bun musei wenẽdigen.
Age de fen, ã nigin idi neid kosẽ bun, dogo neid waud ã bun isiyouf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ wau ifenẽya ereb ereb ganan wal fiya anĩ ã ifenein.
Negur nẽ ege luwa dir feleya kisi feleya sã anĩ nigin, Negur de tafiyẽf!
Aya, Pol, tunĩ dirõdig, aya ã geid tabodok sain bun, are yukeleya dedig, aya ã geid to tabodok sain bun, are totol od irõdig dedig, aya Kristus nẽ imatkesiya ado molol nem eig au, ã arokeneik.
Aya asiyouf sain bun, aya tunĩ amã teneub enei nẽ lo fiya bun mabodõdig dedig anidi bun, aya totol od arõf nigin kisi afef gen, to age afouf nigin, aya ã agoneik.
Momoi, amã tenebur ein mabodok, anĩ ere, amã kusĩ nigin, tenebur ein age difedig gen to age mafedig.
Amã nemã kusĩ nẽ waila are, teneub enei nẽ sã, anĩ ere, idi kau totol narĩ fiya nigin Negur nẽ megeir ado.
Amã, monẽya ado, ereb ereb ganan Negur nigin keleĩya nẽ naabura gudũ fiya nigin yogo iselef anĩ, narĩ mafedidig, age mafe fen, amã kisi ganan male fen, Kristus dõ fiya nigin marouledidig.
Sain ã, ãgenei dõ fiya ganan bun, kisi feleya bagai wõ gouf, amã fe temeleid ganan darau ifenẽdiya nigin dodok mafef anĩ kisi falauf.
Ã ereb ereb teten nẽ anĩ dogol lo gedig. Taka ĩ yogo nigin Kristus nẽ ye fen, anĩ nigin totol bagai momoi youf, amãg ĩ gen Kristus nẽ anĩ, ĩ baban kisi fouf.
Aya, ã daũ yeĩya ban yalesneĩya nigin Odug yana ifanaman anĩ nigin, yanau naal yaor afe alesaufeg, aya anĩ nigin to mama fiyauf.
Aya neu pas bunem, ã kumĩ ifeneĩya nigin age afef gen, ã kisi gef anĩ to orouf.
Ere nigin, tunĩ dirõdig, “In pas are morõ ado fen, totol ado, anĩ ere, ĩ amã geid mabodok sain bun, ĩ maleg le fen, yogon wogõ are ege iledig.”
Tamo age fediya idi keleĩ youf, amã ã geid to tabodok sain bun, nemã pas bun amã naig be fiya anĩ, amã ã geid tabodok sain bun, amã de dõ maf, age mafouf bagai.
Amã, tunĩ dogo neid yeneid dalesedig idi geid, kerẽ sã dede to mauf. Idi dogo, dogo nigin dogo bun fele dife fen, dogo nigin dogo bun es difef anidi, idi kisi biya sã.
Anĩ ere, amã yanamã to daũ wal ma fen, malesauf, anĩ ere, amã kabĩ Negur igirkanaman bun dogol yanamã malesauf, kabĩ are ã buneg ilef.
Amã yanamã gerõ bagai to males maroulef, amã ã gein to masim are, amã yanamã gerõ bagai males maroulem, ere nigin, amã Kristus nẽ biya od ado, ã geineg masin.
Amã tunim kabĩ dalen anĩ bun to daũ wal mafe fen, yanamã malesedig. Nemã waumã iseya are eig fiya, ãgenei momoiya odugef isele di, ã atun amã nemã kabĩ akor fatuk bagai bilalaũ fef ilauf,
anĩ bunem, amã ãgenei akor wal mafesil fen, biya od wogõ mauf. Ere nigin, amã tamo taka nẽ akor bun kabĩ dalen anĩ nigin, yanamã yaleseya to oromak.
Anĩ ere, “Taka ĩ yana yalesef, ĩ Odug bun yana yalesauf.”
Ere nigin, taka ĩ yogo yana yalesef nigin, Negur to de yedig, anĩ ere, taka ĩ Odugem yana yalesef anĩ, Negur de yedig.
Ã aya utornag len, neneya od naal wogõ auf nigin aya wau irok, anĩ ere, ã mogo yeir ago gef.
Aya ã bun Negur nẽ kiyeĩ bunem kiyeĩ afeneik. Aya ã aiweĩ tekelei, Kristus bun agirnein, are aya ã kayau taulei bagai gen, ĩ gein arouliyeĩf nigin age afen.
Anĩ ere, Eva gogourem ed fe idegnen gen, ãgenei kisi sane le di, ã ãgenei wauĩ bun, Kristus bun ãgenei momoiya ado kisi karẽtut utorõg fen, sane lauf nigin, aya kumĩ auf.
Takam ã gein isi fen, Jesus taka nigin, amã wogõ mayein anĩ nigin gen sã, wogõ youf be, ã uur fire, uur ã walegen gen sã anĩ walogouf be, ã biya od fire, biya od ã walegen gen sã anĩ walogouf are, ã anĩ karika bagai karĩ wedigedig.
Anĩ ere, aya kisi afef, aya aposel yeneid odug anidi farumen to bagai abodok.
Aya wogõya nigin biya sã be, anĩ ere, aya keleĩ ado. Amã, enei, ã bun naab ganan bun, ereb ereb ganan bun yaor mafen.
Aya yug nigin aukesil fen, Negur nẽ biya od mala sã ege bagai wogõ ayein bunem, ã alesnein anĩ mosor de?
Aya ã aruneĩ yaleya nigin, sios tunĩ bun tamal isennaya alen anĩ, sios tunĩ idi bun tamal bẽ alen gen.
Takag, sain aya ã geid tabod ken, ereb taka nigin lau afen, aya ã taka to morõ afenein, ere nigin, turau tar Masedonia bun tamal disin idi, ereb aya lau afen kisi feleya bagai difanan. Ereb ereb ganan bun, aya yug ã morõ ifeneĩya ator ken, toku age afouf.
Kristus nẽ momoi anĩ, aya nameun ibodok nigin, taka nem Akaia provins bun neu yanau yaleseya enei to katĩ falauf.
Ere nigin? Aya ã nigin wau laa fiya sã nigin de? Negur ĩ keleĩ, aya ã nigin wau laa fedig!
Aya ereb ereb nigin idi yeneid dalesedig anĩ bun, amã idi geid tekelei ya anĩ karĩ douf nigin orodidig anidi neid naabureid gudũ fiya nigin, ereb aya age afef anĩ, toku age afouf.
Ere nigin, tamo age fediya are idegẽya aposel fen, idegẽya kabĩ tamo, idi Kristus nẽ aposel neweid dale fen, kabĩ daledig.
Are terẽya sã, ere nigin, Satan ĩ yogo bagai fula fiya nẽ engel nawa yaledig.
Anĩ nigin, Satan nẽ kabĩ tamo idi, madur bagai nẽ kabĩ tamo neweid dalouf are, to terẽ tauf. Idi neid didikalauf bun, idi age difedig kilei dalouf.
Aya baban arok, taka nem aya nigin neneya tamo to youf. Anĩ ere, ã ago gouf are, aya neneya tamo gen waleyag, anĩ bunem, ayag yanau naal alesauf.
Aya yug yanau yaleseya enei bun, aya Odug gen to wogõ auf, anĩ ere, neneya tamo gen wogõ auf.
Musei idi, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau age difedig gen, yeneid dalesedig nigin, ayag yanau alesauf.
Ã kisi biya bagai ado nigin, ã wauĩ al fiya ado neneya tamo karĩ wedigedig!
Ere nigin, taka nem ã ferfer ineneik, ereb ereb ganan bun ã kadir ineneik, idegẽya bun yaleyeik, yogo yana yaor falaisi ilun iselef be, weleĩ fã fef bun, ã karĩ wiyẽgedig.
Aya momoi eig au arok nigin mama fiyaf, are amã felu reya bagai nigin to age mafedig! Anĩ ere, taka ĩ totol ino fen, ereb taka nigin yana yalesauf are–aya neneya tamo gen wogõ auf–ayag totol ano fen, yanau alesauf.
Idi Hibru tamo de? Ayag anĩ. Idi Israel tamo de? Ayag anĩ. Idi Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar de? Ayag anĩ.
Idi Kristus nẽ kabĩ tamo de? (Aya wadã gen eig au wogõ auf.) Aya idi wal fediya. Aya idi wal fediya kabĩ aledig, aya kalabus bun idi wal fediya abodõdig, aya idi wal fediya wagĩ difiyadig, age de fen, aya laa bun baba baban dinenan.
Juda idi aya sain faif bun teti nain wagĩ difiyan.
Sain towo bun, aya tibogem wagĩ difiyan, sain tekelei bun, aya meeinem dinan, waag aya abodon sain towo sanen, aya, bõ taka ado gaa taka ado, maaĩ atun abodon.
Aya toku ayok bun, kuwei sane waila wal afen, bẽ tamo nẽ waila wal afen, neu fõ turau tar geid kiwai wal afen, haiden geid kiwai wal afen, taun bun kiwai waila wal afen, gerere tuan kiwai waila wal afen, maaĩ bun waila wal afen, idegẽya turau tar nẽ kiwai waila wal afen.
Aya kabĩ totol ale, morõ ado fen, sain musei mulaĩ to ainẽdig. Aya naũ ado naan ail fiya fen, sain musei saaf sã aledig. Aya menig fiya fen, gemũ abodõdig.
Ereb ereb ganan anĩ sirin, aya naa ganan bun, sios ganan nigin suwẽya morõ anim lai fiyadig.
Aib felu re di, aya to felu rauf de? Aib mosor bun iroule di, aya to wau morõ fiyauf de?
Aya yanau yaleseya nigin bagai youf are, aya ereb ereb neu felu reya anĩ yaor fedig anĩ nigin yanau alesauf.
Odug Jesus nẽ Dei, Negur, ĩ anĩ yana faimud yaleseya, ĩ keleĩ, aya to adegek.
Damaskus oun, gawaman nẽ mudur, King Areta farumen ĩ, aya yaleya nigin taun bobog bun lo fiya tamo inenẽdin.
Anĩ ere, aya karam kuren dinena fen, kau mosokoronem folo folõ difiya di, yogon iman tamal ulõ aran.
Aya yanau alesef alauf. Ereb mala to aloufeg, aya Odug bunem malau seleulã kurã fen ado, kurõ fesiya od alen anĩ wogõ auf alauf.
Aya tamo taka Kristus bun ibodok anĩ keleĩ, ĩ kulu yar fotin ilelen bun, Negurem yale, saa tano towo bun irou iselen. Ĩ bouwa ado be, bouwa sã be, aya keleĩ sã, Negur keleĩ.
Aya keleĩ, tamo enei–ĩ bouwa ado be, bouwa sã be, aya keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ keleĩ–
ĩ paradis bun irou iselen. Ĩ ereb ereb tamom faded feleya kisi feleya sã, tamom wogõya nigin katũ fiyen anĩ karĩ yen.
Aya tamo age fiya anĩ yana alesauf, anĩ ere, aya yug nigin yanau to alesauf, aya neu felu reya nigin dogol yanau alesauf.
Aya yana yaleseya nigin agirĩfeg, aya neneya to abodõf, ere nigin, aya momoi anĩ wogõ auf. Anĩ ere, aya yana yaleseya nigin atorok, are taka nem ereb aya age afef be, wogõ auf anĩ wal fe fen, aya nigin fatuk to kisi fouf nigin age afef.
Kurõ fesiya odug bagai enei alen anĩ bunem, aya yug yanau yaleseya katĩ feleya nigin, bouwa bun kudag ifanan, Satan nẽ arũ tamo darau ifanauf nigin bouwa bun yun, are aya yug yanau yaleseya katĩ feleya nigin.
Sain towo, Odug aya bun anĩ yalelkanauf nigin, aya ĩ agonen.
Anĩ ere, ĩ irokanan, “Neu wau ifenẽya õ nigin kilei bagai, ere nigin, neu megeir felu reya bun kisi feleya bagai wõ yef.” Anĩ nigin, aya fatuk bagai wau al fiya bun neu felu reya nigin yanau alesauf, are Kristus nẽ megeir aya bun ibodõf nigin age afouf.
Anĩ nigin, Kristus nigin, aya felu reya bun, kono fiya bun, wau morõ bun, darau bun, morõ bun, wau kulĩ yedig. Ere nigin, sain aya felu rauf bun, aya totol adodig.
Aya yug nigin neneya tamo wõ aun, anĩ ere, ã aya nugo wiyage di, aya age afen. Ã aya nigin yanau walesegem, are dem, ere nigin, aya ege, anĩ ere, aya aposel yeneid odug farumen to bagai abodok.
Aya ã atun abod ken, ereb aposel bagai nẽ anĩ, uris, ereb urug bagai ado, memelik, morõ ganan bun, feseya sã anodin.
Aya sios ganan bun age afedig anĩ, ã buneg age afen, anĩ ere, ereb tekelei dogol ã bun to age afen, are aya ã isennaya nigin morõ taka to afenein anĩ dogol. Neu kũ fenẽya enei nigin wedereĩ tu kel!
Gama aya eneim sain towo ki ayeĩf nigin saika afef, aya ã isennaya nigin morõ to afeneĩf, ere nigin, ereb aya orouf are, ãgenei safina sã, ã aug anĩ. Kesum sina tama nigin moni to kuru difedig, anĩ ere, sina tamam nedi gereneid tar nigin age difedig.
Anĩ nigin, aya wau al fiya odug bun, neu safinau ganan ã nigin araile fen, aya yugeg arailauf. Aya ã nigin wau fatuk afeneĩ di, ã aya nigin wauĩ naal bagai wanagauf de?
Ã tunĩ aya nigin urõgedig, ‘Ĩ amã masennẽf nigin morõ to ifanaman, anĩ ere, ĩ idegẽya keleĩ bagai, idegẽya kor bunem gei famãdig,’ gedig.
Aya tamo susur afedin anidi taka bunem, ã adegnei ken, ãgenei safina alen de?
Aya Taitus ã gein ileya nigin totol bagai aroken ken, aya amã turamã ĩ ado sur afedin. Taitus ĩ to idegnei ken, safineĩ yalen, ĩ age fen de? Amã kisi tekelei bun age mafe fen, naab tekelei dõ mafen, anĩ sã de?
Ã sain enei ganan, amã mug isennamãf nigin ã bun age mafedig be, kisi gedig. Amã, Negur mala bun, tamo Kristus nigin momoi def anidi gen, wogõ maudig. Ã nemã oboimã, ereb ereb ganan amã age mafef, are ã megeir walogouf nigin.
Sain aya asiyouf, aya ã nigin kisi afef gen to ailiyeĩya nigin be, ã aya nigin kisi gef gen to uleyageya nigin, aya kumĩ auf. Ã bun an, kusĩ, kiyeĩ, seyeya, fara fiya, ne tã bou yũya, dumen od irõya, aya aya yeya be, ekul ge ufaregeya nigin, aya kumĩ auf.
Sain aya baban asiyouf, neu Negur ã meleĩ bun aya mama ifana di, musei kulu mosor dino fen, amuyẽ, noli tobonunã fire fire ado, bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya bunem waud to falei difen anidi nigin, aya wau gudũ fouf nigin kumĩ auf.
Eneim sain towo ã gein asif. “Od ganan isennẽya urom be, towom sigoredim kurõ difesiyouf anĩ megeir gouf.”
Uruwa aya asi fen, baban asi ã geid tabodon sain bun, aya wedereĩ irouya od arokeneĩ bure afelen. Gama aya ã geid to tabod ken, anĩ ket, idi uruwa mosor dinodin anidi geid tunĩ ganan arokeneik: Aya kelau asiyouf sain bun, idi to loloum afediyouf, anĩ ere, kafĩ fiya afenẽdiyouf,
ere nigin, ã Kristus ĩ aya bunem wogõ yef anĩ ileya oroyeik. Ĩ ã bun kabĩ yaleya nigin to felu ref, anĩ ere, ĩ ã atun megeir ado.
Ere nigin, momoi bagai, ĩ felu reya bun aa tetek bun dun, anĩ ere, ĩ Negur nẽ megeir bunem mata ibodok. Age fiya gen, amãg ĩ bun felu reya, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ megeir bunem, amã ĩ geid mata mabodõf. Age mafe fen, amã Negur nẽ megeir ã atun yaor mafouf.
Ã momoiya bun ubodõgef be sã be anĩ, ulogouf nigin ã aug es gouf. Ã aug kisig uleg. Kristus Jesus ĩ, ã bun ibodok anĩ ã to keleĩ de? Sãf are, momoi bagai, ã es fiya bun kubũ gef.
Anĩ ere, amã es fiya bun to kubũ maun anĩ ã ulogouf nigin, aya momoi auf.
Ã ereb sane taka to ago gouf nigin, amã Negur bun kosẽ mauf. Are amã es fiya bun to kubũ maun anĩ tamo kayau dilouf nigin sã, anĩ ere, amã es fiya bun kubũ maun gen dilemãfeg, ã ereb madur ago gouf nigin.
Ere nigin, amã ereb taka momoi anĩ to kiwai mafenek, anĩ ere, momoi nẽ nigin dogol age mafef.
Amã felu mauf bun, ã megeir adof nigin, amã waumã al fef. Ã kisi feleya bagai wõ gouf nigineg, amã kosẽ mauf.
Gariya eig fiya nigin, aya ã geid to tabod ken, enei atotof, are sain aya asiyouf, aya neu yanau bunem totol od ã to arokeneĩf nigin age afef, yanau are ã daũ yeĩya ban yalesneĩya nigin Odug ifanan.
Idikeleya bagai, turau tar, dabuo. Kisi feleya bagai wõ gouf nigin ago gouf, aya neu wogõ anĩ karĩg, kisi tekelei waleg, wauĩ inosiya bun ubodõg. Ago ge di, wau laa fiya ado wau inosiya nẽ Negur ã geid ibodõf.
Fateul umãya bunem, abob aan wiyẽg.
Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan, nedi aanya ã bun sur difef.
Aya Pol, aya aposel, tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem to wõ aun, tamomeg aya to sur difiyan, anĩ ere, Jesus Kristus ado Tamada Negur ĩ Jesus Kristus laa bun tamal turĩ fe di, kel fã yen anim aya sur difiyan,
are aya neu turau tar aya weim mafaref anidi ganan geid, pas enei Galesia sios bun sur mafef.
Negur neda Tamada ado Odug Jesus Kristus bun tamal, wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya ã bun ibodõf,
Kristus ĩ, neda Tamada Negur nẽ oroya dõf fen, sain sane enei bun tamal, ada kel gei fadauf ye fen, neda mosor nigin yogo luwa itoron.
Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
Aya, ã kaisã bagai Negur ĩ Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem ã iweignein anĩ utornẽg fen, biya od fire bun falei ge di, terẽ auf.
Od are biya od bagai sã. Momoi bagai, tamo tunĩ, ã neneya bun dirãyei ken, Kristus nẽ biya od anĩ falei difalauf nigin age difef.
Anĩ ere, amam be, engel taka saa ilun tamalem, biya od fire, amã biya od wogõ mayein anĩ to wogõ yeĩf are, utornẽg len, ĩ gai gai daũ fiye kalauf!
Amã mogo marokenein gen, aya gama baban arokeneik: Aibem taka ã biya od fire, ã walegen anĩ to wogõ yeĩf are, utornẽg len, ĩ gai gai daũ fiye kalauf!
Aya tamo nẽ yo ya yaleya nigin age afef de, Negur nẽ yo ya yaleya nigin age afef? Aya tamo waud al fouf nigin age afef de? Aya fau tamo waud al fouf nigin age afouf are, aya Kristus nẽ ferfer sã.
Turau tar, aya ã enei keleĩ youf nigin orouf, biya od aya wogõ ayein, are tamo nẽ kisim to dinon.
Aya anĩ tamo taka bun tamal to alen, takameg to ifelnan, anĩ ere, aya Jesus Kristus nẽ kurõ falaisiya bunem alen.
Aya kulu Juda neid momoiya bun abod ken, naig be afen are ã karĩ gen. Aya Negur nẽ sios darau fatuk bagai afen ken, daũ afalauf nigin age afen.
Aya, Juda neid momoiya bun, Juda tamo aya gegen atun idi musei wawal afedin, age afe fen, aya neu tubu tar neid tobonuneid dõ fiya nigin fatuk bagai kisi totol anon.
Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ, aya sinau fau gõ fiyaya sã mog, igirna fen, yogon wau ifenẽya bunem aya iweigna di,
aya haiden atun yogon Naal nigin wogõ auf nigin, yogon Naal aya bun yaor fiya nigin wau iron, sain anĩ bun, aya aib bun keleĩ yaleya nigin tamo taka to, to afiyen.
Aya, idi aya aposel wõya sã mog, aposel dibodon anidi ailediyouf nigin Jerusalemeg to eselen. Anĩ ere, aya kaisã bagai Arabia kantri ele fen, dum Damaskus kelau elen.
Yar towo ilele di, aya Pita ado uyu kũ mafouf nigin Jerusalem esel fen, ĩ ado naa fiftin mabodon.
Aya aposel anidi taka to ailen, Odug nẽ tura, Jems dogol.
Aya Negur mala bun momoi arokeneik, aya atotkeneik are idegẽya sã.
Anĩ dumen, aya Siria ado Silisia provins elen.
Judia distrik oun sios Kristus bun dibodok idi, aya nigin keleĩ sã.
Idi od enei dogol karĩ den: “Tamo ĩ kulu ada darau ifanadan, ĩ momoiya daũ fouf nigin kulu age fen anĩ, gama wogõ yef.”
Age de fen, idi aya nigin Negur yana dalesen.
Yar fotin ilele di, aya baban Jerusalem eselen, sain anĩ are Banabas ado. Aya Taituseg ale fen, meselen.
Aya Negur kurõ fesiya ifelnan kilei, esel fen, biya od aya haiden atun wogõ aun anĩ, idi faded afiyẽdin. Anĩ ere, aya, ganan keleĩ sã mog, iminẽyan idi sios nẽ uyu irouya gen ailedin anidi bun age afen, ere nigin, aya neu kabĩ alef ado mogo alen anĩ, ege ileya nigin kumĩ aun.
Anĩ ere, Taitus ĩ aya weim mabodon, ĩ Grik tamal, anĩ ere, idi ĩ mulũ ileya nigin to nugo difiyen.
Morõ are, idegẽya turamã tar tunĩ, amã atun iminẽyan disin anidi nigin fã yen, idi amã atun dimin ken, Kristus Jesus bun karika mabodon anĩ kofo de fen, amã lo nẽ kafĩ fiya bun diroulemãf nigin disin.
Biya od nẽ momoi anĩ, ã bun ibodõf nigin, amã idi neid od anĩ, sain naal bagaig to maroun.
Idi sios bun yeneid ado anidi–idi naig be fediya are aya bun fire to ailedig, Negur ĩ tetenem lo fiya bunem to es fedig–tamo sios bun yeneid ado anidi neu od anĩ taka to tobol difen.
Age fiya ban, idi, Pita Juda idi bun biya od wogõya nẽ kabĩ ifenen gen, aya haiden bun biya od wogõya nẽ kabĩ ifanan anĩ dilen.
Negur ĩ, Pita Juda idi atun aposel kabĩ yalen anĩ bun kabĩ yalen gen, aya haiden atun aposel kabĩ alen buneg Negur kabĩ yalen.
Jems, Pita, Jon, idi sios nẽ monog tor gen diledin anidi, idi Negur aya wau ifenẽya ifanan anĩ dile fen, aya Banabas ado nigal maũf nigin, imamã biyalẽ bagu difen. Idi, amã haiden bun mele di, idi Juda anidi bun dilauf nigin, yo den.
Idi amã faimud maleg masennẽdiyouf nigin dogol dirokanaman, kabĩ are, aya age afouf nigin kisi totol aledig anĩ age afedig bagai.
Sain Pita Antiok taun isi di, aya ĩ mala bun ou afiyen, ere nigin, ĩ yaor bagai kũ fenen.
Jems tamo tunĩ sur fedin anĩ fau isiya sã mog, Pita ĩ haiden geid saaf dõ don. Anĩ ere, idi disi wõ de di, ĩ haiden itorneĩd fen, so fedin, ere nigin, ĩ idi mulũ bun temeleid anidi kumĩ fiyeĩd fen.
Juda tunĩ ganan, yogon mala yaleya anĩ dõ difen, age dife di, dogo neid mala yaleya bunem, Banabaseg naab anĩ dõ fen.
Sain aya, idi neid tobonuneid, biya od nẽ momoi anĩ to dõ dife di, ail fen, aya idi ganan meleid bun Pita arokenen, “Õ Juda tamo, anĩ ere, õ haiden gen ubodok, Juda tamo gen sã. Agouf are, naig fe di, haiden idi Juda neid tobonunã dõ difouf nigin, nugo wiyẽdif?”
Ada Juda temelada gogũ difadan, haiden mosor temelada sã.
Anĩ ere, ada keleĩ, tamo ĩ lo dõ fiya bunem Negur mala bun madur bagai to wõ yedig, anĩ ere, Jesus Kristus nigin momoiya bunem. Anĩ nigin, adag, Kristus Jesus nigin momoi taudig, are Kristus nigin momoiya bunem, lo dõ fiya bunem sã, Negur mala bun madur bagai wõ tauf nigin age tafedig, ere nigin, lo dõ fiya bunem, aibem taka Negur mala bun madur bagai to wõ youf.
Ada, Kristus nigin momoiya bunem, Negur mala bun madur bagai wõ tauf tau fen, ada dug mosor temelada anĩ dilouf are, Kristus ĩ mosor nẽ kabĩ tamouf de? Gai sã bagai!
Ereb aya daũ afen anĩ, baban kare afouf are, aya yug, aya lo narĩ fiya tamo wõ auf.
Lo bunem, aya lo mala bun laa fiyan, are aya Negur mala bun mata abodõf nigin age afen.
Aya Kristus ado aa tetek bun dinakesin, anĩ nigin, aya baban mata to abodok, anĩ ere, Kristus aya bun mata ibodok. Gama aya bouwau mata ibodok, are aya Negur Naal nigin momoiya bunem mata abodok, ĩ aya nigin wau laaf fen, aya nigin yogo luwa itoron.
Aya Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya to tadũ afouf, ere nigin, lo bunem Negur mala bun madur bagai wõya anĩ isiyouf are, Kristus ĩ ege laa fen.
Galesia tamo kayau, ã neneya! Aim ã idegnein? Ã meleĩ bun bagai, Jesus Kristus aa tetek bun dukesin anĩ, yaor bagai mafelnein.
Ereb taka dogol, aya ã bun keleĩ you fenẽ: Ã lo dõ fiya bunem Awa Uur walegen de, oo ereb karĩ gen anĩ nigin momoi ge di?
Ã fau neneya ufaregef de? Awa Uur bunem gariya unog fen, gama ã tamo nẽ totol bunem udikalagau fenẽ de?
Ã darau fatuk bagai ege walegen de? Are momoi, ege bagai walegen de?
Negur ĩ, ã, lo dõ fiya bunem yogon Awa Uur ifeneĩ di, ã atun memelik inodin de, oo ereb ã karĩ gen anĩ nigin momoi ge di?
Abraham bun kisi gouf: “Ĩ Negur nigin momoi yen, age fe di, Negurem ĩ madur bagai fiyen.”
Anĩ nigin, karĩ gouf, idi momoi def anidi, are idi Abraham gere tar.
Negur nẽ Itotoya ketem, Negur ĩ haiden idi neid momoiya bunem madur bagai fediyouf anĩ ifelnadan, Negur ĩ, anĩ fau wõya sã mog, biya od anĩ ketem Abraham irokenen: “Teneub ganan õ bunem el fediyouf.”
Anĩ nigin, idi momoiya ado are, momoiya tamo Abraham geid el fedif.
Idi lo dõ fiya bunem dedig anidi ganan, are isisĩya farumen dibodok, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, “Idi ganan Lo nẽ Buk bun itotoya ibodok anĩ ganan toku to dõ difouf are, isisĩya farumen difaref.”
Taka ĩ lo bunem Negur mala bun madur bagai to wõ youf, are yaor, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Tamo madur bagai ĩ, momoiya bunem mata ibodõf.”
Lo are, momoiya bunem to ifaref, age fiya ban, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Tamo ĩ enei age fedif, ĩ anĩ bunem mata ibodõf.”
Kristus ĩ, ada fotokar isisĩya nẽ wõ ye fen, ada lo nẽ isisĩya bun temelada kel yaledan, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Ganan aa bun diseginnẽdif, idi isisĩya farumen dibodok.”
Ĩ, el fiya Negurem Abraham ifenen anĩ, Kristus Jesus bunem, haiden bun isiyouf nigin, ada kel yaledan, are ada, momoiya bunem, Awa Uur nẽ promis anĩ talouf nigin age fen.
Turau tar, aya tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem wogõ auf: Tamo nẽ bar itenẽya anĩg, tamo waud iro ken, bar ditenek anĩ, to dalelef be, to tobol difedig gen, eneig age fiya.
Negur ĩ, promis od anĩ, Abraham ado yogon ibor irokenẽdin. Negur nẽ Itotoya to eig yef, “yogon ibor tar bun,” age youf are, are musei nigin, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya, “ogon ibor bun,” yef, are tamo tekelei, ĩ Kristus nigin.
Aya wogõ auf anĩ nẽ gariya, are eig fiya: 430 yar ilele di, lo wõ yen anĩ, Negur kulu bar itenẽya inon anĩ to we fel fen, Negur nẽ promis to yalelef.
Lo bunem akor anĩ yaleya nigin ouf are, promis bunem akor are to dalouf. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ, yogon wau ifenẽya bun promis bunem akor anĩ Abraham ifenen.
Age fiyauf are, lo are ere nigin? Lo are mosor yaor fouf nigin ifenẽdi di, anĩ ibodok ile, Abraham nẽ ibor ĩ nigin promis iron anĩ, wõ youf bun bure falauf. Lo are, engelem, atun tamo Moses difenẽ di, lo anĩ yaor fen.
Atun tamo ĩ, tamo foi fiya tekelei nẽ dogol to ibodõdig. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ tekelei dogol, ĩ yogo bagai Abraham promis anĩ ifenen. (Anĩ bun, atun tamo taka to ibodok.)
Anĩ nigin, lo ado Negur nẽ promis kiwai youf de? Gai sã bagai! Lo ifenen anim tamo mata ifenem are, Negur mala bun madur bagai wõya are, momoi bagai, lo bunem isim.
Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya kurõ falaisi, tenebur tamo kayau ganan mosor nẽ kafĩ fiya bun difaref yef, are Negur nẽ promis Jesus Kristus nigin momoiya bunem ifenẽf anĩ, idi momoi def anidi ifenẽdiyouf nigin, Negur age fen.
Momoiya enei isiya sã mog, ada lo nẽ kafĩ fiya bun tabodon, tabodok tele mog, momoiya anĩ yaoren.
Anĩ nigin, lo anim ada ulum iroukanada di, Kristus wagen tele di, ĩ ada momoiya bunem Negur mala bun madur bagai fadauf nigin, inon.
Gama momoiya mogo isin nigin, ada gama baban lo farumen to tabodok.
Ã ganan, Kristus Jesus nigin momoiya bunem, Negur gere tar ubodõgef,
ere nigin, ã Kristus bun naan walegen ganan, are mogo Kristus ufonũgen.
Ã gama, Juda tamo be Grik tamo, ferfer be kafĩ fiya sã, monog be gober to ufaregef, ere nigin, Kristus Jesus bun ã ganan tekelei ufaregef.
Ã Kristus nẽ ufaragauf are, ã Abraham gere tar, anĩ nigin, in promis bunem yogon akor anĩ walogouf.
Aya eig au wogõ auf, kesu monog tama fotokar ĩ fau simõf are, are ĩ tama nẽ akor ganan yaloufeg, ĩ fau ferfer gen ibodok.
Ĩ fau simõ ibod mog, ĩ idi kulatun fiya tamo ado idi lo fiya tamo farumen ibodõ di, idi yogon kabĩ nigin lo difef, ile, tama sain ifenek anĩ bun didikalauf.
Age fiya gen, adag Kristus fau isiya sã mog, simõ bun, tenebur nẽ uur sesen farumen, ferfer gen kafĩ fiya bun tabodon.
Anĩ ere, yogon sain bagai wõ ye di, Negur yogo Naal sur fe di, kayau bunem wõ yen, lo farumen wõ yen,
are idi lo farumen difaref anidi kel gei fediyouf nigin, age fe di, ada Negur gere tar ya bagai anĩ talouf nigin age fen.
Ã Negur gere tar nigin, Negur ĩ yogo Naal nẽ Awa Uur, ada wauda bun sur fe di, Awa Uurem iweig irõdig, “Abba, Dei.”
Anĩ nigin, õ baban ferfer sã, õ in kesu. Õ in kesu ubodok nigin, Negur ĩ õg yogon akor walouf nigin ineyon.
Uruwa bun, ã Negur keleĩ sa ken, ã idi waitou bagai sã anĩ farumen ferfer ubodõgen.
Anĩ ere, gama ã Negur keleĩ, oo Negur ã nigin keleĩ youf auf are deuf, naig fe di, ã falei weleg fen, feseya ado maleg nẽ ifelnẽya bun ulegef? Ã baban idim ferfer dineneĩf nigin oroyeik de?
Ã naa tunĩ, ogõ tunĩ, saneya tunĩ ado, yar tunĩ anĩ bun, anĩ nẽ lo dõg fen, ãgenei kisi unogedig!
Aya ã nigin kumĩ auf, are aya ã nigin ege be kabĩ alen.
Turau tar, aya ã agoneik, aya gen wowãg, ere nigin, ayag ã gen wõ aun. Ã aya bun ereb sane taka to ago gen.
Ã keleĩ, are aya dagi nigin, aya ã bun urug bagai biya od wogõ ayein.
Neu dagi are ã morõ ifenein, anĩ ere, ã aya to meleĩ irim wiyag fen, soso wiyagen. Age fiya ban, ã, aya Negur nẽ engel gen, Kristus Jesus yogo bagai gen, waleyagen.
Ãgenei wauĩ kulĩya ganan gama nain ibodok? Ãgenei meleĩ kusuf yale, aya ifanaya nigin kisi feleyam are, ã kusug waleg aya wanagem, aya agef kurõ feis irokeneĩya nigin kisi feleya.
Aya age a momoi arokeneik bunem, ãgenei kiwai wõ auf de?
Tamo anidi are ã gei diyeĩf nigin kabĩ totol daledig, anĩ ere, biya nigin sã. Idi ã ama bun tamal dalelneĩf nigin orodif, are ã idi nigin kabĩ totol walogouf nigin age difef.
Ereb biya nigin kabĩ totol yaleya, are biya, sain aya ã geid tabodok bun dogol sã, wededem ago gouf, are biya.
Neu kesu tar, aya ã nigin baban darau kesu gõ fiya nigin gen alef ele, Kristus ã namein kare fouf.
Aya ã geid gama tabod ken, aya neu ailõ falei afouf nigin aya wau adok irok, ere nigin, aya ã nigin nene auf!
Aya urokanag, ã lo farumen ibodõya oroyeik, ã lo irok anĩ to keleĩ de?
Negur nẽ Itotoya bun irok, Abraham ĩ kesu uru ado, taka ferfer kayau bunem wõ yen, agef fen, taka kafĩ fiya sã kayau bunem wõ yen.
Yogon kesu ferfer kayau bunem wõ yen are, tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem gõ fen. Age fe di, yogon kesu kafĩ fiya sã kayau bunem wõ yen are, promis od anĩ dõf fen, wõ yen.
Enei are yaab od gen tailauf: Kayau are, bar itenẽya uru nigin. Bar itenẽya taka are, Sinai Arei bun tamal anĩ kesu gogũ fen, are ferfer wowã douf nigin. Are Hagar.
Hagar are Sinai Arei Arabia teneub bun ibodok anĩ nigin, takag, falei fel Jerusalem taun gama ibodok anĩ, ere nigin, ĩ yogon gere tar geid idi ferfer dibodok.
Anĩ ere, Jerusalem ilun ibodok, are kafĩ fiya sã. Agef fen, ĩ neda sinada.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok: “O kayau dali, õ kesu to gogũ wodig, waũ al fe. Õ kesu gõ fiya nẽ darau to walef, uweig fen, fatuk kaĩ wouf, ere nigin, kayau dali nẽ kesu are musei biya fen, kayau tamo ado nẽ kesu wal fiya.”
Turau tar, ã, Isak gen, promis nẽ gere tar.
Anĩ ere, sain anĩ bun, kesu tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem gõ fen are, kesu Awa Uur nẽ megeir bunem gõ fen anĩ darau ifenen. Gamag agef yenek.
Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya ere yef? “Ferfer kayau ado yogon kesu uru uraileid, ere nigin, ferfer kayau nẽ kesu ĩ, kafĩ fiya sã kayau nẽ kesu akor anĩ to foi fenẽf.”
Anĩ nigin, turau tar, ada ferfer kayau gere tar sã, kafĩ fiya sã kayau nẽ gere tar.
Ada karika tabodõf nigin, Kristus ĩ ada kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnadan. Anĩ nigin, megeir ufareg fen, baban ferfer nẽ kafĩ fiya farumen to ubodõg.
Karĩ weleg! Aya Pol, ã arokeneik, ã mulũ bun ulalagauf are, Kristus ĩ, ã bun kabĩ sã bagai youf.
Tamo ganan mulũ bun dilef are, aya baban arokenẽdif, idi lo ganan bagai dõ difouf.
Ã lo bunem Negur mala bun madur bagai wõ gouf nigin ago gef, ã Kristus bun tamal fara yein. Ã wau ifenẽya utorõg fen, uyagen.
Anĩ ere, ada momoi tau fen, Awa Uur bunem madur bagai wõ tauf nigin, wauda ise fen, totol bagai tari tafef.
Ere nigin, taka ĩ Kristus Jesus bun ibodok are, mulũ ileya be, mulũ ileya sã, anĩ ganan ege. Ereb odug bagai are, momoiya, wau laa fiya bunem kabĩ yalef anĩ dogol.
Ã meli bagai gududu gen. Aim anĩ ã momoi anĩ dõ fiya nigin naabureĩ gudũ fen?
Weder te yabiya od age fiya, are ĩ ã iweigneik anĩ bunem to isif.
“Yis naal bagai anim bret ganan gẽ yedig.”
Aya Odug bun ã nigin momoi auf, are ã kisi fire to walogouf. Aib ĩ ã neneya bun iraileyeik are, mala solo sane yalouf.
Turau tar, aya mulũ ileya nigin fau wogõ auf are, ere nigin aya fau darau difanaf? Aya age afem are, Kristus nẽ aa tetek, are tamo yeid tũ fiya nẽ meein to ibodom.
Idi ã wauĩ tũ fiya difeneik anidi, idi dile, dogo bouweid gudũ difouf nigin, aya wau irok.
Neu turau tar, ã kafĩ fiya sã ufaragauf nigin iweignein. Anĩ ere, ãgenei kafĩ fiya sã anĩ bunem, bouwa nẽ oroya to dõ gouf, age fiya ban, wauĩ laa fiya bunem, abob aruna walogouf.
Lo ganan are lo tekelei bun bagu felef: “Õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigin waũ laa fouf.”
Ã atun monẽg fen, waila kaka gouf are, ã abob daũ wiyẽgouf nigin, lo walagauf.
Anĩ nigin, aya orok, Awa Uur bunem ubodõgouf, ago gouf are, ã bouwa nẽ oroya to dõ gouf.
Ere nigin, bouwa nẽ oroya ĩ, Awa Uur nẽ oroya anĩ to orodig, age fe di, Awa Uur ĩ, bouwa nẽ oroya to orodig. Idi urom abob kiwai difenẽdig, are ã ereb oroyeik anĩ to ago gouf nigin age difedig.
Anĩ ere, ã Awa Uurem ulum iroukeneĩf are, ã lo farumen to ubodõgef.
Bouwa nẽ oroya nẽ tobonunã are yaor: noli tobonunã, amuyẽ ado, bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya;
idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya ado idegẽya kosẽya; abob kiwai ifenẽya, kusĩya, kiyeĩ inoya, seyeya, aya dogol yeya, fara fiya, foi fiya ado,
name nameya, aai naanueiya, bilãya ado, tobonunã age fiya anĩ ganan. Aya ã kulu arokenein gen, gama totol bagai arokeneik, idi age de difaref anidi, Negur nẽ tano to dalouf.
Anĩ ere, Awa Uur nẽ faat are, wau laa fiya, wau kulĩya, wau inosiya, wau yukeleya, wau ifenẽya, tobonunã biya, dõ fiya biya,
molol ado yogon bouwa tobonunã biya bun kulatun fiya. Lo takam enei ganan to katĩ felef.
Aib idi Kristus Jesus nẽ dibodok, mogo mosor nẽ bouwa anĩ, yogon mala ile oroya ado bouwa nẽ oroya geid, aa tetek bun dukesin.
Ada Awa Uur bunem tabodok nigin, ada Awa Uur bunemeg tayõf.
Ada yanada to talesauf, to seye talesauf, age ta feneg, abob nigin kiyeĩ to tanouf.
Turau tar, taka mosor ino mog ulogouf are, Awa Uur bun ufaregef ã, ĩ molol nem madur wiyẽgouf. Anĩ ere, ãg kisi fiya bun to ulagauf nigin, ã aug nigin lo walagauf.
Abob nẽ morõ faali ge, agog fen, naab anĩ bunem, Kristus nẽ lo anĩ ã bun kisi falauf.
Taka ĩ aya odug ye fen, ĩ yana sã ege ibodõf are, ĩ yogo idegnek.
Tamo mugu mugu yogon kabĩ anĩ es fouf. Agef fen, ĩ yogo nigin dogol yogon yana yales fen, taka yogo ad nigin to es fouf.
Ere nigin, mugu mugu yogon morõ anĩ faali fouf.
Taka ĩ Negur nẽ od nigin keleĩ yalef, ĩ ereb ereb biya anĩ ganan, yogon tise ado foi difouf.
Takam to idegneĩf: Takam Negur iseilnẽya kisi feleya sã. Tamo ĩ ereb itenek de anĩ yaledig.
Taka ĩ yogo bouwa nẽ oroya dõ fiya nigin itenek, ĩ bouwa nẽ oroya bunem daũ fiya yalouf. Taka ĩ Awa Uur dõ fiya nigin itenek, ĩ Awa Uur bunem mata ibodkeleya anĩ yalouf.
Ada ereb biya age fiya nigin wauda to folo rouf, ere nigin, ada to fese tauf are, ada tatenek anĩ, yogon sain bun bagai talouf.
Anĩ nigin, ada anĩ age fiya nigin naab wõ youf are, ada, tamo kayau ganan bun biya age tag, are idi momoiya nẽ ibor dibodok anidi bun bagai.
Aya imaum bagai od nẽ ereb gegẽ odug atotkenein anĩ uleg.
Idi mayarẽ lo tafef anĩ bunem biya difamãf def anidim, ã mulũ ileya nigin totol bagai dirokeneik. Idi enei age difef are, idi Kristus nẽ aa tetek bunem darau yaleya ditor ken nigin dogol, age difef.
Idi mulũ dilen anidig lo to dõ difedig, anĩ ere, idi ãgenei bouweĩ bunem yeneid dalesauf nigin ã mulũ ileya nigin orodif.
Aya yug nigin to bagai yanau alesauf, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ aa tetek nigin dogol. Aa tetek bunem, teneub enei nẽ oroya, aya bun laa fen, age fe di, ayag neu oroya, teneub enei nẽ oroya bun laa fiyan.
Mulũ ileya, mulũ ileya sã be, are ganan ege. Safina odug are, mata wõya.
Wau inosiya ado wau yũya, idi od enei mogo wogõ aul anĩ dõ difef anidi ganan bun isiyouf, Negur nẽ Israel tamo kayau buneg isiyouf.
Sain enei bunem ilauf ganan bun, taka nem morõ to ifanauf, ere nigin, aya bouwau bun Jesus nẽ uris ibodok.
Turau tar, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ãgenei uur bun ibodõf. Momoi.
Aya Pol, Negur nẽ oroya bunem, Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ aun, Efesus Negur nẽ tamo kayau, Kristus Jesus el de dõ difedig anidi bun, pas enei atotof.
Negur neda Tamada ado Odug Jesus Kristus neid wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya, ã bun ibodõf.
Ada, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ Tama Negur, ĩ yana talesauf, ĩ uur nẽ el fiya Kristus bun saa ilun dibodok anĩ ganan bunem el fadan.
Negur ĩ saa teneub ado kare fiya sã mog, ada yogon mala bun, fateul ado amuyẽ sã tabodõf nigin, Jesus bun igirnadan.
Wau laa fiya bun, Negur ĩ yogon wau kulĩya ado oroya kilei, Jesus Kristus bunem, ada yaleda fen, Negur nẽ gere tar wowã tauf nigin, mogo igirnadan.
Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya, are Jesus Negurem ĩ nigin wau laa fedig anĩ bun, ege luwa ifanadan anĩ nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin, Negur yana talesauf.
Jesus bun, ada, yogon naud bunem kel yaleya, mosor nigin weder tu keleya anĩ, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya barikã bunem, talen.
Negur ĩ yogon wau ifenẽya bunem, kisi biya ado kisi fokõya ganan, ada bun foula fen.
Agef fen, ĩ yogon oroya nẽ waa anĩ ifelnadan, are yogon wau kulĩya nẽ kisi Kristus bun kisi fen kilei,
yogon sain anĩ kisi fel wõ youf bun kabĩ yalouf, sain anĩ bun, Negur ĩ saa teneub ado bun ereb ereb ganan dibodok anĩ, mudur tekelei, Kristus farumen gurif iroulauf.
Negur ĩ yogon oroya dõf fen, ereb ereb ganan age fedig, ĩ yogon kisi dõf fen, ada mogo igirnadan, age fe di, adag Kristus bun yogon akor talen,
are ada uyulil Kristus bun wauda iseya talen anĩ, Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya yana talesauf nigin age fen.
Ã momoi anĩ nẽ od, ãgenei kel yaleya nẽ biya od anĩ karĩ ge fen, ãg Kristus bun ubodõgen. Ã Kristus nigin momoi ge di, Negur ã bun uris, are Awa Uur Fateul Negur afeneĩf yen anĩ inon.
Negur ĩ, idi Negur nẽ anidi kel yaleya fau wõya sã mog, ada neda akor momoi bagai talouf nigin megeir fe fen, Awa Uur Fateul iben, are ada yogon fula fiya medeĩya yana talesauf nigin age fen.
Age fiya nigin, aya Odug Jesus nigin ãgenei momoiya ado, Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan nigin ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya anĩ karĩ au fen,
aya ã nigin Negur de fiyẽya to folõ afelen. Aya neu kosẽya bun ã nigin karĩ aul fen,
neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ Negur, Tamada fula fiya medeĩya barikã, ĩ, ã ĩ nigin keleĩ bagai youf nigin, kisi biya ado kurõ fesiya nẽ Awa Uur ifeneĩf nigin, kosẽ audig.
Aya ãgenei wauĩ nẽ meleĩ fokõ fouf nigineg kosẽ audig, are ã, wau iseya ĩ anĩ bun iweignein, yogon fula fiya medeĩya barikã nẽ akor Negur nẽ tamo kayau bun ibodok anĩ ado,
yogon megeir barikã momoi tauf ada bun kabĩ yalef anĩ, keleĩ youf nigin, age afedig. Megeir are, yogon totol barikã anim kabĩ yalef gen,
megeir de tekelei anim Kristus bun kabĩ yale fen, ĩ laa bun tamal kel turĩ fiye ken, saa ilun Negur ima biyalẽ inenen.
Negur ĩ, Kristus, uyu irouya ganan, yeneid adodo ganan, megeir ganan, odudug ganan ado, yeneid sain enei bun ado sain fau isiyouf buneg ifenẽdiyouf ani ganan wal fiya bun inenen.
Agef fen, Negur ĩ, ereb ereb ganan Kristus ye farumen gõ fel fen, ĩ sios nigin ereb ereb ganan neid mudur ibodõf nigin igirnen.
Sios are, yogon bouwa, ĩ naab ganan bunem ereb ereb ganan kisi feledig anĩ nẽ kisi feleya.
Ã kulu ãgenei kũ fenẽya ado mosor bun gare gen.
Sain anĩ bun, ã teneub enei nẽ naab ado, owõbẽ tano nẽ mudur, are uur idi dõ fiya sã anidi bun gama kabĩ yalef anĩ nẽ naab dõ gen.
Idi atun ada gananeg, uruwa bun bouwada nẽ oroya anĩ dõ tafe fen, yogon oroya ado kisi dõ tafen. Ada, tamo tunĩ ganan idi gogũ difedin gen, adag age de gogũ difadan bunem, Negur nẽ didi farumen tabodon.
Anĩ ere, ada nigin yogon wau laa fiya odug bunem, Negur wau yũya barikã,
ĩ, ada kũ fenẽya bun gare taun sain buneg, ada Kristus geid turĩ fadan. Are wau ifenẽya bunem, ã kel yaleyein.
Agef fen, Negur ĩ, ada Kristus geid kel turĩ fada fen, Kristus Jesus bun ada ĩ geid saa ilun tabodõf nigin inenadan,
are, fau isiyouf sain bun, ĩ yogon biya fiya Kristus Jesus bun ifanadan anĩ bunem, yogon wau ifenẽya barikã ifelnẽdiyouf nigin age fen.
Wau ifenẽya bunem, ã momoiya bunem kel yaleyein, are aug bunem sã, Negur nẽ ege luwa ifenein,
are kabĩ bunem sã, anĩ nigin, taka nem to yana yalesauf.
Ada Negur nẽ imaba, kabĩ biya talouf nigin Kristus Jesus bun ada kare fadan, kabĩ biya are Negur ada age tafouf nigin uruwa bun mogo dodok fanadan.
Anĩ nigin, uruwa bun, ã gõ diyein bunem haiden ubodõge di, idi mulũ dilen anidim (are tamo bouwa bun tamo imedim age difen) ã mulũ ileya sã diyein anĩ karĩ weleg.
Sain anĩ bun, ã Kristus nigin gerõ ufaregen, ã Israel buneg yeneĩ sã, promis nẽ bar itenẽya buneg ã yaũ, tenebur ein wau iseya sã, Negur nigin keleĩ sã ubodõgen anĩ karĩ weleg.
Anĩ ere, gama ã uruwa gerõ ufaregen anĩ, Kristus Jesus bun, Kristus nẽ naud bunem, Negur non guri yeĩ irousiyein.
Ere nigin, Kristus yogo ĩ neda maror, uru anĩ yale, tekelei inon, agef fen, kiwai fara fiya nẽ garaĩ anĩ narĩ fen.
Ĩ yogo bouwa bunem lo, ĩtãfiya ado, nun anĩ yaleledin. Ĩ yogo bun tamo uru anĩ bunem, tamo mata tekelei ino fen, maror inouf nigin age fen.
Ĩ bouwa tekelei enei bun, idi uruwom aa tetek bunem Negur bun komo fediyouf nigin agef fen, ĩ aa tetek bunem dogo neid kiwai yukesin.
Ĩ isi fen, ã haiden gerõ ufaregen bun maror nigin wogõ yei ken, idi Juda temeleid non difaren anidi buneg, maror nigin wogõ fiyẽdin.
Ĩ bunem, ada uruwom Awa Uur tekelei bunem, Tamada wagen ileya kisi feleya.
Anĩ nigin, ã yaũ tamo ado tamo urug sã, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ tamo kayau geid tekelei fen, Negur nẽ ibor tar.
Ã, aposel ado profet fõ gariya dinon anĩ teten fõ gen inoyein, are Kristus Jesus yogo ĩ monog tor gen.
Kristus bun, fõ ganan katõ fel fen, Odug bun tempel fateul wõ youf nigin fã yef.
Kristus bun, ãg, mata ibodõya nẽ modoũ Negur yogon Awa Uur bunem ibodõf nẽ anĩ wõ gouf nigin, weim inoyeik.
Age fiya nigin, aya Pol, haiden ã nigin, Kristus Jesus nẽ kabĩ nigin au fen, kalabus bun abodok.
Momoi bagai, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ã nigin aya ifanan anĩ, naig fe kabĩ yalen are, ã karĩ gen.
Are waa Negurem kurõ fesiya bunem aya ifelnan, are aya mogo tobega bagai atoton gen.
Ã enei uweseg fen, Kristus nẽ waa nigin aya wederou fokõ felen anĩ, keleĩ youf.
Are Awa Uurem Negur nẽ fateul aposel ado profet bun gama kurõ fesin gen, sain mogo ilelen anĩ nẽ tamo kayau bun tamo idi to agef ifelnẽdin.
Waa are, biya od bunem, haiden idi Israel geid Negur nẽ akor dalouf, idi ganan bouwa tekelei nẽ bagu fiya dibodõf, agef fen, Kristus Jesus bun promis nẽ akor anĩ weim dalouf.
Negur nẽ megeir kabĩ yale di, aya Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ege luwa ifanan anĩ bunem, biya od enei nẽ kabĩ tamo wõ aun.
Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan atun, tamo naal farumen aya gai naal bagai anĩ, wau ifenẽya enei aya ifanan, are Kristus nẽ kisi feleya, are imir ken, ileya kisi feleya sã anĩ, haiden bun wogõ auf nigin ado,
waa enei, kulu isin ganan Negur ereb ereb ganan kare fen anĩ bun iminẽyan ibodon anĩ, naig fe kabĩ yalef anĩ, tamo kayau ganan bun yaor afouf nigin ifanan.
Negur nẽ kisi are, gama sios bunem, Negur nẽ kisi biya fire fire, saa ilun uyu iroudiya ado yeneid adodo ifelnẽdiyouf,
are Negur ĩ, yogon mata ibodkeleya nẽ oroya, neda Odug Kristus Jesus bun kisif bure felen anĩ kilei, age fen.
Kristus bun, ada Kristus nigin momoiya bunem, karika ado kumĩ sã, Negur wagen ileya kisi feleya.
Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, aya ã nigin darau alef ge fen, to felu gouf, darau are ã fula fiya medeĩya ifeneĩya nigin.
Gariya enei nigin, Dei ĩ bunem, yogon ibor ganan saa ilun ado tenebur ein dibodok,
dogo neid yeneid yaledig, aya ĩ wagen iborou bobou afef.
Aya kosẽ auf, ĩ yogon fula fiya medeĩya kisi feleya bunem, yogon Awa Uur bunem megeir ã namein ife fen, megeir yeĩf nigin,
are Kristus ĩ momoiya bunem ãgenei wauĩ bun ibodõf nigin. Age afe fen, aya kosẽ auf, ã warumutei ado gariya, wau laa fiya bun utenẽg fen,
ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan geid, Kristus nẽ wau laa fiya anĩ, odug naig be fiya, meluk, ilun ado, namen naig be fiya anĩ ulogouf nigin megeir walogouf,
agog fen, wau laa fiya enei, keleĩ ganan wal fiya anĩ keleĩ youf, anĩ bunem, Negur nẽ kisi feleya ganan ã bun kisi falauf nigin kosẽ auf.
Ĩ gama yogon megeir ada namedan kabĩ yalef anĩ bunem, ereb ada to tafef be, kisi tafef anĩ ganan wal fiya, age fiya kisi feleya,
sios bun ado Kristus Jesus bun, fula fiya medeĩya, ibor ganan gai gai ibodok ilauf bun, ĩ bun ibodõf! Momoi.
Aya Kristus nigin kalabus bun abod ken, iweigya ã walegen kilei, mata ubodõgouf nigin totol bagai arokeneik.
Ã wauĩ adok ukalaisileg fen, molol bagai ubodõgouf. Ã to feseg, wauĩ laa fiya bun abob nẽ morõ uteĩgouf.
Awa Uur maror bunem bagu yein anĩ uroug kafĩ walagauf nigin, kabĩ totol waleg.
Sain ã iweignein, ã wau iseya tekelei bun iweignein, age fiya gen, bouwa tekelei, Awa Uur tekelei,
Odug tekelei, momoiya tekelei, naan igũya tekelei,
Negur tekelei, ĩ ganan neid Temeid, ĩ ganan wal fiya, ĩ ganan atun, ĩ ganan namen ibodok.
Anĩ ere, ada mugu mugu wau ifenẽya, Kristus ege luwa ifenẽya nigin kisi fen kilei, ifanadan.
Negur nẽ Itotoya anĩ nigin eig ye irok, “Ĩ ilun iselen sain, ĩ tamo musei geif irou iselen, agef fen, ĩ tamo ege luwa ifenẽdin.”
(“Ĩ ilun iselen” ya nẽ gariya are ere? Anĩ nẽ gariya are, ĩ tenebur farumen bagai buneg isilen.
Ĩ isilen are, ĩ anĩ saa ilun ganan wal fiya iselen, are owõ ganan inolauf nigin age fen.)
Inim anĩ, tunĩ aposel kabĩ, tunĩ profet kabĩ, tunĩ soosi kabĩ, tunĩ pastor kabĩ ado tise kabĩ ifenẽdin,
are Negur nẽ tamo kayau, aruna yaleya kabĩ dalouf nigin dodok fedi di, Kristus nẽ bouwa odugouf nigin age fen.
Agef ile ile, ada ganan, momoiya tekelei ado Negur Naal nigin keleĩ tekelei bun tasi fen, tamo kisi feleya bagai wõ tau fen, Kristus nẽ kisi feleya bagai bun talauf.
Age tafouf, ada baban momou gen to tabodõf, maaĩ moloun wĩya gen to age ta fen, tai fiya ganan, tamo neid beugya ado, idegẽya tamo neid kisi anidim, yaum fũ fe di, aarau ilef isif fedig gen, to wewu fadauf.
Age fiya ban, ada wau laa fiya bun momoi anĩ wogõ tau fen, ereb ereb ganan bun Mudur ibodok bun biya daf iselauf, Mudur are Kristus.
Ĩ bunem, dirumunã ganan bouwa isenne ken, katokitĩ fe, bagu fele di, bouwa nẽ fara fiya mugu mugu yogon kabĩ yalef bunem, bouwa adok odug fen, wau laa fiya bun yogo inof.
Anĩ nigin, aya enei Odug bun totol bagai arokeneik, ã baban, haiden idi difaredig gen, kisi sã gen to ufaragauf.
Idi neid kisi gugum kel fen, Negur nẽ mata bun ibodõya ditoron, ere nigin, idi wedereid to fokõ ye fen, waud totolen.
Idi es fiya kisi ganan ditor ken, idi dogo bouweid adok sane bun difen ken, ereb ereb sane ganan, dogo nigin dogol, es fiya sã age difedig.
Anĩ ere, ã Kristus nigin naab anĩ bunem to kelein.
Momoi bagai, ã ĩ nigin karĩ gen ado, ĩ bun difelnein, are momoi Jesus bun ibodok anĩ kilei.
Ã uruwa ubodõgen, ãgenei oroya tubu, yogon idegẽya oroya bunem sane len anĩ, utorõg fen,
ãgenei kisi nẽ tobonunã bun mata wõg fen,
oroya mata, madur bagai ado momoi nẽ fateul bun Negur gen inon anĩ, ufonũgouf nigin difelnein.
Anĩ nigin, ã mugu mugu idegẽya utorõg fen, ã neĩ tã momoi nem urokenẽgouf, ere nigin, ada ganan bouwa tekelei nẽ tunĩ.
“Ãgenei seyeya bun, mosor to unog.” Ã wauĩ bun to seye yef ile, gaa kuru kalauf.
Agog fen, ã Satan nẽ modoũ taka to utoumkenẽgouf.
Aib ĩ bẽ ilenouf, baban to bẽ ilauf, anĩ ere, yogo imam ereb biya nigin kabĩ yale di, ĩ lau difef anidi ifenẽdiya nigin safina adouf.
Ãgenei eweĩ bun od sesen to wõ youf, anĩ ere, idi lau difef anidi fã de dalouf nigin isennẽya od anĩ dogol urõge di, idi karĩ def are isennẽdiyouf.
Negur nẽ Awa Uur Fateul to wau morõ wenẽg, ĩ bunem kel yaleya nẽ naa nigin uris ã bun inon.
Ereb ereb dirikeĩ ganan, didi fatuk iseya, seyeya, gurũya, dumen od irõya ado, ereb ereb sane ganan utorõg.
Abob el wiyẽg fen, abob nigin wauĩ yu ken, Negur ĩ Kristus bun ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kelen gen, abob nẽ mosor nigin wedereĩ tu kalauf.
Anĩ nigin, ã Negur gere tar oboi nigin, ĩ gen bagai ago gouf.
Kristus ada nigin wau laaf fen, ada nigin yogo bouwa ofa ado sesewi fiya sumeĩ biya gen Negur ifenen gen, wauĩ laa fiya bun agog ubodõgouf.
Anĩ ere, ã atun, naal bagai noli tobonunã be, ereb amuyẽ ado taka be, safina musei youf nigin ima su lai fe fen sũ we fiya taka to ibodõf, ere nigin, eneidi are Negur nẽ fateul tamo kayau bun to biya.
Takag, od sesen, neneya od be, od sane nem weli to unogouf, are ada nigin to biya, anĩ ere, de fiyẽya od wogõ gouf.
Ere nigin, ã momoi bagai enei keleĩ: Tamo noli tobonunã ado, amuyẽ ado be, safina musei youf nigin ima su lai fe fen sũ we fiya (tamo age fiya are idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya tamo), ĩ Kristus ado Negur nẽ tano bun akor to yalouf.
To lo ge di, taka nem od egem idegneĩf, ere nigin, age fediya bunem Negur nẽ didi, idi nokũ difef anidi bun isidig.
Anĩ nigin, idi geid to nigal ũgouf.
Ere nigin, ã uruwa bun gugum, anĩ ere, gama Odug bun ã lalan. Lalan nẽ gere tar gen agog ufareg.
Ere nigin, lalan nẽ faat are, biya fiya, madur bagai ado, momoi anĩ ganan bun ibodok.
Agog fen, ereb Odug wau al fouf anĩ keleĩ youf.
Ereb gugum bun tamal tobonunã faat biya sã anĩ geid to nigal ũgouf, anĩ ere, yaor wedigouf.
Ere nigin, ereb fe temeleid iminẽyan age difedig anĩ nigin irõya, areg mama ado.
Anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan lalan bun yaor fef, are yaoredig,
ere nigin, lalan anim age fe di, ereb ereb ganan yaoredig. Enei nigin wogõya eig yef, “Fã wale, mulaĩ tamal, laa bun tamal fã wo, ago di, Kristus õ bun fula fouf.”
Anĩ nigin, ãgenei ibodõya nigin el ge lo walagauf. Kisi sã gen to ufaragauf, anĩ ere, kisi biya ado gen ufaragauf.
Naa biya ã nigin wõ youf ganan to sekil gouf, ere nigin, naa are sane.
Anĩ nigin, to neneg, anĩ ere, Odug nẽ oroya naig fiya anĩ ã keleĩ youf.
Ã wain musei to wõ ge di, meleĩ waĩ youf, are bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya bun irouleyeĩf. Age fiya ban, Awa Uurem nameĩ isokosauf.
Od Negur nẽ Itotoya Sam bun ibodok, Negur yana yaleseya seg ado, uur nẽ seg bunem abob wogõ wiyẽgouf. Ãgenei wauĩ bun Odug bun seg waleg fen, kakũ gouf.
Sain ganan bun, Negur Tamada ereb ereb ganan nigin, neda Odug Jesus Kristus yana bun de wiyẽgouf.
Kristus anini wiyẽg fen, abob farumen ubodõg.
Kayau, ã Odug farumen ubodõgedig gen, aiweĩ tar farumen ubodõgouf.
Ere nigin, Kristus ĩ, sios nẽ mudur ibodok gen, tamo ĩ kayau nẽ mudur ibodok, agef fen, Kristus ĩ sios, yogon bouwa nẽ kel yaleya tamo.
Sios Kristus farumen ibodok gen, kayau idig ereb ereb ganan bun, dogo neid aiweid tar farumen dibodõf.
Tamo, Kristus sios nigin wau laaf fen, yogo bouwa ĩ nigin ifenen gen, aiweĩ tar nigin wauĩ laa fouf.
Kristus ĩ anĩ age fen, are sios fateul ibodõf nigin od bunem naan nem fili youf nigin kulof fen,
are sios medeĩya bagai, diri sã, ifokoĩya be, ereb age fiya taka sã, anĩ ere, fateul fen bouwa od sã, yogo bun iroulauf nigin age fen.
Age fiya bagai, tamo dogo bouweid nigin waud laa fedig gen, aiweid tar nigin agef waud laa fouf. Aib ĩ aiwa nigin wau laa fef, are yogo nigin wau laa fef.
Aibem taka yogo bouwa to sane fiyẽdig, anĩ ere, ĩ ifout ken, kulatun fedig, Kristus sios nigin age fedig gen,
ere nigin, ada yogon bouwa nẽ tunĩ.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Age fiya nigin, tamo ĩ yogon tama sina ado itorneĩd fen, yogon aiwa ado bagu difouf, age de fen, idi uruwom bouweid tekelei youf.”
Waa enei are, odug bagai, anĩ ere, aya Kristus ado sios nigin wogõ auf.
Anĩ ere, ã aug nigin wauĩ laa fedig gen, ã mugu mugu ãgenei kayau tar nigineg agog wauĩ laa fouf. Age fe di, kayau ĩ yogon tamo farumen ibodõf.
Kesu, Odug bun sineĩ temeĩ tar sigoreid dõ gouf, ere nigin, anĩ madur.
“Sinã tamã yeneid walesauf,” are ĩtãfiya matu promis ado bagu fen,
“anĩ bunem, õ ibodõya biya ile di, tenebur ein sain meluk ubodõf.”
Tama tar, gereneĩ tar waud saneya to wenẽdig, age fiya ban, Odug nẽ tai fiya ado ifelnẽya bunem lo wedigouf.
Ferfer, ã Kristus dõ gounẽ gen, tenebur ein ãgenei marau tamo, kumĩ ado aniniya ado, wauĩ adok bunem sigoreid dõ gouf.
Ã meleid yaleya bunem to sigoreid dõ gouf, anĩ ere, Kristus nẽ ferfer gen, Negur nẽ oroya, ãgenei wauĩ adok bunem ago gouf.
Ã Odug aruna walogounẽ gen, tamo nigin sã, wauĩ adok yen ken, aruneid walogouf,
ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ĩ ferfer be, kafĩ fiya sã, Odug ĩ mugu mugu ganan, ereb biya age difef anĩ kilei, mala solo ifenẽdiyouf.
Marau tamo ã, ãgenei ferfer naab de anĩ bunem el wedigouf. To kumĩya wenẽdig, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã ado idi nigin, ãgenei Marau saa ilun ibodok, ĩ bun taka nigin dogol anĩ, kinau ya sã.
Od idĩya nigin, Odug bun ado yogon megeir barikã bun, totol ufareg.
Negur nẽ kusĩ nẽ saki ganan waleg, naki weleg fen, Satan nẽ kisi, fe fiyẽya nigin, sã megeir ufaragauf.
Ere nigin, ada neda kusĩ are, bouwa ado naud nẽ oroya fe fiyẽya nigin sã, anĩ ere, uyu iroudiya, yeneid adodo, tenebur nẽ gugum nẽ megeir ado, saa ilun kaa sesen nẽ megeir nẽ totol fe fiyẽya nigin.
Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ kusĩ nẽ saki ganan waleg, naki weleg, anĩ bunem, sesen nẽ naa wõ ye di, ã tutub yũ ifareya nigin kisi feleya, agog fen, ã ereb ereb ganan agog fen, ufaragauf.
Anĩ nigin, totol ufareg, momoi nẽ lũ luweĩ gug fen, madur bagai nẽ siot kapam akoreĩ dedeg,
agog fen, ãgenei yeĩ bun su ufonũg fen, maror nẽ biya od wogõya nigin dodok fiya saika ufaragauf.
Enei ganan bun tobol fe fen, momoiya nẽ makanam waleg, anĩ bunem, ã sesen nẽ magir yã bale ado isif anĩ ganan, sã gare walagauf.
Agog fen, kel yaleya nẽ hat kapa ado Awa Uur nẽ dimig, are Negur nẽ od, anĩ waleg.
Kosẽya ado to fiya ganan bun, sain ganan Awa Uur bun kosẽ gouf. Enei kisi bun unog fen, saika ge fen, sain ganan Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan nigin kosẽ gouf.
Aya nigineg kosẽ gouf, are sain aya od arõf bun ganan, Negurem od ifana fen, aya kumĩ sã biya od nẽ waa anĩ wogõ auf nigin ago gouf.
Biya od enei nigin, aya soosi tamo wõ au fen, kalabus bun abodok. Aya to kumĩ au fen, biya od sã kurõ afalaisiyouf nigin kosẽg.
Tikikus, turau oboiyou fen Odug bun kabĩ tamo dõ fiya biya, ĩ ereb ereb ganan irokeneĩf, age fe di, ãg, aya naig be afef ado aya ere kabĩ alef anĩ, keleĩ youf.
Aya, ĩ, gariya enei nigin bagai ã gein sur afef, are ã amã naig be fiya mabodok anĩ keleĩ youf nigin ado, ĩ ãgenei wauĩ megeir fouf nigin.
Tamada Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus bunem, turau tar, wau inosiya ã bun ibodõf, agef fen, wau laa fiya momoiya ado ã bun isiyouf.
Idi, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nigin waud laaf fen, waud laa fiya anĩ to folõ difeledig anidi ganan bun, wau ifenẽya ibodõf.
Pol ado Timoti, Kristus Jesus nẽ ferfer, Filipai oun Kristus Jesus bun Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan ado, uyu iroudiya ado uyu iroudiya farumen sios kabĩ daledig anidi bun pas enei matotof.
Neda Tamada Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus bunem, wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya ã bun ibodõf.
Sain aya ã nigin karĩ aulef ganan bun, aya neu Negur de afiyẽdig.
Ã ganan nigin neu kosẽya ganan bun, aya sain ganan bun wau kulĩya ado kosẽ audig,
ere nigin, ã gariya bunem biya od nigin, amã geid uyu kũ ta tasin isi, gama sain enei bun.
Aya enei nigin momoi auf, are taka ĩ ã namein kabĩ biya gariya inon are, tokõ fel ile, Kristus Jesus nẽ naa bun idikalauf.
Aya ã ganan nigin eig afe kisi afef, are tutuk, ere nigin, ã neu wau bun ufaregef, ere nigin, aya kalabus bun be abodok, biya od asen ken, kurõ afeis fen megeir afef bun, ã ganan Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bun, aya geid tabodõgedig.
Kristus Jesus nẽ wau laa fiya bunem, aya ã ganan nigin wau naig be fe laa fedig, are Negur ĩ keleĩ.
Enei nigin aya kosẽ auf, are ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya anĩ, keleĩ ado es fiya kisi ganan bun, odugef ilauf,
anĩ bunem, ã ereb biya bagai ya es fiya kelei ken, ã karẽtut fen, od sã ubodõgef uleg, Kristus nẽ naa bun wõ gouf,
ago ge di, madur bagai nẽ faat Jesus Kristus bunem isif anĩ, ã bun barikãf, anĩ bunem, Negur ĩ fula fiya medeĩya ado yana yaleseya yalouf.
Turau tar, gama aya ã enei keleĩ youf anĩ orouf, ereb aya bun wõ yen anim, biya od el fe isennẽ di, fou yelen.
Anĩ bunem, Sisa nẽ fõ lo fiya tamo ganan ado tamo kayau ganan idi, aya Kristus nigin kalabus bun abodok ya anĩ keleĩ.
Aya kalabus bun abodok anĩ bunem, neu turau tar musei ganan, Odug bun dibodok idi, Negur nẽ od nigin, totol ado kumĩ sã, wogõ douf nigin waud yalesen.
Momoi, tunĩ kiyeĩ ado kiwai bunem Kristus nigin wogõ dedig, anĩ ere, tunĩ kisi biya bunem age difedig.
Idi kisi biya bunem age difedig anidi, wau laa fiya bunem age difedig, are aya biya od asennen bunem kalabus bun abodok anĩ idi keleĩ.
Idi kiyeĩ ado kiwai bunem age difedig anidi, kisi karẽtut ban, dogo yeneid nigin de fen, Kristus nigin wogõ def, are sain aya kalabus bun abod mog, morõ aya bun tobol fiya nigin de fen age difedig.
Anĩ ere, ere naig fouf? Ereb odug bagai are, naab ganan bun, kisi kũ fenẽya bunem be, kisi tutuk bunem age difef, are Kristus nigin wogõ def. Anĩ age dife di, aya wau al fef. Momoi, aya neu wau al fiya tokõ afalauf,
ere nigin, aya keleĩ, ãgenei kosẽya bunem ado Jesus Kristus nẽ Awa Uurem isennẽya bunem, ereb aya bun wõ yen anim, aya kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnauf.
Aya totol bagai kisi afe fen, wau irok, are aya naab taka bunem to mama fiyauf, anĩ ere, aya kumĩ sã totol barikã ano di, Kristus ĩ, sain ganan age fedig gen, gamag neu bouwau bun, mata ibodõya bun be laa buneg, yana ilun iselauf.
Ere nigin, aya bun, mata ibodõyauf are Kristus nigin, laa fiyauf areg aya biya alouf.
Aya fau bouwau bun mata abodok alauf are, aya faat biya yũf nigin kabĩ alouf. Anĩ ere, ere anĩ aya dõ afouf? Aya keleĩ sã!
Aya uru anidim si sitakã dĩ difiyaf. Aya ile, Kristus ado ibodõya nigin orouf, are gai biya bagai,
anĩ ere, aya bouwau mata ibodõf are, ã nigin biya bagai youf.
Aya enei nigin momoi bagai au fen, aya keleĩ, aya fau abodõf, age afe fen, aya, ãgenei momoiya biya ilauf nigin ado ã momoiya bun wauĩ kulĩ youf nigin, ã ganan geid tabodõf.
Age fe di, aya ã geid baban tabodõf anĩ bunem, aya bunem, ãgenei wauĩ kulĩya Kristus Jesus nigin ise gogũ fouf.
Ereb wõ youf, Kristus nẽ biya od kisin bagai ereb ereb ago gouf. Anĩ bunem, aya asi ã ailiyeĩf be, aya ã atun ibodõya sa ken karĩ be dogol auf, aya keleĩ youf, are ã uur tekelei bun totol ufareg fen, biya od nẽ momoiya nigin tamo tekelei gen, bagug fen, kabĩ totol walogouf.
Idi naab fire fire bunem, kiwai difeneĩf anidi nigin, ã kumĩ sã ufaragauf. Are idi bun, idi daũ feidlauf anĩ nẽ uris, anĩ ere, ã bun, Negurem ã kel yaleyeĩf anĩ nẽ uris.
Ere nigin, ã Kristus nigin momoi gouf nigin dogol, Kristus aruna yaleya nẽ el fiya to ifenein, anĩ ere, ã ĩ nigin daraug walogouf nigin ifenein.
Ã aya kusĩ aun ulegen, gamag fau kusĩ auf karĩ gef anĩ, ãg ago gef.
Anĩ nigin, ã Kristus bun wauĩ yaleseya adouf are, Kristus nẽ wau laa fiya bunem wauĩ yo fiya adouf are, Awa Uur geid nigal yũya adouf are, molol ado wauĩ yũya adouf are,
neu wau kulĩya anĩ, wauĩ tekelei, wauĩ laa fiya tekelei, uur ado kisi bun tekelei bunem tobol ge di, neu wau kulĩya barikãf.
Aug nigin dogol be, ege yeneĩ yaleseya bunem ereb taka to ago gouf, anĩ ere, wauĩ yukesileya bun, ã aug nigin kisi gef anĩ wal fiya, taka nigin agog kisi gouf.
Ã mugu mugu ãgenei biya fiya nigin dogol to kisi gouf, anĩ ere, tunĩ neid biya fiya nigineg kisi gouf.
Ãgenei tobonuneĩ, Kristus Jesus nẽ ado tekelei youf:
Ĩ yogo Negur bagai, anĩ ere, ĩ Negur gen ibodõya anĩ itoron,
anĩ ere, ĩ yogon kisi ganan yukalaisil fen, ferfer gen ibod ken, tamo bagai gen wõ yen.
Agef fen, tamo bagai gen wõ ye mog, dilen. Ĩ yogo wau yukesil fen, laa nigineg sigor dõ fen, agef fen, aa tetek buneg laa fen!
Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ ilun bagai yaleselne ken, ĩ yana, yana ganan wal fiya anĩ ifenen.
Age fe di, Jesus yana anĩ bun, iboreid ganan bobou difouf, saa ilun ado, tenebur ado, teneub farumeneg.
Age de fen, sigoreid ganan kurõ difalaisi, Jesus Kristus ĩ Odug de fen, Tama Negur fula fiya medeĩya difenẽf.
Anĩ nigin, neu oboiyou tar, aya malau bun dogol sã, anĩ ere, fatuk bagai aya ã geid to tabodok buneg, ã gai dõ gedig gen, ãgenei kel yaleya nigin, kumĩ ado tererẽya bunem, kabĩ totol walogouf,
ere nigin, Negur nẽ kisi biya kilei, ã kisig fen, dõ gouf nigin, Negur ĩ ã namein kabĩ yaledig.
Ereb ereb ganan, nauseirya sã, monẽya sã bunem, ago gouf,
ago ge di, ã bouweĩ od sa ken, karẽtut bagai, tenebur tamo kayau waud gogileya ado sane atun, Negur gere tar kũ fenẽya sã wowã gouf, ã idi atun owõbẽ barisa gegen fula gouf.
Mata ifenẽya nẽ od uroug kafĩ walagauf, ago ge di, aya Kristus nẽ naa bun, aya ege to gudu raun be kabĩ alen anĩ nigin, yanau alesauf.
Anĩ ere, aya, ãgenei momoiya anĩ nẽ sesewi fiya ado aruna yaleya bun, wain ofa gen, naudou fi falaufeg, aya wau al fe fen, ã ganan geid wauda kulĩ youf.
Anĩ nigin, ãg wauĩ al fe fen, aya geid wauda kulĩ youf.
Odug Jesus bun, aya Timoti ã bun kaisã bagai sur fiya nigin, wau isef, are aya ã nigin od ale fen, ayag wau al fouf nigin age afef.
Aya ein, aib taka ĩ gen, ãgenei biya fiya nigin wau fãya anĩ to ailen.
Ere nigin, ganan dogo nigin dogol kisi difedig, Jesus Kristus nẽ biya fiya nigin to kisi difedig.
Anĩ ere, ã keleĩ, Timoti ĩ yogo nigin yaor fen, ere nigin, ĩ aya urom, kesu yogon tama ado gen, biya od nigin kabĩ malen.
Anĩ nigin, aya bun ereb ereb naig fe wõ youf anĩ ail fen, ĩ ã bun kaisã bagai sur fiya nigin, wau irok.
Age afe fen, aya Odug bun momoi auf, aya yug kaisã bagai asiyouf.
Anĩ ere, aya kisi afef, aya Epafroditus ã gein baban sur afiyẽf are deuf auf, ĩ neu turau, neu kabĩ turau ado, kusĩ tamo turau, ĩg ãgenei soosi tamo, ĩ ereb aya lau afef anĩ kulatun fiyauf nigin sur wiyẽgen anĩ.
Ĩ ã ganan ileyeĩya nigin wau fatuk bagai irok, agef fen, ĩ dagi ado ya anĩ karĩ gen bunem wau morõ ado.
Momoi ĩ dagi fen, laaf genen. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ nigin wau yun, ĩ nigin dogol sã, aya nigineg wau yu ken, aya wau gudũ fiya teten, wau gudũ fiya baban to alouf nigin age fen.
Anĩ nigin, aya ĩ sur fiyẽya nigin wau totol bagai irok, age afe di, sain ã ĩ baban uleg fen, wauĩ al fe di, aya wau morõ are wau warasa youf.
Ã Odug bun wauĩ al fiya odug bunem aan wiyẽgouf, agog fen, tamo ĩ gen yeneid walesagauf,
ere nigin, ĩ Kristus nẽ kabĩ nigin laaf genen, ĩ ã aya isennẽya ifanaya kisi feleya sã anĩ, aya ifanauf nigin, yogon bou itoron.
Od idĩya nigin, neu turau tar, Odug bun wauĩ kulĩ ye! Aya ã bun de tekelei enei baban itotoya nigin morõ sã. Are ã kulatun yeĩya nigin, age afef.
Gaũ anidi nigin lo walagauf, tamo idi sane age difedig, idi mulũ ileya nigin bouweid gudũ difedig anidi.
Ere nigin, ada anĩ mulũ telen, ada anĩ Negur nẽ Awa Uur bunem Negur yana talesedig, ada anĩ Kristus Jesus nigin yanada talesedig, age ta fen, ada bouwa nẽ oroya nigin to momoi taudig.
Anĩ ere, aya yug bouwa nẽ oroya bun yanau yaleseya nigin gariya ado. Aib taka ĩ bouwa nẽ oroya bun yana yaleseya nigin gariya ado youf, aya ĩ wal fiya.
Naa eit bun aya mulũ elen, aya Israel tamo, Benjamin nẽ ibor bun tamal, Hibru tamo bagai, aya lo bunem Farisia tamal,
aya Negur nigin au fen, kabĩ totol aledig, age afe fen, sios darau afenẽdidig, lo dõ fiya bunem madur bagai wõya nigineg, aya bouwau bun od sã.
Anĩ ere, ereb ereb anĩ ganan aya isennauf aun are, Kristus nigin au fen, atoron.
Anĩ dogol sã, neu Odug Kristus Jesus nigin keleĩya anĩ, ereb ereb ganan wal feid fen, odug bagai nigin, aya ereb ereb ganan are ege auf. Aya ĩ nigin ereb ereb ganan ator ken, sisik gen kisi afef, are aya Kristus anĩ ale fen,
ĩ ado bagu mafouf nigin age afen. Neu madur bagai aya bun ibodok are, lo bunem isiya sã, anĩ ere, madur bagai Kristus nigin momoiya bunem isif, are madur bagai Negur bun tamal momoiya bunem isif.
Aya, Kristus nigin, yogon mata kel fãya nẽ megeir nigin ado, yogon darau bun ifareya nigin kelei ken, yogon laa bun ĩ gen wõ auf nigin orouf,
are aya laa bun tamal kel fãya anĩ alouf nigin age afef.
Aya enei ganan mogo alen be, kisi feleya bagai wõ aun gen to kisi afef, anĩ ere, aya, ereb aya yaleya nigin Kristus Jesus igirnan anĩ, yaleya nigin totol bagai gudu rauf.
Turau tar, aya anĩ mogo alen to auf. Anĩ ere, ereb aya age afef are, ereb aya dudum afen are wederou tu kel fen, ereb malabag ifaref anĩ bun gudu rauf.
Aya, mala solo Negurem saa ilunem Kristus Jesus bun iweignan anĩ, alouf nigin daũ bun gudu rauf.
Ada atĩya wõ taun ganan, eig ya dogol kisi tafouf. Ã kisi tunĩ nigin fire kisi gouf, areg Negur ã bun yaor fouf.
Anĩ ere, ereb ada mogo talen anĩ dõ tafouf.
Turau tar, ã tunĩ geid bagug fen, aya dõ wiyagauf, agog fen, ã, idi amã tobonunã mafelnein bun difaref anidi dõ wedigouf.
Ere nigin, aya mogo sain musei arokeneik asin anĩ, gama baban maru isi fen arokeneik, musei idi Kristus nẽ aa tetek nigin kiwai dibodok.
Idi neid idikeleya are daũ feleya bun, idi neid waitou are dogo neid naumeid, agef fen, dogo neid fula fiya are dogo neid mama bun ibodok. Dogo neid kisi are tenebur nẽ safina bun ibodok.
Anĩ ere, ada neda ibodõya modoũ are, saa ilun ibodok. Agef fen, ada kel yaleya tamo Odug Jesus Kristus an tamal fatuk bagai tari tafef.
Kristus ĩ, ereb ereb ganan ĩ farumen irouleya nẽ megeir bunem, ada bouwada tenebur nẽ enei falei fele di, ĩ yogon bouwa fula fiya medeĩya gen wõ douf.
Anĩ nigin, neu turau tar, aya ã nigin wau laaf fen, kisi totol anodig, ã neu wau kulĩya ado teter. Neu oboiyou tar, ã Odug bun agog ufareg, megeir lauf.
Aya Yuodia õ agonok, Sintike õg agonok, ã Odug bun wauĩ tekelei youf.
Kabĩ turau bagai, aya õ arokonok, kayau eneidi biya od nigin aya isennaya nigin kabĩ totol daledig anidi usenneĩd fen, Klemen ado neu kabĩ turau tar ganan, dogo neid yeneid mata ibodõya nẽ buk bun ifaref anidig, usennẽdiyouf.
Sain ganan Odug bun wauĩ kulĩ youf. Aya baban arokeneik: Wauĩ kulĩ ye!
Ãgenei molol anĩ tamo ganan bun yaor gouf. Odug ĩ mogo melsak.
Ã ereb taka nigin to suwẽ gouf, anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan bun, kosẽya ado to fiya bunem, Negur de wiyẽg fen, ãgenei to fiya Negur bun unogouf.
Ago ge di, Negur nẽ wau inosiya tamo nẽ karĩya ganan wal fiya anim, Kristus Jesus bun, ãgenei wauĩ ado ãgenei kisi kulatun fediyouf.
Od idĩya nigin, turau tar, ereb momoi anĩ, ereb biya anĩ, ereb madur anĩ, ereb karẽtut anĩ, ereb wau laa fiya nẽ anĩ, ereb yana iseleya nẽ anĩ, ereb taka biya bagai fen, yana iseleya nẽ bagai anĩ, ereb ereb age fiya nigin kisi gouf.
Ereb aya bunem ã kelein, walegen, karĩ gen be, aya bun ulegen anĩ, agog dõ gouf. Ago ge di, wau inosiya nẽ Negur, ã geid ibodõf.
Gama ã aya isennaya nigin baban kisi fã yen nigin, aya Odug bun fatuk bagai wau kulĩ yef. Momoi, ã aya isennaya nigin kisi gen, anĩ ere, ã anĩ yaor fiya nigin naab taka to wõ yen.
Aya ereb lau afef nigin, enei to orok, ere nigin, sain naig be fe isiyoufeg, aya wau inois ibodõya nigin kelein.
Aya maleg bun ibodõya are aya keleĩ, aya safina ado ibodõyag aya keleĩ. Nain be, ereb sain naig be fe wõ youf bun, aya nameu isokosauf be, naũ abodõf, aya safina musei ado be, aya safina naal bagai adoufeg, aya wau inois ibodõya nẽ waa are aya kelein.
Aya ereb ereb ganan, ĩ aya megeir ifanadig bunem, sã age afouf.
Anĩ ere, aya neu morõ bun isennaya nigin kisi gen are, ã biya ago gen.
Filipai tamo kayau ã gai keleĩ bagai, aya Masedonia provins ator ken, asi, biya od uyulil wogõ ayein sain bun, sios takam safina yaleya bun be, ifenẽya bun to isennan, ãgem dogol.
Sain aya Tesalonika taun abodoneg, ã safina aya isennẽya nigin aya lau afe mog, baba baban sur wanagen.
Aya safina ege luwa yaleya nigin to kisi afef, anĩ ere, aya ãgenei dumen mala solo biya walogouf nigin kisi afef.
Aya ereb ereb ganan kisi feleya ale fen, anĩ wal fiyag alen. Aya fatuk bagai wanagen, gama aya Epafroditus bunem safina fire fire ege luwa sur gen anĩ alen. Anĩ ganan are, sesewi fiya sumeĩ biya ado anĩ, Negur wau al fiya ado yalouf.
Agef fen, neu Negur ĩ, Kristus Jesus bun, yogon kisi feleya fula fiya medeĩya barikã bunem, ãgenei lau gef ganan ifeneĩf.
Neda Tamada Negur bun fula fiya medeĩya gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
Kristus Jesus bun Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan aan wiyẽdigouf. Turau tar aya geid mafaref anidim aanya sur difef.
Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan, ã bun aanya sur difef, idi atun, idi Sisa nẽ ibor bun kabĩ daledig anidim bagai anĩ, ã bun aanya sur difef.
Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ãgenei uur bun ibodõf. Momoi.
Aya Pol, Negur nẽ oroya bunem Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ aun ado, neda turada Timoti adom,
oun Kolosi taun, Negur nẽ fateul tamo kayau, Kristus bun momoiya turamã tar bun pas enei matotkeneik. Wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya, Tamada Negur bunem ã bun ibodõf.
Sain amã ã nigin kosẽ mauf bun, amã faimud neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ Tama, Negur de mafiyẽdig,
ere nigin, amã Kristus Jesus bun ãgenei momoiya ado, ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan nigin wauĩ laa fiya anĩ karĩ maun.
Ã mogo momoi nẽ od, biya od ã bun isin anĩ karĩg fen, ereb ã nigin saa ilun inon nigin wauĩ ise fen, momoiya ado wauĩ laa fiya anĩ wõ yen.
Sain ã biya od anĩ karĩg fen, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya momoi bagai kelein sain anĩ bunem ilauf ganan, biya od anĩ ã atun age fen gen, teneub ganan bun, biya od enei faat yu ken, odugef.
Ã, nemã oboimã ferfer turamã Epafras bun keleĩ anĩ walegen, ĩ amã nawamã yaleya, Kristus nẽ kabĩ tamo dõ fiya biya,
agef fen, inimeg ãgenei Awa Uur bun wauĩ laa fiya nigin irokanaman.
Age fiya nigin, sain amã ã nigin karĩ maun bunem isif ganan, amã ã nigin Negur kosẽ mafiye ken, uur nẽ kisi biya ado kisi fokõya ganan bunem Negur nẽ oroya nigin keleĩ aura yeĩf nigin to fiyẽya to matorõdig.
Age mafe fen, amã, ã Odug nẽ oroya bun ubodõg fen, ereb ereb ganan bun Odug wau al fouf nẽ anĩ ago gouf nigin kosẽ maudig: faat biya kabĩ biya ganan bun yũf nigin, Negur nigin keleĩ, ã bun odugouf nigin,
yogon fula fiya medeĩya nẽ megeir bunem megeir ganan ifeneĩ di, ã ereb ereb ganan bun, feseya sã megeir bagai ufaragauf nigin, agef fen, wauĩ kulĩya ado,
Tamada ĩ, ã lalan nẽ tano bun Negur nẽ tamo kayau neid akor weim walogouf nigin age fen anĩ, de wiyẽgouf nigin kosẽ maudig.
Ere nigin, ĩ ada gugum nẽ megeir bun yalelnada fen, in Naal Negurem ĩ nigin wau laa fedig anĩ nẽ tano bun gei fada irou isidan.
Ĩ Naal bun ada kel yaledan, neda mosor nigin weder tu kelen.
Kristus ĩ, Negur ada to tailef anĩ nẽ malakanon, ĩ Negur nẽ kesu matu, ereb ereb inodin ganan anĩ nẽ mudur inenen.
Are, Kristus ĩ bunem ereb ereb ganan inodin, ereb ereb saa ilun ifaredif ado tenebur ein ifaredif, ereb ereb tailef ado to tailef, king, megeir, uyu iroudiya be, yeneid adodo; ereb ereb ganan Kristus bunem Kristus nigin ye fen, inodin.
Kristus ĩ ereb ereb ganan wõya sã mog, ibodon, agef fen, ĩ bun ereb ereb ganan ifaref.
Ĩ bouwa are sios, ĩ yogo anĩ nẽ mudur. Ĩ gariya, tamo gare den bun tamal uyulil kel fã yen, are ereb ereb ganan bun ĩ mudur ibodõf nigin age fen.
Negur ĩ yogon kisi feleya bagai anĩ ganan, Kristus bun ibodõf nigin oro fen,
ĩ Kristus nẽ naud aa tetek bun fi felen anĩ bunem maror ino fen, Kristus bunem ereb ereb ganan tenebur ifaredif be, saa ilun ifaredif, ĩ geid komo difouf nigin oron.
Uruwa bun, ã Negur nigin gerõ ufareg fen, ãgenei tobonunã sane bunem, ãgenei kisi bun Negur nigin kiwai ubodõgen.
