Anĩ ere gama, Negur ĩ, Kristus nẽ bouwam laa bunem, yogon lo fiya bun ã fateul, amuyẽ sã, od sã ineneĩf nigin ĩ geid komo yein.
Ã ãgenei momoiya tobol ge fen, feseya sã totol ufareg fen, biya od karĩ gen sain bun wauĩ iseya walegen anĩ bun to ulegef usigef gouf are, agog wõ gouf. Biya od enei are, ereb ereb ganan saa farumen ifaref anidi bun kurõ fesin, agef fen, aya Pol biya od anĩ nẽ kabĩ tamo wõ aun.
Gama aya ã nigin darau alef anĩ nigin wau al fef, age afe fen, Kristus ĩ yogon bouwa sios nigin darau yalen bun fau to kisi felef anĩ kisi falauf nigin, aya bouwaum darau anĩ ale di, kisi falauf.
Aya Negur nẽ od anĩ kisi feleya bagai afeneĩf nigin, Negur kabĩ ifanan anĩ nẽ kabĩ tamo wõ aun.
Negur nẽ od are ĩ waa, kulunem ibor isin ganan bun iminẽyan ibodon anĩ, gama Negur nẽ momoiya tamo kayau bun yaor fen.
Negur nẽ tamo kayau bun, Negurem waa enei nẽ fula fiya medeĩya barikã anĩ naig be fiya anĩ, haiden atun yaor fouf nigin wau iron, waa are Kristus ã namein ibodok, anĩ nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin wau iseya anĩ.
Amã ĩ nigin kurõ mafalaisi, tamo kayau ganan wedereid maroud fen, kisi biya ganan bun, tamo kayau ganan mafelnẽdidig, are amã tamo kayau ganan Kristus bun, kisi feleya bagai manenẽdiyouf nigin age mafef.
Enei kisi falauf nigin, aya kabĩ totol alef, yogon megeir aya nameun ibod ken, kabĩ totol yalef anim aya gunĩ auf.
Aya ã nigin, idi Laodisia taun difaref anidi nigin ado, idi aya to bagai dileyaf anidi ganan nigin, naig afe gunĩ auf anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin orouf.
Neu kisi bagai are, idi waud alese di, wau laa fiya bunem waud katõ difouf, age fe di, idi kisi fokõ feleya nigin keleĩ barikãf, anĩ bunem, idi Negur nẽ waa keleĩ youf, are Kristus.
Ĩ bun kisi biya ado keleĩ nẽ safina biya ganan inokon ibodok.
Aya taka nem meleĩ yaleya od biyai biyai bunem to idegneĩf nigin enei arokeneik.
Momoi, aya bouwaum ã geid to tabodok, anĩ ere, aya uur bun ã geid tabod ken, ã naig be ge tutuk ufareg fen, ãgenei Kristus bun momoiya naig be fe megeir ifaref anĩ, ileya nigin wau irok.
Ã Kristus Jesus ãgenei Odug walegen, anĩ nigin, ã ĩ bun mata ubodõgouf.
Ĩ bun warei urarãg fen, fõ kare gen walesagauf, ã difelnein kilei, ãgenei momoiya bun megeir ge fen, de fiyẽya anĩ ã bun ise gogũ fouf.
Taka nem ã, tamo nẽ idegẽya keleĩ kaũ sã bunem to gurar yeĩ irouleyeĩf nigin lo walagauf, are Kristus dõ fiya ban, tamo nẽ tobonunã ado tenebur enei nẽ tobonunã dõ fiya nigin.
Ere nigin, Kristus bun Negur nẽ kisi feleya bagai ganan bouwa bun ibodok.
Agef fen, ã Kristus bun kisi feleya bagai ifenein, Kristus ĩ megeir ganan ado yeneid adodo ganan neid mudur.
Ĩ bun ãg mulũ ulegen, are tamo imam mulũ bun ineneĩya sã, anĩ ere, mosor nẽ oroya yaleleya nigin, Kristusem mulũ bun inenein.
Ã, ĩ geid naan yaleya bun mũ yei ken, Negur ĩ laa bun tamal Kristus kel turĩ fiyen anĩ nẽ megeir bun, ãgenei momoiya bunem ĩ geid kel turĩ yein.
Sain ã, ãgenei mosor nigin ado ãgenei mosor nẽ oroya nigin mulũ ileya sã nigin, laa bun ufareg mog, Negur ĩ, ã Kristus geid kel turĩ yein. Ĩ neda mosor adok nigin weder tu kelen.
Ĩ lo nẽ ĩtãfiya itotoya, are ada weteda kiwai ibodon anĩ isasalen, ĩ anĩ yalel fen, aa tetek bun yun.
Agef fen, ĩ, megeir adodo yeneid adodo neid totol ganan, ye farumen gõ fel fen, Kristus nẽ aa tetek bunem kusĩ bun idi wal fedin anĩ dilouf nigin, ganan meleid bun yaor fen.
Anĩ nigin, ã saaf be naan wãgauf, uub sifa naa fire fire be, ogõ mata sigigi fiya naa be, Sabat naa to dõ gouf bun, taka nem to es yeĩf.
Eneidi are, ereb fau isiyouf nẽ malakanon. Anĩ ere, ereb momoi bagai are Kristus bun fotou fiyauf.
Aib taka ĩ, mala yaleya nigin wau yukesileya ado engel yeneid yaleseya nigin wau al fef anim, ã mala solo walogouf anĩ to wal yeĩf. Tamo age fiya ĩ ereb ilen anĩ nigin nenerĩ meluk dir fe fen, yogon bouwa nẽ oroya anim, gariya sã fagã yedig.
Ĩ bouwa nẽ mudur Kristus anĩ folõ fel fen ifaren, mudur are Kristus, ĩ bunem bouwa ganan tuwa katõ fiya ado dirumunã anidim disennẽ di, katõ fel ifar fen, Negur yogo age fe di, odugedig.
Ã Kristus geid tenebur enei nẽ tobonunã bun laa yein, age fiyauf are, ere nigin anĩ ã fau anĩ nẽ gen ufareg fen, yogon ĩtãfiya eig fiya farumen ufaregef,
“Ã to uroug! Ã to kobũg uleg! Ã to dorõg uleg!”?
Enei ganan are, kabĩ wenẽge di, sa kalauf, ere nigin, idi tamo nẽ ĩtãfiya ado tai fiya dogol.
Momoi, ĩtãfiya age age fediya are, dogo neid kisim seli kulõ fiya, dogo neid idegẽya waud yukesileya ado, dogo neid bouweid kafĩ fiya ifenẽya bun, kisi biya gen ulegedig, anĩ ere, idi bouwa nẽ oroya lai fesileya nigin kisi feleya sã.
Age fiya nigin, ã mogo Kristus geid keg fã gen nigin, ãgenei wauĩ ereb ereb ilun nẽ nigin, Kristus Negur ima biyalẽ ibodok nẽ an, unogouf.
Ãgenei kisi ereb ereb ilun nẽ nigin unogouf, ereb ereb tenebur nẽ nigin sã.
Ere nigin, ã gareg fen, ãgenei mata gama Kristus geid Negur bun inokon.
Kristus ĩ ãgenei mata, ĩ wõ youf sain bun, ãg ĩ geid fula fiya medeĩya bun wõ gouf.
Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb ãgenei tenebur nẽ oroya nẽ anĩ udenkesig: noli tobonunã, amuyẽ tobonunã, noli kisi, oroya sesen ado, safina musei youf nigin ima su lai fe fen sũ we fiya (are idegẽya waitou seli yabiya).
Eig fediya nigin, Negur nẽ didi isif.
Ã uruwa ubodõgen, naab enei bun uyõgen.
Anĩ ere, ã gama naab eig fediya, wau saneya, didi iseya, tobonunã sesen inoya, dumen od irõya ado, sigoreĩ bun od sesen wogõya, anĩ ganan utorõgouf.
Ã abob to udegnẽgouf, ere nigin, ãgenei bouweĩ nẽ oroya tubu yogon tobonunã ado uraileg fen,
oroya mata ufonũgen, are Negur nẽ malakanon nigin keleĩ bun mata falei yeĩdig.
Ein baban, Grik tamo be Juda tamo, mulũ ileya be mulũ ileya sã, yaũ tamo be tamo kuĩ gen, ferfer be kafĩ fiya sã tamo gen, fire fire to ibodok, anĩ ere, Kristus ĩ anĩ ganan, ĩ ganan anĩ namedin ibodok.
Anĩ nigin, ã tamo kayau Negurem igirnein, fateul ado Negur nẽ oboi tar nigin, wau yũya, tobonunã biya, wau yukesileya, molol ado, kaisã to seyeya anĩ ufonũgouf.
Molol ufareg fen, abob nigin morõ faali gouf, agog fen, ã atun abob ereb morõ ibodõf anĩ nigin wedereĩ tu kalauf. Odug ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kelen gen, ãg mosor nigin wedereĩ tu kalauf.
Agog fen, enei ganan teten, wauĩ laa fiya ufonũgouf, anim ereb ereb ganan tekelei guf irouwauf.
Kristus nẽ wau inosiya ãgenei wauĩ bun utorõg len, ulum irouwauf, ere nigin, ã bouwa tekelei bun wau inosiya bun iweignein. Agog fen, Negur de wiyẽgouf.
Utorõg len, Kristus nẽ od fatuk bagai ã namein ibodõ di, ã kisi biya ganan bunem abob ufelnẽdig fen, abob weder urougauf, agog fen, od Negur nẽ Itotoya Sam bun ibodok, Negur yana yaleseya seg ado, uur nẽ seg, ãgenei wauĩ bun Negur de fiyẽya ado walogouf.
Agog fen, ereb ã ago gef, od bun be kabĩ yaleya bun, anĩ ganan Odug Jesus yana bun agog fen, ĩ bunem Dei Negur de wiyẽgouf.
Kayau, ãgenei tamo farumen ubodõgouf, are Odug nẽ lo fiya bun biya bagai.
Tamo, ãgenei aiweĩ tar nigin wauĩ laaf fen, idi waud morõ to wenẽdigouf.
Kesu, ã ereb ereb ganan bun sineĩ temeĩ tar sigoreid dõ gouf, anim Odug wau al fouf.
Tama, ã gereneĩ tar to waud saneya wenẽdigouf, ago gouf, idi agogon de fen, waud to al fouf.
Ferfer, ã ereb ereb ganan bun, ãgenei marau tenebur enei nẽ sigoreid dõ gouf, idi meledin dogol idi biya difamãf ya bunem meleid yaleya nigin dogol to ago gouf, anĩ ere, ã wauĩ momoi nẽ ado Odug nigin anini ge fen, ago gouf.
Ereb ago gef ganan, wauĩ adok iro ken, ago gouf, tamo nigin sã, Odug nigin kabĩ alef ge fen, kabĩ walogouf,
ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã Odug bun tamal in akor mala solo walogouf. Are Odug Kristus anĩ ã aruna walekenẽgef.
Aib taka ĩ sane age fouf, yogon sane age fiya nigin mala solo sane yalouf, ere nigin, an anĩ kinau ya sã.
Marau ã, ãgenei ferfer ereb madur ado biya anĩ wenẽdigouf, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ãg saa ilun ãgenei Marau ibodok.
Kosẽya anĩ totol uroug, lo weleg fen, Negur de wiyẽgouf.
Agog fen, amã nigineg kosẽ gouf, are Negur amã od wogõ mauf nigin bobog kã fel kanamã di, amã Kristus nẽ waa kurõ mafalaisiyouf nigin kosẽ gouf, anĩ nigin aya kalabus bun abodok.
Negur aya biya od wogõ auf nigin ifanan anĩ, sã yaor kurõ afalaisiyouf nigin kosẽ gouf.
Ereb tamo kayau serẽ temeleid bun ago gou fenẽ, kisi biya ado ago gouf. Sain biya ã nigin wõ youf ganan to sekil gouf.
Ãgenei wogõya sain bun ganan wau ifenẽya barikãf, od karĩya biya dogol wogõ gouf, anĩ bunem, ã, tamo kayau ganan naig be fe solof irokenẽdiya nigin keleĩ youf.
Tikikusem aya nigin od ganan wogõ yeĩf. Ĩ neu turau oboiyou, kabĩ tamo dõ fiya biya fen, Odug bun kabĩ turau.
Aya, ĩ, ã bun enei nigin bagai sur afiyek, are ã, amã naig ma mafaref anĩ keleĩ di, anĩ bunem ĩ ãgenei wauĩ yalesauf nigin, age afef.
Ĩ Onesimus ado disiyouf, Onesimus ĩ neda turada dõ fiya biya oboida, ĩ ãgenei taka. Idi ereb ereb ganan ein agef wõ yef anĩ dirokeneĩf.
Neu kalabus turau Aristakus, ã bun yogon aanya sur fef, Mak, Banabas ne tam, ĩg agef aanya sur fef. (Ã ĩ nigin faded fiya walegen. Ĩ ã garan isiyouf are, ã ĩ walogouf.)
Jesus ĩ yana taka Jastus dedig, ĩg aanya sur fef. Negur nẽ tano nigin neu kabĩ tamo turau tar atun, idi dogol anĩ Juda temeleid. Age de fen, idi momoi bagai de fen, neu wau dalesen.
Epafras ĩ ãgenei taka, Kristus Jesus nẽ kabĩ tamo, ã bun aanya sur fef. Ĩ faimud kosẽya bun ã nigin totol inodig, are ã Negur nẽ oroya ganan bun, kisi feleya bagai ado momoiya odug bun totol ufaragauf nigin age fef.
Aya, ĩ, ã nigin, idi Laodisia taun difaref anidi nigin ado, idi Hierapolis taun difaref anidi nigin kabĩ totol yaledig anĩ, sã ĩ nigin kurõ afesif.
Nemã oboimã dokta Luk ado Demas aanya sur difef.
Tureĩ tar Laodisia taun dibodok anidi bun ado, Nimfa ado sios yogon fõ bun guru difef anidi bun, neu aanya wenẽdigouf.
Pas enei uweseg le di, Laodisia sios buneg diwesauf, abag, Laodisia tamal paseg uwesagauf.
Akipus urokenẽg, “Õ Odug bun kabĩ walen anĩ, el wo udikalauf nigin karĩ walauf.”
Aya, Polem aanya enei imaum bagai atotof. Aya kalabus bun abodok anĩ karĩ walagauf. Wau ifenẽya ã ado ibodõf.
Pol, Sailas, Timoti, amã, Tesalonika sios Tamada Negur, Odug Jesus Kristus ado bun ufaregef ã bun, pas enei matotof: Wau ifenẽya wau inosiya ado ã bun ibodõf.
Amã faimud ã ganan nigin Negur de mafiye ken, nemã kosẽ bun ã nigin marokenẽdig.
Amã neda Negur Tamada mala bun, momoiya bunem ãgenei kabĩ faat yuk, wauĩ laa fiya bunem ãgenei kabĩ yaleya ado, neda Odug Jesus Kristus bun wauĩ ise fen, ã to fese gen anĩ toku karĩ mauledig.
Turamã tar, Negur ã nigin wau laa fedig anĩ, amã keleĩ, are Negur ĩ ã igirnein,
ere nigin, nemã biya od ã bun isin, are od dogol bunem sã, anĩ ere, megeir ado, Awa Uur Fateul ado, momoiya bagai ado, ã bun isin. Ã atun, ã nigin naig be ma mabodon anĩ ã keleĩ.
Ã, amã Odug Jesus geid madẽ wamãgen. Ã darau odug adon, anĩ ere, Awa Uur Fateulem kulĩya ifenein anĩ bun, ã od anĩ walegen.
Anĩ nigin, ã Masedonia Akaia provins ado bun, momoiya tamo kayau ganan neid dodo gen wowã gen.
Odug nẽ od ã bunem ilen, Masedonia Akaia provins ado bun dogol sã, ãgenei Negur nigin momoiya anĩ fõ fõ ganan iyokelen. Anĩ nigin amã baban ã ereb to mayeĩf.
Idi dogo, ã amã naig ge walemãgen anĩ kurõ difalaisi kanamak. Age de fen, ã naig ge idegẽya waitou utorõg fen, Negur bun falei ge, mata ibodõya nẽ ado momoi nẽ Negur aruna waleg fen,
ĩ Naal ĩ laa bunem turĩ fiyen, are Jesus ĩ didi dumen isiyouf bun tamal kel yaledadig anĩ, saa ilun tamal tari gen anĩ dirokanamak.
Turamã tar, ã keleĩ, amã nemã ki yeĩya ege to ilen.
Ã keleĩ, amã Filipai taun oun darau ado kono fiya malen, anĩ ere, neda Negur nẽ isennẽya bunem amã totol mano fen, naabura gudũ fiya totol ibod mog, in biya od wogõ mayein.
Amã totol bagai marokeneik are, kũ fenẽya bunem sã, kisi sane bunem sã, idegneĩya bunemeg sã.
Age fiya ban, Negur biya od wogõya nigin igirneĩd fen, yo fiyẽdin anidim gen, amã wogõ maudig. Amã tamo waud al fouf nigin to kabĩ malef, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ wauda es fedig, ĩ wau al fouf nigin kabĩ malef.
Ã keleĩ, amã meleĩ yaleya nigin to bagai wogõ mau fen, naumamã nigin to nawamã dede mafedig. Are amã momoi morok anĩ Negur ĩ keleĩ.
Amã tamom yanamã seli kulõ difouf nigin to mamiren, ã bunem sã, taka bunemeg sã. Amã Kristus nẽ aposel mau fen, amã sã morõ mafeneĩ yoũ nẽ,
anĩ ere, ã atun, amã molol nem kesu sina gere tar kulatun fedidig gen, age mafen.
Amã ã nigin waumã fatuk laaf fen, amã Negur nẽ biya od ifeneĩya nigin dogol sã, nemã mata ã nigin iraileya nigineg waumã iron, ere nigin, ã amã bun oboimã bagai wowã gen.
Turamã tar, momoi, amã kabĩ totol morõ ado malen anĩ ã karĩ welegef. Amã morõ ã taka to mafeneĩf nigin, bõ ado gaa ado kabĩ male fen, Negur nẽ biya od ã bun wogõ maun.
Ã, momoiya tamo atun, amã naig be mafen, fateul, madur bagai, od sã mafaren, are ã keleĩ, Negureg keleĩ.
Ã keleĩ, are amã, tama ĩ gere tar nigin suma inodig gen, ã mugu mugu bun suma manon,
amã wauĩ malesedig, wowor mayeĩdig, Negur ĩ yogon tano ado fula fiya medeĩya bun ulagauf nigin iweigneik, ĩ orof kilei ã ubodõgouf nigin, wedereĩ maroudig.
Age ma fen, amãg toku Negur de mafiyẽdig, ere nigin, sain ã Negur nẽ od amã bunem karĩg fen, walegen, are tamo nẽ od gen to walegen, Negur nẽ od bagai walegen, Negur nẽ od anĩ, momoi gef ã bun kabĩ yalef.
Turamã tar, ã oun Judia distrik Negur nẽ sios madẽ wiyẽdigen. Sios Judia distrik oun Kristus Jesus bun difaref, Juda tamo bun darau dalen gen bagai, ãg fõ tureĩ tar bun darau walegen.
Juda tamo idi, Odug Jesus profet geid didenkeis fen, amãg dirumã dirailen. Idi Negur wau al fiya to difenen, idi tamo ganan kiwai difenẽdif.
Idi neid tobonuneid bun, amã haiden wogõ mafiyẽdi di, isennẽya dalouf nigin naaburamã gudũ difedig. Naab anĩ bunem, faimud idi neid mosor tete tete dife di, mudu isedig. Age fiya nigin, Negur nẽ didi kisi feleya bagai, idi bun mogo isin.
Anĩ ere, turamã tar, sain modeg bun, ã geid tabodon anĩ fara mafen (are bouwamam, kisim sã), amã ã ileyeĩya nigin fatuk bagai waumã iro ken, naab ganan bun kabĩ totol malen.
Amã ã gein masiyouf nigin waumã yenen. Momoi, aya, Pol, baba baban lakĩ afen. Anĩ ere, Satan naaburamã katĩ felen.
Neda Odug Jesus isiyouf bun, ere anĩ ĩ mala bun, nemã wau iseya, kulĩya, yana yaleseya nẽ teter youf? Are ã anĩ sã de?
Momoi, ã nemã fula fiya medeĩya ado, nemã kulĩya.
Anĩ nigin, amã foiya kisi feleya sã nigin, amã kisi ma fen, amã mugu ein Atens mabodõf are deuf maun.
Amã, ã ãgenei momoiya bun megeir yei ken, wauĩ yalesauf nigin, Timoti, ĩ nemã turamã ado Kristus nẽ biya od nigin Negur nẽ kabĩ tura, sur mafiyen.
Are takam morõ eneidi bun to kisi rori youf nigin age mafen. Ã gai keleĩ bagai, are ada morõ eneidi nigin igirnadan.
Momoi, amã ã geid tabodon bun, amã, ada fau darau difanadauf nigin toku marokenein. Age fiya bagai, agef wõ yen, are ã keleĩ.
Anĩ nigin, aya foiya kisi feleya sã kisi afe fen, aya ãgenei momoiya ileya nigin sur afen. Aya, naab taka taka bun kisi fiya tamo kisi yeĩ di, nemã kabĩ totol ege ileya nigin kumĩ aun.
Anĩ ere, Timoti gama bagai, ã bun tamal amã gein isi fen, ãgenei momoiya ado wauĩ laa fiya nigin od biya irou isin. Ĩ irokanaman, are ã, amã nigin faimud biya karĩ welegedig ado, amã ã ileyeĩya nigin waumã irõdig gen, ãg ilemãya nigin wauĩ irõdig yen.
Anĩ nigin, turamã tar, amã nemã waumã morõ ado, darau ganan bun, ãgenei momoiya bunem, amã ã nigin waumã yalesen.
Gama amã waumã kulĩya ado mata mabodok, ere nigin, ã Odug bun megeir ufaregef.
Neda Negur mala bun, amã ã nigin waumã kulĩya ifanaman enei ganan nigin, naig ma abag kisi mafel, ã nigin Negur de mafiyẽf?
Amã masi mailiyei ken, ereb ã fau ãgenei momoiya bun lau gef anĩ isenneĩya nigin, bõ ado gaa ado Negur totol bagai kosẽ mafiyẽdig.
Gama, neda Negur Tamada ĩ yogo, neda Odug Jesus ado, nemã naab ã gein isiya nigin dũf nigin oromak.
Odug ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya gire fese di, amã ã nigin waumã laa fedig age fiya gen, abob nigin ado ganan nigin wauĩ laa fiya gogũ fouf nigin oromak.
Negur ĩ, ãgenei wauĩ megeir fe di, neda Odug Jesus, in fateul tamo kayau ganan geid disiyouf sain bun, neda Negur Tamada mala bun, ã bouweĩ od sã fateul wõ gouf nigin oromak.
Od idĩya nigin, turamã tar, amã, ã Negur wau al fiya wenẽgouf nigin naig ge ufaragauf nigin mafelnein, are gama agog ufaregef. Gama amã ã enei baba baban ago gouf nigin to mayei ken, Odug Jesus bun totol bagai marokeneik.
Odug Jesus nẽ totol bunem, amã ã faded fiya mafenein, are ã keleĩ.
Negur nẽ oroya are ã fateul wowã gouf anĩ, are ã noli tobonunã sese wiyẽgouf.
Ã mugu mugu bouweĩ kulatun ge di, fateul fen, yeneĩ biyauf nigin keleĩ youf.
Haiden Negur keleĩ sam, noli nigin mudureid ditenẽdig gen to ago gouf.
Enei bun, takam ne tura sane to age fiyẽf, idegẽya bunem morõ to ifenẽf. Amã mogo marokenei ken, wedereĩ maroun, are Odug fau mosor age fediya ganan nigin tamo mala solo ifenẽdiyouf.
Negur ada amuyẽ adouf nigin to iweignadan, anĩ ere, fateul ibodõya nigin iweignadan.
Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ od enei idodõf, ĩ tamo to idodnek, are Negur in Awa Uur Fateul ifeneĩdig anĩ idodnek.
Gama tureĩ tar nigin wauĩ laa fiya anĩ nigin amã to matotkeneĩf, ere nigin, ã aug abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf nigin Negurem ifelnein.
Momoi, ã tureĩ tar ganan Masedonia provins ganan bun difaref anidi nigin wauĩ laa fedig. Anĩ ere, turamã tar, ã baba baban ago gouf nigin totol bagai marokeneik.
Amã marokenein gen, ã molol ibodõya nigin kisi totol walogouf, ãgenei kabĩ nigin kisig fen, aug imeim kabĩ walogouf.
Anĩ bunem, ãgenei ibodõya bun tamo serẽ temeleid dileyei ken, anini douf, taka bun to utobõgouf.
Turamã tar, amã ã gare den onudi nigin to keleĩ youf anĩ to oromak, takag, tamo tunĩ ganan, wau iseya sã gen wauĩ gudũ fouf anĩ to oromak.
Jesus laaf fen, kel fã yen nigin ada momoi tauf, anĩ nigin, Negur, idi Jesus bun gare den anidi, Jesus geid guri feid isiyouf nigin momoi tauf.
Odug nẽ od bunem, amã ã marokeneik, are ada fau mata tabodok, Odug isiyouf bun tafaref ada, idi gare den anidi to bagai wal tafediyouf.
Odug yogo bagai saa ilunem isiyouf, ait odugem irõ di, engel uyu irouya nẽ ait ado, Negur nẽ taur bunem iweig di, Kristus bun gare den anidi ketem fafã douf.
Anĩ bure fele di, ada fau mata tabod ken, tafaref anĩ geif, idi geid bagu fada fen, lalo bun kutũ fada se, Odug fotou fiya nigin saa ilun irou iselnadauf. An ada Odug geid mata gai gai tabodkalauf.
Anĩ nigin, od enei bunem abob wau talesauf.
Gama, turamã tar, amã sain ado naa nigin to matotkeneĩf.
Ere nigin, ã keleĩ bagai, Odug nẽ naa, bẽ tamo bõ isiyouf gen wõ youf.
Tamo kayau wau inosiya ado morõ sã tabodok de mog, daũ fiya nunũ idi bun, kayau kesu gõ fiya nigin firi yedig gen isi di, idi to diyalalauf.
Anĩ ere, turamã tar, ã gugum bun to ufaregef, anĩ nigin, naa anĩ bẽ tamo gen to isi fen, ba yeĩf.
Ã ganan lalan ado we bun temeleĩ. Ada bõ ado gugum nẽ sã.
Anĩ nigin, ada, idi tunĩ denek gen to tafarauf, anĩ ere, ada lo tafel fen, karĩ adouf.
Are idi mulaĩ temeleid, bõ anĩ denẽdig, idi aai meleid waĩ yedig, bõ anĩ aai meleid waĩ yedig.
Anĩ ere, ada we nẽ nigin, ada dug nigin karĩ ado fen, momoiya wau laa fiya ado siot kapa gen tafoun ken, kel gei fiya nẽ wau iseya anim hat kapa gen kurũ tafouf.
Negur ada didi yaleya nigin to igirnadan, anĩ ere, ada neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem kel gei fadauf nigin igirnadan.
Ĩ ada nigin laa fen, are ada mata be tabodok, gare be tauf are, ĩ geid tabodõf nigin age fen.
Anĩ nigin, abob wau tales fen, abob walesagauf, gama ago gef gen.
Turamã tar, gama amã marokeneik, idi ã atun kabĩ totol dalef, idi Odug bun ãgenei uyu irouya difar fen, wedereĩ dirouf anidi karĩ wiyẽdigouf.
Idi kabĩ dirouf nigin ge fen, idi nigin wauĩ laaf fen, fatuk bagai karĩ wiyẽdigouf. Abob nigin wau inosiya bun ufaragauf.
Turamã tar, amã totol bagai marokeneik, fõ temeleid wedereid uroug, anini temeleid waud waleseg fen, forõ temeleid usennẽdigouf, ganan nigin nameĩ ukeleg ubodõgouf.
Taka nem taka nẽ mosor to solo fouf, anĩ ere, abob nigin ado ganan nigin, faimud tobonunã biya ago gouf.
Wauĩ bun faimud kulĩ youf,
toku kosẽ gouf,
ereb ereb ganan bun de wiyẽgouf, ere nigin, are ã nigin Kristus Jesus bun Negur nẽ oroya.
Awa Uur nẽ yã to uroroukeleg,
profet neid od to welebi ge.
Ereb ereb ganan es gouf. Biya anĩ uroug, kafĩ walagauf.
Ereb sesen fire fire ganan sese gouf.
Negur ĩ yogo, wau inosiya nẽ Negur, fateul kisi feleya bagai inoyeĩf. Ãgenei uur, meleĩkanon ado, bouweĩ anĩ ganan, neda Odug Jesus Kristus isiyouf bun od sãf.
Ĩ iweigneik ĩ yogon od dõ fiya biya, ĩ de age fouf.
Turamã tar, amã nigin kosẽg.
Tureĩ tar ganan, umã fiya fateul bunem aan wedig.
Aya, tureĩ tar ganan bun pas enei uwesagauf nigin, Odug mala bun totol bagai arokeneik.
Neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ã ado ibodõf.
Pol, Sailas, Timoti weim, Tesalonika sios, Tamada Negur, Odug Jesus Kristus ado bun ufaregef ã bun, pas enei matotof:
Wau ifenẽya wau inosiya ado, Tamada Negur, Odug Jesus Kristus ado bunem, ã bun ibodõf.
Turamã tar, amã ã nigin faimud Negur de mafiyẽf bagai, are de age mafiyẽf, ere nigin, ãgenei momoiya fau fau odugef iselef, agog fen, ã ganan abob nigin wauĩ laa fiya anĩ odugef.
Anĩ nigin, amã Negur nẽ sios atun, ã momoi ge fen, ã kafĩ fiya darau ganan ado walegef bun to fese gef nigin selĩ kulõ mafedig.
Enei ganan anim, Negur nẽ es fiya are tutuk anĩ yaoref. Anĩ bunem, ã Negur nẽ tano nigin kisi falauf, ã anĩ nigin kafĩ fiya walegef.
Negur ĩ madur bagai. Ĩ morõ difeneik anidi morõ ifenẽdiyouf,
ã morõ walegef, ĩ karika ifeneĩf, amãg ifanamãf. Anĩ Odug Jesus, in engel megeir adodo geid, yã bale fitotoleya bun saa ilunem isiyouf bun wõ youf.
Idi Negur keleĩ sã ado, neda Odug Jesus nẽ biya od to dõ difedig anidi, darau ifenẽdiyouf.
Idi daũ fiya faimud ibodkeleya nẽ kafĩ fiya dale fen, Odug mala bun tamal ado, yogon megeir nẽ fula fiya medeĩya bun tamal, irudiyouf.
Naa anĩ bun, ĩ isi, yogon fateul tamo kayau bun tamal, fula fiya medeĩya yale di, ĩ nigin momoi den anidi ganan, ĩ nigin meleid yũ yalouf. Are ã gediyouf, ere nigin, ã nemã od nigin momoi gen.
Anĩ nigin amã ã nigin toku kosẽ maudig, are neda Negur iweigneik anĩ kilei, ã kisi feleya inoyeĩf nigin, takag, Negur in megeir bunem, ereb ereb biya ganan ã ago gouf nigin kisi gef anĩ ado, ãgenei momoiya nẽ kabĩ ganan kisi falauf nigin.
Amã age ma kosẽ maudig, are neda Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus neid wau ifenẽya bunem, neda Odug Jesus yana ã atun fula fiya medeĩya yale di, ãg ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya walogouf nigin age mafedig.
Turamã tar, Neda Odug Jesus Kristus isiyouf nigin ado, ĩ wagen guru tagauf nigin, amã ã marokeneik,
Odug nẽ naa mogo isin yeya anĩ, profet od, wogõya be, pas amã bunem isin ya anĩ karĩg fen, to kaisã terẽg fen, wauĩ kui youf.
Naab taka taka bun, taka nem to idegneĩf nigin lo weleg, ere nigin, fau kiwai ketem wõ ye fen, lo wal fiya tamo, are daũ fiya bun ileya nẽ anĩ wõ ye bure fele di, naa are isiyouf.
Ĩ kiwai ino fen, ereb ereb ganan waitou de fen, seli dabidig anĩ ĩ farumen ineneĩd fen, ĩ yogo Negur nẽ tempel bun ibod ken, ĩ yogo nigin Negur ye kurõ fesiyouf.
Aya ã geid tabod ken, enei nigin arokeneĩdig anĩ, ã to karĩ welegef de?
Gama erebem irounek are ã keleĩ, age fe di, fau yogon sain bun bagai, ĩ wõ youf.
Lo wal fiya nẽ waa megeir mogo kabĩ yalef, anĩ ere, ĩ gama irounek anim irouf ile iwaikalauf.
Age fe di, lo wal fiya tamo yaorouf, ĩ Odug Jesus in awa yau neseyam yukeis fen, Odug isiya nẽ medeĩya anim ĩ daũ falauf.
Lo wal fiya tamo nẽ isiya, de Satan nẽ kabĩ ado susu fel, idegẽya memelik, uris ado, ereb urug bagai fire fire ganan inodiyouf.
Agef fen, sesen ganan bunem idi inanakelef anidi idegnẽdiyouf. Idi inanakelef, ere nigin, idi momoi nigin waud laaf fen, kel gei fediyouf anĩ ditoron.
Age fiya nigin, Negur idegẽya totol sur fe di, idi anĩ nigin momoi douf.
Are idi momoi nẽ nigin to momoi de fen, sesen nigin waud al fen anidi ganan, Negurem es fediyouf nigin age fef.
Anĩ ere, amã faimud, ã, turamã tar Odug nẽ oboi nigin, Negur de mafiyẽf bagai, ere nigin, gariya bun, Negur, Awa Uur ã fateul ineneĩya nigin kabĩ yalef bunem ado, ã momoi nẽ nigin momoi gef bunem, kel gei yeĩf nigin igirnein.
Ĩ nemã biya od bunem enei bun iweignein, are ã neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ fula fiya medeĩya anĩ walogouf nigin age fen.
Anĩ nigin, turamã tar, megeir ufareg fen, sigoramam wogõya bunem ado pas bunem, mafelnein anĩ uroug kafĩ walagauf.
Neda Odug Jesus Kristus ĩ yogo ado Tamada Negur, ĩ ada nigin wau laa fen ado, yogon wau ifenẽya bunem, faimud ibodkeleya nẽ wau yaleseya ado wau iseya biya ifanadan anĩ,
ã wauĩ yaleseya difenei ken, ereb ereb biya ganan ago gef ado od wogõya bun megeir difeneĩf nigin oromak.
Od idĩya nigin, turamã tar, Odug nẽ od, ã bun age fef gen, kaisã bagai iyokel fen, tamo kayau atun fula fiya medeĩya yalouf nigin, amã nigin kosẽ gouf.
Agog fen, amã tamo idodõya ado sesen bun tamal yalelnamãf nigin kosẽ gouf, ere nigin, tamo gananem momoiya sã.
Anĩ ere, Odug ĩ yogon od dõ fiya biya, ĩ ã megeir ifenei ken, Satan bun tamal kulatun yeĩf.
Amã Odug bun momoi mauf, are amã ã marokeneik anĩ ago gef ulagauf.
Odug ãgenei wauĩ itoneĩ di, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya ado Kristus nẽ feseya sã megeir ifareya bun ilauf nigin oromak.
Odug Jesus Kristus yana bunem, turamã tar, amã ã marokeneik, tureĩ tar fõ temeleid ganan, amã mafelnein kilei to mata dibodõdig anidi so wiyẽdigouf.
Amã age mafen anĩ naig ge dõ gouf nigin, ã aug keleĩ. Amã ã geid tabodon sain bun, amã to fõ faman.
Age ma fen, amã taka nẽ saaf na yaleya sã to mon. Age fiya ban, amã ã atun taka morõ to mafenẽf nigin, bõ ado gaa ado kabĩ totol malen.
Amã ã bun tamal isennẽya yaleya kisi feleya, anĩ ere, to age mafen, ere nigin, ã amã bun ulemãg fen, ãg agog dõ gouf nigin.
Amã ã geid tabodon sain bun, amã nun enei mafenein: “Taka ĩ kabĩ to yalouf are, ĩ saaf to yãf.”
Amã ã atun tunĩ fõ temeleid yeya anĩ karĩ maun. Idi fõ temeleid, anĩ ere, idi dogo nigin kabĩ to dale fen, taka nigin dogol wogoĩ dedig.
Tamo age fediya nigin, Odug Jesus Kristus yana bunem, amã totol bagai moro ken, wedereid marouf, dẽ desil fen, dogo naumeid nigin kabĩ dalouf.
Aug nigin, turamã tar, biya ago gouf nigin to fõ yeĩf.
Taka ĩ pas enei bun marokeneik anĩ to dõ fouf are, dẽ wiyẽ kalagauf. Ĩ mama fouf nigin, weim to nigal ũgouf.
Anĩ ere, ĩ kiwai gen to ulogouf, ĩ tureĩ gen weder urougauf.
Gama wau inosiya nẽ Odug ĩ yogo, sain ganan bun, naab ganan bun, wau inosiya ifeneĩf. Odug ã ganan geid ibodõf.
Aya, Pol, aya imaum aanya enei atotof, are neu pas ganan bun aya yug imauba. Aya eig afe atotodig.
Neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ã ganan bun ibodõf.
Aya, Pol, Negur neda Isennadaya ado Kristus Jesus neda wauda iseya neid nigiya od bunem Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ aun,
Timoti, momoiya bun neu kesu bagai, bun pas enei atotof. Tamada Negur ado neda Odug Kristus Jesus neid wau ifenẽya, wau yũya ado, wau inosiya, õ bun ibodõf.
Aya Masedonia provins alauf sain bun, aya õ totol bagai arokonon, Efesus an ubod ken, tamo tunĩ urokenẽdi di, idegẽya keleĩ anĩ baban to tai difediyouf.
Ago di, idi nenerĩ ege ado ibor idikeleya sã dir difedidig anĩ so difediyouf. Age fediya are momoiya bunem Negur nẽ kabĩ yaleya ban, luwa irouya dogol dalesedig.
Weder irouya od enei nẽ gariya are, wau laa fiya, are ĩ wau karẽtut, es fiya kisi biya ado, momoiya bagai bun tamal isidig.
Tunĩ enei bunem diya dile, od kaũ sã wogõya bun dilelen.
Idi lo tai fiya tamo wõya orodif, anĩ ere, idi ereb wogõ def ado, ereb nigin totol dinof are idi keleĩ sã.
Ada keleĩ, taka ĩ lo dõf el fouf are, lo ĩ biya.
Ada keleĩ, lo ĩ madur tamo nigin to inof, ĩ lo wal fiya, idodõya, Negur dudum fiya, mosor temeleid, idi fateul sã, idi buru naumeĩ nigin kisi difedig, idi sineid temeid tar didenkesif, tamo yukesiya,
noliya, tamo tutur kayau tutur noliya, ferfer inouf nigin tamo bẽ yaleya, idegẽya, momoi nẽ od wa fiya, ereb ganan ifelnẽya biya wal difef anidi nigin lo inof.
Ifelnẽya biya anĩ, biya od fula fiya medeĩya, Negur el fiya barikã aya wogõya nigin ifanan anĩ susu felef.
Aya neda Odug Kristus Jesus megeir ifanan anĩ de afiyek, ere nigin, ĩ aya yogon od dõ fiya biya anĩ ile fen, in kabĩ alouf nigin igirnan.
Aya kulu kono fiya tamo, tadũ fediya tamo, seye tamo, anĩ ere, aya wau yũya ifanan, ere nigin, aya to kelei ken, momoiya sa ken, age afen.
Neda Odug nẽ wau ifenẽya, Kristus Jesus nẽ momoiya wau laa fiya ado, mugi bagai aya bun foula felen.
Od enei momoi bagai, ganan dale fen, momoi douf nigin: Kristus Jesus mosor tamo kel gei fiya nigin tenebur isin. Idi atun aya sane bagai, idi ganan wal fediya.
Anĩ ere, gariya eig fiya nigin, aya wau yũya ifanan, are aya mosor temeleid ganan wal fediya bun, Kristus Jesus in imatẽya mugi bagai aya bun ifelnẽdin, anĩ bunem idi momoi douf anidim dile fen, ĩ nigin momoi de fen, mata ibodkeleya anĩ dalouf nigin ĩ age fen.
Gama King ibodkeleya, ĩ mata ibodkeleya, ileya kisi feleya sã, Negur yogo dogol anĩ bun yana ado fula fiya medeĩya gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
Timoti, neu kesu, aya tai fiya od eig fiya afonok, are õ nigin profet od wogõya yenen anĩ dõ wo di, õ sã biya kusĩ wouf nigin.
Momoiya ado wau karẽtut biya urou kafĩ wol. Tunĩ anĩ ditoraran nigin dogo neid momoiya tadũ difelen.
Age difen atun are Himeneus Aleksanda ado, idi Negur to kono difiyẽf anĩ keleĩ youf nigin, Satan ima bun anenẽdin.
Aya õ totol bagai orokonok, uruwa bagai, are nonĩ fiya, kosẽya, taka nigin Negur irokenẽya, de fiyẽya anĩ, tamo ganan nigin agouf.
King ado kabĩ nẽ mudur ganan nigin agouf, are ada wauda inosiya ado foro tausil, Negur orof ganan ado fateul bun tabodõf nigin agouf.
Agouf are biya, Negur neda Isennadaya wau al fef,
Negur ĩ tamo adok ganan kel gei fouf nigin ado, momoi nẽ keleĩ bun disiyouf nigin orof.
Are, Negur ĩ tekelei, agef fen, atun tamo tekelei, Negur ado tamo atun ifaref, tamo are Kristus Jesus,
tamo ganan fotokar ĩ yogo bouwa itoron, anĩ yogon sain bun bagai Negurem tenebur tamo kayau keleĩ youf nigin yaoren.
Age fiya nigin, aya arũ tamo, aposel igirnan, aya momoi bagai orok, aya idegẽya sã, aya, haiden atun, momoiya bagai nẽ ifelnẽdiya tamo igirnan.
Tamo fõ fõ ganan imeid fateul ilun dales fen, kosẽ douf anĩ aya orouf, seye sã, monẽ sã.
Takag, aya kayau kolos biya, taka mama ifenẽya nẽ ani sã, tamo kayau nẽ lo fiya biya bun ifonũya anĩ orouf, fatiya kori fiya sã, gol sã, maaĩ tuwa meli bagai pel nẽ kilelei sã, meein odug nẽ kolos sã anĩ orouf.
Anĩ ere, aya idi tobonunã biya dõ difouf anĩ orouf, are kayau Negur yana dalesef ya anĩ susu falauf.
Kayau ĩ foro yel dẽ yesil fen, dõ fouf anĩ bunem keleĩ yalouf.
Aya kayaum tamo ifelnẽya be, wal fiye ken, uyu iroukenẽya nigin to yo auf, ĩ foro yalauf bagai.
Ere nigin, Adam ketem inon, agef fen, Eva inon.
Agef fen, Adam anĩ to idegnen, kayau anĩ idegnẽ di, mosor bun kubũ yen.
Anĩ ere, kayau idi toku tobonunã biya bun momoi douf, waud laa fouf, fateul dibodõf are, idi kesu gõ fiya bun isennẽya dalouf.
Od enei are momoi bagai: Taka ĩ uyu irouya wõ youf nigin wau irõf, ĩ kabĩ biya yaleya nigin orof.
Uyu irouya, yana sane sã, ĩ kayau aiwauf, anĩ ere, ĩ kayau tekelei youf, ĩ molol tamo, yogo nigin el fe kulatun fouf, ĩ karĩ difiyẽf, tamo dor yalouf, tai fiya kisi feleya,
aai to yõdig, to kusĩ youf, imatẽya, monẽya sã, moni nigin wau laa fiya sã.
Ĩ kayau kesu el fe, lo fediyouf bagai. Age fe di, in kesu el de dõ de fen, karĩ difiyẽf.
(Taka ĩ yogon kayau kesu lo feid fen, tutuk fediya kisi feleya sãf are, naig fe fen, ĩ Negur nẽ sios lo fouf?)
Ĩ gama bagai momoiya tamo wõ ye fen, to uyu irouya ifarauf bagai, age fouf are, ĩ bilãya bunem fasikor fele di, Negur Satan es fiyen gen, ĩg es fiyẽf be.
Ĩ serẽ temeleid buneg yana biya adouf bagai, anĩ bunem, ĩ yana sane to yale fen, Satan nẽ kor bun to ilauf.
Uyu iroudiya farumen kabĩ tamo anidi, areg age fiya, tamo idi karĩ difiyẽdidig, idi baleid to kara urudig, aai fatuk to dõdig, idegẽya bunem safina to daledig.
Idi momoiya nẽ keleĩ mugi, kisi karẽtut atata feleya ado dirouwauf bagai.
Uruwa idi kisi difediyouf, age de fen, idi bun od taka sãf are, utornẽdig len, uyu irouya farumen kabĩ tamo wõ de fen, tamo kayau disennẽdiyouf.
Naab tekelei anĩ bunem, nedi aiweid tar idig karĩ difiyẽdiyouf, idi dumen od to wogõ douf, anĩ ere, idi molol fen, ereb ereb ganan kulatun fiya kisi falauf.
Uyu irouya farumen kabĩ tamo ĩ kayau aiwauf, anĩ ere, kayau tekelei fen, in kesu tar ado fõ ereb ereb ganan anĩ el fe, kulatun fediyouf bagai.
Idi kabĩ biya dalen, are yeneid biya bagai dalef, age de fen, idi Kristus Jesus bun momoiya nigin kukĩya sã wogõ def.
Aya õ gein kaisã bagai isiya nigin wau yenek, anĩ ere, aya faded enei atotkonok, anĩ bunem,
aya foi auf are, tamo kayau Negur nẽ fõ bun naig de age difouf are õ keleĩ youf, Negur nẽ fõ anĩ mata ibodõya Negur nẽ sios, are momoi nẽ monog tor ado gariya.
Neda momoiya nẽ waa anĩ odug, are taka nem wa fiya kisi feleya sã: Ĩ bouwa ado wõ yen, Awa Uurem ĩ madur bagai anĩ yaoren, age fe di, engelem dilen, age de fen, teneub ganan bun ĩ nigin wogõ de, momoi de di, fula fiya medeĩya bun yalesnen.
Awa Uur yaor bagai irok, dum bun tunĩ fau momoiya ditor ken, idegẽya uur ado ereb ereb kaa sesen idim difelnẽdiyouf anĩ, idi dõ difouf.
Ifelnẽdiya age fediya are, idegẽya tamo neid meleid yaleya bunem isif, idi neid kisi ain uruwam ifalege di, galig leya gen.
Idi tamo kayau yaleya katũ difiyeĩd fen, saaf tunĩ nigineg katũ difiyẽdiyouf, saaf are Negurem tamo momoi de fen, momoi nigin keleĩ anidi Negur de difiye ken, dãf nigin inodin.
Ereb ereb ganan Negur inon are biya, ereb ereb Negur de fiye ken, yaleyauf anĩ, to sese fiyẽyauf,
ere nigin, are Negur nẽ od ado kosẽ bunem fateul ifenek.
Ereb ereb enei turã tar bun ufelnẽdiyouf are, momoiya od ado ifelnẽya biya dõ wodig anim megeir ifonõ di, Kristus Jesus nẽ kabĩ tamo biya wõ wouf.
Negur ditoron anĩ nẽ od ado kayau tubau neid nenerĩ ege anĩ to urou, Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ fiya biya wõ wouf nigin, õ ogo tai wouf.
Bouwa buru nẽ tai fiya are naal isennadaf, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ fiya biya are ereb ereb ganan nigin isennadaf, anim gama mata ibodõya nẽ ado dumen mata ibodõya nẽ promis od irouf.
Od enei momoi bagai, ganan dale fen, momoi douf nigin
(enei nigin, ada kabĩ tale fen, lakĩ tafef), are ada neda wauda iseya mata ibodõya Negur bun tanon, ĩ tamo ganan nẽ isennẽya, idi momoi def anidi neid bagai.
Ereb ereb eneidi urokeneĩd, su agog wiyeĩd fen, ufelneĩd.
Õ kesu oosi de fen, takam to lai yõi, anĩ ere, wogõya bun, ibodõya bun, wau laa fiya bun, momoiya bun, amuyẽ sã karẽtut bun, momoiya tamo neid suma ago fen, idi age de dõ difouf nigin ufelnẽdiyouf.
Atun meleid bun Negur nẽ Itotoya uwesauf, faded wediyouf, ago fen, ufelnẽdif ule mog, aya asiyouf.
Uyu irouya imeid õ teten dino fen, profet od bunem uur nẽ ege luwa walen anĩ to welebi wo.
Õ suma enei ganan dõ fen, waũ adok wenẽdiyouf, anĩ bunem, tamo kayau ganan ogon kabĩ naig fe ilef anĩ dilouf.
Õ ogo nigin ado ogon ifelnẽdiya nigin lo walauf. Anĩ feseya sã toku agouf, anĩ bunem, õ ogo ado idi karĩ diyõf anidi isennẽya walogouf.
Tamo tubau totol bagai to kãkã wiyẽf, anĩ ere, õ tamã gen urokenẽf. Kesu oosi, turã tar gen walediyouf,
kayau biyeid are sinã gen, kayau momoul are main tar gen, kisi karẽ bagai ado walediyouf.
Kayau waab bagai kesu sã anidi el ge lo wedigouf.
Anĩ ere, waab taka ĩ gere tar be, tubu tar adouf are, uruwa idi neid Negur dõ fiya nẽ tobonunã biya tai fiya nigin, idi neid ibor el de kulatun difouf, nedi sineid temeid tar simõ bun lo difedin anĩ kilei abag age de kulatun difediyouf, anim Negur wau al fouf.
Kayau waab bagai taka, ĩ mugu bagai, isennẽya yaleya nigin yogon wau iseya Negur bun ino fen, bõ ado gaa ado toku kosẽ ye fen, Negur bun isennẽya yaleya nigin to fiyẽf.
Anĩ ere, waab taka ĩ bouwa sigigi fiya nigin dogol ibodõf are, ĩ mata ibodok, anĩ ere, ĩ laa fen.
Faded eneig tamo kayau wenẽdiyouf, ago di, taka bouwa bun od to dinouf.
Taka ĩ yogon ibor tar to kulatun fediyouf, yogon sina tama kayau kesu bagai anĩ to kulatun fediyouf are, in wau momoiya wa fef, anĩ bunem, ĩ sane bagai, taka to momoi yef anĩ wal fiya.
Waab taka ĩ aiwa tekelei ado el de dibodok dile 60 yar wal fen ouf are, waab neid daũ bun unenẽf,
agef fen, ĩ yogo tobonunã biya nigin yana ado, ĩ kesu kulat biya, ĩ tamo yaledig, momoiya tamo kayau yeid kulo fedig, morõ adodo isenneĩd fen, ĩ yogo ereb ereb biya ganan age fedig.
Kayau waab fau gaũ idi, waab neid daũ bun to unouf. Ere nigin, idi neid bouwa nẽ oroya anĩ, Kristus nigin momoiya anĩ wal fese di, idi tamo yaleya nigin orodiyouf.
Anĩ bunem, idi es fiya dogo bouweid bun dinof, ere nigin, idi uruwa bun waud kuturol fen iron anĩ narĩ difen.
Takag, idi fõ fiya tobonuneid ado fen, fõ fõ dalef diyõdig. Fõ fiya dogol sã, dumen od wogõya ado, taka nigin wogõ yef iyõya, idim to wogõya nẽ anĩ wogõ dedig.
Anĩ nigin, kayau waab fau gaũ, tamo dalouf, kesu adouf, nedi fõ el de lo difouf, kiwaim idi dumedin irõya nigin naab to dukenẽdiyouf anĩ aya orouf.
Tunĩ mogo ditor ken, Satan dõ difen.
Kayau taka ĩ momoiya ado, in ibor bun waab adodiyouf are, ĩ yogo isennẽdiyouf, idi nigin sios morõ to ifenẽf, anĩ bunem, sios waab idi isennẽdiya nigin bagai yenek anidi isennẽdiyouf.
Uyu irouya sios nẽ kabĩ el de diroulef, yana biya ado mala solo biya bagai dalouf, are idi biya od wogõ def ado difelnẽdif anidi, age difouf bagai.
Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Bulmakau wit faat biya nẽ gabar yalelauf nigin lalai feid mog, yogon awa to ufokol,” takag, “Kabĩ tamo, yogon kabĩ mala yalouf.”
Uyu irouya taka nigin bouwa yũya od to urouwauf, fau uruwom be towom dirõ di, anĩ urouwauf.
Idi mosor dinof are tamo kayau meleid bun ou wiyẽdiyouf, are tunĩ wedereid fokõ youf nigin agouf.
Negur, Kristus Jesus ado, engel igirnẽdin meleid bun, aya õ totol bagai orokonok, faded enei dõ fen, taka dogol waũ to wenẽf, õ anĩ kinau ya anĩ bunem ereb taka to agouf.
Tetedin imã inoya nigin to sibu wo, tunĩ neid mosor bun to kababal wo. Õ karẽ bagai ubodõf.
Naan dogol to wãf, wain naal bagai walouf, ere nigin, ogon name darau nigin ado, ogon dagi baba baban wõ yedig nigin.
Tamo tunĩ neid mosor are yaor, anĩ ketem es fiya bun ifaref, anĩ ere, tunĩ neid mosor dum yaorouf.
Age fiya gen bagai, biya age fiya are yaor, idi biya age fiya gama yaor sã areg, iminẽya kisi feleya sã.
Ferfer idi ganan, nedi moroid tar yana biya dino fen, karĩ difiyẽdiyouf, anĩ bunem, Negur nẽ yana ado ama mafelnẽdif anĩ, to kono difouf.
Tunĩ idi, nedi moroid tar momoiya adouf are, amã tura tura de fen, to karĩ difiyẽdig gen to age difouf. Age fiya ban, idi el de aruneid dalouf, ere nigin, idi neid kabĩ bunem biya dalef are momoiya tamo, idi neid oboiyeid. Enei ganan anĩ ufelneĩd fen, totol bagai urokenẽdiyouf.
Taka ĩ idegẽya keleĩ ifelneĩd fen, Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ faded fiya biya ado fateul ibodõya ifelnẽdiya anĩ nigin wau to irõf are,
ĩ idegẽyam idegnẽ di, bilã yef, ĩ ereb taka to keleĩ. Ĩ monẽya ado od luwa irouya nigin oroya sane ado, anĩ bunem, kiyeĩ, kusĩ, bou yũya od, sisiniya kisi sane irou fen,
tamo kisi sesen ado atun toku koũkã ya ibodõf, tamo kisi sesen ado anidi, momoi anĩ ditor ken, fateul ibodõya are moni odug yaleya nigin de fen, kisi difedig.
Anĩ ere, safina nigin wau morõ sã ado fateul ibodõya anĩ, mala biya ado.
Ere nigin, ada teneub enei bun gemũ tasin nigin, age fiya bagai gemũ ke tauf.
Anĩ ere, ada saaf ado kolos adouf are, ada nigin de tauf.
Tamo kayau safineid ado ibodõya kisi difef anidi, kisi fiya bun, kor bun ado, neneya kisi ado waila dĩ fiya kisi musei bun kuku def, kisi anim tamo daũf sane lauf.
Moni nigin wau laa fiya, are ereb ereb sesen ganan nẽ gariya. Tamo kayau tunĩ moni nigin waud ditenen, momoiya ditor ken, idi dogo waud darau musei dalen.
Anĩ ere, õ, Negur nẽ tamo, enei ganan nigin so rel fen, madur bagai ibodõya, fateul ibodõya, momoiya, wau laa fiya, feseya sã ifareya ado, molol dõ wouf.
Momoiya nigin kusĩ biya walouf. Mata ibodkeleya are, õ musei meleid bun el wo, kurõ wesin sain bun, õ anĩ nigin iweignon anĩ urou kafĩ wol.
Negur ereb ereb ganan mata ifenẽdidig ado, Kristus Jesus ĩ Pontius Pailat mala bun el fe kurõ fesin, idi meleid bun, aya õ orokonok,
od enei dõ, kerema sã dõ wo ule, neda Odug Jesus Kristus wõ youf,
are Negur yogon sain bun irou isiyouf, Negur ĩ el fiya ado ĩ dogol Uyu Irouya, king neid King ado odudug neid Odug,
ĩ dogol ĩ mata ibodkeleya, agef fen, ĩ lalan medeĩya barikã tamom an ileya nigin kisi feleya sã anĩ bun ibodõdig, taka nem to ilen, taka nemeg to ilouf. Ĩ bun yana ado megeir faimud ibodkalauf. Momoi.
Teneub enei bun safina musei adodo urokenẽdig len, yeneid to dales fen, moni nigin waud to diten, moni are gai to ibodkalauf, anĩ ere, idi neid waud Negur bun dinouf, ĩ ada wauda al fouf nigin, ereb ereb ganan kisi feleya ifanadadig.
Idi tobonunã biya age dife di, tobonunã biya inid ado dibodõf nigin, dor yaleya nigin ado, ne tã isennẽya nigin urokenẽdiyouf.
Naab enei bunem, idi safina biya dogo neid dumen nẽ nigin gariya megeir ado dino fen, mudu dino di, iselauf, age de fen, idi mata are mata bagai anĩ dalouf.
Timoti, ereb ereb õ bun inon anĩ kulatun wo. Momoiya sã neid od ado, kiwai kisi are idegẽya bunem keleĩ biya dedig anĩ so wiyẽ,
are tunĩ mogo wogõ den, anĩ age de fen, idi momoiya bun tamal ditor diyalelen. Wau ifenẽya õ bun ibodõf.
Aya, Pol, mata nẽ promis od, are Kristus Jesus bun ibodok anĩ kilei, Negur nẽ oroya bunem Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ aun,
Timoti, neu kesu oboiyou bun pas enei atotof. Tamada Negur ado neda Odug Kristus Jesus neid wau ifenẽya, wau yũya ado, wau inosiya, õ bun ibodõf.
Aya õ nigin, toku bõ ado gaa ado, neu kosẽ bun karĩ aul fen, aya, neu talik tar age difen gen, Negur mala bun kisi karẽ bunem, Negur aruna aledig anĩ, de afiyek.
Ogon maru nigin karĩ aul fen, ileyõya nigin wau fatuk irok, are aya wau fatuk al fouf nigin age afef.
Aya ogon momoiya idegẽya sã anĩ karĩ aulen, momoiya anĩ, uruwa bun ogon tubũ Lois sinã Yunis ado bun ibodon gen, aya momoi auf, are õ buneg agef ibodok.
Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ ege luwa anĩ kebu wo di, futu rouf nigin wederẽ fokõ afef, Negur nẽ ege luwa are imau teten anon anĩ bunem õ bun ibodok anĩ.
Negur ada kumĩ nẽ uur to ifanadan, anĩ ere, megeir nẽ, wau laa fiya nẽ ado, ada dug kulatun fiya nẽ uur ifanadan.
Anĩ nigin, õ neda Odug kurõ fesiya nigin õ to mama yõf, aya ĩ nigin kalabus bun abodok nigineg to mama yõf. Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ megeir bunem, õ aya ado bagu ta fen, biya od nigin darau talouf.
Negur ĩ kel gei fada fen, fateul ibodõya bun iweignadan, are ada ereb taka age tafen anĩ bunem sã, anĩ ere, ĩ yogon wau irõya ado wau ifenẽya bunem ĩ age fen. Wau ifenẽya enei, Kristus Jesus bun tetunem fau sain gariya inoya sã mog, ifanadan.
Anĩ ere, wau ifenẽya anĩ gama neda Isennadaya, Kristus Jesus wõ yen anĩ bunem yaoren, ĩ laa anĩ narĩ felen, agef fen, biya od bunem, mata ado faimud ibodkeleya anĩ yaor fen.
Biya od enei nigin aya soosi tamo, aposel ado ifelnẽya tamo igirnan.
Age fiya nigin, aya darau enei alef, anĩ ere, aya to mama fiyaf, ere nigin, aya aib nigin momoi aun are aya keleĩ, Odug nẽ naa anĩ nigin, ereb aya ĩ kulatun fouf nigin afenen are, ĩ lo fiya kisi feleya are aya keleĩ.
Ereb aya bun tamal karĩ won, ifelnẽya biya anĩ, Kristus Jesus bun momoiya waũ laa fiya ado, el wo dõ fen, urou.
Awa Uur Fateul ada namedan ibodok anĩ nẽ megeir bunem, ereb ereb biya ifonon anĩ kulatun wo.
Õ keleĩ, Asia provins bun ganan ditornan, idi atun Figelus Hermogenes adog.
Odug, Onesiforus nẽ ibor bun wau yũya ifelnẽdiyouf nigin aya orouf, ere nigin, ĩ sain musei wau filolõ fiya bunem el fiyadig, aya kokolin difiyan nigin to mama fen.
Ĩ Rom taun ibodon sain, aya nigin fatuk bagai imirnaf ile, dum fotou fiyan.
Odug nẽ wau yũya, Odug nẽ naa anĩ bun, Odug ĩ ifenẽf nigin aya orouf! Õ keleĩ bagai, ĩ naig fe naab musei bun Efesus taun oun isennan.
Anĩ nigin, õ, neu kesu, Kristus Jesus nẽ wau ifenẽya bun megeir uno.
Musei meleid bun aya wogõ au di, karĩ won anĩ, karĩya biya tamo anidi ufelnẽdiyouf, ago di, idi bagam tunĩ ifelnẽdiya kisi feleyauf.
Kristus Jesus nẽ kusĩ tamo biya gen, õ amã geid darau karĩ taul fen, tafarauf.
Kusĩ tamo ĩ tamo ege neid tobonuneid to kababal fef, ĩ yogon mudur ado anĩ wau al fouf nigin orof.
Age fiya gen, gudu reya tamo ĩ gudu ref, ĩ gudu reya nẽ suma to dõ fouf are, ĩ uyu irouya nẽ teter to yalouf.
Kabĩ tamo kabĩ totol yaledig ĩ, ketem kaũ yalouf.
Aya orok anĩ kisi wo, Odug enei ganan nigin kisi fokõ fonõf.
Jesus Kristus laa bunem kel fã yen ĩ, Dawid nẽ ibor bun tamal anĩ karĩ walauf. Enei are neu biya od,
enei nigin aya darau ale fen, mosor tamo gen kokolin difiyan. Ani ere, Negur nẽ od kokolin fiya sã.
Anĩ nigin, aya igirnẽdin anidi nigin, ereb ereb ganan bun feseya sã afaredig, are idig isennẽya Kristus Jesus bun ibodok anĩ, fula fiya medeĩya ibodkeleya ado dalouf nigin age afedig.
Od enei momoi bagai: Ada ĩ weim gare taun ouf are, adag ĩ weim mata tabodõf.
Ada feseya sã tafarauf are, adag ĩ weim lo fiya nẽ mudur tabodõf. Ada ĩ nigin wa tafouf are, ĩg ada nigin wa fouf.
Ada to dõ tafoufeg, ĩ de agef dõ fouf, ere nigin, ĩ yogo nigin wa fiya kisi feleya sã.
Idi ereb ereb enei nigin toku wedereid fokõ wouf. Negur mala bun, od luwa irouya nigin wedereid urou, are kaũ sã, are karĩ def anidi tadũ difedidig dogol.
Õ Negur mala bun, kabĩ tamo ile fen, de youf, are kabĩ tamo ĩ yogon kabĩ nigin to mama fouf, ĩ momoi od tutuk ifelnẽdiya nẽ kabĩ el fe irouwauf anĩ, wõ wouf nigin, kabĩ totol bagai walouf.
Negur sã ado kaũ sã nẽ od so wiyẽf, ere nigin, idi anĩ bun dilelef are, fau gai momoiya sã bagai wowã douf.
Idi neid ifelnẽya kaisã bagai gedi gen iyokalauf, idi atun are Himeneus Filetus ado,
idi momoi nẽ anĩ so difiyẽ diyalelen. Idi dirõdig, mata kel fãya are mogo wõ yen, age de fen, tunĩ neid momoiya daũ difef.
Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ gariya totol ifaref, itotoya enei bun megeir fef, “Aib idi yogon are Odug ĩ keleĩ,” ado, “Ganan idi Odug yana kurõ difesif, sesen bun tamal falei douf bagai.”
Fõ odug taka bun, safina ereb ereb gariya fire fire nem dinon are dibodok, tunĩ gol ado silwa nem, tunĩ aa nem ado mafer nem dinon, tunĩ kabĩ odug ifenẽya nẽ ado tunĩ kabĩ nanaal ifenẽya nẽ.
Tamo taka ĩ, sesen enei bun tamal amuyẽ anĩ kulo felef are, ĩ fau kabĩ biya ifenẽya nẽ wõ youf, ĩ fateulouf, Marau mala bun, kabĩ biya yaleya kisi feleya wõ ye fen, kabĩ biya ganan ifenẽya nẽ wõ youf nigin saika fouf.
Oosi nẽ bouwa oroya sane so wiyẽ, ago fen, madur bagai ibodõya, momoiya, wau laa fiya ado, wau inosiya anĩ, aib idi waud karẽtut bun Odug diweignek anidi geid, dõg.
Neneya ado wadã keleĩ nẽ luwa irouya anĩ to fedẽ wo, ere nigin, õ keleĩ, are anĩ bunem kiwai wõ yedig.
Odug nẽ ferfer to kusĩ youf bagai, age fiya ban, ĩ tamo kayau ganan nigin imatẽya ifelnẽdiyouf, ifelnẽdiya kisi feleyauf, to seye youf bagai.
Idi ĩ kiwai difenek anidi molol nem wedereid urouwauf, ago di, Negur idi waud falei fe di, idi momoi nigin keleĩ youf nigin wau iseya adouf.
Anĩ bunem, idi wedereid fokõ ye fen, Satan nẽ kor bun tamal, in oroya dõ difouf nigin Satan gei fedin anidi ditor diyawauf.
Anĩ ere, enei keleĩ youf. Idikeleya naa bun, morõ odug wõ youf.
Tamo kayau dogo nigin waud laa fouf, moni nigin waud laa fouf, yeneid dalesauf, aya aya yeya, Negur kono difouf, sineid temeid sigoreid wal difouf, disennẽdi di to de difiyẽdiyouf, fateul to dibodõf,
wau laa fiya sã, kiwai nigin weder tu keleya sã, taka dumen wogõya, yogo nigin kulatun fiya biya sã, nirãya, tobonunã biya nigin kiwai inoya,
ne tã kiwai ifenẽya, sibuya, kisim aya aya yeya, Negur nigin wau laa fiya ban bouwa nẽ oroya nigin wau laa fiya,
bouwedim dogol Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ dife fen, in megeir wa difouf. Idi age fediya so weid.
Age fediya anidim naab dimirek dile, fõ bun dile fen, kayau maleg didegneĩd, dogo neid kisi ulum diroukenẽdidig, kayau mosor beberikã anidi, oroya sane fire fire bun waud dalesedig,
kayau idi gai toku keleĩ daledig, anĩ ere, momoi anĩ to bagai keleĩdig.
Janes Jambres ado Moses kiwai difenen gen, tamo enidig momoi anĩ kiwai difenek, tamo anidi kisi gelele fiya ado, momoiya sã nigin itornẽdin.
Anĩ ere, idi gerõ bai to dilauf, ere nigin, tamo uru age difen gen, idi neid kũ fenẽya tamo kayau ganan meleid bun kaisã yaorouf.
Anĩ ere, neu ifelnẽya, neu tobonunã, neu kisi gariya, neu momoiya, sain meluk totol ifareya, wau laa fiya, feseya sã ifareya,
kafĩ fiya, darau, naig be fiya Antiok, Ikonium ado, Listra taun bun darau morõ aya alen anĩ ganan õ keleĩ. Anĩ ere, Odug anĩ ganan bun tamal yalelnan.
Momoi, tamo kayau ganan, idi Kristus Jesus bun Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ difouf nigin orodiyouf are, idi morõ dalouf.
Agef mog, tamo sesen ado idegẽya tamo, sane bunem sane bagai lauf, tunĩ didegneĩd mog, abag didegnẽdiyouf.
Anĩ ere, ogo nigin, ereb õ keleĩ wale fen, momoi won anĩ toko tokõ wo ule, ere nigin, idi difelnon are õ idi nigin keleĩ.
Agef fen, õ simõ bunem Negur nẽ Itotoya fateul kelein, are õ isennõ di, kisi biya wale fen, Kristus Jesus nigin momoiya bunem, kel yaleyõya kisi feleyauf.
Negur nẽ Itotoya ganan are Negur awa uur neseya bunem, are ifelnẽya, sakãya, madur fiya ado, madur ibodõya tai fiya nigin biya.
Age fe di, Negur nẽ tamo, kabĩ biya ganan yaleya nigin kisi feleya bagai youf.
Negur ado, Kristus Jesus ĩ isi fen, in tano inouf sain bun, ĩ mata dibodok ado gare den anidi es fediyouf anĩ, idi meleid bun, aya od enei totol bagai arokonok.
Biya od wogõ wo; biya od wogõya nigin, sain biya bun ado sain sane bun dodok wo, sain meluk feseya sã ifareya ado faded fiya bunem, madur wo, totol od urokeneĩd, waud walesauf.
Sain fau isiyouf bun, tamo biya od nigin to wedereid dinouf. Age fiya ban, idi dogo neid oroya dõ dife fen, wederedim karĩya nigin gegeĩ fedidig anĩ karĩ douf nigin, idegẽya ifelnẽdiya tamo musei gou difediyouf.
Idi fau momoi anĩ ditor ken, wedereid fitok du ken, nenerĩ ege anĩ karĩ douf.
Anĩ ere, õ ereb ereb ganan bun kisi fokõ wol fen, morõ faali wo, soosi kabĩ wale, ogon kabĩ ganan walel anĩ kisi falauf.
Aya mogo wain sesewi fiya gen fi afalau fenẽ, agef fen, neu ileya sain mogo isil.
Aya biya kusĩ aun, aya gudu reya mogo bure afelen, aya momoiya kafĩ afelen.
Gama aya nigin, madur bagai nẽ teter dodok fe ibodok, are Odug, Es Fiya Tamo madur bagai, fau naa anĩ bun ifanau fenẽ, anĩ ere, aya dogol sã, idi in isiya tari difef anidig ifenẽdiyouf.
Aya gein kaisã bagai usiyouf nigin kabĩ totol wale.
Ere nigin, Demas ĩ tenebur enei nẽ nigin wau laa fen nigin, itorna fen, Tesalonika taun ilen. Kresen ĩ Galesia provins ilen, age fe di, Taitus ĩ Dalmesia distrik ilen.
Luk dogol aya ado mabodok. Mak wale fen, urom usig, ere nigin, ĩ neu kabĩ nigin isennaya kisi feleya.
Aya Tikikus Efesus taun sur afen.
Õ usiyouf sain bun, neu saket meluk Karpus nẽ fõ bun Troas taun oun atoron anĩ wale urou usiyouf, neu buk kori fediya anĩg urou usiyouf, anĩ atun neu buk kori fediya meme gabar bun itotoya nẽ anĩ to bagai utorõf.
Aleksanda ain kabĩ tamo ĩ, aya gai kiwai totol bagai ifanan. Odug fau ĩ ereb age fen anĩ nigin mala solo sane ifenẽf.
Õg ĩ nigin lo welei, ere nigin, ĩ neda od nigin totol bagai kiwai inon.
Aya uruwa kot bun afaren sain, takam to isennan, anĩ ere, ganan ditornan. Anĩ nẽ mala solo to ifenẽdiyouf nigin aya orouf.
Anĩ ere, Odug aya sirun ifar fen, megeir ifanan. Age fe di, aya bunem biya od kisi feleya bagai wogõ au di, haiden ganan karĩ douf nigin age fen. Agef fen, aya laion awa bun tamal yalelnan.
Odug fau kiwai sane ganan bun tamal yalelna fen, karika bagai in saa tanon irou iseleyauf. Ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
Prisila, Akwila ado, Onesiforus nẽ ibor tar geid, aanya enei wenẽdiyouf.
Erastus Korin taun ibodon, agef mog, aya Trofimus dagi mog, Miletus taun oun atornen.
Yau sain fau mog, ein kaisã usiyouf nigin kabĩ totol wale. Yubulus, Pudens, Linus, Klodia ado momoiya turã tar ganan aanya sur difonok.
Odug ogon uur ado ibodõf. Wau ifenẽya ã bun ibodõf.
Aya Pol, Negur nẽ ferfer, Jesus Kristus nẽ aposel, Negur igirnẽdin neid momoiya nigin ado, momoi nẽ keleĩ uyu irou di, idi fateul bagai dibodõf nigin, igirnan,
momoiya ado keleĩ anĩ, mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ wau iseya bun ibodok, mata faimud ibodkeleya anĩ nigin Negur ĩ to idegẽdig, fau sain gariya inoya sã mog, wau kuturol fen, promis od iron.
Agef fen, yogon sain bun bagai, Negur neda Isennadaya ĩ irõ di, aya biya od wogõya kabĩ ifanan anĩ bunem wogõ au di, in od yaoren,
Taitus, neu kesu bagai, ada momoiya tekelei ado õ bun pas enei atotof: Negur Tamada ado Kristus Jesus neda Isennadaya neid wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya õ bun ibodõf.
Aya Krit nuyo an atornon anĩ nẽ gariya are, ereb bure felediya san anĩ madur woid fen, taun ganan bun uyu irouya, aya õ orokonon gen ugirnẽdiyouf nigin.
Uyu irouya are ĩ bouwa od sã, kayau tekelei aiwa, tamo ĩ ne gere tar momoiya ado, tetẽya, idodõya sã.
Sios lo fiya tamo ĩ, Negur nẽ kabĩ ifenẽya nigin, ĩ bouwa od sã, to aya dogol yedig, kaisã to name isedig, aai fatuk to yõdig, to kusĩ yedig, idegẽya bunem safina to yaledig.
Agef mã, ĩ tamo yaledig, ereb biya nigin wau laa fedig, ĩ kisi biya ado ibodõdig, madur, fateul, ĩ yogo nigin biya kulatun fedig.
Ĩ momoiya od difelnen anĩ irou kafĩ falauf, anĩ bunem, ĩ sã tunĩ keleĩ biya bunem waud yalesauf, agef fen, ĩ idi keleĩ biya od nigin kiwai dinon anidi faded fiyẽdiyouf bagai.
Ere nigin, an idodõya tamo, od kaũ sã, idegẽya temeleid musei difaref, idi atun mulũ bun temeleid anidim age difedig bagai.
Idi sigoreid ufofãf, ere nigin, idi idegẽya bunem safina yaleya nigin to ifelnẽya nẽ anĩ difelneĩd fen, fõ fõ adok daũ difedif.
Idi neid fonõ profet taka eig ye iron, “Krit tamo kayau idi faimud idegẽya temeleid, gaar kuĩ sane gen, fõ temeleid saaf weweneid.”
Od enei are momoi. Anĩ nigin, totol od urokeneĩd, ou wiyẽdiyouf, ago di, anĩ idi neid momoiya biyauf,
anĩ bunem, idi Juda neid nenerĩ kaũ sã to karĩ douf, age de fen, idi momoi nẽ anĩ ditoron anidi neid od to dõ difouf.
Karẽ bun temeleid bun, ereb ereb ganan karẽ, anĩ ere, idi amuyẽ kisi ado momoiya sã anidi bun, karẽ taka sã. Momoi, idi neid waud ado kisi es fiya sane len.
Idi Negur keleĩ dedig, anĩ ere, nedi tobonuneid bun, idi Negur nigin wa difedig. Idi sane bagai, idodõya temeleid, idi ereb biya age fiya nigin kisi feleya sã.
Õ ereb biya od wogõ yef anĩ kilei ufelnẽdiyouf.
Tamo biyeid dogo nigin biya kulatun difouf nigin, idi anĩ karĩ difiyẽdiyouf nigin, idi kisi biya ado dibodõf nigin ado, momoiya, waud laa fiya ado, feseya sã ifareya bun madur dibodõf nigin ufelnẽdiyouf bagai.
Age fiya bagai, kayau biyeideg karĩ del dibodõf nigin, taka dumen od to dirõf nigin, wain fatuk bagai to dãf nigin, agef fen, ereb biya anĩ difelnẽdiyouf nigin ufelneĩd.
Ago di, idi, kayau momoul, nedi aiweid tar adodo kesu tar nigin waud laa fouf nigin, tai difediyouf,
idi dogo nigin, sã biya kulatun difouf nigin ado bouweid od sã dibodõf nigin, fõ bun kabĩ dalouf nigin, tobonunã biya age difouf nigin ado, aiweid tar nigin karĩ difediyouf, age dife di, taka nem Negur nẽ od to kobu fouf nigin, kayau momoul tai difediyouf.
Age fiya gen bagai, kesu gaũ, dogo nigin biya kulatun difouf nigin wedereid urou.
Ereb ereb ganan bun, idi dile fen, dõ difouf nigin ereb ereb biya ago. Ogon ifelnẽya bun, õ tutuk ifareya, wau adok ifelnẽdiya bun ifenẽya,
wogõ biya tamo to kiwai difenẽf nẽ anĩ ufelnẽdiyouf, ago di, idi kiwai difonok anĩ mama fediyouf, ere nigin, idi ada nigin ereb sane taka wogõya nigin are sã.
Ferfer, ereb ereb ganan bun, nedi moroid tar karĩ difediyouf, waud al fiya difenẽdiyouf, aiteid to solo difouf,
idi bun tamal bẽ to dalouf, idi nedi moroid tar nẽ od dõ fiya biya bagai anĩ difelnẽdiyouf nigin ufelnẽdiyouf, age dife di, naab ganan bun, idi age difef bunem, Negur neda Isennadaya nigin ifelnẽya anĩ, tamo meleid bun biya ile di, tamo neid oroya anĩ bun dinouf.
Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya, isennẽya irou isidig anĩ, tamo ganan bun isin.
Anim, Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ fiya sã ado tenebur nẽ oroya sane bun, “Bai” yeya nigin ifelnadadig, agef fen, ada dug nigin biya kulatun ibodõya, madur ibodõya ado, Negur nẽ oroya bun, gama sain enei bun ibodõya nigin, ifelnadadig,
agef mã, ada el fiya nẽ wauda iseya, are neda Negur odug ado Isennadaya, Jesus Kristus ĩ, fula fiya medeĩya ado isiyouf anĩ tarĩ tafouf,
Jesus Kristus ĩ yogo luwa ada nigin itoron, are ĩ sesen ganan bun tamal yalelnada fen, ĩ yogo nigin yogon tamo kayau bagai kulo fele di, idi ereb biya age difouf nigin kabĩ totol dalouf nigin, ĩ age fen.
Ereb ereb enei õ ufelnẽdiyouf. Ogon totol ganan bunem, idi neid waud wales fen, wedereid urou. To loloum weid len, õ lai diyõf.
Tamo kayau wedereid fokõ wo, are idi lo fiya ado yeneid adodo tamo karĩ difediyouf, to didodõf, idi biya age difouf nigin ololo difouf,
taka to bouwa bun od dũf, wau inosiya ado waud difenẽdiyouf, tamo ganan bun dimatkesiyouf nigin ago.
Adag kulu kisi neneya adon, tadodon, didegnadan, tenebur nẽ oroya fire fire ado bouwa nẽ oroya fire fire nẽ ferfer tabodon. Ada tobonunã sesen ado kiyeĩ bun tabodon, to dileda orodin, adag taileid to orodan.
Anĩ ere, Negur neda Isennadaya nẽ tobonunã biya ado wau laa fiya wõ ye fen,
ĩ isennadan, are ada ereb madur age tafen anĩ bunem sã, are yogon wau yũya bunem. Ĩ mata wõya nẽ naan kulo fiya bunem ado, Awa Uur Fateulem mata falei fiya bunem isennadan.
Negur ĩ, Jesus Kristus neda Isennadaya bunem, Awa Uur Fateul, ada bun kisi feleya bagai foula fen,
are yogon wau ifenẽya bunem madur fadan, anĩ bunem, ada mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ wauda iseya ado fen, in akor anĩ talouf nigin age fen.
Od enei momoi bagai, anĩ nigin, aya, õ enei totol wogõ wo di, Negur nigin momoi def anidi karĩ del fen, ereb biya anĩ el de age difouf anĩ orouf. Enei ganan are biya bagai, tamo ganan nigin deuf.
Anĩ ere, neneya kisi abob fe fiyẽya anĩ, ibor dir fiya, monẽya ado, lo nigin luwa irouya anĩ sese wiyeĩd, ere nigin, anidi are kaũ sã, kabĩ ifenẽya kisi feleya sã.
Taka ĩ, ã atun fara fef, uruwa bun weder urouwauf, ago fen, babaneg weder urouwauf. Anĩ bure fele di, ĩ utornẽf.
Õ keleĩ youf, tamo age fiya are wau gogil fen, mosor bun ilen, ĩ yogo bouwa sanen inon.
Sain aya õ gein Artemas be Tikikus sur afiyẽ di, õ Nikopolis an, aya gein kaisã isiya nigin, totol bagai naab umirẽf, ere nigin, yau sain bun aya an abodõf nigin kisi anon.
Lo keleĩ tamo Senas ado Apolos, idi neid naab dilauf nigin, ereb ereb ganan usennẽdiyouf, ago di, idi ereb lau fiya sã dilauf.
Neda tamo kayau idig, ereb ereb biya age fiya nigin, idi de keleĩ anĩ dalouf bagai, are idi naa ganan nẽ safina dale fen, kaũ sã to dibodõf nigin age difouf.
Ganan aya geid mabodok anidim, õ bun aanya sur mafef. Momoiya bun amã nigin waud laa fef anidi aan wiyeĩd. Wau ifenẽya ã ganan bun ibodõf.
Aya, Pol, Kristus Jesus nẽ kalabus tamo, neda turada Timoti ado, oboida ado kabĩ turada Filemon gein,
mainada Afia, kusĩ tamo turada Akipus ado, sios ogon fõ bun guru difedig gein pas enei matotof.
Wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya, Negur neda Tamada ado Odug Jesus Kristus bunem õ bun ibodõf.
Aya, neu kosẽ bun, õ nigin karĩ aul fen, neu Negur faimud de afiyẽdig,
ere nigin, aya, ogon momoiya Odug Jesus bun ilen anĩ karĩ au fen, Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan nigin ogon waũ laa fiya anĩ karĩ audig.
Aya, õ amã geid ogon momoiya nẽ uyu kũ fiya anĩ kabĩ yale di, ereb ereb biya ganan, Kristus bun ada talef anĩ, õ kisi feleya bagai keleĩ youf nigin kosẽ auf.
Ogon waũ laa fiya anim, wau al fiya odug ifana fen, neu wau yalesen, ere nigin, turau õ, Negur nẽ tamo kayau neid waud filolõ fiya wenẽdin.
Anĩ nigin, Kristus bunem aya sã megeir afar fen, õ arokonõ di, ereb õ agouf nigin kisi feleya,
anĩ ere, aya wau laa fiya bun afar fen, totol bagai to ayok. Aya, Pol, tamo tubau fen, gama Kristus Jesus nẽ kalabus tamo,
aya neu kesu Onesimus nigin totol bagai to ayok, ĩ kokolin afar mog, neu kesu wõ yen.
Kulu ĩ õ nigin to biyan, anĩ ere, gama ĩ ada uruwom nigin biya bagai.
Aya, ĩ, õ gein kel sur afef, ĩ aya neu oboiyou.
Aya ĩ uruwom mabodom are, sain aya biya od nigin kokolin afar mog, ĩ ogon modoũ yale fen, isennam.
Anĩ ere, aya õ waũ to irõ mog, aya ereb taka naig be fiya age afouf nigin to oroun, are õ nugo yõya bunem sã, ogon oroya dõ wo agouf nigin age afen.
Momoi, ĩ õ uruwom sain naal bagai fara gen nẽ gariya are, õ ĩ baban gai gai kel walouf nigin be,
ĩ baban ferfer gen sã, anĩ ere, ferfer wal fiya, turã bagai. Ĩ aya bun neu oboiyou, anĩ ere, ĩ õ bun ogon oboi bagai neu wal fiya, are tamo nẽ lo fiya bun ado Odug nẽ lo fiya bun age fiyauf.
Anĩ nigin, õ, aya ogon kabĩ turã gen ago kisi wouf are, aya aan wiyaf gen, ĩg ago aan wiyẽf.
Ĩ õ bun ereb sane taka age fen be, ereb wareg taka adouf, wareg are aya bun uno.
Aya, Pol, imaum bagai enei atotof. Aya fau aba afonõf, aya, õ aya bun ogon mata nigin wareg ado anĩ nigin õ to arokonok.
Turau, aya fau õ bun tamal, ereb biya Odug bun alouf nigin orouf, Kristus bun, aya wau filolõ fiya wana.
Ogon dõ fiya anĩ momoi auf nigin, aya atotkonok, aya to ayok anĩ wal fiya agouf anĩ aya keleĩ.
Agef fen takag yeir. Aab taka, aya nigin dodok wana, ere nigin, ãgenei kosẽya bunem, aya baban ã bun kelau asi, an abodõf nigin, aya wau isef.
Epafras, Kristus Jesus bun neu kalabus turau, õ bun aanya sur fef.
Mak, Aristakus, Demas ado, Luk, neu kabĩ turau tar idig age difef.
Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ãgenei uur bun ibodõf.
Kulu Negur, profet bunem, sain musei ado naab fire fire bun, tubuda tar wogõ fiyẽdin,
anĩ ere, gama idikeleya naa enidi bun, ĩ Naal bunem wogõ fadan, Naal ĩ ereb ereb ganan akorouf nigin Negurem igirnen, ĩ bunem saa teneub ado inon.
Naal ĩ Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nẽ so fiya, ĩ Negur yogo gen bagai, in od totol ado bunem ereb ereb ganan megeir irou ifaref. Ĩ mosor lilik fiya anĩ age fel fen, saa ilun Negur Megeir Bagai ima biyalẽ ibodon.
Negur, Naal yana ifenen are engel yeneid wal fiya, age fiya bagai, Naal ĩ engel wal fediya.
Ere nigin, Negur ĩ yogon engel taka to eig ye irokenen, “Õ neu Kesu, gama aya õ Tamã wõ aul.” Takag, Negur ĩ engel taka nigin to eig ye iron, “Aya yogon Tama abodõf, ĩ neu Kesu ibodõf.”
Takag, Negur ĩ yogon kesu matu tenebur ein irou isif sain bun, ĩ baban irok, “Negur nẽ engel ganan ĩ seli dalouf.”
Negur ĩ engel nigin irok, “Ĩ yogon engel yau gen wowã douf nigin inodif, ĩ yogon kabĩ tamo yã bale gen wowã douf nigin inodif.”
Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ Naal nigin irok, “O Negur, ogon tano gai gai ibodkalauf, õ ogon tano tobonunã madur bagai bun lo wouf.
Õ tobonunã madur bagai nigin waũ laaf fen, tobonunã sane anĩ sese wedig, anĩ nigin, Negur, ogon Negur kulĩya nẽ moul õ bun fi felen, anĩ bunem, nẽ tã tar wal feid fen, ilun inenon.”
Takag, ĩ irok, “O Odug, gariya bun õ teneub nẽ gariya kare won, õ imam saa unon.
Idi fau inanakalauf, anĩ ere, õ fau ubodõf, idi ganan kolos gen sanef ilauf.
Õ idi saket gen kori wediyouf, idi kolos gen falei wediyouf. Anĩ ere, õ ubodok gen ago ubodõf, ogon sain to idikalauf.”
Negur ĩ yogon engel taka to eig ye irokenen, “Imau biyalẽ ubod mog, ogon kiwai tar õ yẽ inoya nẽ sawa anouf.”
Age fiyauf are, engel idi ere? Idi uur Negur nẽ kabĩ daledig, tamo kayau isennẽya dalouf anidi disennẽdiyouf nigin Negurem idi sur fedidig.
Anĩ nigin, ada karĩ taun anĩ fatuk bagai lo tafalauf, anĩ bunem, ada to kũ tafenẽf.
Negur nẽ od tubuda tar bun engel bunem wogõ difiyẽdin are totol ado ibodon, anĩ nigin, idi od anĩ didod ken, to dõ difen anidi are, anĩ kilei mala solo darau dalen.
Anĩ nigin, ada isennẽya odug anĩ to karĩ tafiyẽf are, naig ta tayalalauf? Uruwa bun Odug ĩ isennẽya enei nigin wogõ yen, age fe di, idi ĩ karĩ difiyen anidim, isennẽya are momoi anĩ, ada bun yaor difen.
Uris, ereb urug bagai, memelik fire fire bunem ado, Negur yogon oroya bunem Awa Uur Fateul ege luwa gadõ fedin anim, Negur ĩg isennẽya od anĩ megeir fen.
Negur ĩ, engel, teneub mata isiyouf tau fen, wogõ taudig anĩ nẽ lo fiya tamo, to inenẽdin.
Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun taka nem mogo eig ye iron: “Tamo ĩ ere anĩ, õ ĩ nigin kisi wof? Tamo naal ĩ ere anĩ, õ ĩ nigin karĩ weledig?
Õ ĩ sain naal engel farumedin unenen, õ ĩ fula fiya medeĩya yana ado anĩ nẽ teter kurũ wiye ken,
ye farumen ereb ereb ganan gõ welen.” Negur ĩ farumen ereb ereb ganan gõ felen, are ereb taka ĩ farumen sã anĩ taka to ibodok. Anĩ ere, gama ada ereb ereb ganan ĩ farumen ifaref anĩ to tailef.
Anĩ ere, Jesus Negurem ĩ sain naal engel farumedin inene ken, ĩ darau yale laa fen nigin, gama ĩ fula fiya medeĩya yana ado anĩ nẽ teter kurũ fiyen anĩ ada tailef, are Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem, ĩ tamo kayau ganan nigin laa ilen.
Negur ereb ereb ganan, yogo nigin ado yogo bunem inon, ĩ kesu tar musei fula fiya medeĩya bun irou isiyouf nigin, tamo kel gei fiya nẽ marau Jesus, darau bunem kisi feleya bagai wõ youf nigin agef inenen, are tutuk.
Yogo tamo kayau fateul ifenẽdif ado, fateuledif anidi geid, ibor tekeleif. Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi turau tar fiyẽdiya nigin to mama fef.
Ĩ irok, “Aya õ yanã neu turau tar bun kurõ afalaisiyouf, tamo kayau guru difef meleid bun, aya õ selĩ abiyouf nigin seg alouf.”
Ĩ baban irok, “Aya ĩ bun neu momoiya anouf.” Takag, ĩ baban irok, “Aya yeir, Negur ĩ gere tar ifanan geid.”
Gere tar idi bouweid ado naudeid ado nigin, ĩg bouwa ado naud ado idi gen wõ yen, are ĩ yogon laa bunem, Satan ĩ laa nẽ megeir irouf anĩ daũ falauf nigin ado,
idi laa nigin kumĩ de fen, sain ganan anĩ nẽ ferfer dibodok disin anidi kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnẽdiyouf nigin age fen.
Are momoi bagai, Jesus ĩ engel to isennẽdif, anĩ ere, ĩ Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar isennẽdif.
Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ, Jesus naab ganan bun yogon tura tar gen inenen, are Jesus ĩ pris mudur wau yũya, dõ fiya biya ado wõ ye fen, Negur aruna yalouf nigin ado, ĩ Negur nẽ didi yof fen, tamo kayau neid mosor yalelkenẽdiya kabĩ yalouf nigin age fen.
Jesus yogo bun kisi fiya wõ yen sain bun, ĩ morõ yalen, anĩ nigin, ĩ idi kisi fiya bun difaref anidi isennẽdiya kisi feleya.
Anĩ nigin, fateul turau tar, ãg Negurem iweignein, Jesus ĩ yogo aposel ado pris mudur, are ada ĩ nigin momoi tauf taudig, ĩ bun kisi fatuk tanouf.
Moses ĩ Negur nẽ fõ ganan bun, Negur nẽ od el fe dõ fedig, age fiya bagai, Jesus ĩ, Negur ĩ igirnen anĩ ait el fe dõ fedig.
Fõ inoya tamo yogo yana odug yaledig, fõ anĩ wal fiya. Age fiya bagai, Jesus ĩ yana odug bagai, Moses wal fiya.
Fõ ganan fõ inoya tamo ado, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ yogo ereb ereb ganan inoya marau.
Moses ĩ, Negur nẽ fõ ganan bun kabĩ tamo ibod ken, Negur nẽ od el fe dõ fedig, agef fen, ĩ Negur dumen bun ereb wogõ youf anĩ kurõ fesin.
Anĩ ere, Kristus ĩ Negur Naal, ĩ Negur ait el fe dõf fen, Negur nẽ fõ lo fedig. Anĩ nigin, ada toku totol tano fen, wauda isef anĩ nigin yanada talesef anĩ tarou tokõ tafalauf are, ada yogon fõ.
Anĩ nigin, Awa Uur Fateul eig ye irok kilei ago gouf: “Gama ã, Negur nẽ ait karĩ gouf are,
ã oun gerere tuan Negur kisi wiyẽg fen, kiwai wenẽgen age fiya gen, ã wauĩ to agef totolouf.
An temeĩ tar aya kisi difiya fen, kiwai difanan, are idi yar foti bun ereb age afen are dilen.
Anĩ nigin, aya ibor anidi nigin seye ise fen, oron, ‘Idi neid waud faimud itorna fen, fire iledig, age de fen, idi neu naab to keleĩdig.’
Anĩ nigin, aya seye ise fen, wau kuturol fen, oron, ‘Idi neu si inoya bun to bagai dilauf.’”
Turau tar, ã takam, wau sane ado momoiya sã anim, mata ibodõya Negur dudum fiyẽf anĩ to ago gouf nigin lo welegei.
Anĩ ere, od ‘Gama’ yeya Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek anĩ, ada bun fau agef yenẽf are, naa ganan bun abob wau talesagauf, anĩ bunem, ã taka mosorem idegnẽ di, wau to totolouf.
Uruwa bun ada kisi totol adon anĩ, kafĩ tafel tarou, idikeleya bun talauf are, ada Kristus nẽ ereb ereb ganan weim talef.
Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Gama ã Negur nẽ ait karĩ gouf are, ãgenei tubuĩ tar Negur kiwai difenen age fiya gen, ã wauĩ to agef totolouf.”
Are aiyaim karĩ de fen, kiwai dinon? Idi ganan Mosesem Isip tamal guri feid dilen anidim sã de?
Negur aiyai nigin yar foti wau sanen? Idi mosor dino fen, gerere tuan gare den anidi nigin sã de?
Negur aiyai nigin wau kuturol fen, idi yogon si inoya bun to bagai dilauf yen? Idi yogon od to dõ difen anidi nigin sã de?
Anĩ nigin, ada tailef, are idi to momoi den nigin, namen ileya kisi feleya san.
Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ si inoya bun ileya nigin, Negur nẽ promis od anĩ fau yenek nigin, ã takam si inoya bun ileya nigin ã to biya ya anĩ, Negurem to ilouf nigin lo tafalauf.
Ere nigin, idi karĩ den gen, adag biya od karĩ taun. Idi od karĩ den, anĩ ere, idi bun faat yũya sã, ere nigin, idi od karĩ den sain, idi momoiya ado od anĩ to dalen.
Gama ada mogo momoi taun, are si inoya anĩ bun telef. Are idi to momoi den nigin Negur eig ye iron kilei, “Aya seye ise fen, wau kuturol fen, oron, ‘Idi neu si inoya bun to bagai dilauf.’” Negur nẽ kabĩ teneub kare fiya sain bun mogo bure felen, anĩ ere, ĩ od agef iron.
Negur nẽ Itotoya bun, Negur naa sewen nigin eig ye wogõ yen, “Naa sewen bun, Negur ĩ yogon kabĩ ganan bun si inon.”
Baban Negur nẽ Itotoya enei bun, ĩ eig ye irok, “Idi neu si inoya bun to bagai dilauf.”
Anĩ nigin, tunĩ si inoya anĩ bun sã dilauf nigin fau ibodok, anĩ ere, idi uyulil biya od karĩ den anidi, si inoya anĩ bun to dilen, ere nigin, idi od anĩ to dõ difen.
Anĩ nigin, sain meluk ilele di, Negur baban naa taka igir ken, are “Gama” yen anĩ, Negur ĩ Dawid sigor bunem wogõ yen, are mogo iron gen: “Gama ã, Negur nẽ ait karĩ gouf are, ã wauĩ to totolouf.”
Josua ĩ si inoya anĩ to ifenẽdin, ĩ si inoya anĩ ifenẽdim are, Negur anĩ dumen naa taka nigin to wogõ yem.
Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ tamo kayau neid Sabat si inoya fau ibodok.
Ere nigin, Negur ĩ yogon kabĩ bun si inon kilei, taka ĩ Negur nẽ si inoya bun ilef, ĩg yogon kabĩ bun si inof.
Are, taka nem, od to dõ difen anidi to dõ feid fen, kubũ youf nigin, si inoya anĩ bun ileya nigin kabĩ totol bagai talouf.
Negur nẽ od mata ibod ken, kabĩ totol yalef, are dimig waila si sitakã wal fiya. Are malakanon uur ado, tuwa katõ fiya, tuwa nẽ seselina ado atun borũ fel si sitakãdig. Are wau bun kisi ado oroya es fedig.
Ereb ereb ganan inodin are Negur mala bun taka to iminek. Ereb ereb ganan ĩ mala bun lelek feleya ado yaor. Ĩ bun ada ereb age tafen anĩ faded tafiyẽf.
Anĩ nigin, pris mudur odug saa ilun Negur gein iselen, are Jesus Negur Naal, ada ĩ ado nigin, ada momoiya kurõ tafesif anĩ tarou kafĩ tafalauf.
Are, neda pris mudur ĩ, neda felu yabiya keleĩ bagai nigin, wau yũya yaleya kisi feleya, ĩ ada gen mogo naab ganan bun kisi fiya yalen, anĩ ere, ĩ mosor sã.
Anĩ nigin, ada megeir tano fen, Negur nẽ sia wagen talauf, an wau ifenẽya ibodok, anĩ bunem, ada neda lau fiya sain bun, ada isennadauf nigin wau yũya tale fen, wau ifenẽya fotou tafouf.
Pris mudur idi ganan tamo atun yale fen, tamo kayau nigin Negur aruna dale, mosor nigin ofa ado sesewi fiya difenẽf nigin igirnẽdin.
Ĩg yogo felu yabidig nigin, idi to kelei ken, kũ difenek anidi, molol nem isennẽdiya kisi feleya.
Age fiya nigin, ĩ tamo kayau neid mosor nigin ado, yogon mosor nigineg sesewi fedig.
Taka nem, pris mudur, yana odug anĩ, ĩ yogo bouwa bun to inodig, anĩ ere, ĩ Aron gen, Negurem dogol igirnẽdig.
Age fiya gen, Kristus ĩg pris mudur ibodõf nẽ fula fiya medeĩya yogo bouwa bun to inon. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ irokenen, “Õ neu Kesu, gama aya õ Tamã wõ aul.”
Ĩ taka bun eig ye irok, “Õ faimud ubodkalauf nẽ pris, Melkisedek nẽ gĩ bun.”
Jesus ĩ tenebur mata ibodon sain bun, ĩ inã odug marum fe fen, Negur ĩ laa bun tamal isennẽya nigin kisi feleya, ĩ bun kosẽ ye fen, igonen. Jesus ĩ imatkeis fen, Negur farumen ibodon nigin, Negur ĩ karĩ fiyen.
Jesus ĩ Negur Naal, anĩ ere, ĩ darau yalen anĩ bunem, dõ fiya nigin keleĩ yale fen,
kisi feleya bagai wõ yen. Agef fen, ĩ ait dõ difef ganan neid mata ibodkeleya kel gei fiya nẽ gariya wõ ye di,
Negur ĩ Jesus Melkisedek nẽ gĩ bun pris mudur inenen.
Amã enei nigin wogõya musei ado, anĩ ere, amã faded yeĩya nigin totol, ere nigin, ã keleĩya nigin forõ gef.
Ã tise wõya nigin sain meluk adon, anĩ ere, ã fau taka nem Negur nẽ od tamo mata urug ifelnẽdidig age fiya baban ifelneĩf nigin ubodõgef. Ã fau su yõya nigin yenek, saaf totol yõya nigin kisi feleya sã.
Taka ĩ su yoko are ĩ fau momou, anĩ nigin, ĩ madur bagai nẽ ifelnẽya keleĩ sã.
Anĩ ere, saaf totol are biyeid neid, idi tai fiya bun, kisi def dile fen, enei biya, enei saneya keleĩdig.
Anĩ nigin, ada, ifelnẽya gariya bunem Kristus nigin kelein daũ are tator ken, keleĩ tõya bagai bun talauf. Ada keleĩ eig fediya nigin baban to gariya tanouf, are laa ileya nẽ suma bun tamal faleiya, Negur nigin momoiya,
naan igũdiya, ima teten inoya, laa bun tamal kel fãya ado, faimud ibodkeleya nẽ es fiya.
Negur wau irõf are, ada keleĩ mugier bagai talauf.
Idi Negur nẽ fula fiya mogo dalen, idi saa ilun nẽ ege luwa mogo kobũ de dilen, idi Awa Uur Fateul dalen,
idi Negur nẽ od are biya bagai ado, sain fau isiyouf anĩ nẽ megeir mogo kelein,
age difen anidi momoiya folõ difalauf are, idi baban waud faleiya nigin guri feid isiya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, idi dogo baban Negur Naal aa tetek bun du ken, mal atun mama difenek.
Teneub anĩ bun sain musei uyẽ isi lũf fen, kabĩ moroid saaf ifenẽdidig, teneub are Negur el fiya ifenẽdig.
Anĩ ere, teneub bun malũ duri ado lili isedif, are teneub to biya, gelu fiya melsã ibodok. Idikeleya bun yã malan isaikalauf.
Oboimã tar, amã eig ma wogõ mauf, anĩ ere, amã ã bun age fiya to wõ ye fen, biya fiya ã bun isiyouf nigin momoi mauf, biya fiya are kel gei fiya ado isiyouf.
Negur ĩ madur, ĩ, ãgenei kabĩ ado wauĩ laa fiya, are ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau usennẽdigef usigef bunem Negur ufelnẽgef anĩ, weder to tu kalauf.
Amã, ã mugu mugu kabĩ totol eig fiya bagai walegef uleg, idikeleya bun ulagauf anĩ oromak, ago ge di, ãgenei wauĩ iseya anĩ agef kisi falauf.
Amã, ã fõ yeĩf anĩ to oromak, anĩ ere, ã, idi momoi de, to fese de fen, ereb Negur ĩ afeneĩf yen anĩ dalef anidi, madẽ wedig ago gouf anĩ oromak.
Negur ĩ Abraham age afouf fiyen sain bun, taka Negur yogo wal fiya, ĩ yana bunem Negur wau kuturoleya od wogõya nigin taka to ibodon, anĩ nigin, ĩ yogo wau kuturol fen,
iron, “Aya momoi bagai el fiya afon ken, momoi bagai gerẽ tar musei afonõf.”
Age ye di, Abraham ĩ feseya sã tari fef ile, Negur afonõf yen anĩ yalen.
Tamo idi waud kuturol fen, dogo neid od megeir difouf are, tamo ĩ idi wal fediya yana bunem megeir difedig. Waud kuturoleya od anim, od wogõ def anĩ megeir fe fen, luwa irouya ganan irukaka kesidig.
Age fiya bagai, Negur age afouf yen anĩ dalouf anidi bun, Negur ĩ yogon kisi to bagai falei youf anĩ yaor fenẽdiyouf nigin, ĩ wau kuturoleya od wogõ yen anim, ĩ age afouf yen anĩ, megeir fen.
Od uru enei, are od Negur age afouf yen ado wau kuturoleya od anĩ, faleiya kisi feleya sã, Negur ĩ od uru enei nigin idegẽya kisi feleya sã anĩ bunem, wau iseya malada bun ifaref anĩ tarou kafĩ tafalauf nigin, Negur nẽ ahahaya bun taya telen ada anĩ, wauda fatuk yalesauf nigin Negur age fen.
Wau iseya enei are, ada maladakanon nẽ anka, are totol fen, to gebe yedig. Are anim, gabar tempel namen ibodok anĩ borũ fel, modoũ fateul bagai bun iledig.
Jesus ĩ Melkisedek nẽ gĩ bun faimud ibodkeleya pris mudur wõ ye fen, ĩ mogo ada nigin an uyulil ilen.
Melkisedek enei Salem nẽ king, ĩ Negur Ilun Bagai nẽ pris. Ĩ Abraham king geid kusĩ del wal feid fen, kel isi mog, fotou fe fen, el fiya ifenen.
Age fe di, Abraham ereb ereb ganan ĩ ado anĩ bun tamal ten tekelei ifenen. Yana Melkisedek nẽ gariya are “madur bagai nẽ king,” takag, “Salem nẽ king,” anĩ nẽ gariya, “wau inosiya nẽ king.”
Melkisedek ĩ sina tama sã, in ibor nẽ gĩ taka sã, wõ yen nẽ naa ado laa nẽ naa taka sã, ĩ Negur Naal gen faimud ibodkeleya pris.
Ĩ naig fiya odug bagai anĩ kisi wog. Tubu Abraham ĩg safina kusĩ bun yalen anĩ ten tekelei ifenen.
Lo irok, are Lewi nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar bun pris wowã def idi, tamo kayau bun ten tekelei dalouf, tamo kayau are nedi tureid tar. Tureid tar idig Abraham nẽ ibor, anĩ ere, idi age difedig.
Melkisedek ĩ Lewi nẽ ibor bun tamal sã, anĩ ere, ĩ Abraham bun tamal ten tekelei yale fen, Abraham Negurem age afouf fiyen anĩ el fiya ifenen.
Kisi togu fiya sã, tamo odugem, ĩ farumen anĩ el fiya ifenẽdig.
Pris tamo, idi gare dedig, ten tekelei daledig, anĩ ere, Melkisedek nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya yaor fef, ĩ mata ibodkeleya, ĩ ten tekelei yalen.
Ada sã eig tauf, Lewi ĩ ten tekelei yaledig, ĩg Abraham bunem Melkisedek ten tekelei ifenen,
ere nigin, Lewi ĩ fau tubu Abraham bouwa bun ibod mog, Melkisedek ĩ Abraham fotou fiyen.
Israel tamo kayau lo ifenẽdin anĩ bun irok nigin, Lewi idi pris kabĩ daledig. Lewi neid pris kabĩ anĩ bun lau fiya to yenem are, ere nigin pris taka isiya nigin lau fiya fau yenen, Melkisedek nẽ gĩ bun tamal taka, Aron nẽ gĩ bun tamal sã?
Pris kabĩ falei fouf are, lo areg falei fouf.
Neda Odug nigin od enei wogõ yen, are ĩ ibor fire bun tamal, yogon ibor bun tamal taka pris kabĩ to yalen.
Neda Odug ĩ Juda ibor bun tamal are yaor. Anĩ ere, Moses ĩ pris nigin wogõ yen sain bun, Juda ibor nigin od taka to wogõ yen.
Pris taka Melkisedek gen bagai wõ yef are, od enei amã wogõ maun are yaor bagai wõ yef.
Ĩ tamo pris kabĩ yaleya nẽ lo bunem pris to wõ yen, anĩ ere, ĩ, mata, daũ feleya kisi feleya sã anĩ nẽ megeir bunem pris wõ yen.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei: “Õ faimud ubodkalauf nẽ pris, Melkisedek nẽ gĩ bun.”
Lo tubu are megeir sã, kabĩ to yaledig, anĩ nigin, yerin gadi difelef,
(ere nigin, lo anim ereb taka to madur fedig). Anĩ ere, wau iseya biya anĩ wõ yef, anĩ bunem, ada Negur non telef.
Negur ĩ Jesus pris inenen, are wau kuturoleya od sã to inenen. Pris tunĩ ganan idi age fiya sã, idi wau kuturoleya od sã, pris wõ den.
Negur ĩ Jesus irokenen sain bun, ĩ wau kuturoleya od ado pris wõ yen: “Odug wau kuturol fen iron, are yogon kisi to falei youf, ‘Õ faimud ubodkalauf nẽ pris.’”
Wau kuturoleya od enei nigin, Jesus ĩ bar itenẽya tubu wal fiya nẽ megeir fiya wõ yen.
Pris idi museim dibodon, ere nigin, idi gare de fen, kabĩ to tokõ difelen.
Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ faimud ibodkelef, anĩ nigin, ĩ gai gai pris kabĩ yalef, are taka bun to ilauf.
Age fiya nigin, idi ĩ bunem Negur garan disif anidi, ĩ el fe isenneĩd leya kisi feleya, ere nigin, ĩ mata faimud ibod ken, idi nigin Negur bun kosẽ yef.
Pris mudur age fiya anim, sã isennadauf. Ĩ fateul, kerema sã, amuyẽ sã, mosor adodo bun tamal gadi felen, Negur ĩ saa ilun bagai inenen.
Pris mudur tunĩ ganan, naa ganan, dogo neid mosor nigin ket sesewi dife fen, tamo kayau neid mosor nigin sesewi difedig, anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ pris anidi gen sã. Ĩ yogo bouwa sesewi fen sain bun, ĩ idi neid mosor nigin sain tekelei dogol sesewi fen.
Lo are felu yabidig tamo pris mudur igirnẽdidig, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ wau kuturoleya od, are lo dumen isin, od anim, Negur Naal, faimud kisi feleya bagai ibodkalauf nigin inenen, ĩ anĩ igirnen.
Amã wogõ mauf anĩ nẽ kaũ, are yeir. Ada pris mudur age fiya ado, ĩ saa ilun Negur nẽ sia ima biyalẽ ibod ken,
modoũ fateul bagai, are tamom sã, Odug yogo bagai salafat inon anĩ bun aruna yalef.
Pris mudur ganan, ofa ado yaro sesewi fiya difenẽf nigin igirnẽdif, anĩ nigin, neda Pris Mudur ĩg ereb taka ifenẽf nigin adouf.
Ĩ tenebur ibodom are, ĩ pris to wõ yem, ere nigin, tamo lo irok kilei ofa difenẽdif are mogo dibodok.
Idi modoũ fateul bagai, are saa ilun ibodok age fiya gen, anĩ nẽ malakanon bun aruna dalef. Anĩ nigin, Moses ĩ salafat fateul inouf nigin age fen sain bun, Negur ĩ weder iroun, “Lo welei, õ arei bun afelnon age fiya kilei bagai, ereb ereb ganan unouf.”
Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ kabĩ yalen are idi neid kabĩ wal fiya, ere nigin, Negur ado tamo geid bar itenẽya nigin, ĩ atun tamo kabĩ yalef, bar itenẽya anĩ, bar itenẽya tubu anĩ wal fiya, bar itenẽya mata anĩ, Negur od age afouf yen, are od tubu wal fiya anĩ teten inon.
Bar itenẽya tubu bun kũ fenẽya taka to ibodom are, mata nigin to lau fiyam.
Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ tamo kayau bun kũ fenẽya ile fen, iron: “Odug irok, sain fau isif, are Israel tamo kayau ado Juda tamo kayau geid bar itenẽya mata anouf.
Bar itenẽya are, aya idi neid tubuid tar Isip bun tamal imeid gim afe elen sain bun, idi tubuid tar geid, bar itenẽya anon age fiya gen sãf. Idi neu bar itenẽya to dõ difen nigin, aya idi dudum afedin.
Odug irok, sain anĩ dumen, aya Israel tamo kayau geid, bar itenẽya enei anouf. Aya neu lo idi neid kisi bun ano fen, idi neid waud bun atotauf. Aya idi neid Negur abodõf, idi neu tamo kayau dibodõf.
Tamo takam ne tã to ifelnẽf, tamo takam tura to eig ye irokenẽf, ‘Odug nigin keleĩ youf,’ ere nigin, idi ganan aya nigin keleĩ youf, naal bagai bunem isel, odug bun.
Aya idi neid sane nigin wederou tu kel fen, idi neid mosor nigin to karĩ aulauf.”
Negur ĩ bar itenẽya enei “mata” yen, anĩ bunem bar itenẽya tubu are kabĩ sã. Ereb taka tubu, kabĩ sã yen anĩ, kaisã bagai iminkalauf.
Bar itenẽya tubu anĩ, seli yabiya nigin nun ado fen, seli yabiya nẽ modoũ tenebur eineg adon.
Salafat taka dinon. Aab malabag anĩ bun, yal nẽ tibog, tebol ado, bret sesewi difen anĩ an ifaredin, modoũ are Modoũ Fateul dedig.
Gabar Modoũ Fateul bun ibodok anĩ dumen, aab taka Modoũ Fateul Bagai dedig ibodon,
an gol alta aa gaula sumeĩ nigin tõ fiyadig ado, bar itenẽya nẽ bogis gol nem ganan kerũ feleya ibodon. Bogis enei bun, gol darum mana ado, Aron nẽ manig sana wõ yen ado, meein bedu bar itenẽya itoton ado ifaredin.
