Bogis teten Fula Fiya Medeĩya Negur nẽ engel Serubim difaren, wayeid yarirĩ dife, bogis mala dede difen, bogis mala are modoũ, Negur an mosor yaleledig. Anĩ ere, amã enei nigin gama to dir mafalauf.
Sain ereb ereb ganan age de dodok difel fen, pris idi Negur nẽ kabĩ dalouf nigin, aab malabag bun naa ganan diledig.
Anĩ ere, pris mudur dogol, aab Modoũ Fateul Bagai dedig gabar dumen ibodok anĩ bun, yar tekelei bun sain tekelei dogol iledig. Ĩ naud sã to bagai iledig. Ĩ yogo nigin ado, tamo kayau neid mosor to kelei ken dinon anĩ nigin naud Negur ifenẽdig.
Enei bunem Awa Uur Fateul, salafat fateul urug bagai dinon anĩ fau ifar mog, Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun ileya nigin, bobog fau kã feleya sã anĩ ifelnẽdin.
Enei are gama sain enei nigin malakanon. Are ofa ado yaro sesewi fiya Negur difenen anim, Negur seli yabidig tamo yogon wau kare keleya kisi feleya sã anĩ ifelnẽdif.
Safina age fediya anĩ, are saaf, naan yõya ado, amuyẽ lilik fiya nẽ tobonunã fire fire dogol. Age fediya anĩ, are bouwa buru nẽ lo, kabĩ yalef ile, suma mata nẽ sain bun.
Kristus ĩ, ereb ereb biya mogo wõ yen anĩ nẽ pris mudur isin. Ĩ salafat fateul odug, biya bagai bun isour yale ilen, salafat fateul are tamom to dinon, are ereb kare fen enei nẽ tomina sã.
Ĩ meme ado bulmakau naal nẽ naud ado to ilen, anĩ ere, ĩ Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun, yogon naud bunem, sain tekelei dogol isour yale ile fen, ada nigin kel gei fiya faimud ibodkeleya anĩ yalen.
Meme ado bulmakau nẽ naud ado, bulmakau gober naal yã difalege di, isaikelen anĩ nẽ aas nem, idi amuyẽ lilik fiya sã anidi tetedin wiri dife di, idi amuyẽ lilik fele di, bouweid fili yedig.
Are momoi youf are, Kristus nẽ naud naig fe yenẽf! Ĩ Awa Uur faimud ibodkeleya bunem, yogo bouwa amuyẽ sã, Negur bun sesewi fen. Yogon naud anim, ada wauda laa bun ileya nẽ tobonunã bun tamal kulo fadalef, anĩ bunem, ada mata ibodõya Negur aruna talouf.
Gariya enei nigin, Kristus ĩ bar itenẽya mata nẽ atun tamo, anĩ bunem, tamo Negurem iweignẽdin anidi, faimud ibodkeleya akor, are Negur age afouf yen anĩ dalouf. Ere nigin, bar itenẽya tubu bun, mosor dinon anidi, nedi mosor bun tamal yalelnẽdiyouf nigin, ĩ laa fen.
Fadim anĩ kabĩ yalouf nigin, fadim yun tamo ĩ mogo laa fen are yaorouf,
ere nigin, fadim are, tamo laa fe di dogol, kabĩ yaledig. Fadim yun tamo fau mata ibod mog, fadim anĩ to bagai kabĩ yaledig.
Age fiya nigin, bar itenẽya tubug naud sã to kabĩ yalen.
Moses lo bun ĩtãfiya ganan tamo kayau ganan wogõ fiyeĩd fen, ĩ bulmakau naal ado meme nẽ naud, naan ado yale falei fe fen, sipsip siwi giriya ado aa hisop were nem, lo buk bun ado tamo kayau ganan bun wiri fen.
Moses iron, “Enei are bar itenẽya nẽ naud, are Negur ã dõ gouf nigin irokenein.”
Naab tekelei anĩ bunem, ĩ salafat fateul ado sesewi fiya nẽ safina ganan bun naud wiri fen.
Momoi, lo bun irok, melsã ereb ereb ganan naud bunem kulo falauf, are naud to fi falauf are, mosor nigin weder to tu kalauf.
Anĩ nigin, saa ilun nẽ safina anĩ nẽ malakanon, sesewi fiya enei bunem kulo feledig, anĩ ere, saa ilun nẽ safina dogo, sesewi fiya enei wal fiya bunem, age fedig.
Kristus ĩ modoũ fateul tamom dinon, are modoũ fateul momoi bagai nẽ malakanon anĩ bun to ilen. Ĩ saa ilun bagai anĩ bun ile fen, Negur mala bun ada nigin wõ yen.
Pris mudur ĩ, yogo naud sã, yaro naud ado, yar ganan Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun iledig. Anĩ ere, Kristus ĩ yogo bouwa baba baban sesewi fouf nigin saa ilun to ilen.
Kristus ĩ age fem are, teneub kare fiya sain bunem isin are, ĩ sain musei darau yalem. Anĩ ere, gama idikeleya sain enei bun, ĩ yogo bouwa sesewi fe fen, mosor yalelauf nigin, sain tekelei dogol wõ yen.
Tamo ganan sain tekelei dogol gare douf, anĩ dumen, Negur es fediyouf.
Age fiya gen, Jesus ĩg tamo kayau musei neid mosor yalel kenẽdiyouf nigin, yogo bouwa sesewi fe, tekelei fen. Ĩ baban isiyouf, are mosor yaleleya nigin sã, anĩ ere, tamo idi ĩ tari difef anidi kel gei fediyouf nigin.
Lo are safina biya isif anĩ nẽ malakanon dogol, momoi bagai safina biya anĩ sã. Agef yenek nigin, lo are, sesewi fiya de tekelei anĩ, yar ganan gai toku difenẽdig anĩ bunem, idi Negur seli dabiyouf nigin disif anidi, madur tamo bagai wowãya kisi feleya sã bagai.
Age fiya kisi feleyam are, idi sesewi fiya ganan ditorom. Ere nigin, Negur sesewi difedig tamo neid mosor, momoi bagai kulo felem are, idi baban mosor nigin waud to morõ fedim.
Anĩ ere, yar ganan bun sesewi fiya anim, tamo kayau idi, mosor nigin karĩ deledig,
ere nigin, bulmakau ado meme nẽ naud anim mosor yaleleya kisi feleya sã.
Anĩ nigin, Kristus tenebur isi fen, iron: “Õ sesewi fiya ado ofa to oroyon, anĩ ere, õ aya nigin bouwa taka dodok won.
Õ, ofa yã bun ifaleg isaikeleya anĩ ado, mosor yaleleya nẽ ofa anĩ nigin waũ to iron.
Ago di, aya oron, ‘Aya nigin buk bun eig ye itoton, O Negur, aya yeir, aya ogon oroya dõ afouf nigin asin.’”
Ĩ uruwa iron, “Sesewi fiya ado ofa, ofa yã bun ifaleg isaikeleya anĩ ado, mosor yaleleya nẽ ofa anĩ õ to oroyon, anĩ nigin waũ to iron” (anĩ ere, lo are, idi age difouf nigin iron).
Age ye fen, ĩ iron, “Aya yeir, aya ogon oroya dõ afouf nigin asin.” Ĩ mata anĩ inouf nigin uruwa nẽ anĩ yalelen.
Oroya anĩ bun, Jesus Kristus ĩ yogo bouwa sesewi fe, tekelei felen, anĩ bunem, ada fateul wõ taun.
Naa ganan bun, pris ganan mugu mugu difar fen, Negur nigin dogo neid kabĩ daledig. Idi sesewi fiya de tekelei anĩ toku difenẽdig, sesewi fiya anim mosor yaleleya nigin kisi feleya sã bagai.
Anĩ ere, Kristus ĩ mosor nigin gai gai nẽ sesewi fiya tekelei fele fen, Negur ima biyalẽ ibodon.
Sain anĩ bunem isi gama, Kristus ĩ, yogon kiwai tar Negurem Kristus ye inoya nẽ sawa inenẽdiyouf anĩ tari fef.
Ĩ sesewi fe, tekelei felen anim, idi mosor bun temeleid kulo feledif anidi, gai gai nigin madur feledin.
Awa Uur Fateul ĩg od enei nigin eig ye irokanadaf. Uyulil ĩ irok:
“Odug irok, sain anĩ dumen, aya idi geid bar itenẽya enei anouf. Aya neu lo idi waud bun ano fen, idi neid kisi bun atotauf.”
Age ye fen, ĩ tobol fe irok: “Dogo neid mosor ado sane age difedig are, aya to karĩ aulauf.”
Mosor enei weder tu kelen ouf are, baban mosor nigin sesewi fiya taka to yenek.
Anĩ nigin, turamã tar, ada Jesus nẽ naud bunem, Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun tuninir ya sã ileya nigin kisi feleya.
An ileya nẽ naab are, mata ibodõya nẽ naab mata, are ĩ, ada nigin, gabar Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun ileya nigin bobog katĩ felen anĩ serek felen bunem kã felen, gabar are yogo bouwa.
Ada Negur nẽ fõ lo fiya nigin pris odug ado.
Anĩ nigin, ada wauda tutuk fen, momoiya totol ado Negur non talauf, ere nigin, ada wauda, mosor nẽ wau morõ bun tamal wirif kulo fada le fen, bouwada naan karẽtut nem kulo felen.
Neda wauda iseya ada wogõ taudig anĩ, ada tarou kafĩ tafalauf, ere nigin, Negur age afouf yen, are ĩ de age fouf bagai.
Ada wau laa fiya ado tobonunã biya bun talauf nigin, abob wau yaleseya nigin kisi tafouf.
Ada guru fiya anĩ to tatorõf, tunĩ to guru difedig gen, to age tafouf, anĩ ere, ada abob wau talesef talauf, ere nigin, ã, Odug nẽ Naa melsã isif are ulegef.
Ada momoi anĩ kelei ken, neda oroya dõ tafe, mosor tanof talauf are, mosor yaleleya nẽ sesewi fiya taka to ibodok,
anĩ ere, Negur yogon es fiya ado, yã bobo reya anim yogon kiwai tar yakur feid isasaikalauf anĩ, kumĩ ado tari fiya dogol ibodok.
Taka ĩ Moses nẽ lo dudum fen, ĩ nigin tamo urom be towom, ĩ age fen anĩ yaor dife di, waud yũya sã dukesi di, laa fen.
Age fiyauf are, taka ĩ, Negur Naal ye nem lai fe fen, bar itenẽya nẽ naud anim ĩ mosor bun tamal kulo fiyekelen anĩ, fateul sã gen inene ken, wau ifenẽya nẽ Awa Uur kono fiyek ĩ, darau naig fiya bagai yalouf anĩ kisi gef.
Ere nigin, ada kelei, Negur eig ye iron, “Taka ĩ sane age fouf, ĩ mala solo sane ifenẽya are neu kabĩ, ayam mala solo sane afenẽf.” Takag, ĩ baban iron, “Odug ĩ yogon tamo kayau es fediyouf.”
Taka ĩ mata ibodõya Negur ima bun ilauf are, ĩ fatuk bagai kumĩ tererẽ youf.
Ã uruwa bun fula fiya walegen, anĩ dumen naig wog ufaregen anĩ kisi waleg. Sain anĩ bun ã darau nẽ kusĩ odug walegen, anĩ ere, totol ufaregen.
Sain tunĩ, ã mal atun kono diyei ken, darau difeneĩdig. Sain tunĩ, ã, idi morõ age fiya dalen anidi usennẽdigedig.
Ã tamo kalabus bun dibodon anidi nigin wauĩ yũya wenẽdigen, agog fen, tamo idi ãgenei safina ganan dale di, ã kulĩya ado folõ wol kenẽdigen, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã aug safina biya, mata gai gai ibodkeleya nẽ ado.
Anĩ nigin, ãgenei kisi totol anĩ to folõ walagauf, are fau mala solo odug bagai ifeneĩf.
Ã totol ufaragauf, anĩ bunem, ã Negur nẽ oroya dõg fen, ereb ĩ age afouf yen anĩ walogouf.
Ere nigin, sain naal bagai ilele di, “Tamo ĩ isif, are fau isiyouf, ĩ to foi youf.
Anĩ ere, neu tamo madur bagai, ĩ momoiya bunem mata ibodõf. Ĩ dumelem soso rouf are, aya ĩ nigin wau to al fouf.”
Anĩ ere, ada, idi dumelem soso de fen, fõ delef gen sã, anĩ ere, ada, idi momoi de fen, isennẽya dalef gen.
Momoiya are, ereb nigin wauda isef anĩ, de momoi bagai agef wõ youf tauf anĩ. Momoiya are, ereb ada maladam to tailef anĩ, de momoi bagai ibodok tauf anĩ.
Kulu nẽ tamo kayau, dogo neid momoiya bunem, Negur idi nigin de fiyẽdin.
Momoiya bunem, ada keleĩ, Negur irõ di, saa teneub ado wõ yen, anĩ nigin, ereb ada malada bun tailef are, maladam to tailef anim inodin.
Momoiya bunem, Abel ĩ sesewi fiya, Kain nẽ wal fiya Negur ifenen. Abel nẽ momoiya bunem, Negur ĩ Abel nigin madur tamo bagai yen, ere nigin, Negur ĩ Abel nẽ sesewi fiya are de yen. Abel ĩ laa fen, anĩ ere, momoiya bunem, ĩ fau wogõ yef.
Momoiya bunem, Enok teneub enei bun tamal yalelnen, anĩ nigin, ĩ to laa fen. Negurem ĩ yalelnen nigin, takam ĩ to fotou fiyen. Negur nẽ Itotoya irok, Negur ĩ fau to yale mog, ĩ Negur wau al fiya ifenen.
Taka ĩ to momoi youf are, ĩ Negur wau al fiya ifenẽya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, taka ĩ Negur gein isif, are Negur ibodok anĩ ado, ĩ dimirnek anidi mala solo ifenẽdidig anĩ, de momoi bagai youf.
Momoiya bunem, Noa ĩ ereb malam fau ileya sã mog, Negurem weder iroun anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ Negur anini fiye ken, yogon ibor isennẽdiyouf nigin waag taka kare fen. Yogon momoiya bunem, Noa ĩ, teneub enei mosor ado anĩ yaor fe fen, madur bagai, are momoiya bunem isif anĩ, Negur bun tamal yalen.
Negur ĩ, Abraham yogon akor fau yalouf modoũ bun ilauf nigin iweignen sain bun, Abraham ĩ nain be ilauf ya anĩ keleĩ san. Anĩ ere, ĩ momoiya bunem Negur nẽ od dõf fen, ilen.
Momoiya bunem, Abraham ĩ, Negur afonõf yen teneub anĩ bun, yaũ teneub bun yaũ tamo gen ibodon. Ĩ salafat bun ibodon, Isak Jakop ado, idi Negur afonõf yen od tekelei Abraham yalen anĩ dalen, idig salafat bun dibodon.
Are Abraham ĩ, taun anĩ gariya teten totol ifaref, are Negurem eig fe yenẽf ye fen, kare fen anĩ tari fedig.
Abraham ĩ tubau bagai, Sara ĩ yogo dali. Anĩ ere, momoiya bunem, Abraham tama wõya nigin kisi felen, ere nigin, ĩ, Negur age afouf yen anĩ agef wõ youf bagai ye fen, momoi yen.
Anĩ nigin, tamo tekelei ĩ tubau bagai laa tamo gen, ĩ bunem yogon ibor nẽ tubu tar, saa ilun barisa ado maaĩ ubun kulum yenek gen, iwesleya kisi feleya sã, fulus fen.
Tamo kayau eneidi ganan momoi de fen, gare den. Idi ereb Negur ĩ age afouf yen anĩ to dalen. Are idi egerom meledim dogol dile fen, waud al fen. Age dife fen, teneub enei bun idi yaũ tamo, namala den.
Tamo kayau age de dirok, are dogo neid teneub dimirek anĩ difelnadaf.
Idi teneub ditor disin anĩ nigin kisi dalem are, idi keku de dilauf nigin kisi feleya yenem.
Age fiya ban, idi teneub biya bagai, saa ilun nẽ anĩ nigin waud yenen. Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ, idi nemã Negur def anĩ nigin to mama fef, ere nigin, ĩ idi neid taun taka dodok felen.
Momoiya bunem, Negur Abraham kisi fiyen sain bun, Abraham ĩ, Isak anĩ Negur sesewi fiya ifenen. Abraham Negurem age afouf fiyen ĩ, naal tekelei bagai anĩ sesewi fiya ifenẽf nigin age fen.
Negur Abraham irokenen, “Isak bunem, ogon ibor tar wowã douf.”
Abraham kisi fen, Negur ĩ laa tamo kel turĩ fiya kisi feleya. Anĩ nigin, ada eig tau wogõya kisi feleya, Abraham ĩ Isak laa bun tamal kel yalen.
Momoiya bunem, Isak ĩ, Jakop Esau ado, dumen bun idi neid ibodõya nigin el fiya ifenẽdin.
Momoiya bunem, Jakop yogon laa melsã mog, Josef gere tar monog mugu mugu el fiya ifeneĩd fen, yogon manig tubi bun mudur isen ken, Negur seli yabin.
Momoiya bunem, Josef yogon laa melsã mog, Israel tamo kayau Isip tamal ditor dilauf nigin wogõ ye fen, yogon tuwa nigin faded fiyẽdin.
Momoiya bunem, Moses sina tama adom, Moses wõ ye di, ĩ ogõ towo dinokelnen, ere nigin, Moses ĩ kesu meli bagai dile fen, idi king nẽ od nigin to kumĩ den.
Momoiya bunem, Moses ĩ biya fen, Isip king nẽ barai nẽ kesu yeya anĩ itoron.
Moses ĩ, mosor nẽ oroya sain naal bun dõ fiya itor ken, Negur nẽ tamo kayau geid morõ dalouf nigin wau iron.
Moses ĩ kisi fen, are Kristus nigin kono fiya yaleya anĩ, Isip nẽ safina biya bagai anĩ wal fiya, ere nigin, ĩ yogon mala solo dumen nẽ anĩ lo felen.
Momoiya bunem, Moses ĩ Isip king nẽ seye nigin kumĩ sã, Isip itor ilen. Ĩ totol ifaren, ere nigin, Moses ĩ, Negur ileya kisi feleya sã anĩ, ilen gen age fen.
Momoiya bunem, ĩ Pasa ado, bobog bun naud wiri fiya nẽ suma inon, are Yukesiya nẽ Engel ĩ, Israel neid kesu monog matu to idenkesiyouf nigin age fen.
Momoiya bunem, Israel tamo kayau, teneub maug bun gen Maaĩ Giriya atu diyok dilen. Anĩ ere, Isip tamo idi dibal mog, naan kerub fedi di, gare den.
Momoiya bunem, Israel tamo kayau, Jeriko kau, naa sewen kalĩ dife di, Jeriko kau narĩ felen.
Momoiya bunem, naabur kayau Rahab, idi Negur ait to dõ difedig geid to didenkesin, ere nigin, ĩ kofo tamo aan fiyẽdin.
Aya baban ere od taka arokeneĩf? Aya Gidion, Barak, Samson, Jepta, Dawid, Samuel ado, profet idi nigin dir feleya nigin sain sã.
Idi momoiya bunem king geid kusĩ de fen, lai difedin. Idi madur bagai bunem kulatun difen. Idi Negur age afeneĩf yen anĩ dalen. Idi laion eweid difofakelen.
Idi yã bale difofor len. Idi dimig waila wal difen. Idi totol sã, anĩ ere, megeir dale fen, totol difaren. Idi kusĩ namen totol dale fen, yaũ kusĩ tamo lai difedin.
Kayau dogo neid tar gare dedin, baban mata ke de fafã de di, daledin. Tunĩ darau sane bagai dale fen, kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnẽdiya ditoron, are idi kel fãya biya anĩ, dalouf nigin age difen.
Tunĩ kono fiya ado tibog dalen, tunĩ sen nem difofa ken, kalabus bun dinenẽdin.
Idi meein tulu difedin. Idi so nem kokour difedi di, uru wõ yen. Idi dimig nem didenkesin. Idi sipsip gabar ado meme gabar difounkel dilen, are idi maleg dibodon, darau dalen, to biya difiyẽdin.
Tenebur ein, idi ed fe ibodõya nigin to biya. Idi gerere tuan, arein, meein ku bun ado, teneub kur diyõdig.
Eneidi ganan, Negur, dogo neid momoiya nigin de fiyẽdin. Anĩ ere, idi takam, Negur age afouf yen anĩ to yalen,
ere nigin, Negur ada nigin kisi biya bagai inon, are idi ada weim ouf dogol, kisi feleya bagai wowã douf nigin, Negur ĩ age fen.
Ada momoiya tamo kayau age fediya musei budũ gen kalilĩ difadaf. Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb ganan naaburada gudũ fef anĩ ado, mosor karika sane fili fadaf anĩ taraile fen, abob wawal fiya nẽ gudu reya Negurem inokanadan anĩ bun, feseya sã gududu tauf.
Ada malada Jesus bun dogol tanouf, ĩ neda momoiya nẽ gariya ado, momoiya kisi feleya bagai wõya nẽ. Ĩ wau al fiya mala bun ifaren anĩ nigin ye fen, ĩ aa tetek nigin to fese ye fen, mama yaleya nigin to kukĩ yen, agef fen, ĩ Negur nẽ sia ima biyalẽ ibodon.
Jesus ĩ mosor adodo tamom kiwai fatuk difenen anĩ ganan faali fen, ĩ nigin kisi tafouf, are ã to fõ yei ken, wauĩ folo rouf nigin age tafouf.
Ã mosor ado gunĩ gedig, anĩ ere, ã fau kusĩg fen, naudeĩ fi feleya sã.
Agog fen, ã wauĩ yaleseya od, Negur neu kesu tar yein anĩ wedereĩ tu kelen: “Neu kesu, õ Odug nẽ madur fiya to ege wouf, Odug ĩ ou yõf are, waũ to folo rouf,
ere nigin, Odug ĩ, idi nigin wau laa fedig anidi madur fiyẽdidig, agef fen, ĩ yogon kesu tar yaledif anidi ganan darau ifenẽdidig.”
Morõ ã ado are, Negur nẽ madur fiya anĩ de faali gouf. Negur ĩ, ã yogon kesu tar nigin age fef. Kesu nanĩ taka, tamam to madur fiyẽdig?
Negur yogon kesu tar ganan madur fiyẽdidig, anĩ ere, ĩ ã to madur yeĩf are, ã yogon kesu tar sã, ã dubur temeleĩ.
Ada ganan tamada tar ado, idi ada madur difada di, anĩ nigin bobou tafiyẽdidig. Anĩ nigin, ada fatuk bagai neda uur nẽ Tama farumen tabod ken, mata tabodõf!
Ada tamada tar, sain naal bagai, idi biya kisi difen anĩ kilei, madur difadan. Anĩ ere, Negur neda biya fiya nigin, madur fadadig, are ada ĩ geid fateulouf nigin age fedig.
Sain madur fiya ganan bun, wau al fiya to taledig, darau anĩ taledig. Anĩ ere, dum, idi darau age fiya bunem madur fiyẽdin anidi bun, madur bagai ado wau inosiya nẽ faat biya wõ youf.
Anĩ nigin, imeĩ bubur kelediya ado iboreĩ felu reya megeir weledigouf.
“Yeĩ nigin naab tutuk gouf,” anĩ bunem, yeĩ kirorõya to sesen lauf, are biya lediyouf.
Tamo ganan geid wauĩ inosiya bun ubodõg fen, fateulouf nigin kabĩ totol waleg. Fateul sãf are, takam Odug to ilouf.
Taka nem Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya to folo rouf nigin ado, aa faat dirikeĩ gen to wõ ye fen, musei morõ ifeneĩd fen, amuyẽ ifenẽdiyouf nigin lo welegei.
Taka nem noli tobonunã to inouf nigin be, Esau gen Negur nigin kisi sã to ibodõf nigin lo welegei. Esau ĩ, kesu matu nigin yogon akor fau yalouf anĩ, sain tekelei nẽ saaf anĩ nem na sur fen.
Anĩ dumen, ã karĩ gef kilei, ĩ el fiya enei akorouf nigin oron, anĩ ere, ĩ to yalen. Ĩ inã ado el fiya anĩ imiren, anĩ ere, ĩ wau faleiya nigin naab taka san.
Ã arei eig fiya bun to usigen, arei are kobũ fiya kisi feleya, yã balẽ yef ado, gugum, tubutubuya, uyẽ yau totol ado,
taur ait, ait taka od wogõya nẽ, are tamo idi ait anĩ karĩ de fen, od baban to wogõ fiyẽdiyouf nigin digonen,
ere nigin, idi eig ye irokenẽdin anĩ yaleya kisi feleya sã, “Gaar taka arei anĩ kobũ foufeg, meein tulu difouf.”
Moses anĩ ile fen, fatuk bagai kumĩ ise fen, iron, “Aya kumĩ tererẽ auf.”
Anĩ ere, ã Saion Arei bun, saa ilun nẽ Jerusalem, are mata ibodõya Negur nẽ taun usigen. Ã engel mala musei biya al de guru difef bun usigen.
Ã, Negur nẽ kesu matu, idi yeneid saa ilun itoton anidi neid sios bun usigen. Ã tamo ganan nẽ es fiya Negur bun ado, madur tamo kisi feleya bagai wowã den anidi neid uur bun usigen.
Ã, Jesus, bar itenẽya mata nẽ atun tamo bun ado, naud wiri fen, are Abel nẽ naud wogõ yef anĩ wal fiya od wogõ yef anĩ bun usigen.
Lo welegei, are ĩ wogõ yef anĩ to dudum wog. Idi tenebur ein wedereid iroun ĩ dudum difiyen idi to diyalelen, ani nigin, ada saa ilunem wederada irouf ĩ dudum tafouf are, ada iyaleleya nigin malai bagai.
Sain anĩ bun, yogon aitem teneub enei yokũ fen, anĩ ere, gama ĩ promis od eig ye iron, “Baban aya teneub dogol sã, saa ado yokũ afouf.”
Od “baban” yef are ifelnadaf, are ereb ereb inodin yokũ fiya kisi feleya anĩ yokũ feid fen, yalelauf, are ereb yokũ fiya kisi felya sã anĩ fau ifarauf nigin age fouf.
Ada tano yokũ fiya kisi feleya sã anĩ talef, anĩ nigin, Negur de tafiye ken, Negur wau al fouf nigin, kumĩ ado aniniya bunem, Negur seli tabiyouf,
ere nigin, neda “Negur ĩ isaikeleya nẽ yã.”
Abob nigin tureĩ tar gen, toku wauĩ laa fouf.
Tamo mata urug yalediya nigin to wedereĩ tu kalauf, tamo tunĩ age difen are, keleĩ sa ken, engel gei difedin.
Idi kalabus bun difaref anidi, ã idi geid takai kalabus bun ifareya gen, karĩ wedigouf. Idi to biya difiyẽdif anidi, ã morõ takai walegef gen, karĩ wedigouf.
Tamo kayau ado bagu fiya nigin, tamo ganan, yana odug an dinouf. Tamo kayau ado bagu fiya nẽ fatar karẽtut ibodõf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ, idi seseirã tobonunã dinof anidi ado, idi noli tobonunã dinof anidi, es fediyouf.
Moni nigin kisi fatuk to unogouf, safina ã adof anĩ, are eĩ de gouf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ iron, “Aya to bagai atorneĩf, aya to bagai folõ ayeikalauf.”
Anĩ nigin, ada kumĩ sã torõf, “Odug ĩ neu isennẽya, aya to kumĩ auf. Aya tamom ere naig fiyauf?”
Ãgenei uyu irouya, Negur nẽ od wogõ diyein anĩ karĩ walagauf. Idi naig de dibodok disi di, ereb wõ yen anĩ kisig fen, idi neid momoiya madẽ gouf.
Jesus Kristus ĩ to falei yedig, nor, gama ado, sain ganan, de agef ibodkeledig.
Ã ifelnẽya fire fire anim to wewu yeĩ irouleyeĩf. Ada wauda, wau ifenẽya anim megeir fouf anĩ biya, saaf nẽ lo dõ fiya bunem ada wauda to megeir fouf, are idi saaf nẽ lo dõ de doko anidi, anim to isennẽdif.
Ada alta ado, an pris salafat fateul bun kabĩ daledig idi, neda alta anĩ bun yõya nigin kisi feleya sã.
Pris mudur, yaro naud anĩ, mosor nẽ sesewi fiya Negur ifenẽf nigin, Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun iledig, yaro bouwa are, fõ mayã dumeitur difaleg isaikeledig.
Anĩ nigin, Jesus ĩg yogon naud bunem, tamo kayau neid mosor yalelauf nigin, taun bobog dumeitur darau faali fen.
Anĩ nigin, ada, ĩ mama faali fen anĩ tale fen, fõ mayã dumeitur ĩ gein talauf.
Ere nigin, ada, tenebur ein, faimud ibodkeleya nẽ taun sã, anĩ ere, ada taun fau isiyouf anĩ tamirek.
Anĩ nigin, ada toku, Jesus bunem, yana yaleseya nẽ sesewi fiya, Negur tafenẽf, yana yaleseya nẽ sesewi fiya are, sigoradam Jesus yana kurõ tafesif anĩ.
Ereb ereb biya agog fen, abob wenẽgouf anĩ to wedereĩ tu kalauf, ere nigin, sesewi fiya age fediya anim Negur wau al fedig.
Ãgenei uyu irouya farumen ubodõg fen, karĩ wiyẽdigouf. Idi ã lo diyeĩdig, idi dogo neid kabĩ nigin dum Negur dirokenẽf. Idi karĩ wiyẽdigouf, anĩ bunem, idi neid kabĩ morõ sã, wau kulĩya ado dalouf, ere nigin, idi morõ ado kabĩ dalouf are, ã to isenneĩf.
Amã nigin kosẽ gouf. Amã momoi mauf, are amã kisi karẽtut ado, amã ereb ereb ganan bun biya age mafouf nigin oromak.
Negur aya ã gein kaisã bagai sur fiyauf nigin, ã kosẽ gouf nigin, fatuk bagai arokeneik.
Wau inosiya nẽ Negur ĩ, faimud ibodkeleya bar itenẽya nẽ naud bunem, neda Odug Jesus, sipsip lo fiya tamo odug, laa bun tamal kel irousin.
Wau inosiya nẽ Negur ĩ, Jesus Kristus bunem, yogon oroya dõ gouf nigin ereb ereb biya ganan ã ifenei ken, yogo wau al fouf nigin ada bun kabĩ yalouf anĩ amã oromak. Negur ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya gai gai ibodõf. Momoi.
Turau tar, ã, neu wau yaleseya od anĩ, karĩ gouf nigin, totol bagai arokeneik, ere nigin, aya pas tobega dogol atotkenein.
Neda turada Timoti, kalabus bun tamal ulõ yesin anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin aya orouf. Ĩ kaisã wõ youf are, amã urom ã mailiyeĩf nigin masiyouf.
Ãgenei uyu irouya ganan ado, Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan aan wiyẽdigouf. Idi Itali temeleid, ã bun, idi neid aanya, sur difeneik.
Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ã ganan bun ibodõf.
Aya Jems, Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus neid ferfer, Israel neid ibor tuwelf tenebur ein firagagaũ difen bun pas enei atotof. Aan yeya.
Turau tar, ereb sain morõ fire fire walogouf are, ã wauĩ al fiya nigin gouf,
ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ãgenei momoiya, kisi fiya bunem, feseya sã ifareya wõ yedig.
Feseya sã ifareya anĩ tobol ge di, ketẽ yese di, ã atĩyeĩ ken, kisi feleya bagai, ereb taka nigin lau fiya sã wõ gouf.
Ã taka kisi biya nigin lau fouf, Negur tamo ganan kisi biya nigin lau de fen to difiyẽf anĩ to ou fiyeĩd fen, wau sã kisi biya kisi feleya ifenẽdidig anĩ to fiyẽf, age fe di, ĩ ifenẽf.
Anĩ ere, ĩ to fiyẽ fenẽ, ĩ momoi ye fen, to wau uru ouf bagai, ere nigin, taka ĩ wau uru ouf are, ĩ maaĩ moloun wĩya gen, yaum wese fe di, ilef isif fedig gen.
Tamo age fiya, ĩ Odug bun tamal ereb taka alouf ye fen, to kisi fei.
Ĩ tamo wau uru ado, ereb age fef ganan bun, in wau to dẽ yesiledig.
Momoiya turada taka ĩ maleg are, ĩ Negur mala bun yogon modoũ ilun nigin wau al fouf bagai.
Anĩ ere, taka safina musei ado, sain Negur ĩ lai fesilnẽf are, ĩ anĩ nigin wau al fouf bagai, ere nigin, ĩ odõ munĩ gen inanakalauf.
Gaa ise fen, yogon uruwa nẽ totol anim aayũ gariri keledig, age fe di, munĩ tu rel fen, kubũ ye fen, yogon gegẽ meli bagai anĩ inanakalauf. Age fiya gen, tamo safina musei ado ĩg yogon kabĩ yalef ile mog, inanakalauf.
Tamo taka ĩ, morõ bun megeir ifaref ilauf, ĩ el fiyek, ere nigin, ĩ kisi fiya bun ifaren nigin, ĩ mata nẽ teter Negur idi ĩ nigin waud laa fef anidi afenẽdiyouf yen anĩ yalouf.
Kisi fiya isi di, taka nem to irõf, “Negur aya mosor anouf nigin kisi fiyaf.” Ere nigin, Negur ĩ sanem kisi fiyẽya kisi feleya sã, agef fen, inimeg taka mosor inouf nigin to kisi fiyẽf.
Anĩ ere, mugu mugu ĩ, yogon oroya sanem mala yũ yale di, kisi fiya bun iledig.
Age fe di, bouwa nẽ oroya anim, mosor wau bun kare fe di, mosor gõ fef, mosor anĩ isora le fen, laa gõ fef.
Turau tar oboiyou, to didegneĩf.
Ereb biya ganan ado ege luwa bagai ganan, are ilun tamal, Negur saa ilun nẽ lalan ganan kare fen ĩ bunem isif, ĩ to falei fulu yedig, ĩ buri ilef isif fedig gen to falei yedig.
Ĩ, yogon oroya bunem, ada, yogon momoi od bunem yogon gere tar wõ tauf nigin igirnadan, are ada ereb ĩ inodin anĩ ganan bun faat uyulil taka gen wõ tauf nigin age fen.
Turau tar oboiyou, enei karĩ walagauf: Tamo ganan kaisã bagai karĩ gouf, kaisã to wogõ gouf, kaisã to seye gouf,
ere nigin, tamo nẽ wau saneya are, tutuk mata ibodõya Negur orof anĩ to irou isidig.
Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb amuyẽ ganan ado, sesen ketẽ yesen ganan walelagauf, agog fen, wauĩ yukesileya bunem, od ã namein Negurem itenen, kel yaleyeĩf kisi feleya anĩ walogouf.
Ã od ege karĩ dogol ya bunem, to aug bouweĩ udegnẽg. Ereb yef anĩ dõg agog.
Aib taka ĩ od karĩ ye fen, ereb yef anĩ to dõ fef are, ĩ tamo yogo nawa dodo bun ilef gen,
ĩ yogo nawa felef, waĩf yale di, kaisã bagai yogo nawa nigin nene yedig gen age fiya.
Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ, lo kisi feleya bagai, karika ifenẽdig anĩ bun, el fe felef fen, faimud age fef ile, ereb karĩ yen anĩ to weder tu kel fen, anĩ agei fouf are, ĩ ereb age fef anĩ bun el fiyẽf.
Aibem taka ĩ aya momoi auf ye fen, ereb ereb lo irok kilei bagai dõf age fouf, anĩ ere, yogon sigor to fateul inouf are, ĩ yogo idegne ken, yogon momoiya are kaũ sã.
Momoiya, Negur ada Tamada karẽtut ado kũ fenẽya sã gen iledig, are eig fiya: maad ado waab, nedi morõ bun kulatun fediya, agef fen, tenebur nẽ oroyam to amuyẽ iroudauf nigin lo feleya.
Turau tar, ã, neda fula fiya medeĩya nẽ Odug Jesus Kristus nigin momoi gef nigin, ã wauĩ wenẽgef anĩ dogol to lo walagauf.
Tamo taka ĩ, ãgenei guru fiya bun ima sai gol ado kolos biya ifoun ken, isi di, maleg tamo taka kolos tubu adog namen isiyouf.
Ã tamo kolos biya ado anĩ el ge lo weleg fen, “Ogon ibodõya modoũ biya bagai yeir,” ge fen, maleg tamo urokenẽgouf, “Õ an ufar,” be “Õ yeu gariyan tenebur ubod,” wiyẽgouf are,
ã atun es ge fen foi gen, agog fen, kisi gariya sane bunem es fiya tamo wõ gen.
Karĩg, turau tar oboiyou! Negur ĩ, tenebur tamo kayau meleid bun maleg anidi momoiya bun kisi feleya bagai wõ de di, Negur nẽ tano ĩ nigin waud laa fedig anidi afenẽdiyouf yen anĩ, idi akor dalouf nigin to igirnẽdin de?
Anĩ ere, ã maleg anidi anĩ meleĩ irim uledigen. Tamo safineid adodom to lai diyeĩdig de? Idim ã kot bun to guri diyeĩ dirouleyeĩdig de?
Idim, Kristus yana biya anĩ bunem ã iweigneĩdig anĩ, to yana sane dinodig de?
Ã, momoi bagai, neda King nẽ lo, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok, “Õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigineg ago waũ laa fouf,” anĩ dõ gouf are, ã biya ago gef.
Anĩ ere, ã wauĩ wenẽgef anĩ dogol lo walagauf are, ã mosor unog fen, lo bunem, ã lo wal fiya tamo wowã gef.
Ere nigin, taka ĩ lo ganan dõf fen, lo tekelei dogol wal fouf are, ĩ lo ganan wal fef.
Aib ĩ iron, “Õ seseirã to uno,” ĩ eig yeg iron, “Õ taka to ukeis.” Õ seseirã to unof, anĩ ere, taka ukesiyouf are, õ lo wal fiya tamo wõ wouf.
Idi, lo karika ifenẽdidig anim, es fediyouf age fediya gen wogõg fen, dõ gouf,
ere nigin, Negur, es fiya wau yũya sã anĩ, aib wau yũya sã bun inouf. Taka ĩ taka nigin wau yũya ifelnẽf are, ĩ es fiya anĩ wal fouf, ere nigin, ĩg Negurem wau yũya ifelnẽf.
Turau tar, tamo taka aya momoi auf ye fen, to dõf age fouf, ĩ ere biya age fouf? Momoiya age fiyam tau isennẽf?
Turada be mainada taka ĩ, kolos ado saaf naa teke tekelei yõya nẽ sã.
Ã takam ĩ irokenẽf, “Wau inosiya bun ule, aya õ de ailiyok, uruwa wale fen, wõ el wo,” age ye fen, ĩ bouwa buru isennẽya nigin ereb taka to age fouf, ĩ ere biya age fef?
Naab age fiya bagai, momoiya yogo dogol, dõ fiya bunem to isennek, are laa fef.
Anĩ ere, takam irõf, “Taka momoiya ado, taka dõ fiya ado.” Kisi age fiya are kũ fenẽya. Ogon momoiya, dõ fiya sãf are, naig fe di, aya õ momoiya ado ya anĩ keleĩ youf? Anĩ ere, aya, neu dõ fiya bunem, aya momoiya ado ya anĩ afelnõf.
Õ Negur tekelei ibodok ya anĩ momoi wof. Are de! Kaa seseneg age de momoi de fen, kumĩ tererẽ dedig.
Õ neneya bagai, õ momoiya dõ fiya sã are, ege bagai ya anĩ keleĩ you fenẽ de?
Ada tubuda Abraham yogo naal Isak alta bun Negur sesewi fiyẽf nigin age fen bun, ereb ĩ age fen bunem, Negur ĩ madur bagai to fiyen de?
Õ, yogon momoiya ado yogon dõ fiya bagu de kabĩ dale di, yogon momoiya, ereb age fen anĩ bunem, kisi felen anĩ ulef.
Anĩ bunem, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok anĩ kisi felen, “Abraham Negur nigin momoi yen, age fe di, Negur Abraham madur bagai yen,” age ye fen, Negur Abraham nigin neu mou yen.
Anĩ bun, õ ulef, are tamo ĩ ereb age fef anĩ bunem, Negur ĩ nigin madur bagai yef, momoiya dogol bunem sã.
Age fiya bagai, Rahab naab kayau ĩg, kofo fiya tamo gei feid fen, naab taka bunem sur fedin anĩ bunem, Negur Rahab nigin to madur bagai fiyen de?
Bouwa uur sã are laa fef age fiya gen, momoiya dõ fiya sã are laa fef.
Turau tar, ã atun musei tise wowãya nigin to kisi gouf, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, amã tise kabĩ malef, totol bagai es famãf.
Ada ganan naab musei bun kuku taudig. Aib taka ĩ ereb yef bun to kũ fenẽf, ĩ tamo kisi feleya bagai, yogon bouwa ganan ulum iroukenẽya kisi feleya.
Ada hos sigorada dõ difouf nigin eweid bun ain tobega tanof are, ada hos bou ganan, sã gadi tafiyẽf.
Takag, waag bun kisi gouf. Idi odug bagai fen, yau totolem irouledig, anĩ ere, ulum irouya tamo narib ileya nigin, ulum naal bagai anim waag anĩ narib ileya orof nẽ irouledig.
Age fiya bagai, bouwada bun baleda are gai naal bagai, anĩ ere, ĩ, ereb odudug ĩ age fef nigin, yogo yana seli yabidig. Dub odug yã ninimam age fe di, uu yedig age fiya gen bagai kisi gouf.
Baledag ĩ yã, bouwada ganan atun sane nẽ teneub. Ĩ tamo oditekei bouwa ganan amuyẽ ifenẽdig, yogon mata ibodok ilauf ganan bun yã irãdig, age fe di, ĩg yogo hel bunem isaikalauf.
Gaar fire fire ganan, ninã, gaar luwedim diyõdig anĩ ado, maaĩwõ difaref are ganan, maman difiyẽdig nigin tamom maman difediyouf.
Anĩ ere, tamo takam bale maman fiya kisi feleya sã. Ĩ faimud sane fen, laa nẽ mũ sanem barikã.
Baledam ada neda Odug ado Tamada yana talesedig, age tafe fen, de anim tamo Negur yogo gen inodin anĩ gelu tafedidig.
Awada tekelei anĩ bun tamal, yana yaleseya ado gelu fiya wõ yedig. Turau tar, anĩ to agef ilauf bagai.
Maaĩ naan ado naan maug, warur tekelei bun tamal wõya kisi feleya de?
Turau tar, aa fig, aa oliv faat imaya kisi feleya de? Aa wain, aa fig faat imaya kisi feleya de? Age fiya gen, maaĩ naan, warur bun tamal, naan maug wõya kisi feleya sã.
Ã atun taka, kisi biya ado fen, kisi fokõ feleya adouf are, ĩ yogon tobonunã biya bunem, wau yukesileya kisi biya bunem isif anĩ bun, dõ fiya bunem anĩ yaorouf.
Anĩ ere, ã ãgenei wauĩ bun, kiyeĩ makik ado, aya aya yeya adouf are, ã yeneĩ to waleseg fen, aya kisi biya ado gouf. Ago gouf are, ã udegẽg fen, momoi nẽ od anĩ to dõ gouf.
Yeneĩ yaleseya nẽ kisi age fiya, saa ilunem to isif, anĩ ere, are tenebur tamal, bouwa nẽ oroya nẽ, Satan bun tamal.
Ere nigin, kiyeĩ ado aya aya yeya ibodok nẽ an, ekul fiya ado ereb ereb sane ganan ibodok.
Anĩ ere, kisi biya saa ilunem isif are, uyulil karẽtut, age fe di, maror nigin wau laa fiya, molol, abob karĩ fiyẽya, wau yũya barikã ado, faat biya yũya, anĩ kinau ya sã ado, mala yaleya sã.
Maur gudũ fiya tamo ĩ maror bun itenek, ĩ madur bagai anĩ kusu fedig.
Erem age fe di, kusĩya ado monẽya ã atun ibodok? Are ãgenei oroya ã namein kusĩ yedig anĩ bunem to wõ yedig de?
Ã ereb oroyeik, anĩ ere, to walegedig. Anĩ nigin, ã safineid adodo udenkesig fen, ereb ereb yalekenẽdiya nigin kisi gedig. Ã ereb oroyeik, anĩ ere, yaleya kisi feleya sã. Anĩ nigin, ã monẽg fen, kusĩ gedig. Ã to walegedig, ere nigin, ã Negur to, to wiyẽgedig.
Sain ã to gef bun, to walegedig, ere nigin, ã wauĩ bun tutuk sa ken, to gedig, ã ereb walegef are aug naumeĩ nigin ge fen, iraileya nigin ago gedig.
Ã gai de, tamo kayau seseirã dinodig gen! Ã tenebur nẽ oroya ado bagu gouf are, Negur kiwai wenẽgef anĩ ã keleĩ sã de? Taka ĩ tenebur nẽ oroya ado bagu fouf are, Negur nẽ kiwai tamo wõ youf.
Ã kisi gef, Negur nẽ Itotoya ĩ gariya sã, “Uur ada namedan ibodõf nigin inon anĩ kiyeĩ totol bagai ifenek,” yef de?
Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ wau ifenẽya mugi bagai ada ifanadadig. Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Negur ĩ, dogo yeneid dalesef anidi kiwai ifeneĩd fen, waud dukesil dibodok anidi wau ifenẽdidig.”
Age fiyauf are, aug Negur farumen ubodõgouf. Satan wal fiya nigin teĩbir gouf, ago ge di, ĩ ã folõ yeikalauf.
Negur wagen usig len, ĩ ã wagein isiyouf. Mosor adodo ã, imeĩ kulo gouf, kisi uru adodo ã, kisi tenebur ein nẽ oroya bun unogef anĩ utorõg fen, kisi ganan Negur bun dogol unogouf.
Wauĩ gudũf, maruĩ isi fen, inã walogouf. Kasãya utorõg fen, wauĩ gudũ fouf, wauĩ kulĩya utorõg fen, wauĩ morõf.
Odug mala bun wauĩ ukesileg, ago ge di, ĩ ã yalesneĩf.
Turau tar, ã abob, õ sane to wiyẽg. Taka ĩ, tura, õ sane fiyek be, es fiyek, ĩ lo are sane ye fen, lo es fiyek. Ã lo es wiyẽgouf are, ã lo dõ fiya tamo sã, anĩ ere, ã lo nẽ marau gen wowãg fen, ã aug tamo es wiyẽgedif.
Lo ifenẽya ado es fiya tamo, de tekelei dogol ibodok, ĩ yogo kel yaleya ado daũ feleya kisi feleya. Anĩ ere, ã ere anĩ neĩ tã es wiyẽgouf?
Gama karĩ gouf, õ aib urõgedig, “Gama be nil, amã fau taun enei be anĩ bun mele, an yar tekelei mabod, bisnis mano fen, moni malouf,” gedig.
Anĩ ere, ãgenei mata are nil naig fe ilauf anĩ, ã keleĩ sã. Ãgenei mata are ere? Ã ogou sain naal bagai wõ ye fen, iwaikeledig gen.
Anĩ nigin, ã eig gouf, “Odug orouf are, amã mabod ken, enei be anĩ age mafouf,” gouf.
Anĩ ere, ã agog wauĩ fã ye di, yeneĩ walesegedig. Yana yaleseya age fediya ganan are sane.
Age fiya nigin, taka ĩ biya nigin kelei ken, age fiya kisi feleya anĩ to age fouf, ĩ mosor inouf.
Gama karĩ weleg, ã safina musei adodo, morõ odug ã bun isif anĩ nigin maruĩ isi fen, inã walogouf.
Ãgenei safineĩ bura le di, dedek ãgenei kolos dakasin.
Ãgenei gol ado silwa maat te yun. Dogo neid maat te anim, ã nigin kiwai od wogõ ye fen, yã nem gen ãgenei bouweĩ yakasiyouf. Ã gamag idikeleya sain mog, safina kuru gen.
Ulegef! Kabĩ tamo ãgenei kabier kusu fiya nigin oroi dilen anĩ to na waledigen nigin, na yaleya nẽ wareg ã to wenẽdigen anim, ã nigin kaĩ ye fen, iron. Age dife di, oroi tamo aiteid, Odug saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri feid uyu iroudig anĩ, wederen ilen.
Ã tenebur ein ereb ereb biyai biyai ado ubodõg fen, bouweĩ sigigi gen. Ã idenkesiya nẽ naa nigin bouweĩ gigiru unogen.
Ã, idi mosor sã, kiwai to difenein anidi, bouweid ũg fen, udenkesigen.
Anĩ nigin, turau tar, to fese gef uleg, Odug nẽ isiya sain wõ youf. Saaf kabĩ yaleya tamo, teneub bun saaf biya bagai wõ youf nigin, naig fe tarif fen, uyẽ uruwan isif ile idikeledig anĩ atun, naig fe feseya sã tarif fen, kabĩ yaledig anĩ uleg.
Ãg, to feseg fen, totol ufaragauf, ere nigin, Odug isiya nẽ naa are mogo melsak.
Turau tar, abob to nauseir wiyẽg, abob nauseir wiyẽgouf are, es fiya ã bun isiyouf. Es fiya tamo mogo bobogẽ ifaref!
Turau tar, profet Odug nẽ yana bun wogõ den anidi, darau bun feseya sã difaren gen ãg ago gouf.
Ã keleĩ, ada idi feseya sã difaren anidi el fedif taudig. Ã Job naig fe feseya sã ifaren anĩ karĩg fen, dum Odug ĩ bun ereb naig fen are ulegen. Age fiya gen, Odug ĩ wau ifenẽya ado wau yũya barikã.
Anĩ ganan wal fiya, turau tar, ã wauĩ kuturol fen, saa ilun bunem, tenebur bunem be, ereb taka bunem od to megeir wogouf. Ãgenei yoya are de yo dogol gouf, ãgenei sãya are de sã dogol gouf. To dõ gouf are, es fiya bun ufaragauf.
Ã atun taka ĩ morõ bun ibodok de? Age fouf, ĩ kosẽ youf bagai. Ã atun taka wau al fef de? Age fouf, ĩ yana yaleseya nẽ seg yalediyouf.
Ã atun taka dagi ado de? Age fouf, ĩ sios nẽ mudur adodo ĩ nigin kosẽ de fen, Odug yana bun ĩ mudur bun moul fi difalauf nigin iwegnẽdiyouf bagai.
Age fe di, momoiya bunem kosẽ def anim dagi tamo el fiyẽdig. Odug ĩ yalesnẽf. Ĩ mosor inon ouf are, in mosor nigin weder tu kalauf.
Anĩ nigin, ãgenei mosor nigin abob mala bun kurõ wesig fen, abob nigin kosẽ ge di, ã karika walogouf. Madur tamo nẽ kosẽya are megeir ado fen, kabĩ yaledig.
Eliya ĩ tamo ada gen taka. Ĩ uyẽ to isiyouf nigin totol bagai kosẽ ye di, tenebur ein yar towo ogõ sigis uyẽ to isin.
Ĩ baban kosẽ ye di, saa ilunem uyẽ isin, age fe di, tenebur nẽ saaf wowã yen.
Turau tar, ã atun taka, momoi nẽ naab kũ fen ken, fasikor fel, meteig ile di, takam ĩ momoi nẽ naab bun kel irousiyouf are,
enei karĩ gouf, aibem taka ĩ mosor tamo yogon kũ fenẽya nẽ delẽ bun tamal falei fiyek are, yogon malakanon laa bun tamal kel yale fen, mosor musei ganan nigin weder tu keleya anĩ irou isif.
Aya Pita, Jesus Kristus nẽ aposel, Negur igirnẽdin anidi, tenebur ein yaũ tamo gen Pontus, Galesia, Kapadosia, Asia ado, Bitinia provins firagagaũ de difaref anidi bun pas enei atotof.
Ã, ereb wõya sã mog, Negur Tamada nẽ keleĩ biya kilei igirneĩ di, Awa Uur nẽ kabĩ bunem fateul wõ gen, anĩ bunem, ã Jesus Kristus sigor dõg fen, yogon naud ã tetein wiri fen. Wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya ã bun barikãf.
Negur, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ Tama yana talesauf! Yogon wau yũya odug bun, Negur ĩ Jesus Kristus laa bun tamal kel fã yen bunem, ada mata gõ fadan, are ada mata ibodõya wau iseya bun tele fen,
yogon akor, inanakeleya, bura leya be, sa keleya kisi feleya sã, ã nigin saa ilun dodok fen anĩ bun talauf nigin age fen.
Momoiya bunem, ã Negur nẽ megeir anim kulatun yeik ile, kel yaleya, idikeleya sain bun yaor fouf nigin dodok fef anĩ, isiyouf.
Anĩ nigin, gama sain naal bagai, ã morõ fire fire anĩ bun wauĩ morõ yeĩdigeg, ã fatuk bagai wauĩ kulĩ yef.
Morõ eneidi ã bun isin are, ãgenei momoiya, gol yã nem difalegefeg, sa keledig anĩ wal fiya wõ ye fen, ãgenei momoiya anĩ, momoiya bagai yaore di, Jesus Kristus wõ youf sain bun, yana ifenẽya, fula fiya medeĩya ado, yana yaleseya walogouf nigin agef isin.
Ã ĩ to ulegen, anĩ ere, ã ĩ nigin wauĩ laa fef. Ã gama ĩ to ulegef, anĩ ere, ã ĩ nigin momoi ge fen, wauĩ kulĩya dir feleya kisi feleya sã ado fula fiya medeĩya anim aura yeik,
ere nigin, ã ãgenei momoiya nẽ kaũ, ãgenei meleĩkanon kel yaleya anĩ mogo walegef.
Kel yaleya enei nigin, profet idi wau ifenẽya ã bun isin anĩ nigin wogõ den anidi, fatuk bagai el de dimir ken,
Kristus nẽ Uur idi bun ibodon anĩ, Kristus nẽ darau ado anĩ dumen isiyouf nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin profet od wogõ yen sain bun, ĩ ere nigin ado ereb sain nigin wogõ yen anĩ, idi keleĩ youf nigin age difen.
Awa Uur Fateul saa ilunem sur fen anĩ bunem, soosi tamo idi biya od wogõ diyein anim ereb wogõ diyein, are engeleg dilouf nigin totol bagai orodif anĩ nigin, profet idi wogõ den sain bun, idi dogo nigin sã, ã nigin aruna dalen anĩ, idi bun yaor fen.
Anĩ nigin, dõ fiya nigin ãgenei kisi dodok gouf. Ã aug nigin biya kulatun gouf. Jesus Kristus yaor fouf sain bun, wau ifenẽya ifeneĩf anĩ nigin ãgenei wauĩ iseya barikãf.
Gere tar dõ fiya biya gen, sain ã neneya bun ubodõg fen, oroya sane ã walegen anĩ to dõ gouf.
Anĩ ere, Negur ã iweignein, ĩ fateul ibodok gen, ereb ã ago gef ganan bun fateul ubodõgouf,
ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Fateul ubodõg, ere nigin, aya fateul abodok.”
Ã, Dei anĩ kinau ya bunem tamo mugu mugu nẽ kabĩ to es fedig ĩ, uweignẽgef, anĩ nigin, ã tenebur ein yaũ tamo gen, kumĩ ado aniniya anĩ bun, ãgenei mata ubodõgouf.
Ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã, mata ibodõya kaũ sã, tubuĩ tar bunem walegen anĩ bun tamal kel yaleyein, are silwa be gol age fediya gen, ereb bura lauf anĩ bunem sã,
anĩ ere, Kristus, sipsip naal amuyẽ sã, gerĩ tõ fiya taka sã anĩ nẽ naud biya bagai anĩ bunem kel yaleyein.
Negur ereb ereb ganan kare fiya sã mog, ĩ igirnen, anĩ ere, ã nigin idikeleya sain enei bun ĩ yaor fen.
Kristus bunem, ã, Negur Kristus laa bun tamal kel turĩ fiye ken, fula fiya medeĩya ifenen ĩ nigin momoi gen, anĩ nigin, ãgenei momoiya ado wauĩ iseya Negur bun ibodok.
Ã gama momoi anĩ dõ fiya bunem, aug nigin lilik ge fen, tureĩ tar nigin wauĩ laa fiya bagai walegen nigin, abob nigin fatuk bagai wauĩ bun wauĩ laa fouf.
Ere nigin, ã bura leya nẽ faat bunem sã, to bura leya nẽ faat bunem baban gõ yein, are Negur nẽ od mata ibod ken, faimud ibodkeleya anĩ bunem age fen.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Tamo ganan fisir gen, agef fen, dogo neid fula fiya medeĩya ganan kabier odõ munĩ gen. Fisir gariri keleid fen, munĩ kuku redig,
anĩ ere, Odug nẽ od faimud ibodkalauf.” Od enei are ã wogõ yein.
Anĩ nigin, sane ganan, idegẽya ganan, mala yaleya, kiyeĩ ado, dumen od irõya ganan urailagauf.
Momou mata gõ fediya gen, uur nẽ sumin karẽtut nigin fatuk bagai oroyeĩf, ago ge di, ã anĩ bunem ãgenei kel yaleya bun odugouf.
Gama ã, Odug ĩ biya yeya anĩ, mogo wõg ulegen.
Ã, ĩ mata ibodõya Meein, tamom dudum difiyen, anĩ ere, Negurem igirne ken, Negur mala bun biya bagai wõ yen anĩ bun usig fen,
ãg, mata ibodõya meein gen, uur nẽ fõ inoyeĩ di, pris fateul wõg fen, Jesus Kristus bunem uur nẽ sesewi fiya Negur mala bun biya anĩ wenẽdigouf.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Lo weleg, aya Saion oun meein taka, monog tor aya agirnen, biya bagai anĩ anof, age afe di, taka ĩ, ĩ nigin momoi yef, ĩ mama to bagai yalouf.”
Momoi gef ã bun, meein enei are biya bagai. Anĩ ere, idi to momoi def anidi bun, “Meein fõ inoya tamom sane de fen, ditoron anĩ, gama monog tor wõ yen.”
Agef fen, “Ĩ, tamo yeid tũ fiya nẽ meein wõ ye fen, idi kuku douf nẽ sa tuwa anĩ wõ yen.” Idi yeid tũ fef, ere nigin, idi od anĩ to dõ difef, areg Negurem idi age difouf nigin igirin.
Anĩ ere, ã tamo kayau Negurem igirnein, king nẽ pris, teneub fateul, Negur nẽ tamo kayau wowã gen, are ĩ ã gugum bun tamal iweignei ken, yogon lalan biya bagai bun irouleyein anĩ nẽ yana, ã walesagauf nigin, agog wõ gen.
Uruwa bun, ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau sã, anĩ ere, gama ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau. Uruwa bun, ã wau yũya to walegen, anĩ ere, gama ã mogo wau yũya anĩ walegen.
Turau tar oboiyou, aya ã tenebur ein yaũ tamo ado urug tamo gen anĩ, mosor nẽ oroya meleĩkanon geid kusĩ yedig anĩ so wiyẽgouf nigin, totol bagai arokeneik.
Ã haiden atun tobonuneĩ biya bagai bun ubodõge di, idi ã nigin sane ago gedig dedig anidi, ãgenei tobonuneĩ biya anĩ dile fen, Negur ada ki fadauf sain bun, idi Negur yana dalesauf.
Ã aug Odug nigin ge fen, megeir ganan tamo atun inodin anĩ farumen ubodõgouf, are king megeir ilun bagai ĩ farumen be,
gawaman nẽ mudur adodo idi, tamo sane age difef anidi darau difenẽdiyouf nigin ado, tamo tutuk age difef anidi yeneid dalesauf nigin, Negurem sur fedif anidi farumen ubodõgouf.
Ere nigin, ã ereb biya ago gef bunem, kisi neneya tamo neid neneya wogõya anĩ foro dalauf, are Negur nẽ oroya.
Tamo kafĩ fiya sã ubodõgouf, anĩ ere, ãgenei kafĩ fiya sã anĩ sane kerub fiya nẽ kabĩ bun to unogouf. Negur nẽ ferfer ubodõgouf.
Tamo ganan anini wiyẽdigouf. Momoiya tureĩ tar nigin wauĩ laa fouf. Negur kumĩ ado anini wiyẽgouf. Agog fen, king anini wiyẽgouf.
Ferfer ã, aniniya ganan ado ãgenei odudug farumen ubodõgouf, idi biya fen, waud yũdig anidi dogol farumen sã, idi wau morõ difeneĩdig anidig farumen ubodõgouf.
Ere nigin, tamo taka ĩ gariya sã darau yalef sain bun, ĩ Negur nigin kisif fen, darau nẽ morõ anĩ faali fouf, are biya.
Anĩ ere, ã mosor unogen nigin wagĩ fiya waleg fen, morõ faali gouf are, ã bun ere biya anĩ isiyouf? Anĩ ere, ã ereb biya ago gen nigin darau waleg fen, anĩ faali gouf are, enei are Negur mala bun biya.
Enei bun ã iweignein, ere nigin, Kristus ã nigin darau yalen, are ãg ĩ uleg fen, yogon delẽ anĩ dõ gouf nigin age fen.
“Ĩ mosor taka to inon, age fe di, yogon sigor bun idegẽya taka to dilen.”
Sain idi ĩ kono difiyen, ĩ idi to solo fedin. Sain ĩ darau yalen, ĩ kumĩ to ifenẽdin. Age fiya ban, ĩ yogo Negur tutuk es fedig ĩ ima bun inon.
Neda mosor ĩ yogo bouwam aa tetek bun faali fen, are ada mosor bun gare tau fen, madur bagai bun mata tabodõf nigin age fen. Yogon gudũ fiyam ã el yein.
Ã sipsip gen fõ yeleyan ulegen, anĩ ere, gama ã sipsip marau, ãgenei meleĩkanon nẽ lo fiya tamo bun keg usigen.
Kayau ã, age fiya bagai, aiweĩ tar farumen ubodõgouf, ago ge di, aib idi biya od nigin to momoi defeg, idi irokenẽdiya bunem sã, nedi kayau tar neid tobonuneid bunem kel yalediyouf,
are idi ãgenei tobonuneĩ karẽtut ado aniniya anĩ dile fen, momoi douf.
Ãgenei meli meli, mayarẽ naki anĩ, fatiya korif ifõya, gol sai ifonũya be, kolos biya ifonũya age fediya bunem to isiyouf.
Age fiya ban, ãgenei meli meli, ã namein uur molol ado imatẽya anĩ nẽ meli meli to inanakalauf, are Negur mala bun odug bagai anĩ bunem isiyouf.
Naab enei bun, fateul kayau kulu temeleid idi, Negur bun waud dinon anidig, dogo nigin meli bagai wowã douf nigin age difedig. Idi dogo neid aiweid tar farumen dibodõdig.
Sara ĩ Abraham sigor dõf fen, ĩ nigin yogon odug yedig gen, ã ereb madur agog fen, kumĩ farumen to ubodõgouf are, ã ne barai tar wowã gef.
Tamo ãg, age fiya bagai, aiweĩ tar geid ubodõg fen, idi nigin kisi gouf, are idi forõya nigin tamo wal fiya sã, idi dum mata ibodõya nẽ ege luwa wau ifenẽya, ã weim walogouf nigin, aniniya ado ago wiyẽdigouf, ago ge di, ãgenei kosẽya, ereb takam to naabura gudũ fouf.
Od idĩya nigin, ã ganan abob geid wauĩ tekelei bun ubodõgouf. Abob nigin wauĩ ũgouf. Tureĩ tar gen abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf. Wauĩ yũya ado wauĩ yukesileya bun ubodõgouf.
Sane anĩ sane bunem be, kono fiya anĩ kono fiya bunem to solo gouf, anĩ ere, el fiya bunem solo gouf, ere nigin, ã ago ge di, el fiya anĩ walogouf nigin, ã enei bun iweignein.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Aib ĩ mata nigin wau laaf fen, naa biya ilouf, ĩ yogo bale sane wogõya bun tamal so fiye ken, yogon sigor idegẽya wogõya bun tamal so fiyẽf bagai.
Ĩ sane itor ken, biya age fouf bagai. Ĩ maror imir ken, anĩ dõ fouf bagai.
Ere nigin, Odug nẽ malam tamo madur bagai lo fedidig, agef fen, yogon weder dogo neid kosẽya anĩ karĩ yedig. Anĩ ere, Odug nẽ nawa, idi sane age difef anidi bun dudum fiyẽdidig.”
Ã biya age fiya nigin kabĩ totol walogouf are, aim anĩ ã sane yeĩf?
Anĩ ere, ã ereb madur nigin darau walogoufeg, ã el yeik. “Ereb idi kumĩ def anĩ to kumĩg, to morõ yeĩf.”
Anĩ ere, ãgenei wauĩ bun Kristus ĩ Odug unogouf. Idi wauĩ iseya ã namein ibodok anĩ nẽ gariya karĩ douf nigin to diyeik anidi ganan solog urokenẽdigouf nigin, faimud dodok gouf. Anĩ ere, molol ado aniniya bunem enei agog fen,
kisi karẽtut walogouf, ago ge di, idi Kristus bun ãgenei tobonuneĩ biya nigin od sane wogõ def anidi, dogo neid dumen od wogõya nigin mama fediyouf.
Biya age fiya nigin darau yaleya, are Negur nẽ oroyauf, enei are, sane age fiya nigin darau yaleya anĩ wal fiya, are biya bagai youf.
Kristus ĩ, sain tekelei dogol, mosor nigin laa fen, ĩ madur tamo anĩ, idi madur sã tamo nigin laa fen, are ĩ, ã Negur bun irouleyeĩf nigin age fen. Ĩ bouwa dukesin, anĩ ere, Awa Uur bunem mata ibodon.
Awa Uur bunemeg ĩ ile fen, uur kalabus bun dibodon anidig wogõ fiyẽdin.
Eneidi are, kulu Noa nẽ sain bun, waag ifot mog, Negur idi nigin feseya sã tari fedidig, anĩ ere, idi fe den. Waag anĩ namen, tamo kayau musei sã, ganan eit dogol naan bunem kel yaledin.
Naan enei are, naan igũya, gama Jesus Kristus nẽ mata kel fãya bunem ãg kel yaleyeik anĩ nẽ malakanon, are bouwa bun amuyẽ yaleleya sã, are Negur bun kisi karẽtut biya inoya.
Jesus Kristus ĩ saa ilun isel fen, Negur ima biyalẽ ibodok, age fe di, engel, yeneid adodo ado, megeir ganan ĩ farumen dibodok.
Anĩ nigin, Kristus ĩ yogo bouwa bun darau yalen nigin, ã augeg yogon kisi de tekelei anĩ urougauf, ere nigin, taka ĩ yogo bouwa bun darau yalen, ĩ mosor inoya nigin folõ felen.
Agef fen, ĩ tenebur ein yogon mata ibodõya fau ibodok bun, tamo bouwa nẽ oroya nigin to mata ibodõf, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ oroya nigin mata ibodõf.
Ã kulu sain meluk bagai, ereb haiden age difedig anĩ, ago gedig, idi bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya, noli kisi, aai yõya, bilãya, mala odug bun naan yõya ado, idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya sane bagai bun dibodõdig.
Ã idi geid, idi sane bagai age difedig anĩ bun to ulege di, idi anĩ dile fen, terẽ def, age de fen, idi ã nigin od sane wogõ def.
Anĩ ere, idi, Negur idi mata dibodok anidi ado idi gare den anidi es fediyouf nigin dodok fef ĩ bun, dogo nigin kurõ difeis dirokenẽf.
Enei nigin, biya od anĩ, idi gama mogo gare den anidig wogõ fiyẽdin, are idi bouweid bun, tamo gen es feid fen, dogo neid uur bun, Negur mata ibodok gen mata dibodõf nigin age fen.
Ereb ereb ganan nẽ idikeleya naa mogo melsak. Anĩ nigin, ã kosẽ gouf nigin, kisi el ge waleg fen, aug nigin biya kulatun gouf.
Anĩ ganan wal fiya, abob nigin fatuk bagai wauĩ laa fouf, ere nigin, wau laa fiya are mosor musei kerub fedidig.
Nauseirya sã, abob el ge waledigouf.
Ã mugu mugu, Negur bunem ege luwa walegen anĩ bunem, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya fire fire nẽ lo fiya tamo dõ fiya biya gen, abob aruna walogouf.
Aib taka ĩ od wogõ yef, ĩ Negur nẽ od bagai wogõya gen wogõ youf. Aib taka ĩ aruna yalef, ĩ megeir Negur ĩ ifenek anĩ bunem age fouf, are ereb ereb ganan bun, Jesus Kristus bunem, Negur yana dalesauf nigin age fouf. Ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya ado megeir gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
Turau tar oboiyou, ã darau yã isaĩneĩ geneg gama walegef anĩ nigin, ereb urug ã bun wõya gen to terẽ gouf.
Anĩ ere, ã Kristus geid darau walegef nigin wauĩ kulĩ youf, ago ge di, ã yogon fula fiya medeĩya anĩ yaor fouf sain bun, wauĩ fatuk bagai kulĩ youf.
Ã Kristus yana nigin de fen, kono diyeĩf, ã el yeik, ere nigin, fula fiya medeĩya nẽ Awa Uur, are Negur nẽ anĩ ã bun ibodok.
Ã darau walogouf, are tamo yukesiya tamo, bẽ tamo, tamo tobonunã sane fire fire dinodig be, baula fiya tamo, nedi darau gen sãf.
Age fiya ban, ã momoiya tamo nigin darau walogouf are, ã to mama yeĩ, anĩ ere, ã Negur yana anĩ urougef nigin ĩ yana walesagauf.
Ere nigin, sain eĩ, Negur nẽ ibor bun, es fiya gariya inoya nẽ. Es fiya anĩ ada bun gariya inof are, idi Negur nẽ biya od to dõ difedig anidi bun ere anĩ wõ youf?
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Madur tamo kel yalediya nigin malai bagai youf are, tamo momoiya sã ado mosor temeleid nigin ere anĩ wõ youf?”
Anĩ nigin, idi Negur nẽ oroya bunem darau dalef anidi, idi dogo, Negur kare fedin yogon od dõ fiya biya, ĩ ima bun dino fen, toku ereb biya anĩ age difef dilauf.
Sios nẽ uyu irouya ã atun dibodok bun, aya, uyu irouya tureĩ, Kristus nẽ darau ail fen, kurõ afesidig ado, fula fiya medeĩya fau yaor fouf weim talouf anĩ, ã arokeneik.
Negur nẽ sipsip ã farumen dibodok anĩ nẽ lo fiya tamo wõg fen, kabĩ mala nigin ge fen to lo wedigouf, anĩ ere, ã wauĩ iro ken, Negur ã ago gouf nigin orof kilei lo wedigouf. Moni nigin ge fen, to ago gouf, anĩ ere, aruneid yaleya nigin bagai fen, ago gouf.
Idi ã gem lo wedigouf nigin inodin anidi to nugo wiyẽdigouf, anĩ ere, ã sipsip dileyei ken, dõ diyeĩf nẽ tobonuneĩ bun ago gouf.
Agog mog, sipsip lo fiya tamo neid mudur wõ youf sain bun, ã fula fiya medeĩya nẽ teter to bagai tu ralauf anĩ walogouf.
Age fiya bagai, kesu oosi ã, biyeid uyu irouya farumen ubodõgouf. Ã ganan, abob nigin wauĩ yukesileya anĩ ufonũgouf, ere nigin, “Negur ĩ yeneid dalesef anidi kiwai gen iledidig, anĩ ere, ĩ waud yukesileya anidi wau ifenẽdidig.”
Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ ima megeir barikã farumen wauĩ ukalaisileg ubodõgouf, ago ge di, ĩ ã yogon sain bun yalesneĩf.
Ãgenei suwẽya ganan ĩ bun unogouf, ere nigin, ĩ ã nigin suwẽ yedig.
Ã aug nigin biya kulatun ubodõg fen, lo walagauf. Ãgenei kiwai, Satan ĩ laion ninirã ye fen, taka yakasiyouf nigin mumul katĩ fedig gen, age fedig.
Momoiya bun totol ufareg fen, ĩ wal fiya nigin teĩbir gouf, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã tureĩ tar teneub ganan bun, darau de tekelei age fiya anĩ daledig.
Ago ge di, wau ifenẽya ganan nẽ Negur ĩ, ã Kristus bun, yogon fula fiya medeĩya faimud ibodkeleya bun iweignein ĩ, ã sain naal darau walege di, ĩ yogo baban yalesnei ken, ã kisi feleya bagai totol, megeir ado, feseya sã wõya nigin age fouf.
Ĩ bun megeir gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
Sailas, ĩ aya turau dõ fiya biya gen kisi afedig, in isennẽya bunem, aya ã tobega bagai atotkenein, anĩ bunem, aya ã wauĩ ales fen, enei ã gama walegef anĩ momoi bagai Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya au fen, kurõ afesin. Anĩ bun totol ufaragauf.
Sios Babilon ibodok, ĩ ã geid weim igirnein, ĩ ã bun yogon aanya sur fef, age fe di, neu kesu Mak ĩg age fef.
Wauĩ laa fiya bunem, abob umã wiyẽg fen, aan gouf. Ã Kristus bun ufaregef anĩ ganan bun, wau inosiya ibodõf.
Aya Simon Pita, Jesus Kristus nẽ ferfer fen aposel, idi neda Negur ado Isennadaya, Jesus Kristus nẽ madur bagai bunem momoiya meli bagai neda gen dalen anidi bun, pas enei atotof.
Ã, Negur ado neda Odug Jesus nigin keleĩ bunem, wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya ã bun barikãf.
Negur ĩ yogon fula fiya medeĩya ado biya bunem iweignadan, ada ĩ nigin keleĩ bunem, ada Negur nẽ oroya bun mata tabodõf nigin, ereb lau tafef anĩ ganan yogon megeir anim ifanadan.
Enei bunem, ĩ ada yogon promis od, odug fen meli bagai andi ifanadan, are anĩ bunem ã Negur nẽ tobonunã bun bagai ufareg fen, bouwa nẽ oroya sanem teneub ganan daũ fen anĩ utorõgouf nigin age fen.
Age fiya nigin, ãgenei momoiya bun, biya anĩ tobol fiya nigin kabĩ totol walogouf, agog fen, biya bun, keleĩ tobol fiya nigin,
agog fen, keleĩ bun, aug nigin biya kulatun ibodõya tobol fiya nigin, agog fen, aug nigin biya kulatun ibodõya bun, feseya sã ifareya tobol fiya nigin, agog fen, feseya sã ifareya bun, Negur nẽ oroya bun ibodõya tobol fiya nigin,
agog fen, Negur nẽ oroya bun ibodõya bun, abob geid nigal yũya tobol fiya nigin, agog fen, abob geid nigal yũya bun, wau laa fiya tobol fiya nigin kabĩ totol walogouf.
Ere nigin, ã tobonunã enei ganan waleg fen, tobol gouf are, ã neda Odug Jesus Kristus nigin keleĩ yaleya bun kabĩ biya kaũ ado walogouf.
Anĩ ere, taka ĩ eneidi taka to yalouf, ĩ melsã nigin dogol ileya kisi feleya fen, mala ifofakeleya, agef fen, ĩ yogon mosor kulu tamal bun tamal lilik fiyekelen anĩ weder tu kelen.
Anĩ nigin, turau tar, Negurem ã iweignei ken, igirnein anĩ tutuk bagai keleĩ youf nigin, kabĩ totol walogouf. Ere nigin, ã enei ago gouf are, ã to bagai kubũ gouf.
Ago ge di, ã, neda Odug fen Isennadaya, Jesus Kristus nẽ tano mata gai ibodkeleya bun, ileya nigin lakĩ fiya taka to ibodõf.
Anĩ nigin, ã enei nigin kelei ken, momoiya ã gama ado anĩ bun totol ufaregef, anĩ ere, aya enei nigin kisi gouf nigin, faimud wedereĩ fokõ afouf.
Aya kisi afef, aya bouwau enei nẽ salafat bun abod mog, ãgenei kisi turĩ afouf, are tutuk,
ere nigin, aya mogo, neda Odug Jesus Kristus kurõ feis irokanan nigin, aya keleĩ, aya mogo melsã yerin awaikalauf.
Anĩ nigin, aya ã atorneĩ mog, ã faimud enei karĩ walagauf nigin kabĩ totol alouf.
Amã, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ megeir ado isiya nigin ã marokenein sain are, amã nemã kisim tamo nẽ nenerĩ anĩ to wogõ mayein, anĩ ere, amã malamam bagai yogon fula fiya medeĩya nẽ megeir mailen anĩ wogõ maun.
Ait are Negur fula fiya medeĩya megeir ado bunem ĩ bun isi fen, iron, “Eĩ neu Kesu, ĩ nigin aya wau laa fedig, ĩ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig,” sain anĩ bun, ĩ, Tama Negur bunem, yana odug ado fula fiya medeĩya yalen.
Amã ĩ geid arei fateul bun mafar mog, ait enei saa ilunem isi mog, amã mug bagai karĩ maun.
Agef fen, ada, profet neid od are momoi anĩ, megeir tafe, momoi tauf, are lalan gugum modoũ bun, we fef ile, we kasasa fe fen, bonimei nẽ barisa wauĩ bun fã youf gen, ã profet neid od karĩ weleg fen, el ge dõ gouf are, ã biya ubodõgouf.
Ereb odug bagai are eig fiya, ã keleĩ youf, Negur nẽ Itotoya nẽ profet od taka, tamo nẽ kisim to faded fouf.
Ere nigin, profet od, tamo nẽ oroya bunem to wogõ den, anĩ ere, tamo Awa Uur Fateulem ulum iroukenẽdi di, Negur bun tamal od dale fen, wogõ den.
Anĩ ere, tamo kayau atun idegẽya profeteg difaren, age fiya gen, ã atun idegẽya tiseg dibodõf. Idi fau tamo kayau daũ fediya nẽ idegẽya od anĩ iminẽyan difelneĩf, Odug na yaledin ĩ anĩ wa de fen, idi dogo bun kaisã bagai daũ feidleya anĩ dinouf.
Musei dogo neid tobonuneid sane dõ de fen, momoi nẽ naab are naabura gudũ difouf.
Dogo naumeid nigin, tise eneidi nenerĩ dogo neid kisim wogõ diyei ken, safineĩ gei difouf. Negur idi mogo es fedin, agef fen, idi daũ fediya nẽ are mogo isiyouf.
Negur ĩ engel mosor dino di, to isenneĩd fen, hel bun sur fiyẽdin, dumen es fediyouf nigin ku gugum keleya bun inenẽdin.
Negur ĩ kulu tenebur nẽ tamo kayau to isenneĩd fen, tamo kayau idi Negur nẽ to difaren anidi bun kuwei sur fen, anĩ ere, ĩ, Noa madur bagai nigin wogõya tamo ado, sewen anidi geid ahaha fedin.
Negur ĩ, Sodom taun ado Gomora taun, yam yakur feid aasu ileya bunem daũ feidlen, are tamo kayau Negur nẽ to difaref anidi bun, ereb wõ youf anĩ ifelnẽdiyouf nigin age fen.
Negur ĩ, Lot madur tamo, tamo lo to dõ difedig anidi neid tobonuneid sane nigin wau morõdig ĩ ahaha fiyen
(ere nigin, madur tamo are, naa ganan bun, idi atun ibod ken, tobonuneid sane ilen ado karĩ yen anĩ bunem, yogon malakanon madur anĩ darau yalen).
Age fiyauf are, Odug ĩ naig fe fen, tamo Negur nẽ dibodok anidi, morõ bun tamal yalelneĩd fen, tamo Negur nẽ to dibodok anidi, darau bun irounẽdif ile, es fiya nẽ naa bun ileya nigin anĩ keleĩ.
Negur ĩ, idi bouwa nẽ oroya sane dõ de fen, Odug nẽ yana lai difedig anidi bun, momoi bagai age fouf. Idi kumĩ sã ado, dogo yeneid dalesedig. Idi, engel megeir adodo nigin bou yũya od wogõya nigin to kumĩ dedig.
Anĩ ere, engeleg dogo neid totol ado megeir odug bagai nigin tamo eneidi wal fediya, Odug mala bun, engel megeir adodo age fediya nigin bou yũya od to wogõ dedig.
Anĩ ere, tamo eneidi, ereb idi keleĩ sã nigin kono difedig. Idi gaar kuĩ kisi sã, bouwa nẽ oroya dogol dõ dife di, tamom kaka difeid fen, didenkesiyouf nigin dogol gõ difedidig anidi gen. Gaar kuĩ gen, idig daũ fediyouf.
Idi sane age difen kilei, mala solo sane dalouf. Idi gaa atun bouwa nẽ oroya sigigi fiya nigin orodidig. Idi amuyẽ ado gerĩ tõ fiya. Idi ã geid sifa dino fen, nedi bouweid nẽ oroya sigigi difedig.
Idi meleid bun seseirã tobonunã barikã ado fen, mosor inoya nigin to bagai ditorõdig. Idi, tamo kayau totol sã difaref anidi, didĩ difedidig. Idi safina musei youf nigin imeid su lai de fen sũ we fiya nigin keleĩ bagai. Idi daũ feidleya nẽ gere tar.
Idi naab madur anĩ ditor ken, Beor naal, Balam ĩ sane nẽ mala solo nigin wau laa fedig anĩ nẽ naab dõ difouf nigin fasis difen.
Anĩ ere, ĩ donki, gaar kuĩ wogõya kisi feleya sã anim, yogon kũ fenẽya nigin ou fiyen, donki ĩ tamo nẽ ait nem wogõ ye fen, profet anĩ nẽ neneya kisi katũ fiyen.
Tamo eneidi, naan warur gere keleya gen ado, ogou uyẽ yau totol ado bunem irou isidig gen. Modoũ gugum keleya bagai anĩ, idi nigin saia fen.
Idi yana yaleseya od kaũ sã wogõ de fen, tamo kayau idi kũ fenẽya bun dibodok anidi bun tamal, mogo diyawof anidi, bouwa nẽ oroya, noli nigin kisi fãya bunem didĩ difedidig.
Tamo sane eneidi, tamo kayau karika ibodõya mafeneĩf de dirokenẽdidig, anĩ ere, idi dogo sane nẽ ferfer, ere nigin, tamo ĩ, ereb ĩ wal fiyek anĩ nẽ ferfer.
Idi, neda Odug ado Isennadaya, Jesus Kristus kelei ken, tenebur nẽ sane bun tamal soso dife di, baban tenebur nẽ sanem fili feid fen, wal fediyouf are, idi gariya bun sane dibodon anĩ wal fiya, idikeleya bun sane bagai dibodõf.
Idi madur bagai nẽ naab anĩ kelei ken, ĩtãfiya fateul idi imeid bun dinon anĩ dudum difem are, idi madur bagai nẽ naab anĩ to keleim, are dem.
Od biya tamo kayau wogõ dedig are, idi nigin momoi, “Gaũ yogon iluf anĩ kel yõdig,” takag, “Bor naan igu kel fen, baban ile ed igũdig.”
Turau tar oboiyou, eĩ neu pas baban ã bun sur afef. Aya pas uru enei atotodin are, kisi biya turĩ akeneĩ di, wedereĩ fokõ youf nigin age afen.
Aya, od profet fateul kulu wogõ den ado, ĩtãfiya neda Odug ado Isennadaya, ãgenei aposel bunem ifenein anĩ, ã karĩ walagauf nigin orouf.
Ã uyulil enei keleĩ youf, idikeleya naa bun, kono temeleid disiyouf, idi disi, kono de fen, dogo neid oroya sane dõ difouf.
Idi dirõf, “Ĩ asiyouf yen promis od anĩ nain? Amã nemã tamamã tar gare den bunem isif, ereb ereb ganan uruwa bun kare fen gen, agef yenek.”
Anĩ ere, idi, kulu bagai Negur nẽ od bunem saa wõ ye fen, teneub naan bun tamal ado naan nem kare fen anĩ, karĩ del fen, wedereid tu kelen.
Naan anim, kuwei fã ye fen, sain anĩ bun teneub ganan daũ felen.
Od de anim, saa ado teneub gama tailef are, yã nigin faraf foi fen, agef fen, tamo kayau momoiya sã es fiya ado daũ feidleya nẽ naa nigin inon ibodok.
Anĩ ere, turau tar oboiyou, ereb tekelei enei to wedereĩ tu kalauf, Odug bun naa tekelei are tausen yar gen, agef fen, tausen yar are naa tekelei gen.
Odug ĩ, yogon promis od kisi falauf nigin, tunĩ age dedig gen, to foi yedig. Ĩ taka daũ feleyan ileya itor ken, ganan waud falei fouf nigin, sain meluk tari yeĩdig.
Anĩ ere, Odug nẽ naa are, bẽ tamo gen isiyouf. Saa gududũ ye fen, iwaikalauf, ereb ereb nanaal teneub inon are ganan yam daũ falauf, agef fen, teneub ado ereb ereb ganan ĩ bun ibodok are yaor fouf.
Naab enei bun, ereb ereb ganan daũ falauf, anĩ nigin, ã tamo kayau naig fiya bagai wõya nigin kisi gef? Ã fateul ubodõg fen, Negur nẽ tobonunã bun ubodõgouf.
Ã, Negur nẽ naa tarig fen, kaisã bagai isiyouf nigin ololo gouf. Naa anĩ bun, yam saa daũ falauf, ereb ereb nanaal teneub inon are uruwam naan kalauf.
Anĩ ere, ada yogon promis od tarou fen, saa mata ado teneub mata ololo tafef, are madur tamo kayau an dibodõf.
Age fiya nigin, turau tar oboiyou, ã enei tari gef nigin, Odug mala bun amuyẽ sã, od sã wowãg fen, ĩ ado wauĩ katõ gouf nigin kabĩ totol walogouf.
Ãgenei kisi bun, neda Odug sain meluk tari fiya are, kel yaleya nigin gouf, are neda turada oboida Pol ĩg Negur kisi biya ifenẽ di, ã bun pas itoton kilei.
Ĩ yogon pas ganan bun, eig fe itotoid fen, enei nigin wogõ yen. Yogon pas bun, ereb ereb tunĩ keleĩya nigin lakĩ fiya bagai ibodok, are idi keleĩ sa ken, momoiya ilef isif anidi, Negur nẽ Itotoya tunĩ bun age difedig gen, falei difeid fen, dogo daũ feidleya bun diledig.
Anĩ nigin, turau tar oboiyou, ã enei mogo keleĩ nigin, lo wal fiya tamo neid kũ fenẽyam to guri diyei ken, dile ãgenei modoũ biya utorõg fen, kubũ geya nigin lo welegei.
Anĩ ere, neda Odug ado Isennadaya, Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ado keleĩ bun, odugouf. Ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya gama ado faimud ibodkalauf! Momoi.
Are ĩ gariya bun tamal, are amã mogo karĩ maun, are amã mogo malamam mailen, are amã mogo mail fen, amã imamam kobũ mafen–anĩ amã mata ibodõya nẽ Od mau fen, kurõ mafesif.
Mata are wõ yen. Amã anĩ mail fen, anĩ nigin kurõ mafesif. Age mafe fen, amã, mata ibodkeleya ĩ, Tama ado dibod ken, amã bun wõ yen anĩ, ã yaor mafe marokeneik.
Amã ereb mailen ado karĩ maun anĩ, ã yaor mafe marokeneik, are ãg amã geid nigal taũf nigin age mafef. Age fe di, neda nigal yũya are, Tama ado yogon Naal Jesus Kristus geid nigal taũf.
Amã nemã waumã kulĩya barikãf nigin enei matotof.
Od enĩ, amã ĩ bun tamal karĩ mau fen, ã yaor mafe marokeneik: Negur ĩ lalan, ĩ bun gugum taka to ibodok.
Ada ĩ geid nigal tauk tau fen, gugum bun tayõf are, ada tadeg fen, momoi anĩ bunem to tabodok.
Anĩ ere, ĩ lalan bun ibodok gen, adag lalan bun tayõf are, ada abob geid nigal taũf, age tafe di, Negur Naal, Jesus nẽ naud anim, mosor ganan bun tamal kulo fadalauf.
Ada mosor sã tauf are, ada dug tadeg ken, momoi anĩ ada namedan ibodõya sã.
Ada neda mosor kurõ tafalaisiyouf are, ĩ yogon od dõ fiya biya fen, madur bagai, anĩ nigin, ĩ fau neda mosor nigin weder tu kel fen, ada neda madur bagai sã anĩ ganan bun tamal kulo fadalauf.
Ada mosor to tanon tauf are, ada, Negur ĩ idegẽya tamal tau fen, in od ada namedan to ibodok.
Neu kesu tar, ã mosor to unogouf nigin, aya enei atotkeneik. Anĩ ere, taka ĩ mosor inouf are, taka ada isennadauf nigin yogon Dei irokenẽdig anĩ ibodok, ĩ Jesus Kristus, madur bagai.
Ĩ neda mosor nigin Negur nẽ didi yo fiya nẽ sesewi fiya, are neda mosor nigin dogol sã, anĩ ere, tenebur tamo kayau ganan neid mosor nigineg.
Ada keleĩ, ada yogon ĩtãfiya dõ tafef are, ada mogo ĩ keleĩ.
Tamo ĩ aya ĩ keleĩ ye fen, ereb ĩ irok anĩ to dõ fouf are, ĩ idegẽya tamo, agef fen, momoi anĩ ĩ bun to ibodok.
Anĩ ere, taka ĩ yogon od dõ fef are, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya are momoi bagai ĩ bun kisi felef. Anĩ bunem, ada ĩ bun tabodok anĩ ada keleĩ.
Aib taka ĩ bun abodok yef, ĩ Jesus age fedig gen age fouf bagai.
Turau tar oboiyou, aya ĩtãfiya mata to atotkeneik, anĩ ere, ĩtãfiya tubu, are abob nigin wau laa fiya anĩ, ã uruwa Jesus nigin momoi gen sain bunem karĩ gen. Ĩtãfiya tubu enei are, od ã karĩ gen anĩ.
Anĩ ere, aya ĩtãfiya mata atotkeneik, are anĩ nẽ momoi anĩ, ĩ bun ado ã bun mogo ulegef, ere nigin, gugum mogo iwaikele di, lalan momoi bagai anĩ mogo so fef.
Taka ĩ lalan bun abodok ye fen, yogon tura nigin to orof, ĩ fau gugum bun ibodok.
Aib taka ĩ yogon tura nigin wau laa fef, ĩ lalan bun ibodok, age fe di, ereb anim ĩ ye tũ fiya nigin, ĩ bun taka to ibodok.
Anĩ ere, aib taka ĩ yogon tura nigin to orof, ĩ gugum bun ibod ken, gugum bun iyõdig. Ĩ narib ilef anĩ, ĩ keleĩ sã, ere nigin, gugum anim ĩ mala ifofakelen.
Aya kesu tar ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ãgenei mosor in yana bunem weder tu kelen.
Aya tama tar ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ã ĩ gariya bun ibodok anĩ keleĩ. Aya kesu oosi ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ã sane anĩ mogo wal gen.
Aya kesu tar ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ã Dei anĩ mogo keleĩ. Aya tama tar ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ã ĩ gariya bun ibodok anĩ keleĩ. Aya kesu oosi ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ã totol ado, age fe di, Negur nẽ od ã bun ibodok, age fe di, ã sane anĩ mogo wal gen.
Ã teneub enei be, ereb taka tenebur ibodok anĩ nigin to wauĩ laa fouf. Taka ĩ teneub enei nigin wau laa fouf are, Dei nẽ wau laa fiya ĩ bun to ibodok.
Ere nigin, ereb ereb ganan tenebur ein ifaref–mosor tamo nẽ oroya, yogon mala ile oroya ado, ereb ĩ ado fen ereb ĩ age fef anĩ nigin yana yaleseya–are Dei bun tamal to isif, anĩ ere, tenebur tamal isif.
Teneub ado yogon oroya are sa kalauf, anĩ ere, tamo Negur nẽ oroya dõ fef, ĩ mata ibodkalauf.
Neu kesu tar, sain enei are idikeleya sain. Kristus nẽ kiwai isif anĩ, ã mogo karĩ gen, age fiya gen, gamag Kristus nẽ kiwai tar musei disin. Anĩ bunem, sain enei are idikeleya sain anĩ, ada keleĩ.
Idi uruwa bun, ada geid tabod ken, ada bun tamal dilen, anĩ ere, idi momoi bagai neda sã. Ere nigin, idi nedam are, idi ada geid tabodom. Anĩ ere, idi ada bun tamal dilen anim, idi ganan neda sã anĩ yaor fen.
Anĩ ere, ã, Kristus ĩ Fateul anĩ bunem, Awa Uur Fateul waleg fen, ã ganan momoi anĩ keleĩ.
Aya ã momoi anĩ keleĩ sã nigin to atotkeneik, anĩ ere, ã momoi anĩ keleĩ nigin ado, idegẽya taka momoi anĩ bun tamal to isif nigin, aya ã atotkeneik.
Ai anĩ idegẽya tamo? Tamo, Jesus ĩ Kristus yeya anĩ wa fef anĩ. Tamo age fiya, are Kristus nẽ kiwai. Ĩ, Dei ado Naal wa fedif.
Taka ĩ Naal wa fef, ĩ bun Dei sã. Aib taka ĩ Naal kurõ fesif, ĩ bun Deig ado.
Ereb ã gariya bunem karĩ gen anĩ, ã bun agef ibodõf nigin lo walagauf. Ago gouf are, ã Naal bun ado Dei buneg ubodõgouf.
Agef fen, enei anĩ ereb ĩ age afouf fadan, are mata ibodkeleya.
Aya, idi ã kũ fenẽya bun dirouleyeĩya nigin age difef anidi nigin, enei atotkeneik.
Ã nigin, Awa Uur Fateul ã ĩ bun tamal walegen are, ã bun ibodok, age fe di, aib takam ã ifelneĩya nigin lau fiya taka to ibodok. Anĩ ere, yogon Awa Uur Fateul anim, ereb ereb ganan nigin ã ifelneĩdig. Age fe di, Awa Uur Fateul anĩ momoi bagai, idegẽya sã, anĩ nigin, ã ifelnein kilei anĩ, ĩ bun ubodõgouf.
Neu kesu tar, gama ĩ bun agog ubodõgouf, ago ge di, ĩ wõ youf sain bun, ĩ isi di, ĩ mala bun, ada kumĩ sã ado mama sã tafarauf.
Ã, ĩ madur bagai anĩ keleĩ youf are, ã keleĩ, tamo idi ereb madur age difef anidi ganan ĩ bunem gogũ fedin.
Tamada, ada bun, wau laa fiya fatuk bagai ifanadan, anĩ nigin, Negur, ada in gere tar yedig. Are ada age fiya. Teneub enei ada nigin keleĩ sã, ere nigin, teneub enei ĩ nigin keleĩ sã.
Turau tar oboiyou, ada gama Negur nẽ gere tar. Age fe di, ada naig be fiya bagai wowã tauf, are fau yaor fiya sã. Anĩ ere, ada keleĩ, ĩ isyouf sain bun, ada ĩ gen wowã tauf, ere nigin, ada ĩ bagai anĩ tailauf.
Aib taka ĩ bun wau iseya anĩ ado, ĩ karẽtut bagai gen, ĩ yogo karẽtut ouf.
Aib taka mosor inof, ĩ lo wal fef. Momoi bagai, mosor are lo wal fiya.
Anĩ ere, ã keleĩ, ĩ ada neda mosor yalelauf nigin wõ yen. Agef fen, ĩ bun mosor sã.
Taka ĩ bun ibodok, ĩ mosor to inof iledig. Taka ĩ mosor inof iledig, ĩ to ilen be, oo, ĩ nigin keleĩ san.
Neu kesu tar, ã takam to idegneĩf. Aib taka ĩ ereb madur age fef, Odug ĩ madur bagai gen, ĩ madur.
Aib taka ĩ ereb mosor age fef, ĩ Satan nẽ, ere nigin, Satan ĩ gariya bunem mosor inof isin. Negur Naal ĩ, Satan nẽ kabĩ anĩ daũ falauf nigin wõ yen.
Taka Negur bunem gõ fen, ĩ mosor to inof iledig, ere nigin, Negur nẽ faat ĩ bun ibodok. Ĩ mosor inof ileya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, ĩ Negur bunem gõ fen.
Ada ai anĩ Negur nẽ gere tar ado, ai anĩ Satan nẽ gere tar anĩ, naig tafe keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Aib taka ĩ ereb madur to age fef, ĩ Negur nẽ kesu sã, aib taka ĩ yogon tura nigin to wau laa fef, ĩg Negur nẽ kesu sã.
Od enei ã gariya bunem karĩ gen, are ada abob nigin wauda laa fouf bagai.
Ã Kain gen to ago gouf, ĩ Satan nẽ fen, yogo tura yukesin. Ere nigin ĩ yogo tura yukesin? Ere nigin, yogon tobonunã are sane fen, yogo tura nẽ tobonunã are madur.
Turau tar, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau sane diyeĩf are, to terẽ gouf.
Ada keleĩ, ada laa tator ken, mata ibodõya bun telen, ere nigin, ada neda turada tar nigin wauda laa fef. Aib taka ĩ to wau laa fef, ĩ laa bun ibodok.
Aib taka ĩ yogon tura nigin to orof, ĩ tamo yukesiya tamo, agef fen, ã keleĩ, tamo yukesiya tamo ĩ bun, mata ibodkeleya sã.
Ere anĩ wau laa fiya naig tafe ada keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Jesus Kristus ĩ ada nigin yogon mata itoron. Anĩ nigin, adag turada tar nigin neda mata tatorõf bagai.
Aib taka ĩ safina ado fen, yogon tura lau fiya bun ibodok anĩ ile fen, ĩ nigin wau to yuk, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya naig fe ĩ bun ibodok?
Neu kesu tar, ada od be, sigorada wogõya bunem wauda to laa fouf, anĩ ere, age tafedig ado momoi bun age tafouf.
Anĩ bunem, ada momoi bagai nẽ anĩ, ada keleĩ youf, age tafe fen, ada wauda yogon mala bun si inouf,
ada neda wauda, ada nigin kafĩ fiya ifanadauf sain anĩ buneg, age fouf. Ere nigin, Negur ĩ neda wauda wal fiya, agef fen, ĩ ereb ereb ganan nigin keleĩ.
Turau tar oboiyou, ada wauda kafĩ fiya to ifanadauf are, ada Negur mala bun kumĩ sã totol tafar fen,
ereb ada ĩ to tafiyek anĩ, ĩ bun tamal talouf, ere nigin, ada yogon ĩtãfiya dõ tafe fen, ereb ĩ orof anĩ age tafef.
Yogon ĩtãfiya are eig fiya. Negur Naal, Jesus Kristus nẽ yana nigin momoi tau fen, ĩ ada irokanadan kilei, abob nigin wauda laa fouf anĩ.
Idi yogon ĩtãfiya dõ difef anidi, ĩ bun dibodok, agef fen, ĩ idi bun ibodok. Ĩ ada bun ibodok anĩ, naig tafe ada keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Ada Awa Uur ifanadan anĩ bunem, ada anĩ keleĩ.
Turau tar oboiyou, uur ganan nigin to momoi ge fen, idi Negur bun tamal be sã anĩ ulogouf nigin, idi es wiyẽdigouf, ere nigin, idegẽya profet musei teneub ganan bun diyokelef.
Negur nẽ Awa Uur naig ge ã keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Uur ganan Jesus Kristus ĩ tamo bouwa bun isin anĩ dirõdig, are Negur bun temeleid.
Anĩ ere, uur ganan Jesus nigin wa difef, are Negur bun temeleid sã. Enei are Kristus nẽ kiwai anĩ nẽ uur, are ĩ mogo isif ya anĩ karĩ gen, gamag ĩ mogo tenebur ibodok.
Neu kesu tar, ã Negur nẽ ubodõg fen, idi wal wiyẽdigen, ere nigin, ĩ ã bun ibodok anĩ, ĩ tenebur ein ibodok anĩ wal fiya.
Idi tenebur temeleid, anĩ nigin, idi tenebur nẽ lo fiya bunem wogõ de di, tenebur tamo kayau idi karĩ difiyẽdidig.
Ada Negur bun temelada, age tafe di, aib ĩ Negur keleĩ, ada karĩ fadadig, anĩ ere, aib ĩ Negur bun tamal sã, ada to karĩ fadadig. Anĩ bunem, ada momoi bagai nẽ Awa Uur ado kũ fenẽya nẽ uur nigin keleĩ youf.
Turau tar oboiyou, abob nigin wauda laa fouf, ere nigin, wau laa fiya are Negur bunem isidig. Ganan waud laa fedig idi, are Negurem gõ fedi di, idi Negur keleĩ.
Aib taka ĩ to wau laa fedig, ĩ Negur keleĩ sã, ere nigin, Negur ĩ wau laa fiya.
Negur nẽ wau laa fiya eig fe ifelnadan. Ĩ yogon Naal tekelei bagai, ada ĩ bunem mata tabodõf nigin, tenebur sur fen.
Wau laa fiya are yeir. Ada Negur nigin wauda to laa fen, anĩ ere, ĩ ada nigin wau laaf fen, yogon Naal, neda mosor nigin Negur nẽ didi yo fiya nẽ sesewi fiya anĩ sur fen.
Turau tar oboiyou, Negur ĩ ada nigin agef wau laa fen nigin, adag abob nigin wauda laa fouf bagai.
Takam Negur to bagai ilen. Anĩ ere, ada abob nigin wauda laa fouf are, Negur ada bun ibod ken, yogon wau laa fiya ada bun kisi falauf.
Ada keleĩ, ada ĩ bun tabodok, agef fen, ĩ ada bun ibodok, ere nigin, ĩ yogon Awa Uur ada ifanadan.
Ada tail fen, kurõ tafeis, Dei, yogon Naal tenebur enei nẽ kel yaleya tamo wõ youf nigin sur fen, taudig.
Aib taka Jesus ĩ Negur Naal youf are, Negur ĩ bun ibodok, age fe di, ĩ Negur bun ibodok.
Age fiya nigin, ada, wau laa fiya ada nigin Negur ado anĩ kelei ken, momoi taudig. Negur ĩ wau laa fiya. Aib taka wau laa fiya bun ibodok, ĩ Negur bun ibodõ di, Negur ĩ bun ibodok.
Naab age fiya bun, wau laa fiya ada atun kisi fele di, ada es fiya naa bun, kumĩ sã, totol tafarauf, ere nigin, tenebur ein, ada Kristus gen tabodok.
Wau laa fiya bun, kumĩ taka to ibodok. Anĩ ere, wau laa fiya kisi feleya bagai anĩ, kumĩ irudig, ere nigin, kumĩ mala solo sane ado iledig. Taka ĩ kumĩ yef, ĩ wau laa fiya bun, kisi feleya bagai to wõ yef.
Ada wauda laa fedig, ere nigin, ĩ ketem ada nigin wau laa fen.
Aib taka ĩ aya Negur nigin wau laa fef ye fen, yogon tura nigin to orouf are, ĩ idegẽya tamal. Ere nigin, aib taka ĩ yogon tura ĩ iledig anĩ nigin to wau laa fef are, ĩ Negur to ilen anĩ nigin wau laa fiya kisi feleya sã.
Kristus ĩ ada ĩtãfiya enei ifanadan. Aib taka Negur nigin wau laa fef, ĩ yogon tura nigineg wau laa fouf bagai.
Aib taka ĩ Jesus ĩ Kristus yef, ĩ Negurem gõ fen, agef fen, aib taka tama nigin wau laa fef, ĩ yogon kesu nigineg wau laa fef.
Ada Negur nẽ gere tar nigin wauda laa fef ya anĩ, naig tafe keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Negur nigin wau laaf fen, yogon ĩtãfiya dõ fiya bunem.
Negur nigin wau laa fiya, are yeir. Yogon ĩtãfiya dõ fiya. Agef fen, yogon ĩtãfiya are, ada age tafouf nigin morõ to ifanadadig,
ere nigin, ganan Negur bunem wowã den idi, tenebur nẽ oroya wal difedig. Momoiya bunem, ada tenebur nẽ oroya wal tafedig.
Aim anĩ tenebur nẽ oroya wal fef? Ĩ, Jesus Negur Naal ye fen, momoi yef anim dogol.
Enei anĩ, naan igũya nẽ naan ado laa nẽ naud bunem isin, are Jesus Kristus. Ĩ naan bunem dogol to isin, anĩ ere, naan ado naud bunem isin. Agef fen, Awa Uurem anĩ kurõ fesif, ere nigin, Awa Uur ĩ momoi bagai.
Towo anidim kurõ difesif.
Awa Uur, naan ado, naud. Agef fen, towo are tekelei wogõ def.
Ada tamom kurõ difesif anĩ taledig, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ kurõ fesiya are tamo nẽ wal fiya. Negur nẽ kurõ fesiya are yeir, ĩ yogon Naal nigin kurõ fesin.
Aib taka Negur Naal nigin momoi yef, ĩ kurõ fesiya od enei in wau bun ibodok. Aib taka Negur nigin to momoi yef, ĩ Negur idegẽya tamo yef, ere nigin, ĩ Negur yogon Naal nigin od kurõ fesin anĩ to momoi yef.
Kurõ fesiya od are yeir. Negur ada mata ibodkeleya ifanadan, age fe di, mata enei are yogo Naal bun ibodok.
Taka ĩ Naal ado, ĩ mata ado, taka ĩ Negur Naal sã, ĩ mata sã.
Aya, ã Negur Naal nẽ yana nigin momoi gef anĩ, mata ibodkeleya ã bun ibodok anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin enei atotkeneik.
Negur mala bun, ada kumĩ sã totol ado anĩ eig fiya. Ada yogon oroya dõ tafe fen, ereb taka nigin to tafiyẽf are, ĩ ada karĩ fadauf.
Age fe di, ada ereb nigin to tafiyek, ĩ karĩ fadadig anĩ ada keleĩ youf are, ada keleĩ, ereb ada to tafiyek are ada talef.
Aib taka ĩ yogon tura mosor laa bun to irouledig anĩ ino mog, ilouf are, ĩ tura nigin kosẽ ye di, Negur tura mata ifenẽf. Aya idi nedi mosor laa bun to guri feid irouledig anidi nigin wogõ auf. Mosor laa bun guri feid irouledig are ibodok. Aya mosor anĩ nigin kosẽ youf nigin to wogõ auf.
Kũ fenẽya ganan, are mosor, agef fen, mosor laa bun to guri feid irouledig anĩ ibodok.
Ada keleĩ, aib taka Negur bunem wõ yen, ĩ mosor to inof iledig. Negur Naal ĩ kulatun fiyẽ di, Satan nẽ anim ĩ to daũ fiyẽf.
Ada keleĩ, ada Negur nẽ gere tare di, teneub ganan Satan nẽ anĩ farumen ibodok.
Takag ada keleĩ, Negur Naal isi fen, ada keleĩ fokõ fanadan, are ada, Negur momoi bagai anĩ, keleĩ youf nigin age fen. Age fe di, ada, Negur momoi bagai anĩ bun tabodok, are yogon Naal Jesus Kristus bun. Ĩ momoi bagai Negur fen, mata ibodkeleya anĩ.
Neu kesu tar, idegẽya waitou so wiyẽdigouf.
Aya, sios nẽ mudur ado, kayau Negurem igirnen ado yogon gere tar bun pas enei atotof. Aya momoi anĩ bun ã nigin wau laa fedig, are aya dogol sã, anĩ ere, ganan idi momoi nigin keleĩ anidig,
are momoi anĩ ada namedan ibod ken, ada geid ibodkalauf anĩ nigin.
Wau ifenẽya, wau yũya ado, wau inosiya, Dei Negur ado Jesus Kristus, Dei nẽ Naal bunem, momoi ado wau laa fiya bun ada geid ibodõf.
Aya ogon gere tar tunĩ, Dei ada irokanadan kilei, momoi bun diyõ mog, ail fen, fatuk bagai wau al fen.
Gama, kayau oboiyou, aya ĩtãfiya mata õ to atotkonok, anĩ ere, ada gariya bunem talen anĩ dogol. Ada abob nigin wauda laa fouf anĩ, aya to afef.
Enei anĩ wau laa fiya, are ada yogon ĩtãfiya dõ fiya bun tayõf. Enei anĩ yogon ĩtãfiya, are ã gariya bunem mogo karĩ gen kilei, ã wauĩ laa fiya bun uyõgouf.
Idegẽya tamo musei, teneub ganan bun diyok, idi Jesus Kristus tamo bouwa bagai bun isin anĩ wa difedig. Tamo age fiya ĩ idegẽya tamo fen, ĩ Kristus nẽ kiwai.
Ã nigin amã kabĩ totol maledig anĩ, ege kilẽ to ilauf nigin ado, ã mala solo kisi feleya bagai walogouf nigin lo walagauf.
Taka ĩ Kristus nẽ ifelnẽya anĩ idod ken, anĩ bun to ibodok, ĩ namen Negur to ibodok. Aib taka ĩ ifelnẽya anĩ bun tobol fef ilef, ĩ namen Dei ado Naal dibodok.
Aib taka ã bun isi fen, ifelnẽya enei to irou isiyouf, ĩ ãgenei fõ bun to waleg uroulagauf, ĩ aaneg to wiyẽgouf.
Aib taka ĩ aan fiyek, ĩ yogon kabĩ sane bun weim kabĩ dalef.
Aya ã bun itotoya nigin musei ado, anĩ ere, aya pepa ado ink nem itotoya nigin to orouf. Age fiya ban, aya ã ki ayei ken, abob nawa bun wogõ tauf nigin wau irok, age tafe di, wauda al fiya anĩ isokosauf.
Ogon main Negurem igirnen anĩ nẽ gere tar, nedi aanya sur difef.
Aya, sios nẽ mudur ado, turau oboiyou Gaius, aya ĩ nigin momoi anĩ bun, wau laa fedig, ĩ bun pas enei atotof.
Turau oboiyou, ogon malãkanon biya ibodok gen, õ boũ biya ibod ken, ereb ereb ganan õ nigin biya ilauf nigin, aya kosẽ auf.
Turau tar tunĩ disi fen, õ momoi anĩ biya bagai dõ wo fen, momoi anĩ bun toku uyõdig anĩ dirokana di, aya fatuk bagai wau al fen.
Aya gereu tar momoi anĩ bun diyõdig karĩya anim, wau al fiya ereb ereb ganan wal fiya anĩ ifanadig.
Turau oboiyou, õ, turada tar idi, õ bun yaũ tamo anidi nigin el wo, biya ago wedidig.
Idi ogon waũ laa fiya nigin sios dirokenẽdin. Õ idi tobonunã Negur orof kilei sur wediyouf are, õ biya ago wouf.
Idi Odug yana nigin, haiden bun tamal isennẽya taka to dale fen, dilen.
Anĩ nigin, ada, momoi anĩ nigin weim kabĩ talouf nigin, tamo age fediya tasennẽdiyouf bagai.
Aya sios bun pas atoton, anĩ ere, Diotrefes uyulil ibodõya nigin wau laa fedig, ĩ nemã od to karĩ yedig.
Anĩ nigin, aya asiyouf sain bun, aya ĩ ereb age fef, amã nigin dumen od sane bagai irõdig anĩ yaor afouf. Anĩ dogol sã, ĩ turada tar yalediya nigin itoron. Ĩ idi turada tar yaleya nigin orodif anidig katũ feid fen, idi sios bun tamal yalelnẽdin.
Turau oboiyou, ereb sane anĩ to madẽ wo, ereb biya anĩ madẽ wouf. Aib taka ereb biya age fef, ĩ Negur bun tamal. Aib taka ereb sane age fef, ĩ Negur to ilen.
Demetrius ĩ nigin, ganan biya wogõ dedig, momoi anĩ ĩ yogog age fedig. Amãg ĩ nigin biya wogõ maudig, age mafe di, ã keleĩ, nemã wogõ are momoi.
Aya õ bun itotoya nigin musei ado, anĩ ere, aya pepa ado ink nem itotoya nigin to orouf.
Aya kaisã ileyõya nigin wau irok, age afe fen, abob nawa tail fen, wogõ tauf.
Wau inosiya õ bun ibodõf. Turada tar ein, nedi aanya sur difef. Turada tar an mugu mugu yeneid nem aan wediyouf.
Aya Jud, Jesus Kristus nẽ ferfer fen, Jems ne tura, idi Negurem iweignẽdin, Tamada Negur idi nigin wau laa fe di, Jesus Kristus kulatun fedidig anidi bun, pas enei atotof.
Wau yũya, wau inosiya ado, wau laa fiya, ã bun barikãf.
Turau tar oboiyou, aya, ã kel yaleya ada weim talen anĩ nigin atotkeneĩf nigin, kisi totol aledig, age a mã, aya kisi afen, aya atot fen, momoiya sain ganan nigin sain tekelei bun, Negur nẽ tamo kayau imeid bun ifenẽdin anĩ, el ge kulatun gouf nigin, totol bagai arokeneĩf, are deuf aun.
Ere nigin, tamo tunĩ idi daũ feidleya nigin mogo kulu yeneid itoton anidi, ã keleĩ sã mog, ã atun iminẽyan disin. Idi Negur nẽ ibodõya sã, idi neda Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya anĩ falei difel, karika tobonunã sane inoya nẽ gen dino fen, Jesus Kristus neda Uyu Irouya fen Odug yana wa difedig.
Momoi, ã enei ganan mogo keleĩ, anĩ ere, aya ã, Odug yogon tamo kayau Isip bun tamal kel gei fedin, anĩ ere, dum idi to momoi den anidi daũ feidlen anĩ nigin, baban wedereĩ fokõ afouf nigin orouf.
